akarot kiṃ mahādeva akarot putrakāmas tu akarot pṛthivīm imām akarot priyayā saha akarot sa pṛthusvaram akarot saṃnatiṃ dakṣe akarod ātmanaḥ putraṃ akarod ṛṣibhir vṛtaḥ akarod dhayamedhāṃś ca akarmaṇaḥ karma puṇyaṃ akarmaṇaivāpyata iti akalpayaṃ tathā cedhmaṃ akalpaḥ kalpasaṃtuṣṭaḥ akaṣāyakṛtaś caiva akasmāc ca mṛtaṃ bālaṃ akasmād yadi vā kasmād akārayad aghāntakam akāraṃ hṛdaye dhyātvā akāraḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ akārī tasya karmaṇaḥ akārpaṇyaṃ dvijottamāḥ akālajajarādīnāṃ akālaṃ kālam ātmanaḥ akālikamanoharam akiṃcanebhyaḥ sādhubhyo akutsanā ca patite akurvanta mahāyatnaṃ akurvann abhiṣecanam akulīnāḥ kulīnāś ca akṛtajñas tato hi saḥ akṛte śrāddhakarmaṇi akṛtvāgrāṇi bhokṣyanti akṛtvā pādayoḥ śaucaṃ akṛśāśvakṛśāśvau tu akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī akaitavī ca yā vṛttiḥ akrudhyann aprasīdaṃś ca akrudhyann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca akrūrakrūrakeṇāpi akrūrayajñā iti te akrūra yamunājale akrūravasudevau ca akrūraś cāndhakaiḥ sārdham akrūras tu tadā viprā akrūraṃ kukurāndhakāḥ akrūraṃ vākyam abravīt akrūraḥ krūrahṛdayaḥ akrūraḥ pradadau dhīmān akrūraḥ suṣuve tasmāc akrūrāgamavṛttāntam akrūrāt kāśikanyāyāṃ akrūreṇa samaṃ gantum akrūreṇograsenāyāṃ akrūreṇograsenāyāṃ akrūro gokulaṃ prāptaḥ akrūro atha mahābhāgo akrūro nānvapadyata akrūro antaram anviṣyan akrūro api viniṣkramya akrūro api sakeśavaḥ akrūro mathurāṃ purīm akrūro asmīti caraṇau akrodhanaś ca na dveṣṭā akleśena mahāmatiḥ akṣajñas tatra nārada akṣatās tu yavauṣadhyaḥ akṣatair abhinandya ca akṣatair daivatārakṣāṃ akṣatriyāś ca rājāno akṣayaś cāprameyaś ca akṣayaś cābhavac chrīmān akṣayaṃ vaṃśam ikṣvākoḥ akṣayaṃ sarvam eva tat akṣayaḥ śāśvato anantaḥ akṣayān yānti narakāṃs akṣayāṃ pitaras teṣāṃ akṣayo asau vaṭo abhavat akṣayyaṃ nas tv iti pitṝn akṣarakṣarayor uktaṃ akṣarakṣarayor etad akṣarakṣarayor eṣa akṣaratvaṃ nigacchati akṣaraṃ kṣaram ātmānam akṣaraṃ kṣaram eva ca akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva akṣaraṃ dhruvam evoktaṃ akṣarākṣarayor vyaktiṃ akṣavan muniśārdūla akṣirogān kukṣirogān akṣīṇāmarṣam atyalpa- akṣetraṃ kṣetram ātmānam akṣauhiṇībhiḥ sainyasya akṣauhiṇyā tu sainyasya akṣauhiṇyo hi bahulā akṣṇāṃ sahasraṃ surarāṭ sa bibhrad akhaṇḍacandrābhimukhaḥ akhaṇḍam api vā māsaṃ akhaṇḍābhir mahādhvare akhaṇḍitahradaṃ tathā akhanan pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ akhileneha bho dvijāḥ agaṇyapuṇyavirahād agatiḥ pāpakarmaṇām agatīnāṃ śarīriṇām agandhavad amūrtimat agamaṃ balasūdana agamyagamyasaṃjñāni agamyagāmī yaś ca syāt agamyastrīratir vāpi agamyaṃ lomaharṣaṇam agamyāgamane ratāḥ agamyāgāmī duṣṭātmā agastyadattaśāpasya agastyapītasyāmbhodheḥ agastyamārkaṇḍasapippalādyāḥ agastyam ṛṣiśārdūlaṃ agastyam ṛṣisattamam agastyam ṛṣisattamam agastyasya prasādāc ca agastyasyāśramaṃ gaccha agastyaṃ tapatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ agastyaṃ muniśārdūlaṃ agastyaḥ punar apy āha agastyaḥ prāha tān sarvān agastyāc ca diteś caiva agastyenoditān devān agastyo agāt sasaṃbhramaḥ agastyo atriś ca kaśyapaḥ agastyo vākyam abravīt agādham etad ajarāmaraṃ ca agādhaṃ makarālayam agādhena tadā reje agāyata varāpsarāḥ agāradāhī mitraghnaḥ agāvahaṃ mahātmānaṃ agoptāraś ca goptāro agnaye tan nyavedayat agnayo vai na dīpyante agnikāryaṃ tataś cakre agnikārye ca dīpe ca agnikuṇḍaṃ ca tatraiva agnijihvo darbharomā agnijīvā yato matāḥ agnijvālo mahāghoraḥ agnijvālo mahāghoraḥ agnitīrtham iti khyātaṃ agnitīrthaṃ ca tat proktaṃ agnitīrthaṃ tad ākhyātam agnitīrthe śucir naraḥ agnityāgiṣu yat pāpam agnidaṇḍaṃ ca dāruṇam agnidāyiṣu yad vane agnināgnisamo bhūyaḥ agninā dhriyate loko agninā yojayām āsa agninā veṣṭyamānāṃś ca agninirṛtivāyvīśa- agniputraḥ kumāras tu agnipratiṣṭhitaṃ liṅgaṃ agniprabhaṃ ca puṃnāgaṃ agnipraviṣṭaṃ rājānaṃ agnipraveśaṃ yaḥ kuryān agnibhūto agnivarcasām agnimātram upādāya agnim āhavanīyaṃ ca agnir apy āha tān devāñ agnir apy āha tān devān agnir ādyāś ca bhāsvantaṃ agnir āpaḥ śubhā vāṇī agnir āpaḥ sarvam iti agnir āpo raviḥ pṛthvī agnir āsyaṃ kṣitiḥ pādau agnir indro atha varuṇas agnir iṣṭvā mahāyajñair agnir jyeṣṭha iti prāhur agnir vāyuś ca sūryaś ca agnir hotā purā tv āsīd agniśuśrūṣakaś caiva agniśuśrūṣaṇaparaṃ agniś ca ṛtvijo devā agniś cakāra tatrānnaṃ agniś ca rūpavān devas agniś ca varuṇaḥ kaḥ syāj agniś ca vāḍavo vipra agniś caiva sa havyavāṭ agniṣṭud atirātraś ca agniṣṭomaphalaṃ tasya agniṣṭomas tathā deho agnisomātmakaṃ jagat agnis tadovāca savistaraṃ tāṃ agnis tuṣṭo abhavat tataḥ agnis tv apsu śarīreṣu agnihotrakuśeṣv eva agnihotram upāsīno agnihotraratāḥ kecit agnihotraratāḥ kecit agnihotrasya śālāyā agnihotraṃ ca vedāś ca agnihotre sadā sthitān agniṃ ca bhartāram athāśramaṃ ca agniṃ jalagataṃ dṛṣṭvā agniṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya agniṃ prāpsye kiṃ nu kāryaṃ bhaven me agniṃ procur divaukasaḥ agniḥ prītyā suvarṇāṃ tāṃ agniḥ suvarṇasya gurur agnīṣomīyam aindrāgnaṃ agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇān pūjya agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cātha agne kiṃcic ca kīrtyate agner aṅgiraso jāto agner apatyam ubhayaṃ tathaiva agner apāṃ vada jyaiṣṭhyaṃ agner ahaṃ tava putrasya bhāryā agner āpas tathā yonir agner duhitaraṃ mune agner dehe ca śāṃbhavam agner bhrātaram uttamam agner bhrātā sa havyavāṭ agneś ca pūjakā ye ca agneś ca pūjakā ye ca agneś caiva tathā priyā agnes tadvacanād indraḥ agneḥ putro hiraṇyas tu agneḥ prabhāvāt paruṣam agneḥ priyakaraṃ sadā agneḥ prītikaraṃ nityaṃ agneḥ sūnoḥ putrikāyās tathāgneḥ agnau kariṣya iti taiḥ agnau toye antarikṣe ca agnau nikṣepayām āsa agnau pratiṣṭhitā sā tu agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyag agnau vipannā ye vīrāḥ agnau vipannā ye vīrāḥ agnau śuddhigatāṃ sītāṃ agnau śuddhigatāṃ sītāṃ agnau hoṣyaḥ paśuś cāyaṃ agnyantaram upādeyaṃ agnyantaraṃ naiva te atra agnyavasthe tu salile agnyupāsanamātraṃ ca agrataḥ siṃhavyāghrādyair agranyastaviṣāṇāgraḥ agram uddhṛtya saṃtyajet agrāmyasukhabhogāś ca agrāsinaṃ somabhujaṃ aghoraghorarūpāya aghoreṇa ca bho viprāḥ aghaughavinivāraṇam aṅkam āroḍhum arhasi aṅkam āroḍhum arhasi aṅkārūḍhau tataḥ kṛtvā aṅkuśair mudgarair daṇḍaiḥ aṅke tam āropya jahāsa somaḥ aṅgadaṃ kāñcanaṃ divyaṃ aṅgadaḥ kanakāṅgadaḥ aṅgado jāmbavāṃs tathā aṅgado hanumāṃs tathā aṅgaputro mahān āsīd aṅgasthair na tilaiḥ kuryād aṅgasparśo vidhīyate aṅgaṃ sumanasaṃ svātiṃ aṅgaḥ prathamato jajñe aṅgāt sunīthāpatyaṃ vai aṅgānāṃ kulavardhanam aṅgāni tava deveśa aṅgān vaṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca aṅgārako api śukrasya aṅgāravarṣabhītaṃ ca aṅgāravālukāmiśraṃ aṅgāravālukāmiśraṃ aṅgārasetus tatputro aṅgārasetor dāyādo aṅgārebhyaḥ samudbhūto aṅgāropacayaṃ nāma aṅgā vaṅgāḥ sasuhmakāḥ aṅgiraḥpramukhāś caiva aṅgirāś ca bhṛguś caiva aṅgirāḥ kaśyapo atriś ca aṅgirāḥ paruṣaṃ vādīd aṅgirāḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ aṅgirāḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ aṅgirāḥ prāha bhārgavam aṅgirobhyas tadādityās aṅgirobhyo nyavedayan aṅgulānāṃ śatāni ca aṅgulīṣu pṛthak pṛthak aṅgulyagre tathā daivaṃ aṅgulyardhārdhamātraṃ tu aṅguṣṭhakṛtyaiva rasātalād adho aṅguṣṭhakṛtyaiva rasātalādi aṅguṣṭhamātrāḥ puruṣā aṅguṣṭhād brahmaṇo jajñe aṅguṣṭhe hastayor nyaset aṅguṣṭhottarato rekhā acakṣurviṣayaṃ prāptaṃ acandrārkagrahā bhūmir acaraś ca caraś caiva acaraṃ caram ātmanaḥ acarāṃś ca carāṃś caiva acalaṃ caiva purataḥ acalās tv āvilā viprā acalo nirmalo vyāpī acintayat tu kaunteyaḥ acintayad atho śīghraṃ acintā vigatajvarāḥ acintyaprabhāvo bahuviśvamūrtiḥ acintyam ajam avyayam acintyarūpaṃ vividhaṃ mahac ca acchede jagatāṃ nāśaś acyutaṃ puruṣottamam acyutaṃ puruṣottamam ajakas tasya cātmajaḥ ajakasya tu dāyādo ajakasya tu dāyādo ajako nāma vīryavān ajanmany ajare anāśiny ajam akṣayam avyayam ajam akṣayam avyayam ajamīḍhasuto jātaḥ ajamīḍhasya keśinyāṃ ajamīḍhasya patnyas tu ajamīḍhāt tu nīlyāṃ vai ajamīḍho dvimīḍhaś ca ajayad baladevo atha ajarāmaraṇaṃ prāptam ajaśyāmaḥ sa pārśvābhyāṃ ajaśyāmau tu tatpārśvau ajas tu rāghavo jajñe ajas tvam ajaro devaḥ ajas tvaṃ vibhur avyayaḥ ajaṃ purāṇam ajaraṃ sanātanaṃ ajātaputrāya sutān ajātaśatruḥ śatrūṇāṃ ajānatā kṛtam idaṃ ajānatā yajñavidyāṃ ajānan kāśyapas tasmān ajāmukhasaraṃ caiva ajārajonugamanaṃ ajāvikaṃ prauṣṭhapadyāṃ ajāś cāpi nirotsyanti ajāśvaṃ mukhato medhyaṃ ajitasyāprameyasya ajitākhaṇḍa śrīkṛṣṇa ajīgartam iti khyātam ajīgarto api covāca ajījanat puṣkariṇyāṃ ajena sacarācaram ajeyam ajaraṃ nityam ajeyaś cāpy adhṛṣyaś ca ajeyaṃ tridaśārcitam ajeyaḥ kṣatriyair loke ajeyaḥ puruṣavyāghra ajeyo abhūt sudāruṇaḥ ajaikapād ahirbudhnyas ajaikā yā samākhyātā ajaiḍakaṃ kharoṣṭraṃ ca ajo aprameyaḥ śivaśabdavācyas ajo vṛddhaḥ suro bhadro ajo hi krīḍayā bhūpa ajñayā saṃpravṛttavān ajñātam asyāsti hṛdi sthitasya ajñātāṃ tridaśair api ajñātvā granthatattvāni ajñātvaikaguṇaṃ karma ajñānatamasā channo ajñānatimirāndhānāṃ ajñānadāridryarujas tathaiva ajñānanāmnā tamasāvṛto ahaṃ ajñānaprabhavaṃ mahat ajñānasāgare ghore ajñānaṃ jñānasadbhāva ajñānaṃ tāmaso bhāvaḥ ajñānāt pāpakāriṇī ajñānād vā pramādād vā ajñānināṃ pravartante ajñāne jñānapūrve tu añcitāni samantataḥ añjanā cādrikā caiva añjanā cādrikā tathā añjanā nāma tatrāsīd añjanāyāṃ tathā vāyor añjano nāma nārada añjiko narakaś caiva aṭantaḥ sāgarāḥ sarve aṭanti vasudhāṃ viprāḥ aṭann araṇye śarvaryāṃ aṭann āste sa gautamaḥ aṭamānā itaś ceto aṭavyāḥ saravāś ca ye aṭitvā vividhān deśān aṭṭaśūlā janapadāḥ aṇimādiguṇair yutam aṇimā laghimā prāptir aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām aṇuprāyāṇi dhānyāni aṇḍam apsu pralīyate aṇḍānāṃ tu sahasrāṇāṃ ata ūrdhvaṃ cyute dharme ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi ata eva hi somasya ata evānyapuruṣa- atattvaṃ tattvam ātmānam atapovidya eva ca atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva atalaṃ vitalaṃ tathā atasīpuṣpasaṃkāśaṃ atasīpuṣpasaṃkāśaṃ atas tvām aham āśritaḥ atas tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ atas tvāṃ sarvabhāvena ataḥ kartuṃ na śaknomi ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi ataḥparaṃ pravakṣyāmi ataḥparaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ ataḥ paraṃ suraśreṣṭha ataḥ prabhṛti niścitam ataḥ saṃprāpyate svargo atikopād dvijo vaiśyam atikramakṛtaṃ pitaḥ atikramam imaṃ śrutvā atikramya bhayodvignā atikrānte vivāhe tu atikrāmanti bho dvijāḥ aticañcalaceṣṭita ati candraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca atitāpibhir atyarthaṃ atitīvraṃ natāsmi tat atithipragraharatas atithibhyas tu yo dadyād atithir yasya bhagnāśo atithiś cāpavādī ca atithis tu kuśāj jajñe atithis tvaṃ namo astu te atithiḥ svargasaṃkramaḥ atithes tv abhavat putro atināmā sahiṣṇuś ca atipūjitalābhāṃs tu atipūjitalābhais tu atibhaktiṃ tu saṃcintya atimuktaiś ca kiṃśukaiḥ atimuktaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ atimuktaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ atimuktaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ atimuktaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ atiriktakaṭūni ca atiriktā tatas tv aham ativardhati cādharme atiśīghram amanyata atiśrameṇa mahatā atiṣṭhan mandaradroṇyāṃ atisaṃmānitas tena atītasarvāvaraṇo akhilātmā atītaṃ śatam ādāya atītā vartamānāś ca atītā vartamānāś ca atītya janmāni bahūni tāta atītya sakalāṃs tataḥ atītyaiko avatiṣṭhate atītyottaram ambhodhiṃ atīndriyam anīśvaram atīva triṣu lokeṣu atīva duḥkham āpannā atīva mamatākulaḥ atīva vanitāpriyam atīva sumanoharam atīva sumanohare atīva hi manoharāḥ atīvādya bhaviṣyati atīvārtaṃ harir dṛṣṭvā atīvāsīt sudāruṇam atīvopadrutā janāḥ atṛpte tu viparyayaḥ ato guhyatarārthaṃ tad ato jiṣṇo sarvam etat tyajasva ato deśān pravakṣyāmi ato deśeṣu saṃsthitaḥ ato adhikaṃ te abhiratā mahārhe ato bhavadbhiḥ satatam ato vakṣyāmi kiṃcana ato vadanti munayo ato avadan surasaṃghāḥ kṛtārthāḥ ato avaśiṣṭam annādyaṃ atyadbhutāni karmāṇi atyantakrodhasakto api atyantavimukhe daive atyantopahataṃ ca yat atyamlakaṭutīkṣṇoṣṇa- atyamlaṃ cātilavaṇam atyamlaṃ picchilaṃ sūkṣmaṃ atyarthadūrajātāṃś ca atyartham anutapteyaṃ atyarthaśītalāmbhobhiḥ atyugratapasaṃ dṛṣṭvā atyugraṃ dīptatapasaṃ atyugrāṃ pratimottamām atyunnataṃ nagaṃ dhīro atra kiṃcic ca ye dadyur atra janmasahasrāṇāṃ atra tu snānamātreṇa atra tu snānamātreṇa atratyaṃ vāri yaḥ kaścit atra pratiṣṭhito dharmo atra buddhir vidhātavyā atra bhuktiś ca muktiś ca atra yad vāri śobhiṣṭhaṃ atra ye bhaktitaḥ śaṃbho atra ye bhaktitaḥ snānaṃ atra vaktuṃ na śakyate atra vaṃśaprasaṅgena atra vaṃśe purāṇajñā atra vaḥ kīrtayiṣyāmi atra vaḥ saṃśayo mā bhūj atra vo varṇayiṣyāmi atra sūryaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ atra snātvā śucir bhūtvā atra snānād avāpnuyāt atra homo vidhīyatām atrāgantuṃ na cāyāti atrāpi tattvaṃ paramaṃ atrāpi bhārataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ atrāpy upāyaḥ ko asmākaṃ atrāplavanamātreṇa atrāplavād eva mahānti pāpāny atrābhiṣekamātreṇa atrāvatīrṇayoḥ kṛṣṇa atrāste rasam utkṛṣṭaṃ atrāham asmi baddhaiva atrijāhaṃ havyavāha atriputro mahātejāś atrir ārādhayām āsa atrir vasiṣṭho bhagavān atrivaṃśe samutpannas atriśreṣṭhāni gotrāṇi atremāṃ sundarīṃ devīṃ atraikanyūnapañcāśat atraiva ca tapas taptvā atraivārādhayiṣyāmi atrauṣadhyo jagadvandyā atha kiṃ punar uktena atha kiṃ bahunoktena atha kiṃ bahunoktena atha ketumataḥ putro atha cāsmiṃś ca niṣkṛtim atha citrarathasyāpi atha cen mānuṣe loke atha tasyās tapoyogāt atha tāṃ pratimāṃ dvāri atha te pitaro viprā atha teṣāṃ prasanno abhūd atha teṣu sthiteṣv evaṃ atha tau taṃ samāgamya atha duryodhano rājā atha dṛṣṭvā satīṃ devīm atha deyo varo asmākaṃ atha devī satī yat te atha devy āsasādaikā atha niḥśvāsajo viṣṇor atha parvatarājo asau atha putrasahasrāṇi atha putrān imāṃs tasya atha pṛthvī tadā vākyaṃ atha bilvāṃs tathā jīvān atha bhīmarathasyāsīt atha bhūtvā kumārī sā atha merugireḥ śṛṅgāt atha ratnāni cānyāni atha rājā vivasvantam athavā kiṃ tadālāpaiḥ athavā kiṃ bahūktena athavā kiṃ bahūktena athavā kiṃ muniśreṣṭha athavā kauravādīnāṃ athavā tava doṣaḥ kaḥ athavā tu jarāṃ rājaṃs athavā te asti saṃdeho athavā dakṣiṇāyane athavā dātukāmo asi athavā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam athavā devapitaro athavā draṣṭukāmā vai athavānantarakṛtaṃ athavā necchasi māṃ tvam athavānyatra saṃgarāt athavānyaiḥ surair api athavāpi kamaṇḍalum athavāpi parābhavaḥ athavā brāhmaṇaiḥ puṇyais athavā bhakṣitaḥ katham athavā māyayā deva athavā yādṛśaḥ sneho athavā yuddhakāmas tvaṃ athavā yogināṃ gehe athavā lapsyase muktiṃ athavā vipramukhyāya athavā śuṣkavṛkṣāgre atha vijñāya yogena atha vṛtte vivāhe tu athaveha tapas tapsye athavaitais tathā tribhiḥ atha śakraḥ prakopeṇa atha śuśrāva śabdaṃ ca atha satyavatī sarvaṃ atha sa vrajamānas tu atha sā daśame māsi atha sā śuddhasaṃkalpā atha siṃhaṃ pradhāvantam atha siṃhaḥ prasenasya atha so agniparītāṅgo atha so ajagavaṃ nāma athākṣaṃ nṛpates tathā athāgāc candratilakas athāgāt tatra śailendra athājapārśva iti vai athātatāyinaṃ viprā athādityasya nāmāni athādityād ṛte hy eṣāṃ athādityena cāgatya athānantarato rājā athāntarāntaraṃ dharmam athāntarikṣād ābhāṣya athānyac cāpi kāraṇam athānyad api tac chṛṇu athānyad api vakṣyāmi athāpare janapadā athāpi kriyamāṇe vai athāpi baddhā puruṣeṇa kācit athāpi mātar etat syān athāpy etad ahaṃ manye athābravīn me madhukaiṭabhāriḥ athābhavad bhūmipateḥ sudharmaṇaḥ athāśvinau cāpi bhiṣagvarau dvāv athāsāv api mūrkhas tu athāsau pitaraṃ prāha athāsminn antare viprās athāha kṛṣṇam akrūro athāha devī duḥkhārtā athendraṃ menakā prāha atheśa māṃ kaṃsaparigraheṇa athaivam āghoṣitamātra eva athonmīlya yamo netre athopavāhyād ādāya athomā yogasaṃsiddhā athovāca rajis tatra atho vighnam anādṛtya adadāt sa mahāyajñe adadāṃ poṣaṇāya tām adarśanam anuprāpto adahat saparicchadam adāmbhikaḥ satyavādī aditir janayām āsa aditir ditir danuś caiva aditir ditir danuś caiva aditir devamātā ca aditir munisattamāḥ aditiṃ varuṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ aditiṃ saṃpraviśya vai adites tu sutā jyeṣṭhāḥ adityā tu kṛtānujño adityāḥ kuṇḍale dātuṃ adityaivaṃ stuto viṣṇuḥ adīkṣitas tu tasyaiva adīkṣitas tu nāmnaiva aduṣṭāṃ māṃ vigarhasi aduṣṭāṃ rudatīṃ rudan aduḥkham asukhaṃ brahma adṛśyata tadādityas adṛśyā tu mṛgī tasmai adṛśyāya tatas te api adṛṣṭāṃ puruṣaiḥ strībhir adṛṣṭvā tu paśuṃ ramyaṃ adainyam anudīrṇatvam adbhir acchābhir ādarāt adbhir eva dhṛtaṃ sarvam adbhir dadau sutaṃ vīraṃ adbhiś ca sahitāḥ sarvā adbhiḥ śaucam avāpyate adbhiḥ saṃpatsyate hy annaṃ adbhutaṃ cātimānuṣam adbhutaṃ cātimānuṣam adbhutāni rasaḥ sparśaḥ adbhyaś ca puruṣas tathā adbhyas tu jāyate sarvaṃ adya kāryaṃ mama mahat adya taṃ dehayantāraṃ adya niṣkauravām urvīṃ adyaprabhṛti ye kuryur adya prabhṛty asau śiṣya adya prabhṛty ātmajayos adya bhīṣmaṃ sabāhlikam adya manye prayojanam adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ tapaḥ adya me saphalaṃ tapaḥ adyāpi ca hitārthāya adyāpi na nivartante adyāpi na nivartante adyāpi paridṛśyate adyāpi brahmaṇo rūpaṃ adyāpi sa caraty uta adyāpy asyā hi māhātmyaṃ adyāpy āghūrṇitākāraṃ adyāpy āste mahāmate adyaiva deva kaṃso ayaṃ adyaiva putro yaṣṭavyaḥ adyaiva spṛṣṭvā mama hastapadmaṃ adrikāyāṃ ca nirṛter adriketi tathāparā adritīrthaṃ tad ucyate adrir nāma piśācarāṭ adriḥ paiśācamūrtimān adveṣī sumukhaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ advaitaṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ dvaitaṃ adhamā jāyate gatiḥ adhamottamamadhyāś ca adhamottamau na teṣv āstāṃ- adharmakāriṇaḥ pāpāḥ adharmaparivarjitam adharmam anubhāṣate adharmam upasevate adharmarucayo viprās adharmavṛddhyā lokānām adharmaśaṅkunā tena adharmasaṃkṣaye muktas adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā adharmasya gatir brahman adharmahā mahādakṣo adharmaṃ kuru mā veṇa adharmaṃ dharmam ity āhur adharmaṃ sevamānās tu adharmāṇāṃ nivṛttyarthaṃ adharmād eva jantavaḥ adharmāśritam eva ca adharmeṇa samāyukto adharmeṇeha cetasā adharme adhīyamānasya adhaś cordhvaṃ ca te dīptās adhaś cordhvaṃ ca raśmibhiḥ adhaś cordhvaṃ ca hṛdaye adhaś cordhvaṃ tathā madhye adhaś cordhvaṃ tathaiva ca adhastān muniśārdūlāḥ adhaḥ paśyanti nārakān adhaḥśirobhir dṛśyante adhikaṃ kiṃ vada prabho adhikaṃ śuśubhe tataḥ adhikaṃ śuśubhe tadā adhikaḥ kvāpi vartate adhikāraphalapradam adhikārī bhavet paścāt adhiyajñas tathaivāgnir adhiruhyārcayām āsa adhiruhyotpatiṣyāmi adhirūḍho mahāratham adhiṣṭhātāram avyaktam adhiṣṭhātāram eva ca adhiṣṭhāteti rājendra adhiṣṭhānaṃ kṣetram āhur adhiṣṭhānaṃ yadā yatra adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā adhiṣṭhāne ca vai buddhyā adhiṣṭhitaṃ keśava nityam eva adhītavedaḥ sarpo api adhītaṃ vismarati yas adhītās tena vedā vai adhītya caturo vedān adhītya caturo vedān adhītya jīvāt sarvāś ca adhītya svargam anvicchaṃs adhīyāno vipra iva adhīyīta ca bho dvijāḥ adhīṣva yad abhīpsitam adhunā kīdṛśaṃ phalam adhṛṣyāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ adhogataṃ mahābhāgā adhogatānāṃ taptānāṃ adhogatinirodhakṛt adhogatinirodhakṛt adhomukhas taiḥ kriyate adhomukhaḥ patet tatra adhomukhaḥ patet tatra adho ahaṃ cordhvam eva ca adhyavasyed yathāmati adhyātmagatiniścayam adhyātmaniṣṭhaṃ sarvajñaṃ adhyātmam atimānuṣam adhyātmaṃ naiṣṭhikī siddhir adhyātmaṃ yad idaṃ viprāḥ adhyātmaṃ vistareṇeha adhyānagatam avyayam adhyāpayati vai pṛthak adhyāpayasi nityaśaḥ adhyāpayasva bho brahmañ adhyāpayiṣye sadṛśaṃ adhyāpya vedaśāstrāṇi adhyāste ca mahān agniḥ adhyāste ca mahī tathā adhyāste vibudhaiḥ sārdhaṃ adhyāste sarvadā suta adhyāsya ca dhanūratnaṃ adhyetavyā trayī nityaṃ adhyetā yogasāṃkhyānāṃ adhvanaḥ śatayojane adhvaryuṃ sāmagaṃ vipraṃ adhvānaṃ jvalanaprabham adhvānaṃ jvalanaprabham adhvānaṃ tat sudurgamam adhvānaṃ tat sudurgamam adhvānaṃ nīyate dehī adhvānaṃ nīyate dehī adhvānaṃ subhayaṃkaraiḥ adhvānaṃ subhayaṃkaraiḥ anakṣajño halī dyūte anaḍvāhaṃ ca gāś caiva anadhyāyeṣu sarveṣu anantabalapauruṣaḥ anantam aparājitam anantaraṃ cakraśārṅge anantarāśino ye ca anantavāsudevasya anantavāsudevasya anantavāsudevasya anantavāsudevasya anantaś cācyuto devo anantaś cāpi ko vipra anantas tvaṃ jagadguruḥ anantasya na tasyāntaḥ anantasyopabhogāya anantaṃ jagatāṃ patim anantaṃ paramācyutam anantaṃ brahmaṇā saha anantaṃ vai prayacchanti anantaḥ kapilo bhānuḥ anantaḥ śaṃbhur avyayaḥ anantākhyaṃ mahābalam anantākhyaṃ vāsudevaṃ anantāyācyutāyeśa anantenāprameyena ananyamanasā caiva ananyaśaraṇān hare ananyaśaraṇo hariḥ anapatyo abhavad rājā anapākṛtya tāṃ rājan anapāyanirāyāsa- anabhragatam evorvyāṃ anamitram amitrāṇāṃ anamitrasuto nighno anamitrasuto rājā anamitraṃ mahābalam anamitraṃ mahābalam anamitrāc chanir jajñe anamitro raghuś caiva anayād bhrātṛghātanam anayā dharmatṛṣṇayā anayā vīkṣitaṃ sarvaṃ anaraṇyasuto nighno anaraṇyas tu putro abhūd analas tv amarān āha analaṃ ca yathāprīti anaśnan deham utsṛjya anaṣṭadravyatā caiva anaṣṭadravyatā yasya anasūyā ca sāmānyā anākhyeyaprayojana anākhyeyasvarūpātmann anākhyeyābhidhāna tvāṃ anāgatāś ca saptaite anāgatāś ca saptaite anāgatyā bhavatāṃ cācireṇa anāgā yo hato vipras anātmanaḥ sarvato api anātmany ātmavijñānaṃ anāthabandho narasiṃha kasmāt anāthānām iha nṛṇāṃ anādaraṃ ca guruṣu anādinidhanaṃ caiva anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ anādinidhanaṃ param anādinidhanāv etau anādinidhano devaḥ anādinidhano anantaḥ anādinidhano brahmā anādinidhano bhavān anādinidhano hariḥ anādinidhano hy ātmā anādinidhano hy eṣa anādimadhyanidhanaṃ anādimadhyāntam ajasya viṣṇoḥ anādir ādir viśvasya anādis tvaṃ jagaddhātar anādiṃ jagatām īśam anādyantāmṛtājeya anādyapāram ajaraṃ anādy avidyātimira- anādyo lokanātho asau anādhṛṣṭir yaśasvinam anādhṛṣṭiḥ kanavako anāyattaiḥ samastaiś ca anāyastatanuḥ svastho anāyāsena deveśa anāyāsena vai yānti anāryebhyo virūpikām anāryeṣu kṛtaghneṣu anāryair akṛtātmabhiḥ anāvṛṣṭibhayāt prāyaḥ anāvṛṣṭibhaye tasmin anāvṛṣṭir ajāyata anāvṛṣṭir atīvogrā anāvṛṣṭir adharmo vā anāvṛṣṭir abhūt pūrvaṃ anāvṛṣṭis tu puṣṭimān anāvṛṣṭyā tadā rāṣṭram anāśayaj jagannātho anāsaḥ sa purotpannas anāso ahaṃ kiṃ karomi anāhvānasya kāraṇe anāhvāne sureśasya aniketas tapo acarat aniketā hy anāhārā aniketo hy araṇyeṣu anicchann api mucyate anicchann api mucyate anicchann api yas tatra anityatvena ca snehaṃ anityaṃ sukham āsīnam anitye duḥkhabahule anindhanaṃ jyotir iva praśāntaṃ aniruddha namas te astu aniruddhapuraṃ paścād aniruddham athāninye aniruddhas tvaṃ mādhavas aniruddhaṃ tathottare aniruddhādayaś cānye aniruddhāya te namaḥ aniruddheti jalpatām aniruddho raṇe ruddho aniruddho raṇe ruddho anirdiṣṭā mayā bhikṣā anirdeśyam arūpaṃ ca anirdeśyavapus tvaṃ vai anirvāpya pitṝn devān anilasya śivā bhāryā anivṛtte śive tasyā anīśatvāt pralīyante anīśvaram atattvaṃ ca anīśvaraḥ kathaṃ mucyed anīśvaraḥ praśāntātmā anukampārtham eva ca anukūlaṃ tathālāpam anukūlaṃ tu te deva anukūlā bhaviṣyāmi anuktvā vacanaṃ kiṃcit anukrośād adharmaṃ ca anugacchanti devatāḥ anugacchasva mām iti anugacchasva māṃ bhadre anugṛhṇanti lokāṃś ca anugṛhṇan sadā bhaktān anucintya sṛjāmy aham anujagmuś ca taṃ nṛpam anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve anujagmus tu taṃ nṛpam anujagmus tu taṃ sarve anujagmus tu rājānaṃ anujānantu te sarve anujānantv imaṃ sarve anujānīhi māṃ tataḥ anujānīhi māṃ tataḥ anujānīhi māṃ bhara anujānīhi māṃ śubhe anujñātas tu viprais taiḥ anujñātas tv agāt tataḥ anujñātaṃ ca bhikṣānnam anujñātaḥ suragaṇaiḥ anujñātuṃ tvam arhasi anujñāṃ dātum arhatha anujñāṃ dehi bhagavan anutaptā śikhā caiva anutkṛṣṭasya cādarāt anuttamān īhamāno jagāma anuttamāny apy atisaṃskṛtāni anuttamāny uttamarūpavanti anuttaraṃ nāma tapo anutpanne kārttikeye anutpanneṣu bahuṣu anudvego hy avasthitiḥ anunīyarkṣarājaṃ tu anuprāptas tathā cāśvo anuprāptās tataḥ sarvāḥ anuprāpto hayārūḍhas anubhūtam ivānyasmiñ anubhūtaṃ tathā prabho anumatyā guror api anumanyanti devatāḥ anumanyantu ṛṣayo anumanyantu devatāḥ anumanyantu munayo anum apy abravīd rājā anumānād dhi manyate anumānya dvijān sarvān anumānya nṛpaproktaṃ anumeyā dvijottamāḥ anumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ anumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ anuyātaśaratkāvya- anuyātas tataḥ param anuyāto mahāyogi- anuyānti yathā putrās anuyāsyanti cāmarāḥ anuyuktau tatas tau ca anuraktajanatyāge anurāgaparaṃ janam anurāgamanoramam anurāgāt tatas tasya anurāgeṇa śaithilyam anurūpaguṇatvāc ca anur neti tadovāca anulepanakarmaṇi anulepanam ādadyān anulepabhujas tathā anulepaṃ ca pradadau anuvartitavāñ jalam anuvartitavān iha anuvartitavān mohād anuvrajya tu tān sarvān anuṣṭhānaṃ karoti vai anuṣṭhānaṃ ca karmaṇām anuṣṭhānair anuṣṭhitaḥ anuṣṭhite yathāśāstraṃ anuṣṭheyaṃ sadā puṃbhiḥ anusaṃdhāya pūruṣam anuhrāda iti khyātaḥ anuhrādo harihayo anuṃ ca dvijasattamāḥ anūḍho didhiṣūpatiḥ anūpadeśaṃ sūtāya anṛṇaḥ sa sukhī bhavet anṛtaṃ ye na bhāṣante anekaśatasāhasrair anekaśatasāhasrair anekaśatasāhasrair anekaśatasāhasraiḥ anekaśatasāhasraiḥ anekaśirasāṃ viprāḥ anekāntaritaṃ laghu anekāvartagambhīraṃ anena karmaṇā devi anena tava dharmeṇa anena tu mahābhāga anena duṣṭakapinā anena parivāreṇa anena bharaṇaṃ kṛtam anena madamattena anena vidhinā gacchan anena saha me kṣayam anena sahasā brahman anenasaḥ samākhyātāḥ anenasaḥ suto rājā anena sāmyaṃ yāsyāmi anena stavena ye vai anenās tu kakutsthasya anenaiva ca dehena anenaiva pathā somaṃ anenaiva vidhānena anenaiva vidhānena anenaiva vidhānena anaitihyam anāgamam anos tu putro dharmo abhūd anaupamyaṃ mahardhimat antakaś cābhavad dogdhā antakāntakṛte caiva antakāla ivādityaḥ antakāle ca saṃprāpte antakāle api putrasya antarapralayo dvijāḥ antarasya suyajñas tu antaraṃ mānuṣasya ca antaraṃ mānuṣasya ca antaraṃ lakṣayen naraḥ antarātmani saṃlīya antarikṣaṃ tathā nābher antarikṣe ca keṣāṃcin antar ūrdhvam adhaś caiva antare yāni tīrthāni antare sa pavitrakān antargṛhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ antargrāheṇa grastas tu antarjalatale sthitam antarjalād āvasathād antar jale japet paścāt antar jale yad āścaryaṃ antarjānus tathācāmet antarjyotiḥ sa evoktaḥ antardadhe jagatsraṣṭā antardhānagataṃ dvijāḥ antardhānagataṃ natvā antardhānam upāgataḥ antardhānaṃ gate tasmin antardhānaṃ gato brahman antardhānād vyajāyata antardhāmno havirdhāmā antar bahiḥ sarvata eva santaṃ antarbhāvaviśuddhātmā antarbhūmigatas tatra antarvarti ca yad bhūtam antarvartī paro vāpi antarvasati bhogena antar vicārayām āsa antarvedyāṃ dvijaḥ kaścid antarveśmani nārada antar veśma sa candramāḥ antavantam amuṃ śatruṃ antas tasya na vidyate antaṃ jijñāsavas te vai antaṃ nṛpatisattamaḥ antaṃ naivāśakad draṣṭuṃ antaḥpuranivāsinyaḥ antaḥpuravarāṃ devīṃ antaḥpurāṇāṃ mañcāś ca antaḥpurāṇi rājñāṃ ca antaḥpure ca patitaṃ antaḥ prabhūtaṃ bālaṃ ca antaḥpraveśakāmo asau antaḥ sthitaḥ prāṇarūpo ante tāpasamartho ayaṃ ante puṇyaparikṣayāt ante śivapuraṃ vrajet ante samastaṃ ca yam āviveśa anto yasya na vidyate antyajātāṃś ca mlecchāṃś ca antyajān antyajātīṃś ca antyā madhye nivatsyanti antyāvasāyipravarās ta ete andhakaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ andhakāt kāśyaduhitā andhakāram apāraṃ ca andhakāram apāraṃ ca andhakārasamāyuktaṃ andhakārasamāyuktaṃ andhakārīkṛte loke andhayor ekaputrayoḥ andhaṃ tama ivājñānaṃ andhānāṃ badhirāṇāṃ ca andhā vāmaṅkurākāś ca andhās ta eva śrutavarjitā ye andhrakāś ca kaliṅgāś ca annakrītā vayaṃ kiṃ no annadaprabhave namaḥ annadānaphalaṃ mahat annadānaṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt annadānena mānavaḥ annadāyānnapataye annapānīyarahitā annaprakāraiḥ sakalopacāraiḥ annaprakiraṇaṃ yat tu annapradāne dāne ca annabhoktre ca goptre ca annam aśnanti ye devāḥ annam ucchiṣṭam eva ca annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke annam etābhir eva syād annam eva praśaṃsanti annasya subahūn viprā annasya hi pradānena annasya hi pradānena annaṃ caturvidhaṃ caiva annaṃ dattvā dvijātibhyaḥ annaṃ dehi mahāphalam annaṃ bhuṅkte gṛhī sadā annaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ supākikam annaṃ yaś corayen naraḥ annaṃ ye tu prayacchanti annaṃ yo vai prayacchati annaṃ lepabhujeṣv adāt annaṃ śreṣṭham udāhṛtam annaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ annādam akhilaṃ jagat annādyena prajāpatiḥ annāni yena dattāni annāni yena dattāni annāny anyāni medhyāṃś ca annāvaśeṣamiśraṃ vai annenātithibāndhavāḥ anne pratiṣṭhitā lokās anne vyavasthitā sā tu annair munīṃś ca svādhyāyair anyac ca śṛṇu bhūpāla anyac charīram ādatte anyac charīram ādatte anyaj jñeyaṃ tad ucyate anyatīrthaphalādikam anyatīrthaṃ prati dvijāḥ anyatīrthāc chataguṇaṃ anyatīrthāl labhanti te anyatīrthena sādharmyaṃ anyatra gamanāc chāpo anyatra tīrthe sārtheṣu anyatvam upalabhyate anyatvaṃ tadvad etayoḥ anyathā tat kathaṃ bhavet anyathā tān na gaccheyam anyathā tu bhaved doṣaḥ anyathāpi ca kṛtyaṃ te anyathā bho dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ anyathā śāpam arhatha anyathā syāt phalaṃ sarvaṃ anyathaitādṛg anyasya anyad anyac ca jantuṣu anyad unmattaceṣṭitam anyad eva ca kṣetraṃ syād anyad eva ca jñānaṃ syād anyadeveṣu yā bhaktiḥ anyadeśagate kṛṣṇe anyad dhṛdi vacasy anyat anyadvīpeṣu cānyathā anyam anyaṃ janāj janam anyam anyaṃ janāj janam anyam ānīya bhojayet anyas tv āvikṣito rājā anyaṃ kuru mamāvāsaṃ anyaṃ caiva na vedmy aham anyaṃ na rocitavatī anyaṃ brāhmaṇarūpiṇam anyaḥ kṣetrajña ucyate anyān api varān matto anyān api varān subhrūr anyān apy asya vai jñātīn anyāni dravyajātāni anyāyaparivarjitam anyāyāvāptavitteṣu anyāyopārjitair arthair anyāś ca jātayas tvaṃ hi anyāś ca tatra tiṣṭhanti anyāś ca tatra tiṣṭhanti anyāś ca tatra dṛśyante anyāś ca bhāryāḥ kṛṣṇasya anyāś cāpsarasaḥ santi anyāsaktaṃ vilokya tam anyāsāṃ caiva bhāryāṇāṃ anyās tv ayutaśas tatra anyāṃś ca te tadā dūtāḥ anyāṃś ca dīpakān dadyād anyāṃś ca pādapaśreṣṭhān anyāṃś ca maṇibhūṣitān anyāṃś ca sauramantrāṃś ca anyāḥ sahasraśas tatra anyāḥ sahasraśaḥ proktāḥ anyūnaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ anyūnānatiriktāś ca anye ca devās tridivāt tadānīṃ anye ca vānarāḥ sarve anye ca vāramukhyānām anye cātra tataḥ śubhe anye nagarayoṣitām anyenotthāpyate anyena anye api tatra tiṣṭhanti anye api tatra saṃsiddhā anye api devā nijabhāgayuktā anye api lebhire mokṣaṃ anye putrāḥ kulodvahāḥ anye ye caiva nirdiṣṭā anye ye caiva nirdiṣṭā anye vismitacetasaḥ anyeṣām api kurvatām anyeṣāṃ ca suradviṣām anyeṣāṃ caiva dravyāṇāṃ anyeṣāṃ tatra kā kathā anyair jalāśayaiḥ puṇyaiḥ anyair divyair jalacarair anyair devagaṇair divyaiḥ anyair devālayaiḥ sādhyaiḥ anyair nānāvidhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ anyair bahuvidhair vṛkṣaiḥ anyair bahuvidhaiḥ puṣpair anyaiś ca kāñcanaiś caiva anyaiś ca jalajaiḥ puṣpair anyaiś ca bahubhir vṛkṣaiś anyaiś ca bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ anyaiś ca vividhair dhānyair anyaiś ca vividhair vādyair anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣair anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ anyaiś ca vividhaiḥ puṣpa- anyaiś ca vividhaiḥ puṣpair anyaiś ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ puṣpair anyaiś ca sacivair vṛtaḥ anyaiś ca sarvair vividhair vṛto asau anyaiś copāsakair dīnair anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayāt anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayāt anyonyapratibuddhena anyonyabhakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā anyonyam ūcus te sarve anyonyaretovyatiṣaṅgadoṣād anyonyavadham īpsante anyonyavīryasaṅgāc ca anyonyaspardhayā yuktāv anyonyasmin pratiṣṭhitau anyonyasyābhisaṃbandhād anyo aham anyeyam iti anyo aham iti manyate anyo hy asyāntarātmāsti anvagacchat kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ anvagacchat tato viṣṇus anvartham icchayā śastra- anv arthān saṃpravartante anvavāyas tu sumahāṃs anvaṣṭakāsu kramaśo anvahaṃ tasya vāsāya anvārabdhena savyena anvārebhe kapoto vai anvārebhe atha sattrāṇi anvāhāryeṇa karmaṇā anvindraṃ tīrtham uttamam anvindrātreyadaiteya- anveṣayan pariśrāntaḥ anveṣayaṃs tu taṃ jāraṃ apa eva sasarjādau apakārāya daityendrā apakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ apakṛtya dvijottamāḥ apakrānto jarāsaṃdhaḥ apakṣayādyair akhilair asaṅgaḥ apaghātam ariṃdama apacāreṇa veṇasya apatat puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca apatad gautamītīre apatan muśalaṃ cāsau apatyakāmo rohiṇyāṃ apatyatritayaṃ pitaḥ apatyam abhavac chiva apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu apatyaṃ guṇavad bhṛśam apatyaṃ bahuśaktikam apatyādyupakāreṇa apatyānāṃ kathaṃ vṛttir apatyānāṃ kṣamasveha apatyānāṃ tathā priye apatyāni bhaviṣyanti apatyānīha ṣoḍaśa apatyāny atha jajñire apatyāny api nārada apatyena prajāpatim apatyena mahābāho apatyeṣu viruddheṣu apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ apadhvaṃseti bahuśo apanetuṃ tadā veṇas apamānaparākṛtaḥ apamānaṃ puraskṛtya apamārgarate ubhe apamārgasthite yasmād apamṛjyān na vastrāntair apayāte tadākrūre apayāne tato buddhiṃ aparaś ca kṣaras tasmāt aparas tu mahāprājña aparasmin kathāyoge aparaṃ kleśanāśanam aparaṃ tava yad rūpaṃ aparaḥ keśavasyāyaṃ aparaḥ sarvabhūtāni aparādhakṛtaṃ mama aparādhasahasrāṇi aparādhasahasrebhyo aparādhaṃ tu candrasya aparādhaṃ nirañjanaḥ aparādhāt pramucyate aparādho na ca kvāpi aparādho hy ayaṃ mama aparāntān nibodhata aparāntāś ca śūdrāś ca apare ca mahābhāgyā apareṇa ca māṃsāni apare tu hy apāṃ jyaiṣṭhyaṃ apare dambhino nityaṃ apare mānavā devi apare svalpavijñānā aparo api sutaś cāsīd aparṇā tu nirāhārā aparṇām ekaparṇāṃ ca aparyuṣitam uttamam apalagnām imāṃ hitvā apalāyat patau prāpte apavargaṃ ca pṛcchatām apavādī haret pāpam apaviddhais tatas tataḥ apaśyaj janavarjitām apaśyato yathāpūrvaṃ apaśyat kanakācalam apaśyat tasya codare apaśyat pādapāṃś caiva apaśyat phalapuṣpitān apaśyat sa tadā sarvaṃ apaśyat sahasā taṃ tu apaśyat sā vanaṃ ramyaṃ apaśyat striyam uttamām apaśyad ārto duḥkhārtāṃs apaśyad ṛṣisattamam apaśyad vasudhādhipaḥ apaśyantī tam utsukā apaśyan nṛpateḥ sutaḥ apaśyan maṇikuṇḍalaḥ apaśyan munisattamaḥ apaśyaṃ saṃsthitaṃ divi apaśyaṃs tatra te nṛpāḥ apaśyaṃs te tadā vibhum apasavyaṃ ca tatrāpi apasavyaṃ samutkṣipan apahatety uvācaiva apaḥ pītvā payomiśrā apaḥ spṛśanti karmasu apākṛṣyanta cābhīraiḥ apānaḥ paścimaṃ kāyam apāpakaṃ devi tataś ca jātam apām agneś ca saṃvādam apām api guṇo yas tu apām īśaṃ tadābravīt apāyatrāsavarjitam apāradātṛtvakalatraputrān apāraṃ subhayaṃkaram apāsya sā tu gandharvāṃs apāṃ guṇās tathā viprāḥ apāṃ ca namuceḥ śatros apāṃ ca munisattamāḥ apāṃ tu nīlikāṃ vidyān apāṃ tu varuṇaṃ rājye apāṃpatis tava guruḥ apāṃ phenopamaṃ lokaṃ apāṃ vṛddhikṣayau dṛṣṭau apāṃ vai pūjane sthitāḥ api kīṭapataṃgānām api kuryān na kaitavam api kṣayaṃ yānti na saṃśayo atra api duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ api duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ api naḥ sa kule bhūyād api mānuṣyam āpsyāmo api ye nidhanaṃ prāptās api lakṣmīpatir viṣṇur api vandhyāpy aśaṅkitam api varṇāvakṛṣṭas tu api śakyo anuvarṇitum api sākṣāt sadāśivaḥ api svalpena kālena apīśaviṣṇvambujasaṃbhavānām aputrasya sa rājñas tu aputraḥ putram āpnoti aputraḥ sa tu dharmātmā aputriṇī tv atra snānaṃ aputro nṛpasattamaḥ aputro api sa rājā vai aputro labhate putrān apunarmārakaṃ yatra apūjito vighnam atho api mātuḥ apūjyapūjane caiva apṛcchac cārulocanā apṛcchad dhimavān vṛttaṃ apṛcchad vṛddhagautamam apṛthagdharmacaraṇās apṛṣṭenāpi dharmajñāḥ apekṣitam udāradhīḥ apekṣitāprāptito hi apetaprītir asmāsu apo jyeṣṭhatamāḥ kecin apo bhāgagatāś ca ye apo hṛtvā tu durbuddhir apauravā mahī naiva apy aṅgam etad bhagavatprasādād apy ambuśākamūlādyaiḥ apy asau mātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ apratarkyāya śuddhāya apratiṣṭheti narakaṃ apraduṣṭām anuvratām aprabuddham athāvyaktam aprabuddhaṃ yathā vyaktaṃ apramatto yathā dhanvī apramāṇaṃ kariṣyanti apramāṇaṃ kariṣyanti apramādād bhayaṃ jahyād apramādād bhayaṃ tathā apramādād bhayaṃ rakṣed aprameyam anādhṛṣyaṃ aprameyaṃ sanātanam aprameye akhilātmani apralubdhāś ca ye lubdhā apravṛttāḥ prapaśyanti aprāptārthamanorathaḥ aprāptau taddine vāpi aprāpya taṃ hariṃ viprās aprāpyāntam ahaṃ prāyāṃ aprokṣitopayogāc ca apsarā ca nadī yatra apsarā dadṛśe tataḥ apsarāsaṃgamaṃ tataḥ apsarogaṇamaṇḍitaiḥ apsarogaṇasaṃghāś ca apsarobhir alaṃkṛtaḥ apsarobhir alaṃkṛtāḥ apsarobhir alaṃkṛtaiḥ apsarobhiś ca vījitam apsaroyugam ākhyātam apsaroyugam ākhyātaṃ apsaroyugam ākhyātaṃ apsu caiva nivedayet apsu jātāsu sarvatra apsu devīṃ samāyuktām apsu pāriplavāṃ pṛthvīṃ apsu brahma vadanti te apsu śītāsu vedavit aphalāni ca sasyāni aphenaśabdagandhābhir abalā na vimucyante abuddhajanasevanāt abuddhajanasevanāt abuddhatvād dhi manyate abuddham anuvartate abjakaṃ cāpi yat proktaṃ abjakaṃ hṛdayaṃ proktaṃ abjakaḥ sa vṛṣākapiḥ abjakāt paścime tīrthaṃ abjakāl lokaviśrutāt abjayoniḥ pitāmahaḥ abjayoniḥ pitāmahaḥ abdair dvādaśabhir yuktaṃ abdaivataṃ tathāgniṃ ca abbhakṣo varuṇas tāsāṃ abravaṃ taṃ hariṃ tatra abravaṃ dvijasattamāḥ abravaṃ pratipūjayan abravaṃ yad ahaṃ viprā abravīt kapilaḥ śrīmān abravīt tad upaśrutya abravīt paramaprīto abravīd gaccha gaccheti abravīd gaccha brahmāṇaṃ abravīd bhasmasāt kuryāṃ abravīd vacanaṃ devī abhaktam aṭavīprāyaṃ abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaratā abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaratā abhakṣyāṇi dvijātīnāṃ abhakṣyānne ratās te atra abhayaṃ cintayām āsus abhayaṃ vo dadāmy aham abhayaṃ sarvasattvebhyo abhayā ruṇḍikerāś ca abhayenānurūpeṇa abhavac ca saricchreṣṭhā abhavac cātibhīṣaṇam abhavat tan mahat tīrthaṃ abhavat pākaśāsanaḥ abhavat sa tu kālena abhavat snānadānādyair abhavad balināṃ varaḥ abhavad bahudhā kṛśam abhavad vāsudevo asau abhavan danuputrāś ca abhavan balinaḥ śūrās abhavaṃ bhavam ātmanaḥ abhavaṃs taṭasaṃghuṣṭa- abhavāya ca pāṇḍava abhāgyāyā bhṛgūdvaha abhāvāya gavāṃ dvijāḥ abhāvino bhaviṣyanti abhāvo vyavahārāṇāṃ abhikurvīta buddhimān abhijic ca punar vasoḥ abhijñānaṃ tu tan mahat abhijñānāni tasyāhur abhinandya ca taṃ devaiḥ abhinandya tadā pūrur abhinandya varāñ śubhān abhinandyedam ūcatuḥ abhinnaḥ sarvago ananto abhipadya harer bhujau abhiprāyaṃ viditvā tu abhibhūtāḥ punaḥ punaḥ abhimatya ca buddhimān abhimantrya ca yatnataḥ abhimanyur ajāyata abhimanyuś ca daśamo abhimanyeta saṃdhātuṃ abhimanyoḥ parīkṣit tu abhimānapravṛddhena abhimānātimānānāṃ abhimānātmako hy eṣa abhimānī śrutadharaḥ abhimāne jvalaty antaḥ abhimāno mṛṣāvādo abhiramyatām ity uvāca abhivandya vyasarjayam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ abhivādyābhyuvāca ha abhivyāhṛtya saptarṣīn abhiśastas tathā stenaḥ abhiśastā tu sā bhartrā abhiśāpabhayād bhītā abhiṣiktaś ca sugrīvo abhiṣiktaṃ cāmṛtena abhiṣiktās tu nandinā abhiṣikte surapatau abhiṣicya gavāṃ vākyād abhiṣicya tadā rāmaḥ abhiṣicyamānam indraṃ taṃ abhiṣicya yathākramam abhiṣicya vanaṃ yāto abhiṣicya vibhāvasum abhiṣicyādhirājendraṃ abhiṣiñca mṛtaṃ yamam abhiṣiñcasva bhāryāṃ tvaṃ abhiṣekaphalaṃ labhet abhiṣekaṃ cakāra saḥ abhiṣekaṃ ca putrāṇāṃ abhiṣekaṃ ca mārjanam abhiṣekaṃ tayā cakre abhiṣekaṃ mahendrasya abhiṣekaḥ kṛtas tatra abhiṣekān mahātmanaḥ abhiṣekāya tasthire abhiṣekāya śūlinaḥ abhiṣekodakaṃ tatra abhiṣekodakaṃ yac ca abhiṣekodakaṃ yat tu abhiṣeko bhaviṣyati abhiṣektukāmās te sarve abhiṣekṣyanti pāpiṣṭhaṃ abhiṣekṣyamāṇam indraṃ taṃ abhiṣekṣyāmy ahaṃ putram abhiṣṭuta iti khyāto abhiṣṭute narendrāya abhiṣṭūya ca taṃ vāgbhiḥ abhiṣṭūya sa yādavaḥ abhisaṃpūjitaṃ yasmād abhīṣṭaṃ vada kalyāṇa abhīṣṭā na ca rukmiṇī abhīṣṭā sarvadaiva ca abhīṣṭāṃ sarvadā hy asya abhūc ca smṛtigocaram abhūt kṛtayuge viprāḥ abhūt tīrthaṃ mahāphalam abhūn nārada tatrāham abhedyam āhur avyaktaṃ abhedyaṃ ca surāsuraiḥ abhedyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ abhojyabhikṣupākhaṇḍa- abhojyānnāni vāśnāti abhyaṅgaś cāpi śasyate abhyadhāvata duṣṭātmā abhyantaraṃ śarīrasya abhyayur jayam icchanto abhyarcya devatās tatra abhyarcyo bhagavān raviḥ abhyarthito api suhṛdā abhyaṣiñcat tathaivainaṃ abhyaṣiñcat sa nāhuṣaḥ abhyaṣiñcan grahāṇāṃ tvaṃ abhyaṣiñcan narādhipam abhyāgatam anuprāptaṃ abhyāgatam anuśrāntaṃ abhyāgatam imaṃ śubhe abhyāgataṃ pathi śrāntaṃ abhyāgataṃ śrāntam anuvrajanti abhyāyayau mahādevo abhyukṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ abhyukṣya salilena ca abhyutthānam adharmasya abhyutthānam adharmasya abhyutthānādisatkṛtam abhrasthāḥ prapatanty āpo amaṅgalānām api saṃnihantrī amatsaras tvaṃ pratigṛhya buddhyā amantrakaṃ vidhipūrvaṃ amaras tvaṃ sadā kalpe amarāṇāṃ hradaṃ puṇyaṃ amarān idam abravīt amarān samupāgatān amarāvatīṃ tataḥ prāpya amarāṃs trātum arhasi amarāḥ syus tato deva amareṣu ca jāteṣu amarair api duḥsaham amaraiś cāvṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ amartyamartyabhedo ayaṃ amarṣāt pratyabhāg api amarṣeṇa bhavaṃ gorī amātyaṃ bhūpatiṃ tadā amātyaḥ sacivair vṛtaḥ amātyānāṃ purodhasaḥ amātyānāṃ mahāmatiḥ amātyā rājavacanaṃ amātyāṃś ca balaṃ kośam amātyeṣu tathokteṣu amātyair mantribhiś caiva amāvasos tu dāyādo amāvāsyāṣṭamī ṣaṣṭhī amāṃsabhakṣaṇe viprās amūḍhatvam asaṅgitvaṃ amūrtaṃ mūrtam athavā amūrtaṃ mūrtam apy etad amūrtā mūrtimantaś ca amūrtiś cāpy amūrtātmā amūrtis tasya viprendrāḥ amṛtatvāya kalpante amṛtasyāraṇis tvaṃ hi amṛtasyāraṇiṃ divyaṃ amṛtasrāviṇī divye amṛtasvāda eva ca amṛtaṃ gobhavaṃ cājyam amṛtaṃ gautamījalam amṛtaṃ gautamīvāri amṛtaṃ cādhiyogavit amṛtaṃ paramātmā ca amṛtaṃ plāvayan mahīm amṛtaṃ bheṣajaṃ śuci amṛtaṃ mṛtam ātmanaḥ amṛtaṃ vāṅmayaṃ mune amṛtaṃ vedagāthaṃ ca amṛtaṃ suravallabham amṛtaṃ suravallabham amṛtaṃ surasattamāḥ amṛtaṃ soma eva ca amṛtaṃ svarṇam ucyate amṛtān na paraṃ kiṃcit amṛtā sukṛtā caiva amṛtā saiva vikhyātā amṛte tu samutpanne amṛtenāmaratvaṃ syād amṛtenāmarā devāḥ amṛtaiḥ pañcasaṃbhavaiḥ amṛtaiḥ prokṣayiṣyanti amṛtotpādaśaṅkitāḥ amṛtyuṃ mṛtyum ātmānam amedhyāktasya mṛttoyair amedhyena mahāmune amogham etad astraṃ me amogham etan madvīryaṃ amoghaṃ tan munes tejaḥ ambarīṣam ivābhāti ambarīṣas tu nābhāgiḥ ambarīṣo abhavat putraḥ ambarīṣo hariścandro ambikā jagadādhārā ambikāpataye namaḥ ambunā śaucam iṣyate ambumṛcchaucam iṣyate ambhasā tv ekatāṃ prāptā ambhasā puruṣo jātaḥ ambhasāplāvayat patim ambhodhau munisattamāḥ ayajac cāśvamedhena ayajad devatāḥ kās tu ayajñīyāś ca devatāḥ ayanadvitaye śrāddhaṃ ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ ayane tūttare sūryam ayane viṣuve tathā ayane viṣuve tathā ayam anubhaved bandhur ayam indraḥ sahasrākṣo ayam eko arjuno dhanvī ayam eva guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ ayam eva vinodo me ayam evocito mantro ayaścūrṇam akārayat ayasaḥ sparśasaṃsparśo ayaṃ cāsya mahābāhur ayaṃ tu tanayo mama ayaṃ tu navamas teṣāṃ ayaṃ tu navamas teṣāṃ ayaṃ mama sahāyas tu ayaṃ rājā bhaved iti ayaṃ vaivasvato dharmo ayaṃ vyādhaḥ pāparataḥ ayaṃ śāstreṣu nirṇayaḥ ayaṃ sa kathyate prājñaiḥ ayaṃ samastajagatāṃ ayaṃ sa sarvabhūtasya ayaṃ hi vimalo vyaktam ayaḥśaṅkus tathaiva ca ayaḥśirā aśvaśirā ayaḥśṛṅgāṭakais taptaiḥ ayācata mahāmate ayācata mṛtaṃ putraṃ ayācat karuṇāvatī ayācetāṃ svarūpāṇi ayājayad bharadvājo ayājayann aṅgiraso ayājyayājakas tatra ayājyayājakaḥ ṣaṇḍho ayājyayājake ṣaṇḍhe ayāt sa rakṣodhipatiḥ sa tuṣṭaḥ ayuktadātāsi maheśvara tvam ayuktadāteti na saṃśayo atra ayutājit tu dāyādaḥ ayutājitsutas tv āsīd ayodhyādhipatiṃ nṛpam ayodhyām agaman sarve ayodhyāyāṃ tu vaidehi ayodhyāyāṃ mahārājo ayodhyāyāṃ supuṇye ahni ayodhyāvāsibhiḥ saha ayodhyāṃ caiva rājyaṃ ca ayodhyāṃ nagarīṃ prāpya ayodhyāṃ pūrvapālitām ayomayaṃ prajvalitaṃ ayomukhaḥ śambaraś ca arakṣamāṇām āvavrur arakṣitāro hartāraḥ arakṣitāro hartāro araṇīm iva saṃrabdhā araṇyabhogabhugbhiś ca araṇyaṃ praviveśa ha araṇye vijane deśe araṇye vijane nyastaṃ araṇyeṣu ca vatsyanti araṇye ahaṃ vasāmy atha aratiṃ durjayāṃ caiva arājārhaṃ yador vaṃśam arājyā te prajā mūḍha arājyārho api sāṃpratam arātīvā mā nas tārīn arimedāmlavetasān ariṣṭanemiduhitā ariṣṭanemipatnīnām ariṣṭanemir aśvaś ca ariṣṭanemiś ca sutā ariṣṭaś cāpy adhṛṣṭaś ca ariṣṭaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ keśiṃ ariṣṭaḥ samupāgataḥ ariṣṭā tu mahāsiddhā ariṣṭādyais tathā cānyaiḥ ariṣṭā surasā khasā ariṣṭo dhenukaḥ keśī ariṣṭo dhenukaḥ keśī aruṇasyānujaṃ priyam aruṇaḥ prāha bhāskaram aruṇā varuṇā caiva aruṇāvaruṇānadyor aruṇāspadaṃ kāmadaṃ ca aruṇair anilāśanaiḥ aruṇo garuḍaś caiva aruṇo garuḍas tathā aruṇodaṃ mahābhadram arundhatipurogamāḥ arundhatī yathā strīṇāṃ arundhatīvanaṃ caiva arundhatī vasur yāmī arundhatīṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca arundhatyāṃ vyajāyata arūpam arasasparśam arogā rūpavantaś ca arogā rūpavantaś ca arogāḥ prāṇinaś cāsan arkasaṃpuṭasaṃyuktam arghayām āsa sarveśaṃ arghavāri sumantritam arghaś ca kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ arghaṃ caiva prasecayet arghātithyena kīrtitam arghārhān na ca saṃskārair arghyapātraṃ kare gṛhya arghyapātrāṇi piṇḍānām arghyapradātā labhate arghyaṃ kṛtvā ca śūkaraḥ arghyaṃ pūjādikaṃ sarvaṃ arghyeṇa sahitaṃ caiva arcanaṃ ye na jānanti arcayanti yathāvidhi arcayantu yathānyāyaṃ arcayanty arkam arkiṇaḥ arcayann avatiṣṭhate arcayitvā tadā ravim arcayitvā tu pattrakaiḥ arcayitvā vibhāvasum arcayed gṛham āgatān arcayen mallikādibhiḥ arcārhāḥ pāpakarmaṇām arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ arcitaḥ sarvadevānāṃ arcitās taṃ pradakṣiṇam arcibhiḥ saṃtate tasmiṃs arcyatāṃ pūjyatāṃ medhyaṃ arjayitvā vihiṃsakaḥ arjayeyaṃ ca saṃpadam arjitaṃ sukṛtaṃ nānā- arjunasyābhavat kṣayaḥ arjunaṃ dadṛśe svayam arjunaṃ vacanaṃ mama arjunaṃ sayudhiṣṭhiram arjunārthe tv ahaṃ sarvān arjunena nipātitāḥ arjunaiḥ samaparṇaiś ca arjuno api tadānviṣya arṇavāntarvyavasthitau arṇavāntarvyavasthitau artihā sarvalokānām arthajñaḥ svārtham uddiśya arthavādaḥ paraṃ brahma arthavān brāhmaṇo abhavat arthaṃ cainān utsṛjantīśvarās te arthaṃ tasya sa vindati arthaḥ sāphalyam ṛcchati arthārthaṃ yadi vā vairī arthāś cāthopabhogāntā arthāḥ striyaś ca nipuṇair api sevyamānā arthine apekṣitaṃ varam arthibhyas tilamātrakam arthibhyo brāhmaṇādibhyo arthī cet puruṣo jātaḥ arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥ ardhadagdheṣu kāṣṭheṣu ardhaprasūtā surabhiḥ ardhaprasūtā hy abhavat ardhaṃ śakānāṃ śiraso ardhena cātmabharaṇaṃ ardhena nārī tasyāṃ tu ardhena puruṣo abhavat ardho jāyā iti śruteḥ ardho jāyā iti śruteḥ arbudaṃ caiva vṛṣabhaṃ arbhakā yuvayoḥ ko vā aryamā iti viśrutā aryamā caiva dhātā ca arvāgdaśāhād yo bālas arvāgvandhyā ca ṣaṇmāsāt alakāyāṃ viśālāyāṃ alakṣmīnāśanaṃ puṇyam alakṣmīnāśanaṃ śubham alagnān vipulān vālān alabhantāmṛtaṃ kaṣṭāt alabhantī tu sā trāṇaṃ alam anyena munaya alam ity anutāpena alam etena cāmbike alam etena deveśa alambuṣā miśrakeśī alambuṣā miśrakeśī alarkas tasya putras tu alarkasya tu dāyādaḥ alarkaṃ prati rājarṣiṃ alarkaḥ kāśirājas tu alarkāya mahātmane alarko rājaputras tu alaṃkāravatīḥ śubhrāḥ alaṃkṛto mayā jantuḥ alaṃkṛtya mamāntikam alaṃkṛtyobhayaṃ taṭam alaṃ khedena majjena alaṃ garveṇa vāsava alaṃcakruḥ purottamam alaṃ tebhyo namo astu vaḥ alaṃ te vrīḍayā pārtha alaṃ trāsena gopālāḥ alaṃ deveti pārvatī alaṃ dainyena bālaka alaṃ nāmasahasreṇa alaṃ śakra prayāsena alaṃ śaṃbho namo astu te alaṃ saṃrakṣaṇe teṣāṃ alaṃ sūryasya sadanaṃ alaṃ someśvaraḥ śivaḥ alābuṃ tiktaparṇāṃ ca alābhād dharmaśīlinaḥ alābhe na viṣādī syāl aliṅgaprakṛtitvāc ca aliṅgā prakṛtir liṅgair aliṅgo liṅgam ātmānam alīkoktair alaṃ balam alpakaś ca yathā viprā alpakālasya rājyasya alpaprajñā vṛthāliṅgā alpaprajño virūpākṣa alpabhūtā bhaviṣyāmi alpabhogakule jātā alpabhogaratā narāḥ alpam āyur bhaviṣyati alpavācās tathā kecin alpavidyas tv alpavayā alpavṛṣṭiś ca parjanyaḥ alpaśākaṃ bahuphalaṃ alpāyāso nirātaṅkaḥ alpāhāratayā dvijāḥ alpāhāro alpaceṣṭitaḥ alpenaiva prayatnena alpenaiva hi kālena avakīrṇaṃ ca kāmyakam avagāhed apaḥ pūrvam avagāhya ca vidvāṃso avajñayā tac chucismite avajñayāpi yeṣāṃ syān avajñayā mahīdevāṃs avajñayā hataṃ dṛṣṭvā avajñānam ahaṃkāro avajñāya vacas tasya avajñāsmitalīlayā avataṃsotpalaṃ cāru avatārayām āsa mahīṃ avatārayām āsa hariḥ avatāraṃ karoti ca avatāraṃ karoty atra avatāraṃ karomy asya avatāraṃ hareś cātra avatāro mayā kṛtaḥ avatāro hy ajasyeha avatārya kṣiter aham avatīrṇam iti jñātvā avatīrṇas tvam ity ukto avatīrṇaḥ sa bhagavān avatīrṇaḥ sa medinīm avatīrṇā mahītale avatīrṇo akhilādhāras avatīrṇo gṛhe mama avatīrṇo mahītale avatīrṇo mahīm aṃśo avatīrṇo arjuno nāma avatīrya ca tatrāyaṃ avatīrya bhuvo bhāra- avatīrya mahītale avatīryātha garuḍāt avateruś ca bhūtale avadat kāntam añjasā avadanta surāḥ sarve avadaṃ daityadānavān avadāteṣu vidvatsu avadyaṃ kiṃ tu vai karma avadhāraya tan mune avadhāraya madvacaḥ avadhyam amarendrāṇāṃ avadhyam amarair api avadhyasevyas trailokye avadhyas tad vidann api avadhyaḥ sarvadevānāṃ avadhyā devatānāṃ hi avadhyās te api devānām avadhyāṃ ca striyaṃ prāhus avadhyāḥ surasattamaiḥ avadhyo yamakiṃkaraiḥ avantipuravāsinam avantī nāma nagarī avantī nāma nagarī avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād avamantā gurūṇāṃ yo avaruhya sa nāgendrād avalīḍhaṃ śunā caiva avalepāc ca pārthivaḥ avalokya tathodakyāṃ avalokya suniścitam avaśāni svakāṅgāni avaśiṣṭaṃ ca yat kiṃcid avaśiṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati avaśiṣṭo śubhir bhavān avaśo nīyate jantur avaśo nīyate jantur avaśyam asya devendro avaśyam eva gantavyaḥ avaśyam eva gantavyaḥ avaśyaṃ tridaśās tena avaśyaṃ nāśam āpnuyāt avaśyaṃ phalam āpnoti avaśyān iva rājinaḥ avaśyāyajalokṣitam avaṣṭabhya idaṃ sarvam avasat tatra vāgīśā avasarpiṇī nadī teṣāṃ avasthātananīravaḥ avasthāṃ saha viṣṇunā avahāsaḥ kimartho ayaṃ avākpāṇis tu yaś cakre avāṅmukham avasthitaḥ avācyam etad vaktavyaṃ avātārayata prabhuḥ avāntaradiśo yās tu avāpa tam anantādim avāpa trividhāṃ gatim avāpa nṛpatiḥ kramāt avāpa paramaṃ mokṣaṃ avāpa paramāṃ siddhim avāpa baladevo api avāpa bhogān vasudhātalasthaḥ avāpa rāmaḥ kamapi pramodam avāpa rūpaṃ ca mahat avāpa lakṣmaṇā putrān avāpa vismayaṃ sarvo avāpa śriyam uttamām avāpa sā yauvanam āsasāda avāpa siddhiṃ manujarṣabho asau avāpātha purātanam avāpāsau mahātapāḥ avāpur mahatīṃ vidyāṃ avāpuḥ paramaṃ padam avāpuḥ paramāṃ siddhiṃ avāptam etad dhi purā sanātanād avāptavidyaḥ pitaraṃ avāptaṃ ca śivād viṣṇor avāpnoti na saṃdehaḥ avāpnoti parecchayā avāpya kurunandana avāpya ca tathā bhāgaṃ avāpya tāṃ karmamahīm anante avāpyate narair duḥkhaṃ avāpyate siddhir anuttamā naraiḥ avāpya pāpān paśyanti avāpya pūjāṃ nṛpatir avāpya prāṇasaṃdehaṃ avāpya bhāryāṃ gautamasyātmajāṃ ca avāpya bhogān atha muktim eti avāpya vidyāṃ gāndharvīṃ avāpya sarvato jagmuḥ avāpsyati mahābhāga avārkordhvaṃ ca paśyati avikārāya śuddhāya avikārāya śuddhāya avikāri bhavān ajaḥ avikārī vibhur nityaḥ avikṣitas tathākṣepaḥ avighnam iti gadyate avighnaṃ tīrtham ākhyātaṃ avicchinnaṃ mahārājyaṃ avijñātagatiś caiva avijñātaprabhāvāṇāṃ avijñātaṃ copaviṣṭaṃ avijñānāc ca mūḍhātmā avijñāpitaduḥkhajñaṃ avijñeyam anālakṣyam avidyamāne māṃse tu avidyayā jagat sarvaṃ avidyaś cāpy aśastraś ca avidyāmohitātmānaḥ avidyāsarga eva ca avidyo ayaṃ mahādyūte avināśi yaśo vibhuḥ avibhāgamanā buddhir avimukte mahākṣetre aviyuktaḥ prītamanā aviviktam avijñātaṃ aviṣṇusmaraṇaṃ saumya- avṛthāpakṛtaś caiva avṛddhārheṇa daṇḍena avṛṣṭyagnyādibhiḥ samyak avekṣya kuliśāyudhaḥ avekṣya cemāṃ parameṣṭhisāmyatāṃ avekṣya muśalāyudham avekṣya yasyās tapa ācaranti avekṣya sarvaṃ cakitaḥ sureśo avekṣyātibhayāturāḥ avehi sarvabhūteṣu avairā ye tv anāyāsā avaiṣṇavā narā ye tu avocat pippalādaṃ taṃ avocaṃ vīkṣya kāraṇam avyakta jiṣṇo prabhava avyaktaprabhavāṃ śīghrāṃ avyaktabodhanāc caiva avyaktabodhanāc caiva avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvam avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvam avyaktam aparaṃ prāhur avyaktam āhuḥ prakhyānaṃ avyaktavyaktabhūtāya avyaktavyaktabhūtāya avyaktaś ca punaḥ svayam avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tan avyaktaṃ kṣetram ity uktaṃ avyaktaṃ caiva tad brahma avyaktaṃ prakṛtir dhruvam avyaktaṃ prāhur avyayam avyaktaṃ viṣamaṃ bhavet avyaktaṃ vyaktadharmāṇaṃ avyaktaṃ sarvadeheṣu avyaktaṃ hy akṣarātmakam avyaktaḥ śāśvato devas avyaktaḥ śāśvato anantaḥ avyaktāt parato amṛtam avyaktād vyaktasaṃjñakam avyaktād vyaktim āpannaṃ avyaktāvyaktabhāvasthā avyaktike pure śete avyakte ca pure śete avyakto vyaktaliṅgastho avyayaṃ yādasāṃ patim avyākṛtam anāyāmam avyāhataparaiśvaryo avyāhatā gatis tasya avyucchinno abhavad rāṣṭre avratā naṣṭamaryādās avratā bhraṣṭaniyamās avratī vṛṣalībhartā aśaktāḥ puruṣādhamāḥ aśakto vahane tasya aśaṭho dharmanirato aśapat kupito bhṛśam aśabdasparśarūpaṃ tac aśaraṇyaḥ sunirghṛṇaḥ aśarīraṃ śarīre sve aśarīraḥ śarīreṣu aśarīro api te bhadre aśastram atighoraṃ tat aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hatvā aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ aśāstravihito yajña aśitvā tv ekaparṇāṃ tu aśivāḥ spṛśyur āśugāḥ aśiśuḥ śiśurūpeṇa aśiṣṭavanto arthaparā aśītikalpakālaṃ tu aśītiyojanāyāmāv aśītivarmaṇā yukta aśīlāḥ sukhino loke aśucir malino naraḥ aśucisrastare suptaḥ aśubhasya śubhasya ca aśeṣajagadantastho aśeṣajagadādhāro aśeṣato nārada kasya śaktiḥ aśeṣadurgakoṣṭhāṃ tāṃ aśeṣaduḥkhānaladhūpitānāṃ aśeṣapāpatāpaugha- aśeṣapāpaśamanaṃ aśeṣaprāṇarakṣaṇam aśeṣarogopaśamo aśeṣavāñchāphaladaṃ variṣṭhaṃ aśeṣavidyānilayaṃ aśeṣaṃ kṣitimaṇḍalam aśeṣāghapraśamanī aśeṣāghavināśinīm aśeṣā bhūbhṛto hatāḥ aśeṣāṃ maṇḍayiṣyasi aśeṣeṇa nyavedayat aśeṣais tridaśais tataḥ aśokavanam eva ca aśokasarjārjunakovidārāḥ aśokākhyāṃ tathāṣṭamyāṃ aśokārjunapuṃnāgair aśokaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca aśokaiḥ pārijātaiś ca aśocan saṃprahṛṣyaṃś ca aśocyaṃ chinnasaṃśayaḥ aśnanti havyāni ca yena devāḥ aśnīyād guruṇā tataḥ aśmakā bhojavardhanāḥ aśmakyaṃ prāptavān putram aśmanaḥ sparśahetoś ca aśmasaṃgharṣaṇena ca aśmānaṃ cāpi putraka aśraddhayāpi yannāmni aśrupūrṇekṣaṇair bhṛśam aśrupūrṇekṣaṇair bhṛśam aśruplutāṅgī girijā samīkṣya aśrauṣaṃ vācam uttamām aśvagrīvo aśvabāhuś ca aśvagrīvo aśvabāhuś ca aśvatīrthaṃ tad ucyate aśvatthatīrtham ākhyātaṃ aśvatthaṃ pippalaṃ viduḥ aśvatthaṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā aśvatthaṃ viṣṇur agamad aśvatthaḥ pippalaś ceti aśvatthaḥ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ aśvatthāgastyajambukaiḥ aśvatthāmā mahādyutiḥ aśvatthaiḥ pārijātaiś ca aśvatthaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca aśvatthaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca aśvattho vṛkṣarūpeṇa aśvattho aśvattharūpeṇa aśvamedhapuraḥsaraiḥ aśvamedhaphalapradam aśvamedhaphalapradam aśvamedhaphalaṃ puṇyaṃ aśvamedhaphalaṃ sāgraṃ aśvamedhaśatādhikam aśvamedhasahasrasya aśvamedhasahasrasya aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ aśvamedhasahasrāṇi aśvamedhas tu yajñānāṃ aśvamedhāṅgasaṃbhūta aśvamedhādikaṃ karma aśvamedhādiyajñānāṃ aśvamedhāni mānada aśvamedhena yakṣyante aśvamedhena rājānaṃ aśvamedhe nivṛtte tu aśvayantrāyudhopetā aśvayūpo nāciketā aśvarūpadharaḥ svayam aśvarūpaḥ svayaṃ tadā aśvavidyāṃ gadāvidyāṃ aśvavedī kubjāvanaṃ aśvaśīrṣa mahāghoṇa aśvaṃ nivārayām āsur aśvaṃ pracārayām āsa aśvaṃ vā gāṃ tilān api aśvānanāḥ kharamukhā aśvān uṣṭrān gardabhāṃś ca aśvāṃ bhānur athāgamat aśvinīṣu turaṃgamān aśvinor yatra cotpattir aśvinau tu hayaṃ gṛhya aśvinau bhiṣajāṃ varau aśvinau bhiṣajāṃ varau aśvinau marutaś caiva aśvinau samajāyatām aśvibhyāṃ ca vṛtaḥ prabhuḥ aśvaiḥ pavanasaṃkāśair aṣṭakasya suto lauhiḥ aṣṭakasya suto lauhiḥ aṣṭakāyām athādiśat aṣṭakāsu ca kartavyaṃ aṣṭapattraṃ kesarāḍhyaṃ aṣṭapattraṃ sakarṇikam aṣṭamasya prajāpateḥ aṣṭamyāṃ bahule pakṣe aṣṭamyāṃ buddhim uttamām aṣṭākṣaravidhānena aṣṭākṣaraṃ tato mantraṃ aṣṭākṣaraṃ tato mantraṃ aṣṭādaśabhujaṃ kruddhaṃ aṣṭāyutāni putrāṇāṃ aṣṭāratho nāma nṛpaḥ aṣṭāvakrasya keśavam aṣṭāvakraḥ purā vipra aṣṭāviṃśatim aṣṭau vā aṣṭāviṃśatime yuge aṣṭāśītisahasraiś ca aṣṭottaraśataṃ tv eke aṣṭottaraśataṃ nāmnāṃ aṣṭau tāny atha śukreṇa aṣṭau putrā maheṣvāsā aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ kathitā aṣṭau mudrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ asakṛt parituṣṭena asakṛd vāryamāṇo api asakṛd vipriyaṃ tasya asaktā vicacāra ha asaṅgasyātmano hy asya asaṅgaṃ saṅgam ātmanaḥ asac ca sadasac caiva asacchāstram asadvādam asajjamānaḥ sarveṣu asatāṃ pragraho yatra asatkṛtām avasthāṃ yaḥ asattvaṃ sattvam ātmānam asatpratigrahītā ca asatpralāpam anṛtaṃ asatyavādinaḥ krūrā asatyaṃ naiva vaktāhaṃ asatyāṃ satyavādinīm asatsevāṃ ca vai dvijāḥ asaddravyapradānataḥ asadvṛttā bhaviṣyanti asamañjā iti śrutaḥ asamañjā gato vanam asamañjāḥ kṣatradharma- asamaujāḥ sutas tasya asamyakkaraṇe doṣās asarvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ asahantī ca saṃjñā sā asahantī tu tat saṃjñā asahantī tu svāṃ chāyāṃ asahantī mahat tejaḥ asahantī sumadhyamā asahāyaḥ pitā mātā asahāyo mahādurge asaṃkhyātabhujāś cānye asaṃkhyātabhujāś cānye asaṃkhyātā mahāvīryāḥ asaṃkhyātum ihotsahe asaṃkhyeyāś ca pādātā asaṃkhyeyair bahuvidhair asaṃkhyeyaiḥ padātaiś ca asaṃgrāmeṇa yo vīro asaṃtoṣāś ca saṃtoṣāḥ asaṃdigdhaṃ bhaviṣyanti asaṃpūrṇe svadharme hi asaṃvītāḥ prajāyante asaṃśayaṃ putra mahad asaṃśayaṃ mahat putra asaṃsaktaṃ yadā cittaṃ asādhyam asyā dayitā harasya asādhyaṃ tasya devasya asādhyaṃ tu na paśyāmi asādhyau rūḍhayauvanau asārāṇāṃ durātmanām asārāpārasaṃsāra- asāv apy abhavat tatra asiknīm āvahat patnīṃ asiknyām atha vairaṇyāṃ asiknyāṃ janayām āsa asiknyāṃ janayām āsa asitajaladadhīradhvānavitrastahaṃsā asitodaṃ samānasam asipattravanaṃ kṛṣṇo asipattravanaṃ ghoraṃ asipattravanaṃ tathā asipattravanaṃ tathā asipattravanaṃ nāma asipattravanaṃ yāti asilomā pulomā ca asiṃ sa lebhe śaśikhaṇḍabhūṣāt asuraniśākarasiddhavanditam asurāṇām ilābhavat asurāṇāṃ madhur dogdhā asurān daityadānavān asurān paryacūrṇayat asurān yakṣarākṣasān asurāḥ sarvato abhavan asūyako naraś cāpi asṛgliptāni nārada asau tad akarod bhiyā astavaṃ vividhair vākyaiḥ astaṃ yāto divākaraḥ astā gāṇḍīvadhanvanā asti dharma iti yuktaṃ asti brahman mahātīrthaṃ astiḥ prāptiś ca bho viprās astuvañ jagatām īśaṃ astuvan bhaktito devā astu śrauṣaḍ iti sthiram asty upāyo na vā brahman astragrāmam aśeṣaṃ ca astravikrayakāś caiva astraṃ ca vāsāṃsi purīṃ vanāni astrāṇāṃ sāyakānāṃ ca astrāṇi kurvantu madasthibhūtāny astrāṇi gṛhṇantu na saṃśayo atra astrāṇi tīrthāni ca kānanāni astrāṇi dehīti ca vaktum etac astrāṇi pītāni śarīrasaṃsthāny astrāṇy anekarūpāṇi astrārthaṃ jagmatur vīrau astrair alaṃ bhārabhūtaiḥ kṛtārthaiḥ astrair hīnāḥ strītvam āptāḥ surendrāḥ astraiḥ samuditaḥ sarvair astv ity āha ca tāṃ gaṅgā astv ity āha śivo munim astv ity evaṃ vaco abravīt asthisaṃghātasaṃghaṭṭaṃ asthisthūṇam amedhyaṃ ca asthi snāyu ca majjā ca asthīni śuddhāni prayacchatādya asthūlaṃ sthūlam amalaṃ asthnām upādānam atha prayāṇaṃ asthnāṃ ca pāvanaṃ brūhi asthnāṃ saṃharaṇaṃ devair asthno majjā samabhavan asnātabhojino nāgni- asnāpayaṃś ca kecic ca asnehā api godhūma- asmacceṣṭopahasanaṃ asmatpitā tava bhrātā asmatsaṃśrayavṛddho ayaṃ asmadarthe bhavān nityam asmadārādhako bhava asmadbhaktyāpi devarṣe asmanmakhavināśāya asmaran nṛpater guruḥ asmaraṃ lokaviśrutam asmartākhilavastunām asmākam api sarveṣām asmākam indraḥ prahrādo asmākam etat kṛtyaṃ syād asmākaṃ kila kālajam asmākaṃ kiṃ phalaṃ tataḥ asmākaṃ gāḥ parā vṛttir asmākaṃ ca gavāṃ tathā asmākaṃ tvaṃ patiṃ dehi asmākaṃ duḥkham īdṛśam asmākaṃ bhavatāṃ cāpi asmākaṃ bhārataṃ vada asmākaṃ yujyate vraje asmākaṃ sakalaṃ tathā asmākaṃ sa bhaviṣyati asmākaṃ sarvadā mānyaṃ asmāt saṃsārasāgarāt asmān upari sasnehaṃ asmān dadāti yo nityaṃ asmābhir arcyo bhavatā asmābhir nāvalokitaḥ asmābhir nirmitaṃ puram asmābhir mohito bhṛśam asmābhir vyāpṛtaṃ jagat asmābhis tu śrutaṃ vyāsa asmābhiḥ suprajāgare asmāsu tan mahāprājñā asmāsu vrajato hareḥ asmāsu sarvadeveṣu asmāsu sarvam apy asti asmin kṣetravare puṇye asmin kṣetravare puṇye asminn abhyarcite vibhau asminn āyatane puṇye asminn ekārṇave ghore asminn eva nagaśreṣṭhe asmin vayasi putro me asmin vasati duṣṭātmā asmin sthite dinakare asmiṃś ca śāstre yogānāṃ asmiṃs tīrthe dvijaśreṣṭhau asmiṃs tīrthe mahāpuṇye asmiṃs tu samare rājaṃs asya gaṅge avalepasya asya gaṅge avalepasya asya cānto mayā dṛṣṭas asya cīrṇasya yat samyak asya tīrthasya māhātmyaṃ asya tīrthasya māhātmyād asya dattaṃ ca viṣṇunā asya devasya tad viṣṇor asya bhūmitale arjuna asya māteti menire asya raśmisahasrāṇi asya ślokaṃ padaṃ vāpi asyā devyāḥ prasādataḥ asyā nānyac chubhāvaham asyāpy etan nidarśanam asyā matena tā gāvo asyām adya prabhṛti vai asyām utpatsyate vidvān asyāś caritraviṣaye asyāś caiva prabhāveṇa asyās tu smaraṇād eva asyās tu smaraṇād eva asyāṃ gavi vidher balāt asyāṃ prītyā vartitavyaṃ asyāṃ yadubhir āsitum asyāḥ parataraṃ tīrthaṃ asyāḥ pāpaṃ ca lakṣaye asyāḥ prabhāvaṃ ko brūyād asyāḥ prabhāvād arayaḥ sakhāyaḥ asyāḥ prabhāvād dharayo asyety evaṃmatir muniḥ ahatvā yudhi keśavam ahany ahani bhūtātmā ahany ahani majjanti ahany ahani śuddhātmā aham atyantaviṣayī aham atrātithir mānyo aham atraiva saṃsthitā aham apy agnim āvekṣya aham apy atra vatsyāmīty aham apy adriśṛṅgābhaṃ aham apy abravaṃ prāptān aham apy āgamaṃ tatra aham alpataro bālo aham asmi mahāṃs tatra aham asmīti vai mithaḥ aham ātmeśvarī brahman aham āditya eva ca aham ijyaś ca yaṣṭā ca aham indrasya yā lakṣmīs aham īdṛśakas tadā aham etāni vai kurvan aham eva tataḥ śreṣṭhā aham eva svayaṃ brahmā aham eva hi saṃmohād aham evorvaśī vipra aharad bhāgyasaubhāgya- aharniśam asau vaiśyaḥ ahalyā gautamapriyā ahalyā jāram abravīt ahalyā priyavādinī ahalyām adadāṃ mune ahalyāyāṃ ca gamanād ahalyāyāṃ coktavatyāṃ ahalyāyāṃ muniśreṣṭho ahalyāyāḥ punarbhāvaṃ ahalyārtham imaṃ tathā ahalyārthaṃ surā jagmuḥ ahalyā satyavādinī ahalyāsaṃgamaṃ ceha ahalyāsaṃgamaṃ śubham ahalyāṃ vākyam abravīt ahalyāṃ śāpanirmuktāṃ ahalyāṃ samudaikṣata ahalyeti suraiḥ proktaṃ ahas tad brāhmam ucyate ahaṃkārakṛtātmakam ahaṃkāraś ca jantuṣu ahaṃkāraś ca buddhiś ca ahaṃkāras tato jāto ahaṃkāras tathā vidyā ahaṃkāras tu bhūtānāṃ ahaṃkāras tu mahatas ahaṃkāras tu mahatas ahaṃkāraṃ mahātejāḥ ahaṃkāre kṛtā mayā ahaṃkāreṣu nṛpate ahaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pitā kṛṣṇo ahaṃ krodhaś ca kāmaś ca ahaṃ ca putraḥ karmaṇyaḥ ahaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ kuryāṃ ahaṃ cāmṛtarūpāsmi ahaṃ caiva namasyāmi ahaṃ caivoktavān vibhum ahaṃ janitrī tava ceti vācyaṃ ahaṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca ahaṃ tatra dvijātayaḥ ahaṃ tatrāpi te vighnam ahaṃ tatraiva nityaśaḥ ahaṃ tapovirahito ahaṃ tava guruḥ katham ahaṃ tu puruṣo yena ahaṃ tu pūrvadoṣeṇa ahaṃ tu mātur udare ahaṃ tu vipro vedavid brahmavṛndaiḥ ahaṃ tridharmā viśvātmā ahaṃ tvām anuyāsyāmi ahaṃ tvāṃ varayiṣyāmi ahaṃ daśaratho rājā ahaṃ drakṣyāmi keśavam ahaṃ dvijātipravaro ahaṃ dhātā vidhātā ca ahaṃ nārāyaṇo devaḥ ahaṃ nārāyaṇo nāma ahaṃ nārāyaṇo nāma ahaṃ netre āhariṣye ahaṃ paramasaṃvigno ahaṃ pūrvaṃ mahārāja ahaṃ pūrvaṃ samudbhūtā ahaṃ bālas tvaṃ tu vṛddhā ahaṃ brahman nānyavṛttā ahaṃ bhavo bhavantaś ca ahaṃ makhaṃ haniṣyāmi ahaṃ mameti bhāvo atra ahaṃ mahābalīty evaṃ ahaṃ yajñahanas tubhyaṃ ahaṃ yāmi nagaśreṣṭha ahaṃ yāmi bharadvāja ahaṃ yāsyāmi bhadraṃ te ahaṃ yāsyāmi bhadraṃ te ahaṃ rākṣasasattamaḥ ahaṃ rāmaś ca mathurāṃ ahaṃ rudraś ca śakraś ca ahaṃ vaktuṃ na te kṣamaḥ ahaṃ vakṣyāmi vaḥ sphuṭam ahaṃ vasāmi yogyeṣu ahaṃ vijānāmi viśālanetre ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ brahmā ahaṃ viṣṇur maheśvaraḥ ahaṃ viṣṇuś ca bhagavān ahaṃ viṣṇuś ca śaṃbhuś ca ahaṃ viṣṇus tathaiva ca ahaṃ viṣṇuḥ śivo apy aham ahaṃ vai pañcamas tathā ahaṃ vairān nivartaye ahaṃ vaiśravaṇo rājā ahaṃ vo bāndhavo jāto ahaṃśaktir athauṣadhyaḥ ahaṃ śivaś ca somaś ca ahaṃ sa devadevena ahaṃ sarvasya durlabhā ahaṃ sarvāsu medini ahaṃ saṃvartakaḥ sūryas ahaṃ saṃvartako jyotir ahaṃ saṃvartako analaḥ ahaṃ sthitvā yatra deśe ahaṃ svargaṃ gamiṣyāmi ahāni tāvanti divaṃ gatasya ahāni maghavaṃs tasyā ahitaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ ahir vṛtro balis tvāṣṭrir ahiṃsan brāhmaṇasvāni ahiṃsādiphalaṃ samyak ahiṃsāsatyamaryādaṃ ahiṃsāṃ sarvajantuṣu ahīnagos tu dāyādaḥ aho kaṣṭaṃ mahākaṣṭaṃ aho kṛṣṇasya māhātmyam aho kṛṣṇasya māhātmyaṃ aho gaṅgāprabhāvaś ca aho gaṅgāprabhāvo ayaṃ aho gopījanasyāsya aho cāti balaṃ daivaṃ aho caikārṇave ghore aho tapaḥprabhāvo ayaṃ aho atiduḥkhaṃ ghoraṃ ca aho tvayā muniśreṣṭha aho dānaprabhāvo ayam aho durvidhivaiśasāt aho devasya māhātmyaṃ aho devasya māhātmyaṃ aho daivam aho dharmo aho dhātar namo astu te aho dhiṅ nirdhanaṃ naram aho no vismayo jātaḥ aho pṛthivyāṃ ramyāṇi aho bata mṛdhe vīryaṃ aho bata sukaṣṭaṃ vai aho bhagavatā tena aho bhavantaṃ prakṛtiprabhāvāt aho bhāratavarṣasya aho bhūyān na kasyāpi aho mahānubhāvo ayaṃ aho mahāvalepo ayam aho mānuṣadehasya aho mokṣasya mārgo ayaṃ aho mohasya mahimā ahorātraṃ tu tad divi ahorātraṃ pitṝṇāṃ tu ahorātraṃ muhūrtās tu ahorātraṃ yamaḥ saṃdhye ahorātrekṣaṇo divyo ahorātreṇa tat kalau ahorātraiś catuḥṣaṣṭyā ahorātropavāsena aho lokagatiś citrā aho lokatraye apy asmin aho viṣṇor anusmṛtiḥ aho śrutam aho adbhutam aho saṃsāracakre asmin aho sumahad ākhyānaṃ aho asya tapaso vīryam aho asya tapaso vīryam aho asya paramaṃ tapaḥ aho asya paramaṃ dhairyam aṃśas tvaṃ parameśvaraḥ aṃśāvatārakaraṇair na mamāsi putraḥ aṃśāvatāraṃ puruṣottamasya aṃśāṃśenodare tasyāḥ aṃśukaṃ corayitvā tu aṃśunaiva vivasvatā aṃśumān api bālakaḥ aṃśumān iti vikhyātaḥ aṃśumān iti viśrutā aṃśumān nāma vīryavān aṃśumān pañcabhis tribhiḥ aṃśena teṣāṃ bhrātṛtvaṃ aṃśena lokam āyātaḥ aṃśe asmi yuvayor jātā aṃśo nāma manoḥ putro aṃśo bhagaś cātitejā ā kacagrahaṇād devi ā kacagrahaṇād devi ākaṇṭhamagnaṃ salile ākaṇṭhāntaḥpraveśayā ākarṇya svāminādiṣṭaṃ ākarṇyāsurarāṭ tataḥ ākarṣantī tanmanaḥ kāmasiddhim ākarṣantv atha rājānaṃ ākarṣitaṃ ca lobhādyair ākāṅkṣanti sadā surāḥ ākāṅkṣase jīvitaṃ dhik tavedam ākāraṃ tu bhaved yasya ākāśagaṅgāsalilaṃ ākāśagaṅgāsalilaṃ ākāśagaṅgāsalilaṃ ākāśagān vāyusaṃsthāñ ākāśagāminī svedaṃ ākāśaprabhavaḥ śabdo ākāśaprabhavo vāyur ākāśam akarot prabhuḥ ākāśaṃ grasate tataḥ ākāśaṃ caiva bhūtādir ākāśaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ ākāśaṃ pūrayann iva ākāśaṃ pṛthivīṃ jyotir ākāśaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam ākāśāt patitaṃ toyaṃ ākāśād āgatau vīrau ākāśādyaṃ śarīreṣu ākāśe vigataklamaḥ ākāśo api muniśreṣṭhā ākṛtitritayaṃ bhavet ākṛṣṭam amṛtaṃ caiva ākṛṣṭo asi narottama ākṛṣṭo ahaṃ tava guṇai ākṛṣya ca mahāstambhaṃ ākṛṣya nīyate jantur ākṛṣya nīyate jantur ākṛṣyante śuṣyamāṇā ākṛṣya lāṅgalāgreṇa ākṛṣya śīghram utkṛṣṭaṃ ākranditeneha vṛthā hi kiṃ te ākramasva ciraṃ divam ākrameyur divaṃ śubhāḥ ākramya gatayaḥ sūkṣmā ākrānta indhanaiḥ sthūlais ākrāmad daṇḍakaṃ vanam ākrāman dakṣiṇām āśāṃ ākrośantaṃ muhur muhuḥ ākrośantaṃ muhur muhuḥ ākrośanti narādhamāḥ ākrośanti narādhamāḥ ākṣipan punar abravīt ākṣipto brāhmaṇenaivaṃ ākhudarduravaktrāś ca ākhyāta te procur imāṃ praviṣṭā ākhyātas te mayā cātmā ākhyātaṃ cātipuṇyadam ākhyātaṃ cāsya māhātmyaṃ ākhyātaṃ dvijasattamāḥ ākhyātaṃ no bhagavatā ākhyātaṃ sahasā kṛṣṇo ākhyānaṃ mātṛtīrthānām ākhyānaṃ viditātmanām ākhyānaṃ viṣṇuśaṃbhvoś ca ākhyānaṃ śṛṇu nārada ākhyāsyāmi namas tubhyaṃ ākhyāsyāmi mataṃ tubhyaṃ ākhyāsye svasutau prati ākhyeyam anujīvibhiḥ āgacchata itīrayan āgacchata drutaṃ devā āgacchate tato lokaṃ āgacchad devaparvatam āgacchad vaḍavā bhūtvā āgacchad vaḍavā bhūtvā āgacchantas tapodhanāḥ āgacchantaṃ tv āgoyuktaṃ āgacchantaṃ nityam eva āgacchantaṃ mahātmānaṃ āgacchanti durātmāno āgacchanti durātmāno āgacchanti mahāraudrā āgacchanti mahāraudrā āgacchanti yathākālaṃ āgacchantī devanadī āgacchantīṃ tāṃ prātitheyīṃ tadānīṃ āgacchantu surān sarvān āgaccha yamune snātum āgacchāgaccha śīghraṃ tvaṃ āgaccheti tvayoditam āgacched anumoditaḥ āgacchen nātra saṃśayaḥ āgatas tadāhaṃ tridivair upetaḥ āgataḥ śilpināṃ varaḥ āgatā tad bravītu me āgatā devavacanād āgatānāṃ pṛthak pṛthak āgatānāṃ sa gautamaḥ āgatān daityagardabhān āgatān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ āgatā yajñabhāginaḥ āgatāṃ surarūpiṇīm āgatāṃs tān ṛṣīñ jñātvā āgatāṃs tān ṛṣīn idam āgatāḥ sattriṇaḥ sarve āgato ahaṃ dvijottamaḥ āgatya gautamīṃ tatra āgatya tatra pañcāśat āgatya brahmaṇaḥ puṇye āgatya mām abravīc ca āgatya yatra sa muniḥ āgatya yācate kiṃcit āgatya varuṇaḥ prāha āgatya saṃgatā devī āgatyāśvāsayām āsa āgatyeśam uvāca ha āgantavyaṃ tvayā rājan āgamālokadharmāṇāṃ āgamiṣyāmi te puram āgamoktena mantreṇa āgamotthaṃ vivekāc ca āgamyate mayā satyaṃ āgniidhraś cāgnibāhuś ca āgnīdhra iti viśrutaḥ āgnīdhraṃ cākarod yajñe āgneyam astraṃ labdhvā ca āgneyam etad astraṃ me āgneyaṃ jātavedasam āgneyaṃ tu mahābhāgā āgneyaṃ puratas tu tat āgneyaṃ rūpam āpannam āgneyās te balotkaṭāḥ āgneyāstraṃ tu havyavāṭ āgneyī ceti viśrutā āgneyo agniṃ samāyāto āghūrṇitaṃ tat sahasā āghrāya madirāharṣam ācakṣva sarvadeveśa ācacakṣur yathātatham ācacakṣe tatas tayoḥ ācacakṣe tato rājā ācacakṣe vivasvate ācacakṣe savistaram ācamya prayataḥ śuciḥ ācamya prayato bhūtvā ācamya manasā harim ācamyācāmayed viprān ācamyādbhis tathā mṛdā ācamyaiva tu niḥsnehaṃ ācaran saṃśitavrataḥ ācarāmi yathāśāstraṃ ācariṣyāmi durmate ācāmec caiva tadvac ca ācāmeta yathānyāyaṃ ācāraparirakṣaṇam ācāram akhile jane ācāram ācared yas tu ācārasyaiva lakṣaṇam ācārya samyag jñāto asi ācāryaṃ tu visarjayet ācāryāñ śāstrapāragān ācāryānumatenaiva ācāryāya tato dadyād ācāryāya tadā dattvā ācāryāya nivedayet ācāryāya nyavedayan ācāryeṇāvagāhitāḥ ācāryopādhyāyavarān ācitaṃ bhairavaiḥ pāśaiḥ ācitāni samantataḥ ācitāni samantataḥ ācchādya rūpam aninditā ācchinad yajñabhāgāṃś ca ājagāma jagannātho ājagāma tadā jñātvā ājagāma nṛpasyāgre ājagāma pituḥ puram ājagāma pralambākhyo ājagāma bhuvaṃ hariḥ ājagāma mahābalaḥ ājagāma mahāvane ājagāma rathaṃ bhūyo ājagāma vrajajano ājagāma sa caivātha ājagāma sa duṣṭātmā ājagāma svakaṃ deśaṃ ājagāmātha gopīnāṃ ājagāmātha tatraiva ājagāmātha munayo ājagāmāmitadyutiḥ ājagmatur atidyutī ājagmatur devavarau suvīrau ājagmatur mahābhāgau ājagmur amarāḥ kramāt ājagmur āruhya vimānapṛṣṭhaṃ ājagmur dvārakāṃ rāma- ājagmur bhūpatiṃ prati ājagmur munayo amalāḥ ājagmur muniśārdūla ājagmur vibudhāḥ sarva ājagmus tatra munayas ājagmus tatra yad vṛttaṃ ājagmus tvaritā gopyo ājagmus tvaritāḥ sarve ājagmuḥ śvaśuras tathā ājanmamaraṇaṃ vā te ājaprāyaṃ tathā payaḥ ājamīḍhāḥ smṛtāś caite ājamīḍho aparo vaṃśaḥ ājamīḍho aparo vaṃśaḥ ājahāra ca lokeṣu ājahāra tadaṅganāḥ ājahāra nirargalān ājahāra nirargalān ājahāra rajiḥ prabhuḥ ājahārāśvamedhānāṃ ājahre pitṛdāyādyaṃ ājahre pitṛdāyādyaṃ ājahre yo mahat sattraṃ ājahre yo mahāsattraṃ ājānubāhuḥ sumukhaḥ ājānulikhitaś cāsau ājīvo yaḥ paraṃ teṣāṃ ājuhāva śatakratuḥ ājñayā gautamasyāsann ājñayā rakṣitaṃ tava ājñayā śaṃkarasya tat ājñā trailokyamaṇḍanī ājñānantaram evāśu ājñāpaya karomi kim ājñāpayatu kiṃ nṛpaiḥ ājñāpayaty ugrasenaḥ ājñāpayadhvaṃ munayo vrajāmi ājñāpayājñāṃ pratipālayantas ājñāpūrvaṃ ca yad idam ājñābalaiśvaryakṛtapramodaḥ ājñā svāmini bhṛtyataḥ ājñāṃ kurukulotthānāṃ ājñāṃ ca pradadus tasmai ājñāṃ pratīcched dharmeṇa ājñāṃ bhetsyanty anāvṛtāḥ ājyanāsaḥ sruvatuṇḍaḥ ājyapāḥ somapās tathā ājyaplutaṃ madhūkṣitam ājyarūpeṇa nārada ātatāyī sa yādavān ātāmranayanaḥ kopād ātāmrāyatalocanam ātithyakāle saṃprāptaṃ ātithyapūjānirato ātithyaṃ dehi yācate āttagandhā tato bhūmiḥ ātmakīyāni vittāni ātmakopānusāreṇa ātmacihnopalakṣaṇam ātmajanmodbhavāṃ tāṃ tu ātmajānāṃ tathākarot ātmajānāṃ tatheśvaraḥ ātmajñānam idaṃ guhyaṃ ātmajñānasamasneha- ātmajñānaṃ ca muktiṃ ca ātmatīrtham iti khyātaṃ ātmatīrthaṃ vidur budhāḥ ātmatṛptaḥ sa evāsīd ātmadoṣāṃś ca vijñāya ātmanaś ca punaḥ kṛtyam ātmanaś ca śubhān putrān ātmanaś ca samādhāne ātmanas tūpakārāya ātmanas tejasā kaścin ātmanaḥ karmasākṣitve ātmanaḥ kāmakāreṇa ātmanaḥ kāraṇāntare ātmanaḥ kilbiṣāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ paramaṃ rūpaṃ ātmanaḥ pitaraṃ na ca ātmanaḥ phalabhūtyarthaṃ ātmanaḥ śreyase muktyai ātmanaḥ sa tu kauśikaḥ ātmanaḥ saṃpradānena ātmanaḥ sukhitāṃ loke ātmanā viprahīṇāni ātmanā sa tu vijñeyas ātmanā sūkṣmam ātmānaṃ ātmanāṃ ca sahasrāṇi ātmanaikamanā bhūtvā ātmanaiva gaṇeśvarān ātmano jīvitārthaṃ ca ātmano nābhijānīte ātmano bhūtim darśayām āsa ātmānaṃ paramātmanaḥ ātmānaṃ prathayitvāhaṃ ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā ātmānaṃ bhāskaraṃ dhyātvā ātmānaṃ bhedayām āsa ātmānaṃ vā tathānyad vā ātmānaṃ vāsudevākhyaṃ viśodhitaḥ pāpād ātmā vai sa guṇair vṛtaḥ ātmīyam ālokya mahattvam īśa ātmīyaṃ ca punā rūpaṃ ātmīyān preṣayām āsa ātmaikatāṃ svaprakṛtiṃ kadācid ātyantiko vai mokṣaś ca ātreyatīrthe ye snānaṃ ātreyam ca śuktaṃ ca ārabhet kavacaṃ budhaḥ ārambhān dvijasattamāḥ ārādhanāya savituḥ ārādhanīyo bhūtānām ārādhayanty atra bhavantam īśaṃ ārādhayan mahādevaṃ ārādhayasva paulomyā ārādhayituṃ pratimāṃ tvām abhīpsante ārādhya tvāṃ surā daityā ārādhya puruṣottamam ārādhya vṛṣabhadhvajam ārādhya vṛṣabhadhvajam ārādhya śaṃkaraṃ devaṃ ārādhyaṃ paramaṃ sukham ārāmāṇi vicitrāṇi ārikṣepas tathopekṣaḥ ārirādhayiṣur dvijāḥ āruhya gajam uttamam āruhya garuḍaṃ viprā āruhya ca svayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ āruhya tridivaṃ yāti āruhya prayayau svargaṃ āruhya bhīmaṃ mahiṣaṃ javena āruhya bhugnaśirasaḥ āruhya
