phalam karmasv iha punaḥ punaḥ karmāgādhaṃ satyatīraṃ karmāṇi rudramarudaśviśatakratūnāṃ karmāṇy aparimeyāni karmāṇy asaṃkalpitatatphalāni karmāṇy ātmani manyate karmāntāgāraśālāś ca karmāpi dvividhaṃ jñeyaṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ karmaitad anurūpaṃ vāṃ karmaiva kāraṇaṃ tasmād karmaiva viśvatovyāpi karṣakāṇāṃ kṛṣir vṛttiḥ karṣatā vṛkṣayor madhye karṣamāṇa ulūkhalam kalatraputramitrādi- kalatrāṇāṃ kṛtena ca kalayā jāyate ajasraṃ kalaviṅkamayūrāṃś ca kalaviṅkair mayūraiś ca kalaviṅkair mayūraiś ca kalaviṅkaiḥ kapotakaiḥ kalaśān vardhamānakān kalaśair upacāraiś ca kalaśaiḥ kāñcanair dvijāḥ kalahāgniḥ kṣayāvahaḥ kalā kāṣṭhā nimeṣāś ca kalākāṣṭhānimeṣā hi kalākāṣṭhāmuhūrtāś ca kalākāṣṭhās tathaiva ca kalākauśalasaṃyuktāḥ kalā ca daśa pañca ca kalā cāndramasīti ha kalā pañcadaśī yonis kalāyān atha mudgāṃś ca kalāsaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtaḥ kalās traikālyam eva ca kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm kalikalaṅkavināśanadakṣam idaṃ kalikālasya nārada kalikāle bhaviṣyati kaliṅgarājapramukhā kaliṅgarājaṃ cādāya kaliṅgādhipatir dvijāḥ kaliṅgādhipatiṃ śūram kaliṅgāś caiva sarvaśaḥ kaliṅgāḥ puṇḍrakāś caiva kaliś cānyatra na kvacit kaliś ceti caturyugam kalisvarūpaṃ bho viprā kaliḥ sarvāmarāśrayaḥ kaluṣīkṛtamānasaḥ kaler viprā vicakṣaṇaiḥ kaler vṛddhis tadā prājñair kalevaraṃ tasya surāś ca samyak kalevaraṃ brāhmaṇasyeha devāḥ kaleḥ svarūpaṃ bhagavan kalau jagatpatiṃ viṣṇuṃ kalau na kiṃcid vijñeyam kalau pādena caikena kalau mānuṣam ucyate kalau yuge samutpannāḥ kalau lāṅgaladhāriṇaḥ kalau varṣāṇi viṃśatim kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam kalau sādhv iti bhāṣitum kalau striyo bhaviṣyanti kalkī viṣṇuyaśā nāma kalpakoṭiśataṃ tatra kalpakoṭisamudbhavaiḥ kalpate brahmabhūyataḥ kalpadrumaṃ ca sāvitrīṃ kalpadrumān kalpalatāṃ ca dhenum kalpadrumair nityaphalaiḥ kalpanāparivarjita kalpanābhir udīritaḥ kalpam ekaṃ dvijottamāḥ kalpam ekaṃ yathāsukham kalpayitvā tu tan māṃsaṃ kalpaye arghāya me pituḥ kalparājaṃ sanātanam kalpavṛkṣa namo astu te kalpavṛkṣavaṭaṃ ramyaṃ kalpavṛkṣasamīpe tu kalpavṛkṣasya bho dvijāḥ kalpavṛkṣasya rāmasya kalpavṛkṣaṃ tato gatvā kalpavṛkṣaṃ samāsādya kalpavṛkṣaṃ samāsādya kalpavṛkṣaḥ pārijāto kalpavṛkṣair asaṃkhyaiś ca kalpavṛkṣo mahākāyo kalpasaṃkīrtanaṃ tathā kalpasya parimāṇataḥ kalpaṃ viddhi caturyugam kalpāgnir iti saṃśrutaḥ kalpādāv āyuṣaḥ sutaḥ kalpāntaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ kalpānte ca mahāmune kalpānte punar āgatya kalpānte pratisaṃcaraḥ kalpānte prākṛte caiva kalpānte yasya vaktrebhyo kalpānteṣu punaḥ punaḥ kalpān bhuktvā sukhaṃ naraḥ kalpitaṃ viśvayoninā kalpitā hy annaparvatāḥ kalpitāḥ paśavaḥ surāḥ kalpitaiḥ sumanoharaiḥ kalpe asmin manavaḥ smṛtāḥ kalpo niḥśeṣa ucyate kalpopaniṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ kalmāṣapādasya sutaḥ kalyakalyam upānayet kalyāṇatvān narapates kalyāṇam upajāyate kallolajanitāvarte kavacaṃ ca mahāprabham kavacī vivaraṃ budhaḥ kavayaḥ kāvyakartāro kavaṣasya suto dvijaḥ kavir apy āha deveśaṃ kaviśāpapradagdho abhūt kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ kavyaṃ cāmṛtam eva ca kavyādāṃś ca pitṝn atha kavyena ca pitṝṃs tathā kaś ca tān anugacchati kaś cālayel labdhamahānubhāvaṃ kaścij jalānnavikṣepaḥ kaścit saṃpannam ity uktvā kaścid anyo dvijottamāḥ kaścid apy atitejasā kaścil loke bhaviṣyati kaśyapaś ca prajāpatiḥ kaśyapaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ kaśyapas tāṃ ditiṃ rahaḥ kaśyapas tu prasannātmā kaśyapasya durāsadam kaśyapasya prajāpateḥ kaśyapasya suto jyeṣṭha kaśyapasyātmajo balī kaśyapasyātha mandire kaśyapaṃ taṃ prajāpatim kaśyapaṃ dvipadāṃ varam kaśyapaṃ munisattamam kaśyapaṃ vinayānvitam kaśyapād abhijajñire kaśyapād iti naḥ śrutam kaśyapādyāḥ prajeśvarāḥ kaśyapādyaiḥ prajeśvaraiḥ kaśyapāya tathāparām kaśyapāya trayodaśa kaśyapāya trayodaśa kaśyapāya trayodaśa kaśyapāya varān bahūn kaśyapāya vasuṃdharām kaśyapena purodhasā kaśyapena mahātmanā kaśyapena sahāyena kaśyapo gautamīṃ tadā kaśyapo jamadagniś ca kaśyapo atha prajāpatiḥ kaśyapo atha prajāpatiḥ kaśyapodvardhayan giraḥ kaśyapo api prajāpatiḥ kaśyapo api śivaṃ prāha kaśyapo bhagavān ṛṣīn kaśyapo munisattamaḥ kaśyapo vedapāragaḥ kaśyapo vai prajāpatiḥ kaṣāye hānir ucyate kaṣāyopaplave kāle kaṣṭajīvina eva te kaṣṭam āpatitaṃ kīdṛg kaṣṭam āpat suduṣpāraṃ kaṣṭam etan mahāpāpaṃ kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭam iti bruvan kaṣṭe asmin duḥkhabahule kas tadvīryaṃ vadiṣyati kas tapo ghoraśiraso kas tasya rūpaṃ yo veda kas tasyāḥ pratitīrthaṃ tu kas taṃ nārādhayet pumān kas taṃ sthāpitavān purā kas te tu putro vada me maharṣe kas tvam ity āha so apy āha kastvārur vārakān api kas tvāṃ deva na pūjayet kasmāc ca bhayam āpannaṃ kasmāc chūnyaś ca parvataḥ kasmāt te duḥkham āpannaṃ kasmāt te mānaso jvaraḥ kasmāt tvaṃ duḥkham āgataḥ kasmāt sa nṛpatiḥ pūrvam kasmād iti jagatprabhum kasmān na dvārakām eṣa kasmān na rakṣase deva kasmān nārcayase prabhum kasmān manyur abhūt tava kasmān māṃ hantum udyataḥ kasmān mṛgayase devi kasmin kāle bhavet snānaṃ kasmin kāle alpako dharmo kasmin kāle suraśreṣṭha kasmin kṣetre athavā tīrthe kasmin varteta vai katham kasmiṃścit kāraṇāntare kasmiṃścit kāraṇāntare kasmiṃścit kāraṇāntare kasmai dadyām imāṃ kanyāṃ kasya kartā jaganmayaḥ kasya kāmeṣu vaśyatām kasyacit kāraṇāntare kasyacit tv atha kālasya kasyacit puravāsinaḥ kasyacid bhavitā sutaḥ kasyacid yajamānasya kasya jyaiṣṭhyaṃ bhavān prāṇo kasya deva snuṣeti vai kasya mātā pitā kasya kasyāparādhān mātas tvaṃ kasyāpi kaścit patitasya puṃso kasyedam anulepanam kasyedaṃ karmaṇas tāta kasyeyaṃ pāpaceṣṭā syāt kasyaitat kathayāmi vā kahlāraṃ ca niyojayet kahlāraiś ca sugandhibhiḥ kahlāraiś ca sugandhibhiḥ kahlāraiḥ kamalaiś cāpi kahlāraiḥ kamalaiś caiva kahlāraiḥ kumudotpalaiḥ kaṃcic ca kālaṃ nivasāma cātra kaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣasīva tvaṃ kaṃ pṛcchāmi kva yāmi ca kaṃsakeśiniṣūdanaḥ kaṃsadūtaḥ pracoditaḥ kaṃsapatnyas tataḥ kaṃsaṃ kaṃsam āvedayām āsur kaṃsayuddhe adhunā punaḥ kaṃsavīryapratāpābhyām kaṃsaś ca tvām upādāya kaṃsas tūrṇam upetyaināṃ kaṃsas tau paritoṣya ca kaṃsas tv athodvignamanāḥ kaṃsasya karam ādāya kaṃsasya rajakaḥ so atha kaṃsaṃ ghātayitā bhuvi kaṃsaṃ ca ruṣitābravīt kaṃsaṃ jagrāha vegitaḥ kaṃsaṃ dvividam eva ca kaṃsaḥ kuvalayāpīḍaḥ kaṃsaḥ kopaparāyaṇaḥ kaṃsā kaṃsavatī tathā kaṃsādīnāṃ vadhārthāya kaṃsād bhayaṃ kṛtavatā tu mayātitīvram kaṃsād bhīto dvijottamāḥ kaṃsāya cāṣṭamo garbho kaṃsāya nāradaḥ prāha kaṃse gṛhīte kṛṣṇena kaṃsena sa nirasyate kaṃsena sa visarjitaḥ kaṃsenānakadundubhiḥ kaṃsenāpi niyojitā kaṃso nāma mahābāhur kaṃso api koparaktākṣaḥ kaṃso api tad upaśrutya kaṃso ayaṃ ditijāntaka kaṃso rāmajanārdanau kaḥ kṣametottamāśayaḥ kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ kaḥ śaknoti nirañjanam kaḥ śaknoti harer māyāṃ kaḥ śṛṇoti bravīti vā kaḥ śraddadhyāt parābhavam kaḥ śraddadhyāt sagāṅgeyān kaḥ samastān guṇān vaktuṃ kaḥ saṃkhyāṃ kartum īśvaraḥ kaḥ saṃvaritum īśvaraḥ kākakākīsamākīrṇaṃ kākapakṣadharau bālau kākāṇḍasaṃnibhās tathā kāko jāyeta mānavaḥ kāko madguḥ prajāyate kākolaṃ nāma narakaṃ kākṣīvato anṛṇo abhavat kāṅkṣāmo yad anāmayam kāṅkṣitaṃ prāpya satpatim kācit kṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti kācit tasya padānugā kācit pravilasadbāhuḥ kācid anyā tvam eva sā kācid asti sureśvara kācid ālokya govindam kācid ālokya govindaṃ kācid āvasathasyāntaḥ kācid bhrūbhaṅguraṃ kṛtvā kāñcanadhvajaśobhitaiḥ kāñcanena yamālayam kāñcīnūpuranāditāḥ kāñcīnūpuranāditāḥ kāṇābhavat tataḥ kadrūḥ kāṇo andho badhiro jaḍaḥ kāṇḍakoṣās tathā puṣpaṃ kāṇva puṇyaprabhāvataḥ kāṇvaś ceti janaiḥ khyāto kāṇvaṃ gāṅgaṃ kṣudhābhidham kāṇvaṃ pautraṃ hiraṇyakam kāṇve asmiṃs tīrtha uttame kā te bhāryā vadasva me kātyāyani namo astu te kādambaiś cakravākaiś ca kādambaiś cakravākaiś ca kādambaiś cakravākaiś ca kādambaiś ca plavair haṃsaiś kādravāsaṃgamaṃ tathā kādraveyās tu balinaḥ kānanāni purāṇi ca kānaneṣu viviktāś ca kā nāmāsthā mahātmanām kāni jitvā ca sattama kān utpātabhavān doṣān kānta kasmān na jānāsi kāntaṃ darśaya bhadraṃ te kāntaṃ rūpam avāpsyasi kāntāt kāntataraṃ draṣṭum kāntāt kāntataraṃ rūpam kāntād anyo na vīkṣyas tu kāntādyāpy ativatsalā kāntāragahaneṣu ca kāntāre prāṇasaṃdehe kāntāṃ kaḥ soḍhum īśvaraḥ kāntir vai pṛthivī dhṛtiḥ kāntiś candramaso yathā kāntyā ca veśena ca cārurūpaḥ kānyānayāsty atra nadī samānā kāpile gograhe some kāpotam iti viśrutam kā bhavatīṣu kālasya kāmakārāt tathaiva ca kāmakrodhadveṣamuktā kāmakrodhaparāyaṇān kāmakrodhabhayadveṣa- kāmakrodhamahārṇave kāmakrodhavivarjanam kāmayadhvaṃ subāliśāḥ kāmarūpadharaiḥ śubhaiḥ kāmarūpadharo rāhur kāmarūpanivāsinaḥ kāmarūpam avāpyātha kāmarūpaṃ mahārūpaṃ kāmarūpī kāmapuṣpaḥ kāmarūpī janārdanaḥ kāmarūpī vicarati kāmalī nāma reṇukā kāmalobheṣv avartata kāmavṛttā rahogatāḥ kāmas tasyāpi mānasam kāmaṃ krodham atho ratim kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca kevalam kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca kāmaṃ jitvā tathā krodhaṃ kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayāturāḥ kāmaṃ devāś ca māṃ vipra kāmaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te kāmaṃ vasantaṃ vāyuṃ ca kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt kāmaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca kāmaḥ krodhaś ca harṣaś ca kāmaḥ krodhas tathā darpo kāmaḥ saṃpadyatāṃ tava kāmākṛṣṭaḥ śatakratuḥ kāmākrāntadhiyau cobhau kāmāc cānyāḥ pravavrajuḥ kāmāturaṃ hayaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmātmāno durātmānaḥ kāmādayo mṛtyur apīha yāvan kāmād bhogaḥ sukhāni ca kāmān abhīpsan sakalān kāmān ātmabhavakṣaye kāmān āpnoti cottamān kāmāni vibhavaṃ mama kāmān bhogāṃś ca mānavaḥ kāmāyainaṃ prayacchatha kāmārigocare caiva kāmālaye koṭitīrthe kāmāvarta namo astu te kāminībhir na vañcitaḥ kāminīm āyatekṣaṇām kāminī māṃ pratīkṣate kāminya iva kāntānāṃ kā mūrtiḥ kā ca devatā kāmena kopena ca matsareṇa kāmenādya hatāni me kāmeśvaraṃ mātritīrthaṃ kāmeṣu ca yathāproktaṃ kāmonmattā varāṅganāḥ kāmopahatacetasām kāmo avatīrṇaḥ putras te kāmo vāpi svabhāvataḥ kāmbojānāṃ tathāśvānāṃ kāmbojānāṃ tathaiva ca kāmbojān pāradāṃs tathā kāmbojāś caiva viprendrā kāmbojāḥ pahnavās tathā kāmyaṃ nāsti jagattraye kāmyā nāma sutā śreṣṭhā kāmyāny anyāni śrāddhāni kāmyāputrās tu catvāraḥ kāmyāś ca kāminīr bahūḥ kāyajaṃ yac ca duṣkṛtam kāyatrāṇavibhedinaḥ kāyavāṅmānasaiḥ śuddhas kāyaśodhanam uttamam kāyasthair yas tilair mohāt kāyaṃ tatra prajāpateḥ kāyena vācā manasā sadaināṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet kāraṇaṃ kāraṇāgraja kāraṇaṃ kim akāraṇam kāraṇaṃ tac ca kīrtaya kāraṇaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ jaganmaya kāraṇaṃ praṣṭum āyātā kāraṇaṃ brūhi tatra vai kāraṇaṃ bhuvaneśvaram kāraṇaṃ mama pṛcchataḥ kāraṇaṃ yadi nāma syāt kāraṇaṃ vada māṃ tāta kāraṇaṃ śṛṇu rākṣasa kāraṇaṃ sarvasiddhīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃśrayasya ca kāraṇāni dvijatvasya kāraṇānugatā dvijāḥ kāraṇāny akhilāni ca kāraṇe puṣkale sati kāraṇair bhāvitātmabhiḥ kāraṇḍavaravākulaiḥ kāraṇḍavaṃ cāvedhyaṃ ca kāraṇḍavair bakair haṃsaiḥ kāraṇḍavaiḥ plavair haṃsais kāraṇḍavaiḥ plavair haṃsaiḥ kārayām āsa dharmātmā kārayām āsa vidhivac kārayām āsa vipro asau kārayām āsa sūdānām kārayitvā pradakṣiṇam kārayitvā bhavaṃ śuciḥ kārayitvā mahotsedhaṃ kārayet tv akuṭumbinām kārito viśvakarmaṇā kārukarmopajīvinaḥ kāruṇyasaṃjñaṃ sukhamokṣadaṃ ca kāruṇyaṃ yadi me dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyāt samavārayat kāruṇyenātmanātmānaṃ kārur ahaṃ tato bhiṣag kārkaśyena samārjitam kārtavīryasya tanayā kārtavīryasya dhīmataḥ kārtavīryasya yo janma kārtavīryo atrisaṃbhavam kārttikeya iti smṛtaḥ kārttikeyam iti śrutam kārttikeyaś ca śauriṇā kārttikeyaṃ divaukasaḥ kārttikeyaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ kārttikeyaṃ sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kārttikeyaḥ svayaṃ śaktyā kārttikeyād anantaram kārttikeyānuśāsanāt kārttikeyena nandinā kārttikeyo anumanya ca kārttikeyo harodbhavaḥ kārttikyāṃ kṛttikāyoge kārmukasya yathā guṇaḥ kāryakriyākārakasādhanānāṃ kāryajāte vraje sthitim kāryam asti dhanena kim kāryam uddiśya sādaram kāryavijñāpanaṃ cobhau kāryasiddhiṃ labhen naraḥ kāryasya ca parasya ca kāryasya na bhavet siddhyai kāryahantā kalipriyaḥ kāryaṃ kartā tvam ucyate kāryaṃ ca bhagavān sadā kāryaṃ cāpi sukhapradam kāryaṃ caitad acintayat kāryaṃ tasmai nyavedayat kāryaṃ tu sarvatas tasya kāryaṃ na vratavighnaṃ me kāryaṃ niṣkāraṇaṃ budhaiḥ kāryaṃ yat tu kramāgatam kāryaṃ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ guroḥ kāryaṃ sarvam anuṣṭhitam kāryaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati kāryākṣamair ninditair na kāryān nyāyāgataṃ nityam kāryāya kāraṇāya ca kāryārambhapravṛttayaḥ kāryārthamāyāt tridivaukasāṃ hi kāryā śāstir durātmanām kāryās tatra dinakriyāḥ kāryāḥ saṃcayanāt param kāryeṇaivāvatāriṇaḥ kārye saiva gatir mama kāryo gamanam eva ca kāryo atraiva phalapradaḥ kāryo dharmaḥ sadācāra kāryo nābhibhavaḥ kvacit kāryo api caiṣa saha karmakartṛ kārṣṇidāmodarāḥ purīm kālakaḥ kālakopaś ca kālakāmadakāmaghna kālakāyaḥ kaliḥ kila kālagṛdhraiś ca jambukaiḥ kālagṛdhraiś ca jambukaiḥ kālacakraṃ nayāmy eko kālacakro vibhāvasuḥ kālajñāya ca sarveṣāṃ kālañjaram udāhṛtam kālañjarādyāś ca tathā kālañjare ca gokarṇe kāladaṇḍena cakreṇa kālanābhas tathaiva ca kālanābhas tathaiva ca kālanemipurogamāḥ kālanemir nipātitaḥ kālanemir hato yo asau kālanemisamudbhūtam kālaparyāyacoditaḥ kālapāśena manyunā kālapuṣpaphalapradaḥ kālam ājñāpayām āsa kālamūlam idaṃ jñātvā kālam etaṃ na buddhavān kālam etaṃ vivañcanāt kālayanto vrajaukasaḥ kālayūpasya pārśve taṃ kālayoge bhavanti hi kālarātrir bhadrakālī kālarātrī ca dāruṇā kālarūpāya te namaḥ kālavarṣī ca parjanyo kālavyavasthām amṛtasravaṃ ca kālaśākaṃ tathā madhu kālaśākaṃ tandulīyaṃ kālaśākaṃ tilājyaṃ ca kālaś colaś ca pārthivaḥ kālasaṃkhyā na vidyate kālas taralalocanaḥ kālasya gatir īdṛśī kālasya vaśam āpanno kālaṃ navatikalpaṃ tu kālaṃ bhuktvā śubhān bhogāñ kālaṃ vasantam utkṛṣṭam kālaṃ śāpād ṛṣer bhayam kālaṃ sarvasukhapradam kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālākhyo dīptavigrahaḥ kālāgnisadṛśopamāḥ kālātmakam idaṃ sarvaṃ kālād ṛte na niyamo kālādyāḥ kāraṇaṃ taroḥ kālādhyakṣaḥ prajādhyakṣo kālānalasamaprabham kālānalasya dharmajñaḥ kālāvalokane nālaṃ kālāśrayaś ca yo dharmo kālikāśramam eva ca kālikāśramam eva ca kālindī mitravindā ca kālindyāś ca śrutādayaḥ kāliyo damitas toye kālīyaṃ raktavāṇāṃ ca kālīyo asau viṣāyudhaḥ kālī vicitravīryaṃ tu kāle cābhyāgate vrajam kālena ko na nihataḥ kālena gacchatā tau tu kālena cāśrito dharmo kālena bahunā punaḥ kālena mahatā cāyaṃ kālena mahatā dvijāḥ kālena mahatā viprāḥ kālena mahatā śivaḥ kālena saṃyatān yatīn kālena hiṃsayām āsa kālenāgatya matimān kālenātha tayoḥ putrāḥ kālenāmbumayaṃ rasam kālenālpena mānavāḥ kālenāsāṃ dvijottamāḥ kālenaiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ kāle pañcatvam āgataḥ kāle punar ihāyāto kāle praśastavarṇānāṃ kāleyakaṃ tūgragandhaṃ kāleyaiḥ kāñcanāraiś ca kālo dhatte tadā tadā kālo bhavāya bhūtānām kālo abhivyañjakaḥ prokto kālo bhūtvātidāruṇaḥ kālo yamaś ca mṛtyuś ca kālo lokaprakālanaḥ kāverīpramukhā nadīḥ kāverīhradam eva ca kāverīṃ jahnur āvahat kāverīṃ jahnur āvahat kāverīṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ kāveryāṃ janayām āsa kāvyaśāstrakathās tatra kāvyaḥ pṛthus tathaivāgnir kāvyālāpakathāś caiva kāvyo rājānam abravīt kā śacī pārijātasya kāśapuṣpāśanas tathā kāśasya kāśipo rājā kāśaḥ śalaś ca dvāv etau kāśikasya tu kāśeyaḥ kāśikaṃ ca mahāsatyaṃ kāśipuryāṃ sa cikṣepa kāśirājabalaṃ caiva kāśirājabalena ca kāśirājasuteneyam kāśirājaṃ ca sānugam kāśirājo mahārājaḥ kāśīnām adhipas tadā kāśīśvareṇātha samaṃ suyuddham kāścit kāñcanasaṃnibhāḥ kāścit padmapalāśākṣyaḥ kāścid indīvarekṣaṇāḥ kāśmīrān atha kośalān kāśmīrāṃs taṅgaṇān khasān kāśmīrāḥ karuṇās tathā kāśyāṃ ca viraje dvijāḥ kāṣṭhakuḍyasamāni tu kāṣṭhakhaṇḍaṃ nyaveśayat kāṣṭhakhaṇḍena vaiśyakaḥ kāṣṭhapādukayānāni kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥ kāṣṭhavikrayakārakāḥ kāṣṭhasya darśanaṃ tathā kāṣṭhaṃ sarvaguṇānvitam kāṣṭhād agnir yathaiva ca kāṣṭheṣu vahniḥ kusumeṣu gandho kāsāvṛṣṭy aty athānanam kāsāvṛṣṭy aty athānanam kāsi kasyāsi suśroṇi kāsi tvaṃ kasya hetor vā kāsi bhadre prabhuḥ ko vā kā syāt kanyā guṇādhikā kāhalais tālaśabdaiś ca kāṃ kāṃ ceṣṭāṃ na ceṣṭate kāṃ gatiṃ yānti manujā kāṃ ca kāṣṭhāṃ samāsādya kāṃ cakre stutim uttamām kāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇā kāṃcid bhrūbhaṅgavīkṣitaiḥ kāṃ daśām anuyāsyati kāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti kāṃdiśīkās tato abhavan kāṃdiśīkāṃs tava bhayād kāṃdiśīko vicetanaḥ kāṃdiśīko vicetanaḥ kāṃścit sa pariṣasvaje kāṃsyakārāś ca rūṭhakāḥ kāṃsyadohāḥ payasvinīḥ kāṃsyapātraṃ ca bhaktitaḥ kāṃsyaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhir kiṅkiṇījālamālinā kiṅkiṇījālamālinā kiṅkiṇījālamālinā kiṅkiṇījālamālinā kiṅkiṇījālamālinā kiṅkiṇījālamālinā kiṅkiṇīstabakākulaiḥ kiñjalkacūrṇaiḥ kapilīkṛtāni kitavasya tu yā jāyā kitavaḥ kopi dṛśyate kim akathyaṃ priye mitre kim atra tvaṃ kariṣyasi kim atra bahunoktena kim atra vīkṣase mṛtyo kim adya durlabhaṃ loke kim adya sarvadharmajña kim aniṣṭaṃ na jāyate kim anena dvijottama kim anena mahāprājña kim anena śvamāṃsena kim anenātra duḥkhena kim anenālpasāreṇa kim anyacetā iva lakṣyase tvam kim anyac chrotum icchatha kim anyac chrotum icchatha kim anyac chrotum icchatha kim anyac chrotum icchatha kim anyajantor iti cintya mātā kim anyat kathayāmi vaḥ kim anyat kriyatāṃ dvijāḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam kim anyad yogalakṣaṇam kim anyaṃ tvaṃ na vetsi yat kim anyena prayojanam kim anyena vareṇa me kim apy antar dhyāyati ca kim abhīṣṭaṃ pradāsyāmi kim abhīṣṭaṃ varayase kim ayaṃ devadeveśa kim ayaṃ mānuṣo bhāvo kimartham āgatāḥ sarve kimartham ārtena hi rudyate tvayā kimartham iha cāgataḥ kimarthaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ kimarthaṃ ca mahābāho kimarthaṃ ca śakādīnāṃ kimarthaṃ tanayeṣu vai kimarthaṃ tanayeṣu vai kimarthaṃ te tu kokāyāṃ kimarthaṃ te pravartatām kimarthaṃ tau samutpannau kimarthaṃ divyam ātmānaṃ kimarthaṃ nānugacchasi kimarthaṃ martyaloke asmin kimarthaṃ vartase anyathā kimarthaṃ sa bhavo devaḥ kimarthaṃ sarasas tīre kimarthaṃ stutavān māṃ tvaṃ kimarthaṃ sthīyate param kim alabhyaṃ bhagavati kim asaṃbaddham ucyate kim asmākam iti dvijāḥ kim asmākaṃ mahendreṇa kim āgamanakāryaṃ ta kimācāraprabhāvo vā kimātmako varāho asau kim ātmānaṃ viḍambase kimāhāravihāriṇaḥ kim āhorubhavā tava kim icchasi mahābhāga kim idaṃ kathyatāṃ mama kim idaṃ mama saṃjātam kim idaṃ mama saṃjātaṃ kim idaṃ mama saṃsthitam kim idaṃ liṅgamūrdhani kim idaṃ vajrapāṇis tvaṃ kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ kṛtam kim utāsyadvayena tvaṃ kim u māyāmayī tu sā kim ṛṇaṃ kena yujyate kim etat tāta kathyatām kim etad ity athovāca kim evaṃ mūḍhadhīr bhavān kiyantaṃ kālam ucyatām kiyantaṃ ca tvayā kālam kiyanti narakāṇi ca kiyanti narakāṇi ca kiyanti santi tīrthāni kiyān udyamavistaraḥ kirātaṃ piṇḍamūlakam kirātānāṃ ca jātayaḥ kirātās kiṃ svaguṇaiś ca teṣāṃ kiṃ vṛddhā yuktakāriṇaḥ kiṃ vai niṣkiṃcano bhavān kiṃ vo bahubhir uttaraiḥ kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ kiṃśukānāṃ vanāni ca kiṃ śaucenāmbujalpanā kiṃ svapno ayaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kiṃsvit tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ kīṭakeśāvapannaṃ ca kīṭadaṃśādibhis tathā kīṭamūṣikasarpāś ca kīṭaḥ samabhirundhati kīṭaḥ saṃjāyate jantus kīṭaḥ syān māsam eva ca kīṭādaḥ kṛmibhakṣaś ca kīṭādaḥ kṛmibhakṣaś ca kīdṛśaṃ deva rājyaṃ te kīrṇā kṣatriyakoṭībhir kīrtanāt sukham edhate kīrtanād yasya deveśi kīrtanād vā paro viprāḥ kīrtayanto mahātmanaḥ kīrtayitvā pṛthuṃ nṛpam kīrtayiṣyāmy ataḥ param kīrtayiṣyāmy ataḥ param kīrtayet puruṣottamam kīrtayed yaḥ śṛṇoti vā kīrtayed vāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ kīrtayeyam idaṃ viprāḥ kīrtikhaḍgadvidhākṛtāḥ kīrtitaṃ kīrtanīyasya kīrtitaṃ kīrtivardhanam kīrtitaṃ puruṣottamam kīrtito munisattamāḥ kīrtipuṣṭyādisaṃvṛtā kīrtim āpsyasi śobhanām kīrtimāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ kīrtir dhṛtiś ca lakṣmīś ca kīrtiś ca tava rājendra kīrtis tavātra rājendra kīrtiṃ kīrtimatāṃ varaḥ kīrtiṃ cāpy anivartinīm kīrtyamānaṃ nibodhata kīrtyamānaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ vaḥ kīrtyamānān nibodhata kīlālamadhuvigrahā kīlāvajranipātanaiḥ kukurasya suto vṛṣṭir kukuraṃ bhajamānaṃ ca kukurāṇām imaṃ vaṃśaṃ kukkuṭaḥ pañca varṣāṇi kukkuṭī jātipattrakam kukkuṭebhyaḥ prayacchati kukṣāv antrāṇy avaikṣata kukṣir ity evamādayaḥ kukṣiśūlo abhavan mama kukṣiś ca caraṇasyāntaḥ kukṣiṃ vidāryātha kare gṛhītvā kuṅkumāgurucandanaiḥ kuṅkumena vilepayet kucabhārāvanāmitāḥ kucabhārāvanāmibhiḥ kuñjaraiś cāpy alaṃkṛtāḥ kuṭajair bāṇapuṣpaiś ca kuṭilālakasaṃyuktāḥ kuṭumbabhāraduḥkhārto kuṭumbabhārāt parito kuṭumbaṃ tava bhokṣyati kuṭhāraiḥ pāṭyamānānāṃ kuḍmalaṃ nāma narakaṃ kuṇḍalābhyām alaṃkṛtām kuṇḍalaikadharaṃ divyaṃ kuṇḍalaikavibhūṣitam kuṇḍalai ratnasaṃyuktaiḥ kuṇḍalo dvijam āhedaṃ kuṇḍaṃ ghargharikāyāś ca kutas tv āgamyate tvayā kutaḥ kunṛpatau sukham kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ kuto niḥśreyasaṃ param kuto anyā śravaṇaspṛhā kuto bhayaṃ hy ātmavatāṃ kuto rājyaṃ kalatraṃ ca kuto vatsa cirāt prāptas kuto vā sāṃprataṃ vipre kuto vai sasyaniṣpattis kuto hy asyākṣayaḥ svargaḥ kutra gantā kimātmakaḥ kutra deśe nivatsyanti kutra vā saṃpradīyate kutrāpi kāruṇyavaco api nāsti kutrāpi vastuny abhimānaleśaḥ kutsaḥ puruḥ śatadyumnas kutsitaṃ munisattamāḥ kutsitānām acetasām kutsitā ye daridrāś ca kunetāro abhimāninaḥ kuntalāḥ kāśikośalāḥ kuntis tasyātmajo abhavat kuntis tāṃ pāṇḍur āvahat kunter dhṛṣṭaḥ suto jajñe kuntyai dāsyāmi vikṣatān kundakārāś ca pāvakāḥ kundadantaprahāsinī kundabāṇakuruṇṭakaiḥ kundāmalāṅgam unnidra- kundendurajataprakhyaṃ kupathaḥ krodhanaḥ krathaḥ kupitaḥ pippalāśanaḥ kupitā praṇayenābhūd kupitābhūt sureśvarī kupitā sābravīt sutān kupitās te hariṃ hantuṃ kupitena pinākinā kupito darśayām āsa kupito abhyāyayau śīghraṃ kupyanti devā ripavas te bhavanti kubera iva mandare kubero yakṣarakṣasām kubjakaṃ tagaraṃ caiva kubjaḥ keśāntapiṅgalaḥ kubjāmbakaṃ bhadravaṭaṃ kubjāya kuṭilāya ca kumāradhārā śrīdhārā kumāravāsaṃ śrīvāsam kumāraśālām anvicchan kumāraṃ gatacetasam kumāraṃ janayām āsa kumāraṃ manmathataror kumāraḥ sukumāro asau kumārān pradrutā bhayāt kumārā rāmaṭhāḥ śakāḥ kumārāv iva pāvakau kumārās te yathākālaṃ kumāro dasyuhantamaḥ kumāro abhūn mahābalaḥ kumārge na pravartante kumāryaś cāpi tisro vai kumāryaḥ sapta cāsyātha kumudaś connataś caiva kumudāpīḍaśuklābhir kumudaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca kumudaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca kumudaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca kumudaiḥ śatapattraiś ca kumudotpalamaṇḍitaiḥ kumbhakarṇahradaṃ caiva kumbhakarṇaṃ sarāvaṇam kumbhakarṇo arṇavālayaḥ kumbhakarṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ kumbhanābho gardabhākṣaḥ kumbhayonir ivāparaḥ kumbhayoniṃ jagadgurum kumbhaṃ ca dakṣiṇāṃ caiva kumbhīkauṣṭhaharītakaiḥ kumbhīpākaṃ sudāruṇam kumbhīpāko mahāghoraḥ kumbhīpāko mahāghoraḥ kumbholūkaḥ prajāyate kuraṇṭakaṇṭakākīrṇaṃ kuraṇṭakaṇṭakākīrṇaṃ kuraratvaṃ niyacchati kuraraṃ ca nirasthiṃ ca kurarī mālyavāṃs tathā kuravas tuṅgaṇāḥ khasāḥ kuru karma tyajeti ca kuru krīḍāṃ mayā saha kurukṣetraṃ cakāra ha kurukṣetraṃ ca pāñcālān kurukṣetre tathārbude kurukṣetre samāsīnaṃ kuru gaṅgāṃ ca sevaya kuru cūḍām api kriyām kuru caitad vaco mama kuru caiva mayā saha kurutāṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ rūpaṃ kurutāṃ gautamīsnānaṃ kuru tāṃ pratimāṃ divyāṃ kurutāṃ yajñarakṣaṇam kurutāṃ śraddhayānvitau kurutāṃ snānam ādarāt kuru tīrthaṃ suśobhanam kurute mama yātanām kuru tvaṃ nṛpasattama kurudhvaṃ mama sāhāyyaṃ kuru patnīṃ gireḥ sutām kuru puṇyaṃ mahāphalam kuru putra nijaṃ karma kuru prasannārtihara kuru prasādam eteṣāṃ kuru bhadre mamājñayā kuru madvacanaṃ putra kuru vipra śivālayam kuru śīghraṃ śivālayam kuru śailamayīṃ bhuvi kuruṣva ca jagaddhitam kuruṣva cāstrāṇi bahūni sadyaḥ kuruṣva cety āhur adīnasattvaṃ kuruṣva pratimā iti kuruṣva mama gopate kuruṣva vākyaṃ madudīritaṃ yat kuruṣva śīghraṃ padam aindram atra kuruṣva surapūjita kuruṣv āste sanātanaḥ kuruṣveti ca coditaḥ kuru sundari mā ciram kuru sthairyam ato arjuna kuruḥ kanakhalaś caiva kuruḥ saṃvaraṇāt tathā kurūn athottarān gatvā kurūn athottarāṃs tataḥ kurūpā vikṛtasvarā kurūpo bhogavarjitaḥ kurūpo rūpasaṃpattim kuroś ca putrāś catvāraḥ kuroḥ putrasya rājendra- kurmas tad eva prathamaṃ kurmas tasmin varān bahūn kurmo vākyaṃ tvayoditam kuryāc cāgniparigraham kuryāc chreyaḥ svam ātmavān kuryāt karma svabhāvataḥ kuryāt paricayaṃ yoge kuryāt pitṝṇāṃ tritayam kuryāt pitṝṇāṃ prītyarthaṃ kuryāt pratigrahādānaṃ kuryād anugatas tadā kuryād avimanāḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kuryād ācamanaṃ sparśe kuryād udakatarpaṇam kuryād viprāḥ svaśaktitaḥ kuryād vyomapradakṣiṇām kuryān nṛharipūjanam kuryān mātāmahānāṃ tu kuryān mūtrapurīṣayoḥ kuryām aham idaṃ dhruvam kuryām ahaṃ yena patir mamādya kuryur etaṃ vidhiṃ samyak kuryur vighnaṃ gṛhe tasya kuryus teṣām abhīṣṭāni kuryuḥ samagrāḥ śucinaḥ kuryuḥ sarve yathocitam kurvataḥ saphalaṃ janma kurvatāṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ kurvatāṃ yāti yaḥ kālo kurvatī sarvadābhavat kurvate saṃyatendriyāḥ kurvate aharahaś caiva kurvato jñānam ādhāsye kurvato mukhadarśanam kurvato viṣṇuprīṇanam kurvatyaḥ satataṃ spṛhām kurvatyās tapa uttamam kurvatyo gurubhartṝṇām kurvatyo abhinayān bahūn kurvatyau girimūrdhani kurvan kṛtārthaṃ madanaṃ sa reme kurvantāṃ cānurādhāsu kurvanti garhitaṃ karma kurvanti te sukhaṃ yānti kurvanti yamakiṃkarāḥ kurvanti śabdaṃ madaneritāṅgāḥ kurvantu yuddham unmattaiḥ kurvanty aniṣṭaṃ kapaṭais kurvanty aśvatthalambhanam kurvann āste mahītale kurvann āste yathā baliḥ kurvann āste sa gautamyās kurvann idam udairayat kurvan paśyati mastake kurvan balavatā saṃdhiṃ kurvan rājyam akaṇṭakam kurvan rājyam anuttamam kurvan rāmo mahāvanam kurvaṃl lokasya vismayam akurvaṃs te paramaṃ tapaḥ kurvāṇas tu trayodaśīm kurvāṇaḥ sumanāḥ sadā kurvāte sma tadā tena kurvīta kurvataḥ śrāddhaṃ kurvīta caivam ucchiṣṭaṃ kurvīta niyatātmavān kurvīta satataṃ viprā kurvīta samyag ācamya kurvītālambhanaṃ cāpi kulajā munisattamāḥ kulajāṃ vāpy arogiṇīm kuladharmam anutiṣṭhadbhir kulabhadraṃ tatas tu saḥ kulalakṣaṇabhūṣitam kulavadhvā rahaḥ kāryaṃ kulavān rūpavān bhavet kulaśīlaguṇopetāḥ kulaśīlavivarjitāḥ kulasya niṣkṛtir viprāḥ kulasyācyuta lakṣaye kulasyādhārabhūto yo kulaṃ rūpaṃ vayo vittaṃ kulaṃ śaktiṃ dhiyaṃ vapuḥ kulaṃ śīlaṃ jīvitaṃ vā kulād yuṣmatkulocitam kulikā jāṅgalaiḥ saha kulitthān sarṣapāṃś caṇān kulīnaṃ kuśakaṇṭakavalmīka- kuśagandhatilonmiśraṃ kuśagandhayavaiḥ puṣpair kuśago mandagaś coṣṇaḥ kuśatarpaṇa eva vā kuśatarpaṇadeśe tu kuśatarpaṇam ākhyātaṃ kuśatarpaṇam ākhyātaṃ kuśatarpaṇam ucyate kuśatarpaṇam uttamam kuśadvīpasya vistārād kuśadvīpe kuśastambaḥ kuśadvīpena sarvataḥ kuśaputrā babhūvur hi kuśapravaṇam eva ca kuśalaṃ siddhapuruṣaṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ sadā kuśalākuśalo nṝṇāṃ kuśalān yajñakarmaṇi kuśalān sarvakarmasu kuśas tasyātmajo abhavat kuśasthalīṃ dvāravatīṃ kuśaṃ krauñcaṃ ca śākaṃ ca kuśaḥ krauñcas tathā śākaḥ kuśāgreṇāpi rājendra kuśān ādāya keśavaḥ kuśān ādāya prāgagrāṃl kuśān ādāya satvaram kuśān āstīrya bhūtale kuśāmbo mūrtimāṃs tathā kuśāvartam iti khyātaṃ kuśāvartasya māhātmyam kuśikas tasya cātmajaḥ kuśikas tu tapas tepe kuśikas tu tapas tepe kuśikaḥ kuśanābhaś ca kuśīlānāryabhūyiṣṭhā kuśūladhanino apare kuśenāvartayitvā tu kuśenāvartitaṃ yatra kuśeśayo hariś caiva kuśeṣv eva tu saṃśrayaḥ kuśair ullikhya tāṃ punaḥ kuśaiś ca tarpitāḥ sarve kuśais taṃ gāṅgavāribhiḥ kuṣṭhasarvāṅgaśithilaḥ kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī vālakaṃ ca kuṣṭhaṃ hanyāt tanau sthitam kuṣṭhāṅgāmayasaṃjñakaiḥ kuṣṭhī bhūyās tataś candraṃ kuṣṭhī raktekṣaṇaḥ kubjo kusamodaś ca modākiḥ kusumāni eva ca kūlaṃ ca lavaṇāmbhasaḥ kūlānte hi mahāvṛkṣaḥ kūle yaś cottare caiva kūṣmāṇḍaṃ kaṭukatrayam kṛkaṇeyus tathaiva ca kṛcchracaṅkramaṇotthāna- kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādīṃś ca kṛcchreṇa nihato balī kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ kṛtakṛtyo yathecchayā kṛtakṛtyo asi bhadraṃ te kṛtakṛtyo asi bhadraṃ te kṛtakṛtyo asi mānada kṛtaghnas tu mṛto viprā kṛtaghnaḥ satyarahitaḥ kṛtaghnāyāhitāya ca kṛtaghne mitraghātake kṛtaghno mitravañcakaḥ kṛtacihnena pāṇinā kṛtacchāyaṃ harer mūrdhni kṛtajñeṣu mahatsu ca kṛtatretādikaś cātra kṛtatretādikā naiva kṛtatretādiyuktāni kṛtadāro abhavat prabhuḥ kṛtadhanvā tathaiva ca kṛtapuṇyās ta eva hi kṛtabuddhiṣu sādhuṣu kṛtam anyo haniṣyati kṛtamālātāmraparṇī- kṛtamālā tāmraparṇī kṛtam ity āha tān api kṛtavān nityavat tadā kṛtavān bhārataṃ śāstraṃ kṛtavidyau dhanuṣpāṇī kṛtavīryaḥ kṛtaujāś ca kṛtavīryād athārjunaḥ kṛtaśailaḥ kṛtācalaḥ kṛtaśaucāvaśiṣṭāś ca kṛtaśauco viśuddhātmā kṛtaś cātmīyatejasā tasyā vacaḥ satyaṃ kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanā kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kṛtaṃ putra suduṣkaram kṛtaṃ bālasya mokṣaṇam kṛtaṃ bhaktimatā vada kṛtaṃ bhadre atha niyamaḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati karmaṇā kṛtaṃ yad anyad evābhūt kṛtaṃ yad etad vyabhicārarūpaṃ kṛtaṃ varṣanivāraṇam kṛtaṃ viṣṇugṛhe vada kṛtaṃ sadbrāhmaṇasya me kṛtaṃ sarvam atandritaḥ kṛtaṃ saṃdehaharaṇam kṛtaḥ kaṃsena kaṃso api kṛtaḥ kāṣṭhamaye tvayā kṛtaḥ kila durātmabhiḥ kṛtaḥ śuklas tvayā punaḥ kṛtaḥ sabahudakṣiṇaḥ kṛtaḥ sa bhagavāñ śveto kṛtā kaṃsasya dehena kṛtākṛtasya satkartre kṛtāgnis tu caturtho abhūt kṛtāñjalipuṭaś cābdhis kṛtāñjalipuṭas tāṃ vai kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ pūrvaṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ śanaiḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ skandaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ sthitaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā dīnā kṛtāñjalipuṭā dīnāḥ udāradhīḥ kṛtāñjalis tadā hṛṣṭo kṛtāñjaliḥ savinayam kṛtātithyo dvijaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛtādiṣu yathākramam kṛtā devena viṣṇunā kṛtādau parikīrtitam kṛtāni madhusūdana kṛtāntaṃ ca bhayānakam kṛtānto vartate adhunā kṛtāny annarasās tathā kṛtāny annarasās tathā kṛtāparādhe api jane kṛtāparādhe api jane kṛtāparādhe api hare kṛtā pradakṣiṇā tasyāḥ kṛtābhipūjo vigataśramas tāṃ kṛtābhyuddhāra keśava kṛtārtha iva durjanaḥ kṛtārthāsmīty acintayat kṛtārthāhaṃ tathāpi tvāṃ kṛtārthāhaṃ na saṃśayaḥ kṛtāvataṃsaḥ sa tadā kṛtā sā vai bhaved iti kṛtās tena mahātmanā kṛtāstrā balinaḥ śūrā kṛtāṃ devair akalmaṣām kṛtāṃ dvāravatīṃ nāma kṛtāṃ pūjāṃ sa vidhvasya kṛtinas tapase vanam kṛtinā bhuvanatrayam kṛte kiṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam kṛte kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati kṛte caivātha saṃkalpe kṛte deśaṃ ca kālaṃ ca kṛte na pratikartā ca kṛtenehāpy anantakam kṛte pāpe anutāpo vai kṛte prahāre huṃkāre kṛte vai putrajanmani kṛte śayyālaye dvijāḥ kṛte sakṛd api dvijaiḥ kṛte sapiṇḍīkaraṇe kṛtaikaniścayāḥ sarve kṛtaiḥ kaitavavartibhiḥ kṛtodvāhaṃ dvijottamāḥ kṛtodvāho yadātmajaḥ kṛtopavāsaḥ prāpnoti kṛtopavāso yatretya kṛto api dharmo aniṣṭāya kṛto mattapaso vyayaḥ kṛto yajño mayā pūrvaṃ kṛtordhvadaihikaṃ cainaṃ kṛtau tena mahātmanā kṛttikātīrtham ucyate kṛttikādiṣu ṛkṣeṣu kṛttikāsu ca tad retaḥ kṛttikāsu pitṝn arcya kṛttikāḥ svayam evaitad kṛttivāsasam uttamam kṛttivāsā vṛṣadhvajaḥ kṛttivāsā vṛṣadhvajaḥ kṛttivāsā hy avāsāś ca kṛtyaṃ tasya ca bhūpateḥ kṛtyaṃ na me dvārakayā kṛtyaṃ suravareśvara kṛtyā netravinirgatā kṛtyāpi vaḍavākṛtiḥ kṛtyām anujagāmāśu kṛtyā māheśvarī tadā kṛtyā vārāṇasīm eva kṛtyā sā ṛṣinirmitā kṛtyā sānalagarbhiṇī kṛtyāṃ ca vaḍavāṃ tatra kṛtyāṃ prāha tadā śivaḥ kṛtyāṃ śamaya bhadraṃ te kṛtye kṛtyaṃ tataḥ kuru kṛtvā kanyāṃ tathā dattvā kṛtvā karma divaṃ yānti kṛtvā kila naraḥ samyak kṛtvā kiṃcit tu pauruṣam kṛtvā kṣemaṃ jagat sarvaṃ kṛtvākṣemām aśeṣāṃ tāṃ kṛtvā gatā kvāpi caivaṃ suvarṇā kṛtvā girimahaṃ goṣṭhaṃ kṛtvāgnihotraṃ svaśarīrasaṃsthaṃ kṛtvāṅgair hṛdayādibhiḥ kṛtvā cakruḥ stutiṃ parām kṛtvā ca devāṃs tridaśeśvarāṃs tu kṛtvā ca dharmān bubhuje ca bhogān kṛtvā ca samayaṃ hariḥ kṛtvā cātithipūjanam kṛtvā cāvāhanaṃ cakre kṛtvā caiṣāṃ pradakṣiṇām kṛtvā jānuni sattamāḥ kṛtvā jāyeta vai vṛkaḥ kṛtvā jyeṣṭhe narottamaḥ kṛtvā tatpravaṇaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā tatra mahīpatiḥ kṛtvā tathāstrāṇi ca devatānāṃ kṛtvā tasmin pañcatīrthaṃ kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā tāṃ tapasaś cyutim kṛtvātithyaṃ tayoḥ samyag kṛtvā tiṣṭha śubhāṃ buddhiṃ kṛtvā tu triḥ pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā tu pāpāni naro mahānti kṛtvā tu brāhmaṇān natvā kṛtvā tu vaidikair mantrair kṛtvā tu sparśanālāpaṃ kṛtvā tenānṛtaṃ vakṣya kṛtvā teṣāṃ yathāvidhi kṛtvā toyamayaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvātmānaṃ mahābāhuś kṛtvā divyena śudhyati kṛtvā devaiḥ sa rākṣasaḥ kṛtvā deśam akaṇṭakam kṛtvā daityaiś ca saṃgamam kṛtvā dvādaśadhātmānam kṛtvā dvāravatīṃ yayau kṛtvā dharmaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ kṛtvā natvā surān imān kṛtvāniśaṃ tābhir udārabhāvaḥ kṛmiṣv api koṭarī purato hareḥ koṭare tannage śreṣṭhe koṭikoṭiguṇaṃ karma koṭikoṭiśatāni ca koṭitīrthajalenāsāv koṭitīrthaphalaṃ yataḥ koṭitīrtham iti khyātaṃ koṭitīrthasthalīṃ caiva koṭitīrthasya māhātmyam koṭitīrthaṃ cāgnipadaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ tato viduḥ koṭitīrthaṃ tathāparam koṭitīrthaṃ pañcanadaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ bhadravaṭaṃ koṭitīrthe dvijāgryāya koṭidrumam anuttamam koṭidvayaṃ tatra pūrṇaṃ koṭiprītiguṇaṃ bhavet koṭiśaś ca karoty eṣa koṭīdhanapatiḥ śrīmāṃś koṭīnāṃ caiva bhūṣaṇam koṭyanekair javānvitaiḥ koṭyo navanavatyas tu koṇāditya iti khyātas koṇāditya iti khyāto koṇārkasyodadhes tīre koṇārkaṃ munisattamāḥ koṇisarpā māhiṣakā koṇe caiva tu vinyaset ko atikramitum īśvaraḥ ko duśceṣṭaṃ na ceṣṭate ko deśaḥ kim u tīrthaṃ vā ko deśaḥ kiṃ ca tīrthaṃ syād ko doṣo bhavatāṃ nītir kodravaṃ kokilākṣaṃ ca kodravāṃś caiva varjayet ko dharmaḥ kaś ca vādharmaḥ ko na kuryāt karoti ca ko na kuryāt sukhaṃ rave ko na moham upāyāti ko nāma loke rājendra ko nivartayituṃ śaktas ko nu tṛptaḥ praśasyate ko nu me rakṣako atra syād ko nu vātyeti paṇḍitaḥ ko nu vidhvaṃsate pāpo ko nu svapnaḥ sabhāgyābhir ko anyo asti sadṛśas tvayā ko nv ayaṃ cety ajānatī ko nv asyā guṇakīrtanam kopasaṃraktalocanaḥ kopaṃ cakre sa durmatiḥ kopaṃ cakre halāyudhaḥ kopaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca niyamya sādhvī kopaṃ nigṛhya dharmātmā kopaṃ yacchata rājānaḥ kopāt kavir athābravīt kopāt tvam iti taṃ muniḥ kopād daiteyagardabhaḥ kopāya ca yatas tasmād kopāya tridaśendrasya kopi tadvad durātmanaḥ kopena mahatāviṣṭā kopena mahatāviṣṭo kopena mahatāviṣṭo kopena hutabhug yathā ko apy anya eva nāśāya ko bhavān atiduḥkhitaḥ ko bhavān iti cābravīt ko bhavān iti taṃ prāha ko bhavān kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ ko bhavān kva ca gantāsi ko bhavān dvijaśārdūla ko bhavān dvimukhaḥ pakṣī ko bhavān munirūpeṇa ko bhavāṃs tat purā vada ko bhavet ko nu yācate ko martyalokātigaceṣṭitasya ko ayam atreti saṃmantrya koyaṣṭikaiś ca dātyūhaiḥ koyaṣṭidātyūhabalākayuktā koyaṣṭibakaśobhitaiḥ ko ayaṃ katham ayaṃ matsya- ko ayaṃ nāmnā kīrtayati ko ayaṃ śakramaho nāma ko rājā syād guṇāśrayaḥ ko arthī gauravam āgataḥ kolāhalaḥ sa vaibhrājo ko varo vaḥ pradīyatām ko varṇas tūbhayor api ko varṇas tūbhayor api ko vā girāv atra vasen mahātmā ko vā dhartuṃ tvām ṛte vai samarthaḥ ko vā dharmo vidhīyate ko vā bhartā kiṃ tu kṛtyaṃ ko vā bhartā mamety enāṃ ko vā śakraḥ surādhipaḥ ko vāsyāḥ poṣaṇe śakta ko vijetā bhaviṣyati kovidārakaśigrukau kovidāraiḥ sapippalaiḥ ko viśeṣo asti me tvattaḥ ko vetti bhāgyaṃ naradehabhājāṃ ko vedeṣv anugīyate kośakāraṃ tato hṛtvā kośakaupīnavāsāś ca kośalādhipatiṃ caiva koṣakāro yathātmānaṃ koṣṭhāākāśaṃ śarīriṇām koṣṭhe agnir bhoktum icchati koṣṭhe bhāṇḍamanā iva koṣṭhe viṇmūtrapicchale koṣṭhe saktaṃ tathānalam ko asau kaṇḍuḥ kathaṃ tatra ko hi tādṛgbhave bhavet ko hi duṣṭamatir mando kautukenātimahatā kautūhalād idaṃ vākyaṃ kaupīnācchādanaprāyā kaumāram iti viśrutam kaumāraṃ vāruṇaṃ tathā kaumudīkumudākaram kaumodakīṃ gadāṃ cāsau kauravāj janamejayāt kauravāṇām ādhipatyam kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ kauravāṇāṃ pradāsyati kauravā munisattamāḥ kaulikāḥ kuntalāś caiva kauśalyā ca sumitrā ca kauśalyāyāṃ tathā rāmaḥ kauśalyā suṣuve sutān kauśāmbī ca divākaram kauśikād vaṃśavardhanaḥ kauśikānāṃ mahātmanām kauśikī karatoyā ca kauśikī cāpagā caiva kauśikīti samākhyātā kauśikī devatīrthaṃ ca kauśikīhradam eva ca kauśikīṃ saṃtariṣyanti kauśiko gālavaś caiva kauśikyaṃ bharataṃ caiva kauśeyaṃ kṣaumakārpāsaṃ kauśeyaṃ ca vivarjayet kauṣakārāś citrakārāḥ krakacair iva dāritaḥ krakacair iva dāruṇaiḥ krakacair vajradhārograir krakacaiḥ pīḍyamānānāṃ krakacaiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ kratudantaś citīmukhaḥ kratunānena divyena kratuniṣpattaye jagmur kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ kratubhis tāni tulyāni kratum aṅgirasaṃ mayam kratur haraḥ pracetāś ca kratusthalā varāṅgī ca kratuhantāram eva ca kratuṃ kṛtvā tataḥ pūrṇaṃ kratuṃ vidhvaṃsayām āsus kratuṃ samāpayām āsa kratuḥ pūrṇo bhavatv eṣa kratuḥ pūrṇo bhavet tatra kratuḥ pūrṇo astu me prabho kratvaṅgirodakṣamarīcivaiṣṇavāḥ krathāya krathanāya ca krandaty avirataḥ so atha krandaty avirataḥ so atha krandamānāḥ sudāruṇāḥ kramamāṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśam kramavikramasatkṛtaḥ krama viṣṇo punaḥ punaḥ kramavṛddhyā caturviṃśam kramaśaś caiva vinyaset kramaśas tāni rājyāni kramaśo juhvatas tadā kramaśo brāhmaṇānītāṃ kramaśo yajñayoniṣu kramasva viṣṇo lokeśa kramāgataṃ dhanaṃ nāsti kramāt prakṛtayas tathā kramād garbhe nyayojayat kramiṣye paśya daityarāṭ krameṇa narakāgniṣu krameṇācintya mānase krameṇājau mahāmṛgaḥ krameṇāsya tu bāhūnāṃ krameṇaitena bho dvijāḥ krameṇaiva tathā sā tu krameṇaiva pitāmahaḥ krameṇaivaṃ prapūryate krayakrītam ṛṣeḥ sutam krayavikrayajair vāpi krayavikrayaṇaṃ tathā krayo bhavati nārada kravyādā brahmarūpeṇa kravyādair vinipātitam krānto asmy ahaṃ mṛtyubhujaṃgamena krāntau viṣṇur bale śakraḥ krimikīṭasamākīrṇaṃ krimibhāvād vinirmuktas krimiyonau prajāyate krimiyonau prajāyate krimiyonau prajāyate krimir bhavati varṣāṇi krimiś ca kramaṇaś caiva kriyatām avicāritam kriyatām ity anubruvan kriyatāṃ kratur uttamaḥ kriyatāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak kriyatāṃ cārur udvāhaḥ kriyatāṃ tan mahābhāgā kriyatāṃ dārasaṃgrahaḥ kriyatāṃ pratisaṃhāraḥ kriyatāṃ prītaye mama kriyatāṃ samanugrahaḥ kriyatāṃ sthīyatāṃ sukham kriyatāṃ hitam ātmanaḥ kriyate guṇarūpaṃ yad kriyate copasaṃhāras kriyate tapasā hi yaḥ kriyate na tathā bhūri kriyate niyamo yas tu kriyate balabhadrasya kriyate bhujyate vāpi kriyate snānadānādi kriyantām aparāḥ kathāḥ kriyamāṇaṃ tathā kṛtam kriyamāṇe bhavatkārye kriyamāṇe abhiṣeke tu kriyamāṇe mahādhvare kriyā karaṇakārye ca kriyākāraṇavarjitam kriyākriyāpathopetas kriyājñānavivarjitaḥ kriyāyogād bahiṣkṛtāḥ kriyārūpaṃ ca taj jñānaṃ kriyālopo anyathā bhavet kriyāvantaḥ prajāvanto kriyā saiva tad ucyate kriyāṃ kurvīta vai śuciḥ kriyāṃ kriyāpathe raktas krīḍatā līlayā purā krīḍate keśavena vai krīḍate nahi devānāṃ krīḍate nṛtyagītakaiḥ krīḍate saha kanyābhir krīḍantāv aticañcalau krīḍanti tatra viprendrāḥ krīḍanti tāsu ramyāsu krīḍanti tāḥ sadā tatra krīḍanti vividhākārāś krīḍanti sma divā rātrau krīḍantīm upalakṣyoccaiḥ krīḍante tatra muditā krīḍante tatra saukhyena krīḍanty apsarasaiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍantyaś ca madonmattāḥ krīḍantyas tāḥ sadā hṛṣṭā krīḍann iva bhujodbhinnaṃ krīḍamānā varāṅganāḥ krīḍamānau tathā paraiḥ krīḍayantyā ca maṇinā krīḍā bhavati tādṛśī krīḍābhir itaretaram krīḍābhiś ceratur vanam krīḍārtham abhimanyate krīḍāviśeṣabahulair krīḍāsaktena līlayā krīḍāsu yuktān atha tarjayantaḥ krīḍāhetoḥ saromadhye krīḍāṃ kṛtvā suraiḥ saha krīḍitvā cāpsaraiḥ saha krīḍitvā tatra devavat krīḍitvā tatra vai sukham krīḍitvā madhusūdanaḥ krīḍitvā vācyutālaye krīṇāmi vada taddhanam krītvā jīvāmahe vayam kruddhas tvaṣṭāram abhyagāt kruddhaṃ cainaṃ prasādayet kruddhaṃ sutaṃ bodhitum apy aśaktas kruddhaḥ prāha bṛhaspatiḥ kruddhaḥ sarvātmakaḥ prabhuḥ kruddhā devī tam abravīt kruddhā lokapitāmaha kruddhair maharṣibhis tāta kruddho nirasad acyutaḥ kruddho rājā dvijottamāḥ kruddho rudraḥ paśūn iva kruddho viprās tadā nṛpaḥ kruśadaṇḍaṃ ca viśrutam krūrakarmātidāruṇaḥ krūraś cāpi prasannaś ca krūrāṇām anilāśinām krūrāś cāñjanasaprabhāḥ kretānnena nṛpottama kroḍamāṃsāśino yac ca kroḍarūpī janārdanaḥ kroḍarūpī hariḥ svayam kroḍena vatsān ākramya krodhagrāhākule raudre krodhatīvreṇa vahninā krodhano anṛtabhāṣaṇaḥ krodhapaṅkāṃ saridvarām krodhamohavinirmuktā krodharaktāntalocanāḥ krodharūpe durātmanām krodhavardhana eva ca krodhaś ca saphalo nṛṇām krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ krodhas tu prathamaṃ śatrur krodhaṃ duryodhanādiṣu krodhaṃ śamena jayati krodhaṃ śaṃbhoś ca duḥsaham krodhaḥ kasya na jāyate krodhaḥ sarvasya yo bhīma krodhākulīkṛtamanā krodhād amitatejasaḥ krodhād vidhvaṃsito yajño krodhāndhānāṃ lobhināṃ ca krośamānaṃ ca meghavat kroṣṭā tasmād bhaviṣyati kroṣṭā nīlo añjikas tathā kroṣṭubhārye babhūvatuḥ kroṣṭuvaktrāś ca dānavāḥ kroṣṭuś caiva mahān putro kroṣṭor athābhavat putro kroṣṭor bhārye babhūvatuḥ kroṣṭor vaṃśaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ kroṣṭor vaṃśaṃ hi śrutvaiva krauñcadvīpasya vistāra- krauñcadvīpaḥ samudreṇa krauñcadvīpe dyutimataḥ krauñcadvīpena saṃvṛtaḥ krauñcadvīpo muniśreṣṭhāḥ krauñcayonau prajāyate krauñcavaktrāś ca dānavāḥ krauñcaś ca vāmanaś caiva krauñcaḥ kārpāsikaṃ hṛtvā krauñcī tu janayām āsa krauñcī śyenī ca bhāsī ca krauñco jīvati varṣāṇi klāntadeho api pannagaḥ klidyatāṃ kṣārakardame klinnavāsā sa lubdhakaḥ klībatvam upayānti te klībā jāyanti vai narāḥ kleśadas tridivaukasām kleśasaṃghavināśanam kleśahāniṃ kariṣyataḥ kleśādayaḥ santi parāpareśe kleśādigoptā na paro asti kaścit kleśād utkrāntim āpnoti kleśena pratipadyate kleśenālaṃ suragaṇā kleśair niṣkrāntim āpnoti kva ekaiva tu gacchasi kva kramiṣye bhuvaṃ dehi kva gacchāmi kva tiṣṭheyaṃ kva gacchāmīti vai muhuḥ kva gacche ahaṃ muniśreṣṭha kva gatāyonijā mātā kva gateti mahāyaśāḥ kva gato asīti nirlajjā kva gamiṣye kuto anv aham kva guṇāḥ kva ca gauravam kva ca prītir gatā tava kva ca me mānuṣasyaiṣā kvacic ca parvatakṣepād kvacic chāpanivartanam kvacit karṣāgninā punaḥ kvacit kasmiṃś ca tīrthāni kvacit taptaśilābhiś ca kvacit paṅkena nicitā kvacit sattvaṃ samāśritam kvacit sarpaviṣolbaṇaiḥ kvacit siṃhair vṛkair vyāghrair kvacid ajagaraiḥ punaḥ kvacid antaram āsādya kvacid eva palāyanam kvacid dāvāgninā yutam kvacid duṣṭagajaiś caiva kvacid duṣṭāmbunā vyāptaṃ kvacid dhasantāv anyonyaṃ kvacid bhītaiḥ kvacit trastaiḥ kvacid bhītaiḥ kvacit trastaiḥ kvacid vālukayā vyāptam kvacid vidyunnipātena kvacid viṣamagartābhiḥ kvacid vyāptaṃ himena ca kvacin mahājalaukābhiḥ kvacil loṣṭaiḥ supicchalaiḥ kva japo vāsudeveti kvathyatāṃ tailamadhye ca kva nākapṛṣṭhagamanaṃ kva nītaḥ kena vā nītaḥ kva pibāmaḥ kva saṃsthitiḥ kva me puṣpaṃ kva me phalam kva yakṣyāmi surān iti kva yāmaḥ kutra mantraḥ syāt kva yauvanonmukhībhūtaḥ kva vajrakaṭhinābhoga- kva vā keneti tad vada kva vā gataś ceti savismayā sā kva vā baddho mahāmatiḥ kva sthāpyaṃ cety athābravīt kva sthairyaṃ nanu yoṣitām kva hoṣyaṃ syād dvitīyaṃ tu kvāpi kvāpi śubhāni ca kvāpi tatra jayaṃ prāpur kvāpi taddehadoṣataḥ kvāpi tad rākṣasair vighnaṃ kvāpi tan mānuṣair abhūt kvāpy anyac charaṇaṃ nahi kvāpy astraṃ te vajram uddāmaśakti kvārādhayāmi giriśam kṣaṇamātreṇa tat tadā kṣaṇamātreṇa vai tatra kṣaṇavidhvaṃsini sukhe kṣaṇas tena vinābhavat kṣaṇaṃ ca brahmarūpeṇa kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā śanaiḥ śanaiḥ kṣaṇaṃ na saṃtiṣṭhati jīvalokaḥ kṣaṇaṃ bhūtvā tv asau tūṣṇīṃ kṣaṇāt taḍid garjitaṃ ca kṣaṇā nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhāś ca kṣaṇān nirdhūtapāpas tvaṃ kṣaṇā muhūrtā divasā kṣaṇena yamasāṃnidhyam kṣaṇena labhate adhvānam kṣaṇena śārṅganirmuktaiḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata kṣaṇenālaṃkṛtā pṛthvī kṣaṇenaikena nirmitāḥ kṣaṇenaiva samānīya kṣatradharmaparāyaṇaḥ kṣatradharmaparāyaṇaḥ kṣatradharmarataḥ śrīmān kṣatradharmarataḥ sadā kṣatradharmān niṣevate kṣatram indrabhayāvaham kṣatrayonau prajāyate kṣatravṛddhasya cāparaḥ kṣatravṛddhātmajas tatra kṣatravṛddho mahāyaśāḥ kṣatraṃ daivaṃ yataḥ sūryo kṣatriyarṣabhasūdanaḥ kṣatriyas tarasā prāptam kṣatriyaḥ śūdratām eti kṣatriyaḥ saṃgaraṃ gatvā kṣatriyaḥ svena karmaṇā kṣatriyā guṇasaṃpannā kṣatriyāṇāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahaujasām kṣatriyāṇāṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ vivāhāś ca kṣatriyādyāḥ susaṃyatāḥ kṣatriyāntakaraṃ tadā kṣatriyā brāhmaṇāś caiva kṣatriyā yuddhadurmadāḥ kṣatriyā yuddhadurmadāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyatāṃ gatāḥ kṣatriyeṇa balīyasā kṣatriyeṇa vidhitsatā kṣatriyeṇa viśeṣataḥ kṣatriyeṇāparo apy aṃśo kṣatriye yajamāne tu kṣatriyo jayatāṃ varaḥ kṣatriyo dvādaśāhaṃ ca kṣatriyopamadeśāś ca kṣatriyo lokaviśrutaḥ kṣatriyo lokaviśrutaḥ kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā kṣatriyo vā mahābhāge kṣatriyo vijayaṃ raṇe kṣatriyo vaiśyaśūdrau vā kṣantavyaṃ bhavataivaitad kṣantum arhasi cāvyaya kṣapā yāmās tathā kṣaṇāḥ kṣapāsu kṣapitāhitaḥ kṣapitaṃ yādavaṃ balam kṣamante prabhaviṣṇavaḥ kṣamayā krodham ucchindyāt kṣamayā parayā yutaḥ kṣamayā pṛthivīsamaḥ kṣamasva karuṇānidhe kṣamasva mātaḥ śāntāsi kṣamānāthā bhavanti hi kṣamāmāyākarotkaraḥ kṣamāvatsv atha sādhuṣu kṣamāvantaḥ suhṛtpriyāḥ kṣamāvantau manīṣiṇau kṣamāvāṃś cānahaṃvādī kṣamāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ kṣameyaṃ na kathaṃcana kṣamyatām aparādhinām kṣamyatām ātmapāpena kṣamyatāṃ kṣamyatāṃ tvayā kṣayavṛddhivivarjitaḥ kṣayavṛddhyakṣayetarāḥ kṣayaṃ cakre ca dehinām kṣayaṃ jagmuḥ kramaśaḥ kālayogāt kṣayaṃ teṣāṃ tathā punaḥ kṣayaṃ dhanānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kṣayaṃ nītvā janārdanaḥ kṣayaṃ prāptā viṣṇubāṇais kṣayaṃ yānti muniśreṣṭhāḥ kṣayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca candrasya kṣayaṃ saṃvatsarāṇāṃ ca kṣayāpalāsinī caiva kṣayāya ditivaṃśasya kṣayāya yatate kartum kṣayiṣṇor nāsti nirvṛtiḥ kṣayī śuklī vaṇikpathaḥ kṣayodayābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ kṣaratīdaṃ yathā jagat kṣaratīdaṃ yathā jagat kṣarate vyaktasaṃjñakaḥ kṣaraḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu kṣarākṣaranidarśanam kṣarākṣara maheśvara kṣarākṣaraḥ priyo dhūrto kṣareyaṃ yena vatsalā kṣaro bhavaty eṣa yadā kṣātravidyāṃ sutaṃ śubhām kṣātraṃ karma dvijasyoktaṃ kṣātraṃ bhuvi pariśrutam kṣāntam eva mayety āha kṣāravajraśatotkaṭe kṣāravajraśatotkaṭe kṣārodena yathā dvīpo kṣālakas tvām ṛte acyuta kṣālayadhvaṃ ca vāriṇā kṣālitākhilakilbiṣaiḥ kṣiteś ca bhāraṃ bhagavān kṣites tebhyaḥ sa bhāro hi kṣipanti narakārṇave kṣiptaṃ vajram athendreṇa kṣiptaḥ samudre matsyasya kṣiptaḥ samudre matsyena kṣiptvā cakraṃ dvidhā cakre kṣiptvā cakraṃ sudarśanam kṣiptvā cordhvaṃ pragṛhya ca kṣiptvā puṣpajalāñjalim kṣipyatāṃ kṣepayantrakaiḥ kṣipyate tatra duṣṭātmā kṣipyate yamakiṃkaraiḥ kṣipyante tatra narake kṣipyante tatra vai narāḥ kṣipyamāṇe mahodadhau kṣipram āyānti pitaro kṣipraṃ budhyasva lakṣaṇam kṣipraṃ brūhi muniśreṣṭha kṣipraṃ bhīmaparākrama kṣipraṃ raupyaharo babhau kṣiprātaṭe mahāraṇye kṣīṇaprāye mahītale kṣīṇavṛttiḥ kṛśaḥ kasmād kṣīṇaśastrās tu jagṛhuḥ kṣīṇaḥ kṣayam upaiṣyati kṣīṇāyur upajāyate kṣīṇāyuṣaṃ samālokya kṣīṇāyuṣaṃ samālokya kṣīṇāyuḥ kena bhavati kṣīṇāṃ javena hṛdayām kṣīṇāḥ sutā āvayor eva bhadre kṣīṇe tapasi sattamaḥ kṣīṇe vaṃśe tu somakaḥ kṣīyamāṇān dvijān dṛṣṭvā kṣīrakāvāsam eva ca kṣīranadyas tathā cānyā kṣīrapradānasaṃbandhi kṣīram ojaskaraṃ caiva kṣīravatya imā gāvo kṣīraśravaṃ virūpākṣaṃ kṣīraṃ tadvac ca taṇḍulaḥ kṣīraṃ teṣāṃ tapo brahma kṣīraṃ teṣāṃ sudhā smṛtā kṣīraṃ pītaṃ tvayā śuni kṣīraṃ madhu ca tad divyaṃ kṣīraṃ māyāmayaṃ smṛtam kṣīraṃ ratnauṣadhīs tathā kṣīraṃ vatsaś ca pātraṃ ca kṣīraṃ sarvatra bhāvayet kṣīrāntardhānam eva ca kṣīrābdhiḥ sarvato viprāḥ kṣīrābdhes taṭam uttamam kṣīrārṇavasamīpataḥ kṣīrārṇavāśritamahāhisutalpagāya kṣīreṇa tadanantaram kṣīreṇa tarpaṇaṃ kṛtvā samantataḥ kṣīrodo hy udadhīnāṃ ca kṣutaṃ vā jṛmbhaṇaṃ tathā kṣute avalīḍhe vāte ca kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhaḥ pṛcchāmi kṣuttṛṅjṛmbhā tathaiva ca kṣuttṛṣṇākulitendriyāḥ kṣuttṛṣṇāparipīḍitāḥ kṣutpānānāṃ ca kṣudhārūpeṇa sarveṣāṃ kṣudhā saṃpīḍitān bhṛśam kṣudhāṃ ca paramāpadam kṣudhāṃ cāha dvijottamaḥ kṣudhāṃ yogena paṇḍitaḥ kṣudhitānnapradāyinaḥ kṣudhitānnapradāyinaḥ kṣudhitās tvarayā yayuḥ kṣudhe tubhyaṃ namo namaḥ kṣudhe tṛṣṇe daridriṇi kṣurakarmaṇi cānte ca kṣurakarmaṇi riktāṃ vai kṣuratūṇadhanurdharāḥ kṣuradhārānibhais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣuradhāreti narakaṃ kṣuvatas tu manor viprā kṣetrajña iti cocyate kṣetrajñaś ca pare yojyas kṣetrajñaś caiva kathyate kṣetrajñas tv adhitiṣṭhati kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīyān kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi cāṣṭamam kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrabhṛt kṣetrī kṣetrajñaḥ saṃpraṇīyate kṣetrasaṃdarśanaṃ caiva kṣetrasaṃdarśanaṃ tathā kṣetrasthair vā jalasthair vā kṣetrasthair vā jalasthair vā kṣetrasya ca punaḥ punaḥ kṣetrasya caiva māhātmyaṃ kṣetrasya puruṣottama kṣetrasya varṇanaṃ caiva kṣetrasraṣṭre namo astu te kṣetrahā kṣetrakṛd vaśī kṣetraṃ ca tad dvijottamāḥ kṣetraṃ ca durlabhaṃ loke kṣetraṃ ca puruṣottamam kṣetraṃ jānāti cāvyaktaṃ kṣetraṃ tat paramaṃ mahat kṣetraṃ tatra ketumān putraḥ kṣemaṃ kuru maheśvara kṣemaṃ mama sahānena kṣemaṃ subhikṣam ārogyaṃ kṣemī bhavati kīrtimān kṣemeṇa munipuṃgavāḥ kṣemeṇābhipatet tathā kṣemeṇoparamen mārgād kṣemo nāma mahāyaśāḥ kṣemyā khaḍgatomarasāyakaiḥ khaḍgapaṭṭiśamudgaraiḥ khaḍgamāṃsaṃ tathā haviḥ khaḍgamāṃsaṃ paraṃ haviḥ khaḍgamudgaradhāriṇe khaḍgaśaktiprahāraiś ca khaḍgaśaktiprahāraiś ca khaḍgaśūlanipātaiś ca khaḍgaṃ vāme ca gaṅgāyāṃ nārasiṃhaṃ tu gaṅgāyāṃ niyataḥ sthitaḥ gaṅgāyāṃ pratyagāt kṣayam gaṅgāyāṃ prāptavān putraṃ gaṅgāyāṃ munisattama gaṅgāyāṃ śāpavihvalā gaṅgāyāṃ sarvatīrtheṣu gaṅgāyāṃ sarvatīrtheṣu gaṅgāyāṃ gaṅgāyāḥ saṃgamo yas te gaṅgāyāḥ sevanāt pūrvaṃ gaṅgārdhena vinirgatā gaṅgāvatāraṃ vividhair upāyaiḥ gaṅgāvatāritā pūrvaṃ gaṅgāviṣṇvoḥ prasādataḥ gaṅgāśaktir mahādyute gaṅgāśāpena dehārdhaṃ gaṅgāsamīpe yo dadyāt gaṅgā sarasvatī sindhuś gaṅgāsāgarasaṃgame gaṅgāsāgarasaṃgame gaṅgāsāgarasaṃgame gaṅgā sā gautamī devī gaṅgā surāṇām api vandanīyā gaṅgāsravaṇam abhyagāt gaṅgāhradasaritsu ca gaṅgodbhedaṃ śivodbhedaṃ gaccha karmakarī bhava gaccha karmakarī bhava gaccha gaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ gaccha gaccheti tāṃ gaṅgā gaccha gaccheti sakrodham gaccha tatra mahābuddhe gacchata sahitāḥ sarva mamādeśāt gacchan gaṅgām apaśyata gacchantam anvagāt putram gacchantam upalabhya saḥ gacchantaṃ tu namasyātha gacchantaṃ tu śatakratum gacchantaṃ tvām anāgasam gacchantaṃ māṃ mahādevo gacchanti gatim uttamām gacchanti janalokaṃ te gacchanti paramāṃ gatim gacchanti bhuvanaṃ paścād gacchanti yoginaḥ paścād gacchanti vigatajvarāḥ gacchanti vimalaṃ śubham gacchanti sādhakavarāḥ gacchanti sādhakottamāḥ gaccha bhuṅkṣva yathāsukham gacchamānāṃs tu tān prekṣya gaccha vā nilayaṃ svakam gaccha vāyo yathāsukham gaccha śūkaravoddeśaṃ gacchaṃs tiṣṭhan svapañ jighrann gacchāmaḥ svam adhiṣṭhānam gacchāmi śapathāḥ kṛtāḥ gacchāmo dhanam ādātuṃ gacchāmy abuddhabhāvatvād gacchāvas tridaśasthānam gacchetāṃ paramāṃ gatim gacchet svargagatiṃ parām gacched akṣarasāmyatām gacchendraṃ brūhi vāyo tvam gacchen nirdhūtamatsaraḥ gacchen maitrīm aśīlena gaccheyam ativihvalā gaccheyaṃ gurum anyaṃ vai gaccheyaṃ gautamīṃ gaṅgām gaccheyaṃ cety acintayat gaccheyaṃ devasadanam gaccheyaṃ dharmapatnītvaṃ gaccheyaṃ pitaraṃ brahman gajadantavarāyudhau gajayuddhakṛtāyāsa- gajayuddhaviśāradāḥ gajavaktram uvāca sā gajavaktro abhyabhāṣata gajavaidyāś ca vaidyāś ca gajāśvarathadānena gajāśvarathayānāḍhyo gajāśvarathasaṃpannaiś gajāśvānāṃ ca bhūpatiḥ gajāṃś cānyāṃs tathā sattvān gajendrakarṇo gokarṇaḥ gajendracarmavasanās gajendrāṃś ca mahīpatiḥ gajair aśvair dhanaiś cānyai gaṇakiṃnaragandharva- gaṇapān pracakāra ha gaṇarāḍ upajāyate gaṇaṃ krodhavaṃśaṃ viprās gaṇaṃ caṇḍaṃ kārttikeyaṃ gaṇādhināthasya vinoda eṣaḥ gaṇādhipatyaṃ saptamyām gaṇānāṃ ca maheśvarāt gaṇānnaṃ śrāddhasūtakam gaṇikāgaṇakiṃkaraiḥ gaṇikā gaṇakiṃkaraiḥ gaṇikāyācanaṃ prabho gaṇikāsaṃgame snātvā gaṇike gaccha me kāryaṃ gaṇeśaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tathā gaṇeśaḥ prāha tān surān gaṇeśādigaṇair vṛtaḥ gaṇeśe ca gate tathā gaṇeśair vividhākārair gaṇeśvaratve abhiṣiṣeca putram gaṇair gaṇyo gaṇādhipaḥ gaṇaiś ca vividhais tathā gaṇḍakī ca mahānadī gaṇḍapiṇḍakalūtānāṃ gaṇḍamālāvicarcike gaṇḍūṣāya hy aputrāya gaṇḍo nāmābhavat putro gatakopo aham ity uktvā gatadharmo nirānando gatanetraḥ śucaṃ prāpto gatapāpaṃ karomy aham gatapāpāv asaṃśayam gatam etan na kurute gatavān asmi rākṣasīm gataś ca kaśyapo brahmann gataś ca dadṛśe tatra gatasya tasyaiva daśānanasya gataṃ dhanaṃ karau chinnāv gataṃ dhanaṃ gataṃ cakṣuś gataṃ sarvam asāratām gatā kadācit kalaśaṃ gṛhītvā gatāgatābhyāṃ yogena gatāny abdaśatāni te gatā bhītā diśo daśa gatāmarṣo asuraṃ prati gatāyām adya śarvaryāṃ gatāvartātiśobhitā gatāś ca mātaro yāvad gatāsūnāṃ ca sattvānāṃ gatās tasmin girau dvijāḥ gatās tu devatā jñātvā gatās te ripavo asmākaṃ gatāḥ prāṇā mahāvane gatāḥ prāṇās tato nṛpaḥ gatipradāya ca namo gatimanti ca sarvaśaḥ gatim iṣṭām avāpnuyāt gatim iṣṭāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ gatim iṣṭāṃ tathaiva ca gatir eṣā kṛtā yena gatir eṣā bhaved iti gatir gatimatām api gatiś ca parameśvara gatiś caiṣāṃ dadāti saḥ gatiṃ ko vetti tattvataḥ gatiṃ cāśubhakarmaṇām gatiṃ teṣāṃ mahātmanām gatiṃ duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ gatiṃ yāsyanti pārthivāḥ gatiṃ vācāṃ śubhāṃ jñātvā gatiṃ vijñāya cāśubhām gatiṃ vīra yathā kuru gatiṃ śrutvā suduḥkhitaḥ gate ca kāle hy ativiprayukte gate tasmin gurau rājā gate tasmin muniśreṣṭhāḥ gate tasmin sa bhagavān gate tasmin suraśreṣṭhe gate tīkṣṇāṃśumālini gate dvādaśavārṣike gate nirāśe api ca te nirāśāḥ gate anugamanaṃ cakrur gate api tvayi ko doṣas gate bhartari te ubhe gate varāhe pitaraḥ gate vāyau tadā daityā gate vede gate dharme gate śakre tu gopālāḥ gateṣu deveṣu munipravaryo gateṣu daityasaṃgheṣu gateṣu brahmavṛndeṣu gateṣu surasaṃgheṣu gate sarpe pariṣvajya gate saṃvatsare tataḥ gato divaṃ sūryasamair vimānaiḥ gato api danujādibhiḥ gato bārhadrathaṃ nṛpam gato asīmāṃ daśāṃ vaiśya gato asau paramāṃ gatim gato asmi dāsatāṃ nātha gato asmi dugdhārṇavam ātmageham gato asmi śaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇa gatya pratyaham eva saḥ gatvā gaṅgāṃ ca pāvanīm gatvā gaṅgāṃ tu gautamīm gatvā ca kokāmukham agratīrtham gatvā ca brūhi kaunteyam gatvācamya śucis tatra gatvā ca yoṣitaṃ śrāddhe gatvā caiva triviṣṭapam gatvā caiva rasātalam gatvā cocatur avyagrau gatvā jalāśayaṃ puṇyam gatvā jitvā mahāsurān gatvā tatra ca maṇḍape gatvā tatra japet tattvaṃ gatvā tatra mahīpālaḥ gatvā tatra śucir dhīmān gatvā tatra suraśreṣṭha gatvā tatrākṣayān bhogān gatvā tadā nṛpān ūcur gatvā tasmai nyavedayan gatvā tasya samīpataḥ gatvā tasya samīpataḥ gatvā tasya samīpaṃ tu gatvā tasyāntikaṃ tadā gatvā taṃ jagatām īśaṃ gatvā taṃ lavaṇodadhim gatvā tān nāśaye ripūn gatvā tu gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ gatvā tu gautamīṃ devīṃ gatvā devam uvāca ha gatvā drakṣyāmi bāndhavān gatvā natvābravīd vacaḥ gatvāntikaṃ varārohā gatvā pitaram añjasā gatvā putra yathārthavat gatvā bhogavatīṃ tadā gatvā munigaṇāḥ sarve gatvā mokṣapradaṃ śivam gatvā yamapurīṃ hariḥ gatvā yācasva pitaraṃ gatvā vārāṇasīṃ purīm gatvā vipro nyavedayat gatvā vaiṇyabhayāt tadā gatvā śivālayaṃ paścāt gatvāṣṭatīrthaṃ vidhivat gatvā sabalavāhanaḥ gatvā sa mithilāṃ prabhuḥ gatvā saṃvartam ūcatuḥ gatvā sā tatra ruciraṃ gatvā stuhi maheśvaram gatvā snātvā yatavrataḥ gadato me muniśreṣṭhāḥ gadaś cāstāṃ sutāv ubhau gadā garuḍa eva ca gadācakrātipātaiś ca gadācakrograpāṇinam gadādharaṃ koṭitīrtham gadādharaṃ tato natvā gadādharaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ gadādharo asau tvaritaḥ sametaḥ gadāparaśubhiḥ śaraiḥ gadāprakṣepakhaṇḍitam gadāmuśaladhāriṇam gadāmuśaladhāriṇam gadāśārṅgāsidhṛk prabhuḥ gadāśikṣāṃ tato divyāṃ gadāśūladharāyudhāḥ gadāhastāya te viṣṇo gadeyaṃ te visarjitā gantavyam avaśiṣyate gantavyam avilambitam gantavyaṃ kva punaś coktā gantavyaṃ cāturair naraiḥ gantavyaṃ cāturair naraiḥ gantavyaṃ jīvaghātakaiḥ gantavyaṃ jīvaghātakaiḥ niveśanam gandhapuṣpaṃ nivedayet gandhapuṣpādikaṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpādikaṃ dattvā gandhapuṣpānurāgibhiḥ gandhamādanakailāsau gandhamādanaparvate gandhamādanapādeṣu gandham ādāya mārutaḥ gandhamodayutāni vai gandhayogyāni cakṣate gandharvatvaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ gandharvayakṣanāgāṃś ca gandharvayakṣarakṣāṃsi gandharvayakṣāmaraseviteṣu gandharvayakṣoragakiṃnarāś ca gandharvarājasya sutā gandharvarājaḥ sa ca gandharvasiddhayakṣāṇāṃ gandharvasiddhayakṣāṇāṃ gandharvasiddhān puruṣān striyaś ca gandharvas tv atha vāruṇaḥ gandharvāṇām adhipatiṃ gandharvāṇāṃ citrarathaḥ gandharvāṇāṃ citraratho gandharvāṇāṃ naiva somo gandharvāṇāṃ purābhavat gandharvāṇāṃ maheśvaraḥ gandharvāṇāṃ sarasvatī gandharvāṇāṃ sudurlabham gandharvādhipatis tadā gandharvān atha saṃpūjya gandharvān amitaujasaḥ gandharvāpsarasaś divyaiḥ gandhenorvī triyojanam gandhaiḥ puṣpair upahārair gandhaiḥ puṣpair manoharaiḥ gandhaiḥ puṣpais tathā dīpair gandhaiḥ puṣpais tathā dhūpair gandho bhūmiguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ gabhastitīrthaṃ ca tathā gabhastinī bālagarbhā gabhastimān ajaḥ kālo gabhastihasto brahmā ca gabhastī saptamī tathā gamanaṃ te na vidyate gamanāj jāyate dvijāḥ gamanād bhaktisevanāt gamanāya mahābhāgo gamane te vrajaukasaḥ gamiṣyanti mahāpatham gamiṣyanti mahāpatham gamiṣyanti striyo anyataḥ gambhīram idam uktavān gambhīrāṃ cātigambhīrām gambhīro nṛpasattamaḥ gamyatām icchayānyataḥ gamyatāṃ gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ gamyatāṃ nandagokulam gamyatāṃ mā vilambyatām gamyatāṃ yatra vāñchitam gamyate prāha sā śubhā gamyaṃ tatra viśiṣyate gayasya tu gayā smṛtā gayaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vrajājinau gayaṃ gargaṃ tathaiva ca gayaḥ kollāsuro vṛtras gayā prabhāsaṃ śrītīrthaṃ gayāyām athavā piṇḍaṃ gayāśīrṣākṣayaṃ vaṭam gayāśrāddhaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ gaye cāmarakaṇṭake garado madhuhartā ca gariṣṭhaś ca variṣṭhaś ca garīyasām apy atigauravātman garuḍakṣatabāhuś ca garuḍakṣatavāhanam garuḍaś cāpi vaktreṇa garuḍasya gṛhe nāgo garuḍasya tato mūrdhni garuḍasya bhayād bhaktyā garuḍasyeti tad vākyaṃ garuḍaṃ gaganecaram garuḍaṃ ca dadarśoccair garuḍaṃ caiva pakṣiṇām garuḍaṃ purato nyaset garuḍaṃ vākyam abravīt garuḍaṃ vinayānvitam garuḍaṃ vipadaṃ gatam garuḍaṃ vihagādhipam garuḍaṃ vihagādhipam garuḍaḥ patatāṃ śreṣṭho garuḍaḥ pannagaripus garuḍaḥ pannagaṃ dṛṣṭvā garuḍaḥ samavāpsyati garuḍād abhayaṃ bhavet garuḍād aruṇānujāt garuḍānilaśoṣitāḥ garuḍena yato vāri garuḍena sureśāna garuḍe patageśvare garuḍo atīva duḥkhitaḥ garuḍo nāgasattamam garuḍo api ca yatrāste garuḍo api tayoḥ śrutvā garuḍo matsutān iti garuḍo vāruṇaṃ chattraṃ garutmatā tān avāpya garutmantaṃ samāruhya garutmādyās tathā prabho garutmān eṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ garutmāṃś ca garutmatā gareṇaiva sahācyutaḥ gareṇaiva sahācyutaḥ gargaś ca gokule tatra gargasya hi sutaṃ bālaṃ gargo jyotīṃṣi tattvataḥ gargo matimatāṃ śreṣṭho garjatpayodasthagitendubimbā gartadhānyadhanāḥ kecit gartarūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ gartasthāne śṛṇomy aham gartaṃ praviśya pānārtham gartaṃ praviṣṭe nṛpatau gartāyāṃ vīraṇastambe gardabhatvaṃ tu saṃprāpya gardabhaḥ pañca varṣāṇi gardabhākṛti bhīṣaṇam gardabhākṛtibhīṣaṇam garbhajanmajarājñāna- garbhajanmajarādyeṣu garbham ādāya saśraddhā garbham ādhāya kaśyapaḥ garbham āviśya vajradhṛk garbhavāsam arocata garbhavāse atha bālye vā garbhavāse atha bālye vā garbhavāse mahāduḥkham garbhavāso na vidyate garbhasaṃkarṣaṇāt so atha garbhasthā eva te anyonyam garbhasthānāṃ ca sarveṣām garbhasthāni śubhāni ca garbhasthāḥ kiṃ nu pauruṣam garbhasthitaṃ bālakaṃ prātitheyī garbhaṃ durdharam acyutam garbhaṃ vai śaradāṃ śatam garbhaṃ sā cotsasarja ha garbhaḥ saṃjāyate yathā garbhāṇḍāt prakaṭo abhavat garbhād alābūmadhyād vai garbhāntaragataḥ śakraḥ garbhāntaḥsthitim eva ca garbhāvadhānena kṛtaṃ cakāra garbhās te tilasaṃmitāḥ garbhe garbhe tato hariḥ garbheṇa puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ garbhe tvayā yaśodāyā garbhe api lokān vapuṣā bibharti garbhe vilīyate bhūyo garbhe sthitaṃ tu yad bhūtaṃ garbho dhāryaḥ kathaṃcana garbho neyas tvayodaram garbhoṣmasaṃbhavo jñeyo garvam āropitā yūyaṃ garvalīlāvalokinau garvitā rūpavīryeṇa garhitaṃ mahatām arthe garhitā ye ca ye adhamāḥ galatsvedajalāni vai galallālāvilānanaḥ gale bandhān mahātapāḥ gavayaś ca gavākṣaś ca gavām adres tathā mama gavām udvegakārakaḥ gavām etat kṛtaṃ vākyāt gavāṃ kṣīreṇa loḍayet gavāṃ ca pāvanaṃ yatra gavāṃ caiva parikṣayaḥ gavāṃ bhavanam eva ca gavāṃ vākyapracoditaḥ gavāṃ vikrayakāriṇaḥ gavāṃ vṛddhim abhīpsatā gavāṃ sahasraṃ dhānyānāṃ gavāṃ sūryo aparo guruḥ gavi ratne ca pārakye gavedhukapinaddhakāḥ gavyasya haviṣaḥ kumbhaiḥ gavyaṃ payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ gavyaṃ māṃsaṃ pitṛtṛptiṃ gahanaṃ hy etad uttaram gahanā duṣkaraṃ tapaḥ gahanāṃ karmaṇāṃ jīva- gahanāṃ karmaṇo gatim gāṅgam ambhaḥ samāviśat gāṅgam etad udīritam uttamam gāṅgaṃ devavrataṃ nāma gāṅgaṃ vāry atipuṇyadam gāṅgeyo agnibhavaś ceti gāḍham āliṅgya vividhair gāḍhaṃ parikaraṃ tataḥ gāṇḍīvam ajaraṃ yudhi gāṇḍīvasya tathā mama gāṇḍīvaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gātrayogyam athobhayoḥ gātravatpramukhān sutān gātrāṇi tava śobhantu gātrāṇy ambarapāṇibhiḥ gātrebhyas tasya jajñire gātreṣu paridagdhaṃ vai gāthā gāyanta eva te gāthābhir upagāyati gāthām apy atra gāyanti gāthāṃ prati tam āhukam gāthāḥ provāca muktidāḥ gādhiputraṃ mahādyutim gādhiputro akhilaṃ kṛtam gādhis tasyām ajāyata gādhiḥ kuśikanandanaḥ gādhiḥ sadāras tu tadā gādheḥ kanyā mahābhāgā gānatrayaviśāradāḥ gāndinīṃ nāma gāṃ sā ca gāndinīṃ nāma tasyāś ca gāndīputro mahāyaśāḥ gāndharvakuśalā ravim gāndharvaṃ brahmaṇo antike gāndharvaṃ lokam uttamam gāndharvais taṃ mahāpāśair gāndharvo vāruṇas tathā gāndhāradeśajāś caiva gāndhāraviṣayo mahān gāndhāraṣaḍjanaiṣāda- gāndhārā yavanāś caiva gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca gāndhārī janayām āsa gāndhārī janayām āsa gāndhāro nāma pārthivaḥ gām argham udakaṃ caiva gām ālabhyārkam īkṣya vā gāminau pavanāhārau gām ekāṃ yaḥ prayacchati gāmbhīryaṃ dhairyam eva ca gāyatā viṣṇugītikām gāyati daivataviprasamakṣam gāyatrī caiva sāvitrī gāyatrī chandasāṃ yathā gāyatrīsthānam eva ca gāyatrīṃ ca mahātmanaḥ gāyatrīṃ pāvanīṃ devīṃ gāyatrīṃ pāvanīṃ devīṃ gāyatrīṃ vedamātaram gāyatryabhyasanaṃ tathā gāyatryabhyāsamātreṇa gāyatry oṃkāra eva ca gāyadbhiś caiva nṛtyadbhir gāyanā nartakāś caiva gāyanair varṇakair api gāyanaiḥ stutipāṭhakaiḥ gāyantaḥ sāmagā iva gāyanti gandharvagaṇāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ gāyanti ca hasanti ca gāyanti tvāṃ gāyatriṇo gāyanti tvāṃ suraśreṣṭhāḥ gāyanti devagandharvā gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni gāyanti harṣitāḥ sarvā gāyantīti pariśrutam gāyantī nṛtyatī punaḥ gāyan viṣṇuparāyaṇaḥ gāyan hi bāhyabhūmiṣṭhaḥ gāyamānau samīyatuḥ gā yair nītāś ca rākṣasaiḥ gā rakṣati sma devānāṃ gāruḍaṃ nāma yat tīrthaṃ gāruḍaṃ sarvakāmadam gārgyaṃ goṣṭhe dvijo śyālaḥ gārhapatye dakṣiṇāgnau gārhapatyena vidhinā gārhapatyo asya dakṣiṇe gārhasthyam āvaset prājño gārhasthyaṃ tena vai param gārhasthyaṃ puṇyadaṃ smṛtam gārhasthyena ca yat phalam gālavasya tu yad vacaḥ gālavasya vacaḥ śrutvā gālavaṃ ca namasyātha gālavaṃ ceti viśrutam gālavaṃ muniśārdūlaṃ gālavaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca gālavaḥ prāha taṃ dvijam gālavaḥ prāha mā śucaḥ gālavāśramam abhyagāt gālavo nityam eva ca gālavo yatra bhagavāṃs gāvaś ca bhavatā trātā gāvas tu tena patatā gāvaḥ kṛṣṇasya tatkṣaṇāt gāvaḥ śaṃbhum athābruvan gāvaḥ śailaṃ tataś cakrur gāvaḥ śailāś ca devatāḥ gāvo goṣṭha ivāsate gāvo devāḥ parvatā yakṣarakṣāḥ gāvo devair āyudhārthaṃ kṣaṇena gāvo yā rākṣasair nītās gāvo labdhā yatra devair gāvo varjyā viśeṣataḥ gāvo vavṛdhire tataḥ gāvo vivatsāś ca kṛtā gāvo asmaddaivataṃ tāta gāvo hiraṇyaṃ dhānyāni gāvo hriyantām eṣāṃ ca gāś ca gopavapurdharam gāś caiva mahiṣīś caiva gās tu vai janayām āsa gāṃ ca pāpaharety uktvā gāṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtāṃ vipras gāḥ pālayantau ca punaḥ gāḥ sadā pradadau pitā gāḥ sundarāḥ savatsāś ca girā madhurayā haran girigoyajñaśīlāś ca giriṇā pādapena vā giriduhitṛvivāhe prāvṛḍ āvirbabhūva giridhāraṇakarmaṇā giripātasya nirbhayaiḥ giripṛṣṭhe ruroda ha girimūrdhani govindaḥ girimūrdhny abhidhīyate giriyajñas tv ayaṃ tasmād giriyajñaṃ vrajaukasaḥ giriyajñaḥ pravartyatām girirājagṛhe prabho girirājasamāśritā girirājasya bho dvijāḥ girirājasya bho dvijāḥ girirājasya vistṛte girir brahmagireḥ pārśve girir vajrahato yathā girivṛkṣapriyāya ca giriśṛṅge tathā caitye giriśṛṅge ambudheḥ pāre giriṃ gatvā tato vatsa giriṃ na tatyāja tadā mahātmā giriṃ nayāmy enam athādhi bhūmeḥ girīṇāṃ gahvare yad vā girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca girīṇāṃ sarvasaṃghātaiḥ girīśaṃ śūlapāṇinam girīśo girijāpriyaḥ girer mūrdhni jaṭāṃ sthāpya gireḥ pādād ivodakam gireḥ śṛṅgam aśīryata girau vavṛdhire phullāḥ gītanṛtyais tathā vādyair gītanṛtyaiḥ samākīrṇaṃ gītanṛtyaiḥ samākīrṇaṃ gītamaṅgalanāditaiḥ gītamaṅgalanāditaiḥ gītamādhuryasaṃyuktāḥ gītavādanakapriyaḥ gītavāditrakāriṇe gītavāditranisvanā gītavāditranṛtyāṅgo gītavādyakathālāpai gītavādyaviśāradāḥ gītavādyaviśāradaiḥ gītavādye ca kuśalāḥ gītavādyair manoharaiḥ gītavādyair manoharaiḥ gītavādyaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ gītasaubhāgyamaṅgalāḥ gītastutiviśāradān gītaṃ nṛtyaṃ ca hāsyaṃ ca gītānugamanaṃ kṛtam gītā purāṇe prakṛtiḥ parā yā gītāḥ kila yayātinā gītikā kautukāśrayā gītikāphalabṛṃhitaḥ gītikāphalam āmantrya gītikābhir vicitrābhir gītikāyāḥ phalaṃ viṣṇor gītikā viṣṇunāmāṅkāḥ gītikāṃ cāpi kārayet gītair vādyair manoharaiḥ gītair vādyair manoharaiḥ gītair vādyair manoharaiḥ gītair vādyaiḥ patākābhiḥ gītair vādyaiḥ patākābhiḥ gītaiś caivāṅgasaṃgamaiḥ gītaiḥ sumadhurasvaraiḥ gīyate gautamo dvijaḥ gīyate brahmavādibhiḥ gīyante brahmavādibhiḥ gīyamānaś ca madhuraṃ gīyamānā gatā svarge gīyamānā divaṃ sadyo gīyamāno atha gopībhiś gīr buddhir āsīr ajarāmare tvam gīṣpater bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ guggulaṃ ca muniśreṣṭhā gugguluṃ candanaṃ caiva guggulaiś candanair vṛkṣais guṭikāñjanapātāla- guṭikāṃ ca manoharām guḍakulyā manoramāḥ guḍapānakam arcitam guḍavikrayikāś caiva guḍaśarkaramatsyaṇḍī guḍasarpiḥsamanvitam guḍivā nāma deveśa guḍivā nāma yātrā me guḍivāmaṇḍapaṃ yāntaṃ guḍivāyāṃ tathotthāne guḍivāyāṃ dvijottamāḥ guṇakarmavibhedataḥ guṇajyeṣṭhā ca bhāminī guṇajyeṣṭhāya viprāya guṇatyāgin namo astu te guṇadāyi tu sarveṣāṃ guṇadoṣair na lipyate guṇapāśair niveśitam guṇabuddhyā tu bhagavān guṇabhedān prapaśyati guṇabhoktṛ guṇārāma guṇayuktām acetanām guṇarūpadayānvitāḥ guṇarūpavayoyutā guṇavatī guṇeṣv atha guṇavattvād yathaitāni guṇavatputrasaṃprāptir guṇavanti mahāprājña guṇavān matimāñ śūraḥ guṇavān matimāñ śūro guṇavān rūpasaṃpanno guṇaśabdo na cetanāḥ guṇaśīlānvitāya ca guṇasaṅgena sajjataḥ guṇasanmaṇibhūṣitam guṇasāmyam anudriktam guṇahīnāḥ prajās tathā guṇā ete svayonijāḥ guṇā guṇavataḥ santi guṇā guṇeṣu jāyante guṇā guṇeṣu līyante guṇā guṇeṣu satataṃ guṇācāryāḥ kulastriyaḥ guṇān ācarate hy eṣa guṇānām anubhāvena guṇānām ekadeśo ayaṃ guṇānāṃ dhāryatāṃ tattvaṃ guṇānāṃ mahadādīnām guṇānāṃ vṛttidāya ca guṇān evānuvartate guṇān guṇaśatair jñātvā guṇān devāvṛdhasyāpi guṇān buddheś ca sattamāḥ guṇān vāyoś ca sarvajñāḥ guṇān vikriyataḥ sarvān guṇān veda sa sarvadā guṇābhivyāptibhedena guṇā ye cāpi vaidikāḥ guṇālaya guṇāvāsa guṇālaya namas te astu guṇāś ca yasmin bahavo guṇāśraya guṇāvaha guṇās tathopadharmāś ca guṇās trayaś ca puruṣās guṇās tv ete trayo ambhasām guṇā hy api tu catvāraḥ guṇāṃś ca tamasaḥ sarvān guṇāṃś ca manasaś cāpi guṇāḥ śudhyanti karmaṇā guṇebhyaḥ paramā matāḥ guṇebhyo guṇakartṛbhyo guṇeṣu guṇa ucyate guṇeṣu parivartatām guṇeṣu parivartanāt guṇeṣv api kadācana guṇeṣv iha guṇaiḥ saha guṇaiś caivādhikāḥ ślāghyāḥ guṇais tu nīyate buddhir guṇaiḥ karmābhinirvṛttir guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtam guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtāḥ guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtāḥ guṇaiḥ saha guṇakṣayāt guravaś ca nṛṇāṃ kalau guravaḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti guravaḥ santi bahavas guravo hi dvijottamāḥ gurukutsāratiś ca yaḥ gurukramavivarjitaḥ guruṇā patatopari gurutalpī gurudveṣī gurudāraprasaktānāṃ gurudārābhigāminaḥ gurudevadvijasvāmi- gurudevadvijātīnāṃ gurudevapitṝn viprān gurudogdhrīvadhena ca gurupūjāṃ karomīti gurubhaktaḥ satyasaṃdho gurubhaktyā ca satyena gurubhis tyajyate bhuvi gurubhis tyajyate bhuvi gurubhyo gauraveṇa hi gurum abhyarcayan sadā gurum ārādhya bhaktitaḥ gurumithyāpacārataḥ gurur agnir dvijātīnāṃ gurur gaṅgām abhāṣata gurur gurumatāṃ deva gurur hanyād akāraṇam guruvṛttiparau hi tau guruvṛddhopatāpinaḥ guruśuśrūṣaṇe yuktā guruśuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ guruś ca pitṛvac ca syāt guruṣv alpeṣu vā punaḥ gurusevāphalaṃ tathā gurusevāvivarjitāḥ gurusevodyateṣu ca gurus tvaṃ bhavitā mahyaṃ gurusvāmisakhidruhaḥ guruṃ jñānapradāyakam guruṃ deśaṃ vadiṣyati guruṃ deśādikaṃ ca yat guruṃ natvā tapodhanāḥ guruṃ namaskartum agād viśākhaḥ guruṃ nābhivadanti ye guruṃ praṇamya vakṣyāmi guruṃ bṛhaspatiṃ dṛṣṭvā guruṃ saṃsevya yatnena guruḥ śākalya ity āha guruḥ sarvaprayatnataḥ gurūṇām agrato vaktuṃ gurūṇām apy asau guruḥ gurūṇām āsanaṃ deyam gurūṇāṃ tvaṃ gurur mama gurūṇāṃ nedam ucitaṃ gurūṇāṃ śapathaṃ kartā gurūditena mārgeṇa guro tava manaḥpriyām guro tubhyaṃ namo astu te guror apy abhivādanam guror asya prasādena guror gāṃ dvijasattamāḥ guror gurutamāṃ sindhur guror gehe vasan viprā guror vākyaṃ niśamya ca guroḥ pativratānāṃ ca guroḥ saṃdeśakāriṇaḥ gurau pitari me devāḥ gurvapadhyānataḥ so api gurviṇī bhaktitas tv iha gurviṇīṃ tām ayonijām gulmārśaḥśvayathuśvāsa- guhāmukhād viniṣkrānto guhām ṛkṣasya mādhavaḥ guhāyāṃ muniśārdūla guhāyāṃ sa ṛtadhvajaḥ guhāsaṃsthena cotsiktaḥ guhyakānāṃ tathaiva ca guhyakāpsarasāṃ tathā guhyakāpsarasaiḥ sādhyair guhyakaiḥ parivāritaḥ guhyamantrais tadā svayam guhyam avyaktam avyayam guhyaṃ viṣṇupadaṃ tathā guhyaṃ sa jaṭharaṃ viṣṇur guhyaṃ sudurlabhaṃ puṇyaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ vakṣye guhyād guhyātmanā tvayā guhyopaniṣadāsanaḥ gūḍham aprajñaninditam gūḍhavrataniṣevitaḥ gūḍhavrataś ca gūḍhaś ca gūḍhasatyena sākṣiṇaḥ gūḍhātmā na prakāśate gṛñjanaṃ cukrikāṃ cukraṃ gṛṇan brahma sanātanam gṛdhrabhojāndhakas tathā gṛdhrair āmiṣagṛdhnubhiḥ gṛdhraiḥ saṃbhakṣyamāṇānāṃ gṛhakṛtyaṃ tataś cakre gṛhakṣetradhanādikaiḥ gṛhakṣetram athāpi vā gṛhakṣetram athāpi vā gṛhagopurasaṃbādhaṃ gṛhagopurasaṃbādhā gṛhadharmaparāyaṇaḥ gṛhaprākāratoraṇām gṛhamadhyagatais tathā gṛhamadhyagatais tathā gṛham āgāt taponidhiḥ gṛham āyāti mūrtimān gṛham etya yatātmavān gṛhasthakāryam akhilaṃ gṛhasthavratam ātiṣṭhan gṛhasthasādhave nityaṃ gṛhasthasya bhaviṣyati gṛhasthaḥ paramaṃ vidhim gṛhasthā janakādyāś ca gṛhasthādyās tathaiva hi gṛhasthāś ca na hoṣyanti gṛhasthāḥ snātakāś caiva gṛhasthena sadā kāryam gṛhasthair brahmacāribhiḥ gṛhastho brahmacārī ca gṛhastho bhoktum arhati gṛhaṃ gaccheti maudgalyo gṛhaṃ gatāsmi deveśa gṛhaṃ gṛhītvā gacchasva gṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvāpy acintayam gṛhaṃ paitāmahaṃ varam gṛhaṃ ratnaṃ dhanaṃ tathā gṛhaṃ śarīram utsṛjya gṛhāgatasya vimukhāḥ gṛhāgatānāṃ dadyāc ca gṛhāṇa kanyāṃ vidhivad gṛhāṇa kuṇḍale ceme gṛhāṇa tapa eva tvaṃ gṛhāṇa puruṣottama gṛhāṇa pratimāṃ vīra gṛhāṇa madhusūdana gṛhāṇa yauvanaṃ putra gṛhāṇa varakārmukam gṛhāṇa vidyāṃ vidhivat samagrāṃ gṛhāṇa vidyāṃ strīyogyāṃ gṛhāṇācamanīyaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇi śubhrāṇy aticitritāni gṛhāṇedaṃ nayasva tat gṛhāṇemaṃ kamaṇḍalum gṛhāṇemaṃ kamaṇḍalum gṛhāṇemaṃ kamaṇḍalum gṛhāṇemaṃ kamaṇḍalum gṛhāṇemāṃ jarāṃ mama gṛhāṇemāṃ jarāṃ mama gṛhāt pratinivartate gṛhād ucchiṣṭaviṇmūtraṃ gṛhād yathānyato yāti gṛhāntadeśe saṃdhyāsu gṛhāntā dravyasaṃghātā gṛhān naḥ pitaro datta gṛhāvasathadātāro gṛhītakalaśas tvaran gṛhītagrāhyavedaś ca gṛhītacihna evāham gṛhītam idam avyaya gṛhītaś cāpi bhakṣitum gṛhītasya viṣāṇayoḥ gṛhītā tyajyate katham gṛhītā dasyubhir yac ca gṛhītāyāṃ śilāyāṃ tu gṛhītā lubdhakenātha gṛhītāstrau tatas tau tu gṛhīto ayaṃ mayā śakra gṛhītvāgatya taṃ śivam gṛhītvājagavaṃ dhanuḥ gṛhītvā tāṃ taṭenaiva gṛhītvā te tadā viprāḥ gṛhītvāditikuṇḍale gṛhītvā devatāgaṇāḥ gṛhītvā nṛpatīn imān gṛhītvā pādapottamam gṛhītvāpūrayad dhanuḥ gṛhītvā prāṇasahitaṃ gṛhītvā bhājanaṃ jagmur gṛhītvā bhrāmaṇenaiva gṛhītvā madhusūdanaḥ gṛhītvā yātu vajraś ca gṛhītvārghāya kalpitam gṛhītvā vajram eva ca gṛhītvā vāridarbhāṃś ca gṛhītvā vāsavaṃ haste gṛhītvā vidhivat sarvaṃ gṛhītvā śilpimukhyāṃś ca gṛhītvā sa dhanur divyaṃ gṛhītvā saśaraṃ cāpam gṛhītvā sādhakeśvaram gṛhītvā sādhakeśvaraḥ gṛhītvā sīriṇo halam gṛhītvā stabakaṃ sā tu gṛhītvaikaṃ ca kuṇḍalam gṛhītvainaṃ gamiṣyasi gṛhītvainaṃ ca ko vrajet gṛhe guptāv adhārayat gṛhe nityasya karmaṇaḥ gṛhe ratnasuśobhite gṛhe vai gṛhamedhinā gṛheṣu teṣām utpanno gṛheṣu puṇyakarmaṇām gṛheṣṭyā pātake yac ca gṛhaiḥ kāñcanamaṇḍitaiḥ gṛhṇāti tatsvabhāvaś ca gṛhṇāti puruṣo viprās gṛhṇātu tv aparāṃ bhavān gṛhṇātv ekā nitambinī gṛhṇīmo dakṣiṇāṃ bhuvam gṛhyatām iti sādaram gṛhyantāṃ mā vicāryatām gṛhyante cāntarātmanā gṛhyamāṇā mayā bālā gṛhyamāṇo ajarāmaraḥ geyagītir anukramām gehaṃ vedavid agnimān gehe yakṣasya dhīmataḥ gokule vasudevasya gokoṭiphalam aśnute gokṣīraṃ ca nivedayet gogopīgopasaṃkulam gograhe saṃkule hatāḥ gograhe saṃkule hatāḥ goghātī narake naraḥ goghnaś ca munisattamāḥ goghrāte makṣikānvite gocaratvaṃ gato arjuna gocarebhyo nivṛttāni gocare vartate nityaṃ gojātaṃ sarvam āharat gojāvimahiṣānanāḥ gotamaḥ kaśyapo manuḥ gotamena śivaṃ pūjya gotīrthaṃ ceti viśrutam gotīrthaṃ tad udāhṛtam gotīrthaṃ tad udāhṛtam gotīrthe brahmatīrthe vā gotrakais tu kriyāḥ sarvāḥ gotrotsādo bhavet tasya godānād yābhidhīyate godānāni pavitrāṇi godābhīmarathīmukhāḥ godām apy antikasthitām godāvari namo astu te godāvari namo astu te godāvari namo astu te godāvarī tāvad aśeṣapāpa godāvarīdakṣiṇatīrabhāge godāvarībhīmarathī- godāvarī bhīmarathī godāvarī bhīmarathī godāvarī bhīmarathī godāvarīvāridhisaṃgame yaḥ godāvarīṃ tato gatvā godāvarīṃ stauti ca saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ godāvaryā munīśvaraiḥ godāvaryā yatavrataḥ godāvaryās tayoś caiva godāvaryāṃ tataḥ snātvā godāvaryāṃ tapaḥ kuryād godāvaryāṃ viśeṣataḥ godāvaryāḥ prasādena godāvaryāḥ prasādena godāvaryāḥ śubhe tīre godvīpaṃ gāṅgamadhyataḥ godhanaḥ pāṇḍarācalaḥ godhanāny akhilāny aham godhāśallakivaktrāś ca godhāhaṃsaṃ ca varjayet godhūmān atasīs tathā godhūmānnayavānnādyān godhūmair masurādibhiḥ godhūmaiś caṇakais tathā gonetā gopracāraś ca gopagopījanair hṛṣṭaiḥ gopagopījanais tathā gopagopījano dvijāḥ gopagopīṣu yāsyati gopate śrīpate viṣṇo gopatvam akarot prabhuḥ gopatvasya ca kāraṇam gopaputraiḥ samaṃ vatsāṃś gopayitvā tanuṃ tadā gopavaryāhṛtaṃ dvijāḥ gopavṛddhāś ca yāsyanti gopavṛddhās tataḥ sarve gopaveṇukṛtātodya- gopaveṣatirohitaḥ gopastrīveṣadhāriṇī gopā eva hi bāndhavāḥ gopā gopastriyaś caiva gopā daitye janārdanam gopānāṃ nāśakāriṇā gopān utsavalālasān gopā mūrdhani govindaṃ gopāyanaṃ yaḥ kurute gopāyantaṃ vimṛśya sā gopālacchadmarūpiṇā gopālatvaṃ jugupsitam gopāladārakau prāptau gopā labdhvā tato varān gopālā daityavājinaḥ gopālā nāpitāś caiva gopālāḥ saha pupluvuḥ gopālī cāpsarās tasya gopālair aparaiś cānye gopālair asmi nirjitaḥ gopālaiś ca punar vrajam gopālo yādavaṃ vaṃśaṃ gopā vismitacetasaḥ gopāv etau samājaughān gopā vrajam upāgatya gopās tatra halāyudham gopāṃś cāha jagannāthaḥ gopāḥ keneti jagaduḥ gopāḥ samānayanty āśu gopikāṃ rāsamaṇḍalam gopitaṃ me varānane gopīkapolasaṃśleṣam gopī gītastutivyāja- gopījananirīkṣitaḥ gopījano na caivābhūd gopīnām ativihvalaḥ gopīparivṛto rātriṃ gopībhiḥ saha sādaram gopī madhuvighātinaḥ gopucchabhrāmaṇādyaiś ca gopurīṣam upādāya gopair anyaiḥ parājitāḥ gopair anyaiḥ sahāyavān gopair daitye nipātite gopaiś ca pūrvavad rāmaḥ gopaiḥ samānaiḥ sahitau gopaiḥ saha gireḥ śiraḥ goptā gogarga eva ca goptre dhātre namo namaḥ gopyaś ca tvaritā jagmur gopyaś ca premamuditāḥ gopyaś ca bhayasaṃvignā gopyaś ca vṛndaśaḥ kṛṣṇa- gopyaś ca sīdataḥ kasmāt gopyaś cāsārapīḍitāḥ gopyas trailokyagoptāraṃ gopyas tv anyā rudatyaś ca gopyaḥ papracchur aparā gopyo vyagrāḥ samaṃ cerū gobrāhmaṇahitaṃ puṇyaṃ gobrāhmaṇahitāya ca gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya gobrāhmaṇahite ratam gobhānus tasya cātmajaḥ gobhānos tu suto rājā gobhiś ca noditaḥ kṛṣṇa gomatī dhūtapāpā ca gomatyāṃ saṃnyaveśayat gomante cārbude tathā gomayaṃ rūpaśītikam gomūtrabhojanaś caiva gomedaś caiva candraś ca gomedhaphalam āpnuyāt goyajñaś ca pravartyatām gorakṣaṃ tu tatas tīrthaṃ gorūpadhāriṇī gosahasraṃ tu yo dadyād gostrīdvijānāṃ parirakṣaṇārthaṃ gohartṝṃś caiva rākṣasān gautamaś cājaraś caiva gautamas tv āgatān munīn gautamasthāpitaṃ liṅgaṃ gautamasya kathāṃ puṇyāṃ gautamasya cirāyuṣaḥ gaur bhūtvā prādravan mahī granthadhāraṇatatparaḥ granthasyārthaṃ na vetti yaḥ granthasyārthaṃ sa pṛṣṭas tu granthaṃ vakṣyati nirṇayāt granthārthaṃ sthūlabuddhimān granthiparṇī ca sundarī grasate taṃ cakrapāṇir iti khyātaḥ cakrapāṇiḥ śūladharaḥ cakrapūrṇakaraṃ divyaṃ cakraprabhaṃ mataṅgaṃ ca cakram āpa yato hariḥ cakram āpa yato hariḥ cakram utsṛṣṭam akṣeṣu cakram etat samutsṛṣṭaṃ
