tasyāsīc tamālair devadārubhiḥ tam āviśat tadā viṣṇus tam āśramaṃ taṃ ca muniṃ tam āśritya nagaśreṣṭhaṃ tam āśritya nagaśreṣṭhaṃ tam āśrityopaviṣṭo abhūt tam āśvāsya punaḥ saiva tam āśvāsyātha evaṃvādinaṃ devaṃ tam evaṃvādinaṃ sindhum tam evārthasvarūpeṇa tam evārthasvarūpeṇa tam evārthaṃ śaśaṃsire tamo nāśaṃ yathābhyeti tamondhaṃ vātavarjitam tamobhibhūte loke ca tamobhūtam idaṃ sarvaṃ tamobhūte nirāśraye tamobhūteṣu lokeṣu tamo abhyeti mahattaram tamo mahasi saṃsthitam tamomohaś ca naśyati tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca tamorūpadharaḥ śivaḥ tayā ca ramatas tasya tayā ca saṃgamaḥ puṇyo tayā cākramyate pāpaḥ tayā jaghāna taṃ daityaṃ tayā tu preryamāṇo asau tayā tu saṃgatā devyā tayā dattakareṇa ca tayā dīvyāmahe tvayā tayā devyā mahātapāḥ tayā devyā vṛtas tadā tayā nadyā prasāditaḥ tayā parasparaṃ jaghnuḥ tayā mātrā vinā tathā tayā yuktaṃ śriyā yuktaṃ tayā rājño mahāmate tayā liṅgati duḥkhārtā tayā vṛttyā tu vasatāṃ tayā sa reme bahulā manojñayā tayā sahāvasad rājā tayā sā yogagāminī tayā sārdham aharniśam tayā hīnaṃ na kiṃcana tayā hīnaṃ hi dṛśyate tayā hy asādhyaṃ kim iha trilokyām tayaivam uktaḥ sa munis tayor jātyantare gataḥ tayor dattvāmitaṃ varam tayor darśanamātraṃ ca tayor dātṛgrahītroś ca tayor bhartṛhaṇaṃ harim tayor madhyagataṃ baddhaṃ tayor madhyagato meruḥ tayor madhye tv ilāvṛtam tayor madhye mahāgiriḥ tayor madhye mahādevo tayor yuddham abhūn mahat tayor yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam tayor vākyam anādṛtya tayor vākyam upaśrutya tayor viharator evaṃ tayor vīryeṇa gaṅgāyām tayor vai devadaityayoḥ tayoś ca prītaye prāyād tayoś ca yuddham abhavad tayoś ca vairam abhavad tayoś ca sakhyam abhavad tayoś ca saṃgamaḥ puṇyo tayoś ca saṃgamo yaḥ syāt tayoś ca sārasarvasvam tayoś chidrāntaraprepsur tayos tattvam idaṃ śṛṇu tayos tu śocatoḥ paścāt tayoḥ karma mahāmatiḥ tayoḥ karmātimānuṣam tayoḥ parasparaṃ jñānaṃ tayoḥ putrasahasrāṇi tayoḥ putrau mahāprājñau tayoḥ puṣpāṇi kāmataḥ tayoḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā tayoḥ śakalayor madhya tayoḥ śāntiṃ kuru prabho tayoḥ śuśrūṣakaḥ kaḥ syād tayoḥ śrutvā vaco viprāḥ tayoḥ sakāśaṃ yāsyāmi tayoḥ samāgamaś cāsīd tayoḥ sāraṃ samāharat tayoḥ saiva pṛthagbhāve tayoḥ stavānte suprītaḥ taraṅgaiḥ samabhiplutam taraṇas tāraṇaś caiva taranti yatayaḥ siddhā taranty avidyāṃ vitatāṃ tarayet pracyutāṃ pṛthvīṃ taravaś ca sarīsṛpāḥ tarasā bhītavat tadā taraṃgāṅkitakeśāya tarughātāṅkitānanaḥ taruṇas tava rūpeṇa taruṇas tava rūpeṇa taruṇādityavarṇena taruṇādityavarṇena taruṇādityasaṃkāśair taruṇādityasaṃnibham taruṇā vṛddhaśīlinaḥ taruṇībhir varastrībhiḥ taruṇī lokasundarī taruskandhe samāropya tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayor antaḥ tarjanyādiṣu vinyaset tarjayanta ivānyonyaṃ tarpaṇaṃ devatānāṃ ca tarpaṇe tūbhayaṃ kuryād tarpayanty arcayanti na tarpayāmaś ca devatāḥ tarpayitvā jagattrayam tarpayitvātithīn gurūn tarpayitvā pitṝn dvijān tarpayitvā surān ādau tarpayed daivatāny ṛṣīn tarpitās tena pitaras talaśabdaṃ ca keśavaḥ talātalaṃ rasātalaṃ tale tiṣṭhanty arogiṇaḥ tal lakṣmīvacanaṃ śrutvā talliṅgair bhāskaraṃ tataḥ tallipsur asuras tatra tallokavāsibhiḥ sārdhaṃ tava kartum alaṃ yama tava karmakarā cāhaṃ tava kāntam ariṃdama tava kāntaṃ divaspate tava kiṃ vartate citte tava kīrtiś ca śāśvatī tava krodhān mahādeva tava cāpi viśeṣataḥ tava cāpi śubhānane tava cittavirodhakṛt tava tejovarodhane tava duṣṭena karmaṇā tava dehasthitena ca tava dharmajña sarvaṃ hi tava dharmo vidhīyate tava nāmāṅkitaṃ tasmāt tava nārada kīrtitaḥ tava nārāyaṇo avyayaḥ tava niryātito bala tava pitrā tadādṛtam tava puṇyavivardhinī tava putra prasādataḥ tava putrasya yogyā sā tava putraṃ pradāsyati tava putrās tu kim iti tava putro guṇajyeṣṭhas tava putro atiduṣkṛtam tava putro bhaved iti tava putro bhaved dhruvam tava putro aham ity api tava pūjārthasaṃbhūtās tava prasādāc caraṇo tava prasādāc caraṇo tava prasādāc cārvaṅgi tava prasādāt sā śaktir tava priyāṃ jagannātha tava prītyā pravakṣyāmi tava bhartā ca putrāś ca tava bhartā priyas tathā tava bhartā varānane tava bhartā sarpa iti tava bhartur ahaṃ dhāma tava bhāryāṃ parārditām tava mātā pativratā tava mātrākṣayaṃ kṛtam tava yajñe hy ayonijāḥ tava yatnena nārada tava yāty anivāritaḥ tava yuktaṃ bhaviṣyati tava rājan bhaviṣyati tava rūpaṃ dvijottama tava rūpaṃ pradāsyati tava rūpeṇa cāgatya tava vaktrābdhisaṃbhūtam tava vaktrodbhavāṃ puṇyām tava vākyaṃ kṣamasva me tava vākyaṃ suraśreṣṭha tava vākyāmṛtena vai tava vākye pratiṣṭhitam tava vīryaṃ mayi sthitam tava śaṅkum asaṃśayam tava śatrus tamo nāma tava sarvān mahāmune tava saṃtoṣahetave tava saṃdarśanākāṅkṣau tava saṃdarśanākāṅkṣau tava sthāne ca śaṃkaram tava hastagataṃ vibho tava hy eṣa syamantakaḥ tavāgre siddhapuruṣa tavācirād daityapate tavātitejasāviṣṭam tavātitejasā vyāptam tavātitaijasaṃ rūpaṃ tavādya mohena sahendradevā tavānagha namo astu te tavāpi putraṃ kalyāṇi tavāpi balam īdṛśam tavāpi bhartṛputrāṇāṃ tavāyogyā kṛtiḥ sakhe tavāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryaṃ taveti bhṛśaduḥkhitā tavedaṃ dvividhaṃ rūpaṃ tavedānīṃ pitāmaha taveme baladevādyāḥ tavaitan nātha ceṣṭitam tavaitā mūrtayaḥ kṛṣṇa tavaiva tiṣṭhāma sadāstadoṣāḥ tavaiva dīyate subhrūḥ tavaiva bhagavan haste tavaiva vacanaṃ yathā tavaivaitat praharaṇaṃ tavaiśvaryeṇa puṣṭāṅgā tavodare ca deveśa tasthivān dvijasattamāḥ tasthur anyā dvijottamāḥ tasthur vaiśvānaropamāḥ tasthuṣaś ca sanātanaḥ tasthau dhunvann adhomukhaḥ tasthau paścimasāgare tasthau prītā mudā yutā tasthau bahuyugaṃ dvijāḥ tasthau maunavratasthitaḥ tasthau sa nṛpatiśreṣṭho tasmāai eva tu tāṃ dāsye tasmāc ca diṅmātramatiprayāsāt tasmāc caiva samutpannau tasmāc cyutas tvadbhavane ca jāto tasmāc cyuto maheśāni tasmāc chastrair alaṃkārair tasmāc chastrair alaṃkārair tasmāc chaṃbhuprasādena tasmāc chāpān nadī martye tasmāc chīghraṃ prayāhi tvaṃ tasmāc chṛṇudhvaṃ munayo tasmāc chṛṇudhvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasmāc chrāddhaṃ tathā kāryaṃ tasmāc chrāddhaṃ naro bhaktyā tasmāc chreṣṭhaṃ tad ucyate tasmāc chliṣṭiṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca tasmāj jantuḥ prajāyate tasmāj jarāṃ na te rājan tasmāj jahi manorujam tasmāj jīvaya deveśa tasmāj jyeṣṭhe prayatnena tasmāj jyeṣṭhe muniśreṣṭhāḥ tasmāj jyaiṣṭhyam apām eva tasmāj jyaiṣṭhyaṃ mayi sthitam tasmāj jyaiṣṭhyāṃ samuddhṛtya tasmāt kam anupṛccheyam tasmāt karambhaḥ kārambhir tasmāt karma na kurvanti tasmāt karmāśritaṃ phalam tasmāt kāmyāni śrāddhāni tasmāt kiṃ kurmahe vatsa tasmāt kurvantu tat purā tasmāt kṛtvā tapo ghoram tasmāt keśavanāmnā tvaṃ tasmāt tat prathamaṃ vada tasmāt tatprāptaye yatnaḥ tasmāt tatra śucir bhūtvā tasmāt tatraiva dātavyaṃ tasmāt taddānasaṃbandhaṃ tasmāt tannāmato nadī tasmāt tapo vrataṃ dānaṃ tasmāt tava dhiyā kānte tasmāt tava dhiyā sādhvi tasmāt tava prasādāc ca tasmāt tavātra tīrthe ye tasmāt tavāśrame puṇye tasmāt tavaiṣa caraṇaḥ tasmāt tavopadeśena tasmāt taṃ tvaṃ samācara tasmāt taṃ muniśārdūlā tasmāt tān pātum arhasi tasmāt tān pūjayet sadā tasmāt tīrthaṃ tad ucyate tasmāt tīrthaṃ mahāmune tasmāt tīrthād avāpa ha tasmāt tu kāraṇād vāpi tasmāt tu māṃ rakṣa jagajjanitri tasmāt tṛṣṇe namo astu te tasmāt te duṣkaraṃ karma tasmāt tenaiva mantreṇa tasmāt te hy akṣatāḥ kṛtāḥ tasmāt tyakṣya imaṃ deham tasmāt tyajāmy ahaṃ deham tasmāt tv aprathamaṃ kāryaṃ tasmāt tvayā cittarāgo tasmāt tvayā naraśreṣṭha tasmāt tvaṃ gautamīṃ gaccha tasmāt tvaṃ jarayā tyaktas tasmāt tvaṃ devapakṣe syā tasmāt tvaṃ narakād ghorād tasmāt tvaṃ nipuṇenādya tasmāt tvaṃ bhūpa mā śucaḥ tasmāt tvaṃ vai daityapateḥ tasmāt tvaṃ śṛṇu rājendra tasmāt tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ tasmāt pāpāgatair arthair tasmāt pārtha na saṃtāpas tasmāt puṇyatamaṃ tīrthaṃ tasmāt putrasamaṃ kiṃcit tasmāt pūjyatamo atithiḥ tasmāt pṛccha jagatpatim tasmāt paitāmahaṃ lokaṃ tasmāt prayatnam āsthāya tasmāt prasādaye vipra tasmāt prasīda deveśa tasmāt prāvṛṣi rājānaḥ tasmāt satyaṃ na saṃtyajet tasmāt satyaṃ na saṃtyajet tasmāt sadā muniśreṣṭhāḥ tasmāt sa puruṣottamaḥ tasmāt sa bahurūpatvād tasmāt samastatīrthebhyaḥ tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tasmāt sarvam abhūd idam tasmāt sarvam abhūd devā tasmāt sarvāgasam api tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni tasmāt sarvātmanā karma tasmāt sarvātmanā kānta tasmāt sarvātmanā kāryā tasmāt sarve anumanya ca tasmāt sarveṣu kāryeṣu tasmāt sa vāgmī dharmajño tasmāt saṃpūjayed bhaktyā tasmāt sārdhaṃ surair yajñe tasmāt sutas te vyabhicāravāṃś ca tasmāt surūpaṃ suvidyām tasmāt sūkṣmataraṃ nāsti tasmāt stuvantu te sarve tasmāt strītvam avāpto asi tasmāt snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca tasmāt snānāvaśeṣaṃ yat tasmāt snānena dānena tasmād agādhād avyaktād tasmād agneḥ paraṃ nāsti tasmād agneḥ paraṃ nāsti tasmād aṅgirase prādād tasmād ajñānasāgarāt tasmād anyatra bhaktir hi tasmād api mahātāpa- tasmād apy aparaṃ tīrtham tasmād apy aparaṃ tīrthaṃ tasmād apsu smaren nityaṃ tasmād abhyāgataḥ śrānto tasmād ardhaphalaṃ bhavet tasmād avyaktam utpannaṃ tasmād avyākulāya ca tasmād asmai tu tāṃ kanyāṃ tasmād asmai varān dāsye tasmād aharniśaṃ viṣṇuṃ tasmād ahaṃ bhaktivinamragātro tasmād ahaṃ mūrdhni śilāṃ tasmād ahaṃ vasāmīha tasmād ākṣipyate punaḥ tasmād āgacchate cātra tasmād āgacchate lokaṃ tasmād āgacchate lokaṃ tasmād āgneyam ākhyātam tasmād ādityam ākhyātaṃ tasmād āpaḥ parāḥ smṛtāḥ tasmād āpaḥ samudbhūtā tasmād āpo variṣṭhāḥ syur tasmād āplavanād dharmaś tasmād deham idaṃ pūrvaṃ tasmād dehi mahābuddhe tasmād dharmaḥ sahāyaś ca tasmād dharmaḥ sevitavyaḥ tasmād dharmeṇa kiṃ tena tasmād dhyeyo namasyaś ca tasmād babhūva prathamaṃ sa dharmo tasmād aśeṣeṇa tasmād ripuvināśāya tasmād ruṣṭo asi kiṃ nātha tasmād vakṣyāmi bho viprā tasmād vadanti śrutitattvavijñāḥ tasmād vadham avāpnoti tasmād vanagatā garbhaṃ tasmād vayaṃ na jānīmo tasmād vayaṃ subhrūr tasya kanyā mahābhāgā tasya kāyaṃ samāviśya tasya kā syād vicāraṇā tasya kiṃcin na durlabham tasya kīrtir yaśaś caiva tasya kukṣau dvijottamāḥ tasya kṛtvā mahātmanaḥ tasya kesaraparvatāḥ tasya kautūhalaṃ hy abhūt tasya kṣetravarasyātha tasya gaṅgā ca tat sadaḥ tasya gaṅgā tadā sadaḥ tasya gaccha mude śubhe tasya garbhasya tā diśaḥ tasya gṛhe munī prāptau tasya gehe samutpanno tasya cakṣuḥsamutthena tasya cāpi mataṃ jñātvā tasya cārayataḥ so aśvaḥ tasya cāsīd daśarathaḥ tasya citrarathaḥ sutaḥ tasya caitrarathī bhāryā tasya jāyā jayā satī tasya jīvo nirarthakaḥ tasya taj janayatīha kurvataḥ tasya tat prāpya duṣprāpyam tasya taddhāraṇaṃ vṛthā tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tasya tad vākyam ākarṇya tasya tasya kṣaṇenāṅgaṃ tasya tasya phalaṃ samyak tasya tisro mahiṣyaḥ syū tasya tīrthaprabhāvataḥ tasya tīrthasya māhātmyaṃ tasya tīrthasya māhātmyād tasya tyāgo na śasyate tasya tv akaraṇaṃ vakṣye tasya tv avarajaḥ putraḥ tasya tvaṃ varadānena tasya dakṣasya vai mune tasya darpabalaṃ hatvā tasya dāridryaduḥkhebhyo tasya dāśarathir vīraś tasya dīpasya yaḥ kuryāt tasya devagaṇaḥ prīto tasya devasya māhātmyaṃ tasya devasya māhātmyaṃ tasya devī tadā hṛṣṭā tasya dehasya bho dvijāḥ tasya dehādikā śaktiḥ tasya dehād vimuktasya tasya dehe vasāmahe tasya daityasya mādhaviḥ tasya dharmayaśaḥśriyaḥ tasya naśyati vai sarvaṃ tasya nābhau samutpannaṃ tasya nāmāni vakṣyāmi tasya nāsti sutaḥ kaścit tasya niḥśvāsavātena tasya patnī uṣā khyātā tasya patnī gale baddhvā tasya patnī vyajāyata tasya pādaprahāreṇa tasya pāpasya ca phalaṃ tasya pucche sthito dhruvaḥ tasya putraśataṃ khyātās tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīt tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīd tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīd tasya putraśataṃ dagdhaṃ tasya putraś caturbāhur tasya putraś cirād āsīt tasya putraḥ sūryanibhaḥ tasya putrā babhūvur hi tasya putrā mahāprājñā tasya putrāś ca pautrāś ca tasya putrās trayaḥ śiṣṭā tasya putraiḥ khanadbhiś ca tasya putro bāla eva tasya putro bharo nāma tasya putro abhavad ṛṣe tasya putro abhavad veṇo tasya putro abhavan madhuḥ tasya putro mahādaityo tasya putro mahān āsīd tasya putro mahāprājñaḥ tasya paiṭhīnasī nāma tasya pracetaḥpramukhā tasya prabhāva eṣa syān tasya prabhāvaṃ te jñātvā tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya prabhāvāt taṃ deśaṃ tasya prabhur ahaṃ vibho tasya prasanno bhagavān tasya bālasya codare tasya bālasya dhīmataḥ tasya bāhusahasraṃ tu tasya bāhusahasreṇa tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā tasya bhāryākṣasūtreti tasya parājitā tasya bhāryābhavat saṃjñā tasya bhāryām aninditām tasya bhāryā mahāprājñā tasya bhāryā mahī cāhaṃ tasya bhāryā mahī nāma tasya bhāryā rūpavatī tasya bhāryā samānāmnī tasya bhāryā sthaviṣṭheti tasya bhāryā hetināmnī tasya bhāryopadānavī tasya bhāryopapāditā tasya bhāvānurūpataḥ tasya bhīmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ tasya bhrātā mayo anujaḥ tasya bhrātā veda iti tasya bhrātṛśatasya vai tasya bhrātṛśataṃ tv āsīd tasya manvantaraṃ smṛtam tasya mātur manodoṣād tasya mānyaḥ sakhā mama tasya māyāvatī nāma tasya mūle samāviśat tasya yac caritaṃ tejaḥ tasya yā gahvarī māyā tasya yā prathamā mūrtir tasya rakṣām athākarot tasya rājñas tu dhīmataḥ tasya rājñaḥ purohitaḥ tasya rājño mahābāhor tasya riṣṭir na kācana tasya rūpaṃ ca vakṣyāmi tasya rūpaṃ pravakṣyāmi tasya rūpaṃ pravakṣyāmi tasyarddhim unnatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyarṣeḥ pūjanaṃ cakre tasya lokāś ca śāśvatāḥ tasya varṣaśatair api tasya vaṃśakarā nṛpāḥ tasya vaṃśakarā bhuvi tasya vaṃśe muniśreṣṭhāḥ tasya vācaṃ nadī sā tu tasya vārimayaṃ vegam tasya vāsas triviṣṭape tasya vikramato bhūmiṃ tasya viṣṇur bhavet prītaḥ tasya viṣṇoḥ kadācana tasya viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam tasya viṣṇoḥ sureśasya tasya vistaram ākhyāsye tasya vīryaṃ ca vividhaṃ tasya vīryaṃ prabhāvaś ca tasya vai saṃtatir nābhūd tasya vyākhyāvadhāryatām tasya śatruś ca balavān tasya śākhāṃ samādāya tasya śākho viśākhaś ca tasya śāpabhayād bhīrur tasya śāpān mahāmuneḥ tasya śiṣyatvam abhyetya tasya śravaṇamātreṇa tasya śravaṇamātreṇa tasya śravaṇamātreṇa tasya śravaṇamātreṇa tasya śravaṇamātreṇa tasya satyarathā nāma tasya satyavrato nāma tasya satrājitaḥ sūryaḥ tasya sarvam idaṃ jagat tasya sarvam idaṃ jagat tasya sarvāṇi kāryāṇi tasya sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ tasya saṃstūyamānasya tasya saṃsparśanirdhūta- tasya sā daivataṃ mahat tasya sā nimnagottamā tasya sā yātv iyaṃ rājañ tasya sā vacanaṃ śrutvā tasya stoṣyāmi kiṃ nv aham tasya stoṣyāmi kiṃ nv aham tasya smaraṇamātreṇa tasya svarūpabhedaṃ ca tasya svarūpam atyugraṃ tasya svarūpaṃ gadato tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tasya svarūpaṃ vyuṣṭiś ca tasya svasā revatīti tasya svasā viṣṭir iti tasya haryatvataḥ sutaḥ tasya haimavatī kanyā tasya hotābhavat tv agnir tasya hreṣitaśabdena tasyā api prasādaṃ ca tasyākhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi tasyākhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi tasyākhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi tasyāgamanakāryaṃ ca tasyā garbho aṣṭamo ayaṃ tu tasyāgrato devavaras tu keśavaḥ tasyācārye puraḥ sthite tasyājñāśaktibhinnāṅgā tasyātmānaṃ darśitavān tasyātha tanayaḥ śuciḥ tasyātha putradauhitraiḥ tasyātha vākyaṃ harayo anumenire tasyā dehe samāhitaḥ tasyādhastād ārtanādaṃ tasyādhāraḥ svayaṃ hṛdi tasyā nagaryāḥ paryante tasyā na lābho bhavitātimaurkhyād tasyā nāmnā tu vikhyātā tasyā nivartite deve tasyānu balabhadraṃ ca tasyānubhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi tasyāntarāyo viprendrā tasyānte ca svayaṃ prāṇair tasyānte ca svayaṃ prāṇair tasyānte brāhmaṇo jāto tasyānnasya pradānena tasyānvavāyaḥ sumahān tasyānvavāyaḥ sumahān tasyāpakāriṇaṃ krūraṃ tasyāpatyaṃ mahātejā tasyāpi keśavodyogaṃ tasyāpi putras tejasvī tasyāpi putro matimān tasyāpi prathamaḥ putras tasyāpi prathame kalpe tasyāpi balavān putro tasyāpi bhagavān bāhuṃ tasyāpi madhye viprendrā tasyāpi mama cātyantaṃ tasyāpi rukmiṇaḥ pautrīṃ tasyāpi vratam īdṛśam tasyāpi hetuḥ parahetuhetuḥ tasyāpy adhyayanaṃ yajño tasyā bhadre sthitasya ca tasyābhimānam ṛddhiṃ ca tasyā bhītā vipram ūcuḥ kuruṣva tasyām anena mantreṇa tasyām asyābhavat putro tasyām āṅgirasā jātā tasyām ādhatta garbhaṃ sa tasyām āsaktamānasaḥ tasyāmitakṣemasubhikṣayuktaṃ tasyā mukhaṃ nirīkṣanto tasyām utpādayām āsa tasyāyur vavṛdhe putra tasyāripakṣakṣapaṇe tasyārjane mahān kleśaḥ tasyāvabhṛtham etya ca tasyā vācaṃ niśamyāśu tasyā vivāhe rāmādyā tasyā vṛttaṃ tu te dṛṣṭvā tasyā vo na bhayaṃ bhavet tasyāśeṣaphalaṃ vada tasyāś ca karuṇāṃ jñātvā tasyāś ca dakṣiṇe kūla tasyāś carum athājñānād tasyāś ca śaṅkhalikhitau tasyāś ca saṃgamaḥ puṇyo tasyāś caiva prasādena tasyāś caivāntaraprepsur tasyāśramam anuprāpto tasyāśrame ca garbhaḥ sa tasyāśrame mahāpuṇye tasyāśrayaś ca dvividho tasyāsaṃdarśane dvijāḥ tasyāsīt pṛthivīpateḥ tasyāsīt sumahad rājyaṃ tasyāsīd vijayo yuddhe tasyāsīn munisattama tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tasyās tasya ca ceṣṭitam tasyās tīre ṛṣīn puṇyān tasyās tīrtham anuttamam tasyās tu saṃgamaḥ puṇyo tasyāsthisaṃcayaḥ kāryaś tasyāhaṃ caritaṃ bhūyaḥ tasyāhaṃ ca śirobhavaḥ tasyāṃ kukṣiṃ praviśya saḥ tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ sasmāra tasyāṃ ca bhagavān sūryaḥ tasyāṃ ca vartamānāyām tasyāṃ cātimahābhīmaṃ tasyāṃ chāyāsamutthitām tasyāṃ jajñe ca pradyumno tasyāṃ jajñe purūravāḥ tasyāṃ jajñe mahābāhuḥ tasyāṃ janiṣyate putro tasyāṃ jāto mahān agnir tasyāṃ tithau pumān svapne tasyāṃ tu patitāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ tu mātṛrūpaṃ sa tasyāṃ mayodyataḥ pādo tasyāṃ mayodyataḥ pādo tasyāṃ vasanti manujaiḥ tasyāṃ viprāḥ pralīyate tasyāṃ vyāpārayām āsa tasyāṃ sa nṛpatiḥ pūrvaṃ tasyāṃ samantataś cāṣṭau tasyāṃ snātas tu vidhivat tasyāṃ hi śaptamātrāyāṃ tasyāḥ kālāvadhiṃ nṛpaḥ tasyāḥ patis tāṃ mocayatīti yuktam tasyāḥ parataraṃ tīrthaṃ tasyāḥ pāpaṃ nivedaya tasyāḥ putraḥ śanaiścaraḥ tasyāḥ putro manojavaḥ tasyāḥ putro mahādaityo tasyāḥ putrau mahārājñau tasyāḥ putrau mahāśreṣṭhau tasyāḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ cakre tasyāḥ prabhāvaṃ prāśastyam tasyāḥ prasūtisamaye tasyāḥ priyārthe svagiriṃ vihāya tasyāḥ prītaḥ sa vai bhartā tasyāḥ phalaṃ prayacchasva tasyāḥ śakrasamaḥ putro tasyāḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ kurvann tasyāḥ sakhy abhavat sā ca tasyāḥ sa bhartātha ciraṃgateti tasyāḥ sarvaṃ nivedya ca tasyedṛśaṃ vrataṃ cāsīd tasyendriyaniviṣṭāni tasyendreṇābhavad yuddhaṃ tasyeyaṃ dayitā ratiḥ tasyeyaṃ matir utpannā tasyeyaṃ madirekṣaṇā tasyeśasya tu kathyate tasyaikasaptatiyugaṃ tasyaikasya mahattvaṃ hi tasyaikaikasya māhātmyaṃ tasyai tuṣṭāḥ surāḥ sarve tasyaite bhrātaraś cāsan tasyai dadāv ahaṃ śāpaṃ tasyai piṇḍam adāt prabhuḥ tasyaiva cāgrajo bhrātā tasyaiva tu hiraṇmayam tasyaivam abhavan dvijāḥ tasyaiva rūpaṃ dhyāyantī tasyaivāgniniveśanāt tasyai sa puruṣottamaḥ tasyotsaṅge ghanaśyāmam tasyodyatas tadā dakṣo tasyonnatiśarair bhagnāḥ tasyopacārād vai lakṣmīr tasyopatiṣṭhataḥ sūryaṃ tasyopari papāta ca tasyopari sthitaṃ devaṃ taṃ kathyamānam ekāgrāḥ taṃ kālayavanaṃ nāma taṃ gatvā tapaso bhraṣṭaṃ taṃ gatvā pṛccha nṛpate taṃ gatvā stuhi deveśaṃ taṃ garbhaṃ vidhinādiṣṭā taṃ gṛhītvā drutaṃ yāto taṃ gṛhītvā mahānāgaṃ taṃ gautamam avārayat taṃ gautamam ahalyāṃ ca taṃ ca kṛṣṇo abhyabhāṣata taṃ ca baddhaṃ gale dṛṣṭvā taṃ cāpi meghahāsaṃ te taṃ cāśvamedhikaṃ so aśvaṃ taṃ jaghāna ca keśavaḥ taṃ janaṃ nihateśvaram taṃ janāḥ paryadhāvanta taṃ jānāmi na cānyathā taṃ jīvam anugacchati taṃ tatra patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ taṃ kāmam avāpnoti taṃ tārakavadhaṃ prati taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dvijavaraṃ taṃ tu deśaṃ parityajya taṃ tu putraṃ vijānīyād taṃ tu yajñaṃ tathārūpaṃ taṃ dadarśa mahāvṛkṣaṃ taṃ dadarśa harir dūrād taṃ dānavam abhiprekṣya taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaśyapo garbham taṃ dṛṣṭvā gūhamānānāṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvāgnau kṣiptajīvaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tato devī taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu tapasyantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu mahābhāge taṃ dṛṣṭvā te munivarāḥ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaṃ tu subhage taṃ dṛṣṭvā daityarāṭ prāha taṃ dṛṣṭvā niścayayutaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpateḥ putro taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāḥ taṃ dṛṣṭvā prahasañ śaṃbhur taṃ dṛṣṭvā prāha govindaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣaṇaṃ sarpaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣaṇaṃ sarpaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā muktim āpnoti taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ prāhur taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayo bhītā taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śīghraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā vibudhāḥ sarve taṃ dṛṣṭvā vibudhāḥ sarve taṃ dṛṣṭvā vihvalībhūtaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadeveśaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā salile magnaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sopahāsārtham taṃ dṛṣṭvā hatasainyaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭasaṃkalpā taṃ devakratum utkṛṣṭaṃ taṃ devaṃ nārado abravīt taṃ devaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmi taṃ devā ṛṣayo abruvan taṃ devāḥ samavākiran taṃ devāḥ svāśramasthāś ca taṃ deśam api yāty asau taṃ deśam upajagmivān taṃ deśaṃ taṃ guruṃ vada taṃ deśaṃ dhīvaragrāmaṃ taṃ deśaṃ sarva eva te taṃ drakṣyāmi jagatpatim taṃ natvā tridaśāḥ sarve taṃ namasyanti dehinaḥ taṃ namasyāmahe bhaktyā taṃ namasyāyatekṣaṇā taṃ namāmi ca tryambakam taṃ namāmi jagatpatim taṃ nigṛhya mahātmāno taṃ nipātya viśaṃ vipraś taṃ nirbhugnaśirogrīvam taṃ nivārya tato brahmā taṃ paśyanti bhayānakam taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno taṃ paśyeyam ahaṃ pāpaṃ taṃ pāñcajanyam āpūrya taṃ pitā prāha kim iti taṃ pitā prāha saṃgamya taṃ puṇyāyābhiṣecire taṃ punaḥ prāha cāṇḍālo taṃ pūjayām āsa vadhe purāṇām taṃ pūrvapūjyaṃ prathamaṃ namāmi taṃ pṛthuṃ kapilena ca taṃ prakṣipya narottamam taṃ pradeśam athāgatya taṃ prapadye ambuśāyinam taṃ praṣṭum upacakrame taṃ prasenajitaṃ divyaṃ taṃ prahasyātha cāṇḍālaṃ taṃ prāhāthorvaśī vipraṃ taṃ provāca nṛpātmajam taṃ baddhvā gāruḍaiḥ pāśair taṃ bālaṃ kṛpayāviṣṭāḥ taṃ bālaṃ yātanāsaṃsthaṃ taṃ buddhvā viharen naraḥ taṃ budhyadhvaṃ muniśreṣṭhā taṃ brahmabhūtaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye taṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ prāha taṃ brahmavādinaṃ śāntaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ samāhūya taṃ bhavantaḥ samāsādya taṃ bhūyaḥ pratyuvācātha taṃ bhūyaḥ prāha sā tanvī taṃ bhūyo janayām āsa taṃ bhrāntacittaṃ munirājaputram taṃ maṇiṃ babhrave punaḥ taṃ māraya mahākāyaṃ taṃ māsaṃ pitaras tayoḥ taṃ mūrkhaṃ siddhagaditaṃ taṃ menire ca hartāraṃ taṃ yacchec chāntir ātmanaḥ taṃ yajñam adahac chīghraṃ taṃ yajñaṃ sa mahāsattvo taṃ yadi kṣatriyo hanyāt taṃ yaduḥ pratyuvāca ha taṃ yāntu na cirād eva taṃ rākṣasaḥ pratyuvāca taṃ rājan pārayāmasi taṃ rājan pārayāmasi taṃ rājan pārayāmasi taṃ rājan pārayāmasi taṃ rājan pārayāmasi taṃ rājan pārayāmasi taṃ rājan pārayāmasi taṃ rājānam ṛṣiḥ prāpya taṃ rāmaṃ cāpi saumitriṃ taṃ ripuṃ nāśayāmīti taṃ ripuṃ nāśayāmīti taṃ ripuṃ hy uttare taṭe taṃ vandamānaṃ caraṇāv taṃ vande puruṣottamākhyam amalaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ niścalam taṃ vareyaṃ surapitar taṃ vighnarājaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmaḥ taṃ vidyād devarūpeṇa taṃ vipraṃ rūpasaubhāgya- taṃ vivedorvaśī svayam taṃ viśrāntaṃ nṛpavaram taṃ vīkṣya kṣamyatām asyety taṃ vṛkṣā jagṛhur garbham taṃ vai rudantaṃ sasutaṃ sakanyaṃ taṃ vai rudraṃ ca śaṃkaram taṃ vaiśyaṃ tarasādāya taṃ vai svayaṃbhūr bhagavān taṃ vrajantaṃ pathi naraḥ taṃ śapeyam anujñātra taṃ śaptvā cābravīd druhyuṃ taṃ śaśāpa tataḥ krodhāt taṃ śaṃkarapratinidhiṃ taṃ śailaṃ sarvataḥ sthitam taṃ śoṇitapure śrutvā taṃ śrīgaṇeśaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye taṃ śrīgaṇeśaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye taṃ ṣoḍaśabhir īśānam taṃ sa trayyāruṇo atyajat taṃ samudrāś ca nadyaś ca taṃ sarpaṃ sarpabhāvanaiḥ taṃ sarvaṃ kathayām āsa taṃ sarvāghanivṛttaye taṃ saṃsāravināśahetum ajaraṃ vande hariṃ muktidam taṃ siddham urvaśī prāha taṃ siddhaṃ prāha mūrkho asau taṃ sinīś ca kuhūś caiva taṃsus tām abhyagacchata taṃ somanāthaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi taṃ somāya nyavedayat taṃsoḥ suto atha rājarṣir taṃ stotum upacakrame taṃ spṛṣṭvā tau vilepatuḥ taṃ hatvā narasiṃhas tat- taṃ hasantam athālakṣya tā āgatāḥ punaś cāpi tā eva sarvaṃ jānanti tā eva somarājanyāḥ tā gāvo vṛṣṭipātena tā jagmur varuṇālayam tāñ jitvā punar apy āgād tāñ jetuṃ naiva śakṣyāmo tāñ śaśāpa sa kauśikaḥ tāñ śṛṇudhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ tāḍayadbhiḥ samantataḥ tāḍayadbhiḥ samantataḥ tāḍayanti ca daṇḍaiś ca tāḍayanti tathā viprān tāḍayanti tathā viprān tāḍayanti nirāgasaḥ tāḍayanti nirāgasaḥ tāḍayām āsa pādena tāḍayitvā tu tāv eva tāḍayitvā prahārakaiḥ tāḍayitvā bhṛśaṃ kruddhair tāḍayitvā bhṛśaṃ kruddhair tāḍyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ tāḍyamānāś ca dāruṇaiḥ tāḍyamānāś ca dāruṇaiḥ tāḍyamānais tu jarjaraiḥ tāḍyamānais tu jarjaraiḥ tāta nāpnoti śobhanam tāta nāmānurūpatā tātaḥ prāptas tvatpadaṃ cāmbikā me tātedṛṅ me viḍambanā tā dadyuś cakravartitām tādṛg eva phalaṃ tu syād tādṛg bhavati maithila tādṛgbhūtas tato brahmā tādṛgrūpapravṛttyā tu tādṛgrūpā bhaviṣyatha tādṛg vāri śucir bhūtvā tādṛśaṃ cāmṛtātmānaṃ tā dṛṣṭvā nāradaḥ prāha tā devavākyāc ca tathaiva cakruḥ tān agnir adahad ghora tān apṛcchac ca sa dvijaḥ tān abādhanta sahitāḥ tān abravīj jagannātho tān arcya bhūyo gandhādyair tān avocan munigaṇāḥ tān avocaṃ surān sarvāñ tān aśvān dvārakāṃ purīm tān ahaṃ pratyavocaṃ vai tān āgatān dvijāṃs te tu tān āgatān nṛpān dṛṣṭvā tān āgatān bhūpasutān tān āgatān munīn sarvān tān āgatān hariḥ prāha tān ārādhya yathāvidhi tān āvāhya svamantrataḥ tāni karmāṇi me deva tāni tāpāya me abhavan tāni tīrthāni gaṅgāyāṃ tāni dṛṣṭvā mahātapāḥ tāni prakṣālanād eva tāni prādād brāhmaṇāya tāni prāptāni vai mayā tāni bhūtāni parito tāni vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepān tāni vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ tāni vaḥ kīrtayiṣyāmi tāni vetti sa yogātmā tāni śrāddhe niyojayet tāni śrīpuruṣākhyasya tāni sattvāny anekaśaḥ tāni sarvāṇi saṃtyajya tāni sarvāṇi saṃdhāya tāni sarvāṇy anukramāt tāni snātuṃ samāyānti tāni snānāvaśeṣasya tān uvāca tadā nṛpaḥ tān ṛṣīn sūtamāgadhau tān eva parameśvaraḥ tān eva puruṣo yathā tāno viśasanas tathā tān kopād bhasmasāt karot tān garbhān nidadhe tataḥ tān guṇān upalakṣayet tān dṛṣṭvā manyunāviṣṭo tān dṛṣṭvā yajñasaṃbhārān tān dṛṣṭvā yādavān āha tān na saṃkhyātum utsahe tān nivārya balaḥ prāha tān nṛpān sa mahīpatiḥ tān paśūn kṛtvā kṛpaṇaṃ tān pāsi tvaṃ jagadguro tān pūjayitvā rājāsau tān budhāḥ pravadāmi vaḥ tān bhakṣaṇāyopagataṃ nikṛtya tāny ato dūratas tyajet tān yācamānāṃs te yāmyā tāny eva sarvatīrthāni tāny evātmābhimanyate tān vihantuṃ mahodyamam tān sarvān āgatān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān bhasmasāt kuryāṃ tān sarvān yajamāno vai tān sā kadrūḥ suvihvalā tān hatvā mātaraḥ sarvān tān hayān vātaraṃhasaḥ tāpatāpitacetasām tāpatrayaparikliṣṭas tāpatrayāṇāṃ śaraṇaṃ na cānyat tāpatrayābhibhūtena tāpatrayopaśamanīm tāpatrayoṣṇadyutitāpitānām tāpanād duḥkhabhāgy aham tāpapāpaprade namaḥ tāpapāpāpahāriṇi tāpayaty eṣa trīṃl lokān tāpayanti ca mānavam tāpayantau mahāmaṇī tāpayāmi janān bahūn tāpayiṣyasi śobhane tāpasā iva mānavāḥ tāpaṃ kṛṣṇāṅgasaṃgamāt tāpaṃ candanadāyinaḥ tāpaṃ candanadāyinaḥ tāpātmakam abhūn mama tāpitaś ca taśāmātyaiḥ tāpī ca yamunā caiva tāpī caiva mahānadī tāpī caiva saridvarā tāpī payouṣṇī kāverī tāpī payouṣṇī vindhyasya tāpīpayoṣṇīnirvindhyā- tāpena mahatā vyāptas tāpo dvijavaraśreṣṭhāḥ tāpo bhavati naikadhā tāpo hy ādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ tā budhyadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ tābhir āpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ tābhir āpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ tābhir māṃ sarvato rakṣa tābhiḥ ko atra na jīyate tābhiḥ prasannacittābhir tābhiḥ samanvitovāha tābhyaś cauṣadhisaṃbhavaḥ tābhyas te niḥsṛtā garbhāḥ tābhyām abjaṃ samudbhūtaṃ tābhyām avyāpṛtaṃ vastu tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ puruṣair tābhyām ṛtubhyāṃ saṃprāpto tābhyām eva yato bhavet tābhyāṃ gaṅgāsusaṃgamaḥ tābhyāṃ dehy udapānaṃ tvaṃ tābhyāṃ parasparaṃ cāpi tābhyāṃ puṣpāṇi yācitaḥ tābhyāṃ pṛṣṭais tu rakṣibhiḥ tābhyāṃ pravrājito rājā tābhyāṃ prītaḥ prajāpatiḥ tābhyāṃ bhūyāt svakaṃ vapuḥ tābhyāṃ yat pūrvavṛttāntaṃ tābhyāṃ sahānayor yuddhaṃ tābhyo api gautamī tathā tābhyo vākyaṃ kṛttikābhyaḥ tābhyo hīnāṃ pitā cakre tām agrato harir dṛṣṭvā tām adarśam ahaṃ tatra tām adṛṣṭvā mahāprājño tā madbhītāḥ pañca sutā tām antaḥprasavāṃ dṛṣṭvā tām apaśyad budho dhīmān tām apāsya namasyātha tām apṛcchan mṛgīṃ punaḥ tām apy āha muniḥ kopāt tām apsarasam āsīnām idaṃ vacanam abravīt tām abravam ahaṃ tadā tām abravīt tataś coṣā tām avekṣya janaḥ sarvo tāmasas tu tathā jñeyaḥ tāmasasya manor ete tāmasasyāntare manoḥ tāmasaṃ bhāvam āśritaḥ tāmasānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ tāmasā nirayaṃ yānti tāmasāś ca gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ tāmasāṃś ca tathāvidhān tāmasī sā samākhyātā tāmasīṃ mūrtim āśritaḥ tām ahaṃ katham āvase tām ahaṃ pratigaccheyaṃ tām āgatya priyāṃ dṛṣṭvā tām āgatyābravīd budhaḥ tām ādāya muniśreṣṭha tām ādāyātha sacivā tām ānīya bhavaṃ pūjya tām ānīyāsya hṛdaye tām āpṛcchyāgamad gṛham tām āplutya punar vapuḥ tā mām ūcuḥ punar mune tām āśvāsya tataḥ subhrūr tām āha pṛthivīṃ punaḥ tām āha bhagavān hariḥ tām āha lalitaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ tām āhvayan nṛpātmajām tām iccheyaṃ jaganmaya tām iyeṣa ca sa prabhuḥ tām ilety eva hovāca tāmisram iti vikhyātaṃ tāmisrādīni nārada tāmisrād dviguṇaṃ proktaṃ tām īkṣya ca divaṃ yayau tām uvāca vinītātmā tām ūcuḥ pitaro divyā tām ṛcīkas tato dṛṣṭvā tām eva kanyāṃ munayaḥ tām eva gatvā vibudhāḥ tām eva gautamīṃ santo tām eva dehi deveśa tām eva manasā dhyāyaṃs tām oṣadhīṃ mama pitar tāmbūlapaṇyajīvinaḥ tāmbūlapattranicayais tāmbūlapūrṇavadanā tāmbūlarañjitamukhā tāmbūlarañjitamukhā tāmbūlena virājitāḥ tāmrakumbhavatī dīptā tāmraparṇo gabhastimān tāmrapallavaśobhitam tāmravarṇo gabhastimān tāmrā krodhavaśā irā tāmrābhāve arkapattrasya tāmrāyasamayīṃ dvijāḥ tāmrāyasamayīṃ dvijāḥ tāmrāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ tāmrāvaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ tārakaś ca mahābalaḥ tārakaṃ sa haniṣyati tārakaḥ sarvadehinām tārakād bhaya āgate tārakād bhaya utpanne tārakād bhayam āpannaṃ tārakād bhayam āpannaṃ tārakād bhayam utpannaṃ tārako balavān āsīn tārako lokadāruṇaḥ tārayanty ahitān api tārayanty eva pitarāv tārayasva pitṝn bhayāt tārayā yatra candramāḥ tārayitvā kulāni ca tārā iva nabhastalāt tārāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tārādhipaṃ khe vimalaṃ sutāraṃ tārā pūtā bhaviṣyati tārāmayaṃ bhagavataḥ tārām ūcuḥ surottamāḥ tārāyāś ca viśeṣataḥ tārā ratisamaprabhā tārārūpāṇi dṛśyante tārāvṛttaviniṣkrayam tārāṃ tārāmukhīṃ dṛṣṭvā tārāṃ papraccha saṃśayam tāritāḥ pitaro rāma tārito ahaṃ tvayānagha tāre kasya sutas tv ayam tārkṣyaprajāpateḥ putrāv tārkṣyaṃ samāruhya mahīdhrakalpaṃ tārtīyacakṣuṣo jyotir tārtīyacakṣuṣodbhūtaṃ tālajaṅghā iti smṛtāḥ tālajaṅghān sahaihayān tālajaṅghās tathaiva ca tālajaṅgho mahābalaḥ tālaṃ varuṇakākolau tālāgrān nipatan kharaḥ tālāṅko adhomukhaṃ halam tālānāṃ patatāṃ śabdam tālāḥ stamālāḥ saralāḥ kapitthāḥ tālaiḥ pippalaiḥ kharjūrair tālaiḥ pūgaphalaiś caiva tālaiḥ śrīphalasaṃbhavaiḥ tā lokamātaraś caiva tāvac ca bhasmasādbhūtaṃ tāvac ca maitrī dravyabhāvaś ca tāvan tāvac chanais tv agād rāmo tāvac chindhi prajāpate tāvac chūdrasamo dvijaḥ tāvatā muktim āpnuyāt tāvatī pṛthivī smṛtā tāvatī rātrir ucyate tāvatīḥ poṣaṇe nṛpaḥ tāvat kanyā pradātavyā tāvat karmaṇy anarho ayam tāvat kalpaṃ viṣṇuloke tāvat kāmā manīṣitāḥ tāvatkālaṃ vaset svarge tāvat kṛṣṇaprasādena tāvat tā dviguṇaṃ jaguḥ tāvat tāvan na bāndhavam tāvat tāḥ puṇyabhūmayaḥ tāvat tvam iha viprarṣe tāvat pitṛpurī śūnyā tāvat putro mama priyaḥ tāvat puṃbhir jīvitavyaṃ tāvatpramāṇabhāge tu tāvat pravartatāṃ yajño tāvaty eva sahasrāṇi tāvat sa kopo bhayamohaduḥkhāny tāvat sarvaguṇālayaḥ tāvat sarvatra cāvyayā tāvat sarvottamo jantus tāvat skhalatsvedajalā tāvat svapimi viśvātmā tāv atha dvijasattamāḥ tāvad anyāni tīrthāni tāvad eva ca vistīrṇaḥ tāvad eva mayā vadhyāv tāvad eva vayaṃ sthitāḥ tāvad garjanti tīrthāni tāvad guṇā gurutvaṃ ca tāvad daridrābhibhavo tāvad duḥkhābhibhūto asāv tāvad devamayī smṛtā tāvad devāḥ sthitā āsan tāvad dhairyanidhir jñānī tāvad yajñādayo yāvat tāvad vivāhaḥ kanyāyāḥ tāvadvistāriṇaś ca te tāvanti cakre rūpāṇi tāvanto narakaukasaḥ tāvanty eva yugāni ca tāvanty eva śatāni ca tāvan na jāyate bhaktir tāvan na pūjayed viṣṇuṃ tāvan niḥśrīkatā puṃsāṃ tāv anyonyaṃ samūcatuḥ tāv apy etena mārgeṇa tāv abrūtāṃ tadā sutam tāv āgatya mahāprājñau tāvān ātmā parātmani tāv ānīya tataḥ putrāv tāv ārādhya na cānyathā tā vāryamāṇāḥ pitṛbhiḥ tāv ālokya tato duḥkhād tāv ālokya smitānanau tāv āśvāsya mahāmanāḥ tāv āhatur ubhau devau tāv ubhāv antaraṃ prepsū tāv ubhau punar apy evam tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau tāv uvācātha nārada tāv ūcatur ubhau devān tāv ūcatur nṛpaśreṣṭhaṃ tāv ūcatur mahārāja tāv ūcatur hariścandraṃ tāv ūcatus tadā sarvāṃs tāv ūcur ṛṣayaḥ sarve tāv eva praṇatau sthitau tāv evaṃ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā tāś ca gatvā muniśreṣṭha tāś ca jagmur bhuvaṃ bhittvā tāś cākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi tāś cāpi saṃgatā gaṅgāṃ tāś caiva visṛjāmy aham tāsām apatyāny abhavan tāsām ānayanāya ca tāsām utkṛṣṭam etasmād tāsām ekāṃ śreṣṭhatamāṃ tāsām eva parasparam tāsāṃ geheṣu keśavaḥ tāsāṃ ca dvividho bheda tāsāṃ jyeṣṭhā satī nāma tāsāṃ tapasi saṃsthitau tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu tāsāṃ pāpāvadhiḥ kutaḥ tāsāṃ prabhāvasmaraṇāt tāsāṃ bhartā prabhākaraḥ tāsāṃ bhāgīrathī śreṣṭhā tāsāṃ ye caiva bhartāras tāsāṃ vikṛtarūpāṇi tāsāṃ sarve api pūrvajāḥ tāsu garbhaḥ samabhavat tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu tāsu dattaṃ tad akṣayam tāsu devāḥ khagā gāvo tāsu yad gamanāt pāpaṃ tāsu vīryam athāsṛjat tāsu sarvāsu mādhavaḥ tās tatra saṃniyojaya tās tadā pratijagrāha tās tu prāptāḥ pitur gṛham tāsv apatyāni bodhata tāsv apatyāni bodhata tāsv āyatanavaryāṇi tāsv ime kurupañcāla- tāṃ kanyāṃ savitā kasmai tāṃ kanyāṃ hṛtavān hariḥ tāṃ gacchantīṃ nṛpagṛhaṃ tāṃ gādhiḥ kāvyaputrāya tāṃ ca kokāṃ mahānadīm tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ dvijanmane tāṃ ca bhāryāṃ varān anyān tāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ guṇopetām tāṃ cāpi pratimāṃ rāmaḥ tāṃ jitvā pramatiḥ prāha tāṃ tanvīṃ prāha nāradaḥ tāṃ tārāṃ jagṛhe kaviḥ tāṃ tāṃ prāpnoti sa dhruvam tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ vrajed vipro tāṃ tīrṇaḥ sarvato mukto tāṃ tu buddhvā naraḥ sargaṃ tāṃ tu rūpeṇa kāntena tāṃ tṛṇena nyavārayat tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham tāṃ dattavān suraśreṣṭhas tāṃ dadarśa sa gautamaḥ tāṃ dadarśa sa gautamaḥ tāṃ dīkṣām avahad balī tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cakame rājā tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cārusarvāṅgīm tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cārusarvāṅgīṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpatiḥ śrīmān tāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā prāha nṛpatir tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītavad dhariḥ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpasaṃpannām tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vaḍavārūpāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vavṛdhe athāsya tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtā buddhir tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtāṃ bhrātā tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vigatānando tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vibudhāḥ sarve tāṃ nāśayasva deveśa tāṃ niśāṃ sa samudvīkṣya tāṃ papracchāyatekṣaṇām tāṃ putrasyāpy adarśayat tāṃ pṛthur dhanur ādāya tāṃ poṣayitvā vidhivad tāṃ praṇamya sakṛd bhaktyā tāṃ baddhāṃ pañjarasthāṃ vā tāṃ bālāṃ cārusarvāṅgīṃ tāṃ bravīti sumadhyamām tāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuvāca tāṃ mātā pratyabhāṣata tāṃ mukhe samabhāvayat tāṃ mūrtim asurā dṛṣṭvā tāṃ yacchej jñānacakṣuṣā tāṃ yoniṃ brahmaṇo viddhi tāṃ yauvanāḍhyām atha cārudharmiṇe tāṃ vācaṃ dhanadaḥ śrutvā tāṃ vidyāṃ nātha yāciṣye tāṃ vipro yācayed yathā tāṃ viśāpām athākarot tāṃ vettum icchāmi janārdano aham tāṃ vai krodhāc ca mohāc ca tāṃ vai procuḥ suragaṇā tāṃ śaptukāmo bhagavān tāṃś ca vṛkṣāṃs tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ tāṃś cāpi saṃdhārya tataḥ kṛtārthāḥ tāṃś cāsiñcan mahīruhān tāṃś ciccheda hariḥ pāśān tāṃś caiva naṣṭān vijñāya tāṃ samārādhya suciraṃ tāṃ samīkṣya kaṭhas tv atha tāṃ saṃgatāṃ vīkṣya śivo hariś ca tāṃ sītāṃ lokamātaram tāṃ sutāṃ sutavatsalaḥ tāṃs tattvavid anādṛtya tāṃs tathā bruvataḥ sarvān tāṃs tathaivopakalpayet tāṃs tān aśnāty asau taruḥ tāṃs tān kāmān avāpnoti tāṃs tān kāmāṃl labhanti te tāṃs tān prāpnoty asaṃśayam tāṃs tān sarvān avāpnoti tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā mahābhāgān tāṃs tu doṣān parityajya tāṃs tvaṃ pāsi maheśvara tāṃs tvaṃ prāpnuhi suvrata tāṃ svīcakāra lalanāṃ tāḥ kathaṃ sukhahetavaḥ tāḥ kanyā narakāvāsāt tāḥ pitābhyarcayad gṛhe tāḥ pibanti mudā yuktā tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā tāḥ śaśāpa muniḥ kopam tāḥ samāśvāsayām āsa tāḥ sṛṣṭās tena vidhinā titikṣā nābhimānitā titikṣur abhavad rājā titikṣuṃ ca mahābalam titikṣos tu prajās tv imāḥ tittiratvam avāpnuyāt tintiḍīkavibhītakaiḥ tintiḍīraktacandanaiḥ tiryaktvaṃ caratāṃ dvijāḥ tiryaktvaṃ narakaṃ cāpi tiryaktvaṃ samupāgatā tiryaktve patatāṃ viprās tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā tiryag evam ulūkhalam tiryaggatim avāpnuyāt tiryag jāyeta bho dvijāḥ tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca tiryagyonigatāś ca ye tiryagyonigateṣv api tiryagyonimanuṣyatve tiryagyonimanuṣyatve tiryagyonim avāpnuyāt tiryagyonisahasreṣu tiryagyonisahasreṣu tiryagyoniṃ vrajanti te tiryagyonau ca saṃsthitā tiryagyonau prajāyate tiryagyonyatiriktāni tiryaṅmukhaśirodharāḥ tiryañco api sureśvara tilakalkena vā punaḥ tilakāḥ kusumotkarāḥ tilagandhodakair yuktaṃ tilagodānam uttamam tilataṇḍulatoyaṃ ca tilatailena vā punaḥ tilatailena vā punaḥ tiladhenupradānena tilavat tatra pīḍyante tilā gāvo dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ tilānāṃ lavaṇasya ca tilān vā śrāddhakarmaṇi tilāḥ pavitraṃ tailaṃ vā tiliris tanayo abhavat tile tadvat pumān iha tilodakena cānyāṃś ca tilodakena matimān tilodakena vidhinā tiṣṭhati puruṣe buddhir tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt tiṣṭhatīti hi śuśruma tiṣṭhate bhuvanottame tiṣṭhate varṣakāyutam tiṣṭhate vigatajvaraḥ tiṣṭhaty atra sunirbhayaḥ tiṣṭhaty ekaḥ samudrānte tiṣṭha tvaṃ ca tathākṣayam tiṣṭha tvaṃ madhusūdana tiṣṭha tvaṃ rājasattama tiṣṭhatv eko yathāsukham tiṣṭhantam ajaraṃ taṃ tu tiṣṭhantaṃ śūlapāṇinam tiṣṭhanti takṣyamāṇāś ca tiṣṭhanti tatra muditāḥ tiṣṭhanti tapasānvitāḥ tiṣṭhanti divi devāś ca tiṣṭhanti dharaṇītale tiṣṭhanti mānavās tatra tiṣṭhanti vicaranti ca tiṣṭhanti vaiṣṇavās tatra tiṣṭhanti śāśvate bhāve tiṣṭhanti susthās tadanādareṇa tiṣṭhantī caiva gacchantī tiṣṭhantu nāma cānyās tās tiṣṭhan sthiraś ca sthāṇuś ca tiṣṭhaṃs tatra sa kāmahā tiṣṭhāmaḥ śaṃbhusaṃnidhau tiṣṭheha tvaṃ mahābāho tisṛṇāṃ saṃgamo yatra tisṛbhir brahmahatyābhir tisṛbhir brahmahatyābhir tisṛbhir brahmahatyābhir tisraḥ koṭyas tathā pañca tisraḥ koṭyaḥ sutās teṣāṃ tisraḥ koṭyo ardhakoṭiś ca tisraḥ koṭyo ardhakoṭī ca tisraḥ koṭyo ardhakoṭī ca tisraḥ koṭyo ardhakoṭī ca tisro yogaṃ samāśritāḥ tisro vai yaśasānvitāḥ tīkṣṇakṣurasamāvṛtam tīkṣṇavyādhimahārujam tīkṣṇaśṛṅgair mahāvṛṣaiḥ tīkṣṇaśṛṅgaiḥ samanvitam tīkṣṇaśṛṅgaiḥ samanvitam tīkṣṇaśṛṅgo arkalocanaḥ tīramṛt tadrasaṃ prāpya tīrayor ubhayor mune tīrasaṃlagnaphenaughair tīrastho lokapūjitaḥ tīre ca dakṣiṇe puṇyaṃ tīre cābhyarcya vidhivan tīre tasya mahodadheḥ tīre tasya mahodadheḥ tīre nadanadīpateḥ tīrtvā ca dustaraṃ janma tīrthakoṭimahāpuṇyā tīrthakoṭisamāvṛtaḥ tīrthacandanavāriṇā tīrthadevasvarūpiṇyām tīrthaprabhāvāc ca vimuktapāpaḥ tīrthabhedo mayoditaḥ tīrtham asti mahāphalam tīrtham ācamanāya vai tīrtham ānandanāmakam tīrthamāhātmyam uttamam tīrthamāhātmyasaṃbhavam tīrtham uddālakaṃ tathā tīrtham ṛṣigaṇākīrṇaṃ tīrtham etan mune proktaṃ tīrtham auśanasaṃ tathā tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena tīrthayātrāphalaṃ caiva tīrthayātrāphalaṃ yat tu tīrthayātrāṃ karomīti tīrthayātrāṃ jitendriyāḥ tīrtharājajale snātvā tīrtharāja namas te astu tīrtharāja namo astu te tīrtharājasamaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrtharājas tu sa punaḥ tīrtharājasya bho dvijāḥ tīrtharājaṃ ca sāṃpratam tīrtharājaṃ paraṃ śubham tīrtharājaṃ mahāśabdam tīrtharājaṃ sanātanam tīrtharūpeṇa tiṣṭhati tīrthavajraṃ tathārbudam tīrthavaryaṃ pṛthūdakam tīrthaśreṣṭhā mahānadī tīrthaśraiṣṭhyam ayācata tīrtha sarvāghanāśana tīrthasevāpātradāna- tīrthasevāṃ vinā svalpā- suprayogā tuṅgamañce vyavasthitaḥ tuṅgam āruhya vāraṇam tuṅgaraktanakhaṃ padbhyāṃ tuṅgorasthalam unnasam tuṇḍenāpo nirasya ca tutoṣa bhagavān haraḥ tutoṣa munisattamāḥ tubhyaṃ tad ucitaṃ mama tubhyaṃ namaḥ kanakaratnasukuṇḍalāya tubhyaṃ śaṃbho namo astu te tumulaṃ bhojakṛṣṇayoḥ tumbīvīṇāpriyāya ca tumburās tu carāś caiva tumburur nārado hāhā tumburuṃ ca niyojayet turagasyāsya śakro api turagā vājināṃ varāḥ turuṣkaṃ cāpi varjayet turyākhyaṃ puruṣottamam turvasuṃ kāmam abravīt turvasuṃ matimān nṛpaḥ turvasoś ca pṛthak pṛthak turvasos tu pravakṣyāmi turvasos tu suto vahnir tulasī tilakaṃ tathā tulyatām iha paśyāmi tulyadveṣyapriyā dāntā tulyaveṣās tu manujā tulyaṃ jñānaṃ na vidyate tulyaṃ taddarśanaṃ kasmāt tulyaṃ śaucaṃ tayor yuktaṃ tulyena manasā narāḥ tulyeṣv apy adhikaḥ sneha tulyeṣv abhyadhikaḥ sneha tuṣāṅgāraviśīrṇāni tuṣāḥ kaṇāś ca santo vai tuṣitā nāma te anyonyam tuṣitāś caiva ye dvijāḥ tuṣṭas tadāviṣkṛtadivyamūrtiḥ tuṣṭas tasmai sa mādhavaḥ tuṣṭāyām atha tasyāṃ vo tuṣṭāva garuḍadhvajam tuṣṭāva gautamītīre tuṣṭāva gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ tuṣṭāva ca punaḥ punaḥ tuṣṭāva ca maheśvaram tuṣṭāva tejasāṃ rāśiṃ tuṣṭāva tridaśeśvaram tuṣṭāva devadeveśaṃ tuṣṭāva devaṃ prayataḥ tuṣṭāva devaṃ sa muniḥ tuṣṭāva niyato vākyaiḥ tuṣṭāva paramaiḥ stotrair tuṣṭāva praṇato bhūtvā tuṣṭāva vividhair vākyais tuṣṭāva vividhoktibhiḥ tuṣṭāva śaṃkaraṃ devaṃ tuṣṭāva śaṃkaraṃ devaṃ tuṣṭāva sarvabhāvena tuṣṭāva sarvavijñāna- tuṣṭāva stavanaiḥ puṇyair tuṣṭāvāditir avyagraṃ tuṣṭāvānakadundubhiḥ tuṣṭāḥ procur vasiṣṭhaṃ taṃ tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ tuṣṭir eṣāṃ nṛpāsane tuṣṭuvur gautamīṃ nadīm tuṣṭuvur nihate tasmin tuṣṭuvur brahmaṇaḥ putrās tuṣṭuvur muditā gopā tuṣṭuvur vāgbhir ādyābhiḥ tuṣṭuvur vibudheśānaṃ tuṣṭuvur vividhaiḥ stotraiḥ tuṣṭuvur vividhaiḥ stotraiḥ tuṣṭuvur hariśaṃkarau tuṣṭuvus taṃ tathā tathā tuṣṭuvus taṃ mahātmānaṃ tuṣṭuvus tām aharniśam tuṣṭuvus tejasāṃ yoniṃ tuṣṭuvus te praharṣitāḥ tuṣṭuvus tridaśeśānaṃ tuṣṭuvus tridaśeśvaram tuṣṭuvuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣam tuṣṭuvuḥ sarvabhāvena tuṣṭe trilocane tasya tuṣṭena śaṃkareṇedam tuṣṭe bhartari nārīṇāṃ tuṣṭe hasantī ruṣṭe ca tuṣṭe hutāśane tasya tuṣṭo abhyagāt pakṣipatiṃ mahātmā tuṣṭo yadi bhaved bhartā tuṣṭo vacanam abravīt tuṣṭo asi cet keśava tad vṛṇomi tuṣṭo asmi tava bhaktyāhaṃ tuṣṭo asmi tava vākyena tuṣṭo asmi te mahīpāla tuṣṭo asmi te viprabhaktyā tuṣṭo ahaṃ tava dhairyeṇa tūṇau cāpy akṣayau śaraiḥ tūṇau śaṅkho asir eva ca tūpaviṣṭaḥ suśītale tūrṇam eva bilaṃ yayau tūryavāditraghoṣaiś ca tūṣṇīm āste ca gauravāt tūṣṇīṃ tadā babhūvāsau tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhanti pārthivāḥ tūṣṇīṃbhūte tu dhanade tūṣṇīṃbhūteṣu nārada tūṣṇīṃ sthitāyāṃ surasattamās te tūṣṇīṃ sthite mayi tadā tṛṇakāṣṭhādikaṃ ca yat tṛṇagulmapipīlikam tṛṇagulmalatāvallī- tṛṇajātīś ca sarvaśaḥ tṛṇavikrayakāś caiva tṛṇāni ca punaḥ punaḥ tṛṇāny atha cacāra ha tṛṇeṣu tṛṇarāḍ yathā tṛṇauṣadhigaṇaḥ kutaḥ tṛtīya iti naḥ śrutam tṛtīyanayanāya ca tṛtīyaś cāndhakārakaḥ tṛtīyas tu balāhakaḥ tṛtīyasya padasyātra tṛtīyaṃ tvaṃ tadābhīṣṭaṃ tṛtīyaṃ nayanaṃ draṣṭuṃ tṛtīyaṃ paśupālanam tṛtīyaṃ pippalāśanaḥ tṛtīyaṃ locanaṃ vibhoḥ tṛtīyaṃ viddhi pārthiva tṛtīyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ tena tṛtīyā karma kurute tṛtīyārkasya yā mūrtiḥ tṛtīyā hy ekapāṭalā tṛtīyāṃ caiva gṛhyebhyaḥ tṛtīyāṃ vai subhadrāṃ ca tṛtīyāṃ svarṇavarṇābhāṃ tṛtīyekṣaṇadhāriṇam tṛtīye divase ye tu tṛtīye ahni ca kartavyaṃ tṛtīyo lubdhakas tathā tṛptaye kṛsaraṃ ca naḥ tṛptas tasya hy abhiṣṭutaḥ tṛptā bhavati niścitam tṛptāḥ smeti sakṛt toyaṃ tṛptiyogaṃ sutāṃs tathā tṛptis tān upatiṣṭhate tṛptiṃ yānti divaukasaḥ tṛptiṃ yānti pitāmahāḥ tṛptiṃ saṃprāpnuvanti vai tṛpto asmi sarvabhogeṣu tṛpyatām iti siñcet tu tṛpyante te na cāṇḍāla- tṛṣārtair upabhujyate tṛṣā vyāptas tathā kṣudhā tṛṣitaś ca kṣudhāviṣṭo tṛṣitena kadācit sa tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite tṛṣṇākṣudhābhyāṃ ca rajastamobhyām tṛṣṇāglānivivarjitāḥ tṛṣṇāchedāya kiṃ bhavet tṛṣṇā bahuvidhā māyā tṛṣṇārtaḥ praskhalan viprās tṛṣṇāśokormisaṃkule tṛṣṇā sarvatra duṣkṛte tṛṣṇāṃ ca paritoṣataḥ te apy ūcatur astv etad te āgatya mahānadīm te āhatur ubhe agastyaṃ te ubhe nety avocatām te ūcatur ubhe devaṃ te ūcatur ubhe devaṃ te kathaṃ bhājanaṃ śriyaḥ te kāmān āpnuyuḥ śubhān te kurvanti na saṃśayaḥ te kṛcchre yānty aśaucāś ca te kṣudhārtā mṛdaṃ śuṣkāṃ te khaḍgapattrādiṣu saṃbhavanti te khyātāś ca dvijottamāḥ te gaṅgāyāṃ ca saṃgate te gatāḥ keśavālayam te garbhiṇyāv ubhe āha te garbhiṇyau punar jāte te guṇān ativartante te gautamīṃ devanadīṃ tu gatvā te ca gopā mahad dṛṣṭvā te ca tv āṅgiraso abhavan te ca procuḥ parasparam te cāgatya nṛpaṃ prāptāḥ te cāgatyātha paśyanto te cāpi devās tām adṛṣṭvaiva śīghraṃ te cāpy ekatra bhuñjate te ced yadi narās tasmān te cainaṃ na prajānanti te jagmur dakṣiṇām āśāṃ tejaś ca kṛtsnaṃ sumahac ca dhairyam tejaś cākhyāpayiṣyasi tejasaḥ śātanaṃ cakre tejasā tasya te dhvastāś tejasā dahyamānās te tejasā niyamena ca tejasā pratibudhyataḥ tejasā bhagavān prabhuḥ tejasā bhāskaropamaḥ tejasā yaśasā śriyā tejasā yaśasā śriyā tejasālpena śakyate tejasā vyāptadiṅmukhaḥ tejasā sadṛśadyuti tejasā sarvato vṛte tejasā saṃbhṛtaṃ rūpaṃ tejasā saṃhatena vai tejasāṃ chedanaṃ cakre tejaso ambarasaṃvṛtam tejaso hananena tu tejas tejasvinām api tejas tv abhyadhikaṃ tasya tejasvantaṃ mahādrumam tejasvinam udāradhīḥ tejasvī dānaśīlaś ca tejaḥprabhāvādhikatulyarūpī tejaḥ saṃkṣipya tiṣṭhataḥ tejaḥ saṃhṛtya durdharṣam tejaḥ soḍhuṃ na śaktāḥ syur tejaḥ somasya bhāsvataḥ te jetāro na cetare tejodhikas tejasi saṃniviṣṭaḥ tejobalavivardhanam tejobalājñāsadṛśaprabhāvaḥ tejobalaiśvaryamahāvarodhaḥ tejobimbe vyavasthitam tejomaṇḍalavān vibhuḥ tejomaṇḍalinaṃ devaṃ tejo ayaṃ sārvalaukikam tejoyuktaṃ tac ca papau dadhīciḥ tejorāśau divākare tejo vāyau tu saṃyuktaṃ te tatra āsan sumanojñarūpāḥ te tatra manujā yānti te tatra mūlamantreṇa te tatra vaiṣṇavā yānti te atapyanta mahat tapaḥ te tam ūcur munivaraṃ te taranty akhilām etāṃ te tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā te taṃ jaghnur muniṃ pādair te tān pitṛgaṇān daityā te tu gotrakarā viprā te tu narāḥ svargagāminaḥ tena viddhas trinetro api tena viprakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tena vipreṇa sarvais taiḥ tena vīreṇa mokṣitaḥ tena vṛddhiṃ parāṃ nītaḥ tena vyastasamastena tena vyāptam idaṃ sarvaṃ tena śabdena mahatā tena śūdrānnaśeṣeṇa tena śailā vivardhitāḥ tena sakhyaṃ dvijasyāsīd tena satyena sā sādhvī tena saptasu dvīpeṣu tena sarve apy avocan vai tena saṃvardhitaiḥ sasyaiḥ tena sārdhaṃ mahātmanā tena sārdhaṃ sahānugā tena somābhirakṣa naḥ tena haihayarājasya tenākarod ṛṣī rakṣo tenātikṣobhitaś cābdhir tenātitāpayām āsa tenātimānasas tāpaḥ tenātīvāsi vicchāyo tenādharmeṇa mucyate tenādharmeṇa vai tadā tenānanta iti smṛtaḥ tenānīto girir mahān tenānuyātaḥ kṛṣṇo api tenānnena kule tatra tenānnena prajāḥ sarvā tenāpi patatā tatra tenāpi pūrvaṃ bhavatā yathaiva tenāpohati dharmātmā tenābhavan mahāraudraṃ tenābhiṣiñca gām etāṃ tenābhiṣiñced gātrāṇi tenābhiṣecitānāṃ me tenābhūd yā nadī puṇyā tenālokitamātro asau tenāvāptaṃ yaśaḥ sphītaṃ tenāvṛtaṃ yad bhuvanāntarālam tenāścaryapareṇāhaṃ tenāsi vigataprabhaḥ tenāsau cāgninetreṇa tenāsau puruṣottamaḥ tenāsau śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ tenāsau sādhv itīritam tenāhaṃ karmaṇā rājan tenāhaṃ toṣito vīra tenāhaṃ dvimukho jātas tenāhaṃ sakalā dattā tenāhūtas tvarann eti te nijaghnuḥ parasparam te nijaghnuḥ parasparam te nipetus tatas tūrṇaṃ te anujñātā aṅgirasā tenendrasyābhavad yuddhaṃ teneyaṃ gaur muniśreṣṭhā teneyaṃ dūṣitā sarvā teneyaṃ nāgavaryeṇa teneyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā teneyaṃ medinī devī tenaikena ca kartavyaṃ tenaiva tu vidhānena tenaiva nāmnā lokeṣu tenaiva saha gantavyaṃ tenaivākhilanāthena tenaivātāḍayat tataḥ tenaivoktaṃ paṭhed vedaṃ tenaivoktaṃ yathā purā tenoktā sā tadā tatra tenoddiṣṭaphalāṃ gatim tenodbhavapralayapālanakāraṇena te patanti śvabhojane te patanti sughoreṣu te payodā nabhastalam te api kṛtvā śubhaṃ karma te api tatra narā yānti te api tatra paraṃ sthānaṃ te api tatra mahāprājñāḥ te api tallakṣaṇadravya- te api taṃ pratipūjyaiva te api tenaiva mārgeṇa te api pāpavinirmuktāḥ te api yānti tanuṃ tyaktvā te api yānti sukhenaiva te api yānty amaraprakhyā te api viśravasaḥ putrā te api śrutvā muniśreṣṭhāḥ te api sarve jagannātha te api saṃpūjya taṃ devaṃ te api sārasayuktais tu te api sūryapradīptais tu te api hastirathair divyair te puṇyāḥ saṃgamās trayaḥ te apy atra pratitiṣṭhanti te apy ūcur bhagavann asmat- te apy evaṃ mantrayām āsur te prayānti vimānais tu te bhavanti narādhamāḥ te bhavitrī na saṃśayaḥ te bhinnadehāḥ praviśanti kṛṣṇaṃ tebhiḥ somābhirakṣa na te bhuktvābhimatān kāmān te bhuktvā manujendrabhogam amalāḥ tebhyaś ca putrās teṣāṃ tu tebhyaḥ kanīyān abhavad tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ samāhṛtya tebhyaḥ sa paramaṃ cakṣuḥ tebhyo atraiva smṛtir bhavet tebhyo dattvā tato yajñaḥ tebhyo dattvātha māṃ devāḥ tebhyo dāridryaduḥkhāni tebhyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ tebhyo na deyam amṛtaṃ tebhyo brahmarṣimukhyebhyaḥ tebhyo yad idam adhikam tebhyo yad yan manīṣitam tebhyo vakty atha harṣitaḥ tebhyo aham anṛṇas tataḥ tebhyo hitārthaṃ tv iha cāpareṣāṃ tebhyo hitārthaṃ tv iha cāmareśa te madvākyād bhuvaṃ gatvā te mahyaṃ yāntu darśanam te muktās tatkṣaṇād api te muktiphalabhāginaḥ te muktibhājaḥ praviśanti viṣṇuṃ te me bahumatāḥ sati te me sthānaṃ na dāsyanti te mokṣaṃ prāpnuvanti vai te mokṣaṃ prāpnuvanti vai te mohamṛtyavaḥ sarve te mohamṛtyavaḥ sarve te yadā tu svasaṃmūḍhā te yānti kāñcanair yānair te yānti divyavarṇābhair te yānti dharmanagaraṃ te yānti padam avyayam te yānti paramaṃ padam te yānti paramāṃ gatim te yānti paramāṃ gatim te yānti bhavanaṃ hareḥ te yānti lokapālais tu te yānti vidrutā nagnāḥ te yānti vidrutā nagnāḥ te yānti śabalaṃ dvijāḥ te yānty aśvai rathaiś caiva te yānty aśvair yamālayam te yānty ācandratārakam te yūyaṃ ca punaḥ kāle te ye lakṣmaṇa jāyante te rasātalam āgaman te labhante yathepsitam te vadhyamānā vīreṇa te vānarā muditāḥ sarva eva te vāhayantas tv anyonyaṃ te vitṛṣṇāḥ sukhaṃ yānti te vimānair mahātmāno te viśanti narāḥ śūrāḥ te viśanti narāḥ śūrāḥ te viṣṇulokam āsādya te viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ te vṛṣaṃ procur amarā te vai dhanyāḥ prāṇino ye tyajanti te vai nṛpopabhojyāni te vai manuṣyatāṃ yānti te vai rudantaṃ pitaraṃ ca dṛṣṭvā te vyaktiṃ pratipadyante te śepuḥ srāviṇī bhava te śrutvā tvaritāḥ sarve teṣām annaṃ samānīya teṣām api ca bho viprā teṣām apy atipāpāni teṣām apy adhikaṃ mayā teṣām apy ahiteṣu hi teṣām abhīṣṭāni śivaḥ karotu teṣām abhīṣṭāni śivaḥ karotu teṣām abhyāgatānāṃ ca teṣām arjuna kālotthaḥ teṣām ājñāṃ pragṛhya ca teṣām ārogyatāṃ cāpi teṣām ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ teṣām upari cāsanam teṣām ete pradṛśyante teṣām evaṃ pravṛttānāṃ teṣām evetare ceṣṭāṃ teṣāṃ kanīyān yo bhrātā teṣāṃ kaśyapaputrāṇāṃ teṣāṃ kaṃsas tu pūrvajaḥ teṣāṃ kā nāma bhītayaḥ teṣāṃ kāryeṣu vai tataḥ teṣāṃ kule muniśreṣṭhā teṣāṃ kṣīraṃ viṣaṃ smṛtam teṣāṃ khyātāni gotrāṇi teṣāṃ gandhaḥ śuciḥ smṛtaḥ teṣāṃ gṛhasthaḥ satataṃ teṣāṃ cakre mahāmanāḥ teṣāṃ cakṣūṃṣi nārācair teṣāṃ ceṣṭāṃ na jānanti teṣāṃ caiva yathāsukham teṣāṃ janapadāḥ pañca teṣāṃ janapadāḥ sphītā teṣāṃ jñānaprado mahān teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhas tu tatrāsīt teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣāṃ tāsāṃ ca vai mune teṣāṃ tīrthaṃ tena nāmnā teṣāṃ tu tiryaggamanaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ tu nāma saṃjñāni teṣāṃ tu paramā muktiḥ teṣāṃ tu manasā raśmīn teṣāṃ tṛptim abhīpsatā teṣāṃ tṛptiḥ prajāyate teṣāṃ teṣām iyaṃ gatiḥ teṣāṃ dattvābhayaṃ tadā teṣāṃ dāridryaduḥkhāni teṣāṃ dāridryaduḥkhāni teṣāṃ duryodhanaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ teṣāṃ dogdhā pṛthak pṛthak teṣāṃ nadyaś ca saptaiva teṣāṃ nāmāni bho dvijāḥ teṣāṃ nāmāny ataḥparam teṣāṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tejaḥ teṣāṃ nāśāya suvratāḥ teṣāṃ nirviśatāṃ sveṣu teṣāṃ parasparaṃ vāpi teṣāṃ parārthavyasanena kiṃ mune teṣāṃ pātraviśeṣāṃś ca teṣāṃ piṇḍādidānena teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca teṣāṃ pūrvavisṛṣṭiṃ ca teṣāṃ bhavati kiṃ puṇyaṃ teṣāṃ madhyamamānuṣaḥ teṣāṃ madhye atidīptimān teṣāṃ madhye daityapatiḥ teṣāṃ madhye babhau pitā teṣāṃ mahāpātakānāṃ teṣāṃ munīnāṃ sarveṣām teṣāṃ yat tapasaḥ sthānaṃ teṣāṃ yayātiḥ pañcānāṃ teṣāṃ yavīyān pṛṣato teṣāṃ yuddham abhūd ghoraṃ teṣāṃ labdhānumānānāṃ teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi vistaram teṣāṃ vacanam ākarṇya teṣāṃ vaṃśas tridhā bhūto teṣāṃ vaṃśo na vardhate teṣāṃ vāgīśvarī devī teṣāṃ vikukṣir jyeṣṭhas tu teṣāṃ vikhyātavīryāṇāṃ teṣāṃ visargāś catvāro teṣāṃ vṛttam idaṃ śṛṇu teṣāṃ vṛttyā vitiṣṭhati teṣāṃ śabdair upacitabalaḥ puṣpacāpeṣuhastaḥ teṣāṃ śrāddhaṃ kathaṃ jñeyaṃ teṣāṃ śrutvā tu tadvacaḥ teṣāṃ sapta mahāvaṃśā teṣāṃ saptasu vaṃśeṣu teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ teṣāṃ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi teṣāṃ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi teṣāṃ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi teṣāṃ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi teṣāṃ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi teṣāṃ sarveṣu vastuṣu teṣāṃ sarve suragaṇāḥ teṣāṃ sahasraśaś cānye teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate teṣāṃ saṃvyavahāraś ca teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ bhedaṃ ca teṣāṃ svasā bhogavatī teṣāṃ svasāraḥ pañcāsan teṣāṃ svāgatadānāni teṣāṃ svāhā svadhā caiva teṣāṃ hi yaś caturtho anyaḥ teṣāṃ hi vāñchitaṃ sarvaṃ teṣāṃ hy ete muniśreṣṭhāḥ teṣu tatropaviṣṭeṣu teṣu tīrtheṣu nārada teṣu tuṣṭeṣu sa prāha teṣu teṣu ca pātreṣu teṣu dānavadaiteya- teṣu deśeṣu saptasu teṣu daityeṣu śatruṣu teṣu paśyatsu rakṣāṃsi teṣu puṇyaṃ puroditam teṣu puṇyā janapadā teṣu prabhavamāṇeṣu teṣu bhūteṣu pañcasu teṣu yatnapareṣv api teṣu sthāneṣu kalpanā teṣu sthāneṣu saptasu teṣu snānam atho dānaṃ teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca teṣu snānaṃ japo homaḥ teṣu snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ teṣu snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ teṣu snānādi yat kiṃcit teṣu snānena dānena teṣv apy andhakavṛṣṇiṣu teṣv apy annasya dātāras te sabhāṃ yadupuṃgavāḥ te samāś ca parasparam te sarve gautamīṃ prāptā te sarve tv anumanya mām te sarve atha parasparam te sarve nihatās tvayā te sarve pralayaṃ yānti te sarve matimantaś ca te sarve sarvadā bhadrā te siddhāḥ saha kiṃnaraiḥ te sugandhāḥ suveśāś ca te syuḥ sukhasya bhājanam te svapne api na paśyanti te hi tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā te ahiduṣṭaviṣajvālā- te hṛṣṭamanasaḥ sarve taijasaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ taittiraṃ śaśakāmiṣam tair apy ukte kuruṣveti tair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā tair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā tair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā tair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā tair iṣṭaiḥ saha coditaḥ tair gobhis tatra gaṅgāyāṃ tair duḥkham anubhūyate tair nirasto bhogipatir tair bhūtair abhibhūyate tair vadhyamānaḥ śastrapātair mahadbhis tair varṇair āryakādibhiḥ tair vā jaṭāsthitā gaṅgā tair vimiśrā janapadā tair vṛto munibhir muniḥ tailapāyī prajāyate tailavikrayakāś caiva tailaṃ ca tilasaṃbhavam tailābhyaṅgaṃ tathā bhogaṃ taiś ca sarvair mahīṃ caret taiś ca saṃyamibhir bhāvyaṃ taiś cāpi spardhate śarvaḥ taiś cāvalokitāṃ hārdāt taiś caitat kadanaṃ kṛtam taiś caiva kurute kāryaṃ tais tac charīram utsṛṣṭaṃ tais tatheti samīritaḥ tais tu dvādaśasāhasraiś tais tu dharmaḥ purā kṛtaḥ tais tu bhūtair vivarjitaḥ tais tu saṃyatibhiḥ saha taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā taiḥ pīyante saricchreṣṭhās taiḥ sarvair ṛṣibhis tatra taiḥ saṃsargam upaiti vai taiḥ sārdhaṃ gaccha suśroṇi taiḥ sārdhaṃ cāśramaṃ muneḥ taiḥ sārdhaṃ dakṣiṇārṇavam taiḥ sārdhaṃ nandanopamam taiḥ sārdhaṃ paramādbhutam taiḥ sārdhaṃ sa samālocya taiḥ surair agamaṃ harim tomarā haṃsamārgāś ca tomareṇa dvijottamāḥ tomaraiḥ samalaṃkṛtam tomaraiḥ samalaṃkṛtam toyakūlam apaḥ spraṣṭum toyadānām athābravīt toyapūrṇair manoharaiḥ toyaratnasamanvitaḥ toyaṃ dadyād yathāvidhi toyā caiva mahāgaurī toyāni cābhiṣekārthaṃ toyārthaṃ kūlam āśritāḥ toyāhāropabṛṃhitāḥ toyena tilamiśreṇa toyenākāśagaṅgāyāḥ toyenātmābhiṣicyate toyeśo dhanapatir antakas tvam eko toraṇāni bṛhanti ca toṣam etena me gatam toṣayantī ca taṃ guṇaiḥ toṣayantīṃ hutāśanam toṣayasva gadādharam toṣayasva nijair guṇaiḥ toṣayām āsa kaśyapam toṣayām āsa kaśyapam toṣayām āsa taṃ patim toṣayām āsa taṃ patim toṣayām āsa varuṇaṃ toṣayām āsa śaṃkaram toṣayām āsa śaṃkaram toṣayaitān samāhitaḥ toṣalāḥ kośalāś caiva toṣitas tena śaṃkaraḥ toṣitā tapasā dvija toṣyate pūjito yataḥ toṣyanti tvāṃ surottama tau gatvā punar ūcatuḥ tau gāvāv aśrupūrṇākṣau tau jitvā nṛpatir maurkhyād tauṇḍikerāś ca vikhyātās tau tathāvādinīṃ sādhvīm tau tāṃ hitvā jagattraye tau dakṣiṇottarāyāmāv tau dakṣiṇottarāyāmāv tau dṛṣṭvā tv aruṇaḥ sūryam tau dṛṣṭvā lubdhako api saḥ tau dṛṣṭvā vikasadvaktra- tau dṛṣṭvā vismito bhītaś tau devau praṇatā tadā tau parasparam āmantrya tau prākṣālayatāṃ jale tau bāhū sa ca me muṣṭiḥ tau me śaraṇyau śaraṇaṃ bhavetām tau me śaraṇyau śaraṇaṃ bhavetām tau me śaraṇyau śaraṇaṃ bhavetām tau śaṃkarau me śaraṇaṃ bhavetām tau śvānau saramāputrau tau samutpannavijñānau tau hatvā vasudevaṃ ca tyaktasarvaparigrahaḥ tyaktahiṃsrasamācārās tyaktātmānaṃ viśeṣataḥ tyaktānīmāni santi vai tyaktāḥ svapatibhiś ca ṣaṭ tyaktaiṣaṇā nirjitacittavātāḥ tyaktvā kṣaram anāmayam tyaktvā gṛhakalevaram tyaktvā cakrādikaṃ cihnaṃ tyaktvā cittaṃ śamaṃ naya tyaktvā tanuṃ doṣamayīṃ tatas tu tyaktvātmānaṃ jaṭāmātraṃ tyaktvā dehaṃ punar jātā tyaktvā dehaṃ malīmasam tyaktvā dehaṃ hariṃ smṛtvā tyaktvā dharmaṃ kulāgatam tyaktvā dhairyaṃ vimohitaḥ tyaktvā nijapuraṃ tūrṇaṃ tyaktvā pātrādikaṃ tu yat tyaktvā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma tyaktvā mānuṣyakaṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā mānuṣyam ātmabhūḥ tyaktvā meruṃ mahāgirim tyaktvā yatra naro dehaṃ tyaktvā yatra naro dehaṃ tyaktvā lajjāṃ janārdana tyaktvā sa mānuṣaṃ deham tyaktvā sa reme muditas tyaktvā snehaṃ prajākṛtam tyaktvāsmān bhagavān gataḥ tyakṣye jīvān daihikān yogayuktaḥ tyakṣye ahaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ tyajet snehaṃ dvijottamāḥ tyaje vāpi priyāṃ tanum tyajyamānaṃ priyaṃ sutam tyāgī vai bālaghātakaḥ tyāgena kṣamayā caiva tyāge api doṣāt kṛpayānudhatte atra kā bhaved vicāraṇā traya ete ca rākṣasāḥ traya ete svayonijāḥ traya eva mahārathāḥ traya eva mahārathāḥ trayam ākāśalakṣaṇam trayastriṃśat tu kāmajāḥ trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ trayaḥ putrāḥ sahasraśaḥ trayāṇām api devānāṃ trayāṇām api devānāṃ trayāṇām api devānāṃ trayāṇām api putrāṇām trayāṇām api lokānāṃ trayāṇām api lokānāṃ trayāṇām api lokānāṃ trayāṇām api lokānāṃ trayāṇām upakārārthaṃ trayāṇām upakārārthaṃ trayāṇām upakārārthaṃ trayāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ ca trayāṇāṃ ko nu pūjyaḥ syād trayīdhāma namo astu te trayīmūrtiḥ surārcitaḥ trayīmūrte namo astu te trayīvārttādaṇḍanīti- trayodaśa dvijottamāḥ trayodaśa mahābalāḥ trayodaśyāṃ bhādrapade trayo devāḥ sanātanāḥ trayo bhāgā hy adharmasya trayo abhisaṃdhitā lokā trayo lokās trayo devās trayo varṇās trayo guṇāḥ trayo varṇāḥ prakṛtyeha trayoviṃśatibhir vṛtaḥ trasadasyur mahīpatiḥ trastā devāḥ samāgatāḥ trastāṃ ca vikṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā trastāḥ śaṃbhum upāgaman trastāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ trāṇāyācintayat tadā trāṇārthaṃ mām upasthitam trāṇārthaṃ vihvalaś cāsau trātavyam adhunā mayā trātaḥ sa puruṣavyāghraḥ trātā ca dharmas tv iha mokṣadaś ca trātā na kopy asti jagattraye api trātāraṃ nātra paśyāmi trātāraṃ nādhigacchati trātāraṃ nādhigacchan vai trātāraṃ naiva paśyantī trātāraṃ naiva paśyāmi trātāraṃ prāṇināṃ nagam trātāraḥ santi munayo trātās tāpāt tvayā gāvaḥ trātu māṃ kaścid ity āha trāyate na kadācana trāyate mahato bhayāt trāyasva no adya deveśa trāsayan samado goṣṭhān trāsavihvalalocanā trāsād abhyetya jajñivān trāsād abhyetya jajñivān trāsād vipralapanti ca trāsitaṃ yac ca nāśitam trāsye tvāṃ mahato bhayāt trāhi trāhi gadāpāṇe trāhi trāhi jagannātha trāhi trāhi jagannātha trāhi trāhīti govindas trāhi trāhīty alpaśabdāḥ trāhi pāpāt samuddhara trāhi mām acyutapriya triṛṇān mocayet putraḥ trikacādvārabhūṣitam trikarmaniyatāya ca trikūṭaḥ parvataśreṣṭho trikūṭaḥ śiśiraś caiva triguṇas triguṇādhipaḥ triguṇaṃ dvijasattamāḥ triguṇād vyatirikto asau triguṇāya trimūrtaye trijagatpāvanīṃ naraḥ trijagatpāvanīṃ śaktiṃ trijaṭāya triśīrṣāya triṇāciketas trimadhus tritayaṃ jīvataḥ phalam tridaśādhipatiṃ patim tridaśānāṃ cakāra saḥ tridaśānāṃ ca vārdhakiḥ tridaśārtiharo haraḥ tridaśaiḥ saṃprasāditaḥ tridivasthāṃs tathā devān tridivaṃ samanuprāpya tridaivatyaṃ tu yat tīrthaṃ tridaivatyaṃ na dṛśyate tridaivatyaṃ mahātīrthaṃ tridaivatyaṃ satyayuge trivāraṃ susamāhitaḥ trivikramakramākrānta- trivikrama namo astu te trivikramavinākṛtāḥ trivikramāya ca namo trividhas te vyatikramaḥ trividhaṃ karma pauruṣam trividhaḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ trividhā
