ṣaṇmukhaḥ tvaṃ gatis tvaṃ pratiṣṭhā ca tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ gadī tvaṃ śarī cāpī tvaṃ gurur mama daivatam tvaṃ gurur mama mitraṃ ca tvaṃ gurus tvaṃ gurutamas tvaṃ gautami sadā pūjyā tvaṃ ca gaccha yathāsukham tvaṃ ca te pitaras tathā tvaṃ ca trāto bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ ca trāto bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ ca putro guṇākaraḥ tvaṃ ca priyasakhī nityaṃ tvaṃ ca matsadṛśī bhava tvaṃ ca śuṣkanadī bhava tvaṃ ca sarvatra viśrutaḥ tvaṃ ca saṃkarṣaṇo devas tvaṃ ca sthāpayiteti ca tvaṃ cātra kuśalā śubhe tvaṃ cāpi pāpa putrasya tvaṃ cāpi vīraṇastambas tvaṃ jagat sacarācaram tvaṃ jalanidhir āmūlaṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe nātha yad atra yuktam tvaṃ jiṣṇus tvaṃ janārdanaḥ tvaṃ jyāyān puruṣas tvaṃ ca tvaṃ jyeṣṭhas tvaṃ parāyaṇaḥ tvaṃ jyeṣṭhas tvaṃ variṣṭhas tvaṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhasva kṣaṇam atha tvaṃ tu dāsyasi nandine tvaṃ tu mṛdbhiḥ kuśair vārbhir tvaṃ tu sarvaguṇopetā tvaṃ trātā jagatāṃ nātha tvaṃ dikpālāś ca dharmāś ca tvaṃ dṛṣṭis tvaṃ parāyaṇam tvaṃ deva karuṇāsindhuḥ tvaṃ deva daśadhā sthitaḥ tvaṃ devadeva saptāsya tvaṃ daityāḥ samarudgaṇāḥ tvaṃ daivaṃ tvaṃ prabhur mahyaṃ tvaṃ dhātā tridaśapatiḥ samīraṇo agniḥ tvaṃ dhātā tvaṃ punar vasuḥ tvaṃ dhṛtātmā tvam acyutaḥ tvaṃ nabhas tvaṃ manaś caiva tvaṃ nas trātā na cetaraḥ tvaṃ nātha mokṣiṇāṃ mokṣo tvaṃ nāthavad vāraya nātha śatrūn tvaṃ nābhikamale viṣṇoḥ tvaṃ nidhānam anuttamam tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ tvaṃ no vṛttiṃ vidhatsveti tvaṃ payonidhayaḥ śailāḥ tvaṃ paras tvaṃ parasyādyaḥ tvaṃ parjanyas tvaṃ prathitas tvaṃ pālakaḥ pālayase na dīnam tvaṃ pāhi lokeśvari lokamātar tvaṃ pitā jagataḥ śaṃbho tvaṃ pippalas tvam agamas tvaṃ pīyūṣataraṃgiṇī tvaṃ punar dṛḍhabhaktitvāt tvaṃ punaḥ strī ca yakṣiṇī tvaṃ pumān strī napuṃsakaḥ tvaṃ puro yadi manyase tvaṃ pradyumnaḥ surārihā tvaṃ prabhus tvaṃ vibhuḥ śreṣṭhas tvaṃ prabhuḥ sarvabhāvena tvaṃ prabhuḥ sarvalokānāṃ tvaṃ praśādhi mahīṃ kṛtsnām tvaṃ prāṇas tvaṃ tamisrahā tvaṃ prāṃśus tvaṃ caturbhujaḥ tvaṃ bandhūn samupekṣase tvaṃ bālas tvaṃ tathā vṛddhas tvaṃ buddhiḥ prakṛtiś caiva tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ mahādevas tvaṃ brahmā paśupatir aryamā vidhātā tvaṃ bhartā me purā diṣṭo tvaṃ bhavo bhūtabhṛd bhavān tvaṃ bhavyas tvaṃ bhavatprabhuḥ tvaṃ bhūtakṛt tvam avyaktas tvaṃ bhūtabhāvano devas tvaṃ bhūtas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvaṃ bhūtiḥ saṃnatiḥ kīrtiḥ tvaṃ mayā na nimantritaḥ tvaṃ mahī tvaṃ jalaṃ deva tvaṃ muhūrtaḥ kṣaṇā lavāḥ tvaṃ yamas tvaṃ ca niyamas tvaṃ yamas tvaṃ surārihā tvaṃ yamaḥ pitṛrāṭ deva tvaṃ rakṣodhipatiḥ svayam tvaṃ rājan kiṃ nu manyase tvaṃ rudras tvaṃ durādharṣas tvaṃ lokapatir acyutaḥ tvaṃ vāmas tvaṃ pradakṣiṇaḥ tvaṃ vāyus tvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ tvaṃ vāsudevo ameyātmā tvaṃ vidyāvān vajrapāṇe tvaṃ viparyayakārakaḥ tvaṃ vipravaryas tapasā caiva yukto tvaṃ virāṭ tvaṃ suraprabhuḥ tvaṃ viśrabdhaṃ kariṣyasi tvaṃ viśvakarmā jiṣṇus tvaṃ tvaṃ viśvajetā tvaṃ śarma tvaṃ viśvayonis tvaṃ cakṣus tvaṃ viṣṇur īśajagatām upakārahetoḥ tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ hariś cakrī tvaṃ vṛtrahā namuceś cāpi hantā tvaṃ vettā copadeśakaḥ tvaṃ vetsi nūnaṃ bhagavan bhavantam tvaṃ vedavedas tvaṃ dhātā tvaṃ vedāṅgaṃ tvam avyayaḥ tvaṃ vedhās tvaṃ sureśvaraḥ tvaṃ vaidyas tvaṃ dhṛtātmā ca tvaṃ vai pumān bhavitā śakra sādho tvaṃ vai yady anumanyase tvaṃ vyaktas tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ tvaṃ vrataṃ tvaṃ paraṃ brahma tvaṃ śaraṇyas tvam akṣaram tvaṃ śaśī tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ tvaṃ śaṃkaras tvam uśanā tvaṃ śaṃbhus tvaṃ vṛṣākṛtiḥ tvaṃ śaṃbhus tvaṃ svayaṃbhūś ca tvaṃ śāśvatas tvam ajitas tvaṃ satyaṃ tvaṃ tapo janaḥ tvaṃ sarvadamano arihā tvaṃ sarvadarśanaḥ śrīmāṃs tvaṃ sarvalokarakṣārtham tvaṃ sarvaviśvasukhadas tvaṃ sahiṣṇuś ca mādhavaḥ tvaṃ saṃgare śatrubhir bādhyase ca tvaṃ saṃgrahas tvaṃ sumahat tvaṃ saṃrāḍ bhavitā rājann tvaṃ sāmyāt saṃgatā bhava tvaṃ suparṇas tvam ādimān tvaṃ suhṛt tvaṃ parāyaṇam tvaṃ senānīḥ prabho bhava tvaṃ sthāṇus tvaṃ śuciśravāḥ tvaṃ sthānaṃ samavāpsyasi tvaṃ sraṣṭā tvaṃ tathā bhoktā tvaṃ svāhā tvaṃ svadhā vidyā tvaṃ harāmṛtam uttamam tvaṃ havis tvaṃ hutāśanaḥ tvaṃ hi jñānavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ tvaṃ hi tasya vadhāyaikaḥ tvaṃ hi dhārayase lokān tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo guruḥ tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo devas tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo dhātā tvaṃ hi brahmavidaḥ kanyā tvādṛśaḥ sakṛpo yeṣu tvādṛśā vyasanāgame tvādṛśyaḥ santi cārikāḥ tvām adya vipra paśyāmi tvām anārādhya jagatāṃ tvām apy avajñāya yadīha mohāt tvām asmin mandire mama tvām ahaṃ cādya deveśa tvām ahaṃ staumi gopate tvām āhur ajam īśvaram tvām āhur vatsaraṃ budhāḥ tvām upasthāsyate śacī tvām ṛte kamalākānta tvām ṛte anyo na vidyate tvām ṛte yādavāś ceme tvām eva karuṇākaram tvām eva bhaktyā parayā bhajante tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ tvām eva sukhinaṃ prāpya tv āruroha mahī nabhaḥ tv āvikaṃ caiva bho dvijāḥ tvāṣṭraṃ tīrthaṃ tad ākhyātaṃ tvāṣṭraṃ māheśvaraṃ tathā tvāṣṭrī trailokyasundarī tvāṣṭrī devī vivasvataḥ tvāṣṭry abhyagāc ca gautamīm tv āsīc ca suraveśmani tvāṃ kaścid bhīṣaṇākṛtim tvāṃ ca devīṃ stuvanti vai tvāṃ jijñāsārtham āgatā tvāṃ tu praṇamatī vāṇī tvāṃ dātuṃ na kṣamā vayam tvāṃ dikṣu pātu vaikuṇṭho tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmasaṃbhṛtam tvāṃ deva puruṣādhamāḥ tvāṃ namasyanti ye bhaktyā tvāṃ nihatyādya bāṇena tvāṃ paśyeyus tvatpadaṃ te prayāntu tvāṃ paśye ahaṃ dvijottama tvāṃ mūrtitvaṃ samāśritam tvāṃ vahāmi sadā svāmin tvāṃ vinā kaḥ samartho atra tvāṃ vinā tāta duḥkhitaḥ tvāṃ vinā viṣṇucaraṇa- tvāṃ śrutvā dātṛtilakam tvāṃ stuvanti kṣudhāturāḥ tvāṃ snātuṃ tāni yāsyanti tv ekādaśyāṃ samāhitaḥ dakṣa ity eva nāmnā tvaṃ dakṣa eva prajāpatiḥ dakṣakratuvināśana dakṣakratuvināśanam dakṣakratuhara tryakṣa dakṣakratau pravṛtte tu dakṣacitte malīmase dakṣa duḥkhaṃ na kartavyaṃ dakṣaproktaṃ stavaṃ cāpi dakṣam āpedire tathā dakṣayajñavināśanaḥ dakṣayajñavināśaṃ ca dakṣayajñavināśārthaṃ dakṣayajñavibhedine dakṣaśāpabhayān muniḥ dakṣaś caiva prajāpatiḥ dakṣas tāḥ pradadau kanyāḥ dakṣasya kopād dhimavadgṛhaṃ sā dakṣasya ca phalaṃ kratoḥ dakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ dakṣasya ca vināśāya dakṣasya ca suraśreṣṭha dakṣasya jananī dvijāḥ dakṣasya tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ dakṣasya duhitā satī dakṣasya duhitā svadhā dakṣasya parameṣṭhinā dakṣasya putrā haryaśvā dakṣasya pūjitaṃ makham dakṣasya madanujñayā dakṣasya vai duhitari dakṣasya sumahātmanaḥ dakṣasya hi sutāḥ śreṣṭhā dakṣasyāmitatejasaḥ dakṣasyāmitatejasaḥ dakṣasyāsann aṣṭa kanyā dakṣasyaite hi dauhitrāḥ dakṣaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam dakṣaṃ so abhyaśapat punaḥ dakṣaḥ kila śubhavrataḥ dakṣaḥ prācetasaḥ punaḥ dakṣaḥ prācetaso dadau dakṣaḥ śiṣṭajanānveṣī dakṣaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ dakṣādyair munisattamaiḥ dakṣiṇaśravaṇasya ca dakṣiṇasya padasya ca dakṣiṇasyāṃ jagatpate dakṣiṇasyāṃ tathā diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi tathā dakṣiṇasyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ dakṣiṇasyodadher garbhaṃ dakṣiṇasyodadhes taṭam dakṣiṇasyodadhes taṭe dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre dakṣiṇaṃ cottaraṃ caiva dakṣiṇaṃ tīram āśritam dakṣiṇaṃ dvāram īdṛśam dakṣiṇaṃ dvāram īdṛśam dakṣiṇaṃ dharmasaṃhitam dakṣiṇāgner anantaram dakṣiṇāgrān kuśān kṛtvā dakṣiṇāṅge tathātmānaṃ dakṣiṇānilasevite dakṣiṇāpatham etya saḥ dakṣiṇāpathavāsinaḥ dakṣiṇābhimukhāv ubhau dakṣiṇābhimukhī tvarā dakṣiṇābhimukho gacched dakṣiṇām adadāt somas dakṣiṇāyanavac ca tat dakṣiṇārṇavagāminī dakṣiṇārṇavam abhyāgāt dakṣiṇārṇavavindhyayoḥ dakṣiṇārṇavasaṃsthitāḥ dakṣiṇārthaṃ tu sā dattā dakṣiṇāśāpatir yamaḥ dakṣiṇāśāpatiṃ cāpi dakṣiṇāśāpatiṃ śāntaṃ dakṣiṇāśāpatiḥ prabhuḥ dakṣiṇāśāpatiḥ prabhuḥ dakṣiṇāśāpater vākyaṃ dakṣiṇāśāpates tadā dakṣiṇāśāṃ tato gatāḥ dakṣiṇāśāṃ vrajāmy aham dakṣiṇāhṛdayo yogī dakṣiṇāṃ ca yathāśaktyā dakṣiṇāṃ te bhuvaṃ daduḥ dakṣiṇāṃ bhṛgunandanaḥ dakṣiṇāṃ vidhivat prabhuḥ dakṣiṇāṃse vyavasthitaḥ dakṣiṇe keśavasya tu dakṣiṇe gandhamādanam dakṣiṇe gandhamādanaḥ dakṣiṇe ca tathā pāre dakṣiṇe cāpi vindhyasya dakṣiṇe cottare tathā dakṣiṇe tu prakīrtitāḥ dakṣiṇe tu vyavasthitaḥ dakṣiṇena tu te sarve dakṣiṇena tu te sarve dakṣiṇe niyato naraḥ dakṣiṇeneṣudhī divye dakṣiṇenaitya bhāratam dakṣiṇe parato yasya dakṣiṇe madhusūdanaḥ dakṣiṇe yat tu patitaṃ dakṣiṇodadhisaṃsthitaḥ dakṣiṇopakrame bhūyo dakṣeṇa dūṣite deve dakṣeṇa yajamānena dakṣo jajñe mahātejāḥ dakṣo devaṃ prajāpatiḥ dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ dakṣo nāma mahābhāge dakṣo api manasā devaṃ dakṣo bhaktyā prajāpatiḥ dakṣo yajñaṃ surān api dakṣo rudram abhidviṣan dakṣo labdhvā bhavād varam dagdha eva dhruvaṃ bhadre dagdhatīramahātarum dagdhapakṣāv ubhau śrāntau dagdhabhogā nipetus te dagdhaśailopamākṛtim dagdhasphuṭatvacākīrṇair dagdhasphuṭatvacākīrṇair dagdhasya prathamāṅkuram dagdhaṃ mā dagdhum arhasi dagdhānāṃ virahāgninā dagdhāny ādityaraśmibhiḥ dagdhā vārāṇasī yathā dagdhāḥ sarve muniśreṣṭhāś dagdhāḥ sūryasya tejasā dagdhvā kāmaṃ tato viprāḥ dagdhvā tad balam ojasā dagdhvā tu vasudhātalam daṇḍakaṃ tatra puṇyadam daṇḍakaṃ mudgaraṃ śūlam daṇḍakādhipate ripuḥ daṇḍakāraṇyamadhyasthāṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam āpnuyāt daṇḍakāraṇyam ucyate daṇḍakāraṇyam ucyate daṇḍakāraṇyam eva ca daṇḍakārāś cāsikārāḥ daṇḍake gautamīṃ nadīm daṇḍake asthāpayat tadā daṇḍadhāro raṇapriyaḥ daṇḍadhṛk cakradaṇḍaś ca daṇḍanītis tathāparā daṇḍapātanipātena daṇḍapātapradakṣiṇaiḥ daṇḍavat praṇipatya ca daṇḍavat praṇipatya ca daṇḍavat praṇipatyorvyāṃ daṇḍavat praṇipātaiś ca daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiś ca daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiś ca daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiś ca daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiś ca daṇḍahasto naraḥ sadā daṇḍaṃ pātitavān mayi daṇḍaṃ samāgṛhya kṛtānta āgād daṇḍidaṇḍāya vai namaḥ daṇḍinaṃ mṛtyur abravīt daṇḍine gadine namaḥ daṇḍine śaṅkukarṇāya daṇḍī provāca vismitaḥ daṇḍī muṇḍas tridaṇḍadhṛk daṇḍī mṛtyum atāḍayat daṇḍenābhihatas tava daṇḍo devakṛtas tatra daṇḍo mayy eva saṃviśet datta ity api vikhyātaḥ dattakaś cośanā tasya dattapretodapiṇḍāś ca dattam annaṃ na yanti te dattam ārādhayām āsa dattam ity eva jānīhi dattam ity eva śākalyo dattam etan mayā tubhyaṃ dattavanto varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dattavān bhāskaras tadā dattavān manasepsitam dattavāṃs tridaśaśreṣṭho dattasya dīyamānasya dattaṃ ca tripurāriṇā dattaṃ mamānyair anyebhyo dattaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā nṛpa dattaṃ havir yena surā bhajante dattaḥ pūrvaṃ kilānaghāḥ dattaḥ śakreṇa tuṣṭena dattaḥ somo atha durvāsāḥ dattāṅgasaṅge phalavartma tat syāt dattā ca hariṇā tatra dattātidattau balinau dattā tena vasuṃdharā dattātreya iti khyātaḥ dattātreyaḥ pratāpavān dattātreyeṇa dhīmatā dattāny ātmakulodbhavaiḥ dattā bhūr bhūpates tataḥ dattā mayeyaṃ te putra dattārdhatapasaḥ sarve dattāvadhānā kācic ca dattāḥ pitrā tava prāṇā dattāḥ sa tasyām āhlādam dattāḥ sa tasyām āhlādam datteyam ṛṣiśārdūla datte sthāne vipravarya śṛṇuṣva datto atriccyavanas tathā datto hi vārṣikaḥ sarvo dattvā kanakam eva ca dattvā ca varam atyugro dattvā cāhaṃ na gṛhṇāmi dattvā jagāma pitaram dattvā jagāma śikharaṃ dattvā tu bhojanaṃ tebhyaḥ dattvā dānaṃ ca viprebhyo dattvā dānaṃ dvijātibhyo dattvā dānāny anekaśaḥ dattvā dānāny anekāni dattvā deveṣu sākṣatam dattvāpaḥ sumanokṣatān dattvā pāpāt pramucyate dattvā pitṛṣu taiḥ sārdhaṃ dattvā pitṝṇāṃ piṇḍāṃś ca dattvā bhavati yo dharmaḥ dattvā yaś carate mahīm dattvā rājyaṃ vibhīṣaṇe dattvārghyaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ ca dattvā viprasya dānāni dattvā viṣaṃ saṃharan nīlakaṇṭha dattvā vai svargagāminaḥ dattvā śuddhaṃ ca kāñcanam dattvā sa priyayā saha dattvā somaṃ tadā somo dattveha sukham edhate dattvaivam arghyaṃ vidhivad dattvorjasvī bhaven naraḥ dadaty arthibhya aṇv api dadarśa kandaraṃ tatra dadarśa kubjām āyāntīṃ dadarśa kumbhaṃ na ca tāṃ taṭasthāṃ dadarśa kṛṣṇam akliṣṭaṃ dadarśa cakṣur unmīlya dadarśa cakṣur devasya dadarśa ca balāt tataḥ dadarśa ca vibuddhvā sā dadarśa ca sugandhāḍhyaṃ dadarśa ca hariṃ tatra dadarśa cālpadantāsyaṃ dadarśa tatra caivobhau dadarśa taṃ kṛśaṃ dvijam dadarśa taṃ vaṭaṃ bhūyo dadarśa taṃ suduṣprekṣaṃ dadarśa tān samudrāṃś ca dadarśa tridaśādhipaḥ dadarśa dvārakāpuryāṃ dadarśa nṛpatis tadā dadarśa paramaṃ kṣetraṃ dadarśa purato harim dadarśa pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ dadarśa pṛthulocanā dadarśa yadunandanam dadarśa yavanaś ca tam dadarśa yogam āsthāya dadarśa ramaṇīyāni dadarśa vanam uttamam dadarśa śakrabhavanān dadarśa śiśurūpiṇam dadarśa sa mahīpālaḥ dadarśa sāgaraṃ ramyaṃ dadarśāñjanasaṃkāśāṃ dadarśātivibhīṣaṇam dadarśāntaram acyutaḥ dadarśendrotsavārambha- dadarśelo mṛgīṃ tadā dadasva cāstrāṇi munipravīra dadasvānyasya kasyacit dadaṃśuś cāpi te kṛṣṇaṃ dadāti ca juhoti ca dadāti manasīpsitam dadāti yajate yajñaiḥ dadāti sa mahāviṣṇu- dadāti sumahāphalam dadāty abhimatān kāmān dadāty eva tato rājan dadāmi nacirād aham dadāmi bhāgaṃ na tu śaṃkarāya dadāmi sarvaṃ viprarṣe dadāmīti matiṃ dadhe dadāmīty abhyabhāṣata dadāmīty avadat tadā dadāmīty evam abravīt dadāv aṅgirase tārāṃ dadāv arghyaṃ tato rājā dadāv arghyaṃ pitāmaha dadāv ahārayad babhrur dadāv ājñāṃ dvijākṛtiḥ dadāsi mahyaṃ yady ājñāṃ dadāha kārtavīryasya dadāha capalo deśaṃ dadāha tāṃ purīṃ cakraṃ dadāha balavadbhītaś dadur bālāya te cāpi daduḥ śailabaliṃ tataḥ dadṛśāte tapasyantaṃ dadṛśāte mukhāc cāsya dadṛśuś cāpi te tatra dadṛśus taṃ surastriyaḥ dadṛśus te hayaṃ baddhaṃ dadṛśus toraṇāny atra dadṛśuḥ pādape tasmin dadṛśuḥ pūtanotsaṅge dadṛśuḥ śītasalilāṃ dadṛśuḥ śokakātarāḥ dadṛśuḥ sarva eva te dadṛśe ca mahādrumau dadṛśe antargatas tadā dadṛśe vāruṇaṃ chattraṃ dadṛśe sa tathaiva tau dadṛśe sātiśobhanam dadṛśe so alpakān narān dadau ca prapitāmahe dadau cānyān sa viṣayān dadau jalaṃ pretarūpāya pitre dadau jitvā vasumatīṃ dadau tasmin mahāyajñe dadau tasmai muniśreṣṭhāḥ dadau tasyākṣayaṃ vittaṃ dadau daśa sa dharmāya dadau narakanāśaṃ ca dadau pāyasapūrvakam dadau piṇḍān sa śūkaraḥ dadau bāhulatāṃ skandhe dadau bhūmyāḥ pradakṣiṇām dadau bhrātre narapatiḥ dadau maunavimocanam dadau lokapitāmahaḥ dadau varaṃ ca tuṣṭo asau dadau varṣāṇi sapta saḥ dadau vāsāṃsi bhaktitaḥ dadau viprāya nityaśaḥ dadau śakrāya vasudhāṃ dadau satrājite taṃ vai dadau sa daśa dharmāya dadau sa puruṣottamaḥ dadau samāhitas tebhyo dadau savyena cāsanam dadau sa śiśupālāya dadau suvarṇasaṃghātaṃ dadau so api sudharmākhyāṃ dadau svad iti cābruvan dadau hṛṣṭamanāḥ kṛṣṇas dadyāc chrāddhaṃ trayodaśyāṃ dadyāc chrāddhe vicakṣaṇaḥ dadyāt kanyāṃ surūpiṇe dadyāt tu maṇike trayam dadyāt tebhyaḥ samodakān dadyāt tebhyo vimatsaraḥ dadyāt puṣpāṇy amūni ca dadyād adeyaṃ tv idam avratāya dadyād annaṃ yathocitam dadyād abhimukhaḥ sadā dadyād arghyaṃ dine dine dadyād bahubaliṃ tataḥ dadyād vastrāṇi kambalān dadyād vastrādikaṃ dvijāḥ dadyād vottarataḥ śuciḥ dadyān nāndīmukhād ṛte dadhat sudarśanaṃ dhīmān dadhānam asite vastre dadhāra kaśiras tadā dadhāra dakṣiṇe haste dadhārāmbumayaṃ vapuḥ dadhikarṇodapānakam dadhikulyāś ca dadṛśuḥ dadhikṣīraghṛtonmiśraṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ tyajet dadhigomayabhojanaḥ dadhi cāpy upahārya vai dadhidugdhajalaiḥ samam dadhidugdhajalodadhīn dadhipāyasamāṃsādyair dadhipuṣpaphalākṣataiḥ dadhimaṇḍodakaś cāpi dadhimaṇḍodakena tu dadhivāhanaputras tu dadhi hṛtvā bakaś cāpi dadhīcidehaṃ tu vidārya yūyam dadhīciputroditam ādareṇa dadhīcim abruvan devā dadhīcim ity uttaram agnikalpam dadhīcir agnimān nityaṃ dadhīcir apy āha gabhastim ojasā dadhīcir apy āha surāribhītyā dadhīcir iti vikhyāto dadhīcir jātasaṃharṣaḥ dadhīcir vākyam abravīt dadhīcisūnur dharmātmā dadhīcisūnur munir ugratejā dadhīciṃ pippalāśanaḥ dadhīciṃ muniśārdūlaṃ dadhīciḥ putram āśvāsya dadhīciḥ prātitheyī vā dadhīciḥ saha bhāryayā dadhīcer maraṇaṃ sādhvyās dadhīceḥ sā priyā nityaṃ dadhnā tu tarpaṇaṃ kṛtvā dadhyau brahma paraṃ viprāḥ dadhyau mīlitalocanā dadhre nātisphuṭaṃ vapuḥ danujā rākṣasās tathā danuḥ provāca nārada danor vaṃśavivardhanāḥ dantadhāvanam añjanam dantavaktro vidūrathaḥ dantavakro mahābalaḥ dantaśatruś ca śatrujit dantaśūle galagrahe dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ dantān vidarśayan mūḍho dantibhir dantabhūṣaṇaiḥ danturo naṣṭanāsākṣo damite kāliye nāge damito ahaṃ tvayācyuta daminaḥ śuṣmiṇaḥ snehā damena niyamena ca dambhakā nīlakālakāḥ dambhamāyānurakte ca dambhaś cāpi gṛhe sataḥ dambhaṃ tyaktvā nṛpottamaḥ dambhaṃ prājñopasevanāt dambhācāro atinirghṛṇaḥ dambhānṛtavivarjitāḥ dambhābhimānaṃ taikṣṇyaṃ ca dambhārthaṃ lajjayā tathā dambhena darpādibhir apy anekaiḥ dayā cātra mahāmune dayā bhūteṣu cānaghāḥ dayārthaṃ tasya meghās tu dayālor apatat tatra dayāvān anupaśyati dayāvān priyakṛt tathā dayā samastabhūteṣu dayitaṃ syāt surārcitam dayitānakadundubheḥ daridratvaṃ ceśvaratvaṃ daridrayā ca sā proktā daridraḥ krīḍanaiḥ śubhe daridrā krīḍanais tvaṃ hi daridrāṇāṃ tapasvinām daridrāṇāṃ tapasvinām daridrāyā vacaḥ śrutvā daridrāyāś ca lakṣmyāś ca daridrā vākyam abravīt daridrāvairakāry abhūt daridrāṃ vākyam abravīt daridrāṃ vākyam abravīt daridre śṛṇu me vacaḥ daridraivaṃ vaco abravīt daridro vyādhito api vā darvāyāḥ suvrato abhavat darvāś colāḥ sakeralāḥ darśanaṃ guṇakīrtanam darśanaṃ ca bhavādṛśām darśanaṃ tv asamaṃ tayoḥ darśanaṃ na kadācana darśanaṃ narasiṃhasya darśanaṃ pākaśāsanaḥ darśanaṃ baladevasya darśanaṃ vāsudevasya darśanaṃ śūlapāṇinaḥ darśanāt sparśanād vāpi darśanād eva mānavāḥ darśanād bhuktimuktidaḥ darśanād vedavid bhavet darśane śravaṇe vāpi darśanaiś ca śanir yathā darśayantī kvacit kvacit darśayām āsa taṃ devaṃ darśayām āsa daityasya darśayām āsa daityāya darśayām āsa nārada darśayām āsa bhāskaraḥ darśayāśu vilamba mā darśayāṃ cakratur vīrāv darśayitvā mahānidhim darśas tatra nimittaṃ tu darśitaṃ bālaceṣṭitam darśito mānuṣo bhāvo daśakalpaśatāvartam daśa kalpān dvijottamāḥ daśakīṭaiś ca dāruṇaiḥ daśa koṭisahasrāṇi daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān daśa cāpi caturdaśa daśa cāṣṭau ca bho dvijāḥ daśa cāṣṭau ca saṃgrāmān daśajanma yadā teṣāṃ daśa jāyeta jīvakaḥ daśa tānīndriyoktāni daśa devyo dadhus tataḥ daśadvādaśabhir vāpi daśadvādaśamāsārdha- daśadvādaśavarṣāṇāṃ daśa dve ca samāhitaḥ daśadhā tat punaḥ kṣatram daśadhā dyotayan diśaḥ daśadhā bhāsayan diśaḥ daśanair aṅkuropamaiḥ daśanair aṅkuropamaiḥ daśan vai mānuṣān nityaṃ daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ daśapañcāśvamedhānāṃ daśa putrān manor imān daśa putrān mahāsattvāṃs daśa putrā mahātmanaḥ daśa putrā mahaujasaḥ daśa putrās tu viśrutāḥ daśa putrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ daśabāhur mahātejā daśabhyas tu pracetobhyo daśabhyas tu pracetobhyo daśamanvantaraṃ dvijāḥ daśamī tasya yā mūrtir daśamedhāni vājinaḥ daśamedhāni vājinaḥ daśa me mānasāḥ putrāḥ daśamyāṃ pūrṇakāmatām daśa yāvac ca saṃkhyayā daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ daśarātram abhojanam daśalakṣaṇasaṃyukto daśavargam asaṃśayam daśa varṣaśatāni ca daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣāṇi jīvati daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca daśa varṣāṇi vai bakaḥ daśaviṃśabhujās tathā daśaviṃśabhujās tathā daśa saṃpūrṇatāṃ yānti daśasāhasram ekaikaṃ daśahīnās tathāpare daśānām aśvamedhānām daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ daśāparāṇi tīrthāni daśābhojya dvijottamāḥ daśārṇeṣu kumāryeṣu daśārhasya suto vyomā daśāvṛtyā paraiṣiṇaḥ daśāśvamedhasya phalāni dadyuḥ daśāśvamedhaṃ kedāraṃ daśāśvamedhāñ jārūthyān daśāśvamedhikaṃ tīrthaṃ daśāśvamedhikaṃ tīrthaṃ daśāśvamedhikaṃ viduḥ daśāśvamedhikaṃ samyak daśāśvamedheṣṭiphalaṃ labheta daśāṣṭadoṣarahitair daśāsyam aham abravam daśāhaṃ brāhmaṇas tiṣṭhed daśāhe brāhmaṇaḥ śuddho daśottarāṇi pañcaiva daśottarāṇy aśeṣāṇi daśottareṇa payasā dasyavo loṣṭahāriṇaḥ dasyubhir laguḍāyudhaiḥ dasyubhyo ante tadudbhavaḥ dasyuhastaṃ gamiṣyatha dasyuhastaṃ varāṅganāḥ dasyūnāṃ nihateśvarāḥ adahat kakṣam ivānalaḥ dahantaṃ pāpanāśanam dahanty aśeṣaṃ trailokyaṃ dahet kṣipraṃ mahīm imām dahed gandhasamanvitam dahed devasya cāgrataḥ dahyate ca nimajjyate dahyate tatra yenoktaṃ dahyate tatra suciraṃ dahyate bhidyate varṣa- dahyate svarṇahārakaḥ dahyante tatra saṃkṣiptā dahyante tṛṇavahnibhiḥ dahyamānas tadaṃśubhiḥ dahyamānas tadaṃśubhiḥ dahyamānaṃ tu tair dīptais dahyamānā viśanti ca dahyamānāḥ kṣudhāgninā dahyamānais tu gantavyaṃ dahyamānais tu gantavyaṃ daṃpatī dadṛśe tataḥ daṃpatī duḥkhapīḍitau daṃpatī saṃbabhūvatuḥ daṃpatī surasattamau daṃpatyor abhavan mithaḥ daṃpatyor mudator girau daṃpatyoḥ karuṇaṃ yamaḥ daṃpatyoḥ śṛṇuyād vākyaṃ daṃpatyoḥ śṛṇvatos tadā daṃpatyoḥ sthitayo rahaḥ daṃṣṭrayā gāṃ samudrasthām daṃṣṭrayā yaḥ samuddhṛtya daṃṣṭrayollikhya dharaṇīm daṃṣṭrākarālavadanaṃ daṃṣṭrākarālavadano daṃṣṭrākuṇḍaṃ viṣṇutīrthaṃ daṃṣṭrāgreṇa samāhatya daṃṣṭrābhir bhṛśam ulbaṇaiḥ daṃṣṭrābhir bhṛśam ulbaṇaiḥ dākṣāyaṇī lokamātā dākṣāyaṇī saiva śivā dākṣāyaṇyas tathādityo dākṣāyaṇyā iti śrutvā dākṣāyaṇyā dvijottamāḥ dākṣāyaṇyā śrute vākye dākṣāyaṇyāṃ dvijottamāḥ dākṣiṇātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ dākṣiṇātyās tv amī deśā dākṣiṇyena ca dakṣiṇā dāḍimaṃ bījapūrakam dāḍimaṃ māgadhīṃ caiva dāḍimān bījapūrakān dāḍimair bījapūrakaiḥ dāḍimaiś ca tamālaiś ca dātavya iti me matiḥ dātavyam evārthine kiṃ vicāryam dātavyaṃ bhaktiyuktāya dātavyaṃ mantrapūrvakam dātavyā gurudakṣiṇā dātavyā ca svasā tathā dātavyaiva tvayā guro dātā ca hanti sarvaṃ yo dātā caiva jale sthitaḥ dātā caiva pitāmahaḥ dātā tatra vinaśyati dātā te adya mahāmate dātā dīpyati cāpy evaṃ dātā prasanno astu mamāndhakāriḥ dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā dātā bhūtahite rataḥ dātā bhoktā priyaṃvadaḥ dātā bhoktā bhaved yajvā dātā yajvā ca vīraś ca dātāraṃ ca tadārthibhyaḥ dātāraṃ bhaktito dhanam dātāraṃ yajñatapasāṃ dātāraḥ satyavādinaḥ dātāraḥ sarvaratnānāṃ dātāro no abhivardhantāṃ dātāsi tenāśu śaraṇya citte dātāsmi tam asaṃśayam dātum arhanti tān sarvān dātuś cāpy anayo bhavet dātuṃ mahānty aṣṭavapūṃṣi dhatte dātuṃ śakyeta nārakāḥ dātṛbhyo hy akṣayaṃ tat syāt dātṛmūrte namo astu te dātṝṇāṃ phalakṛd bhavet dātṝn ghnanty asurās tataḥ dātyūhasārasākīrṇaiḥ dātre ca śubhasaṃpadām dādhīcaṃ śivasaṃnidhau dādhīcaṃ surasattamāḥ dānakarmatapoyuktaḥ dānakarma dhanādhipaḥ dānadayātapodeva- dānaprabhāvād yajñaiś ca dānam akṣayyam uditaṃ dānam aśrotriye yathā dānamuktākaraṃ ghoraṃ dānam eva kalau yuge dānavasya vadasva me dānavā jayino abhavan dānavā darpasaṃpūrṇāḥ dānavānām athodbhūtiṃ dānavānāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ dānavānāṃ balaṃ viṣṇuś dānavānāṃ samāśrayam dānavāntacikīrṣayā dānavān baladarpitān dānavāpsarasaḥ surāḥ dānavā yakṣarākṣasāḥ dānavā vinipātitāḥ dānavāś ca tam abhyayuḥ dānavāś ca hataujasaḥ dānavās te mahābalāḥ dānavās tv atidāruṇāḥ dānavās tvaṃ tathā yakṣās dānavāṃś ca sadā khagaḥ dānavāḥ sumahābalāḥ dānavidbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthā dānavena talaṃ nīto dānavena durātmanā dānavendraṃ nihanmi tam dānavebhyo bhayaṃ ghoraṃ dānavaiś ca balādhikaiḥ dānavaiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ dānavo atha hiraṇyakaḥ dānavau pāpacetasau dānavau madhukaiṭabhau dānavrataparā yānair dānaśīlaparāyaṇāḥ dānaśauṇḍaḥ priyālāpī dānasya ca phalaṃ viprāḥ dānahomavivarjitaḥ dānahomādikaṃ kiṃcid dānaṃ kuryur atandritāḥ dānaṃ ca pitṛtarpaṇam dānaṃ ca vividhākāraṃ dānaṃ dadyāc ca śūdro api dānaṃ dātuṃ ca yaṣṭuṃ ca dānaṃ dehi prayatnataḥ dānaṃ dharmaś ca śasyate dānaṃ pūjanam īkṣaṇam dānaṃ viprāya dīyate dānaṃ viprāya nārpitam dānāgnityāganiṣṭhuraḥ dānād godānam uttamam dānāni cātra dīyante dānāni caiva deyāni dānāni tu pravakṣyāmi dānāni dadyād icchāto dānena ghṛtadhenvāś ca dānena yat phalaṃ smṛtam dānair yajñais tapobhiś ca dāntenādhyātmaśīlinā dānto brāhmaṇasatkartā dāpayiṣyati yaḥ piṇḍāṃs dāmodaramukhaṃ yayau dāmodaro asau govindaḥ dāmnā gāḍhaṃ tathodare dāmnā baddhvā tadā madhye dāmbhikās te bhaviṣyanti dāyakaṃ pāpanāśakam dāyakau mama bālakau dāyādas tasya vaikarṇo dāyādyam indrād ājahrū dāyādyam iha dhāryate dāyinī kāmarūpiṇī dārayan dharaṇītalam dāravān hemabhūṣitān dārasaṃyogayuktasya dārāñ śṛṇudhvaṃ viprendrāḥ dārāṃs tu tasya viṣaye dārikāṃ nijamandiram dārite matsyajaṭhare dāridryaṃ kleśa eva ca dārukaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ dārukaṃ prāha keśavaḥ dāruṇaḥ svena karmaṇā dāruṇair yamakiṃkaraiḥ dāruṇo dāruṇākṛtiḥ dāruṇo narake vāsaḥ dāruṇo mūṣiko naraḥ dāruṇy agnir yathā tailaṃ dārudantāsthiśṛṅgāṇāṃ dāruvac cāpi niścalaḥ dāraiḥ putrair vayasyaiś ca dāraiḥ putrair vayasyaiś ca dāvadagdhamahīruham dāvapraveśo api sukhāya nūnaṃ dāsatvam agamat pūrvaṃ dāsavargeṇa saṃskṛtam dāsītvam āptā vada tat- dāsīdāsebhaturaga- dāso abhūs tvaṃ dvijanmaja dāsyaty eva kṛpākaraḥ dāsyanti jagatāṃ pate dāsyanty anye bhavān naiva dāsyamānaṃ tu dattavat dāsyase yadi me kāmaṃ dāsyase varam īpsitam dāsyāmas te tapo mahat dāsyāmi svasutaṃ tava dāsyāmo havyavāhana dāsyāmy abhimatān kāmān dāsye naiva sutāv imau dāsye aham eṣa doṣo me dāsye ahaṃ manasaḥ priyam dāsye ahaṃ yad abhīṣṭaṃ vo dāsyo vastrādikaṃ ca yat dāhamārjanagokulaiḥ dāṃpatyaṃ prītivardhanam dik krameṇa prakīrtitā dikpālāḥ sāyudhāś caiva dik pūrvā muniśārdūlā dikṣu khyātā dvijottamāḥ dikṣu toye pure nage dikṣu sarvāsu bho dvijāḥ dikṣu sarvāsu viśrutāḥ digantaraṃ nabho bhūmir digīśvaratvaṃ draviṇaprabhutvam digīśvarāñ jitya surārcitasya digdeśād āgatān rājño digbhyaḥ prācyādiṣu kramāt ditigarbhasya vai śāntiṃ ditijai rākṣasaiḥ saha ditir apy āha bhartāraṃ ditir namrābravīd idam ditir vinaṣṭaputrā vai ditiśāpam agastyasya ditiṃ cāgastyam eva ca ditiṃ cāpi śivaḥ prāha ditiṃ provāca bhagavān ditiṃ saṃbodhayām āsa ditiḥ śayanam āviśat diter garbho api vavṛdhe diter danor abhiprāyaṃ aditer vilokyātha parāṃ samṛddhim dite varaya suvrate diteḥ putrāś ca danujāḥ diteḥ sutānāṃ ca mahāsurāṇāṃ dityāṃ garbham adhārayat dityāḥ kukṣiṃ samāviśat dityāḥ putradvayaṃ jajñe dinam ekam ahaṃ manye dinaṃ saṃvatsaras tathā dināni katicid bhadre dināni daśa pañca ca dināvasāne śarvaryām dine dine varṣasaṃkhyā parasmiṃl dilīpa iti dhārmikaḥ dilīpas tanayas tasya dilīpas tasya tanayaḥ dilīpasya tu dāyādo divam ācakrame vibhuḥ divam āropayām āsa divam āvṛtya tiṣṭhataḥ divasaḥ ko vinā sūryaṃ divasānāṃ ca saṃkṣayam divasān ekaviṃśatim divasānte guṇān etān divase divase gate divasthā himabhānunā divaspate namas te astu divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ caiva divaṃ ca munisattamāḥ divaṃ prāpte mahīpatau divaṃ bhuvam athāpi ca divaṃ saṃtyajya medinīm divaṃ hitvāyugakṣayāt divākaram ariṃdamam divākaraṃ punar dorbhyāṃ divākaro devamayas divā rātrau pracaṇḍayā divā rātrau prayatnena divā rātrau varānanāḥ divā rātrau sadā priye divā rātrau samāyuktāḥ divārkaraśmayo yatra divā svapneṣu syandante divi bhūmau sadā vāso divi rūpaṃ harer yat tu divi śabdo mahān abhūt divistho api sadā cendras divispṛg abhavad dhvaniḥ divodāsa iti khyātaḥ divodāsas tu dharmātmā divodāsasya putras tu divodāsahṛtaṃ balāt divodāsahṛtaṃ balāt divodāsaḥ prajeśvaraḥ divodāsaḥ prajeśvaraḥ divodāsād dṛṣadvatyāṃ divodāsena bāleti divodāsena bāleti divodāso narādhipaḥ divo hutāśanaḥ prāṇaḥ divaukasaś cāpi ca yogasāṃkhyāḥ divyakanyāvṛtā yānti divyakuṇḍaladhāriṇam divyagandharvanāditaiḥ divyagandharvanādinā divyagandharvanādinā divyagandharvanādinā divyagandhānuliptāṅgāḥ divyagandhānuliptāṅgāḥ divyagandhānulepanā divyagandhānulepanām divyagandhānulepanāḥ divyagandhānulepanāḥ divyagītavarair dhanyaiḥ divyaghaṇṭānināditaiḥ divyacandanaliptāṅgaṃ divyaceṣṭāvighātakṛt divyajñānopapannās te divyatoyābhir eva ca divyadehas tato bhavet divyadehāḥ kuṇḍalino divyapādapamūleṣu divyapītāmbarāya ca divyabhaumāntarikṣāṇi divyamālyavibhūṣitam divyamālyavibhūṣitāḥ divyamālyāmbaradharaḥ divyamālyāmbaradharā divyamālyāmbaradharā divyamūrtidhṛtāḥ surāḥ divyaratnavicitrāṇi divyaratnavicitrāṇi divyaratnavibhūṣitam divyaratnasamāyukta divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān divyarūpadharā tanvī divyarūpadharā devī divyarūpadharo abhavat divyarūpaṃ dadau mune divyarūpaṃ samāsthāya divyarūpā mahābalāḥ divyalokam avāpsyasi divyavastradharaṃ kāntaṃ divyavastradharāḥ śubhrāḥ divyavastradharāḥ sarvā divyavastradharāḥ sarvāḥ divyavastrayugacchannā divyasaṃbhārasaṃyuktaiḥ divyasaṃhananā caiva divyastrīgaṇasevitaḥ divyastrībhogabhūṣitāḥ divyastrīśatayuktena divyasraganulepanā divyasraganulepanau divyasraggandhabhūṣaṇā divyasraggandhabhūṣitam divyaṃ kanakhalaṃ tathā divyaṃ garbham iti dvijāḥ divyaṃ ca karma bhavataḥ divyaṃ ca nṛgadhūmākhyaṃ divyaṃ tv amṛtam akṣaram divyaṃ devāvṛdhaṃ nṛpam divyaṃ brahmasaraṃ puṇyaṃ divyaṃ rūpam idaṃ deva divyaṃ varṣasahasrakam divyaṃ snānaṃ dvijottamāḥ divyaṃ snānaṃ hi tat smṛtam divyaṃ syamantakaṃ nāma divyā āṅgiraso mune divyākṣahṛdayajño vai divyāṅgado divyavimānacārī divyāṅgahārasragudārarūpaḥ divyā devagaṇānvitāḥ divyā devagaṇair vṛtāḥ divyāni vādyāny atha vādayanti divyānīti hi naḥ śrutam divyān gaccha nareśvara divyānnapānabhakṣyāṇāṃ divyān bhogān kāminībhiḥ sametān divyān bhaumāntarikṣagān divyābharaṇabhūṣitā divyābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ divyābhiḥ stutibhir devaḥ divyālaṃkārabhūṣaṇā divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaḥ divyālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ divyālaṃkārasaṃyuktaṃ divyāś cāpsaraso abruvan divyāṃ puṇyām imāṃ kathām divyair adbhutadarśanaiḥ divyair gandhaiś ca mālyaiś ca divyair vastrair alaṃkṛtāḥ divyaiḥ paramavājibhiḥ divyau divyaparākramau divyauṣadhiprabhāvena diśam āvṛtya paścimām diśaś ca daśadhā dadhe diśaḥ pālaṃ sudhanvānaṃ diśaḥ prākrāmad acyutāḥ diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā śīrṣṇaḥ diśaḥ saṃnādayann iva diśābhiḥ pradiśābhiś ca diśāsu vidiśāsu ca diśāsu vidiśāsu ca diśāṃ pālān atha tataḥ diśi dakṣiṇapūrvasyāṃ diśo jitvā divaṃ prāptaḥ diśo vijitya sarvāś ca diśo vijetuṃ śaryātau diśo vijetuṃ sa jagāma rājā diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti sādaram diṣṭyā vo matir utthitā diṣṭyā sa kṣayam āgataḥ dīkṣāmayaṃ sa kavacaṃ dīkṣāmātreṇa kṛṣṇasya dīkṣāṃ cakre nareśvaraḥ dīkṣāṃ cakre purodhasā dīkṣāṃ tāṃ durvahāṃ bhuvi dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm dīkṣitaṃ taṃ nṛpaśreṣṭhaṃ dīkṣitaṃ yajñasadasi dīkṣitaḥ sagaro nṛpaḥ dīkṣito vidhivan nṛpaḥ dīkṣito vipradeśo asau dīnasya pāpagrastasya dīnā kadrūm abhāṣata dīnānāthatapasvinām dīnānāṃ pālane rataḥ dīnāndhakṛpaṇādiṣu dīnāndhakṛpaṇān dṛṣṭvā dīnārtakaruṇābandhuḥ dīnārtakṛpaṇādiṣu dīnārtārtiharaṃ vibhum dīpa ekaḥ prasūyate dīpadātā naro nityaṃ dīpadātā svargaloke dīpadā yānti yānaiś ca dīpadīptā yathākṛtiḥ dīpadhūpapradāne ca dīpamāleva rājate dīpayanti mahātmānaṃ dīpayantī sabhām imām dīpayanto diśo daśa dīpavac cendriyodbhavam dīpahartā naro bandhaṃ dīpaṃ dadāti yo nityaṃ dīpaṃ naivedyam eva ca dīpaṃ prajvālayed bhaktyā dīpair naivedyakair varaiḥ dīpair naivedyakair varaiḥ dīpo ayaṃ pratigṛhyatām dīptajihvo arkanayano dīptatejasam antataḥ dīptatejā mahābalaḥ dīptaśūlamahocchrayam dīptāgnisamalocanam dīptāṅgārasamujjvalam dīptāny amitatejasaḥ dīptāsyo mitabhāṣitaḥ dīptimantaḥ prapakṣādyā dīptimanto bahuśrutāḥ dīptimān kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ dīptis tadvac ca dṛśyate dīpyate gosahasreṇa dīpyamānaṃ suvarcasam dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā dīpyamānaḥ svavapuṣā dīpyamānā ivāgnayaḥ dīpyamānā yathāgnayaḥ dīpyamāno na kampate dīpyamāno nirandhanaḥ dīpyamāno nirandhanaḥ dīyatām anulepanam dīyatām iti sāgaram dīyatām ugrasenāya dīyatāṃ bhujyatām iti dīyatāṃ bhujyatāṃ pūjā dīyatāṃ bhujyatāṃ vāpi dīyatāṃ manasepsitam dīyate annaṃ punaḥ punaḥ dīyate mām anusmaran dīyate śarkarāvṛtam dīyamānaṃ varaṃ śubham dīyase adya mayā viṣṭe dīrghakālaṃ dvijottamāḥ dīrghakālena mahatā dīrghabāhur dilīpasya dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt dīrgham āyur avāpnoti dīrgham āyur bhaviṣyati dīrghamuṣkāḥ karālāsyā dīrghamuṣkāḥ karālāsyā dīrghasattraṃ hayapadaṃ dīrghāyur athavaiśvaryaṃ dīrghāyur iti bhāṣate dīrghikādyair alaṃkṛte dīrghikābhis taḍāgaiś ca dīrghikābhis taḍāgaiś ca dīrghikāśatasaṃghātais dīrghikāḥ puṣkariṇyaś ca dīryamāṇā vrajanti te dīvyetām abhisaṃrabdhau dīvye ahaṃ tena nṛpate dīvye ahaṃ vai tvayā rājan dukūlam ahataṃ tathā dugdhā veyaṃ vasuṃdharā dugdhā sasyāni bhūbhṛtā duduhur dharaṇīṃ kila duduhe asau payo mahat dudoha ca mahauṣadhyo dudoha pṛthivīṃ tataḥ dundubhir meghanirghoṣān dundubhiś ca mahāśailo dundubhyaḥ prāṇadan divi durācārāś ca nihitāḥ durācāro hi puruṣo durātmātitvarānvitaḥ durātmā daśanāyudhaḥ durātmānaṃ kulādhamam durādharṣo bhaven naraḥ durāpam atidurgaṃ ca durāpam atidurgaṃ ca durgamaṃ pāpakarmaṇām durgamaṃ pāpakarmaṇām durgamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam durgamaṃ sthānam āpnoti durgas tv eṣa mataḥ panthā durgā cāntaḥśilā tathā durgātīrthaṃ ca viśrutam durgeyam akṛtātmabhiḥ durjayaṃ durdharaṃ dṛptaṃ durjayaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ durjayāṃ munisattamāḥ durjñeyaṃ nigamair api durjñeyo hi surāsuraiḥ durdamasya suto dhīmān durdamaṃ damanaṃ śubhraṃ durdamena mahātmanā durdamena mahātmanā durdamo nāma viśrutaḥ durdamo nāma viśrutaḥ durdarpo vijayo jayaḥ durdarśaḥ pratibhāti naḥ durdarśāḥ kecid ābhānti durdaivonmūlitodyamāḥ durdharair akṛtātmabhiḥ durdharair yamakiṃkaraiḥ durdharair yamakiṃkaraiḥ durdharo durvaśo nityo durdharṣam amarair api durdharṣāṇāṃ surair api durnayaṃ tasya taṃ jñātvā durnirīkṣas tadābhavat durnirīkṣaṃ durāsadam durnirīkṣaṃ durāsadam durnirīkṣaṃ surendrāṇāṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ suragaṇair durnirīkṣyāṃ surair api durnirīkṣyo arivṛndānāṃ durnivārāḥ śarīriṇām durnītam etad govinda durbalaś ca yathā viprāḥ durbalā viṣayaglānā durbhagā grahapīḍitā durbhikṣakarapīḍābhir durbhikṣam eva satataṃ durbhikṣaṃ vāpy avarṣaṇam durbhikṣeṇa tu pīḍitaḥ durmanā iva lakṣyase durmukhaḥ sumukhas tathā duryodhanasya tanayāṃ durlabhatvaṃ ca mokṣasya durlabhatvaṃ ca mokṣasya durlabhaṃ ca tathā cet syāt durlabhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu durlabhaṃ paramaṃ kṣetraṃ durlabhaṃ mama tac cāpi durlabhaṃ yat surāsuraiḥ durlabhaṃ yo avamanyate durlabhaṃ suravandita durlabhān iha laukikān durlabhāṃ tvāṃ varānane durlabhe puruṣottame durlabhe sādhusaṃmate durvācyam api kathyate durvāraṇo durviṣaho durvāsasaḥ priyo bhrātā durvāsā yad uvāca ha durvāsā lomaśas tathā durvijñeyagatir viṣṇus durvijñeyā surāsuraiḥ durvṛttanidhanārthāya durvṛttā nihatā daityā duścaraṃ devadānavaiḥ duścaraṃ devadānavaiḥ duścarmā vyaṅgakekarau duṣkaraṃ tava darśanam duṣkarā tatra no muktiḥ duṣkālaḥ kālanāśanaḥ duṣkṛtasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā duṣkṛtaṃ karma garhate duṣkṛtaṃ karma bho dvijāḥ duṣkṛtaṃ na guror brūyāt duṣkṛtāntakarīṃ raudrāṃ duṣṭacakṣur hato vāpi duṣṭabhaktāśino bhavet duṣṭasaṅgād adoṣiṇaḥ duṣṭahantṛtvam eva ca duṣṭā dānapate mama duṣṭānāṃ nigrahārthāya duṣṭānāṃ madvadhaiṣiṇām duṣṭānāṃ śāsanād rājā duṣṭāntaḥkaraṇāḥ kalau duṣṭāśayaṃ dambharuciṃ duṣṭe tvaṃ nimnagā bhūyā duṣṭodvṛttaniṣūdana duṣṭo naṣṭaḥ payonidhau duṣpāra duradhiṣṭhita duṣprajñā balagarvitāḥ duṣprajñāś cāpare deva duṣprajñāḥ kecid ābhānti duṣpraṇītāntarākṛtiḥ duṣpraṇītena manasā duṣprekṣaṃ taṃ svakaṃ kāntaṃ duṣyantam atha suṣmantaṃ duṣyantasya tu dāyādaḥ duṣyantasya tu dāyādo duṣyantasya mahātmanaḥ duṣyantaṃ pauravaṃ cāpi dustarā cākṛtātmabhiḥ dustarām akṛtātmabhiḥ dustare cātibhairave dustare romaharṣaṇe dustare lomaharṣaṇe duhitā saṃyatā nāma duhitur devadevena duhitṛtvam anuprāptā duhitṛtvaṃ ca me gaccha duhitṛtvena jāhnavīm duhitṛtvena jāhnavīm duhitṛtve apy akalpayat duhitre svaṃ caruṃ dadau duhyamānā vasuṃdharā duḥkhakopasamāviṣṭo duḥkhakleśakaraḥ śaśvat duḥkhakleśakaraḥ śaśvat duḥkhajātasya paṇḍitaiḥ duḥkhajvarasamīritam duḥkhapraṇodī bhavatīti satyam duḥkhaprāye aticañcale duḥkham atyantam āgatā duḥkhalobhamayi devi duḥkhasaṃyogabheṣajam duḥkhasaṃsāratāraṇam duḥkhaṃ jahau sarvam amitrasaṃbhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ tyaktvā śamaṃ vraja duḥkhaṃ tyaja nṛpātmaja duḥkhaṃ vijñāya bho dvijāḥ duḥkhaṃ sahasraśo bhedair duḥkhaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ ca duḥkhaṃ saṃhṛtya yatnataḥ duḥkhaṃ smṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ duḥkhāgamaṃ karmagatiṃ duḥkhāni cānubhūtāni duḥkhāni maraṇe nṛṇām duḥkhāni yāny anekāni duḥkhāny eva sukhānīti duḥkhānvitā vai rurudur bhṛśārtāḥ duḥkhānvitā sā suciraṃ vilapya duḥkhānvitāsau samupājagāma duḥkhārtaḥ patitaḥ kvacit duḥkhārtaḥ patitaḥ kvacit duḥkhārtāyā viśeṣataḥ duḥkhārtāḥ sarvadehinaḥ duḥkhārtināśana hare duḥkhitaś ca jagatpate duḥkhitasya ca dīnasya duḥkhitaṃ śaraṇāgatam duḥkhitāḥ kena mokṣaś ca duḥkhito atīva cābhavat duḥkhito nṛpatir mune duḥkhito vākyam abravīt duḥkhināṃ śaraṇaṃ nānyad duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭo duḥkhenākrandamānaiś ca duḥkhenākrandamānaiś ca duḥkhaikaphalahetunā duḥkhodvegāt sā papātātha pṛthvyāṃ duḥśāsanādīn bhūriṃ ca duḥśīlā duṣṭaśīleṣu duḥsahaṃ ca durantaṃ ca duḥsahaṃ ca durantaṃ ca duḥsahāṃ tridaśair api duḥsaho duratikramaḥ dūtavaktreṇa māṃ prati dūtaṃ ca preṣayām āsa dūtaṃ prāha janārdanaḥ dūtaṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa dūtānāṃ vacanaṃ nṛpāḥ dūtā rājñe nyavedayan dūrapranaṣṭanayano dūrasthā cāntikasthā ca dūraṃ yāty eṣa me patiḥ dūrād abhyāgataṃ śrāntam dūrād dūrataraṃ mune dūrīkṛto harir yena dūre sthite nṛtyagīta- dūre sthitvā mauninaś ca dūṣayanti narā harim dūṣitau puruṣāv api dṛḍhaprākāratoraṇā dṛḍhayantrārgaladvārā dṛḍhaṃ śarīram āpnoti dṛḍhaṃ śarīram āpnoti dṛḍhaḥ paramavājibhiḥ dṛḍhāyuś ca vanāyuś ca dṛḍhāśvo jyeṣṭha ucyate dṛptaśārdūlavikramaḥ dṛptair daityagaṇair guptaṃ dṛśyate candramaulivat dṛśyate jagad āturam dṛśyate tatra vai mahat dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā dṛśyate bhramarājitaḥ dṛśyate yatra dṛśyante dṛśyate lokasaṃsthitiḥ dṛśyate so ayam acyutaḥ dṛśyante ca mahāmune dṛśyante tatra siddhāś ca dṛśyante tanumadhyamāḥ dṛśyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ dṛśyante nāśahetavaḥ dṛśyante puruṣā deva dṛśyante puruṣāḥ striyaḥ dṛśyante muniśārdūlāḥ dṛśyante munisattamāḥ dṛśyante mṛṣṭakuṇḍalāḥ dṛśyante śubhalakṣaṇāḥ dṛśyante śubhalakṣaṇāḥ dṛśyante sarvadehinām dṛśyante sumanoharāḥ dṛśyante ha dṛḍhavratāḥ dṛśyamānaś ca tair dīnair dṛśyamānaś ca tair dīnair dṛśyādṛśyaṃ ca kiṃcana dṛśyādṛśyaṃ carācaram dṛśyādṛśyā sarasvatī dṛśyādṛśyena cātmanā dṛśyādṛśye hy anugata- dṛśyāpi syāt sarasvatī dṛśyā babhūvuḥ sumanoharāṅgāḥ dṛśyās tu padmotpalamīnapūrṇāḥ dṛśyās tu vṛkṣeṣu sucitrapakṣāḥ dṛṣadvatīsutaś cāpi dṛṣadvatyās tu saṃjajñe dṛṣṭadoṣā hayā mayā dṛṣṭapūtena vartmanā dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ carācaram dṛṣṭamātraś ca tenāsau dṛṣṭamātre vaṭe tasmiṃś dṛṣṭam etat purānagha dṛṣṭavanto nṛpātmajāḥ dṛṣṭavān asmi nārada dṛṣṭaś cānto mayā bhṛśam dṛṣṭasūryaṃ hi tad vāri dṛṣṭas tābhir adhokṣajam dṛṣṭas tair vrajavāsibhiḥ dṛṣṭaṃ keneti pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ caivānubhūtaṃ vā dṛṣṭaṃ tatra mayācyuta dṛṣṭaṃ paraṃ hi deveśa dṛṣṭaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam dṛṣṭaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam dṛṣṭaḥ paśyed aharahaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kila bhūyaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ pāpo dṛṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasenātha dṛṣṭā tu toyārtham upādravantī dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavilakṣaṇam dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeṣṭadaṃ sarva- dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeṣṭasiddhidam dṛṣṭādya sākṣāt saritāṃ savitrī dṛṣṭā yadukumārakaiḥ dṛṣṭāvanāmitā dhyātā dṛṣṭāsmābhis tripāvanī dṛṣṭāḥ syuḥ surasattamāḥ dṛṣṭipātahataujasau dṛṣṭipratyavarodhanam dṛṣṭir vibhrāmyate trāsāt dṛṣṭir vibhrāmyate trāsāt dṛṣṭiṃ ninye tato dvijāḥ dṛṣṭe aṅguṣṭhe duṣṭabuddhyā dṛṣṭe jagaddhātari hāsam uccaiḥ dṛṣṭe tasminn ahaṃ dṛṣṭo dṛṣṭe hi tasmin na punar viśanti dṛṣṭo ananta iti prabhoḥ dṛṣṭo mūrkheṇa vai punaḥ dṛṣṭo yair bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ dṛṣṭormiśatasaṃkule dṛṣṭo asmābhir aho cirāt dṛṣṭau saṃkarṣaṇena ca dṛṣṭvā ṛṣir abhāṣata dṛṣṭvā kaliṅgarājaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā kāśipateḥ pure dṛṣṭvā kṛtyam acintayat dṛṣṭvā kṛpānvitau gṛhya dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ naro bhaktyā dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇāṅgasaṃbhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇo mahābalam dṛṣṭvā kratuvaraṃ śubham dṛṣṭvā gaṅgāṃ maharṣayaḥ dṛṣṭvā gopījanaḥ sāsraḥ dṛṣṭvā gauḥ kāmadohinī dṛṣṭvā ca kapilaṃ harim dṛṣṭvā ca tatra me mātā dṛṣṭvā ca madhusūdanam dṛṣṭvā cāṇūrakṛṣṇayoḥ dṛṣṭvā cintāparo nṛpaḥ dṛṣṭvā cukopa papraccha dṛṣṭvā tatra ṛṣīn kṣāmān dṛṣṭvā tadā munir devaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad duṣkṛtaṃ karma dṛṣṭvā tal liṅgam avyagraḥ dṛṣṭvā taṃ devadeveśaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpatiśreṣṭho dṛṣṭvā taṃ paramātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ puruṣottamam dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhāvagambhīraṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ munim āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān dhārmikān devaḥ dṛṣṭvā tān nṛpatiḥ śrīmān dṛṣṭvā tān vidhivad bhaktyā dṛṣṭvā tām āha saṃdṛṣṭo dṛṣṭvā tāṃ pratimāṃ divyāṃ dṛṣṭvātisumanoharau dṛṣṭvā tu tapaso vīryaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu taṃ yathānyāyam dṛṣṭvā tu sarvasya phalasya siddhim dṛṣṭvā te ṛṣayo abruvan dṛṣṭvā tenaiva saṃcintya dṛṣṭvā tau brāhmaṇau tatra dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ tathā yūyaṃ dṛṣṭvādityāgnivarcasaḥ dṛṣṭvā dinakaraṃ devaṃ dṛṣṭvā devīm upāgatām dṛṣṭvā daityapatiḥ śūro dṛṣṭvānantaṃ sakṛd bhaktyā dṛṣṭvā nandinam abravīt dṛṣṭvā naro añjaliṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā naro vā nārī vā dṛṣṭvā nārāyaṇaṃ naram dṛṣṭvā nirāmayaṃ sthānaṃ dṛṣṭvāniruddhaṃ ca tato dṛṣṭvā nemuḥ sureśvarāḥ dṛṣṭvā pāpāt pramucyate dṛṣṭvāpūrṇāṃs tato yajñān dṛṣṭvā pūṣā samabhyagāt dṛṣṭvā praṇamya taṃ bhaktyā dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣatas tathā dṛṣṭvā balasya niryāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvābravīt sutaṃ rājā dṛṣṭvā sa mātāpitarau dṛṣṭvā savismayo bhūtvā dṛṣṭvā savismayo mene dṛṣṭvā saṃkṣubdhahṛdayāś dṛṣṭvā saṃjñā vivasvataḥ dṛṣṭvā sā tasya tad vīryaṃ dṛṣṭvā suśīlā kadanaṃ mahāntam dṛṣṭvā skandaṃ yayau dhārā- vimāninaḥ devān paśye athavāgniṃ vā devān pitṝn ṛṣīṃś caiva devān pitṝṃs tathā cānyān devān prati maheśvaraḥ devān yajñabhujaś cakre devān sarvān anukramāt devāpikaruṇākaraḥ devāpi mārge muhyanti devāpir abhavan muniḥ devāpir iti viśrutaḥ devāpir gautamīṃ gataḥ devāpir jātavedasam devāpir bāhlikaś caiva devāpir vākyam abravīt devāpivacanaṃ śrutvā devāpiḥ kṛtyam asmarat devāpiḥ sa surān prāpya devāpe bhaktavatsalaḥ devāpeḥ sarvam abhavad devā manuṣyāḥ paśavas devā yakṣāḥ sapannagāḥ devā yato abhavan sarve devāya vasuretase devārayaḥ kṣayaṃ nītā devārayo māṃ dviṣatīha bhadre devārir aparājitaḥ devārīṇām abhūt tadā devārīn atibhīṣaṇān devārthe kriyamāṇāni devālayaṃ caidyataruṃ devālaye mahābuddhe devā viprā gireḥ sutām devā viṣṇupurogamāḥ devā vai dānavā mithaḥ devāś ca ṛṣayas tathā devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ sarve devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ sarve devāś ca ṛṣayo amalāḥ devāś ca ṛṣayo vākyaṃ devāś ca gāvas tatpāpān devāś ca tuṣitā nāma devāś ca dānavāś cāsan devāś ca dānavāḥ sarve devāś ca pitaro cābhūtarajasas devāś cāśvāsitās tvayā devāś cintāparāyaṇāḥ devāś caikonapañcāśat devāś caiva sanātanāḥ devāś caivāsurāś caiva devāsuragaṇānāṃ ca devāsurapitṝn api devāsuramanuṣyaiś ca svaratham ārūḍhās devi karmaphalodayam devi kiṃ kṛtyam etat te devi kiṃ tapasā lokāṃs devi tan nānyathā bhavet devi tvāṃ varayāmy aham devi devatvam aśnute devi dharmārthatattvajñe devi pitrā tv anujñātaḥ devi me pitaraḥ śāpāt devi śīghreṇa kālena devi śailaśilātale devī krodhasamākulā devī jāmbavatī cāpi devī duścaracāriṇī devī pṛthvīti cocyate devī prāha vṛto asi me devīm avocaj jagad astam eti devīm ādityāvabhāsas devīvākyarataḥ sadā devīvivāhasamaye devī sā vyagamad brahman devī himagirīndrajā devīṃ ca varadāṃ śivām devīṃ devaṃ ca duḥkhārtā devīṃ prekṣya viśeṣataḥ devīṃ bālendutilako devair muktaṃ sahasradhā devair yasya pratiṣṭhitam devair yuktaḥ svamandiram devair vanditadehāya devair vijñāpito devo devaiś ca ṛṣibhis tathā devaiś ca nirmitaṃ dehaṃ devaiś ca prahito dūtaḥ devaiś devaiḥ sametair yuyudhe devaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtam devaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtam devaiḥ sarṣigaṇaiḥ saha devaiḥ saha marudgaṇaiḥ devaiḥ saha śatakratuḥ devaiḥ sahendrair muniyakṣasiddhair devotsave mātur ajaḥ padāgraṃ devo dadarśa śirasātha śilāṃ vahantam devo devān kratunā paryabhūṣat devodyānāni sarvāṇi devodyāne nandane saṃbhajāmaḥ devo dhanvantaris tadā devo nārāyaṇaḥ svayam devo nārāyaṇo abravīt devo manovāñchitasaṃpradātā devo mānuṣyam eti ca devo yaḥ saṃśritas tasmin devo vā dānavo vā tvaṃ devo vā dānavo vāpi devo asau viśvataścakṣur devau kiṃ karavāṇi vām devau tasyām ajāyetām devau tuṣṭuvatur mudā devau tau karuṇātmakau devau vā mānuṣau vāpi devau vaivasvatau smṛtau devyaṅguṣṭhaṃ kare aspṛśat devyā utsaṅgavartinam devyā jijñāsayā śaṃbhur devyā tathaiva tatprāptau devyā nandīśvarasya ca devyā manyukṛtaṃ jñātvā devyā manyukṛtaṃ buddhvā devyā manyupramārjakaḥ devyā vai sahitāya ca devyā sahomayā devas devyāḥ krodhād vinirgatā devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā devyāḥ priyārthaṃ bhaganetrahantā devyāḥ śailendrasattamaḥ devyāḥ samaṃ tu bhagavāṃs devyāḥ samīpam āgatya devyai nadyai pṛthak pṛthak deśakālaṃ ca buddhimān deśakālādidoṣeṇa deśakālādisaṃyoge deśakālānuvartinī deśatyāgaṃ karotv ayam deśadoṣāt kāladoṣān deśadharmagato rājā deśadharmās tathaiva ca deśam anyaṃ dhvajī rathī deśam iṣṭaṃ nayaty āśu deśaṃ kośaṃ balaṃ rājyaṃ deśaṃ tīrtham itas tataḥ deśaṃ paśyantu yajñiyam deśaḥ kālaś ca sarvadā deśaḥ puṇyatamo abhavat deśaḥ puṇyatamo hi saḥ deśād deśāntaraṃ yātau deśānām iti viśrutāḥ deśānāṃ tad dhi puṇyadam deśān etān anādṛtya deśān yāsyanti duḥkhitāḥ deśāpekṣā tathobhayam deśikaprerakavyākhyā- deśe kṛṣṇasya cāntike deśe dāsyāmahe sarve deśe deśe pṛthak pṛthak deśe nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ deśe anyasmiṃs taporatā deśe puṇyatame caiva deśeṣu vidyādharabhūṣiteṣu deśe sa puruṣottamaḥ deśe sarvaguṇānvite deśo abhivyaṅgya ucyate deśo asau puṇyaśīlānāṃ dehakartā praśāntātmā dehajaṃ karmajaṃ tathā dehajenāgninā sadyaḥ dehatyāgas tvayoditaḥ dehatyāgo naraiḥ kāryaḥ deham anyat prapadyate deham anyat prapadyate deham āśliṣya sattamāḥ dehaviparyayam etya sukhī syāt dehavaiklavyatāṃ caiva dehaśuddhiṃ vidhāya ca dehasaṃskāravarjitāḥ dehasthāḥ pañca devatāḥ dehasthāḥ sarvadehinām dehasya madhye hṛdayaṃ dehaṃ ca śiraso apekṣi dehaṃ cāpy amaraṃ putra dehaṃ tad apatad bhuvi dehaṃ tad amṛtaspṛṣṭaṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā narottamāḥ dehaṃ tyajanti puruṣās dehaṃ bhittvā daityapateḥ dehaṃ samarthaṃ dharmayuktaṃ tv avāpya dehād deham avāpnoti dehād dehasahasrāṇi dehāntare kathaṃ tasyāḥ dehānte te padam āyāntu śaivam dehān bhittvā tathā śubhān dehi gā upakāriṇaḥ dehi tvaṃ pṛthave rājñe dehi tvaṃ mama śatruhan dehi dīvyāmahe vayam dehi devi manojñāni dehi dehīti taṃ prāha dehi dehīti bhāṣantaḥ dehi daityapate mahyam dehinas tāta jāyate dehinām aham eva tu dehinām iha durlabham dehinām upajāyate dehināṃ dehakartre ca dehināṃ maraṇaṃ varam dehināṃ maraṇaṃ varam dehino dvijasattamāḥ dehi no abhayakāraṇam dehi mārgaṃ nagapate dehi me garuḍābhayam dehi me tridaśārcita dehi me tridaśeśāna dehi me deva savitar dehi me manasepsitam dehi me śatruhantāram dehi me saṃmitāṃ bhūmiṃ dehi rājendra nānyena dehi hatyāṃ prathamato dehīti vacanadvārā dehī prāṇair vimucyate dehī prāṇair vimucyate dehī mānuṣyakaṃ dvijāḥ dehenāpi mayā grāha deheṣv eva hi pañcadhā dehotsarge jagāmāsau deho devyā punas tatra daiteyabalavāhyena daiteyamallāś cāṇūra- daiteyaś ca upādravat daiteyā dharaṇītale daiteyānāṃ baleḥ sutaḥ daiteyān yātudhānāṃś ca daiteyā rākṣasās tathā daiteyair dānavais tathā daiteyaiś ca mahābalaiḥ daityagardabhadehaiś ca daityagarbhasrāvigarjī daityadānavakanyābhir daityadānavadāraṇam daityadānavanāśinīm daityadānavarakṣasām daityadānavarākṣasān daityadānavarākṣasāḥ daityadānavasaṃghāṃś ca daityadānavasaṃyogāj daityadānavasiddhānāṃ daityadehaṃ tathā kuru daityadviṣo nyastaśastrāḥ kṛtārthāḥ daityanāśanam eva ca daityapakṣopakāriṇā daityapūjyāni nārada daityamallam amitrajit daityarājo abhavat purā daityavaryo mamāra ca daityavidyādharoragāḥ daityaś cāyaṃ mahābalaḥ daityasainye guhe jite daityahantā sa eva ca daityaṃ vacanam abravīt daityaṃ so atibalaṃ dṛṣṭvā daityaḥ pañcajano nāma daityāṅganānāṃ nayanāntarāṇi daityācāryo jagāma ha daityāñ jayasi saṃgrāme daityānām atha siddhānāṃ daityānām adhipaś cāsīd daityānām ādipuruṣaś daityānāṃ ca guruś cāsīd daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ vai daityānāṃ pūrvajo balī daityānāṃ yoganāśāya daityānāṃ vadhalakṣaṇā daityānāṃ vigraho mahān daityān ditir danuś cogrān daityān mānuṣadehena daityān hatvā nagasthitān daityā babhūvur balino daityā yakṣāḥ puṇyajanā daityāyādaityarūpiṇe daityāś ca jagmuḥ svasthānaṃ daityāś ca danujāś caiva daityāś ca dānavāś caiva daityāś ca sumahābhaṭāḥ daityā hariṣyanti mahāpravṛddhās daityā hiṃsānuraktāś ca daityāṃś ca danujāṃs tathā daityenoktaḥ svakaṃ vapuḥ daityendrāṇāṃ mamopari daityeśo varuṇāya tam daityeśvara mahābāho daityeśvarasya devarṣe daityeṣu ca muniśreṣṭha daityo gataḥ svena balena yuktaḥ daityoragaiś ca bhujyante daityo ariṣṭas tathā paraḥ daityo vṛṣabharūpadhṛk daityo vṛṣabharūpadhṛk daivataṃ tvaṃ hi śāśvatam daivatānāṃ cakāra ha daivatūryāṇy anekaśaḥ daivaprabhāvāt tapasa daivayogād ariṃdamāḥ daivaṃ kṛtayuge tīrthaṃ daivaṃ kṣatram asi brahman daivaṃ tat sārvakāmikam daivaṃ dharmārtham eva ca daivaṃ pitryam athāpi ca daivaṃ vā tīrtham eva ca daivaṃ vinānyan na nṛṇāṃ samartham daivāni muniśārdūla daivī putra tayoḥ śubhā daivī vāk tāv ubhau prāha daivī vāg abravīt tadā daivī vāg abravīd evaṃ daivī vāg abhavac chubhā daivī vāg abhavat tatra daivī vāg abhavat tadā daivī vāg aśarīriṇī daivīṃ prakṛtim āsādya daivīṃ vācam amanyata daive niyoge pitrye ca daive pitrye ca karmaṇi daive mahāvīryamatau śubheyam daive varṣe saṃkhyayā vai sahasre daiveṣv eva pradeśeṣu daivair varṣasahasrais tu daivyam apy atha mānuṣam dogdhā ca bhagavān raviḥ dogdhā ca suruciḥ kṣīraṃ dogdhā tv airāvato nāgas dogdhā merur mahāgiriḥ dogdhā rajatanābhas tu dogdhā rajatanābhas tu dogdhāraṃ cānupūrvaśaḥ dogdhāraḥ kṣīram eva ca dogdhā śālas tu puṣpitaḥ dodhavīti diśo daśa dorbhyāṃ na cotpāṭayituṃ śaśāka doṣahāniś ca kevalā doṣān doṣaśatair api doṣān sarvāṃś ca bho dvijāḥ doṣāspadībhūtam adoṣayuktam doṣāṃś ca sarvān saguṇo hy atītaḥ doṣiṇāṃ tu paretānāṃ doṣo nābhibhaved vrajam doṣo lobhādikaṃ na ca dauhitraś caiva somasya dauhitrāya dadau rukmī dauhitrī hetir eva ca dyāvāpṛthivyau na ca bhuktimuktī dyāṃ vai bhuvaṃ ca rundheyaṃ dyutimān puṣṭimāṃs tathā dyutis tapasyaḥ sutapās dyutiḥ puṣṭiḥ prabhā vasuḥ dyūtamadyāmiṣādīni dyūtas tasyātmajo abhavat dyūtād vanaduho jajñe dyūtenaiva mahādyute dyotayantī diśo daśa dyor bhuvaḥ prabhavo avyayaḥ dyaur jyotsnā āśiṣaḥ svastir dyaur mūrdhā khaṃ diśaḥ śrotre drakṣyate tāṃ bhavān adya drakṣyase vādya niścitam drakṣyāmi yat paraṃ dhāma drakṣyāmīti mukhaṃ sthitā dravanti bhūtāny apayānti cārayaḥ dravantīm anvadhāvata dravarūpe bhaviṣyathaḥ dravituṃ māṃ samāyāte dravyakarmaguṇārambhaḥ dravyaṃ hy ahīnamanaso dravyād dravyasya nirvṛttir dravyāntā ca tathā matiḥ dravyair uccāvacais tathā dravyaiś cānyair varair budhaḥ draṣṭavyas tena bhagavān draṣṭavyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ draṣṭavyāni mayā yuṣmat- draṣṭavyo devakīsutaḥ draṣṭavyo na kadācana draṣṭavyo mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ draṣṭavyau mānanīyau ca draṣṭā caiva yathātatham draṣṭā sa pātā sa tu nāśakartā draṣṭā hi tāṃ bhavān adya draṣṭum abhyāyayuḥ prītyā draṣṭum arhasi śaṃkara draṣṭum āgāc chatakratuḥ draṣṭum īśaṃ tu taṃ prabhum draṣṭuṃ gato munivara draṣṭuṃ jagāmātha nadīṃ supuṇyām draṣṭuṃ te vismayāviṣṭā draṣṭuṃ na virarāma tau draṣṭuṃ mātulam abhyagāt draṣṭuṃ māṃ śaṃkaraṃ harim draṣṭuṃ munivaraḥ prāyād draṣṭuṃ yāti tato nityaṃ draṣṭuṃ vaivasvataṃ yamam draṣṭuṃ sukhaś ca saumyaś ca drākṣānīlakapitthakam drākṣālakucakharjūrair drāvitā vasavo diśaḥ drutam antaḥ śarīreṇa drutaṃ niḥsārito mayā drutaḥ praskhalito yayau drupadasya pitā prabhuḥ drumakṣayam atho buddhvā drumayoḥ patanaṃ tathā drumaṃ dṛṣṭvā mudānvitaḥ drumāṇāṃ pāpakāriṇaḥ drume asmin sukhaśītale druhyasyānor yadoś caiva druhyaṃ ca turvasuṃ caivāpy druhyaṃ cānuṃ ca puruṃ ca druhyuś ca naicchat tāṃ dattāṃ druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruṃ ca druhyoś ca tanayo rājan druhyoś cānor yados tathā droṇo yatra mahauṣadhyaḥ drohī vadhyo muner api draupadīva purā satī dvayam eva prakīrtitam dvayoḥ saṃbandha iṣyate dvaṃdvam eti ca nirdvaṃdvas dvaṃdvaṃ caivāniruddhaṃ ca dvaṃdvānāṃ viprayogaṃ ca dvaṃdvair na yatra bādhyante dvātriṃśan mūrdhni vistṛtaḥ dvādaśasthāsu mūrtiṣu dvādaśākṣaratatparāḥ dvādaśākṣaramantreṇa dvādaśākṣaramantreṇa dvādaśātmā ravir dakṣaḥ dvādaśābdaphalapradam dvādaśābhyantare caiva dvādaśāsan surottamāḥ dvādaśāhaṃ mahākratum dvādaśāhena kṣatriyaḥ dvādaśe ahani māse ca dvādaśaiva jagatpate dvādaśaiva tu gās tebhyo dvādaśaiva pṛthaktvena dvādaśaiva samāhitaḥ dvādaśaivodakumbhāṃś ca dvādaśyāṃ gṛham etya ca dvādaśyāṃ jayalābhaṃ ca dvādaśyāṃ dvādaśaiva tu dvādaśyāṃ puruṣottamam dvādaśyāṃ puruṣottamam dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣasya dvāparaṃ yugam āsādya dvāparānte harer janma dvāpare cārdhataḥ kāle dvāpare caikadaivikam dvāpare tac ca māsena dvāpare yajñadāne ca dvābhyāṃ pṛthag ariṃdama dvābhyāṃ saṃvatsarābhyāṃ tu dvārakām ājagāmātha dvārakām ugrasenādīn dvārakāyāṃ tathārjunam dvārakāyāṃ vasan prabhuḥ dvārakāvāsināṃ dvijāḥ dvārakāṃ ca mayā tyaktāṃ dvārakāṃ ca mahodadhiḥ dvārakāṃ tatra nirmame dvārakāṃ madhusūdanaḥ dvārakopari saṃsthitaḥ dvāravatyā viniṣkrāntāḥ dvāravatyāṃ kva yāto asāv dvāravatyāṃ janas tadā dvāravatyāṃ tataḥ śauriṃ dvāravatyāṃ nyavedayat dvāravatyāṃ bhavāñ janam dvārasthitaṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ dvāraṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ dvāraṃ yāmyaṃ ca sattama dvāraṃ vakṣyāmi bhīṣaṇam dvārāṇy āhārasiddhaye dvāri jātam aśokaṃ ca dvāreṇa praviśanti vai dvāreṇa praviśanti vai dvāv imāv atha panthānau dvāviṃśatiś ca narakā dvāviṃśatiś ca narakā dvāv ṛkṣau somavaṃśe asmin dvāv etau viśvabāndhavau dvāv eva ca parīkṣitau dvikālakṛtabhojanaḥ dvikālam agnihotraṃ ca dvikālaṃ nopabhuñjīta dviguṇaṃ ca rajo jñātvā dviguṇā kāñcanī bhūmiḥ dviguṇās te parasparam dviguṇīkṛtayajjñeyaḥ dviguṇena dvijottamāḥ dviguṇena samantataḥ dviguṇena samantataḥ dviguṇo yasya vistaraḥ dvijam ādāya sarvatra dvijarūpadharāv ubhau dvijavarya bravīhi tān dvijaśuśrūṣaṇenaiva dvijaśuśrūṣaṇe yuktā dvijaśuśrūṣaṇe yuktā dvijaṃ rājā dvipaṃ matvā dvijaḥ punar uvācedaṃ dvijā āste akhilātmakaḥ dvijātibhyo annam uttamam dvijātir dīkṣitaḥ kalau dvijātivaryātimahānubhāva dvijātisaṃśrayaṃ karma dvijātīnāṃ kṛtādiṣu dvijātīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ dvijān adhyāpayet tathā dvijānāṃ vīrudhāṃ caiva dvijān bhavadbhir yadi yoṣid ekā dvijābhyām abhivardhitaḥ dvijā vājasaneyikāḥ dvijāś ca tatra dṛśyante dvijāś cāṇḍaṃ ca tad vṛtam dvijāś cāsīt suduḥkhitam dvijāś caivāhutāgnayaḥ dvijāś coktavatī sakhīm dvijāṃś ca bhojayām āsuḥ dvijāḥ karmamayo aparaḥ dvijāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ dvijāḥ sa divyayā gatyā dvijāḥ saptarṣayas tathā dvijendrā gadato mama dvijendrāḥ paramātmanaḥ dvijebhyaḥ kṣatriyo api hi dvijebhyo vedamukhyebhyaḥ dvijebhyo vedavṛddhebhyo dvijo nārāyaṇaṃ tathā dvijo bhavati saṃskṛtaḥ dvijo bhavati saṃskṛtaḥ dvijo mohasamanvitaḥ dvijo vā kṣatriyo bhavet dvijo vāri samāviśat dvijo vai nātra saṃśayaḥ dvijo vaiśyaṃ punaḥ prāha dvitīyam iti naḥ śrutam dvitīyam etat kathitaṃ dvitīyaś cauṣadhīrasaiḥ dvitīyas tu bharadvājān dvitīyaṃ karma vai jñātvā dvitīyaṃ tat padaṃ viṣṇoḥ dvitīyaṃ tu padaṃ prāpa dvitīyaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ marakatair yutam dvitīyaṃ mānasasyaitan dvitīyaṃ rājasattama dvitīyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ viduḥ dvitīyaṃ svastikāṅkitam dvitīyā tasya yā mūrtir dvitīyā dvipadapradā dvitīyā pṛthivīṃ mūrdhnā dvitīyām ātmanas tanum dvitīyāyāṃ tu saṃjñāyāṃ dvitīyāṃ lakṣmaṇo hatyāṃ dvitīye ca yuge prāpte dvitīye dātum icchati dvitīye divase cānyat dvitīyo anukramāt tathā dvitīyo munisattamāḥ dvitīyo yaḥ sutas tasya dvitīyo yaḥ sutas tasyāḥ dvitīyo rāśir ucyate dvidaivatyaṃ yuge anyasmin dvidhā kāmo api racitas dvidhā kṛtvā ca tat punaḥ dvidhā kṛtvātmanas tanum dvidhā kṛtvātmano deham dvidhā jñānaṃ tathocyate dvidhā tu saṃsthitā muktiḥ dvidhā bhūtam akalpayat dvidhā yo ayaṃ vyavasthitaḥ dvipadāṃ ca catuṣpadām dvipado atha catuṣpadaḥ dviparārdhātmakaḥ kālaḥ dvipādapṛṣṭhapucchārdha- dvimukhasya dvijasyoktaṃ dvimukhaṃ śobhanākṛtim dvimūrdhā śaṅkukarṇaś ca dvirathyākardamāmbhasi dviraṣṭabāhavaś cānye dviraṣṭabāhavaś cānye dvirjaptaṃ kavacaṃ divyaṃ dvir dvādaśa samā martye dvilakṣe cottare viprā dvilakṣe samavasthitaḥ dvividaḥ kṣīṇajīvitaḥ dvivido nāma vānaraḥ dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam dvividhāni hi bhūtāni dvividhā saiva gaditā dviṣaṭkavarṇamantreṇa dviṣatāṃ durjayaṃ raṇe dvisaṃdhye astamanodaye dvihastamātre tīrthāni dviḥsaptakair vivasvāṃs tu dvīpatulyena mānataḥ dvīpaś caiva samudraś ca dvīpasyāpi pradakṣiṇam dvīpaṃ caivāśrayaṃ gavām dvīpaṃ taṃ vīraṇaṃ prati dvīpaṃ sārasvataṃ caiva dvīpaḥ sāgarasaṃvṛtaḥ dvīpaḥ sāgarasaṃvṛtaḥ dvīpād dvīpeṣu ye śailās dvīpā varṣāṇi nimnagāḥ dvīpibhiś copabhujyatām dvīpī varṣāṇi pañca ca dvīpe tatra dvijottamāḥ dvīpena śākadvīpāt tu dvīpenekṣurasodakaḥ dvīpe puṣkarasaṃjñite dvīpe varṣadvayānvite dvīpo ayaṃ dakṣiṇottaraḥ dvīpo ayaṃ dakṣiṇottarāt dve ete paricārike dve kṛśāśvāya viduṣe dve koṭyau tu jano loko dve caiva bahuputrāya dve caivāṅgirase tathā dvedhā cākaravaṃ mune dvedhā bhāvo ayam ātmanaḥ dve brahmaṇī veditavye dve bhārye sagarasyāstāṃ dve varṣe nāmasaṃjñite dve vidur naraceṣṭitam dve vidye vai veditavye dve śate dvijaśārdūlā dveṣavidhvastabuddhīnāṃ dveṣaḥ prokto mahātmanām dveṣāgnipluṣṭacetasām dveṣād ajñānato vāpi dveṣo vā nāsya jāyate dveṣṭā brāhmaṇanindakaḥ dveṣyāḥ sarvātmanā dveṣyā dvaidhīkartumanās tatra dvau cāpi janamejayau dvau daive pitṛkārye trīn dvau dvau yugapad utpatan dvau putrāv anilasya ca dvau putrau kanyakāṃ tathā dvau putrau devalasyāpi dvau putrau samajījanat dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ dvau putrau sumahābhāgau dvau bhūtasargau vikhyātau dvyaṅgulajāni śuklāni dvyaṅgulenāgrapāṇinā dvyaṣṭavarṣaḥ śubhavapuḥ dvyāmuṣyāyaṇasaṃjñās tu dhatavān saptame pade dhatte sūryasya vāridaḥ dhatte smarāriḥ śirasāpi yat tvām dhatvā bhojaṃ mahābalam dhanadaś ca dhanādhyakṣo dhanadaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā dhanado bhrātṛbhiḥ saha dhanado arthapatir virāṭ dhanado vākyam abravīt dhanadhānyaprapūritān dhanadhānyasamanvitam dhanadhānyasamācite dhanadhānyādisaṃyutam dhanadhānyāvṛtaḥ śuciḥ dhanadhānyopajīvinaḥ dhanapālaṃ ca deveśo dhanabhāryāsamanvitam dhanam āhartum icchati dhanam āhṛtya yatnena dhanarikte kule janma dhanavāṃś copajāyate dhanavṛddhiyaśaskaraḥ dhanaśrīś ca yaśaśrīś ca dhanasaukhyapradaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanasyānto na vidyate dhanahānir athāpi vā dhanaṃ ca dhanakāṅkṣiṇī dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ yaśo vīryam dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā dhanaṃ prāpya svakarmaṇā dhanaṃ vinā tat kathaṃ syād dhanādhyakṣaṃ vinirjitya dhanāni vividhāni ca dhanāni ślāghanīyāni dhanāny ādāya vittāni dhanāpahāradoṣaiś ca dhanārthaṃ tau vaṇigdvijau dhanāśā jīvitāśā ca dhaninas te bhavanty uta dhanināṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca dhanināṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ ca dhaniṣṭhāsu dhanaṃ mahat dhanī bhavati mānavaḥ dhanur ākṛṣya kopena dhanur ādāya bāṇaṃ ca dhanur gṛhītvā saśaram dhanur gṛhya pṛṣatkāṃś ca dhanur gṛhya mahāravam dhanurjyāghoṣaninadā dhanur nyasya pṛṣatkāṃś ca dhanurmahamahāyāga- dhanurmahamahāyāgaś dhanurvidyāpuraḥsarām dhanurvidyāṃ guror matām dhanurvedasya pāragam dhanurvedasya pāragān dhanurvedaṃ yathāvidhi dhanurvedaṃ yadā vetti dhanurvedaṃ saprayogaṃ dhanurvede ca vede ca dhanurvede ca vede ca dhanuṣkoṭyā tadā vaiṇyas dhanuṣkoṭyā dhanaṃjayaḥ dhanuṣprāsāsipāṇayaḥ dhanus tu dīrghatapaso dhanuḥśālāṃ tato yātau dhanūmantaṃ vṛṣākapim dhanena yaśasā śriyā dhanenaitena deśāṃś ca dhaneyuś ca vaneyuś ca dhanai ratnaiḥ suvarṇaiś ca dhanaiḥ kārubhavais tu vā dhanyakaṃ kokilākhyaṃ ca dhanyam āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ dhanyam eṣāṃ prakīrtanam dhanyas tvaṃ nṛpaśārdūla dhanyas tvaṃ putra lokeṣu dhanyaṃ duḥsvapnanāśanam dhanyaṃ duḥsvapnanāśanam dhanyaṃ pāpaharaṃ cedaṃ dhanyaṃ buddhivivardhanam dhanyaṃ buddhivivardhanam dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam dhanyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam dhanyaṃ sarvaguṇākaram dhanyaṃ saṃsāratāraṇam dhanyaṃ saṃsāranāśanam dhanyaṃ saṃsāramocanam dhanyaḥ sa putro loke asmin dhanyā jīvanti jantavaḥ dhanyā dharmaṃ cariṣyanti dhanyāyāḥ khalv ayaṃ putro dhanyā yūyaṃ mahātmāna dhanyāsi bata dāsy api dhanyās tu ye bhāratabhūmibhāge dhanyās te nātra saṃśayaḥ dhanyās te pathi ye kṛṣṇam dhanyās te puruṣā loke dhanyās te bhārate varṣe dhanyās te vibudhaprakhyā dhanyāsmy anugṛhītāsmi dhanyāsmy anugṛhītāsmi dhanye kalau bhaved viprās dhanyo rakṣayitāsi tvaṃ dhanyo asi kṛtakṛtyo asi dhanyo asi nṛpaśārdūla dhanyo aham arcayiṣyāmīty dhanyo ahaṃ mama yajñeśo dhanyau cānyan nibodhata dhanvantaraśatatrayam dhanvantaraśataṃ caikaṃ dhanvantarir iti jñātvā dhanvantarir udāradhīḥ dhanvantarir dhūmaketur dhanvantariḥ prītamanā dhanvantares tu tanayaḥ dhanvantares tu tanayaḥ dhanvantarau vanaṃ prāpte dhanvinaṃ puruṣarṣabham dhanvināṃ niśitair bāṇair dharaṇyāś cānurodhena dharaṇyāṃ krimiko yathā dharaṇyāṃ supratiṣṭhitam dharāyāḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ dharitrī ca mahīdharaḥ dharitrīpālanenaiva dhartā dhāryas tvam eva ca dharma eko anugacchati dharma eko manuṣyāṇāṃ dharma eva ca dṛśyate dharma eva śarīriṇām dharma eva sadā hi syād dharmakarmaprasādhitaḥ dharmakāmārthanāśini dharmakāmārthamokṣadam dharmakāmārthamokṣadām dharmakāmārthamokṣāya dharmakāmārthayukteṣu dharmakāmārthasādhakaḥ dharmakāmārthasiddhaye dharmakāmārthasiddhaye dharmakāmair niṣevyate dharmakāle dvijottamāḥ dharmakṛtyaṃ samācara dharmaketur iti smṛtaḥ dharmaketos tu dāyādaḥ dharmaghātiṣu sarvadā dharmacaryāparo bhavet dharmajñam iva sevitam dharmajñaṃ dharmaśīlinam dharmajñaṃ satyavādinam dharmajñaṃ satyavādinam dharmajño dharmanirataḥ dharmatattvārthadarśanam dharmataś cāpalāyataḥ dharmatīrthaṃ kāmatīrthaṃ dharmato dhanam āhāryaṃ dharmadaṇḍena nirdagdho dharmadhṛg yatidharmā ca dharmadhvajo vedakartā dharmanitye ume sadā dharmanetra iti śrutaḥ dharmanetrasya kārtas tu dharmanetraḥ pratāpavān dharmanaipuṇyadarśinaḥ dharmapatnyo daśa tv etās dharmapravaktāram apātradānāt dharmabījaṃ muktibījaṃ dharmabuddhiṃ sthirāṃ kuru dharmabrāhmaṇasaṃgatim dharmabhāk paśya vartate dharmabhṛc cāpi dharmā ca dharmam āśramiṇāṃ samyag dharmam eva carantaṃ vai dharmam eva paraṃ manye dharmam eva paraṃ manye dharmam eva praśaṃsati dharmam evānusaṃsmaran dharmam evānusaṃsmaran dharmayuktam idaṃ vākyaṃ dharmayuktaṃ paraṃ hitam dharmarakṣāparāyaṇān dharmarāja imāḥ prajāḥ dharmarājagṛhaṃ narāḥ dharmarājapuraṃ divyaṃ dharmarājapuraṃ divyaṃ dharmarājapuraṃ divyaṃ dharmarājapuraṃ narāḥ dharmarājapuraṃ yānti dharmarājapuraṃ yānti dharmarājapuraṃ śrīmān dharmalabdhārthabhoktāras dharmavākyaṃ na ca strīṣu dharmavākyaiḥ prabodhayan dharmavān sa sukhī bhavet dharmavāṃś ca viśeṣataḥ dharmavidbhiḥ sa deveśo dharmavidveṣiṇo narāḥ dharmavyāsās tu te jñeyā dharmavyucchittikāriṇaḥ dharmaśāstrāṇi yac cānyat dharmaśāstrāṇi sarvāṇi dharmaśāstrārthaniścaye dharmaśāstreṣu sarveṣu dharmaśīleṣu sarvadā dharmaś caturvidhas teṣu dharmaś catuṣpād bhagavān dharmaś ca bhagavān devaḥ dharmaś calati saṃkaṭam dharmaś ca hrāsam abhyeti dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca dharmasaṃrakṣaṇāya ca dharmasaṃrakṣaṇāya saḥ dharmasaṃrādhane kleśo dharmasaṃsthānakāriṇī dharmasaṃsthānahetavaḥ dharmasaṃsthāpanāya ca dharmas tatra jayas tathā dharmas tadanuvartanam dharmas tu sevito viprās dharmas teṣāṃ nirākṛtaḥ dharmasthānāny anekaśaḥ dharmasya kanyā suśroṇī dharmasya kurute sthitim dharmasya ca gatiṃ śrotum dharmasya ca vivṛddhyarthaṃ dharmasya tapasas tathā dharmasya phalam āśritaḥ dharmasya bhāryāpi suvarṇanāmnī dharmasya yaśaso avāptye dharmasya vāpy adharmasya dharmasya sādhanaṃ kanyā dharmasya syād abhāvatā dharmasyeti mahāprājña dharmahānir na teṣv asti dharmaṃ ca saṃpravakṣyāmi dharmaṃ cātra dvijottamāḥ dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ jaghāna teṣāṃ vai dharmaṃ jānāti kiṃcana dharmaṃ jānīhi viprarṣe dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhā dharmaṃ nirasad acyutaḥ dharmaṃ paśyanti nityadā dharmaṃ yady anuśaṃsasi dharmaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ vyavasya dharmaḥ kāmo artha eva ca dharmaḥ kāryo vipaścitā dharmaḥ prathama ucyate dharmaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ dharmaḥ sakhā cātra pare ca loke dharmaḥ saṃpūrṇatām iyāt dharmaḥ saṃsāratārakaḥ dharmaḥ sidhyati vai kalau dharmaḥ sevyaḥ sadā naraiḥ dharmaḥ svargādikaṃ ca yat dharmaḥ svāmī sakhā goptā dharmākhyāneṣu sarveṣu dharmācāravicāravān dharmāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ dharmāṇāṃ tu prabhāvaṃ taṃ dharmāṇāṃ deśikaḥ sākṣād dharmāt prāpnoty asaṃśayam dharmātmā dharmakṛd devaḥ dharmātmānam akalmaṣam dharmātmāno yaśasvinaḥ dharmātmā yatra vartate dharmātmā sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ dharmātmā sumahāyaśāḥ dharmātmā sumahāyaśāḥ dharmāt svargagatiḥ parā dharmād arthas tathā kāmo dharmād artho arthataḥ kāmaḥ dharmādi satyaṃ bhavatīha mukhyam dharmād ṛte nāsti tu kiṃcid eva dharmād aiśvaryam ekāgryaṃ dharmādyāḥ prakaṭīkṛtāḥ dharmādharmavido nityaṃ dharmādharmavyavasthāyāṃ dharmādharmāśrayāṇy api dharmādharme nṛṇāṃ deva dharmādhyakṣaṃ mahādevaṃ dharmān kulocitān rājā dharmānveṣī guṇākāṅkṣī dharmāraṇyaṃ dvijottamāḥ dharmārāmaḥ kṣamāśīlaḥ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ dharmārthakāmasaṃprāptir dharmārthakāmaṃ saṃprāpya dharmārthakāmādiṣu pūrvapūjyo dharmārthakāmāni dadāni tubhyaṃ dharmārthakāmābhijanaiḥ dharmārthajñānakāmānāṃ dharmārthamokṣaphaladam dharmārthaṃ puruṣavyāghra dharmārthānāṃ vināśakṛt dharmārthāv anucintayet dharmārthau kāma eva ca dharmāharaṇavarjitam dharmiṇām ālayā dvijāḥ dharmiṇo vāpy adharmiṇaḥ dharmiṣṭhāḥ prāṇino loke dharme kuruta mānasam dharme cākulatāṃ gate dharme caiva pradhānatām dharmeṇa niyamena ca dharmeṇa niyamena ca dharmeṇa pratipālyate dharmeṇa pratipālyate dharmeṇa mokṣaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ dharmeṇa yaśasā caiva dharmeṇa rañjayām āsa dharmeṇa rājyaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ dharmeṇāgnisutā mudā dharmeṇaiva muniśreṣṭhāḥ dharmeṇaivānurañjanam dharme buddhiṃ kuru sthirām dharme buddhiṃ sthirāṃ kuru dharme matir bhavatu vaḥ puruṣottamānāṃ dharme manaś ca te bhadra dharme mantre sahāyinī dharme ratiṃ ca satataṃ dharme śithilatāṃ gate dharme śreyo nipatsyate dharmaikamanaso hare dharmoktaṃ sādhu bhāṣitam dharmokṣāndhakarus tathā dharmo jajñe yudhiṣṭhiraḥ dharmotkarṣam atīvātra dharmo atra mātāpitarau narasya dharmo deśe samāsthitaḥ dharmodbhavaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ dharmo dharmabhṛd eva ca dharmo dharmānubandhārtho dharmo nātmārthapīḍakaḥ dharmo nāthaḥ suhṛt tathā dharmopetāṃ sa pārthivaḥ dharmo mātā pitā bhrātā dharmo yathābhirucitair dharmo arthaḥ kāma eva ca dharmo avaṣṭabhya tiṣṭhati dharṣaṇo nāma puṇyabhāk dharṣayann iva me vapuḥ dharṣayituṃ pīḍayituṃ dharṣayitvārjunaṃ rāmaḥ dharṣayiṣyanti mānavān dhavakhādirapālāśa- dhavalāmbarasaṃvītaḥ dhavaś caivānilo analaḥ dhavasya putro draviṇo dhaste kāye ca vinyaset dhātakiś ca tayos tadvad dhātakīkhaṇḍam antataḥ dhātakīkhaṇḍasaṃjñitam dhātā caiva vidhātā ca dhātā tapati kārttike dhātāraṃ jagatāṃ harim dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ dhātā vidhātā bhuvanatrayasya dhātā vidhātā bhuvanatrayasya dhātā vidhātā saṃdhātā dhātūnāṃ kāñcanaṃ yadvat dhātaikādaśabhiḥ śataiḥ dhātrā dattas tatas tvaṃ māṃ dhātrikā ca tathety uktvā dhātrike gaccha subhage dhātrīś caikaikaśaḥ prādāt dhātreyy api na jānāti dhātryā kumāram ādāya dhānyatīrtham iti khyātaṃ dhānyatīrthaṃ tad ucyate dhānyavikrayiṇaś caiva dhānyavṛkṣaphalair yutaḥ dhānyaṃ vastrādikaṃ na me dhānyāni puṣpāṇi phalāni caiva dhānyāni vividhāni ca dhānyāni vividhāni ca dhānyān yavāṃs tilān māṣān dhā putra hā putra iti bruvāṇā dhāma dhāmavatām īśaṃ dhāmanāma manaḥsthitam dhāmādhāraṃ ca śāśvatam dhāraṇāc chravaṇāc caiva dhāraṇām ātmanātmani dhāraṇā sā tu yogasya dhāraṇāsu yathāvidhi dhāraṇāsu samāhitaḥ dhāraṇāṃ prati vā dvijāḥ dhāraṇe tejasaḥ prabho dhārayaty avanī jagat dhārayann amitaujasām dhārayan vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ dhārayām āsa garbhaṃ tu dhārayām āsa gārgyasya dhārayām āsa cāgneyīṃ dhārayām āsa dīptena dhārayām āsa nityaśaḥ dhārayām āsa līlayā dhārayāmi na dehakam dhārayāmi vasuṃdharām dhārayiṣyāmi goṣṭhasya dhārayīta mano hṛdi dhārayethāḥ prajām imām dhārayen mana ātmanaḥ dhārābhir akṣamātrābhiḥ dhārābhir iva toyadau dhārābhiḥ pūrayanto vai dhārābhiḥ śaramānābhir dhārāṃ ca rudhiraplutām dhārmikasya mahātmanaḥ dhārmikaḥ sa purūravāḥ dhārmikās tridaśās tadvan dhārmiko janamejayaḥ dhāryate ca pratiṣṭhitam dhāryate hi tvayā grantha dhāryaṃ lokānukampayā dhāvantī ca vibhītavat dhāvantīṃ tāṃ priyām aśvām adhāvan sarvāṃ mahīm imām dhik kaṣṭaṃ bāla evāham dhik taṃ kāmamahāgraham dhikśabdapūrvam asakṛt dhig asmān pāpino vayam dhig etat kriyatāṃ balam dhig jīvitam idaṃ mama dhig dhik pitṛvihīnānāṃ dhig dhik putraka jīvitam dhig dhig anyavaśe sthitān dhig dhiṅ mām ity anācāraṃ dhiṅ manuṣyaśatocchiṣṭe dhitāya jagatāṃ śubham dhimavallokanāthayoḥ dhiraṇyagarbhād dhi tato narādhipa dhiṣaṇājanayat sutān dhiṣṇyāni munisattamāḥ dhīmāṃś cāyaṃ na bhavati dhīvarān asṛjac cāpi dhīśrīhrīśāntikīrtayaḥ dhutakesarajālasya dhutāḥ prāṇāñ jahuḥ sarvās dhundhumāratvam āgataḥ dhundhumāratvam āgataḥ dhundhumāro na saṃśayaḥ dhundhumāro bhaviṣyati dhundhur āsādito viprā dhundhur nāma mahāsuraḥ dhundhuṃ dhundhuvināśanaḥ dhundhor vadhaṃ mahāprājña dhundhos tasya nibarhaṇe dhūtapāpaḥ sa tejasvī dhūtapāpā śivā caiva dhūtapāpmā tu tejasvī dhūpadīpaiś ca naivedyair dhūpapuṣpair manomayaiḥ dhūpamantrārghyamantraś ca dhūpaṃ cāgurusaṃyuktaṃ dhūpaṃ dattvā tu bhaktitaḥ dhūpāni pitṛyogyāni dhūpair dīpaiś ca naivedyaiḥ dhūpair dīpaiś ca bhaktitaḥ dhūpair dīpaiḥ sanaivedyair dhūpair naivedyakair api dhūpair naivedyakais tathā dhūpo ayaṃ pratigṛhyatām dhūmavarṇā ghanāḥ kecit dhūmāgnyanilamūrtiṣu dhūmāt kaścid ajāyata dhūminī ca varāṅganāḥ dhūminī putragṛddhinī dhūminyā sa tayā devyā dhūmravarṇaṃ sudarśanam dhūrjaṭir nīlalohitaḥ dhṛtacāpo samādhavaḥ dhṛtacāpo hayasthitaḥ dhṛtam anyair na dhārayet dhṛtam ekātmakaṃ tena dhṛtam ekātmakaṃ yena dhṛtam ekātmakaṃ yena dhṛtarāṣṭrabalāhakau dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca sūryaś ca dhṛtarāṣṭras tu gāndhāryāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuṃ ca dhṛtavān dakṣiṇe kare dhṛtavāṃs tām ilety evaṃ dhṛtavrata iti khyāto dhṛtavrata iti khyāto dhṛtavratasuto dvijaḥ dhṛtavratasuto brahmaṃs dhṛtavrataṃ tathākarṣan dhṛtavrataḥ pitā vipras dhṛtaṃ tābhiś carācaram dhṛtaṃ yenākhilaṃ jagat dhṛtā garbheṇa vai mayā dhṛtimantaṃ tapodhanam dhṛtimanto manīṣiṇaḥ dhṛtimanto manīṣiṇaḥ dhṛtimanto mahāprājñāḥ dhṛtimān avyayo yuktas dhṛte govardhanācale dhṛte govardhane śaile dhṛto govardhanaś cāyaṃ dhṛto govardhano yena dhṛtau saṃśrayadharmiṇau dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sudhārmikaḥ dhṛṣṭaketos tu dāyādo dhṛṣṭasya jajñire śūrās dhṛṣṭasya dhārṣṭakaṃ kṣatraṃ dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātir eva ca dhṛṣṭaḥ śūraḥ puraṃjayaḥ dhenukaṃ campakāraṇyaṃ dhenuke ca nipātite dhenukenaiva rakṣyate dhenuko nāma dānavaḥ dhenuṃ caikāṃ madhusravām dhenūnām api kāmadhuk dhairyeṇa vinivartayet dhautapāpaṃ pracakṣate dhautapāpaṃ supuṇyadam dhautapāpā bhavantu te dhautavāsā jitendriyaḥ dhautavāsā jitendriyaḥ dhautavāsā jitendriyaḥ dhautāny abhinavāni ca dhaundhumārer dṛḍhāśvasya dhyātena yenākhiladehabhājāṃ dhyātvā kṣaṇaṃ tathā samyag dhyātvā ca puruṣottamam dhyātvā taṃ puruṣottamam dhyātvā taṃ susamāhitaḥ dhyātvātmānaṃ guhāśayam dhyātvātmānaṃ juhāva ha dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ tathā dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ param dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ paścād dhyātvā prāha śivaṃ tathā dhyātvā rājānam abravīt dhyātvā vacanam abravīt dhyātvā varaṃ brahma paraṃ pradhānaṃ dhyātvā śaṃbhuṃ dadāv arghyam dhyātvā sa munisattamaḥ dhyātvopasthāya ca jalam dhyānajapyās tathaiva ca dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ dhyānamātreṇa devena dhyānam āsthāya sādaram dhyānam eva paraṃ balam dhyānayukto jitendriyaḥ dhyānayogaparo abhavat dhyānayogena cāsmābhir dhyānayogai rudrarūpa dhyānaṃ ca munisattamāḥ dhyānaṃ samādhir ity uktaṃ dhyānādhyayanasaṃpadā dhyānena tapasā yukto dhyānena te tvāṃ praviśanti śaṃbho dhyānena sarve ca vidanti santaḥ dhyānenāpi munir jñātvā dhyāne api paramaṃ kṛtvā dhyāneṣu homeṣu mahāphaleṣu dhyāyan kṛte yajan yajñais dhyāyantaṃ taṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ dhyāyantaṃ yajñapuruṣam dhyāyanti dhyāyino devaṃ dhyāyanti nityaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam dhyāyanti paramaṃ padam dhyāyanti muktipradaṃ dhyāyantī niścalā uṣā dhyāyan paṭhan stuvan devaṃ dhyāyaṃs tadarthaṃ sa muniḥ dhyeyadhyānaparas tvaṃ ca dhyeyas tvaṃ dhyānināṃ paraḥ dhrādaputro hradas tathā dhriyamāṇāsu taskaraiḥ dhruvaś ca saptamas teṣāṃ dhruvasūryāntaraṃ yat tu dhruvasya jananī śubhā dhruvasya putro bhagavān dhruvasya śiśumāraś ca dhruvasya śiśumāro asau dhruvaṃ ca kīrtimantaṃ ca dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate dhruvaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ dhruvaṃ saptarṣayaḥ sthitāḥ dhruvaṃ sarve yathākāmaṃ dhruvaṃ sthānaṃ smṛtaṃ hy etad dhruvaḥ pucche vyavasthitaḥ dhruvāc chaṃbhur vyajāyata dhruvād ūrdhvaṃ maharloko dhruvādhārāṇy aśeṣāṇi dhruve baddhāni tāni vai dhruve bhānur vyavasthitaḥ dhruvo munivarottamāḥ dhruvo varṣasahasrāṇi dhvajabhaṅgaś ca nābhavat dhvajināṃ savarūthinām dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtā dhvanidhīrataraṃ tataḥ na kaccit purayoṣitām na kathaṃcit pralipyate na kathaṃcid dvijaṃ paśum na kathyaṃ yasya kasyacit na kadaryā na māyinaḥ na kadācit tyajiṣyati na kadācid adhogatiḥ na kadācid vicakṣaṇāḥ na kadācid vinaśyati na kanyāyāḥ kadācana na karoty api ninditaḥ na karomy atra yāvac ca na karmaguṇasadbhāvaṃ na karmasthā dvijātayaḥ na kalpanām ṛte arthasya na kaścit pratigṛhṇāti na kaścit soḍhum utsahet na kaścid akavir nāma na kaścid vindate janaḥ na kaścin mriyate jantur nakāraṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset nakāraḥ śāṃbhavaḥ śyāmo na kāryaḥ śṛṇu tatredaṃ na kāryā śubham icchatā na kālāgnibhayaṃ tatra na kimapy āsasādāsau na kiṃ kiṃ vidhivañcitaḥ na kiṃcit tasya vidyate na kiṃcit tām uvāca ha na kiṃcid anyat kartavyam na kiṃcid api bhakṣayet na kiṃcid api yasyāste na kiṃcid āśramasthānaṃ na kiṃcid āśramasthānaṃ na kiṃcid upalakṣayet na kiṃcid ūce jananīṃ na kutarkapralāpine na kuryāt karmasaṃkaram na kuryād dantasaṃgharṣaṃ na kuryād devatārcanam na kuryād yaḥ pitā tasya na kuryās tvaṃ ca kopaṃ ca na kuryur yadi dūtakāḥ na kurvīta kadācana na kurvīta vicakṣaṇaḥ na kulīnāḥ kadācana na kule jāyate teṣāṃ nakulolūkamārjārāṃl na kūpo na prapā sabhā na kūpo na prapā sabhā na kṛtaghnā na piśunā na kṛtaghnāya mānine na kṛtaṃ tair madīritam na kṛtā gautamīsevā na kṛtyam avaśiṣyate na kṛṣir na vaṇikpathaḥ na kenacit kṛtaṃ yasmāt na kenāpy atra varṇyate na kevalaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhā na kairapi hi śakyate na kaiścit paribhūyate na kopād vyāharante ye na kopi kasyacit kiṃcit na kopi kvāpi jātucit na kopi tādṛśaḥ putro na kopi bhavatāṃ kiṃtu na kopi hariṇā samaḥ na kopaiḥ śāpamantrakaiḥ nakrameṣānanāḥ śūrā na krīṇāti tato anayoḥ na kruddho naikapāṇinā na kvacit pratihanyate nakṣatragrahatārakāḥ nakṣatragrahayos tathā nakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ kṛtsnam nakṣatrasūcakaś caiva nakṣatrākhyaṃ sudurlabham nakṣatrākhyā dadau prabhuḥ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca paryayam nakṣatrāṇāṃ yathātrijam nakṣatrāṇāṃ yathā somaḥ nakṣatrāṇi grahaiḥ saha nakṣatrāṇi ca kāmataḥ nakṣatrāṇi ca cakravat nakṣatrāṇi na tārakāḥ nakṣatrāṇi yugāni ca nakṣatrāṇi viyogāni nakṣatrāṇi vivarṇāni nakṣatre candradaivate nakṣatre śubhalakṣaṇe nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ nakṣatraiś ca muhūrtaiś ca nakṣatraiḥ saha candramāḥ na kṣamo apy ahināyakaḥ na kṣīyante kadācana na kṣut pipāsā na jarā na khalv anyatra martyānāṃ na khalv anyatra martyānāṃ na khalv ayaṃ mṛto aṇḍasya nakhāgrasūcyā śakalendumaulis na khedo na ca daurgandhyaṃ nakhebhyaḥ sarvato abhavan na gaṅgāṃ tyajati prabhuḥ na gacchan na ca tiṣṭhan vai na gajair madayuktaiś ca na gajo na ca sārathiḥ na gatiḥ kāpi kutracit na gantavyaṃ tatra deśe nagaraṃ dharmanilayaṃ nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayam nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayam nagaraṃ vāraṇāvatam nagarāṇi sahasraśaḥ nagarād vacanāt pituḥ nagarī ca samastā sā nagarīyoṣitāṃ madhye nagare kāmadamanas na gāś ca nānnavikṛtiṃ na guṇān vai kathaṃcana na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ na gṛhāṇa madājñayā na gor vatsasya cānanam na gautamyās tathā viṣṇor nagnā viparyayam na jātv avidvān mahimā purātanam na jānanti yathā pāpā na jānanti yathāsurāḥ na jānāti kutaḥ ko ahaṃ na jānāti vrataṃ mantraṃ na jānāti sa tān api na jānāti sa saṃbhramāt na jānāmi paraṃ yat te na jānīmaḥ kathaṃ bhavaḥ na jānīmo asya caritaṃ na jāne kiṃ karomy adya na jāne kiṃ nu kāraṇam na jāne me kathaṃ bhavet na jīyeta tadā devair na jīryate yatra gatvā na jīvayeyaṃ śriyam unnatiṃ ca na jīviṣyati vai kaścit na juhoti na cāśnāti na jñānād vidyate param na jñāpitaṃ tayā rājñe naṭanartakakādīṃś ca naḍvalāyāṃ mahaujasaḥ naḍvalāyāṃ mahaujasaḥ na tac chakyaṃ dvijottamāḥ na tac chaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ na taḍāgāḥ sarāṃsi ca na taḍāgāḥ sarāṃsi ca na tat kratuśatair api na tat tadaparāddhaṃ syād na tat paśyāmi bho viprā na tatyāja sa govindas na tatra tvādṛśām asti na tatra devā tatra vṛkṣacchāyā vā na tathā jāyate puṃsāṃ na tathā tāni sarvāṇi na tathā pūrvajeṣu vai na tad ūrdhvaṃ na tiryak ca na tad vakṣyati tattvataḥ natapṛṣṭhāsthisaṃhatiḥ na tarkaśāstradagdhāya na tasthau prajagāmaiva na tasmāt paramaṃ bhūtaṃ na tasya kopi trātāsti na tasya mahimā kaiścid na tasya rauravādibhyaḥ na tasya vittanāśaḥ syān na tasyānyo asti deveśa na taṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān na tādṛk sarvadevānāṃ natā niścalamūrdhāno na tān me bibhrataḥ khedo na tāreṇa samo manuḥ na tāvad arjunaṃ kaścid na tāvad yāmi mandiram na tāṃ gatiṃ surā yānti na tiryaggatim āpnuyāt na tiṣṭhanti kadācana na tiṣṭhanti kadācana na tīrthāni na dānāni na tu gandhavatīṣv apsu na tu tapyati vai vidvān na tu deyaḥ kathaṃcana na tu dehe nipātitaḥ na tu dehe nipātitaḥ na tu dehe nyapātayat na tu nirbhartsitaṃ rūpaṃ na tu pūjā bhaviṣyati na tu mātrābhiśaptānāṃ na tūpayujyate devair na tṛptā mama vākyena na tṛptim adhigacchāmas na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ na tṛptim dūtān na tan mārgaṃ na tena rahitaṃ kiṃcid na tena sadṛśaḥ kaścit na te paśyanti nirayaṃ na te yānti yamālaye na te vibhūtiṃ nanu vetti ko api na te śrāddhe niyoktavyā na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcit na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcid na teṣāṃ durlabhaḥ svargo na teṣāṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃcit na teṣāṃ niṣkṛtis tasmād na teṣāṃ siddhim eṣyati na teṣu śoko nāyāso na teṣv asti yugāvasthā na te surā āyudhānāṃ munīśa na te surā netukāmā bhavanti na te asty aviditaṃ kiṃcit na te asty aviditaṃ kiṃcid na te asty aviditaṃ mune nato asmi parameśvaram na tyaktavyo mahābhāgau na tyaktas tatkṛte śmābhir na tvayā na ca vṛṣṇibhiḥ na tvayā mama vairaṃ bhoḥ na tvayā sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ na tvayā sadṛśo dhātar na tvaṃ jetā kathaṃcana na tvaṃ duḥkhitum arhasi na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi natvā kalpavaṭaṃ naraḥ natvā ca gaṅgāṃ bhuvam āśramaṃ ca natvā tān ṛtvijaḥ pṛthak natvā tebhyaḥ pṛthak pṛthak natvā tribhuvaneśvaram natvā dharmaṃ sanātanam natvā nātham athābravīt natvā munīndraṃ yayur eva lokān natvā śaṃbhusurān idam na tvāṃ karomy ahaṃ bhasma na tvāṃ jānanti nigamā na tvāṃ dahet tato yāhi na tvāṃ paśyāmi gopate na tvāṃ manyāmahe naram na tvāṃ yakṣyanti vai dvijāḥ na tv etān gaṇayāmy aham na tv eva hi niṣiddhānām na tv evaṃ budhyate avyaktaṃ na tv evaṃ vartamānānām nadataḥ sāgarasyeva na dattaṃ ca kathaṃcana na dattaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu ca na dattaṃ yaiś ca viprebhyas na dadarśa gṛhāyātām na dadau yācate caināṃ na dambhī na ca mānī yo nadarūpeṇa kānicit na daṃśo na grahā viṣam na dānavebhyo rākṣasebhyaś ca ghoram na dāmbhikāya mūrkhāya na dārasaṃgrahaṃ lebhe na dārasaṃgrahaṃ lebhe na dārasaṃgraho yakṣoragarākṣasāḥ na yacchanty alpacetasaḥ na yat karoti śvapacaḥ nayaty anyatra no harim nayaty asmān atikramya na yatra nātha vidyante naya nāgaṃ sagaruḍaṃ naya nāgālayaṃ prati nayanānāṃ mahotsavaḥ nayanena tṛtīyena na yamaṃ na ca tāṃ purīm na yamo nāntakaḥ kruddho naya vā bhakṣa vā sukham na yaṣṭavyaṃ na hotavyam na yasya tattvaṃ sanakādayo api na yaḥ samutsukaḥ kaścid na yāce tvāṃ trivikramam na yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ na yāti narakaṃ martyo na yāti narakaṃ śuddhaḥ na yānti narakaṃ natvā nayāmo anena kiṃ phalam nayāmo aśvaṃ nṛpāntikam na yāsyāmi nijaṃ gṛham nayiṣyāmi sahasradhā na yuktam ity ūcatur iṣṭabuddhyā na yuktaṃ yat sarasvatyāḥ na yujyeta kathaṃcana na yuddhais tapasā śāpair na yūyam abhilapsyadhve nayetāṃ paramāṃ gatim nayed yatra gatir mama nayed viprāṃs tu pattanam nayeyur āyudhānīti na yeṣāṃ vyasanāgamaḥ nayainam analaṃ śīghraṃ na yogyo dārasaṃgrahaḥ na yonir nāpi saṃskāro narakagrāmamārgeṇa narakaś ca hataḥ saṃkhye narakas tadviparyayaḥ narakasthān api pitṝṃs narakasya parigrahāt narakasya viceṣṭitam narakasyāsurendrasya narakasyeva mūrkhāṇāṃ narakasvargasaṃjñe vai narakaṃ karmaṇāṃ lopāt narakaṃ kaśmalaṃ nāma narakaṃ kālasūtraṃ ca narakaṃ kena karmaṇā narakaṃ kena karmaṇā narakaṃ krakacākhyātaṃ narakaṃ guḍapāketi narakaṃ ca mahāghoraṃ narakaṃ ca vikarmataḥ narakaṃ cāmbarīṣākhyaṃ narakaṃ cogragandheti narakaṃ copapadyate narakaṃ tu vilepakam narakaṃ tailapāketi narakaṃ dāruṇaṃ smṛtam narakaṃ durdharaṃ nāma narakaṃ paritāpākhyaṃ narakaṃ pāpacetasaḥ narakaṃ bhūriduḥkhadam narakaṃ yojanānāṃ ca narakaṃ yojanāyutam narakaṃ vajranirmitam narakaṃ vajrasaṃkulam narakaṃ śālmalākhyaṃ tu narakaṃ śoṇitaplutam narakaṃ hatavān kṛṣṇo narakāṇāṃ sahasreṣu narakāṇāṃ sahasreṣu narakāṇi kathaṃcana narakāṇi ca ghorāṇi narakāṇi narais tatra narakāṇi pṛthak pṛthak narakāṇy atha ghorāṇi narakādyās tathāpare narakāntaragocaraiḥ narakān na nivartante narakān nātra saṃśayaḥ narakān nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ narakā bhṛśadāruṇāḥ narakā rauravādayaḥ narakārtasya mūḍhasya narake duḥkhapaddhatiḥ narakena kṛtaṃ ca yat narakenāsya tatrābhūn narake naiva pacyatām narake pacyamānaṃ tam narake pātanaṃ tathā narake pātayiṣyati narake bhṛśadāruṇe narake yātanās tathā narake yāty adhomukhe narake yāni duḥkhāni narakeṣu ca pātitam narakeṣu ca yātanām narakeṣu narādhamāḥ narakeṣu pṛthak pṛthak narakeṣu sa pacyate narakeṣv atidāruṇam narakeṣv atha ghoreṣu narakeṣv atha pakvaś ca narakeṣv atha pātitaḥ narake saṃtatikṣayāt narakottāraṇe prabho narako ayaṃ mahābhāga narako rauravo raudraḥ narako rauravo raudraḥ na rajjvā na ca daṇḍena naratvaṃ viṣṇur āgataḥ naranāthas tadā viprā naranārāyaṇasthānaṃ naranārāyaṇasthānaṃ naranārāyaṇasthāne naranārāyaṇau tathā naranārīsamanvitam naranārīsamākulam naramedhaphalapradam naramedhāya dīkṣitaḥ nararatnam idaṃ subhru naralokeṣu viśrutaḥ naravānarasiṃhāṃś ca naravaidyāś ca ye narāḥ naraś codaṅmukhaḥ śuciḥ narasiṃhakṛtā guptir narasiṃhagṛhaṃ dvijāḥ narasiṃhaprasādataḥ narasiṃha mahāvīrya narasiṃhasya kaṇṭhe tu narasiṃhasya tattvaṃ ca narasiṃhasya bho viprāḥ narasiṃhasya ye bhaktā narasiṃhaṃ ca nairṛte narasiṃhaṃ tu pūjayet narasiṃhaṃ naro dṛṣṭvā narasiṃhaṃ prapūjayet narasiṃhaṃ samāśrayet narasiṃhaṃ smaraṃs
