bhaktyā pūjayet parayā bhaktyā pūjayet parayā bhaktyā pūjayet puruṣottamam pūjayet puruṣottamam pūjayet susamāhitaḥ pūjayet sopavāso yaḥ pūjayed āsanena ca pūjayed yas tu bhāskaram pūjayed yas tu bhāskaram pūjayed yas tu bhāskaram pūjayeyur yathānyāyaṃ pūjayeyuḥ prayatnataḥ pūjākartāram īśvare pūjā bhavatu sarvadā pūjāyāḥ prāpyate phalam pūjāyai bhūtaye athavā pūjāvicitraracitaiḥ pūjāṃ karoti vidhivat pūjāṃ karoti satatam pūjāṃ kuru mayā saha pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ pūjāṃ cakrur mudānvitāḥ pūjāṃ cakrur yathocitām pūjāṃ cakrur vidhivat te pṛthak ca pūjāṃ cakre tadā teṣāṃ pūjāṃ cakre śivasya tu pūjāṃ tava karoty asau pūjāṃ mantravatīṃ citrāṃ pūjāṃ mantravidhānena pūjitas tena ṛṣiṇā pūjitaṃ ca yathāvidhi pūjitaṃ brahmavādibhiḥ pūjitaṃ yaḥ saṃpaśyeta pūjitaḥ pannagottamaiḥ pūjitaḥ sumahāmanāḥ pūjitā sā dvijottamāḥ pūjitās tridivaukasaḥ pūjito devagandharvais pūjito abhiṣṭutaḥ śivaḥ pūjito ayaṃ mahāmantraḥ pūjito lokanāthena pūjyate amararāḍ iva pūjyantāṃ prathitāḥ sīmāḥ pūjyamānas tathoragaiḥ pūjyamānaḥ surarṣibhiḥ pūjyamānaḥ surāsuraiḥ pūjyamānaḥ surāsuraiḥ pūjyamāno apsarogaṇaiḥ pūjyamāno apsarobhiś ca pūjyamāno apsarobhiś ca pūjyaṃ ca paśubhartāraṃ pūjyānāṃ cāpy apūjane pūjyāpūjyaṃ ca sarvatra pūjyā bālāḥ sutā mama pūjyā bhavati caiva ha pūjyā lokais tribhis tadā pūjyena brahmatejasā pūjyo namasyaḥ paricintanīyas pūtanā bālaghātinī pūtanā bālaghātinī pūtanāyā vināśaś ca pūtanāyāḥ kalevaram pūtanā saṃprayacchati pūtanā sā niśācarī pūtanāṃ daityadārikām pūtaṃ māṃ kartum arhatha pūtaṃ śarīram abhavad pūtā yāntu triviṣṭapam pūtās te putravittāḍhyā pūtikaṃ mṛganābhiṃ ca pūtivraṇān nipatito pūto devyā kṛto adhunā pūto asi pratyahaṃ vatsa pūpaṃ vāpi pipīlikaḥ pūyamūtrapurīṣakam pūyaśoṇitadigdhās te pūyaśoṇitadigdhās te pūyaśoṇitaniḥsravaḥ pūraṇāya viśeṣataḥ pūraṇenābhavad dvijāḥ pūrayanti nabhastalam pūrayanto vasuṃdharām pūruṃ putram athābravīt pūruṃ sa surasattamaḥ pūrṇakumbhaiḥ sadīpakaiḥ pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ pūrṇacandraprakāśena pūrṇatāṃ nāpnuvanti sma pūrṇatāṃ nāyayus tāni pūrṇatīrtham iti khyātaṃ pūrṇatīrthasya māhātmyaṃ pūrṇatīrthaṃ tataḥ param pūrṇabhadraprasādena pūrṇamanorathaṃ śāntaṃ pūrṇam astamalaiḥ śuddhair pūrṇaṃ yugasahasraṃ tu pūrṇaṃ viṇmūtraśoṇitaiḥ pūrṇaṃ saro abhūd atha cottatāra pūrṇākhyānaṃ tad ucyate pūrṇātīrthaṃ tataḥ śālaṃ pūrṇā bhaviṣyanti manobhilāṣāḥ pūrṇābhilāṣā niryānti pūrṇāyuṣaṃ dvijavaraṃ pūrṇāś ca kevalāś caiva pūrṇās tan me manorathāḥ pūrṇāhantāsinā chittvā pūrṇāhutir yatra dattā pūrṇimā jyeṣṭhamāsasya pūrṇe tapasi me dvijāḥ pūrṇe yugasahasre tu pūrṇe yugasahasre tu pūrṇe yugasahasre atha pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu pūrṇe varṣasahasre vai pūrṇe śatasahasre tu pūrṇe śatasahasre tu pūrṇe saṃvatsare tataḥ pūrṇais tu divasaiḥ spṛṣṭvā pūrṇo jātaḥ śatakratoḥ pūryamāṇā rudanti ca pūrvakaṃ bhadram astu te pūrvakāle praśasyate pūrvacittis tathā parā pūrvacittis tilottamā pūrvajanmakṛtād doṣāt pūrvajanmavato dinaiḥ pūrvajanmasu vṛttāntam pūrvajasya manor viprāḥ pūrvajaṃ halinaṃ śrīmān pūrvajātān atho putrān pūrvajātīr anekaśaḥ pūrvajān uddharet tu yaḥ pūrvataḥ kesarācalāḥ pūrvato brahmaṇo gireḥ pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ ca taṃ devaṃ pūrvadeśādikāś caiva pūrvadeśādhipaḥ kaścit pūrvadeśe mahārāja pūrvadeho babhūva ha pūrvadaityo mahāvīryo pūrvadvāraṃ śubhaṃ tasyāḥ pūrvadvāraṃ śubhaṃ tasyāḥ pūrvapakṣoktisiddhānta- pūrvapaścāt tu tāv ubhau pūrvapaścāyatāv etāv pūrvabhuktāñ jahāti tān pūrvam atrisamaḥ prabhuḥ pūrvamanvantare śreṣṭhā pūrvam ānakadundubhiḥ pūrvam āsam ahaṃ dvijaḥ pūrvam eva mahāmatiḥ pūrvam evāsṛjat prabhuḥ pūrvarātre parārdhe ca pūrvarātre parārdhe ca pūrvavac cheṣam ācaret pūrvavat tava veśmani pūrvaval laukikān gatvā pūrvaśaucaṃ samākhyātaṃ pūrvasṛṣṭiḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ pūrvas tatrodayagirir pūrvasminn api caivāgnau pūrvasminn ṛṣayo devā pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāgānāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi putraṃ tu pūrvasyāṃ diśi bho dvijāḥ pūrvaṃ kathitavān sarvaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ pūrvaṃ khyātā mayā yā tu pūrvaṃ jāyeta gardabhaḥ pūrvaṃ tu vitathe tasya pūrvaṃ dakṣaḥ svayaṃbhuvā pūrvaṃ dattvā tu yaḥ kanyāṃ pūrvaṃ nāndīmukhaṃ kṛtvā pūrvaṃ nāsīd dvijottamāḥ pūrvaṃ bāhusahasraṃ tu pūrvaṃ buddhir ajāyata pūrvaṃ brahma sanātanam pūrvaṃ yac ca mayā kṛtam pūrvaṃ yatra samutpannān pūrvaṃ śāntabhayaṃ varṣaṃ pūrvaṃ sa hi samutpanno pūrvaṃ surarṣir dvija nāradākhyo pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā pūrvāgatena gantavyaṃ pūrvādiṣu caturdiśam pūrvābhāve tataḥ param pūrvārdhena tataḥ patnī pūrvāsāṃ pūrvavattarāḥ pūrvāhṇa eva kāryāṇi pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇe vā pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇe vā pūrvāhṇe madhyame cāhni pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ sanakṣatrāṃ pūrve kirātā yasyāsan pūrve kirātās tiṣṭhanti pūrve ca susamāhitaḥ pūrve caiva mahodadhiḥ pūrveṇa mandaro nāma pūrveṇa sītā śailāc ca pūrveṇaiveha vidhinā pūrve tu dakṣiṇe caiva pūrve dale vāsudevaṃ pūrve māṃ pātu govindo pūrveṣām api pūrvajam pūrveṣāṃ pūrvavattaraḥ pūrveṣāṃ procyate prajā pūrveṣu karatoyāyā pūrve samudre yaḥ panthā pūrvoktaṃ phalam āpnoti pūrvoktaṃ vacanaṃ te tu pūrvoktaṃ sa phalaṃ labhet pūrvoktāni dvijottamāḥ pūrvoktān dvijasattamān pūrvoktena vidhānena pūrvotpannair mahāsuraiḥ pūrvoditā tu yā lakṣmīr pūṣā tu navabhiḥ śataiḥ pūṣā bhago aryamā tvaṣṭā pūṣārkaḥ savitā raviḥ pūṣṇas tv iva pinākadhṛk pūṣṇo dantavināśana pūṣṇo dantavināśanaḥ pūṣṇo dantaharāya ca pūṣṇo dantān athotpāṭya pṛcchantam atisādaram pṛcchantv atra gatiṃ parām pṛcchāmas tvāṃ jagannātha pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahābhāgaṃ pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahāmatim pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahāmatim pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahāmune pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahāmune pṛcchāmo gautamaṃ munim pṛcchāvaḥ kasya prābalyaṃ pṛcche pāpaphalaṃ nu kim pṛcchyamānā yadā devair pṛthak ca saha caiva ha pṛthak tadaivābhavad apratarkya pṛthak tīrthaphalaṃ puṇyaṃ pṛthak tīrthaphalaṃ śrotuṃ pṛthaktvena divaukasaḥ pṛthaktvena vadanty anye pṛthaktvena vyavasthitāḥ pṛthak pṛthak cārugṛhītaveśāḥ pṛthak pṛthak tīrthakoṭi- pṛthak pṛthak phalaṃ teṣu pṛthak pṛthag idaṃ vacaḥ pṛthakbhūte rase dehaṃ pṛthag etan nidarśanam pṛthag etāni saṃsmaret pṛthag eva śṛṇuṣva me pṛthagdehe svadharmataḥ pṛthagdharmapravartine pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyaitau pṛthag yāgaphalaṃ viduḥ pṛthagrūpeṇa saṃsthitāḥ pṛthāṃ duhitaraṃ cakre pṛthivī kakudopamā pṛthivītalacāriṇīḥ pṛthivī dadhīr ity uktvā pṛthivīdarśanāya ca pṛthivī dyaur diśaś caiva pṛthivīparipālanam pṛthivīm anvapadyata pṛthivīm ādravad balī pṛthivīm upabhokṣyanti pṛthivī vāyur ākāśa pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam pṛthivī viṣayaṃ sarvam pṛthivī vyacalat sarvā pṛthivī saptabhir dvīpaiḥ pṛthivī sāgarāmbarā pṛthivīṃ dātukāmena pṛthivīṃ dātum udyataḥ pṛthiv-yas tripradakṣiṇaiḥ pṛthivyā jagmur ojasā pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni pṛthivyā dharaṇīdhara pṛthivy āpaś ca tejaś ca pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca pṛthivyām annapūrṇāyāṃ pṛthivyām api kṛtsnāyāṃ pṛthivyām apratihato pṛthivyām asti bho dvijāḥ pṛthivyām uttamāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivyā munisattamāḥ pṛthivyāś ca pradakṣiṇe pṛthivyās tīrthayātrāyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ karmabhūmiṃ ca pṛthivyāṃ kṣatriyendrāś ca pṛthivyāṃ jīvasaṃjñitaiḥ pṛthivyāṃ jīvasaṃjñitaiḥ pṛthivyāṃ tān suśīghragāḥ pṛthivyāṃ dvijasattamāḥ pṛthivyāṃ nopamīyate pṛthivyāṃ pātayām āsa pṛthivyāṃ pātayām āsa pṛthivyāṃ puṇyasaṃkṣaye pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīdhara pṛthivyāṃ balino nṛpān pṛthivyāṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ pṛthivyāṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ pṛthivyāṃ yan nabhastale pṛthivyāṃ yāni kāni vai pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni pṛthivyāṃ rājyam ādiśat pṛthivyāṃ samavāyo abhūd pṛthivyāṃ samudāhṛtam pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrthāni pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrtheṣu pṛthivyāṃ sārabhūtaṃ syāt pṛthivyāḥ pṛthivītalam pṛthivyāḥ sā kṛtā bhavet pṛthivyuddharaṇāya ca pṛthivyuddhārakāriṇe pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthā caiva pṛthukīrtyāṃ tu saṃjajñe pṛthucchattram ivopari pṛthutuṅge sukubjake pṛthunā pravibhaktā ca pṛthupūrvāṇi bho dvijāḥ pṛthurukmasya saṃśrayāt pṛthur etair narādhipaiḥ pṛthur eva namaskāryaḥ pṛthur eva namaskāryo pṛthur eva namaskāryo pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca pṛthur vaiṇyas tathā cemāṃ pṛthur vaiṇyaḥ pratāpavān pṛthur vaiṇyaḥ pratāpavān pṛthur vaiṇyaḥ pratāpavān pṛthulākṣa iti smṛtaḥ pṛthulākṣasuto rājā pṛthuvikaṭatāḍanaiḥ pṛthuvikaṭatāḍanaiḥ pṛthuś cānenasaḥ smṛtaḥ pṛthuśravāḥ pṛthuyaśā pṛthus tasmāt samutpannaḥ pṛthuṃ taṃ pṛthulocanam pṛthuṃ vaiṇyaṃ pitāmahaḥ pṛthuḥ paścān mahābalaḥ pṛthuḥ prādāt prajeśvaraḥ pṛthūdakaprabhāvāc ca pṛthor vaiṇyasya bho dvijāḥ pṛthor vaiṇyasya vistaram pṛthor vaiṇyasya vistaram pṛthos tu putrau dharmajñau pṛthoḥ stavārthaṃ tau tatra pṛthvīm imāṃ vā yadi ratnapūrṇāṃ pṛśnigarbha namo astu te pṛṣadājyam ajāyata pṛṣadhro hiṃsayitvā tu pṛṣṭavān aham antakam pṛṣṭas tvayā cāsmi yathā narendra pṛṣṭaṃ cāpi yathā tathā pṛṣṭaṃ mitreṇa yat pūrvaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ provāca tān vyāsaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ śakreṇa vai tadā pṛṣṭā mārgānugāminā pṛṣṭāś ca kuśalaṃ tena pṛṣṭo asi mitra gacchāmi pṛṣṭo asi munipuṃgava pṛṣṭo asmi dvijasattamāḥ pṛṣṭvā tṛptā stha ity uta pṛṣṭhagrīvāsthisaṃhatiḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāpi keśavaḥ pṛṣṭhato api ca pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhato hanyamānyāś ca pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ vṛthāmāṃsaṃ pṛṣṭhamāṃsāśinaś ca yat pṛṣṭhaṃ palāyamānānāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ rakṣatu kūrmarāṭ paitāmahaṃ ca vimalaṃ paitrān ādau tataḥ surān paitryaṃ pitryeṇa sarvadā paitryaṃ vittaṃ na tu spṛśet paippalādiś ca kauśikaḥ pailūṣa iti vikhyātaḥ pailūṣaṃ sarvakāmadam paiśācanāśaṃ ca mahāgadaṃ ca paiśācaṃ cāñjanaṃ tathā paiśācaṃ tīrtham aparaṃ paiśācaṃ tīrtham ākhyātaṃ paiśācān viṣayāṃs tathā paiśunyaṃ ca vivarjayet pothito gadayā bhagno poṣaṇāya nirūpitam poṣayan narakaṃ yāti poṣyāś ca bahavo mama pauṇḍrakoktaṃ tvayā yat tad pauṇḍrako vāsudevaś ca pauṇḍrako vāsudevo asau pauṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgā magadhā pautradauhitrakādibhiḥ pautrāś caiva babhūvire pautre vā varavarṇini pautraiś ca dvijasattama paurajānapadais tyakto pauravasya muniśreṣṭhā pauravaṃ turvasor vaṃśaṃ pauravī rohiṇī nāma pauravī rohiṇī nāma paurā yasyābhavad bhāryā paurāḥ susaṃhatā yatra pauruṣaṃ puruṣeṣv eva pauruṣān viṣayāṃs tathā pauruṣeṇātha sūktena pauruṣeyaḥ sanātanaḥ pauraiḥ saṃmilitais tadā paurṇamāseṣu śrāddhaṃ ca paurṇamāsyāṃ tadā snānaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu kartavyaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ yathā śaśī paurṇamāsyāṃ viśeṣeṇa paurṇamāsyāṃ sanakṣatro paulastyaṃ tīrtham ākhyātaṃ paulastyaṃ dhanadaṃ viduḥ paulastyaṃ manujarṣabhaḥ paulikā maulikāś caiva paulomāḥ kālakeyāś ca paulomyā vacanaṃ mama paulomyāṃ prāha tat sarvaṃ pauṣe pūṣā divākaraḥ apy athātraiva ratis tava apy āgaman makhamaṇḍapam pyāyayiṣyadhvam uttamāḥ prakaṭaṃ jāyate kṣaṇāt prakaṭībhūtasarvāsthir prakampitatanūtkṣepa- prakalpayanto bhuvanāni sapta prakāśadaśanānanam prakāśaṃ bhavate sarvaṃ prakāśyate tad api te prakīrṇaphalabhojanaḥ prakīrṇamaithunā ye ca prakīrtayec chuddhamanāḥ samāhitaḥ prakṛtir grasate dvijāḥ prakṛtir yābhidhīyate prakṛtir yā mayākhyātā prakṛtiś ca tathāpnoti prakṛtis tvaṃ vṛṣākapiḥ prakṛtiṃ ca pravakṣyate prakṛtiṃ cāpy atikramya prakṛtiṃ tv atha jānāti prakṛtiṃ tv āsurīṃ prāpya prakṛtiṃ prasavātmikām prakṛtiḥ kurute karma prakṛtiḥ kurute devī prakṛtiḥ puruṣaś caiva prakṛtiḥ sā parā dvijāḥ prakṛtiḥ sā vilīyate prakṛter anu tattvavān prakṛter guṇahetus tu prakṛter nṛpasattama prakṛteś ca guṇānāṃ ca prakṛtes triguṇāyās tu prakṛteḥ parivarjanāt prakṛteḥ sa paro yasmāt prakṛtyanvita eva ca prakṛtyā ca tayā tena prakṛtyā caiṣa rājendra prakṛtyātmānam evātmā prakṛtyā nirguṇas tv eṣa prakṛtyā sarvam evedaṃ prakṛtyās tu vikārā ye prakṛtyāṃ puruṣe tathā prakopaḥ sumahān abhūt prakopād gautamo abravīt prakriyāsu makheṣu ca prakrīḍitās tu te sarve prakṣālayitvā tāṃ pūjāṃ prakṣālitāni cāsthīni prakṣālya hastau pādau ca prakṣālya hastau pādau ca prakṣipet tāmrabhājane prakṣiptaṃ vai mahodadhau prakṣiptaṃ śakaṭaṃ yena prakṣīṇākhilaśaucaś ca prakṣepāt kārttiko abhavat prakṣeptavyaṃ viśuddhaye prakṣepsyaty antarikṣe ca prakhyātabalavīryasya prakhyātaṃ tārakāmayam prakhyātās triṣu lokeṣu prakhyātāḥ pravarāḥ puraḥ prakhyāto varṣaparvataḥ pragatāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu pragalbhate kopi sa śocya eva pragṛhītaśarāsanam pragṛhīte tato dharme pragṛhya jvalitaṃ śūlaṃ pragṛhya devī prasabhaṃ pratasthe pracacāra divi dvijāḥ pracaṇḍe ghanagarjite pracaṇḍaiḥ ṣaṣṭihāyanaiḥ pracetasaḥ sucetās tu pracetaḥsu mahīruhāḥ pracetās tasya cātmajaḥ pracchanna eva gopānāṃ pracchādya vallikair devi pracyuto gandhamādanāt prajajñire padmavanāni sarvataḥ prajajvāla tato grāhas prajajvāla sureśvarī prajahāsa tathaivoccaiḥ prajāgaram upākarot prajāgaraḥ kṛto rātrau prajāgare gītikāyāḥ prajāgare gītikaikāṃ prajāgaro viṣṇugṛhe prajā dharmeṇa pālayan prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ prajā dhārayitā svayam prajānām atibhīṣaṇā prajānām abhavat tadā prajānāṃ tu prajāyate prajānāṃ tvaṃ parikṣayam prajānāṃ pataye tataḥ prajānāṃ patayo acyuta prajānāṃ patayo nāgā prajānāṃ patayo viprā prajānāṃ patir uttamaḥ prajānāṃ puṣṭidasya ca prajānāṃ pṛthivīpāla prajānāṃ poṣaṇe nṛpa prajānāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya prajānāṃ vṛttikāmena prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā prajānurañjako dakṣaḥ prajāpatitvaṃ teṣāṃ vai prajāpatinamaskṛtam prajāpatir aninditaḥ prajāpatir asaṃśayam prajāpatir iti smṛtaḥ prajāpatir yathā dakṣa prajāpatiś ca tapasā prajāpatis te sa tu vakṣyatīti prajāpatīnāṃ dakṣaṃ tu prajāpatīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ prajāpatīn ṛṣīṃś caiva prajāpatīn manūn sarvān prajāpate kaśyapa tvaṃ prajāpate matprasādāt prajāpater apy adhikā prajāpater ātmajāyāṃ prajāpateś ca dakṣasya prajāpateḥ sūtavarya prajāpālanatatparā prajāpālanatatparā prajā maithunasaṃbhavāḥ prajā maithunasaṃbhavāḥ prajārañjanatatparaḥ prajā rājan vinā mayā prajā rudrāś ca bho dvijāḥ prajārtham ṛṣayo yasya prajāvanto mahārathāḥ prajāvān āpnuyān naraḥ prajāvān āyur uttīrṇaḥ prajāvān eti sāyujyam prajāvāṃś ca bhavet sadā prajāvāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ prajāvidhvaṃsakāriṇaḥ prajā vṛddhāḥ samantataḥ prajāvṛddhiṃ paśuṃ medhāṃ prajāś ca pālayiṣye aham prajā samanuvatsyati prajāsarga ihocyate prajāsargaṃ vidhitsataḥ prajāsaṃrakṣaṇaṃ ca syāt prajāsaṃrakṣaṇena ca prajāsu śīryamāṇāsu prajās tasmin prajāpatau prajās tasyāpy ayonijāḥ prajās tenānurañjitāḥ prajās tenānurañjitāḥ prajās teṣāṃ purastāt tu prajās tv aṅgasya sāṃpratam prajāhitacikīrṣayā prajāhitacikīrṣayā prajāhetoḥ prajāpatiḥ prajāṃ puṣṇāti nityaśaḥ prajāṃ puṣṇāti nityaśaḥ prajāḥ kṣudbhayakātarāḥ prajāḥ pārthiva viddhi tat prajāḥ pālayitā prabhuḥ prajāḥ putrān ivaurasān prajāḥ prācetasātmajāḥ prajāḥ procur manīṣiṇaḥ prajāḥ samabhidudruvuḥ prajāḥ sarvāś ca sīdanti prajāḥ sarvāḥ sadaiva hi prajāḥ saṃdhārayiṣyasi prajāḥ saṃvardhayiṣyati prajāḥ sṛjeti vyādiṣṭaḥ prajñayā saṃtaranty uta prajñāpitās tadā dūtair prajñā medhā sarasvatī prajñāvanto arthakovidāḥ prajñāvāñ śrotriyo yajvā prajñāvān puruṣo bhavet prajñāṃ caiva yaśaḥ kīrtim prajvaladbhir bhayānakaiḥ prajvaladbhir bhayānakaiḥ prajvaladbhiḥ samāvṛtaḥ prajvālito jñānamayaḥ pradīpaḥ praṇataṃ prāñjalisthitam praṇatām aditiṃ viprāḥ praṇatā śirasā sā tu praṇatāṃ yadi manyase praṇatir yā kṛtāsmākaṃ praṇato natavatsala praṇato asmi sanātanam praṇadanti tathā cānye praṇamanti stuvanti tam praṇamya ca vṛṣadhvajam praṇamya ca sanātanam praṇamya narakesarīm praṇamya punar abravīt praṇamya punar abravīt praṇamya praṇato bhūtvā praṇamya prayayau hṛṣṭas praṇamya brāhmaṇān punaḥ praṇamya mama gauravāt praṇamya vadatāṃ priyam praṇamya viṣṇuṃ paśyanti praṇamya śirasā devaṃ praṇamya śirasā devī praṇamya śirasā paścāt praṇamya śirasā prabhum praṇamya śirasābravīt praṇamya śirasā bhaktyā praṇamya śirasā viprā praṇamya śirasovāca praṇamya sa tadābravīt praṇamya sarvabhūtastham praṇamya sarvabhūtastham praṇamya so api kṛṣṇāya praṇamyāyatanaṃ paścād praṇayasmitaśobhanam praṇayād bhaktitaḥ surāḥ praṇayābhyāgatāṃ śacīm praṇayed rajanīṃ budhaḥ praṇavaṃ dīrgham udyamya praṇaśyaty api kāyikam praṇāmam akarot tadā praṇāmam akarot tadā praṇidhāya śiro bhūmyāṃ praṇipatito asmi hitāya bhāskaram praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ praṇipatya ca bhaktitaḥ praṇipatya ca bho dvijāḥ praṇipatya ca sāgaram praṇipatya tatas taṃ bhoḥ praṇipatya tatheśānam praṇipatya pitāmaham praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ praṇipatya prasādayet praṇipatya prasādayet praṇipatya mahātmane praṇipatya muhur muhuḥ praṇipatya sureśvaram praṇipatyātha medinī praṇipatyāmbare sthitāḥ praṇipatyāha keśavam praṇipatyāha caivainaṃ praṇipatyedam abravīt praṇipatyedam abravīt praṇipatyoddhavo harim praṇipātapuraḥsaram praṇipātānataśirā praṇipāte namaskāre praṇipāte pradakṣiṇe praṇipātais tathā stotrair praṇipātaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ praṇipātaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ praṇipetur manīṣiṇam praṇītāni janārdana praṇītāyāṃ mahābuddhe praṇītāyāḥ praṇayanaṃ praṇītāsaṃgamaṃ tathā praṇītāsaṃgame cāpi praṇītāsaṃgamo abhavat praṇītāṃ ca kuśāṃs tathā praṇīteti nadī śubhā praṇītodakabindavaḥ praṇītodakam apy etat praṇetar manaso buddher praṇedur dvijasattamāḥ praṇemur manasā śarvaṃ praṇemus te maheśvaram praṇemuḥ sarvadevatāḥ praṇemuḥ sarvadevatāḥ praṇemuḥ stotratatparāḥ pratapaṃś ca itas tataḥ pratapaṃś ca itas tataḥ prataptajāmbūnadacitrapuṅkhaiḥ prataptatāmravarṇābhaṃ prataptatāmravarṇābhaṃ prataptahemasaṃkāśaṃ prataptahemasaṃkāśā prataptāṅgārayuktena prataradhvaṃ nadīṃ buddhyā pratardanasya putrau dvau pratardanasya putrau dvau pratasthe yatra rākṣasaḥ pratāpena narendrasya pratāpya sukham āptavān pratikūlaṃ ca gagane pratikūlaṃ ca saṃtyajet pratikūlaṃ na saṃcaret pratikūlo hi me bhavaḥ pratikṣatrasutaś cāsīt pratikṣatrasya cātmajaḥ pratikṣatro mahāyaśāḥ pratigṛhṇanti tad devā pratigṛhṇanti taṃ devā pratigṛhṇanti sūrayaḥ pratigṛhṇāti cānaghāḥ pratigṛhṇīṣva bho dvija pratigṛhya vilipyatām pratigrahavivarjitaḥ pratigrahītuṃ dharmajña pratighāto hi vidyate pratijagrāha pāṇinā pratijagrāha pārthivaḥ pratijñātaṃ mayā tac ca pratijñām akarod viprā pratijñāya vanaṃ yayau pratitīrtheṣu bho dvijāḥ pratipaddhanalābhāya pratipanne kṛte doṣe pratipādanīyaṃ pātreṣu pratibhān upasargāś ca pratimā cendranīlākhyā pratimānāṃ ca saṃbhavam pratimāyāṃ tathā piṇḍyāṃ pratimārtham aharniśam pratimā vaiṣṇavī śubhā pratimāsakriyādikaḥ pratimā sārvakāmikī pratimāṃ tatra vai dṛṣṭvā pratimāṃ tasya vai hareḥ pratimāṃ tāṃ samārādhya pratimāṃ vāsudevasya pratimāṃ vāsudevasya pratimāṃ śubhalakṣaṇām pratimāḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥ pratimāḥ sumanoharāḥ pratiyāti priyaṃ vakti pratiyātrāphalaṃ viprāḥ pratilapsyatha mā ciram pratilomānulomena pratilome kathaṃ deva pratiśrayān sabhāḥ kuryāt pratiṣiddheṣu tatkṣaṇāt pratiṣedhena bhāgataḥ pratiṣṭhākālam āsādya pratiṣṭhā dharmarājasya pratiṣṭhānapure rājā pratiṣṭhānam athābhyetya pratiṣṭhānaṃ tu tat kṣetraṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ tu tat kṣetraṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ śatakratoḥ pratiṣṭhāne puravare pratiṣṭhāne mahātmanaḥ pratiṣṭhāne mahāyaśāḥ pratiṣṭhāpya svayaṃ vāpi pratiṣṭhāpyāgniṃ vidhivad pratiṣṭhā yonir ucyate pratiṣṭhā yonir eva ca pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayām āsa pratiṣṭhāṃ kurute yas tu pratiṣṭhāṃ pāpanāśinīm pratiṣṭhāṃ vadatas tava pratiṣṭhāṃ vidhicoditām pratiṣṭhāṃ vidhivac cakre pratiṣṭhitayaśā bhuvi pratiṣṭhitaṃ mahāliṅgaṃ pratiṣṭheya tathā tatra pratisaṃkhyāya tattvataḥ pratisaṃgṛhya yogataḥ pratisaṃvatsaraṃ kāryam pratisaṃvatsaraṃ kāryaṃ pratisaṃvatsaraṃ dvijaiḥ pratisaṃvatsaroṣitān pratisrotaś cakāra ha pratihartā tvam eva ca pratīkṣasvāgataṃ mama pratīkṣāṃ cakrire hareḥ pratīkṣyo hy arjunāgamaḥ pratītaś ca nabhasyaś ca pratīpasya tu śāṃtanuḥ pratīpācaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratīpo bhīmasenāt tu pratīyur hṛṣṭamānasāḥ pratodena pratudati pratyakṣatām agāt tasyā pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca pratyakṣalavaṇaṃ varjyam pratyakṣas tryambako mune pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi pratyakṣaṃ prakṛtes tathā pratyakṣaṃ mama cābhyeti pratyakṣaṃ mama cābhyeti pratyakṣaṃ yānti sarvadā pratyakṣaṃ lavaṇaṃ naraḥ pratyakṣaṃ hetavo yogāḥ pratyakṣā bhavati dvijāḥ pratyakṣe ca priyaṃ vakti pratyakṣo abhūj jaganmayaḥ pratyakṣo ayaṃ paro devaḥ pratyakṣo hy asi sarvadā pratyagātmānam ātmanā pratyagram ekadā svinnam pratyagrasaṃjātaśilīndhrakandalī pratyanandat suteritam pratyantavāsino ye api pratyabhijñāya vismitaḥ pratyavāyabhayāt kāmas pratyahaṃ puruṣottamam pratyahaṃ prayataḥ śuciḥ pratyahaṃ prātar utthāya pratyahaṃ vakti vinayād pratyahaṃ saṃyatendriyaḥ pratyahaṃ stauti mānavaḥ pratyākhyātaś ca tair api pratyātmabhūtaḥ paramārtharūpas pratyānītā hi tena vai pratyāsannām athairakām pratyāhārais tu tāḥ sarvāḥ pratyuktas tair dvijottamāḥ pratyuktyaivaṃ vadanti te pratyutthānaṃ na yo madāt pratyuvāca jagannāthaḥ pratyuvāca janārdanam pratyuvāca vivasvantaṃ pratyuvācātha vandyas taṃ pratyuvācātha hetumat pratyuvācādya yāsyāmi pratyuvācāpsarogaṇam pratyūcus taṃ nṛpavaraṃ pratyūṣaś ca prabhāsaś ca pratyūṣasya viduḥ putram pratyūṣasy āgatā brahman pratyūṣe vāpy upasthite pratyūṣe vāpy upasthite pratyekaṃ dinasaptakam pratyekaṃ muktidāyakam pratyekaṃ muktibhājanam pratyekaṃ yātanāyāś ca prathamaṃ kāñcanaṃ tatra prathamaṃ tu śamītīrthaṃ prathamaṃ puṣkaraṃ tīrthaṃ prathamaṃ pūjya gautamaḥ prathamaṃ vadato mama prathamaṃ śuklavarṇābhaṃ prathamaṃ samupaiti mām prathamāṃ brahmaṇe dadyāt prathame ahni caturthe ca pradakṣiṇam athākarot pradakṣiṇam athākarot pradakṣiṇam athākarot pradakṣiṇam athākarot pradakṣiṇam athāvartya pradakṣiṇam atho naraḥ pradakṣiṇam idaṃ kṛtam pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya pradakṣiṇaṃ ca bahuśaḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ tu kurvāṇaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ prakurvīta pradakṣiṇā kṛtā yais tu pradakṣiṇīkṛtā tatra pradakṣiṇīkṛtā tena pradakṣiṇīkṛtā tena pradakṣiṇīkṛtā brahman pradakṣiṇīkṛtās tena pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca rāmacandraḥ pradattaṃ punar āharet pradadarśāgrato vaiṇyaṃ pradadāv asamaujase pradadau taṃ maṇiṃ babhrur pradadau vāsudevāya pradadau vipramukhyebhyo pradadau sa vilobhayan pradadyāc cāhutīḥ kramāt pradadyān narasiṃhasya pradātā kilbiṣī bhavet pradānakṛpaṇā dvijāḥ pradānānāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ pradāsyāmy api durlabham pradāsye rājyapūrvikām pradīpārthaṃ manaḥ kuryād pradīptadṛḍhakaṇṭakam pradīptam iva pāvakam pradīptavaiśvānaratulyatejāḥ pradīptaṃ dīpanaṃ divyaṃ pradīptāṅgāravarṣeṇa pradīptādityataptena pradīptādityataptena pradīptāni ca tejasā pradīpto asau mahāraudraḥ pradeyam etat paramaṃ tvayā bhavet pradoṣārdhe kadācit tu pradyumnadarśane vrīḍā- pradyumnasāmbapramukhāḥ pradyumnasya puraṃ paścād pradyumnaṃ paścime kuryād pradyumnaṃ sūtikāgṛhāt pradyumnaḥ pramukhas teṣāṃ pradyumnaḥ sa kathaṃ punaḥ pradyumnaḥ sa samāhvayat pradyumnād aniruddho abhūd pradyumnādyā hareḥ putrā pradyumnāya namas tubhyam pradyumnāyātmabhūtāya pradyumnāyāniruddhāya pradyumnāstreṇa pīḍitaḥ pradyumneti samākhyātā pradyumnena kathaṃ hataḥ pradyumno api mahāvīryo pradyumno yadi jīvati pradrutās te surāḥ sarve pradhakṣyantīva māṃ tāta pradharṣayitvā kāmātmā pradhānaguṇakāriṇe pradhānapuruṣātmakam pradhānapuruṣāś ca ye pradhānapuruṣottama pradhānabuddhīndriyavākpradhāna pradhānam iti kathyate pradhānaśīlo bhavati pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ param pradhānaṃ ca pumāṃś caiva pradhānaṃ tasya saṃyogād pradhānaṃ puruṣas tasmān pradhānaṃ puruṣo yas tvaṃ pradhānaṃ samavasthitam pradhānaṃ sruva ucyate pradhānaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pradhānātmā tathā bhavān pradhānātmā purā hy eṣa pradhānā devatāgaṇāḥ pradhānāyāprameyāya pradhānāḥ kathitā dvijāḥ pradhāne avasthito vyāpī pradhūpitam ihālakṣya pradhyāyanti tam īśvaram prananartoruvikramaḥ pranaṣṭadharmaṃ dharmajña pranaṣṭanāsāḥ puruṣā pranaṣṭam iva me anagha pranaṣṭavajraṃ devendraṃ pranaṣṭe gandhatanmātre pranaṣṭe rūpatanmātre pranaṣṭoragarākṣase prapañcasya nimittaṃ yat prapañcodbhavakāraṇam prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam prapadya tam anuvratāḥ prapadyate tad ucyatām prapadyante divākaram prapaśyanti kṛtaṃ yugam prapaśyanti mahātmānaṃ prapāḥ puṣkariṇīs tathā prapitāmahasya piṇḍaṃ vai hy prapitāmahāś ca kliśyāmas praphullapadmapattrākṣaṃ praphullapadmāsanasaṃniviṣṭaḥ praphullāmbhojalocanāḥ praphullendīvaraśyāma- prabalaiḥ sūtimārutaiḥ prabuddhaparivarjanāt prabodhanaparaṃ jñānaṃ prabodhahetoḥ praṇatasya śāsanam prabrūte ca kathāś citrā prabhañjanty apare yūpān prabhavanti tatas tebhyo prabhavaṃ cānilaṃ punaḥ prabhavaṃ śaṅkham uttamam prabhavaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ prabhavaḥ śāśvato avyayaḥ prabhavo avyaya eva ca prabhākaro atha kapilas prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ prabhāte ca praṇamyeśaṃ prabhāte tava rūpāṇi prabhāte vimale ravau prabhāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitam prabhāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitam prabhā matis tathā kāntis prabhāyāṃ jajñire nṛpāḥ prabhāyāṃ samapadyata prabhā yena pravartitā prabhāvaś caiva kāraṇam prabhāvaṃ gadato mama prabhāvaṃ tasya devasya prabhāvaṃ tasya vakṣyāmi prabhāvaṃ vaktum īśvaraḥ prabhāvāt tapasaḥ śubhāt prabhāvāt tasya devasya prabhāvābhyadhiko guṇaiḥ prabhāvā munisattamāḥ prabhāveṇa mahātmanaḥ prabhāveṇa mahārājñaḥ prabhāveṇātidarpitā prabhāvo asya kutaḥ prabho prabhāvo asyā viśiṣyate prabhāsanaṃ sītavanaṃ prabhāsasya tu sā bhāryā prabhāsaṃ tu tato viduḥ prabhāsaṃ prayayuḥ sārdhaṃ prabhāsaṃ yāma mā ciram prabhāse kanakhale dvijāḥ prabhāse tu sarasvatī prabhāse lavaṇārṇave prabhāse śaśibhūṣaṇaḥ prabhāso bhārgavo agastir prabhās tanvanti nātapam prabhutve bhavatām eva prabhur asmi pitā tava prabhur asya kriyāyoge prabhur manvantareṣv iha prabhur yaḥ prabhavātmanām prabhur vahati śuddhātmā prabhuṃ lokanamaskṛtam prabhūtabhṛtyapaurāṃ tāṃ prabhūtaśatruḥ paribhūtaduḥkhaḥ prabhūtaṃ vimalaṃ sāram prabhūtānalagarbhiṇī prabhūtopahatād annād prabhṛtyuktās trayas teṣāṃ prabho kiṃ janayiṣyati prabho manyāmahe vayam prabhor nārāyaṇasya vai pramatir jitavāṃs tatra pramatir nāma rājāsīt pramatiḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ pramatiḥ prahasaṃs tadā pramatiḥ prāha garvitaḥ pramater vartanaṃ tadā pramattapuṃskokilasaṃpralāpair pramathānāṃ tathā balam pramathānāṃ tu nāyakaḥ pramathārtiharāya ca pramathāś ca samantataḥ pramathya tarasā balī pramathya sarvān daiteyān pramadā cāpi tadvākyaṃ pramadānāṃ yathā lakṣmīḥ pramadābhiḥ kvacic cāpi pramadāś ca narās tathā pramadāḥ keśaśūlāś ca pramāṇam iti niścitāḥ pramāṇam iti me matiḥ pramāṇaṃ kalpavṛkṣasya pramāṇaṃ ca yuge yuge pramāṇaṃ caiva mārgasya pramāṇaṃ caiva mārgasya pramāṇaṃ tat sanātanam pramāṇaṃ tava gautama pramāṇaṃ tasya lokasya pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ triṣu pramāṇaṃ paramaṃ mataḥ pramāṇaṃ yac ca vedoktaṃ pramāṇaṃ śabda ucyate pramāṇaṃ sraṣṭukāmā vai pramāṇād duratikramaḥ pramāṇāni yathā tathā pramāṇena ṣaḍaṅgulām pramāṇenānuvartante pramāṇenāpi vai yataḥ pramādān mānavāḥ kalau pramādenāpi mohitāḥ pramukhā malayodbhavāḥ pramukhās tv atidāruṇāḥ pramoho bhrama āvarto pramlocākhyāṃ varārohāṃ pramlocāsadṛśās tathā pramlocā sumanoharā pramloce gaccha śīghraṃ tvaṃ prayacchata varaṃ mahyaṃ prayacchanti kadācana prayacchanti tathā rājyaṃ prayacchanti dvijātibhyo prayacchanti dhanādikam prayacchanti sumedhasaḥ prayacchanti svakaṃ phalam prayacchanty abhibuddhayaḥ prayaccha varam uttamam prayacched udakaṃ naraḥ prayataḥ susamāhitaḥ prayatāya pravaktavyaṃ prayatāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ prayatiṣyāmy anukramāt prayatnam akarot kiṃcid prayatnaṃ kartum arhasi prayatnena ca saṃcitam prayatnena tadā martyair prayatnena naraḥ kvacit prayatnena susaṃyataiḥ prayayuḥ suramandiram prayayau kuṇḍinaṃ draṣṭuṃ prayayau gandhamādanam prayayau cātavacchinnaiḥ prayayau nandagokulam prayayau nandagokule prayayau paramāṃ mudam prayayau ratham āruhya prayayau sānugas tataḥ prayāgapuṣkarādīni prayāgaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi prayāgaṃ puṣkaraṃ tathā prayāge ca kurukṣetre prayāge ca mahāmāghyāṃ prayāge puṣkare caiva prayāge pṛthivīpatiḥ prayājān anuyājāṃś ca prayāṇaiḥ sa dine dine prayātaś cārṇavaṃ siddhaiḥ prayātāḥ sarvato diśam prayātāḥ sarvato diśaḥ prayāti cānte layam eva sarvam prayāti dāruṇe mārge prayāti dāruṇe mārge prayāti narake yaś ca prayāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ prayāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ prayāti puruṣo ghorāṃ prayāti mokṣaṃ bhagavatprasādāt prayāti līlayā yoṣin- prayāti śreṣṭhatāṃ śāstre prayāti sāgaraṃ bhūtvā prayāto naśyati kṣipraṃ prayāty atyantanirghṛṇaḥ prayāntaṃ pratyavārayat prayānti karmabhūr viprā prayānti yasya smaraṇena puṃsām prayāntu praśamaṃ mama prayānty anāvṛttigatiṃ manīṣiṇaḥ prayānty āpyāyanaṃ viprāḥ prayānty ete viśasane prayāmi nidhanaṃ vaktre prayāmo madhusūdana prayāsyanti na saṃdeho prayāsyanti mahītalam prayāsyasi padaṃ divyaṃ prayāhi bhītāñ jaya padmanābha prayuktendriyavājinam prayuktaiḥ siddhagandharvaiḥ prarūḍhanavapuṣpāḍhyā praroham upayānti vai prarohahetusāmagryam pralabdhvā janmaloko yaṃ pralambakaṇṭho abhimukhas pralambakeśipramukhān pralambadaśanacchadāḥ pralambadaśanacchadāḥ pralambanarakāv ubhau pralambabāhum āyāma- pralambamathanāya ca pralambaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā pralambaṃ balavān balaḥ pralambaṃ rohiṇīsutaḥ pralambādyās tathā keśī pralambāre namas te astu pralambena tathā balaḥ pralambe nidhanaṃ nīte pralambe saha kṛṣṇena pralambaiḥ parighopamaiḥ pralambaiḥ parighopamaiḥ pralambo dānavottamaḥ pralambo narakas tathā pralambo vinipātitaḥ pralayaprekṣaṇena tu pralayaḥ prabhavaś caiva pralayānaladīpitam pralayānaladīpitam pralayānalasaṃkāśa pralayānalasaṃkāśaṃ pralayānalasaṃnibhaiḥ pralayāmbudanirghoṣaṃ pralayāya prakalpate pralayāvartakādibhiḥ pralaye ca kam abhyeti pralaye ca tam abhyeti pralaye jāyate yathā pralaye yānti mām api pralayotpattikāriṇe pralayotpattitattvajñāḥ pralayo ayam aśeṣasya pralāpakuśalā tadā pralīnā devagandharva- pralīne ca tatas tasmin praluptaḥ pitṛpiṇḍataḥ pralobhayitvā vividhair pravaktāro maharṣayaḥ pravakṣyāmi tu te bhūyas pravakṣyāmi mataṃ kṛtsnaṃ pravakṣyāmi muniśreṣṭhāḥ pravakṣyāmi yathātatham pravakṣyāmi yathātathyaṃ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsena pravakṣyāmi samāsena pravakṣyāmi samāsena pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ pravakṣyāmy ānupūrvyeṇa pravakṣye tasya ye doṣā pravakṣye dharmasaṃśrayam pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ pravaraś cārimejayaḥ pravaraṃ cāmṛtaṃ bahiḥ pravaraṃ sarvalokānāṃ pravarā cāmṛtā śubhā pravarā tasya jīvikā pravarāyāḥ purā devāḥ pravarāv iti saṃmatau pravarāsaṃgamaṃ viduḥ pravarāsaṃgamo nāma pravarā sābhavan nadī pravare brāhmaṇe kule pravare amṛtam uttamam pravare yogināṃ kule pravare yogināṃ kule pravare yogināṃ kule pravare yogināṃ gehe pravare vaiṣṇave viprā pravaraivaṃ mahānadī pravargāvartabhūṣaṇaḥ pravartakāya prakṛteḥ pravartatāṃ nṛtyam itīty uvāca pravartate vinā hetuṃ pravartamānas tu rajaḥ pravartamāne tasmiṃs tu pravartamānair anekair pravavarṣa sahasrākṣaḥ pravavau sukhasaṃsparśo pravahan viṣayān dvijāḥ pravālamaṇim uttamam pravālāṅkurabhūṣitaiḥ pravāsasthair gṛhasthair vā pravāsasthair gṛhasthair vā praviveśa ca tattoyaṃ praviveśa tato rāmo praviveśa tapovanam praviveśa tvarānvitā praviveśa dvijottamāḥ praviveśa punar nijam praviveśa punaḥ svakam praviveśa mahāguhām praviveśa mahīpatiḥ praviveśa mahīpatiḥ praviveśa svam āśramam praviveśa hutāśanam praviśa tvaṃ jayāya vai praviśanti parasparam praviśanti suraśreṣṭhaṃ praviśanto rasātalam praviśann eva cāśramam praviśet tatra rājāyaṃ praviśen nātra saṃśayaḥ praviśya ca rasātalam praviśya tatra bhagavāṃs praviśya dadṛśe aditim praviśya devatāgāraṃ praviśya dvārakāṃ so atha praviśya nātra bhetavyaṃ praviśya pūjayec charvaṃ praviśya pūjayed bhānuṃ praviśya yamunājale praviśya vadanaṃ rāhor praviśya saṃyato bhūtvā praviśyātmagṛhaṃ tataḥ praviśyāyatanaṃ viṣṇoḥ praviṣṭamātre salile mataṅgas praviṣṭaṃ ca hy anāmayam praviṣṭaḥ ko nu tiṣṭhati praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśādhastād praviṣṭā gautamīṃ tathā praviṣṭā ca mamāśramam praviṣṭā tvaṃ praviṣṭo asi praviṣṭānāṃ mahātmanām praviṣṭāyāṃ hutavahe praviṣṭā ye rasātalam praviṣṭās te mahaujasaḥ praviṣṭāḥ sūryamaṇḍalam praviṣṭe tu manau viprā praviṣṭe atha bile kṛṣṇe praviṣṭe bhavanaṃ deve praviṣṭeṣu rasātalam praviṣṭo antar jalaṃ yas tu praviṣṭo mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ praviṣṭo asi yadā mama praviṣṭau rāmakṛṣṇau ca praviṣṭau sumahāraṅgaṃ pravīram anaghaṃ tathā pravṛktaḥ pārijātārtham pravṛttas tatra vajradhṛk pravṛttasya nivartanam pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca pravṛttaṃ na papuḥ somaṃ pravṛttaṃ mama mānasam pravṛttaṃ raja ity evaṃ pravṛttā na nivartante pravṛttāni purodhasā pravṛttān vrajavāsinaḥ pravṛttā munisattama pravṛttāś carituṃ tapaḥ pravṛttir na kalau nṛṇām pravṛttir nopalabhyate pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo pravṛtte ca mahāyajñe pravṛtte pratisaṃcare pravṛtteyaṃ mahānadī pravṛtte vā siṃhiketi pravṛttair ijyate hy asau pravṛttau nātha saṃsthitaḥ pravṛddhaḥ pippalān evam pravepamānāṃ sa ca tāṃ praveśayanti tā haste praveśayām āsa tadā praveśas tena devānām praveśas tena devānām praveśas tena vai nityaṃ praveśas tena vai nityaṃ praveśas tena hṛṣṭānāṃ praveśas tena hṛṣṭānāṃ praveśaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ praveśaḥ pāpakarmaṇām praveśo me kathaṃ bhavet praveśyate purīṃ ghorāṃ praveśyate purīṃ ghorāṃ praveṣṭum api nārada praveṣṭuṃ havyavāhanaḥ pravrajyāliṅgino adhamāḥ pravrajyāvasite yac ca praśamaṃ sarvaduḥkhāni praśaśaṃsuś ca pāṇḍava praśaśaṃsus tadābhyetya praśaśaṃsus tadā vyāsaṃ praśaśaṃsus tadā hṛṣṭā praśastaṃ kiṃ mahītale praśastāś cetarāḥ sarvās praśastā hy arkasaptamī praśastāḥ sarvakāryeṣu praśasya ca nagaṃ punaḥ praśaṃsamānas taṃ yajñaṃ praśaṃsasi kathaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ praśaṃsasi punaḥ punaḥ praśaṃsasi surottama praśaṃsāmi punaḥ punaḥ praśādhi māṃ surajyeṣṭha praśāntam iva saṃyuktaṃ praśāntaś ca tadā rājā praśāntaśvāpadāśramam praśāntākhilavigrahaḥ praśāntāya tapasvine praśāntāya svarūpiṇe praśāmyati tadā jyotir praśāmyati tadā vāyuḥ praśnabhāro mahān eṣa praśnaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca saṃkaṭaḥ praśne asmin munisattamāḥ praśrayāvanatā bhūtvā praśrayāvanatā satī praśrayeṇa damena ca praṣṭum arhāma sattama praṣṭuṃ tāṃ ca tadā prāyād prasaṅgād vā pramādataḥ prasajjantīṃ tu tām āha prasannavadano bhūtvā prasannasalilāni ca prasannasalilāni ca prasannasumukho bhūtvā prasannas tu taveśāno prasannaḥ pradadau varam prasannā tava sā devī prasannātmātmani sthitvā prasannātmā vikalmaṣaḥ prasannā nirmalā dṛṣṭir prasannābhir mahāmatiḥ prasannābhīṣṭadā yā syāt prasannābhyāṃ harīśābhyāṃ prasannāyatalocana prasannāyatalocanam prasannāyāṃ pradāsyasi prasanne tripurāntake prasanne tvayy asaṃprāptaṃ prasannenendumaulinā prasanne bhāskare tasya prasanno garuḍadhvajaḥ prasanno bhagavan yadi prasanno abhūt sureśvaraḥ prasanno abhūn maheśvaraḥ prasanno vākyam abravīt prasanno vimalaḥ śuciḥ prasanno vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ prasanno asi prabho yadi prasanno asmi tavānagha prasanno ahaṃ mahābhāgā prasanno hy adadāc chaṃbhuḥ prasabhaṃ dīyamānaṃ ca prasahya kartuṃ ye sākṣād prasahyāharaṇaṃ cāpi prasaṃkhyātuṃ bahutvāc ca prasātikāṃ satūlikāṃ prasādadhanabhājanam prasādanārthaṃ lokasya prasādam avasīdataḥ prasādayaṃś ca taṃ devaṃ prasādayām āsa patiṃ prasādayet tato viprāḥ prasādasumukha prabho prasādasumukho brahmann prasādasumukho vibhuḥ prasādasumukhau nāthau prasādaṃ kartum arhasi prasādaṃ kuru paśyeyaṃ prasādaṃ prapitāmaha prasādaṃ manasas tathā prasādaḥ sahasotpanno prasādāc ca vṛṣākapeḥ prasādāc chārṅgadhanvanaḥ prasādāt kiṃ tu duṣkaram prasādāt tava govinda prasādāt tava deveśa prasādāt tava deveśa prasādāt tava śūkara prasādāt tava suvrata prasādāt tasya tāḥ sarvāḥ prasādāt tasya devasya prasādāt tasya devasya prasādāt tasya devasya prasādād āpyate na kim prasādād devadevasya prasādād devadevasya prasādād rākṣasāntakaḥ prasādān narasiṃhasya prasādāya ca jāyate prasādārūḍhavismayaḥ prasādenopasaṃhara prasādya praṇato bhūtvā prasādya pratimāṃ śakraḥ prasādya yatamānasaḥ prasādya yatnena tam ugratejasaṃ prasādyomāpatiṃ prabhum prasādhiṣye tvayā tasmān prasāraṇākuñcanādau prasārya saṃniyacchati prasīda kamalākānta prasīda kaṃsakeśīghna prasīda kṛṣṇa daityaghna prasīdatām eṣa sa devadevaḥ prasīda tridaśeśvara prasīda danujāntaka prasīda devadeveti prasīda devadeveśa prasīda devi sarvasya prasīdanti ca saṃsthāyāṃ prasīda parameśvara prasīda pāhīśa mahābhayebhyo prasīda puruṣottama prasīda mathurāvāsa prasīda madhusūdana prasīda madhusūdana prasīda mama deveśa prasīda mama bhūdhara prasīda mātar mama gautamīti prasīda muśalāyudha prasīda yadunandana prasīda varadā bhava prasīda varadāvyaya prasīda varado bhava prasīda vibudhapriya prasīda vibudhaśreṣṭha prasīda vibudhālaya prasīda vibudhāṃ nātha prasīda śakrāvaraja prasīda sarvakṛd deva prasīda sarvadharmātman prasīda sarvabhūtātman prasīda sarvalokeśa prasīda salilāvāsa prasīda sumahādeva prasīdāriṣṭanāśana prasīdeti punaḥ punaḥ prasīdeti punaḥ punaḥ prasīdety abravīd rāmaṃ prasuptaṃ ca jalāntike prasūtā yā dvijottamāḥ prasūtiṃ tvam avāpsyasi prasūto madhuraṃ vacaḥ prasṛtās tān munīn ūcuḥ prasenavadhakāraṇāt prasenaś cātha satrājic prasenaś copadevaś ca prasenas tena bhūṣitaḥ prasenasya padaṃ gṛhya praseno dvāravatyāṃ tu prasoṣyanti tathā striyaḥ praskhaladbhiḥ kvacit kvacit praskhaladbhiḥ kvacit kvacit praskhalantaṃ rudantaṃ ca praskhalantaṃ rudantaṃ ca praskhalantaḥ pade pade prasthānāt tatra mātṝṇāṃ prasthāne ye mṛtā vīrā prasthāne ye mṛtā vīrā prasthe tīrthaṃ samāsādya prasnāto niyataḥ śuciḥ prasphuradadharottaram prasravodbhūtadugdhārdrāṃ praharṣam atulaṃ gatvā praharṣam atulaṃ yātā praharṣaḥ prītir ānandaṃ prahasya tasmai viśveśas prahasya devarṣim uvāca nāradam prahasya bhāvagambhīram prahasya madhusūdanaḥ prahasyāha surāraṇim prahārāñ jahasur dvijāḥ prahito bhagavan suraiḥ prahṛtaṃ gopayoṣitsu prahṛtaṃ tasya bho dvijāḥ prahṛtaṃ tu punar balam prahṛṣṭacetāḥ sutarāṃ babhūva prahṛṣṭapuruṣastrīkāv prahṛṣṭas tu himācale prahṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭavān nandaṃ prahṛṣṭās tuṣṭuvur gopāḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā prahrādam amitaujasam prahrādaś caiva vīryavān prahlādayati vai prajāḥ prahlādayantī cetāṃsi prahlādaḥ sarvadaityānāṃ prahlādo aśvapatiḥ kumbhaḥ prākāravapre vinyasya prākāraśatasaṃbādhām prākārāḥ kāñcanās tasyā prākārāḥ kāñcanās tasyā prākārodyānamaṇḍitaiḥ prākṛtaṃ liṅgam avraṇam prākṛtaṃ vijugupsate prākṛtaḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ prākṛtaḥ sa layo dvijāḥ prākṛtān abhimanyate prākṛtāni śarīriṇām prākṛto dviparārdhikaḥ prāktanānām ihāṃhasām prākpraśastaṃ cirātītam prāk śvā bhavati bho viprās prākṣālayac ca svāṅgāni prākṣipat svasya veśmani prāgarjitānekakarma- prāgācaritapuṇyataḥ prāgāc chiṣyaiḥ sa gautamaḥ prāgād gaṅgāṃ sa bhārgavaḥ prāgād devīṃ ca gautamīm prāg āsan sapta saptakāḥ prāg āsīc ca kulodvahaḥ prāg āsīt parimaṇḍalam prāg āsīn nṛpatiḥ śrīmān prāguktaphalabhāgī sa prāgjyotiṣapurasyāsya prāgjyotiṣapuraṃ dhīmāṃs prāgjyotiṣapureśvaraḥ prāgjyotiṣaṃ ca nagaram prāgjyotiṣāś ca madrāś ca prāgvaṃśakāyo dyutimān prāgvaṃśaṃ yajñabhūmiṃ ca prāṅ mayoktās tu yuṣmabhyaṃ prāṅmukhaḥ savitus tadā prāṅmukhodaṅmukho api vā prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi prācīnabarhir ākhyātaḥ prācīnabarhir bhagavān prācīnabarhir bhagavān prācīnabarhir bhavitā prācīnabarhiṣaṃ śukraṃ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ prācīnāgreṣu vai devān prācīnāmalakaṃ kṣīraṃ prācīnāmalakair bilvaiḥ prācīnāmalakair lodhrair prācīnāmalakaiḥ plakṣair prācuryeṇa harir bāṇaṃ prācetasam ataḥ param prācetasas tathā dakṣo prācetasasya dakṣasya prācetasānāṃ sā bhāryā prācyā janapadās tathā prācyān deśān nibodhata prājāpatyam anuttamam prājāpatyam anuttamam prājāpatyaṃ jitena ca prājāpatyādikān kramāt prājāpatyena tīrthena prājāpatyena vātena prājāpatye śubhe mārge prājñas tatrāpi jāyate prājñas tiṣṭhet kadācana prājñas tiṣṭhet kadācana prājñaḥ piṇḍodakakriyām prājñaḥ sthapatibhiḥ saha prājñenopanimantraṇam prājñaiḥ śodhanam ātmanaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt prāñjaliḥ praṇatā bhūtvā prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā prāñjaliḥ pratyavedayat prāṇaghnīṃ vedanāṃ kaṣṭāṃ prāṇaghnīṃ vedanāṃ kaṣṭāṃ prāṇadaṇḍāya nityāya prāṇayātrānimittaṃ ca prāṇayātrikamātraḥ syān prāṇayogamayormilam prāṇarūpiṇya eva ca prāṇaś ca tvaṃ rajaś ca tvaṃ prāṇaś ceṣṭā tathā sparśa prāṇas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ prāṇahānim avāpāgryāṃ prāṇaṃ tarpaya mā ciram prāṇātipātād viratāḥ prāṇātipātī yogīndro prāṇātmānaṃ ca mārutam prāṇātyaye sarvadhanāpahāre prāṇān āyamya cācamya prāṇān āyamya vāgyataḥ prāṇān nūnaṃ tyajiṣyataḥ prāṇān priyān puṇyabhājo manuṣyāḥ prāṇān rakṣa śucismite prāṇān samyak parityajet prāṇāpānāśrayo vāyuḥ prāṇāpānau ca jīvaś ca prāṇāpānau samānaś ca prāṇāpānau samānaṃ ca prāṇāpānau samārudhya prāṇāyāmas tathaiva ca prāṇāyāmas tu saguṇo prāṇā hy annaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prāṇāṃs tatyāja duḥkhitaḥ prāṇāṃs tyajati nāgo ayaṃ prāṇāṃs tyajati mānavaḥ prāṇāṃs tyajati mānavaḥ prāṇāṃs tyajati mānavaḥ prāṇāṃs tyajati yo martyaḥ prāṇāḥ sarve asyāpi dehānvitasya prāṇighātavivarjitaḥ prāṇighātavivarjitaḥ prāṇinas tu pade pade prāṇinaṃ cāyuṣakṣaye prāṇinaṃ cāyuṣakṣaye prāṇinaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ prāṇinaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ prāṇinaḥ kuryur añjasā prāṇinām abhayapradāḥ prāṇinām iha sarveṣāṃ prāṇinā sādhv asādhu vā prāṇināṃ jīvadhāraṇam prāṇino atra nagottame prāṇino atra manorathān prāṇino dānaśālinaḥ prāṇino abhīṣṭadā teṣāṃ prāṇino yasya kasyacit prāṇino rodayanti ca prāṇibhir jīvasaṃjñakaiḥ prāṇibhir jīvasaṃjñakaiḥ prāṇibhūtagatāni vai prāṇihā brahmarākṣasaḥ prāṇihiṃsārataḥ krūro prāṇihiṃsāvimokṣeṇa prāṇī kvāpy atra vidyate prāṇī dharmasamāyukto prāṇebhyo api priyaḥ putraḥ prāṇebhyo api sudurlabhaḥ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatair api prāṇo agnir madhusūdanaḥ prāṇo atha ramaṇas tathā prāṇo apānaḥ samānaś ca prāṇo bṛhaspatiś caiva prāṇo asya paramātmānaṃ prātar adbhutadarśanam prātar utthāya mānavāḥ prātar niśi tathā saṃdhyā- prātar bhokṣyasi kalyāṇa prātaś caivāparāhṇe ca prātas tvam āgatā bhadre prātaḥkāle gautamīṃ tu prātaḥkāle sabhāryo asau prātiṣṭhad vaḍavārūpā prātiṣṭhan kupitās tataḥ prādāc ca tasmai bhagavān prādāc chāpaṃ mamedṛśam prādāj jyaiṣṭhyaṃ bhavaś cāpi prādāt kanyāṃ mahāśaneḥ prādāt kṛpāluḥ smaraṇāt pavitrāṃ prādāt tasmai dvijātaye prādāt paramadeveśam prādāt prītyā tathā hariḥ prādāt savasanaṃ dhanam prādād indraṃ punaś cedaṃ prādād indraṃ śacīkāntaṃ prādād dharmāya dhīmate prādād yathepsitaṃ kṣīraṃ prādād vidyām aśeṣataḥ prādād viṣṇuś cakram atho prādān nāgepsitān varān prādān mama kamaṇḍalum prādāṃ kanyāṃ vivasvate prādāṃ kanyāṃ sumadhyamām prādāṃ nārada śāntaye prādāṃ brahmagiriṃ puṇyaṃ prādurāsan mahātmanaḥ prādurbhavati kāryataḥ prādurbhavati māyayā prādurbhavati vīryavān prādurbhavati sā nityaṃ prādurbhāvasamāśritāḥ prādurbhāvasahasrāṇi prādurbhāvaḥ purāṇeṣu prādurbhāvānukīrtanam prādurbhāvānukīrtanāt prādurbhāvānukīrtane prādurbhāvāś ca ye vibho prādurbhāvāśritaṃ puṇyaṃ prādurbhāvāśritāṃ viṣṇoḥ prādurbhāvāṃś ca vakṣyāmi prādurbhāvāḥ purāṇeṣu prādurbhāvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ prādurbhāvo adbhutaḥ śubhaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ prādurbhūtas tamonudaḥ prādurbhūtā punar navā prādurbhūto mahān agnir prādurbhūto mahāmune prādyumnir yatra tiṣṭhati prādyumneḥ sumahātmanaḥ prādhānyaṃ prasave tathā prādhānyena prakīrtitāḥ prādhānyena prakīrtitāḥ prādhānyena bravīmi tān prānte antar bāhyatas tathā prāpayac ca guruṃ prabhuḥ prāpayanti paraṃ pāraṃ prāpayanty udakaṃ mahat prāpayām āsa govindaḥ prāpayām āsur analaṃ prāpayomāvanaṃ subhrūr prāpuḥ kṣayaṃ na ke nāma prāpta evāsmi mantavyo prāptakāle ca yad duḥkhaṃ prāptajñāno mahābuddhir prāptaputraś ca nṛpatis prāptaye pāpamuktaye prāptavāṃs tat padaṃ divyaṃ prāptavidyaḥ kaṭhaḥ prīto prāptavyaṃ tapasaḥ phalam prāptavyaṃ dhanapālatvaṃ prāptavyaṃ prāptavat tatra prāptas tato asya mṛtyur vai prāptaṃ taptuṃ tato nṛpaḥ prāptaṃ tāta punaḥ punaḥ prāptaṃ nidhanam utsukau prāptaḥ paramadharmajña prāptaḥ sa munisattamaḥ prāptaḥ saṃprītimān āha prāptaḥ snātvā ca gautamyāṃ prāptā gaṅgā mahāmune prāptāni dārasaṃyoga- prāptāni vidhinā rājñā prāptāni śataśo mayā prāptā madhyāhnasamaye prāptā vayaṃ hi tat kālam prāptāś ca bāndhavāḥ putrā prāptās te vigatiṃ mātas prāptāṃ pitṝṃś ca kāmataḥ prāptāḥ pretapuraṃ narāḥ prāptāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ prāptukāmair jayaṃ yudhi prāptum icche jagannātha prāptuṃ śakyo na caivāhaṃ prāpte kāle tu saṃtyajya prāpte kāle tu saṃtyajya prāpte atha kāle smaraṇaṃ tathaiva prāpte madhyaṃdine ravau prāpte vai cākṣuṣāntare prāpte vaivasvate antare prāpteṣu dṛkpathaṃ teṣu prāpteṣu dṛkpathaṃ teṣu prāpto vepathunā naraḥ prāpto asi naḥ parigataḥ paramo vimohaḥ prāpto asmi kṛtakṛtyatām prāptau candradivākarau prāptau ca manaso mude prāptau tau vihagottamau prāptau bālagajāv iva prāpnuyāc ca mahad yaśaḥ prāpnuyād akṣayaṃ padam prāpnuyād viṣayān kaścit prāpnuyur vimalaṃ mārgaṃ prāpnuvanti tathā yogāt prāpnuvanti dvijātayaḥ prāpnuvanti narā rājyaṃ prāpnuvanti narā vipra prāpnuvanti narāḥ kāmān prāpnuvanti narāḥ kāle prāpnuvanti narāḥ kāle prāpnuvanti narāḥ phalam prāpnuvanti na saṃśayaḥ prāpnuvanti na saṃśayaḥ prāpnuvanti parāṃ gatim prāpnuvanti parāṃ gatim prāpnuvanti parāṃ siddhiṃ prāpnuvanti parāṃ siddhiṃ prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ prāpnuvanti mahad duḥkhaṃ prāpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ prāpnuvanti mahāphalam prāpnuvanti śubhaṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnuvantīpsitān kāmān prāpnuvantīha mānavāḥ prāpnuvanty abhivāñchitam prāpnuvanty abhivāñchitam prāpnuvanty ubhayaṃ phalam prāpnuvaṃs tasya tāṃ guhām prāpnoti jīvam eva hi prāpnoti tadvan mātṛbhyaḥ prāpnoti tāvad vajreṇa prāpnoti na mṛṣā vacaḥ prāpnoti narake ghore prāpnoti paramāṃ siddhiṃ prāpnoti pitṛpūjakaḥ prāpnoti puruṣas tena prāpnoti puruṣaḥ kalau prāpnoti puruṣaḥ phalam prāpnoti puruṣaḥ sarvaṃ prāpnoti puruṣaḥ sudhīḥ prāpnoti puruṣaḥ sudhīḥ prāpnoti brāhmaṇo vidyāṃ prāpnoti lokān puruṣo prāpnoti śīghraṃ bhagavatprasādāt prāpnoti śubhakṛn naraḥ prāpnoti śubhakṛn naraḥ prāpnoti śṛṇu tāny api prāpnoti hayamedhasya prāpnoty anyāṃś ca vāñchitān prāpnoty abhimatān kāmāñ prāpnoty abhimatāṃl lokān prāpnoty abhimatāṃ siddhim prāpnoty avikalaṃ śubham prāpnoty ātyantikaṃ layam prāpnoty āśu paraṃ sthānaṃ prāpya gaṅgāṃ gautamīṃ tāṃ prāpya jālam ariṃdamāḥ prāpya tatra sarasvatīm prāpyate api bhavāntare prāpyate brūhi mānavaiḥ prāpyate bhārate varṣe prāpyate yatra tapasaḥ prāpyante nārakair viprās prāpyante puruṣair mṛtaiḥ prāpya puṇyo bhaviṣyasi prāpya prabhāsaṃ prayatā prāpya bālo apy abālavat prāpya brahmarṣisamatāṃ prāpya bhāryāṃ śive bhaktiṃ prāpya yogabalād yogī prāpya yogaṃ hares tatra prāpya lakṣmīṃ navām iva prāpyasi tvaṃ samīhitam prāpya siddhiṃ gatān ṛṣīn prāpyā yā nikhilair makhaiḥ prāpyāvabhṛtham apy agryaṃ prāpyeha sa bhiṣakkriyaḥ prāpsyate manasaḥ priyān prāpsyanti dhanyāḥ khalu te manuṣyā prāpsyanti nirupaskṛtāḥ prāpsyanti vyāhatasukhaṃ prāpsyanti hrāsam āyuṣaḥ prāpsyasi tvaṃ tadā raṇam prāpsyasi tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ prāpsyasi paramāṃ gatim prāpsyase nātra saṃśayaḥ prāpsyase priyakṛn mama prāpsyase vada kalyāṇaṃ prāpsyase sarvakāmāṃś ca prāpsyāmaḥ saṃgaraṃ hitvā prābalyam anayor bhuvi prābravīc chvaśuraṃ gurum prāyacchat sa tu viprebhyo prāyaśo nātimāninaḥ prāyaśo amī prakīrtitāḥ prāyaśo alpajalāśayaḥ prāyaścittakriyā kalau prāyaścittanakho ghoraḥ prāyaścittaparāṅmukhaḥ prāyaścittaṃ tataś caret prāyaścittaṃ tu tasyaikaṃ prāyaścittaṃ na tasyāsti prāyaścittāni yad yathā prāyaścittāni vārghyaṃ ca prāyaścittāni viprendrā prāyaścittāny aśeṣāṇi prāyas tvaṃ pāpakāriṣu prāyāc ca vyathito agastyāc prāyāc chvetagṛhaṃ svayam prāyāt pūrvārṇavaṃ prati prāyāt pūrvārṇavaṃ prati prāyāt pūrvārṇavaṃ prati prāyāt svapitaraṃ gurum prāyād aśvattharūpiṇam prāyād uttaṅkasahito prāyād yatra purūravāḥ prāyād vārīśvaraṃ viṣṇuḥ prāyānāśakayor api prāyeṇa haraṇe doṣāḥ prāyo vṛndārako bhavet prārabdha eva hi mayā prārabdhe abhiṣṭutā rājñā prārambham akarot tadā prārambhaṃ ca karomy aham prārambhāś cāvasīdanti prārthanā saphalā nātha prārthanāṃ tāṃ maṇer baddhvā prārthayantaś ca taṃ viprā prārthayante bhavantaś cet prārthayan dīrgham āyuś ca prārthayan sumahad yaśaḥ prārthayām āsa cāśiṣam prārthayitvā suvidyaṃ taṃ prārthayeśaṃ divākaram prārthitaṃ saṃpratīha naḥ prārthitaṃ sumahad varam prārthitaḥ sumahātapāḥ prārthitaḥ soma evādāv prārthitā bhuvam āpnuyāt prārthitāśvāsitas tayā prārthitau tridaśārcitau prāleyacūrṇavarṣibhyāṃ prāleyapaṭalacchannaiḥ prāleyādreḥ samantataḥ prāvartanta mahākratūn prāvartayat tadā rājā prāvādyanta tatas tatra prāviśac cūrṇito abhavat prāviśat tan mahāraṇyaṃ prāviśad yatra sa dvijaḥ prāviśann anivāritāḥ prāvṛṭkāla ivābhūc ca prāvṛṭkālavahāḥ santi prāvṛṭkālas tato atīva prāvṛṭkāle ca nabhasi prāvṛṭkāle ambujekṣaṇaḥ prāvṛḍvyatītā vikasat- prāvṛṇmeghapratīkāśaṃ prāvṛṣīva balāhakaḥ prāsatomarapāṇayaḥ prāsādakaraṇaṃ tathā prāsādaśatasaṃbādhaṃ prāsādas tatra tiṣṭhet tu prāsādaṃ kārayām āsa prāsādaṃ caiva viśrutam prāsādaṃ caiva vaiṣṇavam prāsādaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tataḥ prāsādaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā prāsādaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam prāsādārthaṃ hares tatra prāsāde caiva nirmite prāsāde bhavanottame prāsāde bhuvanottame prāsāde bhuvanottame prāsādair upaśobhitam prāsādaiḥ samalaṃkṛtā prāsādopari saṃsthitam prāsūta mohite jane prāha ko ayaṃ tvayocyate prāha gacchasva satyena prāha gambhīranādinī prāha cāṇūramuṣṭikau prāha cintāparo bhūtvā prāha cedaṃ parasparam prāha cainām alaṃ caṇḍi prāha jñāto bhavān viṣṇor prāha taṃ nandagopaś ca prāha taṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ prāha dāmodaras tadā prāha daityā ime iti prāha brahmā sureśvaraḥ prāha bhadra kva gacchasi prāha bhadre na gṛhṇāmi prāha bhāsvān vṛṇuṣvaikaṃ prāha bhūyo gamiṣyatha prāha macchāpam āditaḥ prāha vākyaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ prāha vṛddhān mahāmatiḥ prāha śīghraṃ jagatpatiḥ prāhasat te ca cukṣubhuḥ prāha sarvān idaṃ vacaḥ prāha sarvān mahāsurān prāha sā lalitaṃ kubjā prāha svargasadomadhye prāhābhīrān hasann iva prāhāsau śakaṭaṃ bhokṣye prāhur avyaktagocarāt prāhur yoganidarśanam prāhedaṃ patitau bhuvi prāhedaṃ vacanaṃ prītyā prāhedaṃ vacanaṃ śubham prāhendrasya parābhavam prāhendraṃ pramatis tadvan prāhendraṃ vinayānvitā prāheśaḥ sarvabhūtānām prāhoccaśabdaṃ vriyatāṃ dvijāte prāhoccai rāmakeśavau prāhoccair vyāyatān narān prāhoccais taṃ jitaṃ mayā prāhotphullavilocanā prāṃśum uttuṅgabāhuṃ ca prāṃśū riṣṭaś ca saptamaḥ prāṃśor eko abhavat putraḥ priya ity api kathyate priyaṅgutagarārjunaiḥ priyaṅgubhis tathārghayet priyaṅguvaṭakhādiraiḥ priyaṅgūś cūtataravaś priyadarśās tathā cānye priyaputrāv ekaputrau priyaputraiś cātakaiś ca priyaputraiś cātakaiś ca priyaputraiḥ śukais tathā priyayā ca purodhasaḥ priyayāntaḥ praviṣṭo asi priyavādaratāś ca ye priyavādaratāś ca ye priyavratottānapādau priyaś cāsīc chatakratoḥ priyaṃ cocur divaukasaḥ priyaṃ yan manasi sthitam priyaṃ syāt surapūjita priyaḥ kakṣīvataḥ sutaḥ priyāṇām ucitāgame priyāṇy anekāny avadan priyā tu somasya mahāsukīrtiḥ priyānuyuktaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ premavadbhiḥ priyān kāmān avāpsyasi priyān prāṇān devaviprārthahetos priyāyā guṇakīrtanam priyāyās tanayā nṛpāḥ priyā rājño vaśe sthitāḥ priyārthaṃ tasya nṛpater priyā śaṃbhor mahāmate priyāṃ tadovāca mahātriputraḥ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ svakaṃ padam priyāṃ vai parameṣṭhine priyāṃś ca manasepsitān priye ahalye bhavati priye cāṅgena te śape priyepsuḥ sa śatakratuḥ priye vai jātavedasi priyeṣu mānoddhatamānasānāṃ priyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ prīṇayanti manuṣyāṇāṃ prīṇayāvaḥ svakarmabhiḥ prīṇayitvā parāvṛtya prīṇāty amṛtasaṃmitam prītaye hy anulepanam prītaḥ provāca bhagavān prītaḥ provāca mādhavaḥ prītaḥ san manasepsitam prītaḥ saṃsmṛtya paurāṇīṃ prītā babhūvuḥ saṃhṛṣṭā prītā astu girijā mama prītās te kukkurāndhakāḥ prītāḥ procuḥ punaḥ punaḥ prītāḥ sarve asurārayaḥ prītāḥ sumanaso abhavan prītibhedaḥ kṛto na ca prītibhedaḥ kṛto na ca prītimantaṃ priyaṃ tathā prītimanto abhavan mune prītimān agamat tatra prītimān atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā prītimān abhavat kṛṣṇaṃ prītimān abhavad rājā prītiyuktā gataklamā prītiyukto bhaviṣyati prītir yaśaḥ saukhyam anādidharmaḥ prītivistāritekṣaṇaiḥ prītivisphāritekṣaṇaḥ prītiś ca kriyate yadi prītiś ca vadatāṃ vara prītiś cābhūn mahāmune prītiṃ vai cakratuḥ surau prītiḥ kadācid vaiṣamyaṃ prītiḥ sastrīkumārasya prītena ca purodhasā prīto abhavat tatas tasya prīto abhavan maheśo api prīto bhaven mahādevaḥ prīto bhogaṃ pradāsyati prīto asi yadi me nātha prīto asmi tava bhaktasya prīto ahaṃ te nṛpaśreṣṭha prītau svo varavarṇini prītyarthaṃ dhārayeśānaṃ prītyarthaṃ munisattamāḥ prītyarthaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ prītyā kauravanandanaḥ prītyā caivārjitān arthān prītyā provāca pārvatī prītyā yadi prasanno asi prītyā sa parayā devas prītyā sapraśrayaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ prītyā hariharāv evaṃ prītyutphullamukhā viprāḥ prītyendrāya nyavedayat prīyatām iti devatāḥ prīyatāṃ puruṣottamaḥ prīyante triṣu lokeṣu prīyante pitaras tasya prīyamāṇaḥ śatakratum prekṣaṇālāpakuśalāḥ prekṣaṇālāpakuśalāḥ prekṣantaṃ nṛtyam uttamam prekṣantaḥ kiṃ bhaved iti prekṣasva paścān māṃ brūhi prekṣite cāpi kiṃcana prekṣya lajjām upeyivān pretakāryāṇi cakrire pretatvāt pitṛtāṃ gatāḥ pretam uddiśya kartavyam pretarājānam antarā pretādhāraṃ kumārakam pretāya salilaṃ deyaṃ pretāvāsakṛtālayaḥ pretāsthicayanaṃ dvijaiḥ pretībhūtasya vidhivad pretībhūtasya satataṃ pretībhūtā niṣiddhās te pretībhūtā yamālayam pretībhūtā yamālayam pretībhūtāś ca ye narāḥ pretya ca parikliṣṭeṣu pretya cāpy aśnute sukham pretya cāpy aśnute sukham pretya jātisahasrāṇi premagarbhabharālasam premagarbhair agarvitaiḥ premṇā satrājid uttamam premṇā spṛśati kānteva premṇaiva na tad asmākaṃ prerayasvety abhāṣata preritā devadevena preritā matsarākulā preritendreṇa menakā preṣaṇaṃ ca nagaryāṃ tāṃ preṣaṇaṃ tat prayacchaiṣā preṣayanti pitṝn putrā preṣayām āsa ceśo api preṣayām āsa tāṃ punaḥ preṣayām āsur amarā preṣayām āsur avyagrāḥ preṣayām āsur udvāha- preṣayitvā dhanānvitam preṣitaṃ cakriṇā cakraṃ preṣitā devadevena preṣyavat karavāṇi kim preṣyāṇām apradāyātha proktamātram avāpya tau proktaś ca devaiḥ saṃsuptaṃ proktaṃ kṣetraṃ sudurlabham proktaṃ dhṛtau prītivaśāc chivena proktaṃ purāṇaṃ bahudharmayuktam proktaṃ mātāmaha priyam proktaṃ śrutaṃ tathāsmābhir proktaḥ proktas tayā tanvyā proktā ca sā siddhir anādikartuḥ proktāni paramarṣibhiḥ proktā praṇayabhaṅgārti- proktāḥ kesaraparvatāḥ prokto jahnugaṇo mayā prokto jahnugaṇo mayā prokto yathāvad ācaṣṭa prokṣaṇaṃ praṇavena tu prokṣaṇāt saṃcayasya ca prokṣaṇīyaṃ sruvaṃ caiva prokṣaṇīṃ dakṣiṇāyanam prokṣayadhvaṃ samantataḥ prokṣitaṃ cauṣadhārthaṃ ca prokṣitaṃ tad dhayaṃ nītvā procur maheśvaraṃ sarvāḥ procuś ca keśavaṃ prītyā procus tam itthaṃ vinayāvanamrāḥ procus te kāśyapaṃ munim procus te abhiratāḥ sma vai procus te rākṣasāḥ surān procus te śāntikāraṇam procuḥ serṣyam athāparāḥ procuḥ svārthakaraṃ vacaḥ proccaiḥ procur yathoditam procya taṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ jvaram procyate prakṛtir hetuḥ procyate yatisattamaiḥ procyate yā mahābalā procyate yo nato asmi tam procyate yo manīṣibhiḥ procyase vedapāragaiḥ procyete jñānacintakaiḥ proddhatān asurān hanti prodbhāsayan sarvadiśo vivasvān prodvejayati caiva hi provāca kim idaṃ dūtā provāca tāṃ siddhavaraḥ provāca duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ provāca parayā prītyā provāca pitaraṃ dvijāḥ provāca praṇato gaṅgāṃ provāca prahasann iva provāca phalasūdanaḥ provāca brahmarākṣasaḥ provāca brahmarākṣasaḥ provāca bhagavān vākyaṃ provāca madhusūdanaḥ provāca muniśārdūlās provāca muniśārdūlās provāca rājā hṛṣṭātmā provāca vacanaṃ viprā provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ provāca vadatāṃ varā provāca vāyuṃ kāmaṃ ca provāca śaśiśekharaḥ provāca śaṃbhos tat kṣetraṃ provāca satvaraṃ kruddho provācātha pitṝn viṣṇus provācedaṃ kramāgatam provācedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ provācedaṃ śubhodayam provāceśaṃ jagatprabhum provācoccais tvayā mattaḥ prauḍho api ko atra jānāti plakṣadvīpa udāhṛtaḥ plakṣadvīpapramāṇena plakṣadvīpas tathā sthitaḥ plakṣadvīpaḥ samāvṛtaḥ plakṣadvīpādike viprāḥ plakṣadvīpe apy udāhṛtaḥ plakṣadvīpeśvarasya vai plakṣadvīpeśvarā hi te plakṣadvīpo dvijottamāḥ plakṣam evābhyaṣecayat plakṣas tannāmasaṃjño ayaṃ plakṣo vatsas tu vṛkṣāṇāṃ plavamānam acetanam plavamāno vicetanaḥ plavasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtāḥ plavaiś ca jalakukkuṭaiḥ plavo matsyān asaṃskṛtān plāvayanti divaṃ dvijāḥ plāvayantī gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ plāvayantīndumaṇḍalam plāvayantī himācalam plāvayanto jagat sarvaṃ plāvayantau diśaḥ sadā plāvayaṃs tīrajān grāmān plāvayām āsa tad vanam plāvayām āsa tāṃ śūnyāṃ plāvayitvākhilāṃ bhuvam plāvayethā madājñayā plāvayeyaṃ jalais tathā phaṭkārāntaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ phaṇāmaṇiśikhāruṇā phaṇāmaṇisahasreṇa phaṇāvikaṭamastakam phaṇāsahasramālāḍhyaṃ phaṇair ānakadundubhim phalakaṃ paridhānaś ca phalagṛhyānvitāsu ca phaladaṃ kīrtivardhanam phaladātāpi tadvidham phaladāya namo astu te phaladāḥ sarvajantuṣu phalade puruṣottame phalaniṣpattir ucyate phalapiṇyākasaktukaiḥ phalabhāgī bhaviṣyasi phalabhārānatair vṛkṣaiḥ phalabhāraiś ca nāmitaiḥ phalam atyantam icchatā phalam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ phalam āhur maharṣayaḥ phalamūlaghṛtaudanaiḥ phalamūladadhikṣīra- phalavikrayiṇaś caiva phalasaṃpatsamanvitam phalasaṃyogadāya ca phalasya dāne pratibhūr jaṭīti phalasya dṛṣṭasya tathā śrutasya phalahaṃsakadambakāḥ phalaṃ karmānusārataḥ phalaṃ kair iha varṇyate phalaṃ ko vaktum īśvaraḥ phalaṃ tat tu na vidmahe phalaṃ tatra jagatpateḥ phalaṃ tathālpasāraṃ ca phalaṃ tadanurodhena phalaṃ tad iha bhokṣyatha phalaṃ tālatarūṇāṃ ca phalaṃ te prāpnuvanti vai phalaṃ dadāti phalināṃ phalaṃ daśaguṇaṃ labhet phalaṃ daśaguṇaṃ labhet phalaṃ dāsyati karmiṇaḥ phalaṃ dāsyanti bhāvataḥ phalaṃ nṛpatisattama phalaṃ pattraṃ nṛṇāṃ vāpi phalaṃ paramadurlabham phalaṃ puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ pūrvoditaṃ labhet phalaṃ prāptaṃ bhaviṣyati phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam phalaṃ prāpnoti durlabham phalaṃ prāpnoti puṣkalam phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti vai dvijāḥ phalaṃ prāpsyasy aśeṣeṇa phalaṃ brūhi pṛthak pṛthak phalaṃ bhavati tādṛśam phalaṃ bhavati puṣkalam phalaṃ māhātmyam eva ca phalaṃ yat samudāhṛtam phalaṃ yasmāt prayacchati phalaṃ yasya yad īpsitam phalaṃ vā mūlakaṃ hṛtvā phalaṃ viṣṇor mahāmune phalaṃ sarvābhivāñchitam phalaṃ sahasraguṇitam phalaṃ snānād avāpyate phalaṃ syād yad yad īpsitam phalaṃ hantāraṃ rakṣasām phalādāne abruvan vacaḥ phalāni ca nivedayet phalāni paśya tālānāṃ phalāni vividhāni ca phalāni vividhāny āśu phalāni svecchayā yathā phalāhāras tathaiva ca phalepsūnāṃ phalaṃ dātā phale yadi pravartate phalaiḥ snātvā tu māṃ paśyet phālgunaḥ kānanāśrayam phālgunena samaṃ vibhuḥ phālgunyāṃ prayato bhūtvā phālgunyāṃ viṣuve tathā phullāravindāyatapattranetra phullāśokalatās tatra phullendīvarapattrābhaṃ phūtkāraravabhīṣaṇaiḥ phūtkāraravabhīṣaṇaiḥ phūtkṛtya phūtkṛtya ca roditi sma phetkāraravasaṃyuktam phenarūpās tadāmbhasi phenas tasya suto abhavat phenasya sutapā jajñe phenāyāś caiva gaṅgāyās phenāyāḥ saṃgamo yatra phenāsaṃgamam ākhyātaṃ phenenendro aharac chiraḥ phenenaivāhanad ripum bakulāś ca nitambeṣu bakulair nāgakesaraiḥ bakulair nāgakesaraiḥ bakulair nāgakesaraiḥ bakulair nāgakesaraiḥ bakulair bahuvārakaiḥ bakulaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca bakulaiḥ saraladrumaiḥ badarīpāṭanaṃ tathā badarīm ādideśātha badarīm āśramaṃ puṇyaṃ badarīvanam āsīnaṃ badarīśailam eva ca badarī suprabhaṃ tathā badarīhradam anyac ca badaraiḥ sakarañjakaiḥ badaryāṃ yat phalaṃ proktaṃ baddha āste mahāmate baddhamaunās tato balam baddhas tiṣṭhati satvaram baddhaṃ nāgaṃ kāśyapena baddhaṃ pitaram ātmanaḥ baddhaṃ bāṇena nāradaḥ baddhaṃ rasātalasthaṃ taṃ baddhaḥ prāpnoti vedanām baddhā pāśair mahāmate baddhāḥ śṛṅkhalayā kecit baddho mayā saṃgare vāhanena baddho mucyeta bandhanāt baddho asmi dāridryamayaiś ca bandhair baddhvā karṣanti nirbhayāḥ baddhvā caiva hi mantravit baddhvā tat kālapāśaiś ca baddhvā tat kālapāśaiś ca baddhvātha tvarayānvitāḥ baddhvā vimokṣaṇaṃ śatror baddhvā hastisamāyuktaṃ badhyante chinnasaṃśayāḥ badhyante bandhanaiḥ kair vā bandigrāhakṛtāś ca ye bandhaky api pativratā bandhanāni adho yayuḥ bandhanāni balānvitaḥ bandhanī pāpakāriṇī bandhaṃ na gacchanty anaghā bandhubhiś cātimānitaḥ bandhūnāṃ kriyatāṃ hitam babandha nṛpatiṃ tadā babandha yadunandanam babandhur yudhi nirjitam babhañja dantān kupito babhāra vinaye sthitaḥ babhāṣe vacanaṃ tābhyāṃ babhūva kupite bale babhūva gajagāminī babhūva ca yadoḥ kulam babhūva jyātalasvanaḥ babhūva tatra gacchantyo babhūva tatra corvaśyāḥ babhūva tatra daityebhyo babhūva tasya nṛpater babhūva tasya nṛpateḥ babhūvatur ubhāv api babhūvatuḥ kaśyapasya babhūva tair vyāptam idaṃ samastam babhūva dīrghatapaso babhūva nṛpatiḥ purā babhūva nṛpatiḥ śrīmān babhūva bhuvi viśrutā babhūva bhūyaś ca yathā babhūva munisattama babhūva munisattamāḥ babhūva munisattamāḥ babhūva munisattamāḥ babhūva munisattamāḥ babhūva mṛgayāśīlaḥ babhūva mṛgayāśīlaḥ babhūva rukmakavacaḥ babhūva vadatāṃ varāḥ babhūva vāridhārābhir babhūva sa mahāgiriḥ babhūva sa mahādyutiḥ babhūva sa yadā tamaḥ babhūva sahasā vibhuḥ babhūva siddho api yayau babhūva sukule rājā babhūva sumahān mithaḥ babhūva sumahāvīryo babhūva smṛtimān vaśī babhūvākṣiptam ākulam babhūvātha prajākṣayaḥ babhūvādbhutadarśanam babhūvābhijitaḥ kila babhūvāmitrakarṣiṇaḥ babhūvur jāmbavatyāś ca babhūvur devagandharvāḥ babhūvur dvijasattamāḥ babhūvur dhārmikāḥ sarve babhūvuś ca tathārṇavāḥ babhūvus tu yadoḥ putrāḥ babhūvus te mahoragāḥ babhūvus tridaśāḥ sajjāḥ babhūvuḥ kṛṣṇayoṣitaḥ babhūvuḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ śobhanāḥ babhūvuḥ sapta śobhanāḥ babhūvendrasakhaḥ sa ca babhūvailaḥ purūravāḥ babhramus tās tato gopyaḥ babhrāma pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ babhrāmāsau muniś cārta babhrupiṅgalalolaiś ca babhrupiṅgalalolaiś ca babhrur matimatāṃ varaḥ babhrusetuś ca pārthivaḥ babhruṃ devāvṛdhaṃ dvijāḥ babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ babhror devāvṛdhād api babhror hastād ariṃdamaḥ barbarāś ca salaukikāḥ barhiketuḥ suketuś ca barhipattrakṛtāpīḍau barhisthitam ahaṃ praukṣaṃ balakṛṣṇau tadākrūraḥ balakṛṣṇau subālakau balakṣayaṃ vivṛddhiṃ ca balagnānyā vivarṇatā balajyeṣṭhān narān anyān baladarpasamanvitam baladevajanārdanau baladevajanārdanau baladevapuraḥsarāḥ baladevaś ca balavāñ baladevasahāyavān baladevasahāyavān baladevasahāyavān baladevas tato gatvā baladevas tu tatkālaṃ baladevasya taṃ kopaṃ baladevasya dhīmataḥ baladevasya bhaginīṃ baladevād avāptavān baladevena muṣṭikaḥ baladevo agrajo agrataḥ baladevo api viprendrāḥ balanirmadaneritaiḥ balapuṣṭipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ balapradyumnasahito balapramathanāya ca balabhadraprapannāni balabhadraś ca līlayā balabhadrasya dhīmataḥ balabhadraṃ dadarśa saḥ balabhadraṃ subhadrāṃ ca balabhadraḥ parājitaḥ balabhadreritaṃ vacaḥ balabhadro api cāsphoṭya balabhadro mahāvīryo balam āgatam ājñāya balavanto durāsadāḥ balavanto mahaujasaḥ balavanto amitaprabhāḥ balavanto yathā mṛgāḥ balavān atibhīṣaṇaḥ balavān abhavad bhṛśam balavān asuro mune balavān dharmatatparaḥ balavān namuciḥ purā balavān puṇyasaṃbhavaḥ balavān matimāñ śūro balavān me ripuś cāsīd balavīryapramāṇavit balaśaktisamanvitāḥ balaśauryavato dvijāḥ balaś ca balināṃ varaḥ balasthasya hi yogasya balasya balaśālinaḥ balasyābhimataṃ viprāḥ balahānir na te saumya balahāniḥ prajāyate balahīnas tathā yogī balahīnāś ca viprendrā balaṃ grāmanivāsinām balaṃ tejaś ca yogaś ca balaṃ tejas tathā vīryaṃ balaṃ balamadoddhatam balaṃ balena dadṛśe balaṃ vidyāṃ dhṛtiṃ paśūn balaṃ samakarot tadā balākābhiś ca śobhitā balākā lakucaṃ tathā balākāśvo mahīpatiḥ balākāśvo mahīpatiḥ balākā saṃprajāyate balāt kālāgatā sahyā balād anyāyataḥ prajāḥ balād ākarṣatīyaṃ māṃ balād ākarṣayat tadā balād ākṛṣya harṣitau balād ādattavān vīraḥ balād yogāc ca tatyaje balāni yogaproktāni balārthaṃ munisattamāḥ balikarmaṇā bhūtāni balinā viṣṇunā purā balinor balibhiḥ saha balinau balisainikaiḥ balibhāgasya pārthivāḥ balimantras tathaiva ca baliyajñe padaṃ nyasat balir jajñe virocanāt balir nāma mahādaityo balir balavatāṃ śreṣṭha balis tu bhārgavaṃ prāha baliṃ kṛtvā tu sūryāya baliṃ taṃ harir abravīt baliṃ tv amaravairiṇam baliṃ nibadhya mantroktyā baliṃ balavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ baliṃ vibhajataḥ kṛtvā baliṃ saṃyamya māyayā baliḥ śāntiṃ parāṃ yayau balīvardo mṛtaś cāpi balī viṣaharaś ca saḥ balī sarveśvaraḥ kalau bale cāpratimatvaṃ vai balena ca samanvitaḥ balena ca samanvitaḥ balena nihataṃ śrutvā balena balināṃ varau balena mahatā yuktaḥ balena mahatā yuktaḥ balena mahatā rāmaḥ balena mahatā vṛtaḥ balena mahatāvṛtaḥ balenādbhutakarmaṇā balenodakarākṣasam balenorasy atāḍayat baler balavato yajñe baleś ca brahmaṇā datto baleḥ putraśatam āsīd baleḥ pautrīṃ mahābalaḥ balair anugataḥ prabhuḥ balonmattā dhṛtāyudhāḥ balonmattaiḥ pramāthibhiḥ balo balavatāṃ varaḥ balau rājyaṃ praśāsati ballavaiḥ saha saṃvṛddho bastagātraiś ca pūgaśaḥ bastagātraiś ca pūgaśaḥ bahavaś cet kim ucyate bahavas tatra karmaṇā bahavaḥ paṇḍitaṃmanyāḥ bahavaḥ śatasāhasrāḥ bahavaḥ sukhino abhavan bahavaḥ syuḥ sutāḥ kecin bahavo brahmavādinaḥ bahavo vatsarā yātā bahir antaś ca dṛśyase bahir antaś ca nirmalāḥ bahir āvāsite sainye bahir gatvā tu gotrakaiḥ bahir jalasamīpataḥ bahir yāte vilocane bahir vedi vinirgataḥ bahiś cānnaprado hi yaḥ bahiḥsthitāṃs tadā paśyan bahukandaraśobhitam bahukarṇākṣiśīrṣakaḥ bahukālaṃ dvijanmanoḥ bahukālaṃ nayānvitām bahukālaṃ nirantaram bahukālaṃ viruddhayoḥ bahukālaṃ samāvasan bahucittam acintayan bahucintyam acintayan bahutvaṃ ca tathā sṛji bahutvaṃ ca pravartate bahutvaṃ ca pravartanāt bahutvān nānukīrtitāḥ bahu dattvātha vijayo bahudṛṣṭir amitrajit bahudoṣo api saṃmataḥ bahudvārāṃ manoramām bahudhā tad vicāraye bahudhātmā prakurvīta bahudhānyadhanānvite bahudhānyasahasrāṇāṃ bahudhā pīḍyamānas tu bahudhā vyabhajat tadā bahudhā sṛjyatām ayam bahunā kāraṇena na bahunā tu kim uktena bahupattrārjunīphalam bahupuṇyaphalapradam bahupuṇyaphalapradam bahuputrasya viduṣaś bahuprakāram asvasthāḥ bahuprajālpabhāgyāś ca bahubāhūrupādas tvaṃ bahubrāhmaṇasevitam bahubhir bahudakṣiṇaiḥ bahubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ kusumotkaraiḥ bahumānapuraḥsaram bahumānapuraḥsaram bahumānapuraḥsaram bahumānapuraḥsaram bahumānam alabdheṣu bahumiṣṭānnam ṛddhimat bahuyācanako loko bahuyonyantaraṃ gataḥ bahurāgārthakāmair vā bahurūpadharā dhṛṣṭā bahulatvāc ca noktā ye bahuvarṣagaṇāni vai bahuvarṣasahasrākhyaṃ bahuvāraiḥ kovidārair bahuvāraiḥ satindukaiḥ bahuvṛkṣasamākulam bahuvyālasamākulam bahuśaḥ sarvabhūtātmā bahuśaḥ saṃprapadyate bahuśākhaṃ mahaujasam bahuśākho mahādrumaḥ bahusarpasarīsṛpam bahūnām upajāyate bahūnām eva bāndhavaiḥ bahūni teṣāṃ nāmāni bahūni dvijasattamāḥ bahūni dvijasattamāḥ bahūni me vyatītāni bahūny abhūvaṃs tīrthāni bahūny ākṣepavākyāni bahūny ārjya dadāty asau bahūn varṣagaṇān pārtha bahūn vā prāṇino anantaṃ bahvannadakṣiṇāḥ sarve bahvannādanatatparāḥ bahvapatyāḥ prajāhīnāḥ bahvapatye mahāpatye bahvarthāṃ śrutivistarām bahv alpaṃ vā puro arthini bahv asti kiṃ dhanenādya bahvābādhāparikliṣṭe bahvāyuś corvaśīsutāḥ bahvāścaryas tvayā prokto bahvyo valayabhūṣitāḥ bāḍham ity abravīt siddhaḥ bāḍham ity avadat so api bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmīty bāṇakṛṣṇau jigīṣayā bāṇajyeṣṭhaṃ tapodhanāḥ bāṇatīrthaṃ tad ucyate bāṇatīrthe tu ye snātvā bāṇarakṣārtham atyarthaṃ bāṇaś cāpi baleḥ sutaḥ bāṇasainyam anekadhā bāṇas tatrāyayau yoddhuṃ bāṇas teṣām atibalo bāṇasya tanayām ūṣām bāṇasya prayayau puram bāṇasya mantrī kumbhāṇḍaś bāṇasyācyutacoditam bāṇasyādbhutakarmaṇaḥ bāṇasyāsya mayā prabho bāṇaṃ vivyādha cakradhṛk bāṇaḥ praśasyaḥ kṛtavān uccapūjāṃ bāṇena prahitāñ śaraiḥ bāṇais tān vyāhanad viṣṇur bāṇaiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ śubhaiḥ bāṇo api praṇipatyāgre bāṇo bāṇaiś ca cakriṇaḥ bādhakatvena vartate bādhate tadbhavānalaḥ bādhante aharniśaṃ prajāḥ bādhāpahāya lubdhāya bādhā yatra na vidyate bādhiryaṃ jaḍatā lopaḥ bādhiṣyati sa no asuraḥ bādhyamānas tadā gaṇaiḥ bādhyamāno ativedanaḥ bāndhavāḥ kriyatāṃ mayi bāndhavaiḥ svajanair yuktas bāndhavo nṛpatir yataḥ bāndhavo asti namo astu te bāndhavau patitau dṛṣṭvā bārhaspatyam anantaram bārhaspatyaṃ ca viśrutam bārhaspatyaṃ tato viduḥ bālakasyopahanyate bālakaṃ cārurūpiṇam bālakaṃ hy ekaputrakam bālako dvijaputrakaḥ bālakrīḍanakaṃ tataḥ bālakrīḍanakāya ca bālakrīḍeyam atulā bālaghātī brahmaghātī bālacandradhara prabho bālacandradhara prabho bālatvaṃ cātivīryaṃ ca bāladoṣam apākarot bālapadmaprabhāya ca bālapannagadehavat bālaparyaṅkikātale bālaputrā surūpiṇī bālabhāvaṃ no jahāti bālabhāve ca yauvane bālabhāve yadāpnoti bālam atyantavismitaḥ bālam ādāya dārikām bālam uttānaśāyinam bālamṛtyur bhaviṣyati bālarūpadharāya ca bālavākyaṃ tu te vṛkṣāḥ bālaśṛṅgāv ivarṣabhau bālaś cāyaṃ vimucyatām bālas tasmin na sīdati bālas tāṃ mātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bālas tvam asi putraka bālas tvaṃ śramapīḍitaḥ bālasya patitasya ca bālasya buddhiṃ vinayaṃ ca vidyāṃ bālasya munisattamaḥ bālasya munisattamāḥ bālasyārtasya śailajā bālasyaitad vilokyatām bālaṃ cemaṃ sumadhyame bālaṃ dṛṣṭvā grahāvṛtam bālaṃ muñca mahāgraha bālaṃ vṛddhaṃ tathāturam bālaṃ vṛddhaṃ tathāturam bālaṃ saṃjīvayām āsa bālaḥ kṛtopanayano bālaḥ prāyād rasātalam bālā cāpi pativratā bālānāṃ kaṇṭhake baddhaṃ bālānāṃ bhartur eva ca bālānubhāvācaraṇaṃ hi śaṃbhoḥ bālām eva pitā yas tu bālārkasomanetrāya bāliśaṃ yas tu bhojayet bāliśā bata yūyaṃ vai bāle deśāntarasthe ca bālenānena pātitam bālendumauliṃ praṇato asmi nityam bālendumauliṃ praṇato asmi nityam bāleyaṃ kṣatram ucyate bāleyā brāhmaṇāś caiva bālo dadhīciḥ prātitheyī bālo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ bālo api balavān iva bālo api sarasas tīre bālo bālakriyānvitaḥ bālo mama samudgataḥ bālo aham iti manyate bālo ahaṃ devadeveśa bālo ahaṃ bālabuddhiś ca bālo ahaṃ bālabuddhiś ca bālo ahaṃ bālabuddhiś ca bālyayauvanagocare bālyāt kāmāc ca mohāc ca bālyād evātirāgeṇa bālyād vā yadi vā mohāt bālyād vā yadi vā laulyān bālye mohaṃ ca vijñāya bāṣkalaḥ pramado madaḥ bāhutīrthaṃ cārunadīṃ bāhudā ca dṛṣadvatī bāhupraharaṇo nṛpaḥ bāhubhyām eva govindo bāhubhyāṃ ca dhanena ca bāhum ābhoginaṃ kṛtvā bāhum utkṣipya vṛtrahā bāhūnāṃ kṛtavān hariḥ bāhū rakṣatu vārāhaḥ bāhor vyasaninaḥ pūrvaṃ bāhyakāthopabāhyakā bāhyam eṣāṃ na kiṃcana bāhyaṃ samāyojyam aho bhavasya bāhyāśvatanayāḥ pañca bāhyāśvaḥ purujātitaḥ bāhyopavanamadhye abhūn bāhlikasya tu rājarṣer bāhlikasya sutaś caiva bāhlikasyātmajābhavat bāhlikādyāś ca bhūmipāḥ bāhlīka iti viśrutaḥ bāhlīkān śūrasenāṃś ca bāhvor vedāṅkurāya ca biḍālaṃ dadṛśe muniḥ biḍālaḥ sapta māsāṃs tu biḍālo abhūn muner bhayāt bindur māheśvaro mune bibharti kaṇikāgatam bibharti yasya bhṛtyānāṃ bibharti sakalāṃl lokān bibharty ekaḥ sanātanaḥ bibhṛyān na vicakṣaṇaḥ bibheda keśavaṃ bāṇo bibheda yamakiṃkarān bibheda yādavaśreṣṭhaḥ bibheda sādhumaryādāṃ bibhemi kartuṃ dāruṇaṃ cākṣamo ahaṃ bibhemi kaṃsād dhig janma bibhemi kramituṃ bahiḥ bibhemi taṃ munivaraṃ bibhemi bhadre śiṣṭo ahaṃ bibhemīti ca vādinam bibhratas tava yad rūpam bibhratī paramaṃ vapuḥ bibhratī pārijātasya bibhrat tadānīṃ jvalanārkatejāḥ bibhrat samāgāt purataḥ surāṇām bibhratsarasvatīṃ vaktre bibhrad yo mānuṣīṃ tanum bibhrad vakṣasi cānagha bibhran muśalam uttamam bibhrāṇaṃ mukhapaṅkajam bibhrāṇaṃ vāsasī pīte bibhrāṇāṃ vapuṣā viṣṇuṃ bimbādharapuṭāḥ kāntāḥ bimbauṣṭhacārudaśanāḥ bimbauṣṭhā madhurasvarāḥ bimbauṣṭhī navagarbhā ca bimbauṣṭhyo rañjitamukhās bilaṃ tatra vyajāyata bilād uddharate balāt bile jāmbavatā saha bilvaprabhaṃ devahradaṃ bilvārkakamalādibhiḥ bījatvam upagacchati bījapūrṇām iti śrutiḥ bījāj jātv api kutracit bījād bījaṃ tathaiva ca bījād vṛkṣapraroheṇa bījānām akṛtasnehā bījānāṃ kledanena ca bījāny anyāni vai tataḥ bīje ca śaśipāvakau bījebhyo vīrudho loke bījeṣu vṛkṣādi dṛṣatsu hema bījauṣadhimahāphalaḥ bījauṣadhīnāṃ viprāṇām buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca buddhavān devadeveśam buddhābuddhiṃ pṛthak pṛthak buddhicintāmayaṃ dṛḍham buddhidravyeṇa dṛśyena buddhibhāvavyavasthitā buddhimān guṇasāgaraḥ buddhir adhyavasānāya buddhir adhyavasāyinī buddhir ātmā ca sahitā buddhir ātmā manuṣyasya buddhir evātmanāyikā buddhir evendriyāṇy api buddhir no atra prajāyate buddhir matis tathā kṣāntiḥ buddhir vikurute pṛthak buddhir vikurute hy anu buddhir vidyā nareśvara buddhiś ca paramā yatra buddhiśreṣṭho niyacchati buddhiṃ saptaguṇāṃ tathā buddhiḥ prajñā dhṛtir medhā buddhīndur iva puṣkare buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca tathā buddhīndriyāṇi caitāni buddher ātmā paraḥ smṛtaḥ buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ buddhyakṣicaitanyamanaḥsukhāni buddhyā tu śreyasāṃ grahaḥ buddhyā paramayā yutaḥ buddhyā prakṛtir avyaktaṃ buddhyā bṛhaspatisamaḥ buddhyā bhāvāt kuto guṇāḥ buddhyā vidhividhānajñas buddhyā satyena cānaghāḥ buddhyā saṃyamya tattvataḥ budha ity akaron nāma budhaputraḥ purūravāḥ budhaputre mahātmani budhaputre samutpanne budhaprāptiṃ tathā prītiṃ budhavākyam ilā bhaktyā budhas tuṣṭāva prathamam budhas tuṣṭo avadat priyām budhasya tu muniśreṣṭhā budhasyāpy uśanā sthitaḥ budhaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ pṛccha budhaḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam budhaḥ prādāt tadātmaje budhaḥ somasuto nāma budhāt purūravāś cāpi budhānām api saṃmohaḥ budhenāntaram āsādya budho aṅgāraka eva ca budho nakṣatramaṇḍalāt budho apy adhyāpayām āsa budho mātar mama pitā budho reme tayā prītyā budhyate ca parāṃ buddhiṃ budhyate tāta kevalam budhyate yadi cāvyaktam budhyadhvaṃ gadato mama budhyadhvaṃ tān dvijottamāḥ budhyadhvaṃ mama sattamāḥ budhyante paramaiṣiṇaḥ budhyamāna iti śrutaḥ budhyamānas tu te anagha budhyamānasya cānagha budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ budhyamānaṃ ca buddhatvaṃ budhyamānaṃ na budhyante budhyamānaṃ prabudhyante budhyamānaṃ mahāprājñāḥ budhyamānaṃ vadanty api budhyamānaṃ vadanty uta budhyamānena buddhena budhyamāno ajarāmaram budhyamāno na budhyate budhyamāno apy abuddhimān budhyamāno bhavaty eṣa budhyamāno yathāpūrvam budhyamāno yadātmānam bubhujuḥ sarvaratnāḍhyāṃ bubhuje annaṃ bahuvidhaṃ bubhuje bahuvarṣāṇi bubhuje viṣayāṃs tanvī bṛhac caivam idaṃ śāstram bṛhatas tanayās trayaḥ bṛhatkarmā prajeśvaraḥ bṛhatkīrtir mahājihvaḥ bṛhadaśvo nyayojayat bṛhadaśvo mahīpatiḥ bṛhadāraṇyakaṃ tathā bṛhaddarbhaḥ sutas tasya bṛhadrathāt krameṇaiva bṛhanmanās tu rājendro bṛhaspatipraṇītaiś ca bṛhaspatir udāradhīḥ bṛhaspatir devagurur bṛhaspatir hariṃ prāha bṛhaspatis tathety āha bṛhaspatis tadā prāha bṛhaspatiḥ suraiḥ pūjāṃ bṛhaspater aṅgirasaḥ bṛhaspater vacaḥ śrutvā bṛhaspateś ca śukrasya bṛhaspates tadā vākyaṃ bṛhaspates tu bhaginī bṛhaspateḥ sa vai bhāryām boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇā boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇā boddhavyo jñātibandhuṣu bodhayām āsa vākyaiś ca bodhāyācyutabhānunā bravīmi devi gaṅge māṃ brahmakuṇḍaṃ vahnikuṇḍaṃ brahmakṣatraviśāṃ nityaṃ brahmakṣatrasya viśrutaḥ brahma kṣatraṃ tathā vaiśyaṃ brahmaghnasparśanaṃ pāpaṃ brahmaghnānāṃ gatiṃ jñātvā brahmacaryaparaṃ kṣatraṃ brahmacaryaphalaṃ caiva brahmacaryavrate sthitam brahmacaryaṃ ca te mahat brahmacaryaṃ tathārjavam brahmacaryeṇa gacchanti brahmacaryeṇa caiva hi brahmacaryeṇa tapasā brahmacaryeṇa vartantīṃ brahmacārigṛhasthāṃś ca brahmacārigṛhasthaiś ca brahmacāriṇi kāmuke brahmacāriṇya eva ca brahmacārī yatiś caiva brahmacārī samāhitaḥ brahmajāyāṃ punar daduḥ brahmajñānaparāyaṇaḥ brahmajñānaṃ kathaṃ me syāt brahmaṇaḥ kathitā divi brahmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ śiraḥ brahmaṇaḥ sāmagāyinaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sthānam uttamam brahmaṇā ṛṣibhiḥ saha brahmaṇā kriyate yataḥ brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ pūrvaṃ brahmaṇā prerito nūnaṃ brahmaṇā me varo datto brahmaṇā vai purā proktāḥ brahmaṇā samudāhṛtam brahmaṇā samudīritaḥ brahmaṇā sṛjatā prajāḥ brahmaṇāhaṃ purā śapto brahmaṇe cādidevāya brahmaṇe cāntarikṣāya brahmaṇo girim āsādya brahmaṇo mānasāt pūrvaṃ brahmaṇo vadataḥ purā brahmaṇo viṣayāṃs tathā brahmaṇo avyaktajanmanaḥ brahmaṇo avyaktajanmanaḥ brahmaṇo avyaktajanmanaḥ brahmaṇo avyaktajanmanaḥ brahmaṇo asya mukhaṃ luna brahmaṇo ahar dvijottamāḥ brahmaṇo hi mahat kṣetraṃ brahmaṇyaṃ paramaṃ devam brahmaṇyaṃ mokṣakāraṇam brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ brahmaṇyaḥ sudṛḍhāyudhaḥ brahmaṇyā lokamātaraḥ brahmaṇyāḥ satyavādinaḥ brahmatīrthaphalaṃ smṛtam brahmatīrtham iti khyātaṃ brahmatīrtham iti śrutam brahmatīrthaṃ tad ucyate brahmatīrthaṃ brahmayoniṃ brahmatīrthaṃ manastīrthaṃ brahmatīrthaṃ sudarśanam brahmatīrthe śiromātraṃ brahmatejaḥprabhāveṇa brahmatejaḥsamānītā brahmatejomayaṃ param brahmatejomayaṃ śukraṃ brahmatvam amareśatvaṃ brahmadeyām alaṃkṛtām brahmadevaṃ sanātanam brahmadviḍ vāpi patati brahmadviṣaś ca saṃvṛttā brahma dhyeyaṃ tad akṣaram brahmanaimittiko layaḥ brahman kuru jagatsṛṣṭiṃ brahman kṛtayugādau tu brahman pāpād vimokṣyase brahman mayi mahāpāpe brahman māṃ tvaṃ paśuṃ kuru brahmapāramayaṃ kurvañ brahmapāraṃ dvijottamāḥ brahmapāraṃ mune śrotum brahmaputreṣu saptasu brahmapūrvo bhaviṣyati brahma prajānāṃ patir acyuto asau brahma prabhur brahma sa sarvabhūto brahmapriya namas te astu brahmapriya namas te astu brahmaproktāṃ kathāṃ puṇyāṃ brahmabhūtas kalpate brahmamātrā dhṛte dvije brahmayajñatapasvinām brahmayoniḥ sanātanaḥ brahmayonau prajāyate brahmarakṣas tu māsāṃs trīṃs brahmarākṣasa tac chṛṇu brahmarudrādayaḥ surāḥ brahmarūpadharaṃ devaṃ brahmarūpadharaḥ śete brahmarūpadharo bhūtvā brahmarūpadharo hariḥ brahmarūpa namo astu te brahmarūpaṃ janārdanam brahmarūpaṃ mamaiva tat brahmarṣigaṇasevitam brahmarṣiśaraṇasya ca brahmarṣiḥ śamināṃ sthitā satī brahmavādiny adhistrī sā brahmavādī jitendriyaḥ brahmavādī parākrāntas brahmavādī parākrāntaḥ brahmavidyāṃ sakṛj jñātvā brahmaviṣṇumaheśānāṃ brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarān brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ saṃpadyate tadā brahmasāmarthyasaṃyutaḥ brahmasūtradharaḥ kṛśaḥ brahmasṛk prakṛteḥ sraṣṭā brahmasthānaṃ saptakuṇḍaṃ brahmasthānaṃ somatīrthaṃ brahmasthānād apākṛtaḥ brahmasvabhāvaḥ suśroṇi brahmasvarūpadhṛg viṣṇur brahmasvaṃ ye harantīha brahmasvaṃ ye harantīha brahmahatyā tu nārada brahmahatyāt pramucyeta brahmahatyātrayaṃ tathā brahmahatyāthavā kṛtā brahmahatyādināśanam brāhmaṇo vākyam abravīt brāhmaṇo vā cyuto dharmād brāhmaṇo vāpy asadvṛttaḥ brāhmaṇo vāmanākṛtiḥ brāhmaṇo vṛddhakauśikaḥ brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ brāhmaṇo vedavid bhavet brāhmaṇo hartum icchati brāhmaṇo sarvam aśeṣataḥ brūhi sarvaṃ pṛthak pṛthak brūhi sarvaṃ yathā jagat brūhi sarvān aśeṣataḥ bhaktatra mama suvrata bhaktapriyatvaṃ tvayi nātha satyam bhaktaś cāhaṃ sadā tvayi bhaktasnehaṃ samāśritaḥ bhaktahradaṃ kṣīrasaraḥ bhaktaṃ bhāvena saṃyutam bhaktaṃ māṃ yadi manyase bhaktānām apy abhaktānāṃ bhaktānām abhayaprada bhaktānām abhayaprada bhaktānām abhayaṃkara bhaktānām īhitaṃ dhanyaṃ bhaktānām upakārakam bhaktānām upakārāya bhaktānukampaka vibho bhaktānukampitāṃ śaṃbhor bhaktānukampī bhagavān bhaktābhīṣṭapradā nityam bhaktigrāhyo ravir yataḥ bhakticchedānuliptāṅgau bhakticchedānuliptāṅgau bhaktitaḥ śṛṇuyāt paṭhet bhaktito nityavat pūjāṃ bhaktito vakṣyate nityaṃ bhaktinamras trilocanam bhaktinamrātmamānasaḥ bhaktinamrātmamūrtayaḥ bhaktipriyatvaṃ te nityaṃ bhaktibhāvena cetasā bhaktibhāvena satataṃ bhaktimadbhir narair nityaṃ bhaktiyuktena vipraiś ca bhaktiyukto naro yo asau bhaktir bhavati keśave bhaktir bhavati bhāskare bhaktir bhavati śaṃkare bhaktistotravrataiḥ śubhaiḥ bhaktiṃ ca paramāṃ jñātvā bhaktiṃ cāgneḥ samāhitaḥ bhaktiṃ tasya tu saṃcintya bhaktiṃ śraddhāṃ samādhiṃ ca bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe yathā bhavet bhaktiḥ premāthavā śaktir bhakto asi me muniśreṣṭha bhakto asi me muniśreṣṭha bhaktyā kurvan samāhitaḥ bhaktyā kṛṣṇaṃ jagadgurum bhaktyā ca niyamena ca bhaktyā cārādhya vidhivat bhaktyā taṃ paridhāpayet bhaktyā taṃ puruṣottamam bhaktyā taṃ puruṣottamam bhaktyā tu tanmanā bhūtvā bhaktyā tuṣṭāva śaṃkaram bhaktyā tu sadhanaṃ tebhyo bhaktyātha bhavabhāvitā bhaktyā dṛṣṭvā tu taṃ devaṃ bhaktyā devaṃ somam ahaṃ namasye bhaktyā paramayānvitāḥ bhaktyā paramayā mune bhaktyā paramayā yutāḥ bhaktyā pūjayate yo arkaṃ bhaktyāpūjya praṇamya ca bhaktyāpūjya praṇamya ca bhaktyāpūjya prasādayet bhaktyā pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaktyā prayatamānasaḥ bhaktyā pravṛttasya yathākathaṃcin bhaktyā prīto bhavec chivaḥ bhaktyā prīto asmi daityarāṭ bhaktyā procuḥ sureśvaram bhaktyā bhuktiṃ na lapsyase bhaktyā muktiḥ kathaṃ bhūyād bhaktyā muktiḥ sarvapūjyā bhaktyā ye puruṣottamam bhaktyā vijñāpayāmy aham bhaktyā śrīpuruṣottamākhyam ajaraṃ bhaktyā samādhinā caiva bhaktyā sarveśvaraṃ prabhum bhaktyā saṃpūjayanty ādyaṃ bhaktyā saṃpūjayet sadā bhaktyā siṃhavapurdharam bhakṣayantas tv aharniśam bhakṣayanto atha śailābhā bhakṣayann ahanad devān bhakṣayām āsa cāmbikā bhakṣayām āsa nārada bhakṣayām āsa bhānujam bhakṣayām āsa māyayā bhakṣayitvā śaśaṃ viprāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ bhakṣyabhojyamahāpāna- bhakṣyabhojyavidhikriyām bhakṣyabhojyādikeṣu ca bhakṣyabhojyānulepanaiḥ bhakṣyabhojyāś ca peyāś ca bhakṣyabhojyaiś ca pūjitā bhakṣyamāṇaḥ śivāśataiḥ bhakṣyamāṇaḥ
