tāta bhaviṣyā munisattamāḥ bhaviṣyā munisattamāḥ bhaviṣyaiḥ stūyatām iti bhavec ca kṛtakāryasya bhavec caivaṃ kathaṃ śāntiḥ bhavej jyaiṣṭhyam apām iti bhavetāṃ jagatāṃ nāthāv bhavetāṃ divyarūpe vāṃ bhavet tasmāt svayaṃ gatvā bhavet tasyeha pātakam bhavet sa khalu vañcitaḥ bhavet saṃsārabandhanāt bhavet sākṣān nṛsiṃho asau bhavet strī kā na garvitā bhaved atra kadācana bhaved āhavanīyake bhaved iyam asaṃśayam bhaved ūrdhvagatir dīpo bhaved eva tato yāntu bhaved eva na saṃśayaḥ bhaved gaṇeśas tu kumāratulyaḥ bhaved duṣkṛtakarmaṇām bhaved devaḥ śivaḥ prītaḥ bhaved devāgamo yadi bhaved bhaktisamanvitaḥ bhaved yajvā tu vaiṣṇavaḥ bhaved yatra ca tryambakam bhaved vipro bahuśrutaḥ bhaved vai saṃśayo mahān bhavena saha saṃyogaḥ bhaveyam aham evārkaḥ bhaveyaṃ priyayā vāpi bhaveyaṃ vīraputriṇī bhaveyur adhipāś caiva bhaveyur aparo varaḥ bhaveyur amarās tataḥ bhaveyur iti manyatām bhaveyur jagatām īśa bhaveyur jayinaḥ surāḥ bhaveyur devatājñayā bhaveyur nātra saṃśayaḥ bhaveyur nātra saṃśayaḥ bhaveyur bahudhā nṛpa bhaveyur yajñabhāginaḥ bhaveyur yat phalaṃ makhe bhaveyur vanavāsā vai bhavodbhave ca kaunteya bhavo harṣasamanvitaḥ bhavyasya sumahātmanaḥ bhasmadigdhaṃ virūpākṣaṃ bhasmaprastaraśāyī ca bhasmaśeṣas tadā kṛtaḥ bhasmāmbubhiś ca kāṃsyānāṃ bhasmāsthinakharomāṇi bhasmīkaromy eva na saṃśayo atra bhasmīkuryāṃ mṛṣāvadan bhasmībhūtaś ca tatkṣaṇāt bhasmībhūtaḥ kṣaṇenaiva bhasmībhūtān nṛpasutān bhasmībhūtā mahāsurāḥ bhasmībhūtās tataḥ sarve bhasmī bhūyāc ca satvaram bhasmībhūyāt kṣaṇenaiva bhāgadvayaṃ ca bhūsaṃsthaṃ bhāgaṃ dāsyanti vai prabho bhāgaṃ bhāgavahaṃ ca yat bhāgaṃ yajñasya dharmataḥ bhāgārthe varavarṇini bhāginaṃ bhajamānaṃ ca bhāgīrathī gautamī ca bhāgīrathī devanadī bhāgīrathī narmadā tu bhāgīrathīṃ nadīś cānyā bhāgīrathīṃ samāśritya bhāgīrathy atha narmadā bhāgīrathy abhidhīyate bhāgīrathyavagāhanam bhāgīrathyāṃ kṣipāmy āśu bhāgīrathyāṃ saiva devī bhāgīrathyāḥ samāgamam bhāge cāpi prakalpite bhāgyabhogyāni dānavaiḥ bhājanaṃ ca vivarjayet bhājanaṃ yatra jāyate bhājanaṃ sarvasaṃpadām bhāṇḍīraskandham etya vai bhāti goṣu ca gauravam bhāti tad bhavanaṃ mahat bhāti raśmisahasreṇa bhānavas tatra devāś ca bhānutāpena vivyathuḥ bhānutīrtham iti khyātaṃ bhānutīrtham iti khyātaṃ bhānutīrtham udāhṛtam bhānutīrthaṃ tad ākhyātaṃ bhānutīrthaṃ tad ucyate bhānutīrthe viśeṣeṇa bhānur arkaṃ vaṭaṃ śivaḥ bhānur vacanam abravīt bhānus tadrūpavāṃs tataḥ bhānuṃ taṃ munayo mudā bhānuṃ vai dakṣiṇe taṭe bhānor bhaktinamaskāra- bhānor yā saptamī mūrtir bhānos tu bhānavaḥ putrā bhānoḥ saptasu raśmiṣu bhānti lokā dvijottamāḥ bhānvādikāṃś ca vai putrān bhāratasyākhilān dvijāḥ bhāratasyāsya varṣasya bhārataṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ bhārataṃ bahupuṇyadam bhārataṃ varṣam abhyagāt bhārataṃ varṣam uttamam bhāratādīni varṣāṇi bhāratānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhāratāḥ ketumālāś ca bhāratī yatra saṃtatiḥ bhārate kūrmarūpadhṛk bhārate ca dvijottamāḥ bhārate prakaṭīkṛtāḥ bhāradvājas tathā drauṇir bhāradvājāṃś ca śārṅgakān bhāradvājī smṛtā cānyā bhāram āveśya bandhuṣu bhāraṃ sa vahate tasya bhārākrāntā dharā yātā bhārākrāntā vasuṃdharā bhārāya mama kiṃ bhujaiḥ bhārāvataraṇaṃ kṛtam bhārāvataraṇārthāya bhārāvataraṇārthāya bhārāvataraṇārdhāya bhārāvataraṇecchayā bhārāvataraṇecchayā bhārāvataraṇe śīghraṃ bhārāvataraṇe sakhyaṃ bhārāvatārakartā tvaṃ bhārāvatārakāryārtham bhārāvatārārtham apārapāram bhāreṇa guruṇā śakra bhārgabhūmis tu bhārgajaḥ bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ bhārgavasya yad acchinat bhārgavaḥ kauśikatvaṃ hi bhārgavaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ bhārgavāt sagaro nṛpaḥ bhārgaveṇābhirakṣitaḥ bhārgavo bhṛgunandanaḥ bhārgo nāma prajeśvaraḥ bhāryayā kṣīṇavṛttikam bhāryayā gantum udyataḥ bhāryayā ca tad akṣayam bhāryayā ca punaḥ punaḥ bhāryayā ca śatakratuḥ bhāryayā cābhiṣecitaḥ bhāryayāpi vane vasan bhāryayā mṛgarūpadhṛk bhāryayā yad udīritam bhāryayā sa mahāmatiḥ bhāryayā saha suvrataḥ bhāryayā sukhitaṃ punaḥ bhāryāṅgāś cāpamardakāḥ bhāryā tava sutasya vai bhāryātvam upayānti tāḥ bhāryānvitas tathā cakre bhāryāputravivarjitaḥ bhāryāputraiḥ parivṛtaḥ bhāryā bhava mama svasthā bhāryābhir ṛṣibhir vṛtaḥ bhāryābhṛtyagṛhādiṣu bhāryā bhṛtyajanā ye ca bhāryā mameyaṃ kalyāṇī bhāryāmātyādisahitas bhāryām āhūya ṣaṇmukhaḥ bhāryām uvāca saṃtrastaḥ bhāryā yā vṛṣaparvajā bhāryāyai nṛpatiḥ prādāt bhāryāyai svārjitaṃ dhanam bhāryā rājan mayoditā bhāryā rāmasya kiṃ citraṃ bhāryārimitrabandhūnāṃ bhāryārthaṃ kaśyapaḥ prabhuḥ bhāryārthaṃ prathamo yatnaḥ bhāryārthaṃ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ bhāryārthinaṃ tu taṃ prāha bhāryāvad bheṣajaṃ nahi bhāryā vai rohiṇī sthitā bhāryā vai śiśirāyaṇeḥ bhāryā vo astu mahābhāgāḥ bhāryāsahāyaḥ svagaṇaiś ca yuktaḥ bhāryā sā guṇaśālinī bhāryā sukalabhūṣaṇā bhāryās tāsāṃ śataṃ sutāḥ bhāryās tu gacchaty aniśaṃ suvarṇo bhāryāsvarūpā saiva bhūtvā suvarṇā bhāryāharaṇam āditaḥ bhāryāṃ kuru mama svasām bhāryāṃ kṛṣṇāya tāṃ dadau bhāryāṃ ca priyavādinīm bhāryāṃ ca vibhavaṃ tathā bhāryāṃ nātyacarat patiḥ bhāryāṃ putrāṃs tathaiva ca bhāryāṃ prāpto dakṣasutāṃ bhāryāṃ vāpi gṛhāṇemāṃ bhāryāṃ svāhām aninditām bhārye prāpya mahāmanāḥ bhārye bhavetām ubhayor bhāryaiveha sahāyinī bhāvagarbhasmitaṃ vākyaṃ bhāvatīrtham iti proktaṃ bhāvatīrthaṃ tad ucyate bhāvatīrthaṃ tad ucyate bhāvaduṣṭiṃ parityajya bhāvanānuguṇaṃ ceti bhāvam antargataṃ nṛṇām bhāvayantī tadīritam bhāvayantyo virejire bhāvayām āsa sarvataḥ bhāvaśuddhiḥ prayoktavyā bhāvaśuddhena cetasā bhāvaśuddhyā kriyate yat bhāvaśaithilyakāraṇāt bhāvas tu trividho jñeyaḥ bhāvasthitaṃ bhavet karma bhāvahāvavilāsādyān bhāvaṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ bhāvaṃ ca rudranihitaṃ bhāvāt prārabhate tadvad bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaṃ bhāvābhāvavivarjitam bhāvābhāvavivarjitam bhāvābhāvau phale dṛṣṭau bhāvābhāvau hi lokānām bhāvā rasānugāś caiṣāṃ bhāvikāryapracoditāḥ bhāvi cendrapadaṃ punaḥ bhāvitasya śubhāśubhaiḥ bhāvino arthasya vānagha bhāvino arthasya vai balāt bhāvino arthasya vai balāt bhāvi vipra tadā kalau bhāvivyāsās tatas tu te bhāvenaikena śraddhayā bhāvenaikena suśroṇi bhāve abhivṛddhā ca bhave bhave ca bhāvair bhedaḥ pradṛśyate bhāvaiḥ phalam avāpyate bhāvo manasi vartate bhāvo ayaṃ mānuṣas tvayā bhāvyarthayogān nimamajja toye bhāvyaṃ yac ca manaḥsthitam bhāvyaḥ samāgate tasmin bhāṣitaṃ tava tattvataḥ bhāṣitaṃ devadevasya bhāṣitena dvijottamāḥ bhāṣitena punaḥ punaḥ bhāṣitena punaḥ punaḥ bhāṣitena punaḥ punaḥ bhāsayanti diśo daśa bhāsān gṛdhrāṃś ca gṛdhry api bhāskarasya dvijottamāḥ bhāskarasya paraṃ kṣetraṃ bhāskarasya paraṃ guhyaṃ bhāskarasya suraśreṣṭha bhāskaraṃ gaganecaram bhāskaraṃ dīptatejasam bhāskaraṃ praṇamet tataḥ bhāskaraṃ samupasthitā bhāskarād vāritaskarāt bhāskarābhimukhas tataḥ bhāskarāya yathoditam bhāskariḥ pūraṇaḥ sūtaḥ bhāskare abhyudite dvijāḥ bhāskareśvarasaṃjñitam bhāskaropamadarśane bhāskaro vāritaskaraḥ bhāsvatsphaṭikabhittiś ca bhāsvadbhramaṇavibhrānta- bhāsvantam abhituṣṭuvuḥ bhāsvantam ity uvāceyaṃ bhikṣavaś cāpi putrā hi bhikṣavo yācamānāś ca bhikṣāṭanāya vedo api bhikṣā balipradānaṃ tu bhikṣābhujaś ca ye kecit bhikṣārtham āgatāṃś cāpi bhikṣārthī paryaṭed gṛhān bhikṣāvadhūtā rajasā bhikṣāṃ balim adattvā ca bhikṣitaś citrabhānunā bhikṣukān atithīn api bhikṣukaiś cānnakāṅkṣibhiḥ bhikṣuvaikhānasaiḥ siddhaiḥ bhikṣuḥ saṃyatavāṅmanāḥ bhittvā dehaṃ purā mama bhidyate dehajas tāpo bhidyate munisattamāḥ bhidyate vajrakaṇṭake bhidyate vartate punaḥ bhidyate śrūyatāṃ ca saḥ bhidyadbhis tīkṣṇaśūlāgrair bhidyadbhis tīkṣṇaśūlāgrair bhidyante tatra nārācaiḥ bhidyante pāpakāriṇaḥ bhidyante śaktitomaraiḥ bhidyamānāś ca sarvaśaḥ bhidyamānaiḥ samantataḥ bhidyamānaiḥ samantataḥ bhinatti marmasthānāni bhinatti marmasthānāni bhindipālāyudhās tathā bhinnadeho vāsudeve bhinnas triśūlena balīyasāhaṃ bhinnākṣaṃ taṃ rathaṃ rājā bhinnātmā jagad api pāsi śaktibhedaiḥ bhinnāsanaṃ ca śayyāṃ ca abhirāmaś ca susatphalaḥ bhillatīrtham iti khyātaṃ bhillatīrthaṃ samastāgha- bhillasya hy apakāriṇaḥ bhiṣaksiddhiṃ ca vāruṇe bhiṣagvaitaraṇaś ca yaḥ bhītayā śīlavipluteḥ bhītaṃ pitṛgaṇaṃ viṣṇur bhītaṃ bhayebhyo jagatāṃ pradhāne bhītaḥ śaṅkitacittas tu bhītaḥ śāpāc ca vimanā bhītā devāḥ śriyaḥ patim bhītānām abhayaprada bhītāḥ kecid divaṃ jagmur bhīto bhṛśaṃ kiṃ karavāṇi śaṃbho bhīmakarmā tathākṛtiḥ bhīmatvaṃ tatkṛtaṃ dhruvam bhīmabhāvo bhīmatanuṃ bhīmasenaś ca nāmataḥ bhīmasenas tathā vātād bhīmasenās trayo viprā bhīmaseno abhavat sutaḥ bhīmas taṃ ratham uttamam bhīmasya mahimānaṃ ko bhīmaṃ karma tathākarot bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpottamam bhīmān saṃdhārayāmy aham bhīmā makaravaktrāś ca bhīmāraṇyaṃ kuśasthalīm bhīmeśacaraṇāśrayaḥ bhīmeśvaraṃ namaskṛtya bhīmair gaṇaiḥ parivṛto bhīmo rājātha rājarāṭ bhīmo vidarbhasya sutaḥ bhīṣaṇaṃ daityasevitam bhīṣaṇaṃ yātanādeham bhīṣaṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam bhīṣaṇaṃ raudrapuruṣaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam bhīṣaṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam bhīṣaṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam bhīṣaṇaṃ vāpi śobhanam bhīṣaṇākṛtir atyugro bhīṣaṇāni bahūni ca bhīṣaṇā pāparūpiṇī bhīṣaṇe kuṇḍakhāte tu bhīṣaṇe jātavedasi bhīṣaṇo bhīṣaṇākṛtiḥ bhīṣayantaś ca sarvataḥ bhīṣayanto mahābalāḥ bhīṣayanto mahābalāḥ bhīṣmakasya puraṃ jagmuḥ bhīṣmakaḥ kuṇḍine rājā bhīṣmako rukmiṇā sārdhaṃ bhīṣmadroṇakṛpādīnāṃ bhīṣmadroṇajayadrathān bhīṣmadroṇāṅgarājādyās bhīṣmadroṇādayaś caiva bhīṣmadroṇādayo dvijāḥ bhīṣmadroṇādayo nṛpāḥ bhīṣmavratadharāya ca bhuktabhojyo yathānyāyam bhuktavatsu ca vipreṣu bhuktavatsv atha vipreṣu bhuktavatsv atha sarveṣu bhuktavān bhuvanatrayam bhuktidaṃ muktibhājanam bhuktido muktidaḥ puṃsāṃ bhuktipradā muktim athāpi dadyāt bhuktimuktipradasya ca bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṛṇām bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṛṇām bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṛṇām bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ prabhum bhuktimuktipradaṃ bhavet bhuktimuktipradaṃ viduḥ bhuktimuktipradaṃ śivam bhuktimuktipradaṃ śivam bhuktimuktipradaṃ śubham bhuktimuktipradaṃ śubham bhuktimuktipradaṃ harim bhuktimuktipradaḥ śivaḥ bhuktimuktipradaḥ śivaḥ bhuktimuktipradaḥ sākṣād bhuktimuktipradāyakam bhuktimuktipradāyakam bhuktimuktipradāyakam bhuktimuktipradāyakam bhuktimuktipradāyakam bhuktimuktipradāyakam bhuktimuktipradāyakam bhuktimuktipradāyakam bhuktimuktipradāyinī bhuktimuktipradāv ubhau bhuktimuktiprade nṝṇāṃ bhuktimuktiprade śive bhuktimuktiprado hariḥ bhuktimuktiphalapradam bhuktimuktiphalapradam bhuktimuktiphalapradam bhuktimuktiphalapradaḥ bhuktimuktiphalapradaḥ bhuktimuktiphalapradaḥ bhuktimuktiphalapradaḥ bhuktimuktiphalapradā bhuktimuktiphalaprade bhuktimuktiphalaṃ nṝṇāṃ bhuktimuktī ubhe api bhuktimuktī ubhe śreṣṭhe bhuktimuktyanusāriṣu bhuktir dānādinā sarva- bhuktir muktiś ca kasmād vā bhuktir vā muktir eva ca bhuktir vā muktir eva vā bhuktiśrīś cātha muktiś ca bhuktiṃ ca vipulāṃ tvayi bhuktiṃ muktim avāpa ca bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca tatkṣaṇāt bhuktiḥ samādhiḥ paramā ca muktiḥ bhuktenaikena kiṃ phalam bhukter muktiḥ śreṣṭhatamā bhukter muktiḥ sudurlabhā bhuktyā narakam ṛcchati bhuktyā muktiṃ kathaṃ vrajet bhuktvā kālaṃ ca saptatim bhuktvā kālaṃ pṛthak pṛthak bhuktvā ca vipulān bhogāṃs bhuktvā cācāmatāṃ yac ca bhuktvā cātra sukhaṃ vimuktakaluṣaḥ svarge ca divyaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā cāyāti medinyāṃ bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān bhuktvā tatra sukhaṃ naraḥ bhuktvā tatra sukhaṃ viprā bhuktvā tatra sukhān bhogān bhuktvā tatrepsitān bhogān bhuktvā tu vipulān bhogāñ bhuktvā divyān mahābhogān bhuktvā nānāvidhaṃ mudā bhuktvā bhogam anuttamam bhuktvā bhogaṃ sudurlabham bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān bhuktvā bhogān manoramān bhuktvā bhogān manoramān bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān bhuktvā bhogān vicitrāṃś ca bhuktvā bhogān sahasraśaḥ bhuktvā bhogān sudurlabhān bhuktvā bhogāṃś ca puṣkalān bhuktvā bhogāṃś ca vividhān bhuktvā yathepsitān bhogān bhuktvā rātrau tayā samyak bhuktvā sarvaguṇānvitān bhuktvā sāgaraparyantāṃ bhuṅkte ca vividhān kāmān bhuṅkte tatra varān bhogān bhuṅkte pradāya viprebhyo bhuṅkte bahuvidhān bhogān bhuṅkte bhogān yathepsitān bhuṅkṣvety evāha rākṣasam bhujadaṇḍair mahāghoraiḥ bhujadaṇḍair mahāghoraiḥ bhujayugmaṃ ca bhāmini bhujaṃga iva nirmokān bhujyatām ambubhakṣyāṇām bhujyatām ambubhakṣyāṇām bhujyante jātipuruṣair bhujyante tās tato nityaṃ bhujyante pāpakāribhiḥ bhujyamānaiś ca gantavyaṃ bhujyamānaiś ca gantavyaṃ bhuñjate niyatavratāḥ bhuñjadhvam adhunā nṛpāḥ bhuñjadhvaṃ svāni duḥkhāni bhuñjanti vividhair vaktrair bhuñjanti ṣaḍrasaṃ viprāḥ bhuñjan saktuṃ yavāgūṃ ca bhuñjāneṣu tu vipreṣu bhuñjāno yāvakaṃ rūkṣaṃ bhuñjīta cānnaṃ taccitto bhuñjīta puruṣaḥ snātaḥ bhunakti vipulān bhogān bhuvanatrayapāvanīm bhuvanaṃ me tato narāḥ bhuvanāni caturdaśa bhuvanāni pṛthak teṣāṃ bhuvane devakāryāṇi bhuvane abhyarcito nityaṃ bhuvaneṣu mahādyute bhuvam āha nṛpottamaḥ bhuvarlokas tu so apy ukto bhuvarlokādikāṃl lokāñ bhuvaṃ gṛhṇantu yā dattā bhuvaṃ ca nāgāṃś ca gajāṃś ca viprān bhuvaṃ tāṃ saiṃhikīm iti bhuvaṃ dāsyati yajñiyām bhuvaṃ devāv upāgatau bhuvaṃ prāpsyatha karmāṇi bhuvaṃ bhittvā rasātalam bhuvaṃ viṣṭabhya hastābhyāṃ bhuvaḥ karma ilā cakre bhuvaḥ sthāne tu tāṃ daduḥ bhuvā grastauṣadhīr api bhuvi tālaphalāni vai bhuvi piṇḍaṃ jalaṃ tathā bhuvi piṇḍān pradāsyati bhuvo nāmātibhāro ayaṃ bhuvo bhārāvatārārthaṃ bhuvo bhāro avatāritaḥ bhuvo lokaṃ tataḥ sarvaṃ bhuvo lokaṃ tathaivordhvaṃ bhuvo hatvākhilān nṛpān bhūgarbha dhruva īśāna bhūtagarbha namo astu te bhūtagrāmaś caturvidhaḥ bhūtagrāmās tathaiva ca bhūtagrāmair na saṃśayaḥ bhūtatattvair anākula bhūtaduḥkhanibarhaṇāt bhūtanāthakṛtād bhayāt bhūtanātha namo astu te bhūtanāthavadhaṃ prati bhūtanāthaṃ tu daṇḍinam bhūtanāthaiḥ samaṃ yayau bhūtanātho api tac cakram bhūtapāvyakta bhūteśa bhūtapretapiśācaiś ca bhūtabhavyabhavatprabhuḥ bhūtabhavyabhavātmakam bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyavit bhūtabhavyabhavodbhavaḥ bhūtabhūteśa nāśaya bhūtabhedāś ca bhūtebhya bhūtayonim akāraṇam bhūtale duṣkṛtacchadam bhūtale pātu vārāhas bhūtale yāni tīrthāni bhūtavad bhavitavyaṃ syād bhūtasargam ahaṃkārāt bhūtasargam imaṃ samyag bhūtasargaharo haraḥ bhūtasaṃghasamākule bhūtasaṃtāpanas tathā bhūtahāpi tataḥ śaṅkāṃ bhūtaṃ krodhāgnisaṃbhavam bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavac caiva bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhūtaṃ mahābhūtajagatpradhānaṃ bhūtaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam bhūtātmā cāvyayo bhavān bhūtātmā cendriyātmā ca bhūtātmā bhūtakṛd bhūto bhūtātmā manasas tathā bhūtātmā saccidākṛtiḥ bhūtātmā hṛdayāśritaḥ bhūtādir grasate punaḥ bhūtādir bhūtabhāvanaḥ bhūtādir bhūr bhuvaḥ svaś ca bhūtādis tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ bhūtādis tvaṃ tathācyuta bhūtādiṃ grasate cāpi bhūtādau saṃsthiteṣu vai bhūtādhivāsa bhūtātman bhūtānām api cāśubham bhūtānām avanī yathā bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim bhūtānām ādito viduḥ bhūtānāṃ karmaṇo gatim bhūtānāṃ karmaṇo gatim bhūtānāṃ ca tathārcanam bhūtānāṃ jyaiṣṭhyabhājanam bhūtānāṃ dvijasattamāḥ bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayam bhūtānāṃ prabhavo hariḥ bhūtānāṃ bhūtabhāvana bhūtānāṃ bhūtasargeṇa bhūtānāṃ viṣaye prītir bhūtāni ca tathānyāni bhūtāni dadṛśuś ca te bhūtāni bhṛtyāḥ sakalāḥ bhūtānīva muniśreṣṭhāḥ bhūtāpsarasakiṃnaraiḥ bhūtāya prasutāya ca bhūtāvāptis tatas tasya bhūtāśrayo bhūtapatiḥ bhūtāḥ piśācā rakṣāṃsi bhūtendriyeṣu yugapad bhūtebhyaś cāpi pañcabhya bhūteṣu ca sa sarvātmā bhūteṣu vasate yo antar bhūteṣu sarveṣu tathāsti yo vai bhūtair antaradhīyata bhūtaiḥ saṃtyaktadehasya bhūtaiḥ saṃtyaktadehasya bhūto hy agnir maheśvaraḥ bhūtyāṃ cotpādito devyāṃ bhūtvā tasmin rudrapiśācasaṃjño bhūtvā pañcaśikhaḥ śiśuḥ bhūtvā purā varāheṇa bhūtvā prasanno bhagavann bhūtvā brāhmaṇaveṣeṇa bhūtvā bhūtahitārthinā bhūtvā manyum athocus te bhūtvā mīno aṣṭa varṣāṇi bhūtvā vṛddhavapus tataḥ bhūtvā śvā pañca varṣāṇi bhūtvā somāgnir eva ca bhūtvāhaṃ dvijasattama bhūtvotpanno mahābalaḥ bhūdharā ye samīpagāḥ bhūnimbaṃ nimbarājike bhūpatau dīkṣite dātā bhūpadmasyāsya śailo asau bhūpās te tasya śāsanāt bhūpradeśo yatas tasmāt bhūbhāge plāvite tatra bhūbhṛtaḥ kupito balaḥ bhūbhṛte viṣṇave bhaktyā bhūmayo yatra viprendrā bhūmāv āsphoṭayām āsa bhūmāv āsphoṭitas tena bhūmidā dīpyamānāś ca bhūmidānaphalaṃ labhet bhūmidānaspṛhāṃ tyaktvā bhūmidānaṃ karoti yaḥ bhūmidānena vidhivad bhūmipṛṣṭhe samutpannā bhūmim abhyetya sakalaṃ bhūmir apy āha vinayād bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir bhūmir āpas tayor vākyaṃ bhūmir āpo bhaviṣyati bhūmir dyauḥ śarvarī kṣāntir bhūmir mātā tathāparā bhūmir viśudhyate kālād bhūmiśayyānulepanaḥ bhūmiśāyī bhavet tatra bhūmisūryāntaraṃ yat tu bhūmistham iva dhūrjaṭim bhūmisthāṃś ca carācarān bhūmiṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ kṛtvā bhūmiṃ caiva praveśitaḥ bhūmiṃ tathāntarikṣaṃ ca bhūmiṃ te samarārthinaḥ bhūmiṃ lebhe jagatpateḥ bhūmiṃ sasyavatīṃ kaścin bhūmiṃ sasyavatīṃ gāś ca bhūmiṃ saṃśodhya yatnena bhūme gorūpiṇī bhūtvā bhūme rasaviśeṣeṇa bhūmer āsīt tadā dvijāḥ bhūmer ete guṇās trayaḥ bhūmer gandhādikaṃ guṇam bhūmer deho jalāt sneho bhūmer yojanalakṣe tu bhūmeḥ svaparadattāyā bhūmau karma vidhīyate bhūmau ca saṃsthitaṃ bhāsvaj- bhūmau cāpi nikhanyatām bhūmau dadyāt tato jalam bhūmau patati bho dvijāḥ bhūmau praṇemus te sarve bhūmyākāśarasātalam bhūmyā ca sahite api bhūmy āsīt kapilāntike bhūmyāṃ caiva ca saṃsthitāḥ bhūmyāṃ caiva layaṃ yātā bhūmyāṃ yad dīyate toyaṃ bhūya eva tapaḥ kartum bhūya evābhivardhate bhūyaś ca jāmadagnyo ayaṃ bhūyaś ca tvaṃ varam imaṃ bhūyaś caiva bhaviṣyanti bhūyaḥ prabrūhi deveśa bhūyaḥ prabrūhi bhagavañ bhūyaḥ śāpabhayād ṛṣiḥ bhūyaḥ śroṣyatha bho dvijāḥ bhūyā iti mahānadī bhūyād agne naikatṛptā bahūṃś ca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ prāṇabhṛdgrāme bhūyiṣṭhānīva bhūtāni bhūyiṣv avasthitā sā tu bhūyo devarṣisattamaḥ bhūyo devasya ceṣṭitam bhūyo devo mahāyaśāḥ bhūyo api kathayāsmākaṃ bhūyo abhavaṃ vaiśyakule vyathārto bhūyo bhūtātmano viṣṇoḥ bhūyo ayaṃ vāmanaḥ paraḥ bhūyo arthadharmārthajigīṣitaiva yat bhūribhārāvapīḍitā bhūrir bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ bhūriśravasam eva ca bhūr bhuvaḥ svaritaś caiva bhūrlokaṃ ca bhuvarlokaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ cātimanyatām bhūṣaṇaṃ vinayena hi bhūṣaṇācchādanādibhiḥ bhūṣaṇācchādanoktibhiḥ bhūṣaṇānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ bhūṣaṇāni vicitrāṇi bhūṣaṇāny atiramyāṇi bhūṣayitvā striyaṃ yathā bhūṣitaṃ daityadānavaiḥ bhūṣitaṃ bahukandaram bhūṣitaṃ sumanoharam bhūṣitaṃ sumanoharaiḥ bhūṣite puṣpapādapaiḥ bhūṣite sūryasaṃnibhaiḥ bhūṣito abhūd dvijottamāḥ bhūsamudrādibhir yuktaṃ bhṛgutīrthaṃ kuśodbhavam bhṛgutuṅgaṃ hiraṇyākṣaṃ bhṛgutuṅge gatiṃ prāpa bhṛgubhiś cāṅgirobhiś ca bhṛgur nabho vivasvāṃś ca bhṛgur marīciś ca tathā bhṛguś ca ṛtvijo abhavat bhṛgor jagatyāṃ vaṃśe asmiñ bhṛgor vaṃśe samutpanno bhṛgvagniveśyātrimarīcimukhyāḥ bhṛgvatripulahādibhiḥ bhṛgvādayas tu te sarve bhṛgvādyās taṃ tadā devaṃ bhṛgvādyaiḥ sevitaṃ pūrvaṃ bhṛṅgamālāmanoramām bhṛṅgarājaiś ca kokilaiḥ bhṛṅgarājais tathā śukaiḥ bhṛṅgarājais tathā śukaiḥ bhṛṅgāraiḥ priyaputrakaiḥ bhṛtakādhyāpako yas tu bhṛtakādhyāpitaś ca yaḥ bhṛtyaṃ mām aparādhinam bhṛtyātmaputradārāṇām bhṛtyādibharaṇārthāya bhṛtyānāṃ bahuśo nṛṇām bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇādikam bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇe rataḥ bhṛtyā hy anirdiṣṭabhujo bhṛtyebhyaḥ prabhaviṣṇavaḥ bhṛtyau prītim avāpsyataḥ bhṛśam ābharaṇair bhīmair bhṛśam ābharaṇair bhīmair bhṛśaṃ kopasamanvitaḥ bhṛśaṃ pīḍitamānasaḥ bhṛśaṃ pīḍitamānasaḥ bhṛśaṃ bāle śubhānane bhṛśaṃ śāpabhayodvignaḥ bhejur gopāṅganā harim bheje śivaḥ śāntatanur janānāṃ bhettāraḥ śatruvāhinīm bhedabhaṅgakarāya ca bhedaṃ na kaścij jānāti bhedāś ca tasya varṣasya bhedās te kīrtitā ye tu bhedāḥ proktā manīṣibhiḥ bhedenāvāṃ vyavasthitau bhedair vinā naiva kṛtir na dharmo bherīmurajanisvanaiḥ bherīmṛdaṅgasaṃnādaiḥ bherīmṛdaṅgasaṃnādaiḥ bheruṇḍo yo abhidhīyate bheṣajaṃ bhagavatprāptir bhaikṣeṇānnaṃ samāhṛtya bhaikṣyavratās tathā śūdrāḥ bhairave romaharṣaṇe bhairave lomaharṣaṇe bhairave lomaharṣaṇe bhairave lomaharṣaṇe bhoktavyaṃ subhage naiva bhoktavyāni mamaitāni bhoktāraḥ sarvasaṃpadām bhoktāro bahavaś ca me bhoktāro rakṣakāś ca te bhoktukāmaḥ kilāyātas bhoktuṃ na śakto asmi phalāni mūlāny bhokṣyanti puruṣāḥ svayam bhokṣyantīdaṃ śvamāṃsakam bhokṣyabhojyaharāś caiva bhokṣyāmahe havirbhāgān bhokṣyāmaḥ surasattama bhokṣyāmo gatamatsarāḥ bhokṣye kathaṃ tu tad vittaṃ bhokṣye nānṛtam asti me bhokṣye aham amṛtaṃ śuci bhogavaty api tāṃ prāha bhogavaty abravīd idam bhogavatyā pratiṣṭhitaḥ bhogavatyā mahāmatiḥ bhogavatyāś ca yo bhartā bhogavatyā sahāgatāḥ bhogavatyās tu tad vākyaṃ bhogavatyāḥ prasādataḥ bhogavatyāḥ savistaram bhogavāṃś cirajīvitaḥ bhogaṃ kāntiṃ balaṃ prabho bhogād ṛte na kṣayo asti bhogān ādityalokaṃ tu bhogān uccāvacān divyān bhogān nānāvidhān viprā bhogān bhuktvā tataś cyutaḥ bhogān bhuktvātidaivatān bhogān bhuktvā yathārthataḥ bhogān bhuṅkte yathepsitān bhogān muktim avāpsyati bhogārthināṃ bhogam abhīpsitaṃ ca bhogārthī satataṃ naraḥ bhogārthe yajñavidhinā bhogāvāptir nṛṇāṃ bhavet bhogāś ca vividhā mayā bhogeṣu ca narādhipaḥ bhojanasyārthinaṃ viddhi bhojanaṃ puṣkaradvīpe bhojanāni vicitrāṇi bhojanāni vicitrāṇi bhojanīyā vipaścitā bhojane ca narādhipa bhojane tūpaviṣṭe tu bhojayām āsa tac chrutvā bhojayitvā śataṃ nityaṃ bhojayitvā sakanyakāḥ bhojayec ca tathātithīn bhojayec ca pitāmaham bhojayet taṃ yathāvidhi bhojayet praṇipātādyaiḥ bhojayed ayujo dvijān bhojavṛṣṇyandhakair guptāṃ bhojaś cakre bhayārditaḥ bhojaś ca vijayaś caiva bhojasya prayayuḥ kila bhojasya vaḍavā viprā bhojasya śatadhanvanaḥ bhojaṃ hatvā mahāratham bhojā ye sārtikāvatāḥ bhojāś cāvantayaḥ smṛtāḥ bhojāḥ kiṣkindhakaiḥ saha bhojiteṣu dvijātiṣu bhojena śatadhanvanā bhojyantāṃ tena vai viprās bhojyante ca svamāṃsaṃ te bhojyapeyādikaṃ caiṣāṃ bhojyam annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ bhojyaṃ kiṃcin mama dhruvam bhojyaṃ pāyasapūrvakam bhojyaṃ vā mā vilambyatām bhojyānnabhojyasaṃbhukte bhojyān peyāṃś ca puṣkalān bhojyāyāṃ puruṣā daśa bho dvijā valayākāraḥ bho bho dānapate vākyaṃ bho bho duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ bho bho nṛpā durācārāḥ bho bho meghā niśamyaitad bho bho vyādha mahābuddhe bho bhoś caṇḍa mahācaṇḍa bho bhoḥ kim etad bhavatā bhoḥ śacī devarājasya bhoḥśabdam abhidhāsyanti bhautikaṃ sargam arthakṛt bhautyo nāma ruceḥ sutaḥ bhaumam etat payo gobhir bhaumas tu narakāsuraḥ bhaumasvargo ayam uttamaḥ bhaumā hy ete smṛtāḥ svargā bhaumo ayaṃ narako nāma bhauvanaṃ kaśyapaṃ tathā bhauvanaṃ brāhmaṇair vṛtam bhauvanaḥ sārvabhauvanaḥ bhauvanaḥ sārvabhauvanaḥ bhauvano api mahāprājñaḥ bhramatā bhagavan sadā bhramatāśeṣajagatāṃ bhraman gacchāmi yogataḥ bhramantam anu taṃ yānti bhramantas tatra cchidyante bhramantaḥ puṇyatīrthāni bhramanti suciraṃ kālaṃ bhramamāṇaś ca kiṃ tatra bhramamāṇas tadā kukṣau bhramamāṇaṃ surarṣayaḥ bhramamāṇāv itas tataḥ bhramamāṇau tu tau dṛṣṭvā bhramamāṇau vane tatra bhramarāvalisevitāḥ bhramāmi parameśvara bhramāmi suciraṃ kālaṃ bhramāmi suciraṃ kālaṃ bhramāmi suciraṃ prabho bhramim āropya tat tejaḥ bhramim āropya tattejaḥ- bhraṣṭacchāyeva me mahī bhraṣṭacchāyo asi sāṃpratam bhraṣṭarājyapradāyakam bhraṣṭarājyapradāyakam bhraṣṭarājyapradāyakam bhraṣṭarājyo babhūva ha bhraṣṭarājyo bhavāmy aham bhraṣṭottarīyo vikalaḥ bhrātaraś ca mahātmāno bhrātaras te trayo mune bhrātaraṃ tvaṃ jighāṃsasi bhrātaraṃ yo avamanyate bhrātaro jñātayas tathā bhrātar yad vihitaṃ karma bhrātā janiṣyate cāpi bhrātā śanaiścaras tasya bhrātur anveṣaṇe dvijāḥ bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya caiva hi bhrātur bhāryāṃ tu pāpātmā bhrātur vacanam ākarṇya bhrātur hanumataḥ prītyai bhrātuḥ priyaṃ tathā dakṣaṃ bhrātṛtvān marṣayāmy eṣa bhrātṛpriyaṃ tīrtham atho jagāma bhrātṛpriyaṃ tv ākhurathaṃ tam īḍe bhrātṛbhir mātulais tathā bhrātṛbhir mātulais tathā bhrātṛmātṛpitṛṃs tathā bhrātṛmātṛpitṛṃs tathā bhrātṛvat putravac cāpi bhrātṛhantṛvināśāya bhrātṛhantrā kathaṃ maitryaṃ bhrātṝṇām ayutasya vai bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ jñātuṃ bhrātṝn sutān bhrātṛsutān sapautrān bhrātṝṃś cakre viśāpinaḥ bhrātrā nirasto duṣṭena bhrātrā nirasto vaiśravaṇo bhrātrā saha gaṇeśvaraḥ bhrātrā saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ bhrātrā skandena jayayā bhrātror vairam abhūn mahat bhrātroḥ saṃjalpator evaṃ bhrāntadeśo bahutaraṃ bhrāntijñānād atītas tu bhrāntidarśanataḥ sthitam bhrāntidarśanataḥ sthitam bhrāntiṃ lokasya paśyadhvam bhrāntopakṛtihetave bhrāmayitvā tu vegena bhrāmayitvā śataguṇaṃ bhrāmayet sādhakottamaḥ bhrāmitānāṃ kudṛṣṭibhiḥ bhrukuṭīkuṭilānanaḥ bhrukūṭīkuṭilekṣaṇam bhrūṇahatyāvināśanam bhrūṇahā purahantā ca makṣikābhiś ca raudrābhiḥ makṣikābhiś ca saṃghaśaḥ makṣikābhiś ca saṃghaśaḥ makham ādāya yajñabhuk makhasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ yena makhas tair veṣṭitaḥ sarvo makhaṃ tu viṣayaṃ kṛtvā makhaṃ prāyān maheśvaraḥ makhaṃ vidhvasya nṛpatiṃ makhe agniḥ prathamaṃ pūjyo makhe tasmin vartamāne makhe vidhvaṃsyamāne tu makhe veṣṭya maheśvaram makhais tapobhiḥ sa guṇair variṣṭhaḥ magadhaṃ māgadhāya ca magā brāhmaṇabhūyiṣṭhā magāś ca māgadhāś caiva magnam abhyuddhariṣyati magnasya mohasalile magnasya hi pare jñāne magnaṃ māṃ bhavasāgare magnaṃ viṣayasāgare magnaṃ saṃsārasāgare magnānāṃ duḥkhapāthobdhau magno vai kāliye hrade maghavantaṃ śacī yathā maghavā kauśikaḥ svayam maghavānaṃ śatakratum maghavān kauśikaḥ svayam maghāsu ca prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ maghāsu ca yathāvidhi maṅgalaṃ priyavāditā maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam maṅgalāni ca sarvaśaḥ maṅgalāya bṛhaspatiḥ maṅgalā sarvamaṅgalā maṅgalāsaṃgamaṃ caiva maṅgalety uditā tu sā maṅgalaikanidhiḥ sākṣād maṅgalaiḥ praṇināditam maṅgalaiḥ praṇināditam maccittasaṃharṣavināśadakṣam macchaktipreritamatir macchāpabhītā vāgīśā macchāpopahatāḥ sarvā macchāsanaparāṅmukhīm majjatāṃ duḥkhasāgare majjamānā jale vipra majjalair mantrasaṃyutaiḥ majjātaḥ śukrasaṃbhavaḥ majjāsnāyuparigrahe mañcaprānte vyavasthitau mañcasthasya dvijottamāḥ mañcasthaṃ puruṣottamam mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ
