mañceṣv anyeṣv avasthitāḥ mañjarīpuñjadhāriṇam mañjarībhiś cakāśire mañjarīr vanitājanaḥ mañjūṣaṃ narakaṃ smṛtam maṇayo yatra suprabhāḥ maṇikāñcanacitritaiḥ maṇikāñcanabhūṣitaiḥ maṇikuṇḍala ucyate maṇikuṇḍalam āhedam maṇikuṇḍalam ojasā maṇitīrthaṃ sarasvatī maṇināga iti tv āsīc maṇipuragiriṃ tathā maṇipūraṃ tathottaram maṇipradīptojjvalakuṇḍalaś ca maṇipravaraśobhitam maṇimattaṃ ca kāmākhyaṃ maṇimantaṃ dvijaḥ prāha maṇimantrauṣadhīnāṃ hi maṇimān dharmavicchreṣṭhaḥ maṇiratnahradaṃ tathā maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam maṇiratne syamantake maṇir ity evamādayaḥ maṇivatyāṃ nivāsinaḥ maṇivastrapravālānāṃ maṇivālaparīdhāno maṇividrumaśobhitam maṇiśṛṅga ivotthitaḥ maṇiṃ caiva syamantakam maṇiṃ dehīti lāṅgalī maṇiṃ syamantakaṃ caiva maṇḍape sthāpayiṣyanti maṇḍalabrāhmaṇo yas tu maṇḍalasthaṃ janārdanam maṇḍalasthaṃ janārdanam maṇḍalasya sutejasā maṇḍalaṃ śaśinaḥ sthitam maṇḍalāni vicintayet maṇḍalaiḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti maṇḍūkaśāyī ca tathā mataṅgahradam eva ca matinārasutās tv āsaṃs matināro mahīpatiḥ matimān guṇasāgaraḥ matimān dharmavic chūraḥ matimān dharmasaṃpannaḥ matimān pitṛvatsalaḥ matimān vijitendriyaḥ matimāṃl lomaharṣaṇaḥ matir āsīn mahāmate matiṃ kuru janārdana matiṃ cakre mahābalaḥ matkṛtena prayatnena matkeśo bhavitā surāḥ matkeśau vasudhātale matta etāni jāyante mattakokilanāditaiḥ mattadvirephāvalijuṣṭapattraiḥ mattabarhiṇanāditaiḥ mattamātaṅgagāmibhiḥ mattavāraṇagāminī mattaś cāpi priyaṃ hare mattaś cāpy abhavan punaḥ mattas tad vriyatāṃ sarvaṃ mattas tvaṃ vayasādhikā mattasyonmattakasya ca mattaḥ kopena cāghūrṇaṃ mattaḥ pūrvatarā pṛthvī mattaḥ prādurbhavanty ete mattaḥ priyatarā nṛpa mattaḥ śīghram ihocyatām mattaḥ śṛṇu mahāmate mattaḥ sa vadham āpnuyāt mattaḥ sāhāyyakāmo abhūc mattaḥ syād asurāriṇaḥ mattairāvatapṛṣṭhagaḥ mattoktām avamanya vai matto gṛhṇīṣva suvrata matto nānyo asti pāpakṛt matto bhayaṃ na cānyeṣāṃ matto yad abhivāñchasi matto yad abhivāñchasi matto varān avāpuś ca matto avibhinnam ātmānaṃ matpadāni ca te sarpa matpitropārjitaṃ dhanam matputrās te prabhāvāc ca matputro gālavāśrame matpṛṣṭhe hi padaṃ nyasa matprasādasamutthayā matprasādād asaṃśayam matprasādād asaṃśayam matprasādād dhruvaṃ mokṣaṃ matprasādād bhaviṣyati matprasādān na te subhru matprasādān na saṃśayaḥ matprasādena bhartāraṃ matprasādopabṛṃhitaḥ matprītyā vīra gamyatām matvā hāsāvamānanā matsamīpaṃ gamiṣyasi matsaṃkalpaḥ surottama matsaṃkalpo anusidhyatām matsaṃbandhena vo gopā matsāṃnidhye yatavrataḥ matsutaḥ sa nipātitaḥ matsuto ayaṃ guṇākaraḥ matstotraṃ dakṣiṇe tīre matsthāpitāny uttamamantravidbhis matsyakūrmavarāhādyaiḥ matsyabandhaiś ca matsyo asau matsyamādhavamāhātmyaṃ matsyamāṃsam atho hṛtvā matsyamāṃsāśinaś ca yat matsyayonim anuprāpya matsyayonau prajāyate matsyarūpaś ca govindaḥ matsyasūkarakūrmāś ca matsyaḥ kūrmas tathaiva ca matsyākhyaṃ mādhavaṃ caiva matsyānām iva codake matsyān madrān sakekayān matsyā mukuṭakulyāś ca matsyair anyaiḥ saha dvijāḥ matsyaiḥ kūrmaiś ca śaṅkhaiś ca matsyo jagrāha jālibhiḥ matsyo jagrāha bālakam matsyo jālo jalo ajayyo matsyodake yathā tadvad matsyodarījale snānaṃ matsyo anyatvam athājñānād matsyo yathodakajñānād mathitaṃ bālayānayā mathurā tena pūritā mathurādvārapālāś ca mathurānagarīpaura- mathurām abhyayāt tadā mathurāyā nirāyudhaḥ mathurāyā madhupriyaḥ mathurāyāṃ marusthale mathurāyāṃ hariṃ dṛṣṭvā mathurāvāsinaṃ lokaṃ mathurāvāsiyoṣitām mathurāṃ ca punaḥ prāptāv mathurāṃ ca svayaṃ yayau mathurāṃ prāpya govindaḥ mathurāṃ yāti keśavaḥ mathyamāne amṛte jātaṃ madanaṃ kusumākaram madanāṃśaḥ sa vīryavān madantikam athāgaman madantikam anuprāpya madanyan nāsti kiṃcana madamattaiś ca bhogibhiḥ madarthe sāhasaṃ kṛtam madalolākulākṣaram madaviplutacetasaḥ madasiktān mahābalān madasthibhiḥ prītimanto bhavantu madāghūrṇitanetro asau madāghūrṇitalocanaḥ madālasāś ca suśroṇyo madāsṛganuliptāṅgau madirāgandham uddhatam madirāditathāvarā madire tvaṃ mahaujasaḥ madīyaṃ tu mataṃ jñātvā madīyaṃ nāma mātmanaḥ madīyaṃ pañcamaṃ vaktraṃ madīyāyāṃ na te yonau madīyena tavāpi ca madupāttaharo bhavān mado mātsaryam eva ca madgṛhe niṣkuṭārthāya maddattamantraṃ śaśirakṣaṇāya maddattena vimānena maddarśanam apuṇyānāṃ maddevayajanaṃ ca tat maddevayajanaṃ cedaṃ maddevayajanaṃ puṇyaṃ maddevayajanaṃ puṇyaṃ maddevayajanaṃ śubham maddvāre niyatā ye ca madbalenaiva keśava madbhaktānāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ madbhaktā ye samāhitāḥ madbhaktāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ madbhakto na mṛtiṃ yātu madbhakto asi dṛḍhavrataḥ madbhakto asau balir daityo madbhaktyā ceha pūrtataḥ madbhartur harato vṛkṣaṃ madbhrātṝñ śāpato muktān madyagandhaṃ ca yad bhavet madyadhārāṃ sa lāṅgalī madyapāne dvijottamāḥ madrarājasutā cānyā madrājyaṃ tu punaḥ punaḥ madrārāmās tathāmbaṣṭhāḥ madrūpaparipālitā madvarād atigarvitaḥ madvākyakartāsi yadi dvijendra madvākyaprerito nāgo madvākyaṃ kuru satyaṃ tvaṃ madvākyaṃ gautamo api ca madvākyāc ca bhaviṣyati madvākyād ānaya svayam madvākyād ṛṣayo māyām madvidhānena vihitā madvināśe vinaśyeyuḥ madvīryatāpitān vīrān madvīryāc cūrṇitāt sūkṣmād madvīryād abhavat tvattaḥ madhukendraphalair drumaiḥ madhukaiṭabhaghātine madhukaiṭabhayoḥ kṛtsnā madhukaiṭabhahantre ca madhukaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca madhukṣīrarasān gandhān madhugandhodakenaiva madhucchandasam ojasā madhucchandaḥpriyā punaḥ madhucchandā iti khyāto madhucchandā jagādedaṃ madhucchandā vaco abravīt madhucchando jayaś caiva madhujambīratindukaiḥ madhutīrtham athaindraṃ ca madhudaṃśaḥ prajāyate madhudhāraśubhāñjanaiḥ madhunā tu samāyuktāṃ madhuparkaṃ mahādeva madhuparkeṇa caiva ha madhupaś cāpapaś caiva madhumaṇḍodakā divyāḥ madhurasvarabhāṣiṇī madhuraṃ cāpy anulbaṇam madhurāṃ pāpavarjitām madhurāṃs tarjitān pūpān madhur ditisuto balī madhur madhuravāg api madhur mādhava eva ca madhuvātātṛcaṃ jagau madhu vā madhumiśraṃ vā madhuśākaphalair mūlair madhu śrotreṇa pāsyati madhusarpiḥsamāyuktaṃ madhusūdanāya namaḥ madhuhā grāmahantā ca madhu hutvā yathānyāyaṃ madhūnāṃ vaṃśakṛd rājā madhūvaṭamanojavau madhor jajñe atha vaidarbhyāṃ madhoś ca tanayo dṛpto madhos tasyāṃ vyajāyata madhos tu mādhavāḥ smṛtāḥ madhoḥ putraśataṃ tv āsīd madhyakesaram eva ca madhyato valayākṛtiḥ madhyadeśam avāptavān madhyadeśā janapadāḥ madhyadeśādayo janāḥ madhyapūrvādidikṣu ca madhyamaś ca śunaḥśephaḥ madhyamaṃ tac ca gamyate madhyamaṃ tu śunaḥśepaṃ madhyamaṃ tu śunaḥśepaṃ madhyamaṃ putram aurasam madhyamaṃ mantrapūrvakam madhyameśvarasaṃjñayā madhyarātre akhilādhāre madhyastham iva cātmānaṃ madhyasthānaṃ vikarṇakam madhyasthaiḥ samupekṣyate madhyahīnāś ca suśroṇyaḥ madhyaṃ cānte ca gacchati madhyaṃ yāte api bhāskare madhyaṃ sarasa eva hi madhyāś cāntanivāsinaḥ madhyāhnādiṣu saṃsmaran madhyāhne vā tathā punaḥ madhyāhne vā tathā punaḥ madhyāhne sakalo janaḥ madhye cāgnidale dhīmān madhye cāpi niveśitaḥ madhye tatra likhet padmam madhye tasmān na dīyatām madhye tīrthāny aśeṣataḥ madhyena vibhajann iva madhye puruṃ ca rājānam madhye madhye padabhraṃśād madhye śūdrāś ca bhāgaśaḥ madhye subhadrāṃ cāsthāpya mana ādhāya niścalam manaś cakre ratiṃ prati manaś cāpi sadā yuṅkte manaś caiva susaṃyatam manaś caiva susaṃyatam manasaś candramā jātaḥ manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ cāpy manasas tu parā buddhir manasas tu parā buddhir manasas tuṣṭivardhanam manasaḥ pañca bhūtāni manasaḥ pariṇāmo ayaṃ manasaḥ pūrvam ādadyāt manasaḥ prītijanakaiḥ manasaḥ prītidāyakam manasaḥ prītidāyakaiḥ manasaḥ prītivardhanān manasā karmaṇā vācā manasā karmaṇā vācā manasā karmaṇā vācā manasācintayat tataḥ manasā cintitaṃ yac ca manasā tu pradīptena manasāpi guror bhāryāṃ manasāpi na gṛhṇanti manasāpi na hiṃsanti manasāpi praduṣṭena manasāpy anyapuruṣaṃ manasā badhyate yena manasā bhāvanā bhaktir manasā mithileśvara manasā viparītena manasā vedamātaram manasā saha pārthiva manasā saṃyatendriyaḥ manasā hṛdaye muniḥ manasi sthāpayed yadi manasaiva jagatsṛṣṭi- manas tatra niveśya saḥ manas tāpair na yujyate manas te vidmahe mune manasyus tasya cātmajaḥ manasyor abhavat sutaḥ manasvinīnām api kāminīnām manaḥkarṇasukhaṃ samyak manaḥ kurvanti pātake manaḥ kurvaṃs tato rāmo manaḥ prajāpatir jñeyaḥ manaḥprasādajananaṃ manaḥ prasṛjate bhāvaṃ manaḥprītikaraḥ svargo manaḥśilānibhās tathā manaḥśrotrasukhāvahāḥ manaḥṣaṣṭhāni cātmani manaḥṣaṣṭhāni medhayā manaḥṣaṣṭhāni medhayā manaḥṣaṣṭhāni sarvāṇi manaḥṣaṣṭheṣu śuddhātmā manaḥṣaṣṭhair ihendriyaiḥ manaḥsamādhisaṃyuktaḥ manaḥsamādhisaṃyukto manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca manaḥsaṃkalparodhasam manaḥ suparṇo bhūtādiḥ manāṃsi kṣobham āyayuḥ manāṃsi durvinītānāṃ manīṣitaṃ tu yat pūrvaṃ manīṣī manasā viprāḥ manujāḥ svargakāṅkṣiṇaḥ manunā cāham uktā vāai manunā yad udīritam manunā saha dharmātmā manunāhaṃ jugupsitaḥ manur apy āha vedārthaṃ manur ādityatas tataḥ manur āhutim āvahat manur ity ucyate loke manur iṣṭiṃ prajāpatiḥ manur evābhavan nāmnā manur dakṣas tathaiva ca manur daṇḍadharas tadā manur mahātmā bhagavān prajākaraḥ manur vaivasvataḥ pūrvaṃ manur vaivasvato yamaḥ manuṣyatvāc ca devatvaṃ manuṣyatvāc ca nirayaṃ manuṣyatvād divaṃ yāti manuṣyatve api tiṣṭhatā manuṣyadeham utsṛjya manuṣyadehināṃ ceṣṭām manuṣyadharmaśīlasya manuṣyadharmābhiratau manuṣyayonau tvaṃ sarpo manuṣyaloke kṛtsne api manuṣyavapuṣānvitau manuṣyaḥ kurute yat tu manuṣyāj jāyate katham manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ manuṣyāṇāṃ tathā kalau manuṣyāṇāṃ yathā rājā manuṣyāṃś ca pitṝṃś cānyān manuṣyāṃś cābhilikhyāsau manuṣyāḥ paśavas tathā manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ khagāḥ manuṣyāḥ pitaras tathā manuṣyāḥ pitaras tathā manuṣyeṣu dadau dṛṣṭiṃ manuṣyeṣūpajāyate manuṣyaiḥ kriyate bhuvi manuṣyaiḥ saha gīyate manuṣyo brāhmaṇo bhavet manuṣyo brāhmaṇo bhavet manus tat kṣāntavāṃs tasyā manus tasyāḥ kṣamat tat tu manuṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhum manuḥ prajāpatis tv āsīt manuḥ sāvarṇike antare manuḥ svārociṣas tathā manūgā mandagāminī manogataṃ vetty athavā vidhātuḥ manoglāninivṛttiś ca manojñarūpāṇi bibharti nityam manojñāni bahūni ca manojñāni śubhāni ca manojñāny ambarāṇi ca manodīpena lokakṛt manonayananandanaḥ manonayananandinīm manonayanasaṃtāpa- mano buddhiḥ svabhāvaś ca mano buddhyā sthiraṃ kṛtvā manobhavodrekakarāḥ surāṇāṃ manobhavo abhūn madano ratiś ca manomārutatulyaiś ca mano yasyāntam abhyeti manor ajāyanta daśa manorathaphalaprāptau manorathasamarpakaḥ manor antaram āsādya manor antaram ucyate manor antaram ucyate manor antaram ucyate manoramaphaladrumān manor devās tv ime smṛtāḥ manor bhrātā śanaiścaraḥ manor vaṃśakaraḥ putras manor vaṃśavivardhanaḥ manor vaṃśe mahātmanaḥ manor viprā mahātmanaḥ manor vaivasvatasya vai manor vaivasvatasya ha manor vaivasvatasya ha manor vaivasvatasyāsan manor vaivasvatasyaite mano lolaṃ calācalam manovākkāyakarmajaiḥ manovākkāyakarmabhyaḥ manovākkāyajāt pāpāt manovākkāyikaṃ tv agham manovākkāyikāni ca mano vācaṃ ca karmaṇā manovibhramakārakaiḥ mano viśuddhaṃ puruṣasya tīrthaṃ manoś ca vaṃśaja ilā mano harasi me subhru manoharāyāḥ śiśiraḥ manoharās tatra tatra manoharair mānavibhaṅgahetubhiḥ manoharau prajvalacāruveśau mano hy ātmani dhārayet manohlādakaraṃ saukhyaṃ manohlādakaraiḥ śubhrair manoḥ svāyaṃbhuvasyaite mantra ity abhidhīyate mantradṛg vā sa eva syād mantradhvanipraharṣibhiḥ mantrapūtaṃ śuciḥ samyag mantrapūrvaṃ tu vai dvijāḥ mantrayajñaparā viprāḥ mantrayajñavahaṃ vahniṃ mantrayām āsur avyagrāḥ mantrayām āsur avyagrāḥ mantrayām āsur udvignā mantraśabdais tathāparaiḥ mantrasiddhais tapaḥsiddhair mantraṃ dāsye nivartasva mantraṃ brūmo atra vibudhāḥ mantraṃ yān āsurān hantuṃ mantraṃ stotram athāpi vā mantraḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ mantrāṇāṃ praṇavas tathā mantrāṇāṃ praṇavo yathā mantrāṇi guṇavanti ca mantrābhyāsas tapo vāpi mantrāhvānavisarjane mantritaṃ pṛthivīty evaṃ mantreṇa yāgadānābhyām mantreṇānena taṃ vaṭam mantrair yathājyaṃ hutam adhvarāgnau mantrair vāhanam uttamam mantraiś cākaravaṃ tataḥ mantrais tu saṃkṣālya jalaiś ca puṇyaiḥ mantraiḥ pūjyaṃ maheśvaram mantraiḥ stotraiḥ stuvantas te mantro ayaṃ tārayaty uta mantharātmakadurdaiva- manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā mandabhāgyās tathā pare mandarakṣobhacakitā mandarasya tathā śṛṅgaṃ mandarāraṇyam eva ca mandare sindhusāgare mandaro dardalācalaḥ mandavāre tu ye aśvatthaṃ mandaṃ jagarjur jaladāḥ mandaṃ mandaṃ vahnināśvāsitā ca mandākinī daśārṇā ca mandākinyāḥ sitaṃ vāri mandārakundapuṣpaiś ca mandārakusumādibhiḥ mandārendīvarāṃs tathā mandāraiś campakadrumaiḥ mandāraiḥ pārijātaiś ca mandāraiḥ pārijātaiś ca mandiraṃ ratnabhūṣitam mandībhavacchrotranetra- mandena ravisūnunā mandodarī ca subhagā mando abhūd duḥkhitas tadā mannāmā tatra vikhyātas mannāmnā tīrtham ucyatām mannāmnā tu prakīrtitaḥ mannāmnīyaṃ nadī devi manmathaḥ kṣobhakṛd dṛḍham manmathāviṣṭahṛdayo manmathāsaktacetasaḥ manmathe tu gate nāśaṃ manmatho lokatāpanaḥ manmanā matprasādena manyate pakṣabuddhitvāt manyante cāpy alaṅghanām manyamāno dvijottamāḥ manyutīrtham iti khyātaṃ manyutīrthaṃ tad ucyate manyunā ca mahābhīmā manyunā jayam āpyātha manyunātisamīritaḥ manyunā parirakṣitāḥ manyunāmānam atyugraṃ manyunā saha cābhyetya manyumatsu sureṣu ca manyum āpur jayaṃ caiva manyum ūcuḥ puraḥ sthitāḥ manyur āha smayann iva manyuḥ provāca tān sarvān manyū rūpaṃ svakaṃ mahat manye kulam idaṃ sarvaṃ manye mitrabalāt punaḥ manye sukṛtam eva ca manyo bhokṣyāmahe vayam manyo asmākaṃ yuyutsatām manvantarapramāṇaṃ tu manvantaram aśītiṃ ca manvantaram ihocyate manvantaram udāhṛtam manvantaram udāhṛtam manvantaraśataṃ yāvaj manvantaraśataṃ sāgraṃ manvantaraṃ caturthaṃ vaḥ manvantaraṃ pūrṇam avāpa śakraḥ manvantarāṇāṃ tatraiva manvantarāṇāṃ te tatra manvantarāṇāṃ navati manvantarāṇāṃ pañcāśad manvantarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ manvantarāṇi tatraiva manvantarāṇi bhoḥ sūta manvantarāṇi sarvāṇi manvantarāṇi saṃkṣepāc manvantare prasūyāmas manvantare vyatikrānte manvantareṣu sarveṣu manvantareṣu saṃhārāḥ manvantareṣu saṃhārāḥ mama karmanibandhanāt mama kṣetrāṇi yāni ca mama kṣetre muniśreṣṭhā mama khyātir yathā bhavet mama geham upāgatau mama gehavibhūṣaṇam mama cārtiharo devas mama cārdhena tejasaḥ mama cotpādake bhaktyā mama janmani tac chṛṇu mama jyaiṣṭhyaṃ mama jyaiṣṭhyam mama jyaiṣṭhyaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavet mama tat kartum arhatha mama tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mama tās tv ayanaṃ sadā mama tena vinābhīrair mama tv apatyadvitayam mama tvayā samaṃ yuddhaṃ mamatvaṃ kṣapayitvā tu mamatvaṃ manasā nityam mamatvāgādhagartānte mamatvena pradharṣitaḥ mamatvenāvṛto nityaṃ mama darśanam icchatā mama dāsyāḥ sabhāgyāyā mama duṣṭau pravardhataḥ mama duḥkhapramārjanī mama deyaṃ sadā tvayā mama deyā sureśāna mama dehavicāriṇaḥ mama dehasya ceśvarī mama dehi prajāgaram mama daivād upāgatā mama doṣāt tavāpi vā mama doṣāpanodāya mama dhanyatamaṃ matam mama dharmabhṛtāṃ vare mama dharmasya jananī mama dhyānasya sāṃpratam mama naśyatu pātakam mama niṣkramaṇaṃ yathā mamanthur jātamanyavaḥ mamanthur jātamanyavaḥ mamanthur dakṣiṇaṃ karam mamanthur varuṇālayam mamanthuḥ kṣīrasāgaram mama putreṇa pālitam mama prāṇaharau hi tau mama priyā tu jānīte mama prītikaraṃ cedaṃ mama brūhi gurur bhavet mama bhārāvatāraṇam mama bhāryā rājaputrī mama mātur vṛṣadhvaja mama mātṛsamaṃ matam mama yātrā bhavatv iti mama yādṛg vapuś ca te mama lokaṃ gamiṣyasi mama lokaṃ sa gacchati mama loke mahīyate mama loke mahīyate mama vartanti nityaśaḥ mama vākyaratā sadā mama vākyena mānada mama vānyopapāditam mama vai romakūpāṇi mama vyākhyātum arhasi mama śāntim abhīpsantī mama śailendram avyayam mama śauryabalaṃ yadi mama satyānuraktasya mama sarvaṃ nivedyatām mama saṃsthāpanaṃ bhavet mama sāmarthyam īdṛśam mama syāt tava ca prabho mama syād iti niścitaḥ mama syād iti bhāminī mama svāsthyena hetunā mama harṣavivardhinī mama hāsyāspadaṃ tv iti mamākhyātir apatyena mamāgre prabhaviṣyati mamāgre avasthito viṣṇuḥ mamājñayā prītamanāḥ mamājñā tava dakṣiṇā mamājñāṃ pravadantu vai mamātmaka iti śrutaḥ mamātmāpi niveditaḥ mamātmā munisattama mamādiṣṭena viprendra mamādya tāṃ darśaya puṣkarākṣa mamādya tyaktajīvitaḥ mamādya dvārakā sarvā mamādhvaryavaḥ kalpayante ca bhāgam mamānukampayā caiva mamānujaḥ kaliś cāpi mamānusmaraṇaṃ prāpya mamāntarātmā tava ca mamāntaḥ kamalāyukto mamāntikam athābhyagāt mamāntikam upāgamat mamāntikaṃ bhaktiyukto mamāpi cāgataṃ bhadre mamāpi bālakas tatra mamāpi bhrāntacittatā mamāpi mātaro devyaḥ mamāpy akhilalokānāṃ mamāpy antakaraṃ bhūtaṃ mamāpy ādhārabhūtāḥ syur mamābhāgyam aho kīdṛk mamābhūd adya ca bhavān mamābhūd yajñasiddhaye mamābhyudayasaṃmatam mamāyaṃ cārpayiṣyati mamāyuṣyeṇa jīvatu mamāra sa mahādaityo mamārja tarupallavaiḥ mamārjunatvaṃ bhīmasya mamārtir āsīd atimohakartrī mamāvadhyo mahādaityo mamāśakyaṃ na kimapi mamāśramasamīpe vai mamāsīn munisattama mamāsti tridaśeśvara mamāstu dhik kubuddhasya mamāṃśaḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ mameti rukmī prāhoccair mameti vadataḥ pārśve mamedaṃ pāpam āpannaṃ mamedaṃ śubham āgatam mameyaṃ jagatī purā mameśo na nimantritaḥ mamaikāgramanāḥ śṛṇu mamaitānīndriyāṇi ha mamaiva doṣo nitarāṃ mamaiva pāṇigrahaṇaṃ mamaiva bhagavān imam mamaivam abhavat sudhīḥ mamaiva viddhi rūpāṇi mamaivāsurasūdana mamaiṣa hanteti dvijā mamopakurvanti hite ratā ye mamopakurvanti hite ratā ye mayam acyutam īśvaram mayasyāsīt sureśvara mayaṃ māyāvinaṃ ripum mayaṃ māyāvinaṃ hariḥ mayaḥ puṣkara eva ca mayā kratuśatair iṣṭaṃ mayā kṣetrasya kīrtitaḥ mayākhyātaṃ dvijottamāḥ mayā gokulanāśakāḥ mayā ca ṛṣibhis tadā mayā cakraṃ nivartitam mayā ca datto viprendra mayā ca śaṃbhuḥ sarvaiś ca mayā ca saha saṃmantrya mayā cārādhitaś cāsau mayā caivam udāhṛtaḥ mayā coktāḥ suragaṇā mayā janmasahasrāṇi mayā janmāny anekāni mayā tat kathitaṃ purā mayā tatroktam uccakaiḥ mayā tad adya saṃprāptaṃ mayā tava niveditam mayā tasmin samarpitam mayā tasya tavoditam mayā tasyā nivartitum mayā tāny anubhūtāni mayā tīvraṃ vrataṃ vipra mayā tu dhyānayogena mayā tulyo na pātakī mayātmā te niśācara mayātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ mayātra vidito bhavet mayā tv apahatāḥ sarva mayā tvaṃ putrakāminyā mayā dattam anekaśaḥ mayā dattavaro daityas mayā dattās tavādbhutāḥ mayā dṛṣṭas tu nārada mayā dṛṣṭaṃ carācaram mayā dṛṣṭāsi suśroṇi mayā nātha gṛhītāni mayā niveditaṃ bhaktyā mayā niveditaṃ bhaktyā mayā nivedito gandhaḥ mayā nivedito bhaktyā mayā niṣiddhaṃ bhuñjāno mayānītaṃ hariṣyati mayā pāśupataṃ vratam mayāpi ca samākhyātā mayāpi tubhyaṃ kārtsnyena mayā puṇyas tapodhanāḥ mayā putreṇa jātena mayā punaḥ śacībhartā mayā pūrvaṃ munīśvara mayā prāptā jagannātha mayā proktaṃ dvijottamāḥ mayā proktaṃ sudurlabham mayā bhaktyā niveditam mayā bhaktyā prasāditaḥ mayā bhadre tathāstv iti mayābhibhūtavijñānāś mayābhimantritaṃ brahman mayā madhuniṣūdana mayārcitāḥ stutāḥ sarve mayā labdho mataṅgaja mayā lokapitāmahaḥ mayā vaḥ kathitā dvijāḥ mayā vā kaḥ samo bhuvi mayā vāsārtham īśvari mayā vijitam ity adaḥ mayā vinā dehabhājo mayā vindhyasya cottare mayā vedhyas tv avedhyo vai mayā vai munisattamāḥ mayā vo hitakāmyayā mayā śrutam idaṃ vacaḥ mayā samāśritā vyaktā mayā samyag udāhṛtam mayā sarasvatī devī mayā saṃparikīrtitam mayā saṃparikīrtitam mayā saṃparikīrtitam mayā saṃmantrya te devāḥ mayā saṃsāracakre asmin mayā sādhv iti yoṣitaḥ mayāsau nirmitā purā mayāsya dvijasattamāḥ mayā hariṇaśaṅkayā mayi kleśātmakaṃ dvija mayi jīrṇā mahauṣadhyaḥ mayi jīvati kiṃ nāma mayi jīvaty abhūd idam mayi tasmān naitad evaṃ mayi tiṣṭhati naivāyaṃ mayi tiṣṭhati nocitam mayi tiṣṭhaty uvāca ha mayi trailokyapāvanī mayi naiva ca kilbiṣam mayi pāśās tvayeritāḥ mayi bhṛtye sthite devān mayi bhrātar asaṃśayam mayi matte pramatte vā mayi madvaṃśaje cāpi mayi mānāryakaṃ kṛthāḥ mayi yajño vidhātavyo mayi ratnāni pīyūṣaṃ mayi lokāḥ sthitā rājan mayi vipra kathaṃcana mayi viśramyatām astraṃ mayi siṃhasthite ambike mayi hotavyam ity api mayūkhair avabhāsyate mayūrakekābhirutaiḥ kṣaṇena mayūradhvajabhaṅgas te mayūravadanās tathā mayūravarasaṃghuṣṭaiḥ mayedaṃ dhāryate jagat mayena prītipūrvakam mayena mahatī hy abhūt mayeyaṃ vasudhākhilā mayeha jñānasaṃpannaṃ mayaitāni dvijottamāḥ mayaite parikīrtitāḥ mayaiva vijito dharmo mayaiva sthāpitaḥ śivaḥ mayaivaite yathā śrutāḥ mayoktā oṣadhīr idam mayokte te ubhe api mayokte vai viśeṣataḥ mayo gatvā rahaḥ prāha mayo daityo mahābalaḥ mayoddiṣṭāṃ tu pratimāṃ mayopapāditaṃ nāgaṃ mayopapāditaṃ nāgaṃ mayo api brāhmaṇaṃ matvā mayoṣitaṃ tathā strīṇāṃ mayo harim uvāca ha mayo harihitaḥ sadā mayy agnau śalabhāyitam mayy asau yātu saumyatām maraṇaṃ ca varaṃ deva maraṇaṃ janmaduḥkhitvaṃ maraṇaṃ jīvato apy asya maraṇaṃ hi manasvinām maraṇānāṃ na bhājanam maraṇāntāni gacchati maraṇāntāny upāśnute maraṇāntāsu mūrtiṣu maraṇāya dhṛtātmanām maraṇe janmani tathā maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni amaraḥ svargagato yathā mariṣyāva iti hy uktvā mariṣye dānavaguro mariṣye na ca jīviṣye mariṣye nātra saṃśayaḥ marīcipramukhās tadā marīcim atryaṅgirasau marīcir atrir bhagavān marīcir janayām āsa marīcir bhṛgur eva ca marīces tu parigrahaḥ marīcyādīn munīn sarvān marīcyādyair munivarair marutaś ca vavuḥ krūrāś marutas tasya tanayo marutas tv amarā bhavan marutām atha vāsavam marutāṃ patir ucyate marutāṃ madhyam āviśat marutāṃ viṣayāṃs tathā maruto nāma te devā maruto ye bhavatputrāḥ maruto alabhata jyeṣṭhaṃ maruto lokapālakāḥ maruto lokapālāś ca marutkiñjalkasaṃyuktaṃ maruttas tasya cātmajaḥ maruttaḥ kathito mayā marutvatyāṃ marutvanto marudbhir daivatais tathā marudbhiḥ krīḍitair alam marudbhiḥ saha nārada marudbhiḥ saha maitryeṇa marudbhiḥ sahitaṃ śakraṃ marudrūpaṃ samāsthāya marubhūmāv adhvagānāṃ martyaloka ihāgataḥ martyalokakṣayaṃ tathā martyalokabhavā tu yā martyalokaṃ pravartate martyalokaṃ samāgamya martyaloke tvayā mukte martyaloke durātmanā martyaloke naraḥ sarvo martyaloke narottamaḥ martyaloke pāpabhūtā martyaloke bhaviṣyasi martyaloke mahāścarye martyaloke samāhṛtā martyalokaiś ca durlabham martyasya kaḥ sahāyo vai martyaṃ cāmartyatāṃ gatam martyānām āyuṣaḥ kṣaye martyānām āyuṣaḥ kṣaye martyānām upakārakṛt martyān prati maheśvara martyā martyagatām eva martye caivātisaṃbhṛte martyeṣu paramārcitam martyo mṛtyum upāśnute martyo mohād acetanaḥ martyo aham iti kiṃ vadan marmaviddha ivābhavat marmavidbhir mahārogaiḥ marmābhighātam ākrośaṃ maryādākārakās teṣāṃ maryādādūṣakas tathā maryādāparvatā dvijāḥ maryādāparvatāv ubhau maryādāparvatāv ubhau maryādābandhakāraṇāt maryādābhedanaṃ sadā maryādābhedinaś ca ye maryādāvyutkramaś cāpi maryādāśailabāhyataḥ maryādāṃ bhedayām āsa maryādāḥ pūrvanirmitāḥ malajāḥ karkaśāś caiva maladā mālavartikāḥ malaniryātanaṃ tathā malaniryātanaṃ yasmin malaprasūtaṃ yad avocad ambā malayasyāpi deśo asau malayādriniketanaḥ malayādrisamudbhūtāḥ malavyaṃ goprabhāvaṃ ca malaṃ yat kāyajaṃ vāpi mallaprāśnikavargaś ca mallayuddhāya tatra vai mallayuddhena hantavyau mallarājaṃ mahābalam mallā dūtāś ca kāyasthā mallā magadhakā nandāḥ mallikākundakusumair mallikākundabāṇaiś ca mallikābāṇabarbarī maśakodumbare yadvad maśakodumbarau vāpi masūraṃ gṛñjanaṃ śaṇam masūrān koradūṣakān mahatas tapasaḥ pāre mahatas tamasas tāta mahataḥ param avyaktam mahatā tapasānvitaḥ mahatā tapasā yuktā mahatā tu prayatnena mahatā daivayogena mahatā pariveṣṭitaḥ mahatā pāṃśuvarṣeṇa mahatāpi suyatnena mahatā bāṇavarṣeṇa mahatā rājarājena mahatāṃ ca mahān asi mahatāṃ darśanaṃ brahmañ mahatāṃ bhūtasaṃghānāṃ mahatī yasya vai kṛpā mahatīṃ lokadhāriṇīm mahate yaśase satām mahat kautūhalaṃ jātaṃ mahattve ca parasparam mahaty abhyāgate kuryāt mahatyā kṣamayā yuktā mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ mahatyā senayā saha mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ mahat saṃkaṭam āpannaṃ mahat sukham avāpsyasi mahatsu na vṛthā bhavet mahadāder vikārasya mahadulkānibarhaṇe mahadulkānibarhaṇe mahad etad acintyaṃ ca mahad etad adhiṣṭhānaṃ mahadbhir munibhiḥ śrutam mahadbhiḥ kratubhir vibhuḥ mahadbhiḥ pavanāśibhiḥ mahadrasopaviṣṭāya mahadvigarhitaṃ karma mahad vai nātra saṃśayaḥ mahabhaṅgam acīkarat mahabhaṅgaviruddhena mahabhaṅgavirodhinā mahar janas tapaḥ satyam maharloka iti smṛtaḥ maharlokaṃ dvijās tadā maharloko vidhīyate maharṣiputraṃ dharmātmā maharṣibhir abhiṣṭute maharṣibhir alaṃkṛtāḥ maharṣivacanāt tadā maharṣiviṣayāṃś caiva maharṣiḥ kauśiko dhīmāṃs maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur yathā maharṣīṇāṃ mahaujasām maharṣīn abravīt tadā maharṣe śṛṇu sarvaṃ ca mahaḥ satyaṃ tapo janaḥ mahākamaṭhabhogāya mahākāyaṃ mahābalam mahākāyā mahābalāḥ mahākāyā mahārāvā mahākāyo mahābalaḥ mahākāryo mahābhogo mahākālavanaṃ tathā mahākālas triśūlavān mahākālaṃ sakṛc chivam mahākāleti vikhyātaḥ mahākūrmāya te namaḥ mahākṛtyā samuttasthau mahākratubhir īje yo mahākratau satvaram āmbikeyaḥ mahākṣārāmbudhārābhiḥ mahāgajapramāṇāni mahāgaṇapatir bhavet mahāgrahagṛhīteṣu mahāgrāha kṛtaṃ mayā mahāghoraṃ tamovṛtam mahāghoraṃ tamovṛtam mahāghoreṇa saṃvṛtam mahācaṇḍena vāyunā mahājñānaṃ mokṣavidāṃ parāyaṇam mahājyeṣṭhaṃ tathaiva ca mahājyaiṣṭhyāṃ muniśreṣṭhā mahājyaiṣṭhyāṃ labhen naraḥ mahājvālas taptakuḍyo mahājvāleti narakaṃ mahājvāle nipātyate mahājvālo mahārciṣmān mahātalaṃ ca brahmāṇḍam mahātāmisrasaṃjñitam mahātigamahārohaṃ mahātīrthāni nārada mahātmano mukhāt tasya mahātmānam ile svayam mahātmānas tu somakāḥ mahātmāno mahaujasaḥ mahātmā rauhiṇeyasya mahāduḥkhapradā hi ye mahāduḥkhapradā hi ye mahāduḥkhaṃ samāsādya mahādeva namo astu te mahādevapadāmbhoja- mahādevaprasādena mahādevam upasthitā mahādevaṃ paśupatiṃ mahādevāya citrāya mahādevena yac chinnaṃ mahādevena roṣād vai mahādevena vai yathā mahādevo akale deśe mahādevo jagadguruḥ mahādevo ativismitaḥ mahādevo liṅgarūpī mahādevo vyatiṣṭhata mahādyutimatāṃ caiva mahādhūlivimiśreṇa mahānadīti nāmnā sā mahānadī vaitaraṇī mahānadīṣu sarvāsu mahānadyāṃ tu bhaktitaḥ mahānalam iti khyātaṃ mahānalam iti śrutam mahānalaṃ mahākāyaṃ mahānalo yatra devas mahānalo yatra devo mahānāgavibhūṣaṇam mahān ātmā prakāśate mahānādair vīkṣitaiś ca mahānābhaś ca vikrāntaḥ mahān āsīt prajāpatiḥ mahān iti ca yogeṣu mahān iti ca yogeṣu mahānīlamahākarṇau mahānīlaṃ tataḥ param mahānubhāvaiḥ sarvajñaiḥ mahānṛpo vanaṃ prāyāt mahān eṣa vyatikramaḥ mahāntam ebhiḥ sahitaṃ mahāntaṃ ca samāvṛtya mahāntaṃ cāpy ahaṃkāram mahāntaṃ bhūtam agrajam mahānti pāpāni ca nāśam āśu mahānti munisattamāḥ mahānto api vipadgatāḥ mahān me saṃśayaḥ kaścin mahāpātakakāriṇaḥ mahāpātakakāriṇaḥ mahāpātakanāśanam mahāpātakanāśanam mahāpātakanāśanam mahāpātakanāśanam mahāpātakanāśanam mahāpātakanāśanam mahāpātakam alpaṃ vā mahāpātakasaṃghāta- mahāpātakasaṃyutaḥ mahāpātakasaṃyutaḥ mahāpātakinaḥ kecid mahāpātakinām api mahāpāpaphalaṃ cedaṃ mahāpāpamahāroga- mahāpāyīti narakaṃ mahāpāṣāṇavarṣeṇa mahāpuṇyamayaṃ viprās mahāpuṇyaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ mahāpuram iti śrutam mahāpuruṣavigraha mahāpuruṣaśabdaṃ hi mahāprajñās tathā cānye mahāprabheti narakaṃ mahāpralayakāraṇam mahāpralayakāriṇe mahāpralayadāruṇe mahāpralayasaṃjñāṃ ca mahāprasthānam acyutam mahāprasthānam ekāgro mahābalaparākramaḥ mahābalaparākramāḥ mahābalaparīvāro mahābalaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ mahābalaṃ haladharaṃ mahābalānāṃ dṛptānāṃ mahābalaiḥ śakrayamāgnitulyaiḥ mahābalau mahāvīryau mahābuddhir vicakṣaṇā mahābhaktividhāyakam mahābhayamahoragam mahābhayaṃ hy āgataṃ śātravaṃ naḥ mahābhayābdhau sādhūnāṃ mahābhaye cānugate mahābhayebhyaḥ kṛpayā prapannān mahābhāgakule devi mahābhāga bhaviṣyati mahābhāgavataḥ prāha mahābhāgavato dvijāḥ mahābhāgaḥ suto abhavat mahābhāgāsu saptasu mahābhāratakartāraṃ mahābhidhānakārttikyāṃ mahābhiṣekam indrasya mahābhūtapravartakaḥ mahābhūtāni ceśvarāḥ mahābhūtāni pañcāpi mahābhūtāni bhūtātmā mahābhūtāni yaś caiva mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi mahābhūte pravṛtte tu mahābhūtair alaṃkṛtaḥ mahābhogo bhujaṃgamaḥ mahābhyudayasiddhyarthaṃ mahābhragaṇasaṃkāśaṃ mahāmakhaiḥ pañcabhir apy akāmāḥ mahāmaṅgalaniḥsvanaiḥ mahāmanā nāma suto mahāmanās tu putrau dvau mahāmahiṣam ārūḍhaṃ mahāmahīdhrocchrayapīnagātraḥ mahāmātrapracoditaḥ mahāmūrtidharaṃ devaṃ mahāmegham ivocchritam mahāmohakarī nṝṇāṃ mahāmohakare nṝṇāṃ mahāyuddhaṃ mahāvarṣaṃ mahāyogabalopetā mahāyogaṃ mahātmānaṃ mahāyogāḥ sudhārmikāḥ mahāyogitvam āyuś ca mahāyogibhya eva ca mahāyogī sa tu balir mahārāja iti khyātas mahārājasutāyāś ca mahārājasya dhīmataḥ mahārājaṃ sametya ca mahārājāya buddhimān mahārājo bhagīrathaḥ mahārājñe nyavedayat mahārāṣṭrā māhiṣakāḥ mahāroganipīḍitaḥ mahārauravasaṃjñitam mahārṇavagatāṃ śīghraṃ mahārṇavaṃ vimalam udārakāntam mahālasair bhekagaṇaiś ca nāditā mahālobho vimohanaḥ mahāvaktrās tathā pare mahāvaktro mahodaraḥ mahāvarāhacaritaṃ mahāvarāhaṃ taṃ devaṃ mahāvaṃśabhavaḥ śrīmān mahāvācās tathā pare mahāvācīti vikhyātaṃ mahāvātaṃ mahātapaḥ mahāvāto muhūrtena mahāvāto ambudān iva mahāvītaṃ tathaivānyad mahāvītaṃ bahir varṣaṃ mahāvīte ca vai dvijāḥ mahāvīto abhavat sutaḥ mahāvīryaparākramāḥ mahāvīryāḥ parājitāḥ mahāvīryo mahāyaśāḥ mahāvelām ivormimān mahāvyasanināṃ nṛṇām mahāvratasamāhitaḥ mahāśanipitā daityaḥ mahāśanir iti khyātas mahāśanir iti bruvan mahāśanir maghavantaṃ babhāṣe mahāśanir mahādaityas mahāśanir mahāvīryaḥ mahāśanir hariṃ jitvā mahāśāntipradāyakam mahāśālasya viśrutaḥ mahāśālo abhavat sutaḥ mahāśilāpraharaṇāḥ mahāśītena marutā mahāśṛṅgaiś ca mahiṣair mahāścaryasamanvitam mahāśmaśāne ca mahācitiṃ sā mahāśramo vaitasikā- mahāsattramayo mahān mahāsarpo atibhīṣaṇaḥ mahāsaṃgrāmaśālinaḥ mahāsindhutaṭe caiva mahāsuraiḥ pīḍitaśailabandhā mahāsainyena saṃyugaḥ mahāsrotaṃ koṭarakaṃ mahāhanukapolāsyāḥ mahāhanukapolāsyāḥ mahāṃś cābhūt tadā grahaḥ mahāṃś caivākṣaro nityam mahimā gautamītīre mahimānaṃ nirīkṣya ca mahimānaṃ yasya vaktuṃ mahimā nāma viśrutaḥ mahimna iti viśrutā mahimnā tasya vismitaḥ mahimnā vyāpya tiṣṭhati mahimne paramātmane mahiṣarṣabhaśṛṅgāgrair mahiṣarṣabhaśṛṅgāgrair mahiṣaṃ bhūtavetālān mahiṣaḥ saptamas tathā mahiṣāsyās tathā pare mahiṣāsyās tathā pare mahiṣāṃś ca vanecarān mahiṣī tatparigraham mahiṣī tv ajamīḍhasya mahiṣoṣṭragavāṃ caiva mahiṣyāṃ jajñire śūrā mahīgataṃ daityadehaṃ mahīgataṃ yatra dehaṃ mahīgatānāṃ saritām adhīśe mahī cāpi dhanaṃ dātṝn mahī cāpsu nimajjati mahī dattā mayā dvijāḥ mahīdharās tathā santi mahī provāca bhauvanam mahīmayaṃ rūpam itīśvarasya mahī mātā mama prabho mahīm imāṃ tena samaṃ dvijena mahīyāṃs tvam anuttamaḥ mahīṃ gorūpam āpannāṃ mahīṃ ca mātaraṃ devīm mahīṃ nipatya sahasā mahīṃ nipatya sahasā mahīṃ sāgaraparyantāṃ mahendracāpena bhṛśaṃ virājitā mahendraprabhavāḥ smṛtāḥ mahendraprabhavāḥ smṛtāḥ mahendravajrāśanitulyasārai mahendra satataṃ tasmād mahendraṃ gurutalpagam mahendraṃ malayaṃ vindhyaṃ mahendrāyudhasaṃkāśau mahendreṇa mahāmune mahendre parvatottame mahendre malaye vindhye mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ mahe pratihate śakro maheśaliṅgaṃ puruṣo manasvī maheśasya mahātmanaḥ maheśe jagatāṃ prabhau maheśo api vihasyātha maheśvarakare nāgaḥ maheśvaragaṇaḥ kaścit maheśvarajaṭāgatā maheśvarajaṭājuṭād maheśvarajaṭājūṭe maheśvarajaṭājūṭe maheśvarajaṭāvāri maheśvarajaṭāsaṃsthāḥ maheśvarajaṭāsthā yā maheśvarajaṭāsthā yā maheśvarajaṭāsthitā maheśvarajaṭāsthitā maheśvaranirīkṣitaḥ maheśvarasutā caiva maheśvaraḥ parvatalokavāsī maheśvaraḥ sthāsyati cottareṇa maheśvarājñayā tatra maheśvarāya tāṃ viṣṇur maheśvare bhavānyā ca maheśvaro api sakalaṃ maheśvaro yatra devo maheśvaro yatra devo mahe sureśam arghanti mahotpātāñ śamāyaiṣāṃ mahotpātātibhīravaḥ mahotpāto bhavet kasya mahotsavam ivālokya mahotsave vartamāne mahotsavo abhūd akhilasya devyā mahotsekaṃ manoharam mahotsedhaṃ mahākāyaṃ mahodadhijalasthāya mahodadhir ivodaye mahodyānāṃ mahāvaprāṃ mahoraskaṃ mahābāhuṃ mahyam etat tapo devi mahyaṃ pūrvayuge nṛpa mākāntaṃ stuhi vidhvajam mā kurvan vairiṇo adhikam mā kṛtvā tad vināśaya mā kṛthās tapa ity uta mā krudho devi mātre tvaṃ māgadhasya balaṃ kṣīṇaṃ māgadhaḥ saṃprayāsyati māgadhādhipatir balī māgadhāś ca tathaiva ca māgadhāḥ kṣatriyās tu te māgadhena pramāṇena māghādīn prapitāmaha māghe candrakṣaye ahani māghe bhagas tu vijñeyas māghe māsi site pakṣe māghe māsy asite pakṣe māghyāṃ vānye śubhe tithau mā cintām alpikāṃ bhaja mā cintāṃ kuru kalyāṇa māṭharāś caiva kanakāḥ māṇḍavyaś cyavano dhūmro māṇḍavyaṃ yuktibhiḥ stavaiḥ māṇḍavyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ māṇḍavyo lokapūjitaḥ mātaṅgavacanaṃ śrutvā mātaṅgavacanaṃ śrutvā mātaṅgavacanaṃ śrutvā mātaṅgas tad vacaḥ śrutvā mātaṅgas tam uvāca ha mātaṅgas tam uvāca ha mātaṅgas tam uvācātha mātaṅgasya kathāśeṣaṃ mātaṅgaṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ mātaṅgaṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ mātaṅgaḥ pratyuvāca ha mātaṅgo api dadau tadā mātaṅgo rākṣasaṃ prāha mā tapaḥ kuru śobhane mātaraś ca tathā mayā mātaraś ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ mātaraṃ ca tapasvinīm mātaraṃ jagataḥ śubhām mātaraṃ parameśvarī mātaraṃ pitaraṃ gurum mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vinā mātaraṃ prāha vighnarāṭ mātaraṃ bhrātaraṃ jayām mātaraṃ mātṛsaṃmitām mātaraṃ ye api gacchanti mātaraṃ lokapālinīm mātaraṃ lokapāvanīm mātaro jajñire tataḥ mātar gaṅgāṃ jaṭāgatām mātaḥ satyaṃ vadasva me mātā kanīyasaṃ cāpi mātā kṛṣṇā tathānujaḥ mātā ca jagato hitā mātā ca teṣāṃ sasurāsurāṇām mātā tava prātitheyī mātā tu tasyā daivena mātā deva na vartate mātā devi tvam asmākaṃ mātāpitarāv ākruśya mātā pitā suhṛd bandhur mātāpitṛparaś caiva mātāpitṛparāś ca ye mātāpitṛparāś ca ye mātāpitror ajānatoḥ mātāpitror apūjanam mātāpitror mṛte ahani mātāpitror vaśe ratau mātāpitror vaśe sthitāḥ mātāpitroś ca pūjanam mātāputrau ca nārada mātā mama tvayā pālyā mātā mama mahāmate mātāmahapitāmahān mātāmahānām apy evaṃ mātāmahānām apy evaṃ mātā mahī mama iyaṃ mātā yasyāśrame sthitā mātā viṣṭiś ca bhīṣaṇā mātā śāpaṃ na dāsyati mātur mate sthito vidvāñ mātur me amṛtakuṇḍale mātulaḥ śvaśuraḥ śyālaḥ mātuluṅgaiḥ pūgaphalair mātuluṅgaiḥ pūgaphalaiḥ mātulena marīcena mātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mātus tava bhaviṣyati mātuḥ kṛtyaṃ tathātmanaḥ mātuḥ prasravaṇe medhyaṃ mātuḥ śāpaṃ cāparādhaṃ mātṛkalpā jaganmayī mātṛjāny anuśuśruma mātṛtīrtham iti khyātaṃ mātṛtīrthaṃ tato viduḥ mātṛtīrthaṃ tathaiva ca mātṛtīrthaṃ pṛthak pṛthak mātṛdāsyāt tadā duḥkha- mātṛpūrvaṃ tad iṣyate mātṛbandhumayīm imām mātṛbhāvaṃ vihāyaiva mātṛbhiḥ pitṛbhiś caiva mātṛbhiḥ pitṛbhiś caiva mātṛbhiḥ sahitāṃ devīṃ mātṛbhūtā yataḥ smṛtāḥ mātṛrūpam apaśyata mātṛvat pitṛvat prabho mātṛvat svasṛvac caiva mātṛśāpād ayaṃ me adya mātṛsnehena duḥkhitā mātṛsvarūpaṃ lokānām mātṛhā pitṛhā caiva mātṛhīnāny udīkṣya ca mātṝṇāṃ tu prakopeṇa mātṝṇāṃ yatra cotpattir mā te abhūd buddhir anyathā māty asyāṃ sarvam apy etat mātrā devaiḥ sa śaktidhṛk mātrāmātrapramāṇataḥ mātrāyonīni bhūtāni mātrāsaṅgād vinirgataḥ mātrāsi vañcitā bhadre mātrā snehena sarveṣu mātrā hīno bālakaḥ sarva eva mā tvayaiva ca bhetavyaṃ mātsaryābhibhavas tathā māthuraḥ sāṃpratas tv ayam mādṛśāḥ kuta eva hi mādṛśo vaktum arhati mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ mādryāḥ putro atha jajñe atha mādryāḥ putrau tu jajñāte mādhavaś candrasaṃnibhaḥ mādhavasya ca māhātmyaṃ mādhavasya ca saṃnidhau mādhavaṃ matsyarūpiṇam mādhavākhyasya bho dvijāḥ mādhavākhyāṃ śaśiprabhām mādhavādiṣu māseṣu mādhavāya variṣṭhāya mādhavo ramayā saha mādhucchandasamākhyātaṃ mādhvīvikrayakṛn vadhya- mānakandaṃ viṣakandaṃ mānabhaṅgād varaṃ tāta mānayantaḥ pinākinam mānayantau manuṣyatām mānayan madhusūdanaḥ mānayām āsa govindo mānavā nirgate yuge mānavāḥ śāstracakṣuṣaḥ mānave dharmasaṃskṛte mānaveyo muniśreṣṭhāḥ mānavo devasattama mānasas tyajyatāṃ jvaraḥ mānasaṃ caiva keśava mānasaṃ vācikaṃ vāpi mānasaṃ vācikaṃ vāpi mānasaṃ śrotum arhatha mānasaṃ sthūlaśṛṅgaṃ ca mānasāny eva bhūtāni mānasā mandagās tathā mānasena ca karmaṇā mānaseneha dharmeṇa mānasottaraśailasya mānasottarasaṃjño vai mānaso api dvijaśreṣṭhās mānaṃ kṛtvā tu pṛṣṭhataḥ mānātītāṃ tu vetti kaḥ mānito mānayīta ca māninaḥ parato ratāḥ mā nimajja kulaṃ mahyaṃ mānī cātmā na kaṣṭārho mānuṣacchadmarūpasya mānuṣatvam anuprāpya mānuṣatvam avāpnuyāt mānuṣatvam avāpnuyāt mānuṣatvaṃ gato viṣṇuḥ mānuṣatve api vipratvaṃ mānuṣasya ca yāmyasya mānuṣasya ca yāmyasya mānuṣaṃ rūpam āsthāya mānuṣāṇām anāmayam mānuṣāṇi trilokeṣu mānuṣāṇīti nārada mānuṣān annapākena mānuṣān durjayān kṛtsnān mānuṣān prati kiṃcana mānuṣā vighnapāśakaiḥ mānuṣāś copajīvanti mānuṣāḥ karapīḍitāḥ mānuṣīṇāṃ manuṣyo hi mānuṣī hārayāmi te mānuṣebhyaś ca tīrthebhya mānuṣebhyo mānuṣās tu mānuṣeṣu ca sarvajñā mānuṣeṣu nyayojayat mānuṣeṣūpajāyate mānuṣeṣv iha janmani mānuṣe sā vyajāyata mānuṣaiḥ kāritāny āhur mānuṣyam api cāśnute mānuṣyam evam ālambya mānuṣyaṃ puṇyasaṃcayan mānuṣyaṃ prāpya durlabham mānuṣyaṃ labhate vāpi mānuṣyaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ mānuṣyān nirayasthānam mānuṣyāṃ gargabhāryāyāṃ māndahāś ca dvijottamāḥ māndhātā dvau sutau dvijāḥ māndhātā manur eva ca māndhātā yuvanāśvasya mānyānāṃ kukurāndhakaiḥ mānyā vandyā ca saiva yat mā bhartāgniṃ samāviśet mām akrūreti vakṣyati mām agāt sākṣiṇas tv ime mām adhyātvātha yad dadyāt mām adhvareśaṃ nitarāṃ stuvanti mām anādṛtya durbuddhe mām anādṛtya ye putrāḥ mām anujñātum arhasi mām abhyetya tadovāca mām abhyetya samūcus te mām abhyetyātha munayo mām abhyetyedam abruvan mām ambujanivāsini mām avocan suragaṇā mām avocan hariṃ tadā mām ārādhaya nityaśaḥ mām ārādhya manīṣitam mām ārohantu pannagāḥ mām āha vigatabhramaḥ mām āha śaṃkaraś caivaṃ mām āha śaṃkaro devo mā māṃ dehi punaḥ punaḥ mām iyaṃ bhakṣayed eva mām īśaṃ ca yathākramam mā muñcasva mahābhāga mā muñcasva mahābhāga mām uddhara bhavārṇavāt mām uddhara saridvare mām uddhartuṃ tvam arhasi mām uvāca punaḥ punaḥ mām uvāca vadhiṣye tvāṃ mām uvāca sa lokeśo mām uvācātha vihvalaḥ mām uvācorvaśī svayam mām ūcatur idaṃ vacaḥ mām ūcur anahaṃkṛtāḥ mām ūcur ubhayaṃ matam mām eva punar ūcatuḥ mām eva praviśanti ca mām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ mām eva satataṃ viprāś māyayā kālaśambaram māyayā tasya mohitaḥ māyayā pramadārūpaṃ māyayā bhagavaṃs tava māyayā mohitas tatra māyayā mohitas tava māyayā yuyudhe tena māyayā viśvavañcakaḥ māyayā vetti tattvataḥ māyayāsṛjya nārada māyayā hatavijñānā māyā tavemām iha vettum icche māyābālavapurdhara māyābhir etad vyāptaṃ te māyā madīyā kamalāsanādyaiḥ māyā madīyā nahi śakyate sā māyāmayī tu sā saṃjñā māyām ātmavimuktaye māyāmohakarāvyaya māyārūpāṃ tu pramadāṃ māyārūpeṇa rukmiṇi māyārūpeṇa saṃsthitau māyārthe nāradasya ca māyāvatī dadau cāsmai māyāvatyā samanvitam māyāvidyodbhavaṃ tathā māyāvimohitadṛśā tanayo mameti māyāvilasitaṃ hi tat māyā viṣṇoś ca durvidā māyāśayyāśaye acyute māyā sarvā mahātmane māyā sā lokakarṣaṇī māyā surāṇām api durvicintyā māyāṃ ca vividhām āpa māyāṃ madīyāṃ nahi vetti kaścin māyāṃ vai tava cottamām māyāṃ saṃyuyuje aṣṭamīm māyāṃ hi me vetsyasi saṃnimagnaḥ māritaṃtepataḥ proktam māriṣā nāma kanyābhūd māriṣā nāma nāmnaiṣā māriṣāyāṃ janiṣyasi māriṣāyāṃ punar nṛpa māriṣāyāṃ prajāpatiḥ mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca mārīcaṃ kaśyapaṃ devī mārīcaḥ samabhāṣata mārīcāt kaśyapāj jātās mārīcāya dadau prītaḥ mārīcir maghavāṃś caiva mārīcogrā mahāmārī mārukā mālavāś caiva mārutāviddhaphenaugham mā rutety abravīd dhariḥ mā rodīr iti taṃ śakraḥ mā rodīr ity atheritām māro hare apy anyasurādivandyo mārkaṇḍaṃ mukhyataḥ kṛtvā mārkaṇḍeya mamāntikam mārkaṇḍeya mune dhīra mārkaṇḍeyavanaṃ caiva mārkaṇḍeyasya caritaṃ mārkaṇḍeyasya ceśvaram mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ mārkaṇḍeyahradaṃ gatvā mārkaṇḍeyahrade tv evaṃ mārkaṇḍeyahrade snānaṃ mārkaṇḍeyahrado nāma mārkaṇḍeyaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca mārkaṇḍeyaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ vaṭaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ mārkaṇḍeyeti coktvā man- mārkaṇḍeyeti viśrutaḥ mārkaṇḍeyena bho dvijāḥ mārkaṇḍeyendradyumnasya mārkaṇḍeyo atha vālmikiḥ mārkaṇḍeyo bharadvājo mārgagadvārasaṃyuktaṃ mārgajñāḥ kāpilāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ mārgamāṇāś ca te putrā mārgaśīrṣe tathā mitraḥ mārgaśīrṣe dvijottamāḥ mārgaṃ vijñāya tattvena mārgaṃ saṃtyajya nimnagā mārgaḥ paramadurgamaḥ mārgaḥ paramadurgamaḥ mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ mārgād asmād apāsara mārgārhasya ca ye mārgaṃ mārgārhāya dadan mārgaṃ mārgeṇa yamasādanam mārgeṇa yamasādanam mārgeṇa varavarṇini mārge vīkṣya tadā priyām mārgo gopāntam āgamat mārjanasya yathākāle mārjanasya yathāvidhi mārjanaṃ varuṇālaye mārjane kriyamāṇe tu mārjayitvā kuśair atha mārjārakukkuṭacchāga- mārjārakharakukkuṭān mārjāratvād abhūn muktā mārjārarūpiṇīṃ nītvā mārjāraśikhivaktrāś ca mārjārasaṃjñitāt tasmād mārjāraṃ ceti tat tīrthaṃ mārjāraṃ pūrvato bhavet mārjārolūkakhadyota- mārjārolūkakhadyota- mārtaṇḍa iti cocyate mārtaṇḍam aditiṃ tathā mārtaṇḍasya mahātmanaḥ mārtaṇḍasya vivasvataḥ mārtaṇḍasya vivasvataḥ mārtaṇḍasyātmajāv etāv mārtaṇḍākhyo bhaviṣyati mārtaṇḍena nirīkṣitāḥ mārtaṇḍo bhāskaro bhānuś mārtaṇḍo bhāskaro raviḥ mālatīkaravīraiś ca mālatīkundapuṣpaiś ca mālatīkundabāṇaiś ca mālatīmallikākundair mālatīyūthikāmallī- mālave bhuvi viśrutā mālākāragṛhaṃ gatau mālākārāya kṛṣṇo api mālākāreṇa pūjitaḥ mālākāro ativismitaḥ mālākārottamo dadau mālāḍhyaṃ mālikāḍhyaṃ ca mālādāmavibhūṣitāḥ mālām amlānapaṅkajām mālāṃ pragṛhya devyāṃ tu mālinī grāhamālinī mālinī pṛṣṭhato anvagāt mālinyaṃ dainyam eva vā mālyadāmavibhūṣitāḥ mālyadāmāvanāmibhiḥ mālyavadgandhamādanau mā vadhīr iti cābruvan mā vādaṃ kartum arhathaḥ mā viṣaṇṇā bhava snuṣe mā vyathasva mahāmate mā vyayas tapaso devi mā śucadhvaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ mā śokaṃ kurutaṃ yuvām māṣamudgatilekṣubhiḥ māṣamudgatilais tathā māsadvayaṃ matsyamāṃsais māsadvayena yātaś ca māsamātram athāpi vā māsamātraṃ gatāyās tu māsamātreṇa sāyātā māsam ekaṃ samādhinā māsartvayanahāyanam māsasaṃkhyair dinair gataiḥ māsasaṃsarakaṃ tathā māsaṃ tasmāt tu mānuṣaḥ māsaṃ tṛptiḥ pitṝṇāṃ tu māsaṃ puṣṭis tathāstu naḥ māsān anyān parityajya māsānāṃ ca kṣayaṃ tathā māsān paricarad daśa māsā māsārdham eva ca māsārdhaṃ māsa-ṛtavas māsāś ca ṣaṭ tathaivānyat māsāḥ saṃvatsarāś caiva māsi jyeṣṭhe ca saṃprāpte māsi māsi ca kartavyaṃ māsi māsi dṛḍhavrataḥ māsi māsy uḍupakṣaye māse caturthe saṃprāpte māsena puruṣottame māsair dvādaśabhir varṣam māsair dvādaśabhiḥ kramāt māsopavāsī mūlāśī māsopavāsair vidhivad māso abdaṃ tridivaukasām māhātmyam asya tīrthasya māhātmyam etat triśatāni yatra māhātmyaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ māhātmyaṃ copasaṃhṛtam māhātmyaṃ tasya ko vaktuṃ māhātmyaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ māhātmyaṃ narasiṃhasya māhātmyaṃ bhuvi durlabham māhātmyaṃ mādhavasya ca māhātmyaṃ varṇyate dvijāḥ māhātmyaṃ vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ vedituṃ śaktā māhātmye tasya bho dvijāḥ māhātmyaiḥ svaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak māhiṣaṃ cāmaraṃ mārgam māhiṣmatyāṃ babandha tam māhiṣmatyāṃ mahādyutiḥ māheśvaraṃ tu tat tīrthaṃ māheśvarī mahāmāyā māheśvarī vaiṣṇavī ca māheśvarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ māheśvareṇa vīryeṇa māṃ kathaṃ vettum arhatha māṃ kuyoganiṣeviṇām māṃ ca kanyām imāṃ dvija māṃ tu cakradharaṃ tathā māṃ tvaṃ ca kṛpayā paśya māṃ tvaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara māṃ tvaṃ muñca mahābhāga māṃ tvaṃ satkartum arhasi māṃ dṛṣṭvā sā mahāraudrā māṃ devayajane sthitam māṃ nighnan kiṃ na lajjase māṃ pāhi muniśārdūla māṃ baddhvā rākṣasaiḥ pāśais māṃ brahmā sa ca deveśo māṃ brāhmaṇā brahmamantrair yajanti māṃ rākṣasendra paraśo māṃsam ānaya śrāddhārthaṃ māṃ samuhya kṛśo bhavān māṃ sarpajananī haṭhāt māṃsavikrayiṇas tathā māṃsaśoṇitadigdhāṅgā māṃsaśoṇitadigdhāṅgā māṃsaśoṇitadurgandhaṃ māṃsaśoṇitasaṃkulam māṃsaṃ vṛkṣe babandha ca māṃsaṃ śrāddhe niyojayet māṃsāt tu medaso janma māṃsān miṣṭataraṃ nāsti māṃsāśī śvetaparvate māṃsena tarupattraiś ca māṃsena tu yathāgatam māṃsena pihitāṃ tadā māṃsaiḥ sanmantritair makhe māṃ stoṣyanti yatavratāḥ māṃ hantum amarair yatnaḥ mito viprāḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ mitraghnaḥ kṛtyate tāvad mitratīrthaṃ tad ucyate mitratve ca sthito yasmāt mitradrohiṣv aniṣṭeṣu mitradhruk kunakhī klībaḥ mitrapakṣas tathātmajāḥ mitrabandhuvivarjitāḥ mitrabhāryāṃ gacchatāṃ ca mitrabhāryāṃ bhajiṣyanti mitrabhedakaraṃ tathā mitravad bhagavāṃs tvaṣṭā mitravargas tathaiva ca mitravargas tathaiva ca mitravisrambhaghātakaḥ mitraśatrur duṣkulīnaḥ mitraś ca varuṇaś cobhāv mitraś ca varuṇaś cobhau mitrasyāpacitau sthitaḥ mitrasvāmigurudrohī mitrādiṣu samo maitraḥ mitrānandavivardhanaḥ mitrāvaruṇayor aṃśe mitrāvaruṇayor aṃśe mitrāvaruṇayor ilā mitrāvaruṇayor viprāḥ mitreṇa varuṇena ca mitrendrau varuṇo aryamā mitro mitravane cāsmin mitro varuṇa eva ca mithas tāv ūcatuḥ punaḥ mithaḥ paśyanti saṃbandhe mithaḥ samūcur amarā mithaḥ samūcur vidvāṃso mithaḥ saṃmantrya te surāḥ mithilām abhito viprā mithilām arimardanaḥ mithilenābhipūjitaḥ mithur dānavarāṭ śūraḥ mithuṃ hatvā ca rākṣasam mithyāpavādam api hi mithyāpratijño balabhid mithyābhiśasto gārgyas tu mithyāmithyāvacouktibhiḥ mithyā vinītaḥ pāpātmā mithyopāyaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ miśro anyo anyasya dṛśyate miṣataḥ pāṇḍuputrasya miṣatāṃ ca dvijanmanām miṣatāṃ devatānāṃ ca miṣṭam ekam atho bhavān mihiro arkaḥ prabhākaraḥ mīno jāyeta durmatiḥ mīlitākṣaḥ sudarśanam mukuṭāṅgadadhāriṇam mukuṭāṅgadadhāriṇam mukuṭāṅgadadhāriṇam mukuṭāṅgadadhāriṇīm mukuṭāṅgadabhūṣaṇam mukuṭāṅgadabhūṣitām mukuṭāṅgadaśobhitam mukuṭāṭopamastakam mukundāṅghriniviṣṭayā muktakeśāya vai namaḥ muktakeśā virūpiṇaḥ muktakeśī ca no bhava muktakeśīty abhidhayā muktatvaca ivoragāḥ muktapāpaṃ raviprabham muktapāpaḥ punas tatra muktaye amitatejase muktaś ca tamasā soma muktas tathāyam ātmānaṃ muktā tenātha bhikṣuṇā muktāphalavibhūṣitam muktāphalavibhūṣitam muktās te nātra saṃśayaḥ muktās te nātra saṃśayaḥ muktāhārapralambitā muktāhārāvalambitam muktāhārāvalambinā muktāhārāvalambibhiḥ muktikādyāni yāni ca muktidaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ muktidaṃ pāpanāśanam muktidaṃ puruṣottamam muktidaṃ puruṣottamam muktidaṃ puruṣottamam muktidaṃ puruṣottamam muktidaṃ bandhakāraṇam muktidaṃ bhuvi durlabham muktidaḥ puruṣottamaḥ muktidā sā bhagīrathī muktipradāyīni kim anyad atra muktiprāptiḥ suduḥkhataḥ muktibījam anuttamam muktibhāgī bhaven naraḥ muktibhājo bhavantu vai muktim asmāt prayāti vai muktim āpa mahāmate muktim āpto asi vāsava muktimārgasya vīkṣaṇam muktimārgaṃ yathākramam muktimārgo mṛṣocyate muktir ekā niratyayā muktir madāśritā nityaṃ muktihetoḥ samuddhṛtam muktiṃ gaṅge prayaccha me muktiṃ ca muniśārdūlā muktiṃ ca samavāpnuyāt muktiṃ prati yathāmati muktiṃ prayāti bho viprā muktiṃ prāpur mahābhāgā muktiṃ prāpto naiva lajjāṃ bhajethāḥ muktiṃ prāpnoti durlabhām muktiṃ prāpnoti durlabhām muktiṃ prāpnoti durlabhām muktiḥ syād iha nārada mukto grāheṇa vai tadā mukto daśaratho nṛpaḥ mukto bhavaty asaṃdehaṃ mukto bhavet tato viprāḥ mukto yāmi triviṣṭapam mukto yāsi triviṣṭapam mukto asmīti ruroda vai muktvā bālaṃ namasya ca muktvā sarvam aśeṣataḥ muktvā hastasamāyogaṃ mukhajenāgninā krodhāl mukhaniḥśvāsajān meghān mukhabāhū prabāhū ca mukhabhūtaṃ ca devānāṃ mukham apy ambujekṣaṇam mukhavāditrakāriṇe mukhaṃ cāśvasvarūpiṇam mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi cakriṇaḥ mukhaṃ rakṣatu vāgīśo mukhāc choṇitam udvaman mukhāc choṇitam udvaman mukhāt kṣīraṃ prasusruve mukhād indras tathāgniś ca mukhād yajño abhyajāyata mukhād vīryaṃ prasusruve mukhānītena vāriṇā mukhe gṛhītvā pānīyam mukhe tasya janārdanaḥ mukhe dhṛtvā mahādhvaram mukhe nyastaṃ mahāyajñaṃ mukhe nyasya mahāyajñaṃ mukhebhyo vāyum agniṃ ca mukhaiḥ pātālasadṛśair mukhaiḥ pātālasadṛśair mukhyāya ca varāya ca mucukundaṃ ca pārthivam mucukundena dhīmatā mucukundaiḥ sakiṃśukaiḥ mucukundo nareśvaraḥ mucukundo api tac chrutvā mucyate cāśubhair duḥkhair mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ mucyate pātakair martyaḥ mucyate bhavabandhanāt mucyate mahato bhayāt mucyate sarvakalmaṣāt mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ mucyate sarvapāpebhyo mucyate sarvabandhanāt mucyate sarvarogādyais mucyate hy athavā punaḥ mucyante karmabandhanaiḥ mucyante ca balānvitāḥ mucyante cāśubhair duḥkhair mucyante tu balānvitāḥ mucyante te na saṃśayaḥ mucyante nātra saṃśayaḥ mucyante vā kathaṃ vada mucyetārtas tathā rogāc mucyema vayam enasaḥ muñcato bāṇanāśāya muñca māṃ muśalāyudha muñca muñceti devakyā- muñjakeśāya dhīmate muñjavaṭaṃ tathottamam muṇḍamālāvibhūṣitaiḥ muṇḍamālāvibhūṣitaiḥ muṇḍayitvā vyasarjayat muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavāsasaḥ mudaraś cārimardanaḥ mudaṃ prajānāṃ sukham unnatiṃ ca mudaṃ prāpa haras tadā mudaṃ yāntu śive ratāḥ mudaṃ lebhe tadā rājā mudā prādāt tadobhayoḥ mudā yuktāḥ punaḥ punaḥ mudā yukto mahāmate mudā vasati devavat muditās te abhavan sarve muditās te yayuḥ śīghraṃ muditair gopakair vṛtaḥ mudgarair niśitair ghanaiḥ mudgarair niśitair ghanaiḥ mudgarair lohadaṇḍaiś ca mudgarais tāḍyamānāś ca mudgarais tāḍyamānāś ca mudgalaś caiva viśrutaḥ mudgalasya tu dāyādo mudgalasya suto ṛṣiḥ mudgalaḥ sṛñjayaś caiva mudgalo lokaviśrutaḥ mudrās tato nibadhnīyād mudrāṃ baddhvā visarjayet mudhaiva ślāghate bhavān munayaś cirajīvinaḥ munayas tattvadarśinaḥ munayas tadvadhaṃ prāhur munayas tvam ṛṣigaṇās munayaḥ kupitāḥ procur munayaḥ praticakruś ca munayaḥ śatadhā vajri- munayaḥ śuśubhe adhikam munayaḥ śrūyatām etat munayaḥ satyadarśinaḥ munayaḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ munayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ munayaḥ siddhayoginaḥ munayo jātasaṃharṣāḥ munayo antyaṃ tathā kalim munayo anye api nārada munayo api tapassthitāḥ munayo bahurūpiṇaḥ munayo mathurāṃ purīm munayo munisattamāḥ munayo rākṣasāv imau munayo vaktum arhatha munayo vālakhilyāś ca munikiṃnarasiddhānāṃ muniputro abravīd vacaḥ munibhir guhyakaiḥ siddhaiḥ munibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ munibhiḥ parikīrtitaḥ munibhiḥ parivāritaḥ munibhiḥ parisevitam muniyakṣagaṇākīrṇair muniyakṣāpsarobhiś ca munir apsarasas tathā munir āsīd guṇānvitaḥ munir āsīn mahātapāḥ munir āsīn mahāyaśāḥ munir āsīn mahāyaśāḥ munir bhūkalpapādapaḥ munir vismitamānasaḥ munir vedaśirās tathā munivākyaṃ tathākarot munividyādharair vṛtaḥ munivṛndasamākulam munivṛndasamākulam muniś ca dundubhiś caiva munisaṃmohinī rāmā munisiddhamahoragaiḥ munisiddhavarais tathā munisiddhāpsarobhiś ca munisiddhāṃś ca pāpakṛt munisiddhaiḥ sacāraṇaiḥ munis tadgatamānasaḥ munis tadgatamānasaḥ munis tābhiḥ prasāditaḥ muniṃ ca dīptatapasam muniṃ natvā tv agān nagam muniḥ paramakopitaḥ muniḥ paramadhārmikaḥ muniḥ paramadhārmikaḥ muniḥ paramanaiṣṭhikaḥ muniḥ prītas triśaṅkave muniḥ sarvātithir dvijāḥ munīnām āśrameṣu ca munīnāṃ ca prasādataḥ munīnāṃ ca yathā vyāsaḥ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām munīnāṃ rakṣaṇāya tu munīnāṃ vedaśabdena munīnāṃ sattram abhyagāt munīndrāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmate munīn vai saṃśitavratān mune khalu jagattraye mune gautama suvrata mune tvanmukhagītasya mune tvanmukhagītasya mune parākramaṃ śauryaṃ mune pṛcchāma sarvajña mune pṛcchāma sarvajña mune brūhi paraṃ kāryaṃ mune brūhi yadarthaṃ māṃ muner ārtasya bhūpatiḥ muner vai munisattamāḥ mune vedāṃś ca śāstrāṇi mune śṛṇu mahāphalam muneś ca kṣobhayām āsa mune samupajāyate munes tapaḥprabhāveṇa munes tasya viceṣṭitam munes tasya suvismitāḥ muneḥ putraṃ nṛpottamaḥ muneḥ putraṃ sa taṃ dvijāḥ mumukṣur dharmatatparaḥ mumukṣur bāṇanāśāya mumukṣuḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ mumucāte tathāstrāṇi mumucus te balāhakāḥ mumucus tridaśāḥ sarve mumoca kṛṣṇo api tadā mumoca ca śaravrātaṃ mumoca bāṇam uddiśya mumoca bhagavān hariḥ mumoca madhusūdanaḥ mumoca yamunāṃ balaḥ mumoca rakṣaḥ paulastyaṃ mumocāmbunidhau tathā mumoha nṛpateḥ sutaḥ muros tu tanayān sapta muśalaśeṣalohasya muśalaṃ ca cakārāsya muśalaṃ janayiṣyati muśalena ca pothitam muśalena sahasradhā muśalolūkhalasya ca muśalolūkhalādīni muṣṭikaś ca mahābalaḥ muṣṭike ca nipātite muṣṭikena mahābalaḥ muṣṭinā cāhan mūrdhni muṣṭinā mūrdhni tāḍitaḥ muṣṭiloham abhūt tadā musalasyātha lauhasya muhur antar vinidhyāyan muhur āliṅgya tau putrau muhur glāniparaś cāsau muhur jñānabalānvitaḥ muhur nininda cātmānaṃ muhurmuhur athākarot muhur muhus taṃ ca pitā muhuḥ śvāsānilāyastaṃ muhuḥ svajati cumbati muhūrtabhūtaṃ devasya muhūrtam iva roditvā muhūrtaṃ kṛtavān kathām muhūrtaṃ prāpya jīvitam muhūrtāt tasya bho dvijāḥ muhūrtārdhaprajāgaram muhūrtās tithayo māsā muhūrtās tu muhūrtajāḥ muhūrto dvijasattamāḥ mūkaḥ paṅguḥ kuṇiḥ ṣaṇḍho mūkāndhabadhirāṇāṃ ca mūḍhatvād yo yunakti vai mūḍhāntaḥkaraṇo naraḥ mūḍhāś ca devatāḥ sarvā mūḍhās tvadyogamāyayā mūḍhāḥ śiṣyeṣu deśikāḥ mūḍho devalakas tathā mūtraśukrāvilānanaḥ mūtrotsarge purīṣe ca mūrkhāś cārthaparā lubdhāḥ mūrkheṇa mantrahīnena mūrkhonmattavyasanino mūrkho api śaṃbho tava pādabhaktyā mūrkho abhūd brāhmaṇavaro mūrkho mām upahāsakaḥ mūrchanābhiś ca tālaiś ca mūrchākulāṃ yaśodāṃ ca mūrchām avāpya mahatīṃ mūrchām upāyayau bhrāntyā mūrtaṃ cāmūrtayas tathā mūrtibhiś ca dvijottamāḥ mūrtibhiś ca dvijottamāḥ mūrtibhedaḥ pṛthak pṛthak mūrtimat purataḥ sthitam mūrtimatyaś ca sarito mūrtimadbhir upasthitaiḥ mūrtimanta upasthitāḥ mūrtimanta upāgamya mūrtimantam amūrtātmā mūrtimanto atha pārvaṇāḥ mūrtimān iti taṃ vidyād mūrtimān iva bhāskaraḥ mūrtimān vinayānvitaḥ mūrtimān ṣoḍaśātmakaḥ mūrtimāṃs tvaṃ mahāmūrtiḥ mūrtir yā tv aṣṭamī tasya mūrtir yā dvādaśī bhānor mūrtir viṣṇuś ca nāmataḥ mūrtiṣv ātiṣṭhatātmavān mūrtis tv ekādaśī bhānor mūrtiḥ ṣaṣṭhī raver yā tu mūrto asau trividho bhavet mūrdhajeṣu nijagrāha mūrdhānaṃ vraṇasaṃyuktaṃ mūrdhānaṃ spṛṣṭavān asi mūrdhnā nipatya sahasā mūlato nṛpasattama mūlaparṇaphalāhārās mūlabhūtaṃ vivardhayet mūlabhūto namas tasmai mūlabhūto namas tasmai mūlamantreṇa cārcayet mūlamantreṇa mantravit mūlamantreṇa saṃpūjya mūlamantreṇa sādhakaḥ mūlam etat tu dharmāṇāṃ mūlaṃ paramadaivatam mūlāparātman bhagavan prasīda mūle cārogyam uttamam mūle ṣoḍaśasāhasrair mūṣiko nirapatrapaḥ mṛgatṛṣṇājalāśayaḥ mṛgapakṣimanuṣyādyaiḥ mṛgapakṣyupajīvinaḥ mṛgapādo mṛgapriyaḥ mṛgapālāś ca haṃsakāḥ mṛgamadhye yathā siṃhau mṛgam āraṇyaketakīm mṛgayakṣāpsaroyoniṃ mṛgayadhvaṃ sadānaghāḥ mṛgayākṛṣṭacetanaḥ mṛgayāgatamānasaḥ mṛgayāśīlibhir vṛtaḥ mṛgayāśīlibhir vṛtaḥ mṛgayāśīlibhiḥ kaiścid mṛgayāsaktacitto vai mṛgayāsaktim eva ca mṛgayāṃ yāti nityaśaḥ mṛgayuḥ somavikrayī mṛgarājaṃ mahāvīryaṃ mṛgarūpadharo api ca mṛgarūpeṇa vyacarad mṛgavyādhaś ca śarvaś ca mṛgavyādhas tadā haraḥ mṛgavyādho abhavac chaṃbhur mṛgas tu caturo māsāṃs mṛgāñ śākhāmṛgān siṃhān mṛgāṇām atha śārdūlaṃ mṛgāṇāṃ ca yathā siṃham mṛgāṇāṃ mṛgarāḍ yathā mṛgān hatvā mahābala mṛgān hatvā yathāsukham mṛgān hanti mahābāhuḥ mṛgāś ca pakṣiṇaḥ sarve mṛgībhūtā tu sā bālā mṛgī bhūtvā umāvanam mṛgī bhūtvā manoharā mṛgī bhūtvā viśālākṣī mṛgīm ālokayantaṃ taṃ mṛgīrūpadharāṃ priyām mṛgīrūpaṃ parityajya mṛgīṃ dṛṣṭvā viśeṣataḥ mṛgair matsyair vihaṃgaiś ca mṛgaiḥ śākhāmṛgaiś cānyair mṛgaiḥ śākhāmṛgaiḥ siṃhair mṛgaiḥ sarvatra śobhitaiḥ mṛgo jāyeta bho dvijāḥ mṛgo vidhyeta śastreṇa mṛgo aham abhavaṃ tadā mṛta āste dakṣiṇeśo mṛtaniryātakāṃś caiva mṛtavac cāpi lubdhakam mṛtaś ca gaṇasāyujyaṃ mṛtaś ca svargam āpnoti mṛtasaṃjīvanaṃ caiva mṛtasaṃjīvanaṃ tat syād mṛtasaṃjīvanaṃ viduḥ mṛtasaṃjīvanīti ca mṛtasaṃjīvinītīrtham mṛtasaṃjīvinīṃ vidyām mṛtasya keśeṣu tadā mṛtaṃ ca kaṃ śocasi naṣṭabuddhiḥ mṛtaṃ dadṛśire śunam mṛtaṃ punar ivāgatam mṛtaṃ śarīram utsṛjya mṛtaṃ śarīraṃ hi nṛṇāṃ mṛtaḥ kālavaśād dvijāḥ mṛtaḥ pitā jīvati ca mṛtāyāḥ paramaṃ trāsaṃ mṛtā ye puruṣottame mṛtā rākṣasapuṃgavāḥ mṛtāvasthaṃ nṛpottamam mṛtās ta evātra yaśo na yeṣām mṛtāhani ca tat kāryaṃ mṛtāhani tathobhayoḥ mṛtāhārāṃś ca dharmavit mṛtāṃ jīvānvitāṃ punaḥ mṛtāḥ kālañjare girau mṛtāḥ kālañjare girau mṛtāḥ śastreṇa vā hatāḥ mṛte tvayi gamiṣyāmo mṛte anyasmin mṛto yadi mṛte bhrātari sa tv agniḥ mṛte vai jātavedasi mṛteṣu piṇḍaṃ dātavyaṃ mṛto jāyeta gardabhaḥ mṛto jāyeta barhiṇaḥ mṛto jāyeta mānavaḥ mṛto jāyeta mānuṣaḥ mṛto jāyeta mūṣikaḥ mṛto jāyeta vānaraḥ mṛto jāyeta vāyasaḥ mṛto jāyeta vai kharaḥ mṛto jāyeta śārṅgakaḥ mṛto jāyeta śūkaraḥ mṛto jāyeta śūkaraḥ mṛto aparaḥ sa vijñeyo mṛto ahaṃ tena doṣeṇa mṛto haṃsaḥ prajāyate mṛtau dvau pitarau pituḥ mṛttikāḥ sapta valmīke mṛtyujihveva bhīṣaṇā mṛtyutīrthaṃ tad ucyate mṛtyudoṣajarāpaham mṛtyunārakajaṃ tathā mṛtyunā saha saṃmantrya mṛtyunā sthāpitaṃ liṅgaṃ mṛtyunopekṣite devā mṛtyupāśān avāsṛjat mṛtyum ūcuś ca dūtakāḥ mṛtyur eva bhaviṣyati mṛtyur dūtān bhayārditān mṛtyur dhātā prabhākaraḥ mṛtyur nau vihitas tathā mṛtyuvaktram ivāparam mṛtyuś caivākṣayo antaś ca mṛtyustotraṃ jitātmavān mṛtyuṃ gantum ihecchati mṛtyuṃ cakrus tapasvinaḥ mṛtyuṃ ca tatsamīpasthaṃ mṛtyuṃjaye kroḍatīrthe mṛtyuṃ pāśadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā mṛtyuṃ paitāmahaṃ tathā mṛtyuṃ vā yamakiṃkarān mṛtyuṃ sukhasamanvitam mṛtyuṃ sukhasamanvitam mṛtyuḥ kālerito mune mṛtyuḥ pāśān athākṣipat mṛtyo kā prītir astu te mṛtyor api durādharṣaṃ mṛtyor naivocitaṃ tu te mṛtyor bhāryā bhava tvaṃ tām mṛtyor mukhagataṃ punaḥ mṛtyo śvetaḥ kathaṃ tv iti mṛtyoḥ pautro hy anuhrādo mṛtyau śamitari sthite mṛdaṅgādiṣu vādyeṣu mṛdaṅgāḥ paṭahānakāḥ mṛdaṅgair jharjharais tathā mṛdambu bhasma cāpy anne mṛdulaṃ madhuraṃ tathā mṛdoḥ kopi bhavet prītaḥ mṛdbhir vārbhiḥ kuśair mantraiḥ mṛdbhiś ca gomayenāpi mṛṣāyāṃ cāpi dhmāpyatām mṛṣaivākṣāvalepatvād mṛṣṭasnigdhāni yāni syur meghakañcukanirmuktā meghagambhīranisvanaḥ meghagambhīrayā girā meghagambhīrayā vācā meghaghoṣasvanottīrṇa- meghanādaḥ pralabdhavān meghamālāparivṛtaṃ meghavṛndapratīkāśam meghahāsa iti śrutaḥ meghān āhūya tatkṣaṇāt meghānāṃ payasām īśo meghāravaiḥ sughoraiś ca meghāvarta namo astu te meghāś cāpy atra varṣantu megheṣv eva sthitā sā tu meghaughasthagitāmbaraḥ meḍhībhūtaḥ samastasya medasā samabhiplutā medaso asthi nirucyate medaḥśoṇitadurgandhair medaḥśoṇitadurgandhair medinī gaganaṃ vāyur medinī pariviśrutā medinīṃ sa tu rāghavaḥ meduraś cārimejayaḥ medhādīṃś ca kratūttamān medhāvī tatra jāyate medhāvī dhāraṇāyuktaḥ medhyatā vāyusaṃśrayāt medhyo medhātithir vasuḥ medhyo yo medhyakarmaṇām menakāyāḥ sutāyāṃ tu menakā sahajanyā ca menā cāpi mahotsāhā menāte sutam āgatam menāyām udapādayat menāyāṃ tām umāṃ devīṃ menā himavataḥ priyā menāṃ ca himavatpriyām menire ṛṣisattamāḥ menire agniṃ tathāpare menire tridaśā yatra menire madhusūdanam menire vedavādinaḥ menire aśvam uṣāpatim menire soma eva ca mene ca nṛpasattamaḥ mene tato muniśreṣṭho mene tan mahad adbhutam mene na putram ātmīyaṃ mene brāhmaṇam eva tam mene vākyaṃ gaṇādhipaḥ mene vākyaṃ tathā satyam mene vākyaṃ suroditam mene śiṣyasya nārada mene sa munisattamaḥ mene saṃdarśanād dhareḥ merukandaram āgatya meruparvatam āsādya merupṛṣṭhaṃ surā jagmur merupṛṣṭhaṃ surālayam merupṛṣṭhād bhuvaṃ yayuḥ merupṛṣṭhe tapo nityam merupṛṣṭhe tu vistīrṇe merupṛṣṭhe mahotsavaḥ merupṛṣṭhe mahaujasaḥ merumandarakailāsa- merumandarakailāsa- merumandarabhūṣaṇā merumandarabhūṣaṇām meruśṛṅge tathottare meruś cānekaśṛṅgavān merusāvarṇyatāṃ gatāḥ meruṃ gatasya vā tasya meruṃ ca sarvaratnāḍhyaṃ meruḥ kanakaparvataḥ meror anantarās te ca meror upari viprendrā meror dakṣiṇato dvijāḥ meroś caturdiśaṃ tatra meroś caturdiśaṃ ye tu meros tapasi saṃsthitaḥ meroḥ paścimadigbhāge merau tatraiva sāntvayan melakāś colakaiḥ saha meṣapālāś cājapālā maitracittaratāḥ sadā maitraṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva maitrāvaruṇim āsīnam maitrī caivāspṛhā tadvad maitrī dṛṣṭiḥ pitṛsamo maitrī samastasattveṣu maitreyaḥ karuṇānvitaḥ maitreyo haritas tathā maitro brāhmaṇa ity ukto maithunaṃ yo adhigacchati maithunaṃ vā samācaret maithunāya viceṣṭantīṃ maithunāyopacakrame maithunāyopamantritā mainākaṃ vakraparvatam mainākaḥ parvataśreṣṭho mainākaḥ surasas tathā mainākādinagair vṛte maivaṃ brūyāḥ kathāntare maivaṃ vadasva bhadraṃ te mokāraṃ kālam evāhur mokāraṃ vāmakaṭyāṃ tu mokṣakāmā vayaṃ cāpi mokṣakāraṇam avyayam mokṣakṣetraṃ ca durlabham mokṣakṣetraṃ ca paramaṃ mokṣakṣetre tathā mokṣaṃ mokṣadurlabhaviṣayaṃ mokṣadoṣo mahān eṣa mokṣadvāraṃ triviṣṭapam mokṣadharmo na vidyate mokṣaprāptiś ca durlabhā mokṣabuddhiṃ samāśritaḥ mokṣamārgavido ye anye mokṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ mokṣam icchatha śāśvatam mokṣayām āsa bho dvijāḥ mokṣayiṣyati yādavaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi nānyathā mokṣavidyā parā smṛtā mokṣaśāstrārthakuśalāḥ mokṣaś ca parikīrtyate mokṣaś ca munisattamāḥ mokṣaś cāpy eṣa mokṣiṇām mokṣaṃ ca dvijasattamāḥ mokṣaṃ ca labhate dhruvam mokṣaṃ ca labhate dhruvam mokṣaṃ ca labhate dhruvam mokṣaṃ ca labhate naraḥ mokṣaṃ cānte labhed dhruvam mokṣaṃ tu labhate naraḥ mokṣaṃ paramadurlabham mokṣaṃ prāpnoti durlabham mokṣaṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam mokṣaṃ sa labhate dhruvam mokṣaḥ pitāmahenokta mokṣāśramaṃ yaś carate yathoktaṃ mokṣiṇaś ca yathākramam mokṣyanti te madvacanād mocanaṃ sarvakāmadam mo ca naḥ kiṃcanāmamad mocayām āsa devebhyaḥ mocayāmīti tām āha modakaṃ phāṇitaṃ vālpaṃ modakādīṃś ca bhaktitaḥ modate divi śakravat modamānair madālasaiḥ mohadhvāntamadāpaham mohapaṅkāvile durge mohapāśair nibaddho asau mohayanty api vidvāṃsaṃ mohaṃ gacchanti mānavāḥ mohaṃ gacchanti sahasā mohaṃ jñānapradātāras mohaṃ jñānapradātāras mohaṃ tamasi saṃyuktaṃ mohāt tat kṣantum arhasi mohād adharmaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā mohāndhatamasāvṛtāḥ mohāya yaducakrasya mohāvartasudustare mohitas tava māyayā mohitaṃ māyayā tava mohitaḥ sūkṣmayā tava mohitā yoganidrayā mohitāś cābhavaṃs tatra mohito nābhijānāti mohena gupto bhavaduḥkhapaṅke moho ayaṃ vigataḥ satyaṃ moho vipac ceti tato apy anantam mauḍhyāt prārthayase kṣemī maudgalya iti vikhyāto maudgalyas tṛṇayajñaś ca maudgalyasya priyā sāpi maudgalyasya raho bhāryā maudgalyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā maudgalyaḥ prāha taṃ viṣṇuṃ maudgalyaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ maudgalyāya jagatprabhuḥ maudgalyo nityavad dharim maudgalyo api tathābhyetya maudgalyo bhāryayā sārdhaṃ maunena bahubhāṣāṃ ca maurkhyāt kṣipati cāmbhasi maurkhyād dambham anuṣṭhitaḥ mriyamāṇātibhīṣaṇā mlecchakoṭisahasrāṇāṃ mlecchādyāś caiva bhāgaśaḥ mlecchāś cāpi na saṃśayaḥ ya āsīd atibhīṣaṇaḥ ya icched durlabhaṃ phalam ya icchen mokṣam āsthātuṃ ya idaṃ cyāvanaṃ sthānāt ya idaṃ janma devānāṃ ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ ya etat paramaṃ dhāma ya etena dvijaśreṣṭhā ya ete pṛthivīpālāḥ ya enāṃ gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ ya eva garuḍadhvajaḥ ya evam abhijānanti ya eva vidhir īśvaraḥ ya evaṃ kurute karma ya evaṃ satataṃ veda ya eṣa bhagavān prabhuḥ ya eṣa viṣṇuḥ so ananto yakāraṃ mūrdhni vinyaset yakāraṃ vāmabāhuke yakāro ayaṃ śirasthaś ca yakṣakiṃpuruṣādayaḥ yakṣagandharvarākṣasāḥ yakṣaguhyakarakṣāṃsi yakṣarakṣaḥsu caiva hi yakṣarakṣomahoragāḥ yakṣarākṣasakiṃnaraiḥ yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ yakṣarākṣasabhoginām yakṣarākṣasavarjite yakṣavāṭāntike māyāṃ yakṣavidyādharatvaṃ ca yakṣavidyādharāṃś cānyān yakṣavidyādharair nāgair yakṣavidyādharaiḥ siddhair yakṣavidyādharaiḥ siddhaiḥ yakṣavidyādharoragaiḥ yakṣavidyādharoragaiḥ yakṣavidyādharau yuvām yakṣas tu saṃsthitas tatra yakṣasya gehaṃ vipulaṃ yakṣasya sādṛśyam idaṃ yakṣasyedaṃ bhaved atha yakṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣādhipaḥ yakṣāñ śūrān dhanurdharān yakṣāṇām adhipaḥ śrīmāṃs yakṣāṇām āmapātraṃ tu yakṣāṇām īśvaraḥ śrīmān yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca yakṣādyair munisattamaiḥ yakṣān gandharvapannagān yakṣān sarvagaṇān imān yakṣā vidyādharāḥ siddhā yakṣās te yuddhadurmadāḥ yakṣiṇī kāmarūpiṇī yakṣiṇī kāmarūpiṇī yakṣiṇīti suviśrutā yakṣiṇīdattanṛtyādi- yakṣiṇīvacanaṃ śrutvā yakṣiṇīvākyam apy asya yakṣiṇī vākyam abravīt yakṣiṇīsaṃgamaṃ nāma yakṣiṇīsaṃgamaṃ smṛtam yakṣiṇī sā tam ācaṣṭa yakṣiṇīṃ bhartsayitvāsau yakṣiṇīṃ vākyam abravīt yakṣiṇy antaradhīyata yakṣiṇyā yad upārjitam yakṣeśvaragṛhe gatim yakṣeśvarasya tad vākyād yakṣeśvaro mṛgo bhūtvā yakṣo gandharva eva vā yakṣo api sukham āptavān yakṣmaitat taiti saṃvadan yakṣyamāṇo abhyapadyata yakṣye tenety avocata yakṣye tvāṃ varuṇāya hi yakṣye ahaṃ tvaritaṃ śuciḥ yakṣye ahaṃ hayamedhaiś ca yac ca kanyānṛte pāpaṃ yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca kiṃcit kṣitāv iha yac ca kiṃcit tvayā prāptaṃ yac ca kiṃcit tvayā loke yac ca kiṃcit prajāpateḥ yac ca kiṃcin manaḥprītyai yac ca gośvatarānṛte yac ca tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yac ca dānaphalaṃ prabho yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham yac ca devalake pāpaṃ yac ca nindayatāṃ pāpaṃ yac ca brahmahanaḥ pāpaṃ yac ca bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad vā yac ca mithyābhibhāṣiṇaḥ yac ca vajramahāpīḍā yac ca vandhyātither api yac ca vācāpy udāhṛtam yac ca vācām aviṣayas yac cākṣara iti smṛtam yac cākṣaram iti proktaṃ yac cānyad akarot karma yac cānyad ripunāśanam yac cānyan manasaḥ priyam yac cāpi dṛṣṭaṃ vidhivat purāṇe yac cāpi bhagavaṃs tasmān yac cāpi suradurlabham yac cāpi suravallabham yac cāsti vasu kiṃcana yac cāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe yac cetihāseṣu mahatsu dṛṣṭaṃ yac ceṣṭaṃ lokanāthayoḥ yaccha kopaṃ mahāmate yac chatrūṇāṃ parābhavaḥ yac chadmanā vartanaṃ pāparūpam yacchanti kurvanti tapāṃsi dharmān yac chūrasena kṛtyaṃ syād yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā yac chrāddhaṃ kriyate naraiḥ yac chrutvābhimatān kāmān yac chrutvā sarvapāpebhyo yajatā saha śakreṇa yajatāṃ naimiṣeyāṇāṃ yajate nityayajñaiś ca yajato dharaṇītale yajanaṃ devatocitam yajanaṃ yājanaṃ caiva yajanādhyayane dānaṃ yajane munisattamāḥ yajantaḥ kṣapayanty ugram yajanti ca mahāśvetaṃ yajanti tvām aharahas yajanti vinayānvitāḥ yajante māṃ tathā vaiśyāḥ yajante vedaviduṣo yajanto vividhair makhaiḥ yajamānaś ca dīkṣitaḥ yajamānaś ca saptamaḥ yajamānaṃ ca bhoktṝṃś ca yajamānaṃ priyavratam yajamānāt prabhṛty ūrdhvam yajamāne balau tathā yajase pitaraṃ kaṃ tvaṃ yajasva hayamedhaiś ca yajasvādya sutaṃ svakam yajasveti tato abravīt yajasveti nṛpaṃ prāha yajasvety āha taṃ nṛpam yajāmas tvāṃ mahāyajñair yajurmaya ṛṅmayaś ca yajuryājyāya juṣṭāya yajurvedas tv atharvaṇaḥ yajuṣāṃ pataye namaḥ yajuṣāṃ śatarudriyam yajuḥsaptakam acyutam yajūrūpadharāya ca yajec ca vividhair yajñair yajed devaṃ sanātanam yaj jalaṃ cāṅghriśaucajam yaj jāyamānaṃ ca guhāniviṣṭam yaj jīvāmi tad adbhutam yaj jyeṣṭhaśukladvādaśyāṃ yajñakarmaṇy uparate yajñakarmavido viprān yajñagarbha hiraṇyāṅga yajñagarbhaḥ sa ucyate yajñatīrthaṃ tu tat proktaṃ yajñadānatapāṃsīha yajñadāna namas te astu yajñadānavratāni ca yajñadevo jaganmayaḥ yajñadvīpaḥ sa ucyate yajñadveṣī brahmahantā yajñadhātābhayaprada yajñadhāma namo astu te yajñapātrasamanvitā yajñapātrāṇy akalpayam yajñabhāgabhujaḥ prabho yajñabhāgaharān arīn yajñabhāgaṃ ca rudrasya yajñabhāgāś ca daiteyair yajñabhāgāṃś ca pūrvavat yajñabhāgair vinā kṛtāḥ yajñabhūmiḥ kathaṃ bhavet yajñabhraṃśam aśeṣataḥ yajñam asmāṃś ca rakṣasva yajñam ādāya rākṣasaḥ yajñamūrtiḥ sa ijyate yajñam etaṃ mahābhāga yajñayajvan yajñadhara yajñarūpa namas te astu yajñavarṇasamanvita yajñavāṭam anuprāpto yajñavāṭaṃ nṛpā dṛṣṭvā yajñavāṭaṃ yathāvidhi yajñavāṭaṃ rājasutau yajñavāṭaṃ samantataḥ yajñavāṭaṃ samantataḥ yajñavāhāya dāntāya yajñavighnakarau yena yajñavidhvaṃsanaṃ kurvan yajñavidhvaṃsanaṃ tathā yajñavidhvaṃsanaṃ prati yajñavidhvaṃsanāya tu yajñavidhvaṃsanāyātāñ yajñaś cāhaṃ dvijottama yajñaś ceti bhṛgūdvaha yajñaśrīḥ kīrtisaṃjñitā yajñasaṃbhāram īdṛśam yajñasaṃbhāravistaram yajñasaṃrakṣaṇārthāya yajñasiddhair niṣevitam yajñasya cendrādyamarair vicitram yajñasyāyatanāni ca yajñasyāsya samīpataḥ yajñasvādhyāyatatparaḥ yajñahartre namas te astu yajñaṃ kuru tataḥ śaktis yajñaṃ me hy atra ko haṃsi yajñaṃ rājā mahāmatiḥ yajñaṃ vidhvasya daityarāṭ yajñaṃ samṛddhaṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ yajñaṃ sarvaṃ samāpyātha yajñaḥ kāryo mahābhāge yajñaḥ parisamāpyate yajñaḥ śrutinidarśanāt yajñaḥ svāhā svadhā mantrā yajñāṅgāyākhilāṅgāya yajñān ajñānamohitaḥ yajñānām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ yajñānāṃ ca mahīpatiḥ yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ tathā yajñānāṃ parameśvara yajñānāṃ smaraṇaṃ tathā yajñān iṣṭvā sadakṣiṇān yajñān iṣṭvā surān pūjya yajñān khāda yathāsukham yajñāntikam upāgatā yajñānte antardhipātinau yajñān muktim avāpa rāṭ yajñāyatanadeśeṣu yajñārthaṃ kalpitān paśūn yajñārthaṃ jñānato dvijāḥ yajñārthe samavetānāṃ yajñārthe surasattama yajñārdhaṃ bhavatām api yajñā vividhadakṣiṇāḥ yajñā vedās tapāṃsi ca yajñāś ca bahudakṣiṇāḥ yajñāś ca varadakṣiṇāḥ yajñāṃś ca bahudakṣiṇān yajñāṃś ca vividhākārān yajñiyāni ca dravyāṇi yajñiyeṣu hradeṣu ca yajñīyān akarod daityān yajñīyān oṣadhīrasān yajñe talam anuprāpte yajñe tvam ijyase acintya yajñe naṣṭa itītvarāḥ yajñe naṣṭe tato amarāḥ yajñe paitāmahe śubhe yajñe yajñahaviḥ prāśya yajñe vācāryakarmaṇi yajñeśaṃ yajñapūruṣam yajñeśāya ca yogine yajñeśo yajñapuruṣaś yajñeśo yajñapūruṣaḥ yajñeśo yajñavāhanaḥ yajñeśvarasvarūpāṇi yajñeśvaraṃ saṃprati havyakavyaṃ yajñeśvaro yajñapumān yajñeṣu mama sarveṣu yajñeṣu yajñapuruṣaḥ yajñeṣv atrer balaṃ caiva yajñeṣv eva nyayojayat yajñe saha gareṇa vai yajñair iṣṭvāptadakṣiṇaiḥ yajñair iṣṭvā sudakṣiṇaiḥ yajñair dānais tapobhiś ca yajñair dānais tapobhiś ca yajñair devāṃs tathātithīn yajñair yajñamayo viṣṇur yajñair vā tapasā vāpi yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ yajñaiś ca dānaiś ca tapobhir ugraiḥ yajñaiḥ ka ijyate devaḥ yajñotsavapramuditā yajñotsavavibhūṣite yajñopakaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ yajño ayaṃ na bhaviṣyati yajño vai viṣṇur ity eṣā yajvabhir yajñapuruṣo yajvā dānapatir dhīmān yajvā dānaparo nityaṃ yajvā devāvṛdho rājā yajvānaś ca tathaivānye yajvāno bhūridakṣiṇāḥ yajvāno bhūridakṣiṇāḥ yajvāno yajñasaṃsthitam yajvāno vītamatsarāḥ yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥ yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥ yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥ yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥ yajvinaḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ yajvināṃ ca viśuddhānāṃ yajvisaṃnyāsinindakaiḥ yatakāyaś ca matimān yatato mama nītāni yatanīyaṃ durātmanām yatayaḥ pāradarśinaḥ yatayaḥ śāntiparamā yatayo brahmacāriṇaḥ yatavākkāyamānasaḥ yataś caiva carācaram yataś caiva jagat sūta yatas tato vinaśyanti yatas te matir utpannā yatas tvayaikena hatā yatas tv iha tato laghu yataḥ prakṛtyaiva tathaiva citram yataḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat yataḥ sarvaṃ tad ucyate yataḥ sarvāḥ pravartante yataḥ snehena vṛttir yā yatātmāno bubhutsavaḥ yatitum ṛṣibhiḥ saha yatibhir brahmacāribhiḥ yatibhir brahmacāribhiḥ yatibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ yatibhiḥ snātakaiś caiva yatiyogakareśāya yatir jyeṣṭhas tu teṣāṃ vai yatir mukto api badhyate yatir yayātiḥ saṃyātir yatis tu mokṣam āsthāya yatīn gopakṣiṇo mṛgān yato dharmas tato muktiḥ yato dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ yato dhṛtiś ca śrīś caiva yato nāvartate punaḥ yato anyā bhogabhūmayaḥ yato māṃ paripṛcchasi yato me brāhmaṇāḥ priyāḥ yato yajñādikarmaṇām yato rajir dhṛtis tatra yato hi karmabhūr eṣā yatkandare bhavān rājā yat kanyāyāṃ pitā kuryād yat karoty anabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ yat kāryam aviśaṅkayā yat kāryaṃ tad vidhīyatām yat kālakūṭaṃ samabhūn maheśa yat kila tvaṃ mahādeva yat kiṃcij jagatīgatam yat kiṃcij jīvasaṃjñaṃ tu yat kiṃcij jīvasaṃjñitam yat kiṃcij jīvasaṃjñitam yat kiṃcit kathitaṃ cātra yat kiṃcit kurute naraḥ yat kiṃcit kriyate cātra yat kiṃcit kriyate tatra yat kiṃcit kriyate tatra yat kiṃcit tena loke asmin yat kiṃcid vāṅmayaṃ loke yat kiṃcid vidyate loke yat kṛtaṃ tat kṛtaṃ vidyāt yat kṛtaṃ tv atra matprītyāai yat kṛtaṃ rajanībhāge yat kṛtaṃ rājapatnībhiḥ yat kṛtaṃ vai tapaḥ kiṃcid yat kṛte daśabhir varṣais yat kṛtyaṃ tava tat sarvaṃ yat kṛtvā karma śobhanam yat khaṇḍatvaṃ svadharmasya yat khyātaṃ kṛttikātīrthaṃ yat tac chatruparābhavam yat tac charīram ādatte yat tac charīram ādatte yat tat tvayi samarpitam yat tat priyaṃ vacmi karomi caiva yat tatra bījaṃ patati yat tat sūkṣmam avijñeyam yat tad avyaktam ajaram yat tad uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ yat tad buddheḥ paraṃ prāhuḥ yat tad ratnaṃ maṇivaraṃ yat tad vaktuṃ na śakyate yat tan maharṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ yat tu tasmāt paraṃ rūpam yat tu meghaiḥ samutsṛṣṭaṃ yat tu satrājite kṛṣṇo yat tu saṃtāpasaṃyuktaṃ yat tu saṃmohasaṃyuktam yat tejo abhyadhikaṃ tasya yat tena sadṛśaṃ bhuvi yat te prakāram ārabhya yat te manasi vartate yat te manasi vartate yat te manasi vartate yat te manasi saṃsthitam yat te rājañ chṛtaṃ havis yat te rūpaṃ paraṃ deva yat tvam ātthākhilaṃ dūta yat tvayā samudāhṛtam yat tvayoktaṃ purā raveḥ yatnavadbhir upasthāya yatnaṃ kurvan surapatir yatnaṃ mama hite ratāḥ yatnaḥ kāryo mahītale yatnena puruṣaḥ śuciḥ yatnena śṛṇu nārada yat pṛcchatha mamānaghāḥ yat pṛcchadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ yat pṛcchadhvaṃ purātanam yat pṛcchadhvaṃ mamānaghāḥ yat pṛcchadhvaṃ mamānaghāḥ yat pṛcchadhvaṃ mahābhāgā yat pṛcchadhvaṃ samāsataḥ yat pṛcchāmaḥ yatrāgnir jalam āviṣṭas yatrāgner munisattama yatrādityo vedamayo yatrānandam anuprāpto yatrānukūlyaṃ daṃpatyos yatrānuṣṭhīyamānaṃ hi yatrāpatan nage cāsmin yatrāpavas tu taṃ krodhāc yatrāpradhṛṣyo yatsaṃbandhaḥ praśasyate yat sādhyam utkṛṣṭatamaṃ priyaṃ ca yat sārabhūtaṃ yad upāsitavyam yat snehād ucyate asmābhir yat svayaṃ kriyate karma yat svaireṇa pravartanam yathartvijas tathā cāhaṃ yathā surā jagmur yathāgataṃ surā jagmuḥ yathā gatir na dṛśyeta yathāgṛhītaṃ cāmbhodhau yathā goṣu prabhūtāsu yathāgnir labhate parām yathā ca tava sāmarthyaṃ yathā ca devakī devī yathā ca nāvaṃ viprendrāḥ yathā ca pādapo mūla- yathā ca māhiṣaṃ sarpir yathā ca vipramukhyānāṃ yathā ca śakunāḥ sūkṣmaṃ yathā cūḍāmaṇir dvijāḥ yathā jātas tu puruṣaḥ yathā jālaṃ gatā dvijāḥ yathājñānaṃ tu jñānataḥ yathā tat kathayāmi vaḥ yathātattvaṃ dvijottamāḥ yathātattvaṃ nareśvara yathātattvaṃ yathā ca tat yathātattvābhigamanād yathā tattvena sāṃkhyeṣu yathā tatra dvijottamāḥ yathā tatra na paśyanti yathātathyaṃ vadāmi te yathā tava patiḥ śubhe yathā tavāhaṃ vidito asmi pāpas yathā tāḥ pratimāḥ pūrvam yathā teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ yathā tau na mariṣyataḥ yathāttha kṛṣṇamāhātmyaṃ yathātmani tathā pare yathātmā naraḥ samyag yathā yathā prasanno abhūt yathā yathā manas tasya yathā yathā roditi sa śvapākas yathā yathā śaṃbhur ameyamāyā yathā yathā hi yajñeśa yathā yasya vinirdiṣṭo yathāyaṃ tanayo nijaḥ yathāyāti puraṃdaraḥ yathāyogyam ihāsyatām yathāyogyaṃ yathākramam yathāyogyaṃ vibhajyatām yathā rasātalaṃ nāhaṃ yathā rasātalād urvī yathārthaśāstreṣu viśiṣṭadṛṣṭam yathārthaṃ satkriyāpūrvam yathārhadātā cārheṣu yathā vakṣyanti mām iha yathāvat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yathāvat pūjayām āsa yathāvat pūrvavistaram yathāvat sodakeṣu ca yathāvad anudarśanam yathāvad anuvarṇitam yathāvad anuvarṇitam yathāvad anusaṃhṛtiḥ yathāvad iha tattvataḥ yathāvad uktaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ yathāvad upasaṃhṛtim yathāvaddakṣiṇādānād yathāvad balakeśavau yathāvad yogasādhanāt yathāvad vaktum arhasi yathāvad vaktum arhasi yathāvad vidhinā tataḥ yathāvarṇaṃ viśeṣataḥ yathā varte tathā tvayi yathāval lomaharṣaṇa yathāvasthitir eva ca yathā vaḥ kathitaṃ purā yathā vānimiṣāḥ sthūlaṃ yathā vāpi nṛbhir dugdhā yathāvāptaṃ brahmaṇo me narendra yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī yathā vāsas tvadāśrame yathāvibhavato viprāḥ yathāvibhavato hy etat yathā viṣṇuś caturbhujaḥ yathā viṣṇau bhaved bhaktis yathā visyandamānaṃ me yathāvihitakarmāṅga- yathāvṛttam anukramāt yathāvṛttaṃ kṛte yuge yathāvṛttaṃ nyavedayat yathāvṛttaṃ praṇamya tām yathāvṛttaṃ sa dharmavit yathā vai bhārataṃ tathā yathā vai viduṣām api yathā vrajantaṃ pitaraṃ yathāśakti samāhitaḥ yathāśaktyā ghṛtena vai yathāśaktyā tu vakṣyāmi yathāśaktyā svarṇadānaṃ yathā śakrapriyārthinyā yathā śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ yathā śaptā maghavatā yathā śānto bhaved bhadre yathā śūdratvam āpnuyāt yathā śūdro bhaved dvijaḥ yathā śaityaṃ jale vāto yathā śailaiḥ piśācaiś ca yathā śocāmi pitaraṃ yathāśmanā hiraṇyasya yathā śrīr vanarakṣiṇaḥ yathā śrutinidarśanāt yathāśrutinidarśanāt yathā śreṣṭhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ yathā samastatīrthānāṃ yathā samastabhūteṣu yathā samastavidyānāṃ yathā sarveśvaro viṣṇuḥ yathā sarveṣu deveṣu yathā sasarja bhūtāni yathāsaṃkhyaṃ ca bho viprāḥ yathāsaṃbhavinānnena yathā saṃharate prajāḥ yathā sā prāpyate bhūpa yathāsukhaṃ juṣasveti yathāsukhaṃ deham imaṃ juṣadhvam yathāsukhaṃ balād reme yathāsukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs yathā surāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ yathā surā yathā cendur yathā sūryas tathā jñānaṃ yathā sūryasya gagana yathāsau puruṣottamaḥ yathāsthānam anukramāt yathāsthānavibhāgaṃ tu yathāsthānaṃ jagāma ha yathā sthiro ahaṃ rājye syāṃ yathā syātāṃ surā mūrdhni yathā syāt somo hy asmākaṃ yathā syād balavān putro yathā svapne sukhaṃ bhavet yathāhaṃ bhavatā sṛṣṭo yathāhaṃ śaṃkarād ūrdhvaṃ yathāhaṃ sukham āpnuyām yathā hānikramaṃ prāptās yathecchasi tathā kuru yathecchasi tathā kuru yathedaṃ visṛjāmy aham yathendrasyāmarāvatī yathepsitam avāpsyasi yathemāṃ nagarīṃ sarvāṃ yatheṣṭacaraṇātmanā yatheṣṭam iti lokapaḥ yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi yatheṣṭaṃ māmakaiḥ saha yatheṣṭaṃ varayatv iti yatheṣṭaṃ sarvam āpnuhi yatheṣṭāṃ cāpnuyād gatim yathaikāgryam avāpyate yathaitad anudṛśyate yathaiva tu vayaṃ brūmo yathaiva vyomni paśyāmi yathaivāgre tathā dūrāt yathoktakarmakartṛtvāt yathoktakārī saumyaś ca yathoktakārī saumyaś ca yathoktakramacoditāḥ yathoktadakṣiṇair viprair yathoktam ṛṣibhis tāta yathoktam ṛṣibhiḥ purā yathoktavidhinā hutvā yathoktaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ yathoktaṃ comayā bhavaḥ yathoktaṃ tau ca cakratuḥ yathoktaṃ parameṣṭhinā yathoktaṃ vai maghavatā yathoktaṃ sā jagaddhātrī yathoktācāravartinaḥ yathoktāyuṣyasaṃyuktaṃ yathoktena tu mantreṇa yathoktena vidhānena yathoktena vidhānena yathoktair ijyate samyak yathocitaṃ kuru sakhe yathocitaṃ te yamakiṃkarair hi yathocitaṃ vipravarās tu kāle yathoditaprakāreṇa yathoddiṣṭaṃ krameṇa tu yathoddiṣṭāṃ svayaṃ tu saḥ yad akṣaraṃ śāśvatam aprameyaṃ yad agnihotre suhute yadaṅghribhyo abhavan nadyo yad aṅghrisaṃgād abhavad yad atra tathyaṃ tattvaṃ no yad atra tathyaṃ tad brūhi yad atra pratikartavyaṃ yad atra pratimā rājañ yad atra yuktaṃ deveśa yad atra sāṃprataṃ kāryaṃ yad atraupāyikaṃ matam yad adya tvāṃ pravakṣyāmi yad adhyātmaṃ yathā vidmo yadanusmaraṇenāpi yad antarguṇajālaṃ tu yadannaḥ puruṣo rājaṃs yad anyac chabdagocaram yad anyat kṛtavān balaḥ yad anyatra kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ yad anyad vasu kiṃcana yad apatyakṛtaṃ kiṃcit yad apy anyan manovarti yad apy asya mahīṃ dadyād yad apy uktaṃ hi manunā yad aprameyaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ yad yad amūrtiḥ sṛjad vyaktaṃ yad ambu snānavastrotthaṃ yad arātiṣu muñcati yadartham annāni dhanāni jīvā yadartham aśubhaṃ kṛtam yadartham aham āgataḥ yadartham āgatas tasmān yadartham āgataḥ kāryaṃ yadarthaṃ tapaso hy asya yadarthaṃ tapyase śubhe yad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ paratra yad asāmarthyayukto ahaṃ yad asthibhiḥ surāḥ sarve yad asmābhir vinā tena yad ahaṃ tava deśikaḥ yad ahaṃ dṛṣṭavān prabho yad ahaṃ yauvanacyutaḥ yadā karmātmakaḥ pumān yadā kāryaṃ tadā nas tvaṃ yadā kālasya paryayāt yadākṣaraṃ prakṛtir yaṃ yad āgamanakāraṇam yadā gṛhapatir dakṣo yadā ca kṣīyate pāpaṃ yadā ca tṛptaḥ kāmeṣu yadā ca śrotriyo abhyeti yadā cāsmān na bibhyati yadā ceyaṃ haraśiraḥ yadā caikārṇave supto yadā jāgarti sarvātmā yadā tadā mahī tatra yadā tadā stutir nāsti yadā tu kṣatriyo yajñe yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tat yadā tu māṃ cintayate sa śuddhaḥ yadā tu viṣṇur bhagavān yadā tu saṃgatā bhadre yadā tebhyo na bibheti yadā tvaṃ lokapāvanī yadā tvāṃ munisattamāḥ yadā tv etad vibudhyate yadā tv eṣa guṇān etān yadā dāsī tu jātāhaṃ yadādityadinaṃ bhavet yadā devo jagatpatiḥ yadā drakṣyasi locanam yadā dharmakṛtāṃ nṛṇām yadādhāraṃ yadātmakam yadā na dhāraṇe śaktās yadā na bubudhe cainaṃ yadā na mokṣaty amarārihantā yadānaye priyāṃ bhrātas yadā na rocate vāsas yadā na śakyate mohād yadā nirviṣayaṃ cittaṃ yadā necchati na dveṣṭi yadā paśyati bhūtātmā yadā paśyasi tatkṣaṇāt yadā purābhavad bālo yad āpnoti tad āpnoti yad āpnoti tad āpnoti yadā prabuddham avyaktam yadā prārthayate kiṃcit yadā bāṇa bhaviṣyati yadā buddhyānubudhyate yadā budhyati ātmānaṃ yadā budhyati buddhimān yadā bhaven mahājyaiṣṭhī yadā bhāryāṃ na lebhe asau yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute yad ābhīrair bhavāñ jitaḥ yadā yadā abhivyaktiṃ yadā yadā ca dharmasya yadā yadā tu dharmasya yadā yadā tv adharmasya yadā yadā na yajñānām yadā yadā satāṃ hānir yadā yadā hi dharmasya yadā yadā hi pākhaṇḍa- yadā yaśodā tau bālāv yadā yāti budhaḥ śāntas yadā yāti virūpavān yadā yāti surūpadhṛk yadā lajjākulā nāsya yadā varamadonmatto yadā varṇāvare janāḥ yadā vikurute bhāvaṃ yadā vijṛmbhate ananto yadā virañcer vadanaṃ trinetraḥ yadā vīreṇa nirjitaḥ yadā sa budhyaty ātmānaṃ yadā samiddho hutabhug babhūva yadā samyaṅ niyacchati yadā sarpākṛtes tava yadā sarvāgamo yatra yad āsīt pramater dhanam yad āsīd dhanarājasya yadāsau tapyate muniḥ yadāsau nāgataś cāntaṃ yadāsau viṣṇur eti ca yadāstreṣu ca śastreṣu yadā sthāsyanti veśmani yadāsya mānasī viprā yadā syāt tu dvijottamāḥ yadā syāt sādhusaṃmatā yadāham uddhṛtā nātha yad āha vasudhā sarvaṃ yadāhṛtaṃ saṃmathituṃ samudram yadā hy adharmo bhavitā yadi kālasya paryayāt yadi kālaṃ na vidmahe yadi kupyanti mohitāḥ yadi krīṇāsi mūlyaṃ tvaṃ yadi cāham anugrāhyo yadi tatraiva vijñāne yadi tasya priyā hy asi yadi tāvad ayaṃ sūryaś yadi tulyaṃ vrataṃ śaucaṃ yadi tuṣṭo asi deveśa yadi tuṣṭo asi me prabho yadi te tad vacaḥ satyaṃ yadi te dvāv imau śaṅkū yadi te viṣṇur abhyeti yadi te asti dayā mayi yadi te asti dayāsmāsu yadi trātā prajā mayā yadi tvam anuvartase yadi tvaṃ dayitā bhartur yadi tvaṃ dārasaṃyogaṃ yadi tvāṃ tatra gautamyāṃ yadi dattaṃ yadi hutaṃ yad idaṃ pakṣirājena yad idaṃ vipriyaṃ me tvaṃ yadi deyo varo mama yadi daityagaṇān sarvāñ yadi dharmaṃ samāyujya yadi dhārayase śauca- yadi naiṣyāmi te antikam yad indrasya viḍambanam yadi putrasamaṃ śiṣyaṃ yadi praviśase pāpa yadi prasanno bhagavān yadi prāṇivadhād bhavān yadi prāpsye surottamāḥ yadi mānuṣyatāṃ devi yad imān sṛjate guṇān yadi muktim abhīpsatha yadi me vacanān nādya yadi yakṣyasi tenaiva yadi yūyaṃ muniśreṣṭhā yadi yūyaṃ sahāyā me yadi lajjā na jāyate yadi vā nīlalohitaḥ yadi vā mucyate vāpi yadi vā yuddhabhaktis te yadi vāhaṃ tava priyaḥ yadi viprāḥ kathayate yadi vo asti mayi prītiḥ yadi śakto asi gaccha tvam yadi śaknoṣi me anagha yadi śrotum ihecchatha yad iṣṭaṃ tat prayacchāmi yad iṣṭaṃ yājitaṃ ca yat yad iṣṭaṃ vara bhadraṃ te yadi syād abhiṣecanam yadi syān mama saṃmatam yad īkṣitaṃ kāṅkṣati vāsavo api yadīcchati vimucyate yadīto na mumūrṣavaḥ yad uktam atra śreyaḥ syāt yad uktaṃ tan nibodha me yad uktaṃ tu bhavadbhir me yad uktaṃ te vidhīyate yad ukto asau dvijena tu yaducakrabhayāvaham yaducakraṃ sakeśavam yad uttamaṃ tat tu divaukasebhyaḥ yad uddiṣṭaṃ sureśāna yad unnidrābjapattrākṣaṃ yadupāyena sarvārthān yadubhir māgadho rājā yadubhiḥ parivāritaḥ yadubhiḥ sa parājitaḥ yad umāvanam ucyate yadurājo bhaviṣyati yaduvaṃśasamudbhavaḥ yaduvaṃśe bhaviṣyati yaduvṛddhān anukramāt yaduśreṣṭhagṛhaṃ tv ekaṃ yadusiṃhaḥ sutasya saḥ yadus tasmān mahāsattvaḥ yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva yaduṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ nyayojayat yadūnām atidurjayam yadūnām ācacakṣe taṃ yadūnāṃ vyasanaṃ dvidhā yadūnāṃ samadhīyata yadūnāṃ saṃnidhau sarve yad ūrdhvaṃ pādatalayor
