yadūṃl lāṅgalinā saha yadṛcchayā devanadīṃ yadṛcchayā muniśreṣṭha yad ekaṃ praviśanty uta yad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā yad etat tvayi jāyate yad etat paramaṃ devaṃ yad etat puṇyam ākhyānaṃ yad etad anapatyatā yad etad anupṛcchasi yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā yad etad ucyate śāstraiḥ yad etad bhavatā proktaṃ yad etad bhavatoditam yad etan nimnam urvaśyāṃ yad etan matam uttamam yad etan madvacaḥ puṇyaṃ yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti yad eva sāṃkhyaśāstroktaṃ yad eṣām utpathasthānāṃ yadaikaṃ naiva pūryate yadaitāny avatiṣṭhante yadaiva krandate jantur yadaiva krandate jantur yadaiva gautamo vipro yado gṛhāṇa me śāpāj yadotpatsyanti dāruṇāḥ yador vaṃśadharasyātha yados tu vaṃśaṃ vakṣyāmi yad goghne yad dvijādhame yad daṇḍitāḥ phalaṃ tasya yad dattaṃ tāsu kanyāsu yad dīyate tad eveha yad deyaṃ prītikāriṇā yad balaṃ yac ca nas tejo yad bālabalinor yuddhaṃ yad bālyād abravaṃ kiṃcid yadbāhubalam āśritya yad bravīmi kuru śreṣṭhe yad bravīmi mahābhāga yad bravīṣi sureśāna yad brahmaputrān sumahānubhāvān yad brahmarūpaṃ yad upāsitavyam yad brāhmaṇeṣu pradadau yad brūṣe bhagavan bhaktyā yad bhaktyā samupāhṛtam yad bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣitaṃ pītaṃ yad bhartur anuveśanam yad bhavān ittham āttha mām yad bhāvyaṃ tat tvam īśānas yad bhāvyaṃ tad bhaviṣyati yad bhūtaṃ tat tvam evoktaḥ yad bhūmyāṃ na pradīyate yad yat priyatamaṃ kiṃcid yad yat prītikaraṃ puṃsāṃ yady atra syād anāmayam yad yadā ca vidhīyate yad yad icchasi tat sarvaṃ yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ kiṃcit yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yad yad duḥkhāya tat sarvaṃ yad yad dravyaṃ naro bhaktyā yad yad bhāvayate jantuḥ yad yad ramyaṃ sundaraṃ vā yad yan manogataṃ rakṣas yady anyathā na śakyaṃ vai yady anyathā pravarteya yady api syān manojavaḥ yady apy agre samāgacched yadyapy avyāhataṃ bhavet yadyapy eṣāṃ na bhedo asti yady asau viṣamo bhavet yady ahaṃ bhagavan bhaktaḥ yad yuktam anubhāṣase yad yuktaṃ tad vidhīyatām yady ekaṃ klinnam indriyam yady eko api gayāṃ vrajet yady evaṃ pṛthivīpāla yady evaṃ vedavacanaṃ yady eṣo amṛtamanthane yad rāma śṛṇu yatnataḥ yad rāmeṇābhavat kṛtam yad rūpam ṛgyajuḥsāmnām yad rūpaṃ jyotiṣāṃ divi yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ yad rūpaṃ te divākara yad vadanti śamātmakāḥ yad vadanty akhilā vedā yadvadhāt kuvalāśvo asau yad varaṃ cātidurlabham yad vāpi manasaḥ kāmyaṃ yad vipro vrajati striyam yad vīryaṃ yat parākramaḥ yad vṛttaṃ tan nyavedayan yad vai viprā vivekajam yad vo vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam yantraśastrādibhīṣaṇe yantrārūḍhaṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā yantritaḥ kāryakaraṇaiḥ yan na gopyaṃ mahājanaiḥ yan na jānanti munayo yan na jñātaṃ surāsuraiḥ yan na dattaṃ purādhamāḥ yan na sādhyaṃ suragaṇair yan na sādhyaṃ suragaṇair yannāmato maṅgalam āpnuyāc ca yannāmaśravaṇād eva yannimittam ihāgatāḥ yannimittaṃ janārdana yan mayā nirmitaṃ purā yan mayā paribhāṣitam yan mayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ yan mayā śarasaṃghātaiḥ yan mayā himavacchṛṅge yanmahimnaḥ śruter api yanmāyāṃ nālam uddhartuṃ yan māṃ pṛcchata sattamāḥ yan māṃ pṛcchatha sattamāḥ yan māṃ pṛcchatha sattamāḥ yan me nāma itīrayan yan me pitāmahāity evaṃ yan me prapitāmahāiti yan me manasi varteta yan maiti ca pituḥ pituḥ yama ādiśyatāṃ tarhi yamajau kauravāṃś cānyān yamajau saṃbabhūvatuḥ yama tāṃ gopayiṣyāmi yamatīrtham iti khyātaṃ yamatīrtham iti khyātaṃ yamatīrthe tu pūjitam yamatīrthe viśeṣataḥ yamadaṇḍaṃ ca rakṣakam yamadaṇḍena tāḍitam yamadūtā bhayaṃkarāḥ yamadūtā bhayaṃkarāḥ yamadūtā bhayānakāḥ yamadūtāḥ śilātale yamadūtair avajñayā yamadūtair avajñayā yamadūtair jvalat tasya yamadūtair balotkaṭaiḥ yamadūtair mahāghorais yamadūtaiś ca caurās te yamadūtaiś ca te kruddhair yamadūtaiś ca te mūḍhā yamadūtaiḥ pāṭyamānā yamadūtaiḥ sunirdayaiḥ yam adya purataḥ kṛtvā yam ananyabhavaṃ prabhum yam abhyasyāpnuyād yogī yam abhyetya janaḥ sarvo yamamārgasya nirṇayam yamamārgasya nirṇayam yamamārge atibhīṣaṇe yamamārge tvayoditam yamamārge yamālaye yamarūpāya te namaḥ yamalārjunayor madhye yamalokasya cādhvānam yamalokasya cādhvānam yamalokaṃ ca dhārmikāḥ yamalokaṃ bravīhi naḥ yamalokaṃ bravīhi naḥ yamaloke tu te ghorā yamalokeṣu yātanām yamavākyād anu tathā yamaś ca yamunā caiva yamasadmany anekāni yamas tatra cukopa ha yamas tasyā na cakṣame yamas tasyā na cakṣame yamas tān pāpakāriṇaḥ yamas tāṃ kṛpayā punaḥ yamas tu karmaṇā tena yamas tu tat pituḥ sarvaṃ yamas tu tena śāpena yamastotraṃ paṭhanti ye yamasya darśanaṃ cogram yamasya puruṣās tathā yamasya puruṣās tathā yamasya puruṣair vadhaḥ yamasya puruṣaiḥ kleśo yamasya bhavane divye yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ yamasya viṣayaṃ gatāḥ yamasya viṣayaṃ ghoraṃ yamasya viṣaye krūrair yamasya viṣaye ghorāḥ yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ yamasya sadanaṃ prati yamasya sadanaṃ prati yamasya sadane gatam yamasyājñākaraṃ dvijāḥ yamasyājñākarās tathā yamasyājñākarās tathā yamasyānayane śīghraṃ yamasyānucarāś ca ye yamasyeti vacaḥ śrutvā yamahastaṃ prahastaṃ ca yamaṃ devā bhayārditāḥ yamaṃ paśyanti pāpiṣṭhāś yamaṃ prasthāpayām āsa yamaṃ prāyād bhayāturā yamaṃ yadi vaco me adya yamaṃ rājye abhyaṣecayat yamaṃ vā narakāṇi vā yamaṃ sabalavāhanam yamaḥ kutrāsta ity atha yamaḥ pātālaketuś ca yamaḥ prāha punaḥ punaḥ yamaḥ prītamanās tadā yamaḥ pretādhipas tathā yamaḥ saṃyamināṃ yathā yamaḥ svakiṃkarān āha yamāntikam anuprāptā yamāya bhṛśaduḥkhitān yamāya sarvam avadan yam ārādhya ca yatra ca yam ārādhya purāṇarṣir yam āśritāś cepsitam āpnuvanti yam āśritāḥ svepsitam āpnuvanti yam āhur jñānagamyeti yam āhur vai yuge yuge yam indriyātigam agocaraṃ dvijāḥ yamī kanyā yaśasvinī yamunākarṣaṇādīni yamunā ca nadī puṇyā yamunā ca nadī puṇyā yamunā ca sarasvatī yamunātīram āgamya yamunā naiva tāpī sā yamunāprabhavaṃ tathā yamunāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ yamunā lokapāvanī yamunā śatadrur vipāśā yamunā saṃgatā tatra yamunā sāgaraṃgamā yamunāṃ cātigambhīrāṃ yamena tu kadācana yamena prahitaṃ daṇḍaṃ yameśvaraṃ tato yas tu yamo adhidevo bhavatāṃ yamo api saṃgame snātvā yamo manuś ca varuṇaḥ yamo mahiṣavāhanaḥ yamo yamapure nātha yamo vatsaḥ pratāpavān yamo vai duṣṭaceṣṭitaḥ yamo vai pāpakāriṇām yayā kṛṣṇam ayodhayat yayā gṛham udīritam yayāce dvādaśa purīṃ yayā jagan moham upaiti viprāḥ yayātikṛtavipriyāt yayāticaritaṃ nityam yayātipatanaṃ śuci yayātim idam abravīt yayātir aparājitaḥ yayātir aparājitaḥ yayātir api rūpeṇa yayātir garhayan sutam yayātir diśi pūrvasyāṃ yayātir nāhuṣo rājā yayātir bubhuje sukham yayātir yadum abravīt yayātir yudhi durdharṣas yayātivākyāc chukro api yayātiśāpād vaṃśo ayam yayātiś ca yaduṃ śaptvā yayātis tasya cātmajaḥ yayātis tu tataḥ param yayātiṃ bhūridakṣiṇam yayātiḥ śukram abravīt yayāter abhavad bhāryā yayāter nṛpasattamāt yayā śapto aham īdṛśaḥ yayā samupajāyate yayur ekam aho yathā yayur gopā mahābhāgās yayuś cakragadādharam yayus tu rākṣasān devāḥ yayuḥ pāṇḍusutā vanam yayuḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ suradantimukhyāḥ yayuḥ sarve taponidhim yayuḥ sarve maharṣayaḥ yayoḥ sakāśād idam abhyudaiti yayau gaṅgām anuttamām yayau gaṅgāṃ jagaddhātrīṃ yayau ca kācit premāndhā yayau jalapatir mune yayau divaṃ tāta mamopapaśyataḥ yayau dvāravatīm ūṣāṃ yayau prāgjyotiṣaṃ puram yayau bāṇapurābhyāśaṃ yayau vanam anuttamam yayau śaraṇyaṃ jagatāṃ yayau śaukaravaṃ punaḥ yayau sa prītimān hariḥ yayau sukhī svakaṃ deśaṃ yayau svanagaraṃ sukhī yavagodhūmacaṇakair yavagorasavikriyāḥ yavanaś ca mahābalaḥ yavanasya bhayāt tadā yavanasya muniśreṣṭhāḥ yavanānāṃ śiraḥ sarvaṃ yavanāḥ pavanaiḥ saha yavanāḥ pāradāś caiva yavanena samālokya yavaneśo hy anātmajam yavīnaraś ca vikrāntaḥ yavīyasī tu sāpy āsīd yavīyasībhyaḥ śreṣṭhāhaṃ yavair vrīhitilair māṣair yaśaś ca prāpsyate mahat yaśaś cāpnoti sumahad yaśasaḥ phalabhūtyarthaṃ yaśasāpratimaḥ sadā yaśaso avāptaye punaḥ yaśas tu teṣāṃ bhavitā yaśaḥkīrtipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ yaśaḥ prāpsyasi dharmaṃ ca yaśaḥsvargasuraiśvarya- yaśaḥ svaṃ ca prakāśayan yaśodayā samaṃ bhrānto yaśodā ca tato dvijāḥ yaśodā ca mahābhāgā yaśodā jātam ātmajam yaśodā tau na rohiṇī yaśodādevakīgarbha- yaśodāpramukhā hradam yaśodā vismayārūḍhā yaśodāśayane tūrṇam yaśodāśayane māṃ tu yaśo balaṃ devarājopabhogyam yaśo vā puṇyam eva vā yaś cakāra mahātapāḥ yaś cakraṃ vartayaty eko yaś ca khaḍgādikṛn naraḥ yaś ca gaṅgām anusmaret yaś ca teṣāṃ dvijanmanām yaś ca daityāntako vibhuḥ yaś ca brahmā sa vai rudro yaś ca brāhmaṇasaṃtyaktaḥ yaś ca bhaktaṃ parityajet yaś ca yaś cābalaḥ sarvaḥ yaś caritrair manorujam yaś ca lokāntakāntakaḥ yaś ca vā paṭhati smaret yaś ca vipratvam utsṛjya yaś ca viṣṇuḥ sa bhāskaraḥ yaś ca samyak karoty evaṃ yaś ca sūryaḥ sa vai viṣṇur yaś ca smarati nityaśaḥ yaś cākroṣṭā narādhamaḥ yaś cātra niyamair yuktaḥ yaś cānyad anṛtaṃ vakti yaś cāpākeṣu vahnidaḥ yaś cekṣvākukulodvahaḥ yaś cedaṃ satataṃ śṛṇoti manujaḥ svargāpavargapradaṃ yaś cemaṃ kīrtayen nityaṃ yaś caitac chrāvayen nityaṃ yaś cainam abhinandeta yaś cainam abhivādayet yaś caiva śṛṇuyān naraḥ yaś caiṣa puruṣo jātaḥ yaś caiṣāṃ vyāhared bhidam yaś cocchvāsanirodhakaḥ yaṣṭavyaṃ ca yathāvidhi yaṣṭavyaṃ cāpi yatnataḥ yaṣṭavyaṃ prahitaṃ tvayā yaṣṭavyaṃ vidhivad dhanaiḥ yaṣṭā kratur yāny api sādhanāni yaṣṭā samastayajñānāṃ yaṣṭim ādāya daiteyān yaṣṭiṃ saṃjīvanīṃ tathā yaṣṭum ārabdhavān asmi yaṣṭum ārabdhavān surān yaṣṭum iṣṭair mahātmabhiḥ yas tattvaṃ vetti paramaṃ yas tatra yātrāṃ kurute yas tatra savituḥ kṣetre yas tatropavased dhīmān yas tad avyākṛtātmani yas tadājñāvaśe sthitaḥ yas tasyāṃ halinaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ yas taṃ mahāsuraṃ raudraṃ yas tu kalpe samutpanne yas tu kaitavavṛttyā hi yas tu granthārthatattvajño yas tu corayate tailaṃ yas tu tatra mṛtaś cāpi yas tu taṃ mānavo loke yas tu tiṣṭhati yogādhau yas tu nānāvidhair yajñair yas tu nindayate pāpo yas tu putro avamanyate yas tu prāṇāhutīpūrvam yas tu māṃsaṃ na bhakṣayet yas tu raudrasamācāraḥ yas tu vo hṛdi saṃśayaḥ yas tu śūdraḥ svadharmeṇa yas tu śrāddhaṃ kariṣyati yas tu snātvā yatavrataḥ yas tu harotsavam adbhutam enaṃ yas te janiṣyate putras yas tv atra praviśen nātha yas tv atra praviśen mandaḥ yas tv ayaṃ madano dhīmān yas tvayā nirjitaḥ purā yas tv asyāntaṃ tu paśyati yas tv asyāṃ praviśed bhadre yas tvām utthāpayiṣyati yas tv āśritaṃ dvijaṃ tyaktvā yas tv idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ yas tv idaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ yas tv idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yas tv idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yas tv imāṃ dhārayen nityaṃ yas tv imāṃ pratimāṃ gacchen yas tv etā niyataś caryā yasmāc ca kāraṇāt pāṇir yasmāc ca mama cotpattir yasmāj jajñe bṛhanmanāḥ yasmāt kātyāyanāḥ smṛtāḥ yasmāt tava supuṇyena yasmāt trilokyāṃ na paraḥ samāno yasmāt tvayānurūpaṃ me yasmāt tvayaiṣa duṣṭātmā yasmāt tvaṃ matkṛte krūra yasmāt parataraṃ nāsti yasmāt paraṃ nānyad asti praśastaṃ yasmāt paraṃ naiva susūkṣmam anyat yasmāt paraṃ no mahatāṃ mahac ca yasmāt pāpataraṃ karma yasmāt purū ravo asyeti yasmāt sarvam idaṃ prapañcaracitaṃ māyājagaj jāyate yasmād aṇutaraṃ nāsti yasmād adattāṃ matkanyāṃ yasmād avamatā dakṣa yasmād asatyam uktāsi yasmād ahaṃ samudbhūto yasmād āvartate punaḥ yasmād etat samāpyate yasmād dṛḍharatho nṛpaḥ yasmād dṛṣṭer agamyās te yasmād dharmāt paro dharmo yasmād dhṛtavatī ceyaṃ yasmād yataś ca na bhaviṣyati sarvabhūtāt yasmād yad abhijāyeta yasmād virūparūpaṃ māṃ yasmān na cyavate punaḥ yasmān na varjitam idaṃ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ yasmān nāsti bṛhattaram yasmān naivātmavān api yasmān manaḥ sādhubahiṣkṛto yaḥ yasmān mūrtam ajāyata yasmiñ jagat sakalam etad anādimadhye yasmin kasmiṃś ca yat kiṃcid yasmin kāle sureśasya yasmin kṛte pāpayoniṃ yasmin kṛṣīvalā rāṣṭre yasmin dine harir yāto yasmin dṛṣṭe ca kathyate yasmin dṛṣṭe bhavakleśā yasmin deve ca mantrake yasmin deśe abhiṣicyate yasmin deśe yatra kāle yasmin deśe surendrasya yasmin dehaṃ na paśyati yasmin na punarāvṛttiṃ yasmin nipātite saukhyaṃ yasmin pratiṣṭhitaṃ sarvaṃ yasmin manuṣyalokās te yasmin yajñe mahādāne yasmin yasmiṃs tithau viprāḥ yasmin vibhūtiḥ sakalādhipatyaṃ yasmin vilayam eṣyati yasmin vaikalyam ṛcchati yasmin suvibhramāḥ kecid yasmiṃl lagne śubhāvahe yasmiṃś ca smṛtamātre tu yasmiṃs tiṣṭhati yāti cāntasamaye kalpānukalpe punaḥ yasmiṃs tu nihate aśubhe yasmiṃs tu pacyate kālas yasmai kasmai ca dātavyā yasmai dadyāt pitā śrāddhaṃ yasmai namo gacchati mantrapūtaṃ yasmai putrāya saṃdātuṃ yasmai yasmai dātukāmaḥ yasmai yasmai stanaṃ rātrau yasya kasyāpi nākhyeyaṃ yasya kasyāpi pattrāṇi yasya kīrtir gatā divam yasya cānudinaṃ hānir yasya te abhyudayo mahān yasya te matir uttamā yasya tv annam upāśnanti yasya dhāma jagattrayam yasya nāgavadhūhastair yasya nādena daityānāṃ yasya nābhisamudbhūtāt yasya nāmnā tu bhāratāḥ yasya nāmnātha kauravāḥ yasya pakṣo bhavej jyāyān yasya putraśataṃ babhau yasya putraḥ sa tādṛśaḥ yasya putro bṛhadrathaḥ yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate yasya paitāmahaṃ gṛham yasya pratāpasaṃtrastāḥ yasya prabhāvāt prabalo daśāsyaḥ yasya bāhusahasrasya yasya brahman pitāmahaḥ yasya mānaṃ pratiṣṭhitam yasya yakṣā hatā mohāt yasya yajñe jagau gāthāṃ yasya yathepsitaṃ kāmaṃ yasya yad vacanaṃ dvijāḥ yasya yo vidhir uddiṣṭa yasya rājye tu varṣāṇāṃ yasya ruṣṭāv ubhāv api yasya vīryāt pravartitāḥ yasya śabdād api trāsaṃ yasya śabdena sakalaṃ yasya śāntā sutābhavat yasya śilpaṃ mahātmanaḥ yasya śuṣmād rodasī abhyasetāṃ yasya śravaṇamātreṇa yasya śravaṇamātreṇa yasya sarvam abhedena yasya sarvam idaṃ jagat yasya sarvaṃ tu taj jñānaṃ yasya sarvodaye mama yasya saṃkhyā na vidyate yasya saṃsmaraṇenāpi yasya smaraṇamātreṇa yasya smaraṇamātreṇa yasya syāt prathamaṃ siddhis yasya svarūpaṃ jānanti yasya hastau ca pādau ca yasya hastau ca pādau ca yasyākarṇanamātreṇa yasyākhilamahīvyoma- yasyāṅgulisparśahatākhilāghair yasyājñayā viśvam idaṃ vicitram yasyājñayā sarvam idaṃ yasyātmabhūtaṃ ca padārthajātam yasyānubhāvād bhīṣmādyair yasyānuśravaṇenaiva yasyānusmaraṇād eva yasyānusmaraṇād eva yasyānte pratibudhyate yasyānnam upajīvati yasyānnenāvaśeṣeṇa yasyānvavāyajo viṣṇur yasyāpi yasyāpi manogatā yā yasyā me daivataṃ patiḥ yasyām evaṃvidhaḥ sutaḥ yasyārcanaṃ naiva vināśam asti yasyārcanāt prārthanayānurūpāṃ yasyārthe vijayāmahe yasyāvalokanād asmāñ yasyā vākyaṃ viparyeti yasyāś ca darśanād eva yasyāsīt puruṣāgryasya yasyāsuragaṇā yajñān yasyāsau narake paktuṃ yasyāsti bhaktiḥ puruṣottamākhye yasyāham indraḥ putras te yasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje yasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje yasyāṃ jajñe prajāpatiḥ yasyāṃ tu ramate skandaḥ yasyāṃ yonau prajāyate yasyāṃ rājābhavat pūrvam yasyāṃ sa dharmavid rājā yasyāṃ snātvā naraśreṣṭhaḥ yasyāḥ paścān nadīkṛtam yasyāḥ putrā mahābalāḥ yasyāḥ prabhāvāt sarvatra yasyāḥ prasādāt phalavanti nityaṃ yasyāḥ priyaṃ yac ca vapuḥ sa kṛtvā yasyāḥ saṃdarśanān martyaḥ yasyedaṃ vikṛtaṃ jagat yasyaitat tiṣṭhati gṛhe yasyaiṣā sakalā pṛthvī yaṃ kaśyapaḥ sutavaraṃ yaṃ kurvan sukham āpnoti yaṃ caivārthaṃ samuddiśya yaṃ jñātvā na nivartate yaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāskaraṃ martyaḥ yaṃ dṛṣṭvā mucyate pāpāt yaṃ dṛṣṭvā muniśārdūlāḥ yaṃ devā na viduḥ kvacit yaṃ dhyātvā munayaḥ prapañcarahitaṃ vindanti mokṣaṃ dhruvaṃ yaṃ dhyāyanti budhāḥ samādhisamaye śuddhaṃ viyatsaṃnibham yaṃ namasyati vai guruḥ yaṃ nityam anuvartante yaṃ paraṃ prāhur aparaṃ yaṃ paśyanti mahātmāno yaṃ prāpya paramānandaṃ yaṃ yajñe śāśvataṃ prabhum yaṃ yaṃ kāmam abhidhyāyañ yaṃ yaṃ kāmam abhidhyāyan yaṃ yāntaṃ pṛṣṭhato anvayuḥ yaṃ yānti muktyai śaraṇaṃ prayatnāt yaṃ lebhe varuṇaḥ putraṃ yaṃ vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ yaṃ viditvāvyayaṃ tatra yaṃ vinidrā jitaśvāsāḥ yaṃ vedavedyam ṛṣayo vadanti yaṃ smṛtya dāridryamahābhiśāpa yaḥ karoti janādhipa yaḥ karoti jitātmavān yaḥ karoti naras tatra yaḥ karoti naro bhaktyā yaḥ karoti yathā tathā yaḥ karoti śṛṇoti ca yaḥ karoty atra gaṅgāyāṃ yaḥ karmāṇy anumanyate yaḥ kaścid vrajati kṣipraṃ yaḥ kaścid vrajate dvijaḥ yaḥ kaścin nirayāt tasmāt yaḥ kāmān nāpi saṃrambhān yaḥ kāmān nāpi saṃrambhān yaḥ kuryāt tena pṛthivī yaḥ kuryāt pitṛtarpaṇam yaḥ kuryāt saṃgame puṇye yaḥ paṭhec ca śṛṇoti vā yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād api yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād vāpi yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād vāpi yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyān martyaḥ yaḥ paṭhet pāṭhayed vāpi yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate jyotir yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate tapaḥ yaḥ paraḥ paramātmavān yaḥ parārthodyataḥ sadā yaḥ paśyati tṛtīyāyāṃ yaḥ paśyati sa buddhimān yaḥ paśyati surān imān yaḥ paśyec chvetamādhavam yaḥ paśyet puruṣottamam yaḥ paśyet puruṣottamam yaḥ paśyet puruṣottamam yaḥ pāpe buddhikṛn naraḥ yaḥ pitā putra eva saḥ yaḥ pitā sarvadevānāṃ yaḥ pitror anyathā vākyaṃ yaḥ pitroḥ priyakārakaḥ yaḥ punāti jagattrayam yaḥ purā kṛṣṇarūpo abhūt yaḥ purāṇaḥ purāṇātmā yaḥ purā puruhūtārthe yaḥ purāsīn mahābalaḥ yaḥ purā hy analo bhūtvā yaḥ pūrvajān uddharati yaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pradakṣiṇām yaḥ paitryam abhilipseta yaḥ prayacchati mānavaḥ yaḥ prayacchati viprebhyo yaḥ prayāgād atikramya yaḥ prayāti dṛḍhavrataḥ yaḥ śakrāṇām īśabhūtas yaḥ śiṣyo yāti pāpakṛt yaḥ śucir niyatendriyaḥ yaḥ śṛṇoti kṛtāñjaliḥ yaḥ śṛṇoti smareta vā yaḥ śete jalamadhyasthas yaḥ śete śāśvataṃ yogam yaḥ sakṛt tatra paṭhati yaḥ sa gaṅgāṃ saricchreṣṭhām yaḥ sadā duṣṭadhīr naraḥ yaḥ sadaivaikakuṇḍalaḥ yaḥ sa dhundhuvadhād rājā yaḥ samālabhate nityaṃ yaḥ samāḥ sarvadharmajñaś yaḥ sarvakāryeṣu sadā surāṇām yaḥ sarvam anupaśyati yaḥ sarvasākṣī sakalāntarātmā yaḥ sarvaṃ vetti sarvadā yaḥ sarvaṃ vetti sarveṣāṃ yaḥ sarveṣāṃ vimānāni yaḥ sa vidyotayan diśaḥ yaḥ sahasrāṇy anekāni yaḥ saṃpūjya jagannāthaṃ yaḥ saṃvādo abhavat pūrvam yaḥ somaṃ pibate niśi yaḥ stambhyaṃ tatra vidhivat yaḥ smaret puruṣottamam yaḥ smaret satataṃ bhaktyā yaḥ smared bhāskaraṃ nityaṃ yā āpaḥ so agnir ity ukto yā kāpy uktā parā śaktiḥ yā gatir jātavedasaḥ yā gatvāśrāvaya vauṣaḍ yāgaḥ kṣaṇī dṛṣṭaphale asamarthaḥ yā gītā pitṛbhiḥ pūrvam yāge yāge mahādhanam yā gautamī lokanamaskṛtā ca yācamānā nirākṛtāḥ yācamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ yācamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ yā ca mūrtiś ca yat kiṃcit yācasva gatasaṃbhramā yācasva vigatajvaraḥ yācitaṃ ca tvayā pūrvaṃ yācitaḥ parameṣṭhinā yācitaḥ savitā rājñā yācitāraś ca dātāras yācito na dadāti ca yācire amṛtam uttamam yācety āha śivo dvijam yāce na cāhaṃ surabhūpatitvaṃ yāceyaṃ dakṣiṇām imām yāce vicāryaiva ca tat kuruṣva yāce ahaṃ tvāṃ dvijottama yāce ahaṃ nātmanā deva yācñeyam akhilāśarma- yācyamānā nivartante yājanādhyāpane caiva yājayām āsa ca jñānī yājayām āsa pārthivam yājayām āsa viprendro yājayiṣyanty ayājyāṃs tu yā jātā hy atibhīṣaṇā yājñavalkyaś ca janako yājñavalkyaś ca janako yājñavalkyaś ca jābālir yājñavalkyaś ca taṃ nṛpam yājñavalkyaś ca buddhimān yājñavalkyaś ca viprendras yājñavalkyaṃ purohitam yājñikaṃ cāpi tat tīrthaṃ yājyopādhyāyasaṃyogād yātanādi dvijottamāḥ yātanāṃ niraye raudrāṃ yātanāḥ prāpya ghorās tu yātanīyaṃ svakarmajam yātanīyaṃ svakarmajam yātanīyaṃ svakarmajam yātanīyaṃ svakarmajam yātayāmaṃ ca sattamāḥ yātām ubhau gautamīṃ tu yātā yātāḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ yātāro vai nātra saṃdehaleśaḥ yātās tān samavekṣitum yāti kvacic cāpi kaves tanūjas yāti grāmaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ yāti cordhvam adhaś caiva yāti tatra ca tiṣṭhati yāti dikpaṭavāsatām yāti dharmapuraṃ naraḥ yāti nirdhūtakalmaṣaḥ yāti netrālibhogyatām yāti miṣṭānnabhuk sadā yāti yānena vai sukham yāti yānair yamālayam yāti vakti karoti ca yāti viṣṇupuraṃ janaḥ yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ yāti vaitaraṇīṃ naraḥ yāti sālokyatāṃ hareḥ yāti svargam ahiṃsakaḥ yāti svādvantaraṃ yathā yātīha tridaśālayam yā tu tāsāṃ kumārīṇāṃ yātudhānāś ca rākṣasāḥ yātudhānāś ca vegitāḥ yā tṛtīyā harer mūrtiḥ yāte tasmin dvijavare yāte pitari svarlokaṃ yāte mayi paraṃ dhāma yāte rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ yāte vedaś cukopa ha yāteṣu teṣu vipreṣu yāto yadukule hariḥ yāty adharmaś ca saṃkṣayam yāty ākāśe samīraṇaḥ yātrākāle ca viprendrāḥ yātrā dvādaśa saṃpūrṇā yātrāphalaṃ ca kiṃ tatra yātrāṃ karoti kṛṣṇasya yātrāṃ kṛtvā guḍivākhyāṃ yātrāṃ kṛtvā vidhānena yātrāṃ damanabhañjikām yātrāṃ snānam atho dānaṃ yāthātathyena te śiva yāthātathyena śaṃkaraḥ yā dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ prāptā yādavaḥ kaḥ pradāsyati yādavānām api kṣayaḥ yādavānām abhūt kṣayaḥ yādavā nāma vairiti yādavānāṃ tato jajñe yādavānāṃ tathā kṣayam yādavānāṃ bhaviṣyati yādavān upasaṃhṛtya yādavān prati sāmarṣo yādavābhibhavaṃ duṣṭā yādavā yadunāmnā te yādavās te ca keśavam yādavā hariṇā saha yādavāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ yādavī pratyapadyata yādavair anibarhitaiḥ yā divyā yāś ca mānuṣāḥ yā dustyajā durmatibhir yādṛg ācaritaṃ purā yādṛg bhāti harer lokaḥ yādṛśas tādṛśas tv aham yādṛśas tādṛśo vāpi yādṛśaṃ copyate bījaṃ yādṛśaṃ puruṣasyeha yā drakṣyanty anivāritam yā na jīryati jīryataḥ yānaṃ puṣpakam āruhat yānāni śubhrābharaṇāsanāni yānāsanābhilāpādyaiḥ yāni karmāṇi kṛtavān yāni karmāṇi cakrus te yāni kāni ca tīrthāni yāni kāni ca divyāni yāni kiṃpuruṣādyāni yāni kṣetrāṇi devānāṃ yāni cānyāni dvaṃdvāni yāni cābhyavahāryāṇi yāni tatra bhaviṣyanti yāni tīrthāni bhūtale yāni teṣām aśeṣāṇāṃ yāni tvadante nihitāni devaiḥ yāni dattvā dvijottamāḥ yāni nāmāni guhyāni yāni romāṇi mānuṣe yāni vai vismitaṃ cetas yāni saukhyāny anekaśaḥ yānenārkaprakāśena yānair uccāvacaiḥ śubhrair yānair barhiṇayojitaiḥ yānais te yānti nirmalaiḥ yānais te hemacandrābhair yānaiḥ śārdūlayojitaiḥ yānti gandharvavāditraiḥ yānti janmaśatair api yānti tatraiva te viprā yānti te rauravaṃ ghoraṃ yānti te vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ yānti dṛptā mahāgajaiḥ yānti dharmapuraṃ narāḥ yānti dharmapuraṃ yānair yānti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ yānti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ yānti mārgeṇa duḥkhitāḥ yānti yānena te sukham yānti yānair yamālayam yānti yānaiś ca tat patham yānti yānaiś ca tat padam yānti yāmyapathaṃ narāḥ yānti yāmyapathaṃ narāḥ yānti lokāntaraṃ tataḥ yānti vai na śubhāṃ gatim yānti vaivasvatapuraṃ yānti vai vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ yānti śūrāś ca pūruṣāḥ yānti sarvasukhapradam yānti svaṃ svaṃ niveśanam yāntu daityāś ca dānavāḥ yāntu brahmāṇam amarāḥ yāntu sarva itaḥ purīm yāntu sarve devagaṇā yānty ataḥ puruṣā dvijāḥ yānty āvirbhāvam ātmanaḥ yāny ahāni tu ṣoḍaśa yān yān kāmān abhidhyāyan yān yān kāmān abhidhyāyan yān yān kāmān abhipretya yān yān vāñchanti cepsitān yān yān vāñchanti durlabhān yān yān samīhate bhogān yāny uktāni ca tīrthāni yāny uktāni mayā tava yāny etāni nabhastale yā patnī cyavanasya ha yā brahma paramārthataḥ yā bhavanty atra siddhayaḥ yābhipretā yasya devasya bhāryā yābhiḥ pratyāharet kāmān yābhiḥ saṃdhāryate jagat yā bhūmis tāṃ vrajed bhavān yāmadvayaprajāgaram yāmas tarhi vayaṃ svayam yāmas tvayā vā garuḍa yāmasyaikasya me dehi yāmaḥ svaṃ svam adhiṣṭhānam yāmaḥ svaṃ svam adhiṣṭhānaṃ yā mātā pippalāśinaḥ yām ārādhya jagannātha yā māliny abhavat purā yām āhur mṛtajīvinīm yāminī cārdhagāminī yāmuneṣu ca bho dvijāḥ yāmuneṣu ca bho dvijāḥ yāmyakiṃkarapāśādi- yāmyakiṃkarapīḍitaḥ yāmyam astram avāpyātha yāmyam āgneyam eva ca yāmyam āśvinam auśanam yāmy ahaṃ tridivaṃ brahman yāmyāgreṣu tathā pitṝn yāmyān ākṣipya śatrave yāmyāṃ vai diśi saṃgare yāmye saṃkarṣaṇaṃ nyaset yāmyaiḥ pāśais tu saṃyatāḥ yāmyaiḥ pāśais tu saṃyatāḥ yāyātam aparaṃ tīrthaṃ yāyātaṃ nāhuṣaṃ pauraṃ yālaṃkṛtā sarvakālaṃ yāvakaṃ kaṇapiṇyākam yāvac candrārkatārakam yāvac candrārkatārakam yāvac candrārkatārakam yāvac ca punar āgatāḥ yāvac cāsya kule sapta yāvacchaktyā jaganmaya yāvajjīvaṃ pravartatām yāvat karomi kālindyām yāvat kalpaśatatrayam yāvat kalpasthitir naraḥ yāvatkālena cāpy atha yāvat krīḍati pāṃśubhiḥ yāvat tārataradhvaniḥ yāvat tiṣṭhati medinī yāvat tvaṃ jīvase vipra yāvat paśyati tasyāṃ tu yāvat paśyati vāmanam yāvat paśyanti manmatham yāvat pāpakṣayaṃ puṃsāṃ yāvatpramāṇā pṛthivī yāvat prīto abhavat pitā yāvat sattraṃ samāpyate yāvat saptāhamātraṃ tu yāvat sa bhagavān brahmā yāvat samudrāḥ saptaiva yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ dvijāḥ yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ sattram yāvat sāgaragā devī yāvat sāgaragā devī yāvat sāgaragā devī yāvat sāgaragāminī yāvat sūryasya sāmīpyaṃ yāvat sūryo bhaviṣyati yāvat saukhyaṃ bhaved asyās yāvat sthāvarajaṅgame yāvad astamane sthitaḥ yāvad asmi mahītale yāvad āgamanaṃ me syāt yāvad āgamanaṃ me syāt yāvad ājñāpratihatā yāvad āpsyati yauvanam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvad āvasathān iti yāvad icchati saṃsthānaṃ yāvad itthaṃ sa viprarṣis yāvad indrāś caturdaśa yāvad indrāś caturdaśa yāvad indrāś caturdaśa yāvad utkalamaryādā yāvad eva tu me saukhyaṃ yāvad gacchati sāgaram yāvad ghanā nabho yāvad yāvad devaḥ purā tv iha yāvad dyauś candratārakam yāvad dvijo asau punar eva tāvaj yāvad dharaṇisūryau ca yāvad bālam ahaṃ tv enaṃ yāvad brahmā na budhyate yāvad bhūmir dhariṣyati yāvad bhaumamahotpāta- yāvad yaśaḥ sphurati cāru manuṣyaloke yāvad yātrāṃ jyeṣṭhamāse yāvad yāvac ca cāṇūro yāvad yugānāṃ viprarṣe yāvad yojanapañcakam yāvad yojanapañcakam yāvad yojanasaṃkhyayā yāvad yojanasaṃkhyayā yāvad vaśyo athavā mṛtim yāvad virajamaṇḍalam yāvad vṛścikadarśanam yāvad vedaṃ na cādhīte yāvad vai skandadarśanam yāvantaṃ kālam eva ca yāvantaḥ pṛthivīdharāḥ yāvantaḥ sāgarā dvīpās yāvanto jantavaḥ svarge yāvanto manavaś caiva yā vandyā jagatām īśā yāvan na kāminīnetra- yāvan na tīrtharājasya yāvan na daśamātyayaḥ yāvan na dīyate cārghyaṃ yāvan na balam ārūḍhau yāvan na yānti śaraṇaṃ yāvan nāyāty asau bhillaḥ yāvan nārthayate param yāvan nārthayate param yāvan naitau mariṣyataḥ yāvan mahītale śakra yāvan muktisamāśrayāḥ yāvan mervādiparvatāḥ yāv arcitau skandagaṇeśvarābhyāṃ yāval lakṣmīr dṛḍhaṃ vapuḥ yāval lajjāṃ na jānāti yāvān ātmani vedātmā yā vāsya prakṛtir brahmaṃs yā vidyā naiva gocarā yā vṛttā brāhmaṇasyāsīn yā vyāptā viṣṇuneśena yā vyāpya viśvaṃ vimalīkaroti yā śaktiḥ saṃsthitā girau yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ yāś cāmbukaṇikā bhuvi yāś caivaṃ patisaṃgatāḥ yā śrīś chāyā ca naḥ so asmān yā sā tvadīyā paramā hi māyā yā sā prakṛtir ucyate yāsām acyutavaktrābje yāsām apāṅge hasite yāsāṃ kaṭākṣapātena yāsāṃ hāsaḥ sphuṭo abhavat yāsenābhīṣṭadāyinīm yās tiṣṭhanty amṛtā vāco yās tu gandhāmbukaṇikāḥ yās te mayā kṛtā yātrā yā sthitā lokapāvanī yāsyataḥ saṃkṣayaṃ yathā yāsyanty avanim eva ca yāsyasi paramaṃ sthānaṃ yāsyāmi tridaśālayam yāsyāmi nidhanaṃ kila yāsyāmi suramandiram yāsyāmy amaralokasya yāsyāmy eko hi kauravān yāhi gaṅgāṃ mahābāho yāhi pāpatare rūkṣe yāhi yāhy atra puṇyabhāk yāhi vatsa svabhavanaṃ yāṃ kṛtvā tu naro bhaktyā yāṃ gacchanti ca karmaṇā yāṃ gatiṃ yānti bho viprā yāṃ gautamo devavaraṃ prapūjya yāṃ jñātvā nābhiśocanti yāṃ taranti kṛtaprajñā yāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti yāṃ prārthayanti munayo yāṃ prekṣya vidhivad bhaktāḥ yāṃ yāṃ kāmayate siddhiṃ yāṃ vai vedavido viduḥ yāḥ kāścit siddhayaś cātra yāḥ patnyo vasudevasya yāḥ pibanti tu te sadā yuktanidro jitakrodhaḥ yuktam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ yuktaṃ dravye parakīye mamatvam yuktaṃ nipuṇadarśanam yuktaṃ manojavaiḥ śubhrair yuktaṃ rākṣasakoṭībhir yuktaḥ kurvīta na drohaṃ yuktaḥ samyak tathā yogī yuktā catasṛbhiḥ śīghraṃ yuktāhāro jitendriyaḥ yuktāḥ sarve pracetasaḥ yukto yogena yogavit yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ yukto hiṃsādibhir yataḥ yugadharmāś ca ye sarve yugapaj jalam agniṃ ca yugapattulyajīvinaḥ yugapad daśabhir mune yugapad daśamedhāni yugabhaktipradāyakam yugaṃ dvādaśasāhasryaṃ yugādi yasmāc ca bhaved aśeṣato yugādiṣu ṣaḍaśītyāṃ yugādiṣu ṣaḍaśītyāṃ yugānām anubhāvena yugānām anurūpeṇa yugānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ yugāni saptatis tāni yugānurūpaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā yugānurūpā mūrtiḥ syād yugāntaṃ samupasthitam yugāntaṃ spṛhayāmahe yugāntādityavarṇābhaṃ yugāntāya namo namaḥ yugānte toyadasyeva yugānte dvijasattamāḥ yugānte puruṣādhamāḥ yugānte prabhaviṣyanti yugānte munisattamāḥ yugānte munisattamāḥ yugānteṣv antako yaś ca yugānte samanuprāpte yugānte samupasthite yugānte samupasthite yugānte samupasthite yugānte samupasthite yugānte samupasthite yugāny atra mahāmune yugāpakramaṇe pūrvaṃ yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati yuge yuge bhavanty ete yuge yuge yathākālam yugeśaḥ kṣaṇadācaraḥ yugeṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu yugeṣv evaṃ nivatsyanti yugmabhedaṃ gaṇocchedaṃ yugmarkṣeṣu tu yat toyaṃ yugmāsu putrā jāyante yuṅkte samyag dvijottamāḥ yujyate paramaprītyā yujyante mṛtyunā saha yuñjann ātmānam ātmanā yuñjāmaḥ puruṣottamam yuñjīta satataṃ yogī yuddham āsīt samāsataḥ yuddham āsīn mahābalaiḥ yuddhasthaś ca bhaviṣyasi yuddhaṃ cakre tathā daityair yuddhaṃ cakre sa rājarāṭ yuddhaṃ sumahad apy āsīn yuddhaṃ hitvā kadācid bho yuddhāni pṛthivīkṣitām yuddhāya samupasthitam yuddhāyāgād ripūn prati yuddhe jitvāgrajaṃ śāntaṃ yuddhe jitvā ca rājānam yuddhe jitvāsurān balāt yuddhe mṛtyum upaiti yaḥ yuddhe sthitvā tu danujair yudhi mattaṃ kathaṃ hanyāṃ yudhiṣṭhirapurogamān yudhyataḥ kila bho dvijāḥ yudhyataḥ saha gopālair yudhyataḥ svedabindavaḥ yudhyamānas tato viṣṇur yudhyamāno yathāśakti yuyudhāte samaṃ tasya yuyudhānaś ca sātyakiḥ yuyudhe ca balenāsya yuyudhe ca mahābalaḥ yuyudhe tatra saṃkule yuyudhe tena jīvo api yuyudhe daityamallena yuyudhe bahavaḥ samāḥ yuyudhe amitavikramaḥ yuyudhe vāsudevas tu yuyudhe vāsudevena yuyudhe śaṃkaraś caiva yuyudhe śārṅgadhanvanā yuyudhe hariṇā saha yuvanāśvasya putrīṃ tu yuvanāśvasya putrīṃ tu yuvanāśvasya śāpena yuvanāśvo narādhipaḥ yuvayor garbham āviśat yuvayor ghātitā garbhā yuvayor duḥkham īdṛśam yuvayor hi kṛte vṛddhaḥ yuvarājo guṇākaraḥ yuvarājo aṅgadas tathā yuvarājyadharo jyeṣṭhaḥ yuvarājyam anuprāpte yuvā divyavapur naraḥ yuvānaṃ dehi putraṃ me yuvānaḥ pitaro yasya yuvāno mṛṣṭakuṇḍalāḥ yuvā mahābalo dhīmān yuvām ājñātum arhathaḥ yuvā rūpeṇa saṃpanna yuvā rūpeṇa saṃpannaḥ yuvā sa matimān dakṣo yuvāṃ gato asmi śaraṇam yuveva vasudevo abhūd yuṣmaccaraṇaśuśrūṣāṃ yuṣmatkāraṇakāraṇāt yuṣmattejomayena vai yuṣmatpādasulālitam yuṣmatsaṃtatijātānāṃ yuṣmatsaṃtatisaṃbhavaḥ yuṣmaddattavaro bāṇo yuṣmaddordaṇḍasaṃbuddhi- yuṣmabhyaṃ kathayiṣyāmi yuṣmabhyaṃ tad vadantu me yuṣmākam amṛtātmanā yuṣmākaṃ tejaso ardhena yuṣmākaṃ bhavitānaghāḥ yuṣmābhir mama daivatam yūthaśo vatsapālīś ca yūthikātagarais tathā yūthikām atimuktaṃ ca yūnāṃ ramyāṃ navāṃ navām yūpakarmasuniṣṭhitaḥ yūpapaśvādi cākarot yūparūpeṇa devarṣe yūpaṃ gaṅgodake akṣipat yūpaṃ cakraṃ dhruvāṃ darvīṃ yūpaṃ chedmi kṛtāntakaḥ yūpaṃ samit sruvaṃ somaṃ yūpāṃś ca śāstrapaṭhitān yūyam ekākinaḥ sthitāḥ yūyaṃ kṛtyāṃ tu brūta tām yūyaṃ sarve nimajjatha yūyaṃ sarve pṛthak pṛthak ye kadācid atikramam ye kurvanti narā bhaktyā ye kurvanty aniśaṃ snehaṃ ye kṣāntāḥ sarvabhūteṣu ye gaṅgāyām āplutā dharmaniṣṭhāḥ ye gacchanti sutāṃ snuṣām ye gacchanti sutāṃ snuṣām ye gatās te gatā gatāḥ ye gatāḥ punar anveṣṭuṃ ye gatāḥ sukham edhate ye agamyāgāmino mūḍhāḥ ye agamyāgāmino mūḍhāḥ ye guṇāḥ puruṣasyeha ye ghātayanti viprān gā ye ghātayanti viprān gā ye ca kṣīraṃ prayacchanti ye ca candrārkaraśmiṣu ye ca tatra tapaḥsiddhā ye ca tadbhāvitā loka ye ca tasmāt paraṃ gatāḥ ye ca dakṣiṇataḥ sthitāḥ ye ca dānaratāḥ śūrā ye ca dānaratāḥ śūrā ye ca dvijātipravarās ye ca paśyanti taṃ devaṃ ye ca bhaktyā prayacchanti ye ca bhūtādisaṃsthitāḥ ye ca mātur guṇās tathā ye ca māsopavāsaṃ tu ye ca māṃsaṃ na khādanti ye ca mohavaśaṃ gatāḥ ye ca yonyantaraṃ gatāḥ ye ca satyaṃ prabhāṣante ye ca saṃnidhivāsinaḥ ye ca svarlokavāsinaḥ ye cādantāḥ kule bālāḥ ye cādityadine prāpte ye cānye karmakāriṇaḥ ye cānye ca maharṣayaḥ ye cānye chedadāhakāḥ ye cānye tatra ghātitāḥ ye cānye tava deveśa ye cānye tava saṃśrayāḥ ye cānye dehasaṃsthitāḥ ye cānye narakaukasaḥ ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ ye cānye paripanthinaḥ ye cānye pānthakā gṛhe ye cānye mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ ye cānye vindhyanilayās ye cānye suraśatravaḥ ye cānye svargavāsinaḥ ye cānye svargavāsinaḥ ye cānyodvegadhāriṇaḥ ye cānyodvegadhāriṇaḥ ye cāpi svarge tiṣṭhanti ye ceme sahitāḥ punaḥ ye caiva gurutalpagāḥ ye acyutaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ ye janā guṇadarśinaḥ ye janā jagatāṃ nāthaṃ ye jalpanti sadānṛtam ye jñātaśāstrāḥ paramārthaniṣṭhāḥ ye jñānam etan munayo na saktāḥ ye ajñānino ye ca pāpā ye tatra kṛṣṇaṃ paśyanti ye tatra dānaṃ viprebhyaḥ ye tatra dānaṃ viprebhyaḥ ye tatra yātrāṃ kurvanti ye tatra haviṣo bhujaḥ ye tatrāsan munivarās ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ ye tannāmasahasreṇa ye taṃ paśyanti kāmāriṃ ye taṃ susūkṣmaṃ vimalā murāriṃ ye tiryaktvaṃ kule gatāḥ ye tilāṃs tiladhenuṃ ca ye tu taṃ dharmarājānaṃ ye tu tvāṃ vidhivad deva ye tu buddhiṃ parāṃ prāptā ye tu mūḍhā durācārā ye tu rāgaiḥ kaṭākṣaiś ca ye tu sāyaṃgṛhās tu te ye te narakagāminaḥ ye tyajanti kalevaram ye tyajanti kalevaram ye tv anye khyātimanto vai ye tvām āryeti durgeti ye tvāṃ nindanti mohitāḥ ye tvāṃ prapannāḥ śaraṇaṃ kṛpāluṃ ye daridrā bhavanti sma ye daridrāś ca rogiṇaḥ ye dānaśīlā na napuṃsakās te ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ ye dūṣayanti durvṛttās ye dharmavimukhā narāḥ ye dharmaśīlā na ta eva śocyāḥ ye dharmeṇānuvartinaḥ ye dhyāyanti sadā kṛṣṇaṃ yena kāryaṃ samudvahan yena kena ca hetunā yena kenāpy upāyena yena kenāpy upāyena yena kṣarākṣare bhinne yena gaṅgā talaṃ prāptā yena jātena loke asmin yena jeṣye ripuṃ prabho yena tad dhriyate kulam yena taptaṃ hi tat purā yena tuṣṭir abhūn mama yena te nihatā daityāḥ yena tenaiva yogena yena te śāntabuddhayaḥ yena trayīdharmam avekṣya pūrvaṃ yena tvayā tu vedārthā yena tvayā bhāratatailapūrṇaḥ yena tvaṃ doṣajātena yena tvaṃ satataṃ prabho yena tvām āviśat krodho yena tvām āviśat krodho yena dagdho jano nityaṃ yena daṃṣṭrāgravidhṛtā yena dānavarakṣobhyo yena divyasukhārthāya yena devamayaṃ kṛtvā yena na cyavate punaḥ yena puṃstvam avāpsyasi yena prakupito nātmā yena praśaṃsasi kṣetraṃ yena prasīdec caivāsau yena prāpa talaṃ viṣṇuḥ yena bhāryā kṛtodvāhā yena bhedo vihanyate ye na majjanti kasmiṃścit ye namanti narā nityaṃ ye namasyanti bhāskaram yena mucyeta deveśa yena yānti narāś ca tān yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥ yena yena vadāmi tat yena yena hi bhāvena ye narā narakadhvaṃsi- ye narā brahmacāriṇaḥ ye narāḥ kūṭasākṣiṇaḥ yena rohanti dehasthāḥ yena lokān kramair jitvā yena vartanti mānavāḥ yena vidhvaṃsitāḥ prajāḥ yena viprā vidhānena yena viśvam idaṃ vyāptam yena vai karmaṇā gatim yena vo harṣa āgataḥ yena samyag dvijottamāḥ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam yena saṃcoditā meghā yena saṃvardhitāḥ prajāḥ yena sṛṣṭiṃ samuddiśya yena saiṃhavapuḥ kṛtvā yena svargād ihāgatya yena svaṃ phalam aśnute ye na hiṃsanti kiṃcana yenākāri stutiḥ puṇyā yenākṣṇā hasitā pāpe yenākhilakulotsādo yenātitāpayām āsa yenātra vāmutra sukhaṃ na kiṃcit ye anāthā ye ca kṛpaṇā yenānantena karmaṇā yenānṛtāni noktāni yenānṛtāni noktāni yenāpy utpāditā garbhā yenārādhyata keśavaḥ yenāsau nṛpatis tatra yenāham ajitendriyaḥ yenāham apadehā vai yenāhaṃ karmaṇā siddha ye nindanti makhaṃ puṇyaṃ ye nṛpāḥ sarvadigbhāge yenedam āvṛtaṃ sarvam yenemam akṣarāhlādaṃ yenaiṣāṃ nāśitaṃ yaśaḥ yenoktā vai maharṣayaḥ yenopāyena puruṣas yenopāyena mucyante yenopāyena śakyeta ye annāni na prayacchanti ye nyāsādyapahartāro ye anye jagadupadravāḥ ye anye devā yajñabhāgasya yogyāḥ ye paṭhanti yatavratāḥ ye paśyanti tadā kṛṣṇaṃ ye paśyanti manīṣiṇaḥ ye paśyanti rathe sthitam ye paśyanti vibhuṃ stuvanti varadaṃ ye paśyanti sumedhasaḥ ye paśyanti suraśreṣṭhaṃ ye paśyanty avyayaṃ devaṃ ye pāpāni narāḥ kṛtvā ye api tiryaktvam āpannā ye piśācatvam āgatāḥ ye api syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ ye putrā jajñire śūrāḥ ye purāṇavido janāḥ ye pūjayanti taṃ devaṃ ye prayacchanti te yānti ye prayacchanti te yānti ye prayacchanti dharmajñāḥ ye prayacchanti vastrāṇi ye prayacchanti viprebhyas ye phalāni prayacchanti ye bālakaṃ mātṛpitṛprahīṇaṃ ye bālā yauvanonmattā ye bhāratenendriyaviprahīnāḥ yebhyas tv ayaṃ havir deyo ye magnā narakārṇave ye mahākulasaṃbhūtā ye māmakāiti ca japed ye māṃ tatrārcayiṣyanti ye mūḍhāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ ye mṛtāḥ puruṣottame ye mṛṣā na vadantīha ye yajanti dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ yeyaṃ prāpyā jagattraye ye ye tatra parājitāḥ ye ye duṣkṛtakarmāṇas ye arcayanti sadā bhaktyā ye arcayanti sadā bhaktyā ye arcayanti sadā harim ye lokān dhārayanti vai ye lokāḥ svargaloke tu ye vadanti ca pauruṣam ye vadanti ca pauruṣam ye vadanti sadāsatyaṃ ye avadhyā vajrapāṇinaḥ ye varjayanti paruṣaṃ ye vasanty utkale kṣetre ye vasanty utkale narāḥ ye vārghyaṃ saṃprayacchanti ye vāsmin varṣaparvatāḥ ye vidus tad ubhayaṃ kṛtākṛtam ye vai kālakṛtodyogāt ye vai bhāvena vartante ye śivaṃ śaraṇaṃ yātās ye śṛṇvanti paṭhanti ca ye aśraddadhānāḥ śivaliṅgapūjāṃ yeṣām atithayo gṛhāt yeṣām arthāya saṃgrāme yeṣāṃ ca pitaraḥ śaṃbho yeṣāṃ daśaratho rājā yeṣāṃ devakulāny atra yeṣāṃ dvau dvau caturdiśam yeṣāṃ dharmo na vidyate yeṣāṃ dharmyāḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ yeṣāṃ na jāyate bhaktir yeṣāṃ na pravaṇaṃ cittaṃ yeṣāṃ na bhaktir bhavatīha kṛṣṇe yeṣāṃ pāpeṣu vā yataḥ yeṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca yeṣāṃ pradhānāḥ satataṃ yeṣāṃ prabhāvaṃ jānāti yeṣāṃ prasanno giriśas yeṣāṃ vāpyaś ca kūpāś ca yeṣāṃ śāntir na vidyate yeṣāṃ suliṅgāni ca kīrtitāni yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇo yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇo yeṣu pañcasu bhūteṣu ye sadānṛtavādinaḥ ye sadānṛtavādinaḥ ye samānā iti japan ye samudre nadīdurge ye sarvakālaṃ tatraiva ye saṃśrayanti cānantaṃ ye saṃśrayanti manujās ye snātvā devam īśvaram ye smaranti janārdanam ye smariṣyanti mānavāḥ ye svāmimitralokārthe ye svāmimitralokārthe ye hatāḥ savyasācinā ye hatvā prāṇinaṃ mūḍhāḥ ye haranti durātmānaḥ ye haranti durātmānaḥ ye haranti parastrīṇāṃ ye haranti parastrīṇāṃ ye hi dīrghāyuṣaḥ śūrāḥ yair ahaṃ vardhito nityaṃ yair dattāni tu dānāni yair dattāni dvijātibhyas yair dravyais tad vadāmy aham yair vyāptaṃ sacarācaram yair vyāptā pṛthivī sarvā yaiva saiva ca viprendrāḥ yais tu dattaṃ hutaṃ ceṣṭaṃ yaiḥ kṛtaḥ kṣīravikrayaḥ yaiḥ prakāśaṃ jahāsa saḥ yaiḥ svadharmaparair nātha yoktavyaṃ havyakavyeṣu yoktraṃ ca paśubandhanam yo akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva yoga eṣa hi lokānāṃ yogakṛtyaṃ tu bho viprāḥ yogakṛtyaṃ tu yogānāṃ yogakṛtyaṃ mahārāja yogakṣeme athavā prabho yogacyutān nirīkṣyaiva yo gatir dharmayuktānām yogatīrthaṃ somatīrthaṃ yogadarśanam etāvad yogadarśanam eva tat yogadoṣān samucchidya yogadoṣān samucchidya yogadharmam avāpya saḥ yogadhārāś ca suvratāḥ yoganidrā mahāmāyā yoganidrā yaśodāyās yoganidrāṃ samāsthāya yoganidrāṃ samāsthitaḥ yogabandhena yuktavān yogabhraṣṭā nipatitā yogabhraṣṭā bhaviṣyadhvaṃ yogabhraṣṭā vicetasaḥ yogabhraṣṭāṃś ca viśveśās yogam aṣṭāṅgam ācakhyāv yogamātā ca khecarī yogamāyām imāṃ martyās yogamāyāsahasrākṣo yogamāyāṃ samāsthāya yogamārgaṃ samāsādya yogamārgo yathānyāyaṃ yogamālābalānvitaḥ yogam āsthāya gopate yogam āsthāya sarve te yogayukto abhavat pādaṃ yogavidyābalena tam yogasiddhā jagat kṛtsnam yogasiddhibhir āvṛtaḥ yogasiddhiḥ prakāśitā yogasyāmitatejasaḥ yogahīnā mahānadīm yogaṃ kuryād balaṃ prāpya yogaṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ prāpya yogaṃ tadvat suniścalam yogaṃ pāśupataṃ prāpya yogaṃ pāśupataṃ prāpya yogaṃ prāpya hareḥ paścāt yogaṃ yuñjīta karhicit yogaṃ raveḥ samāsādya yogaṃ vakṣyāmi bho viprāḥ yogaṃ vivasvataḥ prāpya yogaṃ śaṃbhor varaṃ prāpya yogaṃ samyaṅ manīṣiṇaḥ yogaḥ prokto vimuktidaḥ yogaḥ satyaṃ tapaḥ śraddhā yogāt tathyam apaśyata yogātmā harir īśvaraḥ yogād yogabalānvitāḥ yogād yogīśvarasyeva yogādhāras tathā somas yogādhārā hi pitaras yogādhipataye namaḥ yogānām api vai parān yogān nodvijate manaḥ yogān yogaviduttamāḥ yogān sa sarvān anubhūya martyā yogābhyasanam eva ca yogābhyāsaḥ śivārcanam yogārūḍheva sā babhau yogāvāsa namo astu te yogās te tu sudurlabhāḥ yogāsthiroditān doṣān yogāṃś ca vividhān dvijāḥ yogigamyāya te namaḥ yogicintyāya yogine yogitvād arjuno abhavat yoginaś ca tadā śrāddhe yoginaś cāpy asaṃkhyātās yoginaṃ viśvakṛd bhavaḥ yoginaḥ sarvakarmasu yogināṃ gurave namaḥ yogino naiva somapāḥ yogino yogadehāś ca yogīndravṛttanilayāya sudurvidāya yogī balam avāpnuyāt yogī balam avāpnuyāt yogī balam avāpnuyāt yogī balam avāpnuyāt yogī balam avāpnoti yogī mucyeta nānyathā yogī yogavidāṃ varaḥ yogī yogena vahniṃ ca yogīśvaraniṣevitam yogīśvarāya śuddhāya yogī saṃdṛśyate nṛbhiḥ yo gurur nānuśāsti vai yo gurur nānuśāsti vai yo gurus taṃ vrajāmy aham yo gṛhṇāti mayā dattāṃ yogena ramate ca yaḥ yogenābhyupasṛtya ca yogenaiva tayor viprās yogeśvarasya purato yogeṣu ca mahātmasu yoge sthitvāham apy etat yogaiśvaryapradāya ca yo agnir bhūtvā saṃharati yo agniḥ sūryaḥ sa ucyate yogyābharaṇasaṃpadā yo jaghāna ca śambaram yo jajñe vīrudhāṃ patir yojanadvitayaṃ sārdhaṃ yojanaṃ pādahīnaṃ ca yojanānāṃ tūpari tu yojanānāṃ tripañcāśan yojanānāṃ dvijottamāḥ yojanānāṃ niśākarāt yojanānāṃ mahāpurī yojanānāṃ śatadvaye yojanānāṃ śataṃ lakṣaṃ yojanānāṃ śataṃ sāgraṃ yojanānāṃ śatair api yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ ca yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ vai yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi yojanāni caturviṃśan yojanāni mahāmune yojanāni mahodadhim yojanāntarnivāsinaḥ yojanāntaḥsthitāñ jīvān yojanāyutam ucchritāḥ yojanāyutam ucchritāḥ yojanāyutavistāraṃ yojanāyutavistīrṇaṃ yojanāyutavistṛtam yojanāyutavistṛtaḥ yojanāyutavistṛtāḥ yojanārdhaṃ tadardhakam yojanais tasya cocchrayaḥ ayojayad yajñakarmaṇi yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān yo jātas tv apsu bhāmini yotsyate te vijeṣyanti yo dadāti guḍonmiśrāṃs yo dadāti dvijaśreṣṭha yo dadyād āśrayaṃ bhrātuḥ yo dadyād bhaktimān naraḥ yo dadhāra cakāra ca yo dīpayati vahninā yo dṛṣṭvā gautamītaṭe yo devi divase ṣaṣṭhe yo devo viśvatomukhaḥ yoddhāro baladarpitāḥ yoddhukāmau durādharṣau yo dharmo yatra śasyate yo dharṣayati mohitaḥ yodhānāṃ prathamo nṛpaḥ yodhair api ca vikrāntaiḥ yo na kuryāt pratikriyām yo anantarūpo akhilaviśvarūpo yo anantaḥ paṭhyate siddhair yo anantaḥ pṛthivīṃ dhatte yo naraḥ prayataḥ smaret yo na seveta tan naraḥ yo anādiś ca tv anantaś ca yonidvāraṃ ca dhenukam yonipātāladustarām yonipratigrahādānaiḥ yoniś ca saritāṃ pate yoniṣu ca vicitrāsu yoniṣu vartamānena yoniṃ prāpto asmi dāruṇām yo anupaśyati sa pretya yo netre āhariṣyati yo nainaṃ vetti tattvataḥ yo no dadyāj jalāñjalim yo antakāle jagat pītvā yo antaṃ na ca vinaśyati yonyantare duḥkham upāśnute asau yo anyasyāḥ phalam aśnan vai yo apanihnoti mānavaḥ yo bhakṣayati durmatiḥ yo bhavaty avyayo vyāpī yo bhuṅkte yas tu gacchati yo bhūtas tatra vṛttānto yo bhojam abhito vrajet yo abhyupāyaḥ kuruṣva tam yo bhrātṛmātsaryakaṣāyabuddhiḥ yo madvākyaṃ nābhinandet yo mayā nirjitas tyaktvā yo mātaraṃ sarasair nṛtyagītais yo mātur utsaṅgagato atha mātrā yo mām utthāpayen mando yo māṃ nāśayituṃ śaktaḥ yo amūrtaḥ sa paro jñeyo yo mohān nopatiṣṭhate yo yajñasādhanaṃ yāmi yo yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ yo ayaṃ dīpto mahātejā yo ayaṃ dehe pravartate yo ayaṃ bala niveditaḥ yo ayaṃ brahmarṣitāṃ gataḥ yo ayaṃ mene akṣakovidam yo yāti kaitavasabhāṃ yo yogibhuktaśeṣān no yo yo dadāti bahulaṃ yo yo aśvarathanāgāḍhyaḥ yo raśmibhis tu dhamate yo rāmaḥ sa hṛṣīkeśo yo rudraḥ sarvam eva tat yo rudraḥ sa svayaṃ viṣṇur yo roṣo abhūn mamānagha yo arcayet svapitṝn bhaktyā yo arcāṃ harau nityam atīva kṛtvā yo arthān arjayate sutaḥ yo līlayā viśvam idaṃ cakāra yo līlayā viśvam idaṃ cakāra yo avatiṣṭhati so acalaḥ yo vāpi smarate tu tat yo vā bhavati bhaktitaḥ yo vāruṇyā ca mūrtayā yo vighnapāśaṃ ca kareṇa bibhrat yo vidyāt sacarācarām yo vipanno na tīrthāni yo virāḍ ucyate vede yo viśiṣṭaś ca bhūtebhyas yo viśvagoptā sadasatpraṇetā yo viśvarūpaḥ sadasatparo yaḥ yo viśvarūpaḥ sadasatparo yaḥ yo viṣṇuḥ sa maheśvaraḥ yo veda sarvaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhaviṣyad yoṣic chuśrūṣaṇād bhartuḥ yoṣitaś ca vivarjayet yoṣitaṃ vīkṣya tapyate yoṣitaḥ sakalā api yoṣitā pratyayaṃ jagmur yoṣitām abhavad varā yoṣitāṃ kim adeyaṃ hi yoṣitāṃ jīvanena kim yoṣitāṃ durvilasitaṃ yoṣitkṣetre arpitaṃ bījaṃ yoṣidbhiḥ ko na khaṇḍitaḥ yoṣidbhiḥ sumanoharaiḥ yoṣidbhyo yadi dīyate yoṣin mohāya nirmitā yo asi so asi jagannātha yo asi so asi namo astu te yo asau cārṇavamadhyastho yo asau cintāṃ kariṣyati yo asau tava makhaṃ prāpto yo asau purāṇe vedānte yo asau prāṇāntiko rogas yo asau bāhusahasreṇa yo asau mama pitā prabhuḥ yo asau sadasadātmakaḥ yo asau sarvagato devas yo asau saṃharate devas yo asmān dadāti gaṅgāyāṃ yo asmān dadāti viprebhyas yo asmān dadāti viprebhyas yo asmān dadāti viprebhyas yo asyāṃ prajātaḥ sa tu putra eva yo aham ajñānasaṃmohād yo aham atrābhavaṃ saktaḥ yo aham aṃśāvatīrṇasya yo hariṃ cābhivādayet yo hareta vasuṃdharām yo ahaṃ kālanimajjanaḥ yo ahaṃ na so aham ity ukto yo ahaṃ bālo akṛtāśramaḥ yo ahaṃ magna imaṃ punaḥ yo ahaṃ sa tvaṃ jagac cedaṃ yo ahaṃ suptaṃ na jānāmi yo ahaṃ so aham iti jñātvā yo hi nācarate dharmaṃ yo hi māṃ draṣṭum iccheta yo hi yāsyati puṇyārthī yo hi yoddhā raṇaṃ yāti yo hi vede ca śāstre ca yau kuṅkumena svaśarīrajena yau devavṛndeṣu mahotsave tu yaudheyās tu nṛgasya ha yauvanasthāṃ punaḥ sādhvīm yauvanasthais tathaiva ca yauvanasthais tathaiva ca yauvanaṃ tad vṛthā jñeyaṃ yauvanāśvena samare yauvanena tavānagha yauvane yāni bhogyāni yauvane vartamāno api raktacandanavāriṇā raktacandanasaṃmiśrā raktacandanasaṃmiśrai raktacandanasaṃyutam raktanīlotpalaiḥ kāntaiḥ raktapuṣpaṃ sadarbhaṃ ca raktapuṣpaiḥ śucir naraḥ raktamālyāmbaradharaṃ raktamālyāmbaradharo raktavāsās tathaiva ca raktasrāvamahāpaṅkāṃ raktākṣaḥ krodhanaś caiva raktāṅgulitalau pādau raktāśokapraśākhottha- raktaiś ca raktāni bhṛśaṃ kṛtāni raktotpalāgracaraṇā rakto dvāparam āsādya rakṣakaṃ ca hariṃ kṛtvā rakṣaṇaṃ cāpasavyataḥ rakṣaṇāya jagadgurum rakṣaṇāya yamasya hi rakṣaṇāyopatasthire rakṣatu tvām aśeṣāṇāṃ rakṣatu tvāṃ mahīdharaḥ rakṣate devadānavāt rakṣate bhagavān devo rakṣatv avyāhataiśvaryas rakṣa nātha svakaṃ bhṛtyaṃ rakṣanti sarvatra diśo rakṣantīm anujagmus te rakṣantīṃ tāṃ mahāprājñāḥ rakṣantu te ca māṃ nityaṃ rakṣantu vārttāṃ kuruta rakṣantu sarve api ca bhūtasaṃghās rakṣa māṃ brāhmaṇaṃ munim rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo ahaṃ rakṣayiṣyati ko atra mām rakṣasāṃ nigrahāya ca rakṣase bhaya āgate rakṣas tvaṃ dānavo athavā rakṣasva deveśvara rākṣasebhyaḥ rakṣasva śaṃbho kṛtyāsmān rakṣasvārtaṃ jaganmātar rakṣaḥkarma nyavedayan rakṣaḥkṛtyaṃ nyavedayan rakṣaḥ prāha tadā mudā rakṣākarmaṇy avasthitā rakṣā bhavati nityaśaḥ rakṣā yogavidā sadā rakṣārthaṃ nirmitā hi te rakṣārthaṃ praviveśa ha rakṣā vaḥ kriyate mayā rakṣāṃ karoṣy eva madājñayā ca rakṣāṃsi kopena yutāni sadyaḥ rakṣāṃsi śvāpadāni ca rakṣiṇaḥ sahasotthitāḥ rakṣiṇo gṛhakarmiṇaḥ rakṣiṇo yoganidrayā rakṣitavyaṃ yatātmanā rakṣitaṃ dharmakarmaṇā rakṣitaṃ yad anekaśaḥ rakṣitaṃ śastrasaṃghaiś ca rakṣitā bhavatā striyaḥ rakṣitāro dvijottamāḥ rakṣitāro mahābalāḥ rakṣibhiś ca surakṣitāḥ rakṣiṣyati ca sevanāt rakṣisainyaṃ nikṛtyobhau rakṣet kṣetraṃ ca saṃvidam rakṣet sarvam upadravam rakṣed dārāṃs tyajed īrṣyāṃ rakṣemān vibudhān svayam rakṣogaṇasamanvitaḥ rakṣobhāvān mātṛdoṣād rakṣobhir atibhīṣaṇe rakṣyatāṃ me tvayā yajñaḥ rakṣyo vipraḥ prayatnataḥ raghavaḥ prārthanābhaṅgaṃ raghur nāmnā suto abhavat raṅgadvāram upāgatau raṅgamadhye mahābalaḥ raṅgamadhye samīpagaḥ raṅgopajīvinaḥ sarve raṅgopajīvī kaivartaḥ racitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā raja uddhūyate mahat rajakasya śiro bhuvi rajakaṃ raṅgakārakam rajakāś ca sahasraśaḥ rajataṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā rajanyāḥ paścime yāme rajasaś ca guṇān punaḥ rajasaḥ paramāṃ gatim rajasaḥ putram acyutam rajasā tamasā caiva rajasā tamaso vṛttiṃ rajasā rājasāṃś caiva rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca rajas tamasi saṃmagnaṃ rajas tasyā guṇaḥ sargaṃ rajasvalāṃ tathā paścāc rajaḥ sattvaṃ tathā saktaṃ rajiputro aham ity uktvā rajir āttāyudhaḥ prabhuḥ rajiṃ vai devadānavāḥ rajiḥ putraśatānīha rajo agnir aśvagochāyā rajo navaguṇaṃ tathā rajo vahati viprendrāḥ rajjubandhanavahniṣu rajjuvastrādikāni ca rajjuṃ kṛtvā tu vāsukim rajjūnām atha vāsasām rajjvā daṇḍena vā punaḥ raṇadṛptaṃ babhūva ha raṇadhṛṣṭaḥ pratāpavān raṇaṃ hitvā mahāsuraḥ raṇe cābhimukho hataḥ raṇe vā devane vāpi raṇeṣu purataḥ sthitam raṇeṣv abhimukhaḥ sadā raṇe saumitriṇā saha rataṃ gopāyitaṃ bhavet ratikānta namas te astu ratir yasya sadātmani ratnakūṭā ca tā daśa ratnadūṣayitā ca yaḥ ratnaparvatam āruhya ratnapūrṇām imāṃ naraḥ ratnabhūtā ca kanyeyaṃ ratnam ādāya cottamam ratnamālākulaṃ divyaṃ ratnamūlakam eva ca ratnahārayutaṃ ramyaṃ ratnahārāvalambitām ratnahāreṇa bhrājatā ratnākarāḥ samudrāś ca ratnānāṃ dhanadhānyānām ratnāni narakāvāsāj ratnāni maṇayaś citrā ratnāni vividhāni ca ratnāni vividhāni ca ratnāny anekāny ādāya ratnāny ādāya cārṇavāt ratnāny ādāya satvaraḥ ratnāny ādāya sarvaśaḥ ratnāpahnavakārakāḥ ratne copakṣayaṃ gate ratnair anyair alaṃkṛtam ratnair divyair alaṃkṛtam ratnair yutāṃ puṇyaguṇaiḥ supūrṇām ratnaiś ca vividhair divyair ratnaiḥ prasphuramāṇāni ratyartham atisaṃyogād ratyā ca sahitaḥ kāmaḥ ratyā saha samāgatam rathanemim arā iva ratham abhyāgataḥ punaḥ ratham āruhya govindas ratham āruhya satvaraḥ ratham āropayām āsa rathamukhyo vidūrathaḥ rathavidyāṃ gajodbhavām rathasthas tadvadhodyataḥ rathasthaṃ pārthivaṃ rāmaḥ rathasyopari saṃsthitau rathaṃtaraṃ sāma gāyanti mahyam rathaṃ paramabhāsvaram rathādyair bhuktir uttamā rathān āruhya śīghragān rathānāṃ meghaghoṣāṇāṃ rathārūḍho gatavyathaḥ rathāṃś ca rathināṃ varaḥ rathinaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ rathibhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam rathī dvīpān anucaran rathena yamunātaṭam rathena rathināṃ varaḥ rathena rathināṃ śreṣṭhas rathena vijayī rājā rathe nāge sa dhanuṣi rathenādityavarcasā rathenaiko viśāmy aham rathair nāgaiḥ padātaiś ca rathair vimānasaṃkāśair rathair vimānasaṃkāśaiḥ rathaiś caiva kareṇubhiḥ rathopastham upāviśat rathyāgataṃ ca tailādi rathyāgamanavijñānaṃ rathyāpaṇavatī ramyā rathyāpasarpaṇe snāne rathyāpradeśeṣv api yatra kutra randhrāgatam athāśvānāṃ ramaṇīyānṛtātmanām ramaṇīye nagottame ramate vigatajvaraḥ ramante tatra vā na vā ramamāṇas tadomayā ramamāṇaṃ sahoṣayā ramamāṇā yathāsaukhyaṃ ramayanta upāsate ramayanti ratipriyāḥ ramayantyaś ca tāḥ striyaḥ ramayaṃś ca rarāma ca ramase tad aniṣṭaṃ hi ramitvā nandanādiṣu rambhā cāpsarasāṃ varā rambhātilottamādyāś ca rambhātilottamādyāś ca rambhāṃ cāpi tilottamām rambho anapatyas tv āsīc ca rambho rajir anenāś ca ramyakaṃ cottaraṃ varṣaṃ ramyarūpam avāpsyati ramyaṃ gītadhvaniṃ śrutvā ramyaṃ tālavanaṃ gatau ramyaṃ tālavanaṃ babhau ramyaṃ vṛndāvanaṃ vanam ramyāṇy ādāya vādyāni ramyāṃ niveśayām āsa ramyāṃ niveśayām āsa ramyāṃ manojñāṃ śaśikhaṇḍamauleḥ ramye śrīpuruṣottame rarakṣa kṣatrapūrvajaḥ rarāja rājādhikalakṣyamūrtiḥ rarāja vāmahaste asya rarāja sa muniḥ śrīmān rarāma madhusūdanaḥ rarāma rāsagoṣṭhībhir ravicandramasor yāvan ravicandrasamāgame ravir dvādaśabhis teṣāṃ raviṃ draṣṭuṃ na yānti ca raver dvādaśa mūrtayaḥ raver bhaktisamanvitaḥ raveḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇām raśmayaḥ pavano mahī raśmijālam ivādityas raśmibhir dīpyate sadā raśmimālī jagatpatiḥ rasa ity abhidhīyate rasatanmātrasaṃkṣayāt rasantī rasanā bhavet rasamūlena karmaṇā rasavṛttau sthito yasmān rasaṃ gandhaṃ ca pañcamam rasaṃ rasāyanaṃ caiva rasāc choṇitasaṃbhūtiḥ rasātalagataṃ payaḥ rasātalagataṃ payaḥ rasātalagataṃ vāri rasātalagatāni ca rasātalagatā ye ca rasātalatalaṃ mune rasātalatale sthitam rasātalatale sthitān rasātalanivāsinaḥ rasātalapatitvaṃ ca rasātalapatiḥ prabhuḥ rasātalabhavaṃ gāṅgaṃ rasātalabhavaṃ gāṅgaṃ rasātalabhavaṃ gāṅgaṃ rasātalabhavā gaṅgā rasātalam athābhyagāt rasātalam athāviśat rasātalam atho gatvā rasātalam atho yāsye rasātalam anudviṣam rasātalam anu dviṣaḥ rasātalam anuprāptaḥ rasātalam anuprāptā rasātalasthāñ śatrūṃś ca rasātalaṃ tato abhīṣṭaṃ rasātalaṃ tvayā dattaṃ rasātalaṃ dadus tasmai rasātalaṃ mithuṃ nandī rasātalaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ rasātalād yatra devo rasātale caturdhaiva rasātale hayo baddha rasātale hariḥ sthāpya rasānāṃ pravaraṃ rasam rasālaḥ syān na nimbasya rasikatvāt priyatvāc ca rasiko rasam uttamam rasena teṣāṃ vikhyātā rasaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samanvitam raso gandhas tathaiva ca raso atha rasanaṃ svedo rahasyadharmaṃ vaktavyaṃ rahasyam ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ rahasyam etat paramaṃ rahasyaṃ dharmam uttamam rahasyaṃ puruṣottamam rahasyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ rahasyaṃ sarvavedānām rahasyāni śubhāni ca rahasy evam ahaṃ dūtaḥ rahaḥ sthitvā punaḥ punaḥ rahaḥ sthitvā viniśvasan rahogatā uvācedaṃ raho vacanam abravīt rahovācaṃ kathaṃ vade rākā ca dhiṣaṇā caiva rākāras teja ity āhur rākāraṃ nābhideśe tu rākāraṃ mūrdhni cintayet rākṣasatvād vinirmukto rākṣasas tatsuto nāma rākṣasas tasya vacanād rākṣasasya tu tat karma rākṣasasya madhoḥ putro rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahābalam rākṣasaṃ pāpanilayam rākṣasaṃ brāhmaṇo bhūtvā rākṣasaḥ pratyuvāca tam rākṣasā daityadanujāḥ rākṣasā daityadānavāḥ rākṣasādyair gṛhītā vā rākṣasānāṃ tu vikṛtiṃ rākṣasānāṃ purābhavat rākṣasānāṃ mamāpi ca rākṣasān ūcire tadā rākṣasān dānavān hatvā rākṣasān māyayā yuktān rākṣasā baladarpitāḥ rākṣasā bahurūpiṇaḥ rākṣasā māyayā yutāḥ rākṣasā yajñanāśinaḥ rākṣasā laṅkavāsinaḥ rākṣasā vairiṇo abhavan rākṣasāś ca mahāraudrāḥ rākṣasāś cāpi loke asmin rākṣasās te rasātalam rākṣasāṃś ca balīyasaḥ rākṣasāḥ pradravanti ca rākṣasāḥ preṣitā yataḥ rākṣasāḥ satvarās tadā rākṣasāḥ santu śatravaḥ rākṣasāḥ samupāgaman rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī rākṣasī pāparūpiṇī rākṣasīṃ tāṃ puraskṛtya rākṣase tu gate dhīmān rākṣasena vidhānena rākṣasena samīritam rākṣasebhyo bhayaṃ ghoram rākṣasair guhyakiṃnaraiḥ rākṣasair bhakṣyamāṇās te rākṣasair bhakṣyamāṇās te rākṣasaiś ca tadā dattaṃ rākṣasaiś ca mahāsattvair rākṣasaiḥ sā kuśasthalī rākṣaso bhasmasād abhūt rākṣasau dharmakaṇṭakau rākṣasau bhīmavikramau rākṣasau hanmy apūrṇe tu rākṣasyāṃ rākṣasās tu te rāgagrāhākule raudre rāgadveṣajhaṣākule rāgadveṣavivarjitāḥ rāgaṃ cakre ca tatra sā rāgaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃprāptaṃ rāgaṃ mohaṃ tathā snehaṃ rāgādīni pravartante rāgonmattā vidharmiṇaḥ rāgo mohaḥ śamaḥ kṣamā rāghavo hi mahābalaḥ rāṅkavāstaraṇāni ca rāṅkavāstaraṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ rājakanyāpi māṃ dṛṣṭvā rājakāryaniyukto vā rājakāryahite rataḥ rājagrāmair vimucyate rājacaurāgnidaṇḍādi- rājataṃ bhājanaṃ hṛtvā rājadviṣṭāni sevate rājan daśaratha śrīman rājan pratimayā tvaṃ me rājanyavaiśyahā caiva rājanyasya ca vaiśyoktaṃ rājan yāvan mamāgatiḥ rājaputra varaṃ dehi rājaputrāḥ susaṃyatāḥ rājaputri bhaviṣyati rājaputryā asaṃśayam rājaputryāṃ tu vidvāṃsau rājabhāryāṃ tathaiva ca rājamañceṣu cārūḍhāḥ rājamadhye nṛpātmajaḥ rājamārgam upāgatau rājamārgaḥ suvistīrṇo rājamārge tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ rājamāṣāṃś ca caṇakān rājarājasya dhīmataḥ rājarṣibhiḥ puṇyatamair rājarṣir abhavan nṛpaḥ rājarṣir dhundhumāraṇe rājarṣiviṣayāṃs tathā rājarṣīṇām anuṣṭhitaḥ rājarṣīṃś ca paraṃtapān rājavartiṣu pāpeṣu rājavṛttisthitāś caurā rājasān aśubhān gandhāṃs rājasā mānuṣān atha rājasiṃhena pālitā rājasiṃhena bho dvijāḥ rājasiṃho mahābhujaḥ rājasūyaphalaṃ samyag rājasūyam avāpa saḥ rājasūyaśatasya ca rājasūyābhiṣiktas tu rājasūyābhiṣiktānām rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ rājahaṃsanibhaiḥ śubhraiś rājahaṃsanibhaiḥ śubhraiḥ rājaṃs tava punaḥ punaḥ rājaṃs tava samīhitam rājā indrasakho abhavat rājā kopasamanvitaḥ rājāgantā purodhasā rājā gurum abhāṣata rājāṅghridhyānatatparaḥ rājā cābhayado nāma rājā cintām upeyivān rājā taṃ pratyabhāṣata rājā tu parayā mudā rājā tv antaḥpuraṃ tathā rājā daṇḍadharo yamaḥ rājādayas tena nītās rājā daśarathas tv iti rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān rājā daśaratho dvijaiḥ rājā daśaratho nṛpaḥ rājādibhyaḥ samudrebhyo rājā diviratho abhavat rājā dhanvantarir yataḥ rājā dharmārthakovidaḥ rājā dharmārthakovidaḥ rājādhidevasya sutā rājādhidevaḥ śūras tu rājādhidevī ca tathā rājānam atitejasam rājānam amṛtātmakam rājānam avadat tadā rājānam iti tac chrutvā rājānam idam abravīt rājā nalasakho balī rājānaś cauraśīlinaḥ rājānaṃ cakame ca sā rājānaṃ taṃ dvijaḥ prāha rājānaṃ taṃ mithur daityo rājānaṃ dehi deveśa rājānaṃ prītivardhanam rājānaṃ bhūritejasam rājānaṃ bhūritejasam rājānaṃ bhūridakṣiṇam rājānaṃ mṛgayākulam rājānaṃ rājapatnīṃ ca rājānaṃ vanavāsaṃ ca rājānaṃ varuṇaṃ tadā rājānaṃ sapurodhasam rājānaṃ sānvagacchata rājānaṃ surasattama rājānaṃ so abhyaṣecayat rājānaṃ so abhyaṣecayat rājānaṃ so abhyaṣecayat rājānaṃ so abhyaṣecayat rājānaḥ karṇavedinaḥ rājānaḥ kīrtitā mayā rājānaḥ pūrayām āsur rājānaḥ śāsakā vayam rājānaḥ satyaṃ kṛṇvānā rājā nīto yamānugaiḥ rājā naiva ca dattavān rājā naivety abhāṣata rājāno bhūritejasaḥ rājāno yogadharmiṇaḥ rājāntaḥpurayoṣitaḥ rājāntike sthitā subhrūḥ rājā pañcajano nāma rājā paramatejasvī rājā paramadhārmikaḥ rājā paramadhārmikaḥ rājā paramadhārmikaḥ rājāpāpo bhaviṣyati rājāpi narake sthitaḥ rājāpi varuṇaṃ prāha rājāpi varuṇaṃ prāha rājā punas tān uvāca rājā prāgāt sutau prati rājā prāha tv apāṃpatim rājā prītyā tadorvaśīm rājā bṛhadiṣus tadā rājā bhadrarathaḥ smṛtaḥ rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ rājābhavat pṛthuḥ śrīmān rājābhūj janakaḥ purā rājā mitrasaho abhavat rājā ayaṃ durmanāḥ kānte rājā rājye narādhipaḥ rājā vanacaraḥ sadā rājā vanacaraiḥ saha rājā vidyāṃ punar japet rājā veṇuhayas tathā rājā venakarodbhavaḥ rājā sanmatimān bhuvi rājā samastatīrthānāṃ rājā sarvaguṇākaraḥ rājā sarvaguṇānvitaḥ rājāsīc chāśibindavaḥ rājāsīt kāñcanaprabhaḥ rājāsīt priyadarśanaḥ rājāsīd atidhārmikaḥ rājāsīd rājasattamaḥ rājāsau krodhamūrchitaḥ rājā syāt pṛthivītale rājā syāl lokapūjitaḥ rājā hṛṣṭaḥ pradattavān rājendro dadhivāhanaḥ rājeyam iti vikhyātaṃ rājña ūrau tu jajñivān rājñaś ca pṛthivīśvarān rājñaś caiva śubhān varān rājñas tasya jagatpate rājñas tasya purodhasaḥ rājñas tasya mahāmakhe rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājñas tejasvino dvijāḥ rājñas tridhanvanas tv āsīd rājñaḥ kṛtyaṃ purohitaḥ rājñaḥ pārīkṣitasya ha rājñaḥ putraḥ sarpa iti rājñaḥ purohito bhṛtyo rājñaḥ pūrṇo abhavat kratuḥ rājñā tena mahātmanā rājñā pālyā iti śrutiḥ rājñā balavatā tv aham rājñā śvetena bho dvijāḥ rājñā saha pitā tava rājñāṃ vaiśravaṇaṃ patim rājñāṃ santi janeśvara rājñi dīkṣāyamāṇe tu rājñe caiva yathākramam rājñe devo maheśvaraḥ rājño aṅkaṃ cāruroha sā rājño daśarathasya hi rājño daśarathasya hi rājño duḥkhāturasya ca rājño baddhān sa sarvān vai rājño bāhusahasrasya rājño bhāryā niścayāya rājño bhāryā purodhasaḥ rājño matiṃ viditvā tu rājyatṛṣṇāvivarjite rājyaprāptiṃ priyān sutān rājyabhāraṃ sute nyasya rājyabhraṣṭo vanaṃ prāptaḥ rājyam āsādya sugatiṃ rājyam urvī balaṃ kośo rājyam etad ayādavam rājyalobhena mohena rājyasya sthirabhāvāya rājyaṃ kṛtvā tathā paraḥ rājyaṃ kṛtvā yathocitam rājyaṃ kṛtvā suvistaram rājyaṃ kośaṃ balaṃ caiva rājyaṃ kramāyātam avāpya hṛṣṭaḥ rājyaṃ tattanayā rajeḥ rājyaṃ tasya prayacchati rājyaṃ prāpa sutāt svakāt rājyaṃ prāpte tu tatsute rājyaṃ prāpya kuśasthalīm rājyaṃ prāpya mahāyaśāḥ rājyaṃ laṅkādhipatyaṃ ca rājyaṃ vaḥ pradadāmy aham rājyaṃ sa kārayām āsa rājyāt prabhraśyate nātha rājyāt prabhraśyase hare rājyāny akhilabhūbhujām rājyāmṛtam upāsya ca rājyārthe vigraho abhavat rājyena jīvitenāpi rājyena saha deyeyam rājye parīkṣitaṃ kṛtvā rājye abhiṣiktaḥ kṛṣṇena rājye abhiṣicya paścāt tam rājye sve yavaneśvaraḥ rātrijāgaraṇaṃ mayā rātrijāgaraṇe viṣṇuṃ rātriś caitāvatī rājan rātrīr atho yāma vṛtās tv ayodhyām rātrau kṛtvā prajāgaram rātrau ca kṛṣṇaṃ punar utthitā ye rātrau ca pradadau stanam rātrau taṃ maṇim ādāya rātrau nityaṃ sa maudgaliḥ rātrau sarpo abravīt priyām rātryavasāne yā gītā rāma eko abhavad bhartā rāmakṛṣṇau dadarśātha rāmakṛṣṇau mahābalau rāmakṛṣṇau yathā pūrvaṃ rāmakeśavayor vraje rāmakeśavayoḥ punaḥ rāmatīrtham iti khyātaṃ rāmatīrtham udāhṛtam rāmatīrthaṃ pitṛvanaṃ rāmadāmodarau tataḥ rāmaputrāv ubhau śūrau rāmaputrau yaśasvinau rāma rāma mahābāho rāmarūpāya kalkine rāmaś ca jāmbavāṃś caiva rāmaś cādbhutavikramaḥ rāmas tava sutaḥ śrīmān rāmas tān abravīt surān rāmas tāvat tasya pitā rāmas tuṣṭāva śaṃkaram rāmas tau pṛṣṭhato abhyetya rāmas tyajati tāṃ priyām rāmasya ca muniśreṣṭha rāmasya caritaṃ sarvaṃ rāmasya ca subhadrāyāḥ rāmasya tanayo jajñe rāmasya prapitāmahaḥ rāmasyālokya cānanam rāmasyopari cikṣipuḥ rāma svargaṃ gataḥ pitā rāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca rāmaṃ kṣatriyahantāraṃ rāmaṃ ca puruṣaśreṣṭhaṃ rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva rāmaṃ cāha sa yādavaḥ rāmaṃ caiva mahābalam rāmaṃ bhadrāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ rāmaṃ bhadrāṃ śubhapradām rāmaṃ śaṃbhuḥ salakṣmaṇam rāmaṃ saṃbodhya sītayā rāmaḥ pālayitābhavat rāmaḥ prāha vṛṣadhvajam rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ yathā rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ rāmaḥ saumitrisahito rāmākrūrajanārdanāḥ rāmāc ca niśaṭho jajñe rāmājñayā vāyusuto jagāma rāmādyeṣv eva bandhuṣu rāmādyair yadupuṃgavaiḥ rāmāyaṇaṃ samagraṃ tad rāmāya pratyavedayan rāmāyākliṣṭakarmaṇe rāmāyottaraṇāya ca rāme kṛṣṇe ca tatkṣaṇāt rāmeṇa sā parityaktā rāmeṇāśvāsitā gopyaḥ rāme nibaddhatattvārthā rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati rāmeśvara iti khyātaḥ rāmo daśarathāj jajñe rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ rāmo dāśarathir babhau rāmo dāśarathir bhūtvā rāmo dāśarathī rājā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ rāmo nāma mahābāhur rāmo anujasamanvitaḥ rāmo api gacchann adhvānaṃ rāmo apy anucaraiḥ saha rāmo bhūtapatiḥ purā rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ rāmo rājyam akārayat rāmo arjunam anīkasthaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca rāmo lakṣmaṇasaṃnidhau rāmo vacanam abravīt rāmo virāmaḥ śatrūṇāṃ rāmo vyāsas tathātreyo rāvaṇas taṃ tadābravīt rāvaṇas tu balānvitaḥ rāvaṇasya tu yā mātā rāvaṇasya vadhārthāya rāvaṇasyānujo mantrī rāvaṇaṃ tv arjunena ca rāvaṇaṃ nijaghānāśu rāvaṇaṃ yudhi durjayam rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam rāvaṇaṃ sagaṇaṃ hatvā rāvaṇādīn raṇe śaraiḥ rāvaṇo ghoṣayām āsa rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ rāśayaḥ parvatopamāḥ rāśinakṣatrayogataḥ rāṣṭrapālo atha sutanur rāsageyaṃ jagau kṛṣṇo rāsamaṇḍalabaddho api rāsārambharasotsukaḥ rāsāsakte janārdane rāhugraste divākare rāhugraste divākare rāhudehasamudbhūtā rāhur nāma mahābalaḥ rāhus tatra surān āha rāhuṃ cakrur grahānugam ripavo balinas tu te ripuṃ ripuṃjayaṃ vīraṃ ripūñ jitvā jagāmāśu ripūṇām amṛtaṃ naiva ripūṇāṃ pakṣakāriṇī ripūn sa rāmaḥ samare nijaghne ripor ādhatta bṛhatī rukmatvāyaiva jāyate rukmavarṇāṃ suśobhanām rukmiṇas tanayāṃ śubhām rukmiṇaṃ cāpi durvākyaṃ rukmiṇaṃ madhusūdanaḥ rukmiṇaṃ vākyam abruvan rukmiṇaṃ sa mahābalaḥ rukmiṇā bhāṣitaṃ mṛṣā rukmiṇā vijito balaḥ rukmiṇīkeśavau tadā rukmiṇī cābravīt premṇā rukmiṇī tasya duhitā rukmiṇīpramukhās tu yāḥ rukmiṇībalayor bhayāt rukmiṇīm uruvikramaḥ rukmiṇīṃ cakame kṛṣṇaḥ rukmiṇīṃ prāha harṣitaḥ rukmiṇo nagaraṃ jagmur rukmiṇy ajanayat putrān rukmiṇyās tu sutas tataḥ rukmiṇyāṃ kathitā dvijāḥ rukmī cāha madoddhataḥ rukmī caiva suto dvijāḥ rukmī dyūtavidāṃ varaḥ rukmī dveṣeṇa cakriṇe rukmī balasamanvitaḥ rukmeṣur abhavad rājā rukmeṣuḥ pṛthurukmaś ca ruciraṃ divyaparyaṅkaṃ ruciraṃ rucirānane ruciraṃ vada mā ciram ruceḥ prajāpateḥ putro ruṇaddhy enam atho śacī rudatā dṛṣṭam asmābhiḥ rudanti ca muhur muhuḥ rudanti bahurūpāṇi rudan pitaram abhyagāt rudrakoṭiṃ sumanasaṃ rudrakopaprayuktaś ca rudrakopād viniḥsṛtaḥ rudrakopā mahākopāḥ rudrakrodhodbhavāṃ puṇyāṃ rudratīrthaṃ tad eva syāt rudrapādaṃ tathottamam rudrarūpī janārdanaḥ rudrarūpī tathāvyayaḥ rudralokam avāpnuyuḥ rudralokam avāpnoti rudralokaṃ suragaṇaiḥ rudravīryaparākramān rudraśaktisamanvitā rudraś ca pārṣṇiṃ jagrāha rudrasādhyādibhiḥ saha rudrasya gaṇapo abhavat rudrasyānucarāḥ sarve rudrasyānucaro bhavet rudraṃ roṣātmasaṃbhavam rudraṃ śivaṃ śaṃkaraṃ śānticittaṃ rudraṃ so abhyaśapat punaḥ rudraḥ sarvasuraiḥ saha rudrākṛtir nihantrī sā rudrāṇām amitaujasām rudrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ devīṃ rudrāṇāṃ śaṃkaro yathā rudrādityā vasavaś cāśvinau ca rudrādityās tathāśvinau rudrādityās tathāśvinau rudrānugān gaṇān raudrān rudrā bhuvi nipātitāḥ rudrāya varadāya ca rudrāyottāraṇāya ca rudrāvartaṃ sugandhāśvaṃ rudrāvāsaṃ tathā tīrthaṃ rudrās tribhuvaneśvarāḥ rudreṇāmitatejasā rudrair vasubhir ādityair rudrair viśvasahāyaiś ca rudropendramahendrāṇāṃ rudro manyuḥ śivo abhavat rudro hitaṃ tārakam asya kīrtayet rudhiraṃ tad bhavet toyaṃ rudhirāndhe patanty ete rudhirāndho vasātaptaḥ rudhirāmbhas tathaiva ca rudhirāmbhas tathaiva ca rudhireṇa pariplutāḥ rurukas tanayas tasya rurukasya vṛkaḥ putro ruruduś cāśramasthā ye ruruprabhṛtayo viprāś rurumāṃsaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ruroda rājā tadvākyāt ruroda śokāśrupariplutākṣaḥ rurodoccaiḥ kṛtaṃ smaran rurodha nijamandire rurodha magadheśvaraḥ ruṣṭātmānaṃ samādadhe rūkṣeṇa paruṣeṇa ca rūpatīrthaṃ jagāma ha rūpatīrthaṃ śūkaravaṃ rūpatīrtheti viśrutam rūpatīrthe mṛto bhūyaḥ rūpadātāgnir eva ca rūpabuddhivilāsinau rūpam etac caturbhujam rūpayauvanagarvitaḥ rūpayauvanagarvitaḥ rūpayauvanagarvitām rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ rūpayauvanamatteyaṃ rūpayauvanaśālinaḥ rūpayauvanaśālinī rūpayauvanaśālinī rūpayauvanasaṃpadam rūpayauvanasaṃpadā rūpayauvanasaṃpannam rūpayauvanasaṃpannā rūpayauvanasaṃpanno rūpalakṣaṇasaṃyutāḥ rūpalāvaṇyasaṃyuktāḥ rūpavatyā punas tvaṃ vai rūpavatyo guṇānvitāḥ rūpavantaṃ samutsṛjya rūpavarṇādayas tasyā rūpavān kīrtimāṃś caiva rūpavān bahubhāgyaś ca rūpavān subhagaḥ śūro rūpavān subhagaḥ śūro rūpavān subhagaḥ śrīmān rūpavān subhago bhavet rūpasaubhāgyadāyakam rūpasaubhāgyadāyinī rūpasaubhāgyasaṃpatti- rūpaṃ kṛtvā gautamasya rūpaṃ kṛtvā mahābhīmaṃ rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca rūpaṃ ca paramaṃ tasya rūpaṃ tava guṇottamam rūpaṃ tejaś ca citrāsu rūpaṃ daityavināśanam rūpaṃ na dānaṃ na parokṣam asti rūpaṃ nirvartate tathā rūpaṃ nirvartayāmy adya rūpaṃ nirvartayāmy adya rūpaṃ nirvartayed etad rūpaṃ paraṃ saditivācakam akṣaraṃ yaj rūpaṃ māyāmayaṃ śubham rūpaṃ yasya mahātmanaḥ rūpaṃ saṃlabdhavān raviḥ rūpaṃ sundarikāśramam rūpaṃ smṛtvā skhalatpadaḥ rūpāṇi kṛtvā surasattamānām rūpāṇi dhatte jagato hitāya rūpāṇy etāni trīṇi tu rūpātiśayamohitā rūpāntareṇa madhyāhne rūpānvitā śīlaguṇopapannā rūpārthaṃ bhavato araṇye rūpiṇī tasya pārśvasthā rūpiṇī dvijasattamāḥ rūpeṇa kena savitā rūpeṇa dṛṣṭiṃ saṃyuktāṃ rūpeṇa yaśasā caiva rūpeṇānyena vā gaccha rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi rūpe nāsti samo bhuvi rūpair anekair avatīha sarvam rūpair āśvinayor iva rūponmattena rājendra rūpaudāryasthairyagāmbhīryayuktān rejire śālasaṃśritāḥ reje atīva hiraṇmayaḥ reṇukaṃ pañcavaṭakaṃ reṇukātīrtham eva ca reṇukāyāṃ tu kāmalyāṃ reṇur jajñe atha reṇukaḥ reṇur nāma narādhipaḥ retaḥpānādikartāro retaḥ sa prākṣipad bahu retaḥ saṃpadyate mahat retaḥ somatvam īyivat retogarbhas tadā cāgnir retogarbhaṃ kaviṃ dṛṣṭvā retodhāḥ kāmadīpanaḥ retomūtrakṛtāhārās remakasya tu bhāryā tam rematyāḥ sa tu putro abhūd remāte girimūrdhani reme tatra sa gautamaḥ reme tatromayā sārdhaṃ reme tābhir ameyātmā reme dvāravatīṃ prāpto reme patīn mānuṣān āsurāṃś ca reme paramayā mudā reme yaduvaraśreṣṭhaḥ reme rāmo api dharmātmā reme sa devyā sahitas trinetraḥ reme strībhir manojñābhir revatīgaṅgayor naraḥ revatī ca mahābhāgā revatī caiva rāmasya revatīti samākhyātā revatīṣu tathā kupyam revatīsaṃgamaṃ tathā revatīṃ caiva tanayāṃ revatīṃ bhara tanmanāḥ revatīṃ vidhivad dattāṃ revatyā yad viniḥsṛtam revatyā rūpasaṃpattyai revatyā sahitaḥ sukhī revatyāṃ dayitaḥ sutaḥ raibhyo raucyas tathaiva ca raivataś cākṣuṣas tathā raivatasya gatasya ha raivatasya manoḥ putrāḥ raivatasya mahīpateḥ raivataṃ ca kakudminam raivataiḥ pariśobhitaiḥ raivato arbuda eva ca raivasya raivataḥ putraḥ raivo nāma mahādyutiḥ rogaghnaṃ pāpanāśanam rogaghnaṃ pāpanāśanam rogadāridryanāśanam rogāc ca mucyate rogī rogādibhir na spṛśyate śarīrī rogād vimucyate rogī rogāyatanam adhruvam rogārtasya mahīyataḥ rogārtā mucyate rogād rogārtāś cāpare tathā rogārtās te bhavantīha rogārtikṣuttṛṣācintā- rogārto mucyate rogād rogeṇa mriyate dvijāḥ rogeṇa mriyate punaḥ rogair indriyasaṃkṣayaḥ rocanayā samālikhet rocanāṃ ca maṇiṃ tathā rocanāṃ padmacandanam rocayan vai gaṇaśreṣṭhān rocayām āsa kṛṣṇasya rodanāśrumalakṣāraṃ rodhayan vai gaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ropayanti phalāḍhyāni romapuñjaś caladvapuḥ romabhyaś ca surāsurāḥ romarājipuraskṛtā romāñcitatanur devaṃ romāñcitatanur bhūtvā romāñcitatanur bhūtvā romāñcitatanūruhaḥ romāñcitatanūruhaḥ romāñcitatanūruhāḥ roravīti tatholbaṇam roravīti tatholbaṇam rohiṇīkūpapravaram rohiṇītanayā nava rohiṇīprasavo hi yaḥ rohiṇīṃ cākutobhayaḥ rohiṇyā ca yathā candras rohiṇyās tanayā hareḥ rohitasya tu tad vākyaṃ rohitaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ rohitaṃ ca sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ rohitaṃ nṛpateḥ sutam rohitaṃ pratiyojayet rohitaṃ rūpam āsthitam rohitaṃ śūkaraṃ kūrmaṃ rohitaḥ pitaraṃ prati rohitaḥ pitaraṃ prāha rohitaḥ sa vanaṃ yayau rohitāmiṣam annaṃ ca rohitena sutena ca rohitendradhanūṃṣi ca rohite ṣoḍaśābdike rohito nāma pārthivaḥ raukmiṇeyo mahābāhuḥ raucyo nāma manuḥ smṛtaḥ raudrabhāgavināśanaḥ raudraṃ vaiṣṇavam eva ca raudraṃ śakaṭacakrākṣaṃ raudrāśvatanayasya vai raudrāśvas tasya cātmajaḥ raudrāśvasya daśārṇeyuḥ raudrāṃ vikṛtalocanām raupyakāñcanakakṣāṇāṃ rauravaṃ durgaviṣamaṃ rauravaṃ durgaviṣamaṃ rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet rauravaḥ śaukaro rodhas rauravo vajranārācaiḥ rauhiṇeyaṃ naro bhaktyā rauhiṇeyaṃ mahodadhim rauhiṇeyaṃ subhadrāṃ ca rauhiṇeyo mahābalaḥ lakucair nāgakesaraiḥ lakucaiḥ saralair lodhrair lakṣakoṭiśatatrayam lakṣakoṭiśatāni ca lakṣakoṭiśateṣu ca lakṣakoṭiśateṣu ca lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya lakṣaṇaṃ bhuvi dehinām lakṣaṇaṃ rūpasauṣṭhavam lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ lakṣadvayena bhaumasya lakṣapramāṇau dvau madhye lakṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ lakṣam ekaṃ dvijottamāḥ lakṣam ekaṃ prakīrtitam lakṣayojanam āyatam lakṣayojanam āyatā lakṣayojanam āyatā lakṣayojanavistaraḥ lakṣayojanavistāraṃ lakṣayojanavistṛtam lakṣāyutaśatatrayam lakṣito asi mahārāja lakṣe divākarāc cāpi lakṣmaṇasya karāc charaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ prāha vinayād lakṣmaṇaḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ lakṣmaṇā cāruhāsinī lakṣmaṇānucaro rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt lakṣmītīrtham iti khyātaṃ lakṣmīputrapravardhanam lakṣmībhartā jagatpatiḥ lakṣmībhājo bhavantu te lakṣmīmayaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ lakṣmīr atho dānam atho suvṛṣṭiḥ lakṣmīvāñ jāyate nityaṃ lakṣmīvān asy ato lakṣmīṃ lakṣmīvān puṇyavān bhavet lakṣmīvān matimāñ śūraḥ lakṣmīviṣṇvagnisūryendra- lakṣmīs tāṃ pratyabhāṣata lakṣmīs tvaṃ śṛṇu te sthitim lakṣmīṃ rūpaṃ dadāmy aham lakṣmyā nilayam eva ca lakṣmyā yukto yathā viṣṇur lakṣmyā vyāptaṃ carācaram lakṣmyāḥ putra daridrayā lakṣyate tat puraṃ dvijāḥ lakṣyate dehaceṣṭitaiḥ lakṣyamukta ivāśugaḥ lakṣyaṃ hanti samāhitaḥ laguḍais tu tiraskṛtam laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ laghvāhāro viśuddhātmā laṅkāgato ayaṃ girir āśu śobhāṃ laṅkā ca bhagnā sagaṇaṃ hi rakṣo laṅkāpi satyaṃ śriyam ātanoti laṅkāṃ dagdhvā ripūn hatvā laṅkāṃ prāsthāpayad drutam laṅkeśaṃ mohayitvā tu laṅkeśāya mahātmane lajjayā kaluṣīkṛtaḥ lajjayā kaluṣībhūtaḥ lajjayā dagdhamānasaḥ lajjayā parayā yukto lajjayā paribhūto ahaṃ lajjā kvāpi nirākṛtā lajjā puṣṭir uṣā yā ca lajjā puṣṭiḥ sarasvatī lajjāṃ jahi mahābāho lajjitasya ca nābhavat lajjitasya samāgamaḥ lajjitaṃ prābruvan surāḥ lajjitā cāvadad devam lajjito vākyam abravīt lajjitau ca mahāprājñau latāgucchasamudbhavaiḥ latāgulmavitānaiś ca latāgulmair vitānaiś ca latādrumādyudgatapallavā śubhā latābhiś ca virājitam latāvallyas tṛṇauṣadhyaḥ latāvitānagulmaiś ca latāḥ kalpalatādikāḥ lapsyate sarvavibudhā lapsyase tvaṃ manoratham labdhamātre vare cāpi labdhasaṃjñās tatas te vai labdhālabdhasamo bhavet labdhe madhyasthatāṃ punaḥ labdhvā cānyan manīṣitam labdhvā tu puruṣottamam labhate śamam uttamam labhante kutsite kule labhante tapasaḥ phalam labhante duḥkhitā bhṛśam labhante pariyātanāḥ labhante vaiṣṇavāḥ kāmān labhante svargatiṃ nityam labhante svalpabuddhayaḥ labhec cedipatir yathā labheta kāmān manasā yathepsitān labheta kāmāṃś ca yathāmanīṣitān labheta jātismaratāṃ naraḥ sa tu labheta bhāgaṃ bhagavān acintyo labhet pañca varāṃś caiva labhet sarvatra vai phalam labhet snānādikaṃ phalam labhed abhimataṃ phalam labhed abhimataṃ phalam labhed abhimatān kāmān labheyam iti taṃ śakras labheyam iti taṃ śakras labhyālabhyena vartayan lampakāḥ śunaśokāś ca lambamānā hy adhomukhāḥ lambamānāṃs tadā munīn lambā bhānur marutvatī lambāyāś caiva ghoṣo atha lambodaras tvaṃ bhava vighnarājo lambodaraṃ nāma cakāra śaṃbhuḥ layam eṣyati yatra ca layāḥ satāṃ yatra sanātanās te lalanāmaulimadhyagaḥ lalāṭanayanāya ca lalāṭaphalakaṃ harim lalāṭāt prasṛto ghoraḥ lalāṭād vyapataṃs tasya lavaṅgatālāgurusaptaparṇā lavaṇasyodadhe rājaṃs lavaṇasyodadhes tīre lavaṇasyodadhes tīre lavaṇaṃ corayitvā tu lavaṇaṃ sārasaṃ tathā lavaṇekṣusurāsarpir lavaṇekṣusurāsarpir- lavaṇair mātṛbhojanaiḥ lavaṇodaṃ hareḥ sthānaṃ lavaṇo nāma dānavaḥ lavaḥ kuśaś ca vikhyātau lākṣāprajvalitaṃ ghoraṃ lākṣāmāṃsarasānāṃ ca lākṣārasanibhās tathā lāṅgalāsaktahastāgro lāṅgalāstradharaṃ devam lāṅgulinī vaṃśakarā lājādhṛk cāpi maināko lāpitaṃ haricandanam lābhe naiva ca harṣayet lālābhakṣaś ca dāruṇaḥ lālābhakṣye sa yāty ugre lālāmūtrapurīṣavat lāvajīvās taittirikā likhite api gṛhe sthite likhitvā pustakam idaṃ likhyamānam athāstuvan likhyamānaṃ mudā yutāḥ likhyamānaṃ sahasrāṃśuṃ likhyamāne vibhāvasau liṅgakoṭisamāyuktaṃ liṅgabhedī sa ucyate liṅgam ārādhanārthāya liṅgarūpeṇa sarveṣāṃ liṅgasya ca sureśasya liṅgasya savraṇāṃ bhīmāṃ liṅgaṃ tu tridaśārcitam liṅgaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya liṅgaṃ yad dṛśyate dvijāḥ liṅgātmakaṃ mahādevaṃ liṅgāni rajasas tāni liṅgāni vividhāni ca liṅgāni sarvāṇi nanāma rāmaḥ liṅgāni sarvāṇi visarjayasva liṅgeṣu niyatātmakaḥ liṅgair apy anumīyate lipsāṃ cakre prasenasya limpet tathā bhūrjapattre līnam āsīt tathā yatra līyate nātra saṃśayaḥ līyate pratibuddhatvād līyante tatra cāpare līyante pratilomataḥ līyante pratilomāni līyete paramātmani līlayā samanuprāpad līlayaiva jaganmayaḥ līlayaiva nipātitaḥ līlayaiva mahātmanā līlayaiva yad acyuta līlayaiva vahan yayau līlayaiva sa cakriṇā līlā jagatpates tasya līlā sā jagataḥ pateḥ līleyaṃ tava ceṣṭā hi luṭhan bhramaṇasaṃmardaiḥ luṇṭhitā krīḍatā tena luptadharmas tv ahaṃ punaḥ luptāyāṃ pratimāyāṃ tu lubdhakas tatprasādataḥ lubdhakasya kapotakaḥ lubdhakaṃ prīṇayāmi tam lubdhakaṃ vākyam abravīt lubdhakaṃ vismayānvitam lubdhakaḥ śītaduḥkhitaḥ lubdhako mocayām āsa lubdhako vākyam abravīt lubdha svargeśvarāspadam lubdhaḥ pāpeṣu yo anayaḥ lubdhaḥ pāpeṣu yo anayaḥ lubdhānāṃ khecarā hy annaṃ lubdho jagrāha taj jarā lubdho naikṛtikaḥ śaṭhaḥ lūnavān brahmaṇaḥ śiraḥ lūyante ca tadaiva hi lekhāś ca nāmato viprāḥ lepasaṃbandhinaś cānye lepād ullekhanāt sekād lebhe jāmbavatīṃ kanyām lebhe jyeṣṭhaṃ sutaṃ rāmaṃ lebhe tasmād bṛhadrathaḥ lebhe paramadhārmikaḥ lebhe putram akalmaṣam lebhe prasenajid bhāryāṃ lebhe vai puruṣaḥ patnīṃ lelihānaḥ saniṣpeṣaṃ lehyacoṣyāṇi yāni ca lehyāś coṣyāś ca saṃvṛtāḥ lokakṣayakaraṃ mahat lokacakṣur maheśvaraḥ lokatrayapatiḥ sākṣād lokatrayavibhūṣaṇam lokatrayaṃ citravicitrarūpam lokatrayaṃ sarvam atho vinaṣṭam lokatrayāśrayāśeṣa- lokatrayaikapāvanyāṃ lokatrayaikaśaraṇaṃ lokatrayaikādhipater na yasya lokatrayopakārāya lokatritayapāvanīm lokatritayabhīṣaṇaḥ lokatritayasaṃmoha- lokadvayanivāsinaḥ lokadvayahitaiṣiṇī lokadvaye api na sukhī lokadvāraṃ pañcatīrthaṃ lokadviṣṭo adhamaḥ puṃsāṃ lokanātha jagatpate lokanātha jagatpate lokanātha namo astu te lokanāthaś caturmukhaḥ lokanāthaṃ jagadgurum lokanātho viśvakartā lokapālatvam eva ca lokapālaṃ manuvaraṃ lokapālān samanujān lokapālā bhayād yayuḥ lokapālā marudgaṇāḥ lokapālās tathā cānye lokapālās tvam eva ca lokapālair anuvṛto lokapālaiḥ sa kaśyapaḥ lokapūjyo namaskartā lokaprakāśakaḥ śrīmāṃl lokam ekārṇavaṃ cakre lokarakṣāṃ cakārāsau lokasaṃrakṣaṇāya ca lokasaṃsthānacintakaiḥ lokasaṃharaṇakṣamaḥ lokasākṣin namo astu te lokasākṣī trilokeśaḥ lokasya kiyad antaram lokasya kiyad
