sarvābhyāgatapūjanam sarvābhyo hy adhikaprītir sarvā yaśodayā sārdhaṃ sarvāya sarvabhakṣāya sarvāyudhadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāyudhadharaṃ vapuḥ sarvāyudhodyatakaraṃ sarvāyudhodyatakarā sarvārthadāyināṃ tatra sarvārthasiddhidaḥ puṃsāṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitaḥ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitā sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ sarvāvayavanirdhūtaṃ sarvāvasthaṃ manuṣyeṇa sarvā vihasitānanāḥ sarvāścaryamayaṃ dvijāḥ sarvāścaryamayaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvāścaryamayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ sarvāścaryasamanvitam sarvāścaryasamanvitaḥ sarvāścaryasamanvitaḥ sarvāścaryasamanvite sarvāścaryaṃ samākhyātaṃ sarvāś cāpi yathoditāḥ sarvāś caiva mahābhāgās sarvāsām uttamā yoṣid sarvāsām uttamāṃ kāṃcin sarvāsāṃ tīrthabhūtā tu sarvās tā guṇasaṃyutāḥ sarvās tāḥ kauravaśreṣṭha sarvās tāḥ priyavādinyaḥ sarvāstrakuśalāḥ śūrāḥ sarvāsv api daśāsv eha sarvāṃl lokān atikramya sarvāṃl lokāṃś caran vaśī sarvāṃś ca tān anuyayau sarvāṃś ca paśupālakān sarvāḥ pāpaharāḥ smṛtāḥ sarvāḥ puṇyāḥ sarasvatyaḥ sarvāḥ prahasitānanāḥ sarvāḥ samṛddhayas tasya sarvāḥ sukhaṃ saṃsthitāś ca sarvāḥ so abādhata prajāḥ sarve kāñcanayūpāś ca sarve kāñcanavedayaḥ sarve kāmās tatra pūrṇā sarve ca paramātmānaṃ sarve ca munipuṃgavaḥ sarve ca śepuḥ kupitās tadāgneḥ sarve jīvantu vijvarāḥ sarveṇa ṛṣayas tathā sarveṇānena bhūpate sarve tatra samāyayuḥ sarve tatsthā ime lokā sarve tiṣṭhanti śāśvatāḥ sarve te kṣatriyā viprā sarve te caiva taṃ prati sarve te tryambakāt sati sarve te devadānavāḥ sarve te muktim āpnuyuḥ sarve tyaktvā svāśramaṃ taṃ sarve devagaṇāś cātra sarve devā divaukasaḥ sarve devā bhavanti hi sarve devāḥ punar vibhum sarve devair muniśreṣṭhā sarve nārāyaṇātmakāḥ sarve nirayagāminaḥ sarvendriyavivarjitam sarvendriyāṇi saṃyamya sarve paśyanti nārada sarve purāṇārthavido bahujñās sarve pramuditā hṛṣṭā sarve prācīnabarhiṣaḥ sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā sarve brahma vadiṣyanti sarve bhaveyuḥ subhagā sarve bhīmaparākramāḥ sarve bhūtagaṇā nityaṃ sarve bhokṣyāmahe śeṣam sarvebhya eva varṇebhyo sarvebhyo apy adhikaṃ divyam sarvebhyo apy adhikā matā sarvebhyo apy adhiko abhavat sarvebhyo balinau śreṣṭhau sarvebhyo matimānebhyo sarvebhyo hy adhikaṃ bhavet sarvebhyo hy adhikā mātā sarvebhyo hy adhikā hy aham sarvebhyo hy uktam uttamam sarve mallāḥ pradudruvuḥ sarve yajñā muniśreṣṭhāḥ sarve rudraparākramāḥ sarve varṇā yathāvidhi sarve varṇāḥ kṛtakriyāḥ sarve vāṇikāś caiva sarve vidyāsu niṣṇātā sarve vidhūtapāpmānas sarve viprāś ca vedāś ca sarve vīrā mahārathāḥ sarve vedavidaś caiva sarve vai divam ākraman sarve vaivasvataṃ puram sarve śakrapurogamāḥ sarveśas tvam anuttama sarveśaṃ lokapāvanam sarveśaṃ sarvatomukham sarve śūrakule jātāḥ sarveśvara jagadyone sarveśvaraḥ sarvakalānidhānam sarveśvaraḥ sarvadṛk sarvavettā sarveśvareśvaraṃ viṣṇum sarveṣām apakāriṇām sarveṣām apakāriṇām sarveṣām api bhūtānām sarveṣām api muktidā sarveṣām api sa prabhuḥ sarveṣām abhavat tadā sarveṣām amṛtaṃ cet syād sarveṣām āśramāṇāṃ ca sarveṣām iti naḥ śrutam sarveṣām iti me matiḥ sarveṣām īśvaraṃ manaḥ sarveṣām uttamaṃ sthānaṃ sarveṣām upakārikā sarveṣām ekamantro ayaṃ sarveṣām eva goptāraṃ sarveṣām eva jantūnāṃ sarveṣām eva tīrthānāṃ sarveṣām eva dānānām sarveṣām eva devānām sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ sarveṣām eva śāpānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kīrtivardhanam sarveṣāṃ gautamī puṇyā sarveṣāṃ ca parigrahāḥ sarveṣāṃ ca matir dhairyaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca matenāyaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca matenāhaṃ sarveṣāṃ caiva tīrthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ caiva devānām sarveṣāṃ caiva lokānām sarveṣāṃ tīrthamukhyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tridivaukasām sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ mahān asi sarveṣāṃ na matiḥ kasmāt sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ sarveṣāṃ puṇyavardhanam sarveṣāṃ prabhavāspadam sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇān sarveṣāṃ bhakṣaṇāyaiva sarveṣāṃ melanaṃ yatra sarveṣāṃ yasya kasyacit sarveṣāṃ yācamānānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sarvadā tīrthaṃ sarveṣāṃ sarvadā nṝṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sarvadā nṝṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sarvadārtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sarvasiddhidā sarveṣāṃ sākṣibhūto asau sarveṣāṃ sā dvijottamāḥ sarveṣāṃ sulabhā muktir sarveṣu ca virejire sarveṣu tatra kāmyeṣu sarveṣu nagaśṛṅgeṣu sarveṣu nivasaty asau sarveṣu prabhaviṣṇavaḥ sarveṣu sattveṣu samatvabuddhyā sarveṣv antaḥ praviṣṭo ahaṃ sarveṣv āyataneṣu ca sarveṣv eteṣu te triṣu sarveṣv eteṣu varṣeṣu sarveṣv eva ca yuddheṣu sarve samaṃ ca sarvebhyo sarve saṃtuṣṭamānasāḥ sarve sāṅgaṃ pradāpayet sarve sidhyanty upakramāḥ sarve hy ete mahābhāgā sarvair api prakārais tan sarvair apy abhibhūyate sarvair eva hi gantavyam sarvair eva hi gantavyam sarvair devair anuvṛtas sarvair devair alaṃkṛtaḥ sarvair devair namaskṛtaḥ sarvair devair namaskṛtāḥ sarvair devair vṛto hariḥ sarvais tair dīrghakālena sarvaiḥ samudito guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ sarvatra sarvadā sarvaiḥ suragaṇair vṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ suraiḥ kāntayā vījyamānaḥ sarvonnatim avāpyāsau sarvopadravasaṃyukte sarvopabhogasahite sarvopabhogasaṃpannaṃ sarvopādhivinirmuktaṃ sarvopādhivinirmuktaḥ sarvopāyakṣaye jīvas sarvo bhavati pūjitaḥ sarvo ayaṃ brāhmaṇo loke sarvauṣadhisamāyuktair sarvauṣadhyāśrayo acalaḥ sarvauṣadhyo mātaro lokapālāḥ salakṣmīko janārdanaḥ sa labdhatejā bhagavān sa labhed īpsitaṃ phalam sa liṅgam upalabhyate sa liṅgāntaram āsādya saliladhvāntameghābhaḥ salilaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca salilaṃ tan nirarthakam salilaṃ vāhanāyudhaiḥ salilāmṛtam ādarāt salilāśayaliṅgāya salile tapyamānāya salilena viṣīdantaḥ salilenaivormimatā salilaughapariplutāḥ salīlaṃ lalitaṃ bālā sa lebhe karmaṇā tena sa lokaṃ śāśvataṃ viṣṇor sa lohagandhī rājarṣiḥ sa lohagandho vyanaśat sa vakro manmathaḥ krūro sa vajrapāṇis tarasā savanaspatibījāś ca sa varāhavapuḥ śrīmān savarṇādhatta sāmudrī savarṇāyāṃ prajāpatiḥ savarṇāṃ nirmame tataḥ savarma saśaraṃ dharmyaṃ sa varṣakoṭipratimaḥ savalaḥ putrasaṃjñakaḥ sa vavre bhagavan kṛtyā sa vākyam ākarṇya mahāmaharṣir sa vācyo bhagavān iti savāmadevāṅgiraso atha bhārgavāḥ sa vijñeyaḥ śanaiścaraḥ savitas te namo astu te savitācintayat tataḥ savitā devadeveśo savitā sa pitā tasya savitrā paramātmanā savitrā munisattamāḥ savitre taṃ tu vṛttāntaṃ sa viddho marmadeśe tu sa vidhyatu śivaṃ śāntaṃ sa vinītaḥ śivaṃ prāha sa vinītaiḥ puraḥsaraiḥ sa vipranaṣṭāṃ devānāṃ sa vipraśāpavyājena sa vipraś cālayed enāṃ sa vimucyeta pauruṣāt savilāsasmitādhāraṃ sa viveda tadā somaḥ sa viveśa svakair guṇaiḥ sa viśed viṣṇum avyayam sa viśrāntaḥ śanai rājā sa viśrānto janavṛta sa viṣṇur munisattamāḥ sa viṣṇus tāni rakṣāṃsi sa viṣṇuḥ sarvam evedaṃ sa viṣṇoḥ padam āpnuyāt savisphuliṅgaṃ sāṅgāraṃ savismayaḥ paśyati bhṛtyavargaṃ sa vīkṣyate mayādya ha savṛke gavi caiva ha sa vṛkṣas tu pratāpavān sa vṛthā kleśakārī vai sa vai kopāc ca bālyāc ca sa vai puruṣa ucyate sa vai baddhvā dhanur jyābhir sa vai bāhur vanaṃ yayau sa vai bāhusahasreṇa sa vai bhaktataro naraḥ sa vai bhaktataro naraḥ sa vai bhaktataro naraḥ sa vai bhaktaḥ sanātanaḥ sa vai bhaktaḥ sanātanaḥ sa vairāgyāj jagāmātha sa vairājaḥ prajāsargaṃ sa vai rājā hariścandras sa vai roṣāc ca bālyāc ca sa vai vegaṃ samudrasya sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyakule sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo jāto sa vai svāyaṃbhuvo viprāḥ savyahastena keśavaḥ savrīḍo adhomukho abravīt sa śaṅkyamāno dharmātmā sa śanair vindhyam abhyāgāt saśabde na jalābhyāse saśarīram idaṃ rājyaṃ saśarīraṃ mahātapāḥ saśarīro vraje svargam saśalya iva duḥkhārtaḥ saśalya iva mūrcchitaḥ saśastraḥ puruṣādhamaḥ sa śivaḥ śakram āhedaṃ saśiṣyo gautamīm agāt sa śīghraṃ vṛddhim agamac sa śūdragatibhāg bhavet sa śūnyam āśramaṃ ramyaṃ sa śūraḥ kṣatriyaśreṣṭho saśeṣās tatra tiṣṭhanti saśailavanakānanā saśailavanakānanā saśailavanakānanā saśailavanakānanām saśailavanakānanām sa śocyo hi sureśvarau sa śrutvā śvaśuraṃ yayau saṣaḍaṅgapadakramāḥ sasakaṃ balabarhiṣam sa satprasūtim icchan vai sa satyavacanair dṛḍhaiḥ sa sa bhṛtyaḥ kalau yuge sa samāpyāyate viprā sa samāvāsitaḥ sarvo sasamudrasaricchailā sasamudrā sanagarā sa sa rājā bhaviṣyati sa sargakāle ca karoti sargaṃ sa sargapralayātmakaḥ sasarja puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ sasarjamadhukāśmaryaiḥ sasarja vividhān pṛthak sasarja vividhāḥ prajāḥ sasarja sṛṣṭiṃ tadrūpāṃ sa sarpaḥ pitaraṃ prāha sa sarpo mātaraṃ prāha sa sarvakāmadaḥ puṃsāṃ sa sarvakāmān āpnoti sa sarvadamano nāma sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtir guṇāṃś ca sa sarvam īpsitaṃ labhet sa sarvaratnabhāk samrāṭ sa sarvalokago devaiḥ sa sarvātmā jaganmayaḥ sa sarvān pārthivān saṃkhye sa sarvais tu mahāpathaḥ sa sarvais tu mahāpathaḥ sa sa svāmī tadā nṛṇām sa sahasrārciṣaṃ devaṃ sasaṃgraham adhīyatām sa saṃtuṣṭo abravīd vacam sa saṃpadbhājanaṃ bhavet sa saṃrūḍho asakṛt prāptas sa saṃharan daityagaṇāṃs sa saṃharan sarvadaityāṃs sa sādhayām āsa bhavaṃ prapūjya sa sāntvayann āha manobhirāmām sasāmarthye sati tyājyam sa siddhanātho akhilaviśvakartā sa sukhaṃ mṛtyum ṛcchati sa sukhaṃ mṛtyum ṛcchati sasutaṃ bhāryayānvitam sasurāsuragandharvaṃ sasurāsuramānuṣam sa sūrya eka evātra sa sūryalokam āsthāya sa sūryād upalabdhavān sasṛjur jātamanyavaḥ sa sṛṣṭvā tu prajās tv evam sa sṛṣṭvā manasā dakṣaḥ sasainyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ yudhi sasainyān hayarakṣaṇe sa soḍho ayaṃ varo daṇḍas sa soma upadhāryatām sa somaṃ punar apy āha sa saumyo rāśir ucyate sa snātvā sāgare samyag sasnehānāṃ ca pātrāṇāṃ sasnau caiva yathāvidhi sasmāra sutayā kṛtam sasyacaurā bhaviṣyanti sasyajātāni sarvāṇi sasyajātāni sarvāṇi sasyavatyā api bhuvo sasyākaravatī sphītā sasyānāṃ ghanavat kṛṣṇa sasyāny anyāni hartā ca sasyaiś cānyaiś ca śobhite sasvaje tāṃ punaḥ punaḥ sasvaje tau punaḥ punaḥ sa svayaṃ ca pinākadhṛk sa svargasthān api pitṝn sa svargaṃ samupāśnute sa svāmy akhilalokānāṃ saha kṛṣṇena nāradaḥ saha gopair avismitaḥ saha gopair mahātmanaḥ sahacāriṣu paṇḍitaḥ sahajanyā tilottamā sahajānandasundaram saha tābhyāṃ tadākrūraḥ saha tenarṣiṇā punaḥ saha tair vrajabhūmiṣu saha devagaṇaiḥ prajāḥ sahadevasutaś cāpi sahadevasya dharmātmā saha devaṃ janārdanam sahadevaḥ pratāpavān sahadevā śāntidevā saha devena śārṅgiṇā saha devair mudā yukto saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ saha devaiḥ śacīpatiḥ sahadevo mahāyaśāḥ saha devyā namaś cakruḥ saha daiteyadānavāḥ sa ha dharmayuge abhavat sahanīyaṃ tad bhavatu sa hantavyaḥ prayatnataḥ sa hantā bālakaṃ māṃ vai sahabandhuṃ mahābalaḥ saha bhartrā divaṃ vrajet saha bhṛtyādibhir naraḥ saha bhṛtyair mahībhṛtaḥ saha mantribhir acyutaḥ saha rāmeṇa keśavaḥ saha rāmeṇa madhuram sa hariḥ puruṣo vīraḥ sahavāsanivāsatvād sahavāsam ahaṃ katham sahavāsaṃ na yāsyāmi sahavratā bhavasyaiṣā sahasā tapaso balāt sahasā mucyate pāpāj sahasā mucyate pāpān sahasā ratibhartāram sahasaivāgatā satī sahasotthāya nirgataḥ sahasotpatitā bhītā sahasrakamalānvitam sahasrakaram avyayam sahasrakuṇḍam ākhyātaṃ sahasrakuṇḍam ucyate sahasrakuṇḍābhidhaṃ tad sahasracakṣuḥpramukhāṃs tathāgrataḥ sahasracaraṇaṃ ca yam sahasracaraṇaṃ brahma sahasracaraṇāya ca sahasracaraṇāya ca sahasracaraṇekṣaṇaḥ sahasracaraṇekṣaṇaḥ sahasrajihvaṃ bhāsvantaṃ sahasradaṃ sahasrādiṃ sahasradvitayocchrāyās sahasranayanāya ca sahasranāgaḥ sphuradagnivarṇaṃ sahasraparivāritaḥ sahasrapādaśirasaṃ sahasrapādas tvaṃ devas sahasraphaladāyakam sahasrabāho bahuvaktrapāda sahasrabhagavān bhava sahasrabhāgaḥ prathamād sahasrabhujamanyave sahasrabhujam avyayam sahasrabhujavān prabhuḥ sahasram amitaujasaḥ sahasram asṛjat prabhuḥ sahasramukuṭaṃ prabhum sahasramunibhir vṛtaḥ sahasramūrdhā deveśaḥ sahasram ekaṃ niṣkāṇāṃ sahasram ekaṃ varṣāṇām sahasram ekaṃ varṣāṇāṃ sahasram ekaṃ varṣāṇāṃ sahasram ekaṃ varṣāṇāṃ sahasrayugaparyantaṃ sahasraraśmayaḥ sapta sahasraśataghaṇṭāya sahasraśatadakṣiṇam sahasraśatadakṣiṇāḥ sahasraśirasaṃ devaṃ sahasraśirasaṃ devaṃ sahasraśirasā vyaktaḥ sahasraśīrṣā tvaṃ devas sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasraśīrṣo lokādiś sahasraśo abhyadhāvanta sahasrasaṃkhyāyukteṣu sahasraṃ jīvate samāḥ sahasraṃ tatra tīrthānāṃ sahasraṃ daśa mānavāḥ sahasraṃ parivartate sahasraṃ bharate kaścic sahasraṃ rukmiṇā jitaḥ sahasrākṣakaraṃ vibhum sahasrākṣa virūpākṣa sahasrākṣaviśāpatām sahasrākṣaṃ puraṃdaram sahasrākṣaṃ yad ucyate sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt sahasrākṣaḥ svakāt padāt sahasrākṣāya mīḍhuṣe sahasrākṣo gotrabhid vajrabāhuḥ sahasrākṣo bhaviṣyasi sahasrākṣo abhyabhāṣata sahasrākhyaḥ sahasrāṅgaḥ sahasrāṇāṃ tathā ṣaṣṭir sahasrāṇi caturdaśa sahasrāṇi caturdaśa sahasrāṇi caturdaśa sahasrāṇi ca sapta ca sahasrāṇi tathā daśa sahasrāṇi tathāśītiṃ sahasrāṇi daśaiva tu sahasrāṇi dvijottamāḥ sahasrāṇi mahāmate sahasrāṇi śataṃ tathā sahasrāṇi śatāni ca sahasrāṇi śatāny aṣṭāv sahasrāṇi sthirāyuṣaḥ sahasrāṇy atha ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇy atha ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇy atha ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇy atha sapta vai sahasrāṇy aparāṇi ca sahasrāṇy ayutāni ca sahasrāṇy ayutāni ca sahasrāṇy āvalohi saḥ sahasrāṇy ekaviṃśatiḥ sahasrādasya dāyādās sahasrādaḥ payodaś ca sahasrāyutasaṃmitam sahasrāyur ahaṃ bhadre sahasrāreṇa bhāsvatā sahasrāvartabhūṣitam sahasrās tāṃs tato hariḥ sahasrāsyaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ sahasrāṃśur divākaraḥ sahasrāṃśusahasradam sahasrāṃśuṃ jagatpatim sahasrāṃśuḥ sahasrāsyaḥ sahasrāṃśena te garbhaḥ sahasreṇa ca bāhunā sahasreṇa tu mitro vai sahasreṇa śatena ca sahasreṣu naraḥ kaścin sahasraikaṃ śatādhikam sahasrair api sattama sahasraiḥ so api saṃvṛtaḥ sahasroddhataśūlāya sahādityagaṇair dvijāḥ sahāpsarobhir mudito sahāyas te janārdanaḥ sahāyaṃ menire prāptaṃ sahāyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ sahāyārthe dadāmi te sahāyā vajrapāṇinaḥ sa hi ṛkṣabile vāṇīṃ sa hi taṃ pitur ādeśaṃ sahitaḥ kuṇḍalottame sahitaḥ sarvadaivataiḥ sahitāḥ sahitaṃ prajāḥ sahito gautamaḥ śiṣyair sahito viśvakarmaṇā sahitau rāmakeśavau sa hi devadevaḥ sākṣād sa hi devāsure yuddhe sa hi devo mahātejāḥ sa hi devyāḥ priyecchayā sa hi nāgān manuṣyeṣu sa hi mātā pitā caiva sa hi varṣāyutaṃ taptvā sa hi śrāddhaṃ kathaṃ kuryād sa hi saptasu dvīpeṣu sa hi sarvagataś caiva sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu sa hi svarbhānudauhitraḥ sahetau layam eti vai saheyaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ sahaiva maraṇe matim sahaivāṇḍakaṭāhena sa hy antarātmā bhūtānāṃ sahyapādaviniṣkrāntā sahyapādodbhavā nadyaḥ sa hy aśeṣajagatsraṣṭā sahyasya cottare yas tu sahyaṃ ca śuktimantaṃ ca sahyaṃ bhavatu tejas te sahyāc caivātha dakṣiṇe sa hy eka eva paralokagatasya bandhuḥ sahye ca śuktimante ca sahyo nāma mahāgiriḥ sahyo yajñamṛgavyādho saṃkaṭaṃ duḥkhadāyakam saṃkarṣaṇa namas te astu saṃkarṣaṇasahāyavān saṃkarṣaṇasahāyavān saṃkarṣaṇas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃkarṣaṇaṃ tu skandhena saṃkarṣaṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca saṃkarṣaṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca saṃkarṣaṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca saṃkarṣaṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca saṃkarṣaṇaṃ svamantreṇa saṃkarṣaṇātmako rudro saṃkarṣaṇāya ca namaḥ saṃkalpaṃ kuru yajñasya saṃkalpā ca muhūrtā ca saṃkalpād darśanāt sparśāt saṃkalpām akarot priyām saṃkalpāyās tu viśvātmā saṃkṛter api dharmātmā saṃkrāntividhinā naraiḥ saṃkrāntiṣu ca kartavyaṃ saṃkrāntau vaidhṛtau puṇya- saṃkrāntyām ayane tathā saṃkrāntyām ayane tathā saṃkrāntyāṃ viṣuvāyane saṃkṣayaṃ śārṅgadhanvanā saṃkṣipaty eṣa bhūtāni saṃkṣipyāpaḥ pibāmy aham saṃkṣipyec ca punar viprāḥ saṃkṣīṇākhilapātakaḥ saṃkṣubdhā mṛtyunā saha saṃkṣepāc chṛṇuta dvijāḥ saṃkṣepāc chṛṇu nārada saṃkṣepāt kathitaṃ dvijāḥ saṃkṣepāt tad bravīhi me saṃkṣepāt tan mayocyate saṃkṣepāt sarvam ākhyātaṃ saṃkṣepād vadato mama saṃkṣepeṇa dvijottamāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa mayā proktam saṃkṣepeṇa mayā bhūyaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa mayoktāni saṃkṣepeṇa muniśreṣṭhāḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ jāyate jagat saṃkhyānaṃ cāpi vidyate saṃkhyā pāpasya vidyate saṃkhyā prakurute caiva saṃkhyā sahasrakṛtyā tu saṃgacche ahaṃ na cānyathā saṃgataḥ paramātmanaḥ saṃgatā ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ saṃgatā gaṅgayā tac ca saṃgatā gaṅgayā tathā saṃgatāni ca puṇyāni saṃgatāni yathākramam saṃgatās tāni nārada saṃgatāṃ prekṣya rukmiṇīm saṃgatau gāṅgavāriṇā saṃgantuṃ bahudhā yadi saṃgamasya kṣamo naraḥ saṃgamāya tapodhanāḥ saṃgamāya dhṛtavrate saṃgame ditigaṅgāyāḥ saṃgame yatra kutrāpi saṃgame lokaviśrute saṃgame śraddhayā mune saṃgameṣu nadīnāṃ ca saṃgameṣu prasiddheṣu saṃgamo abhūt sudāruṇaḥ saṃgamo lokapūjitaḥ saṃgamau tatra vikhyātau saṃgamya caiva gautamyā saṃgarād gatacetasaḥ saṃgaro duḥkhakāraṇam saṃgaro abhūt sudāruṇaḥ saṃgaro abhūt sudāruṇaḥ saṃgaro abhūn mithaḥ purā saṃgopayām āsa pitur jaṭāsu saṃgrāmajitpradhānās tu saṃgrāmam atulaṃ cakre saṃgrāmaṃ sumahāghoraṃ saṃgrāmān subahūñ jitvā saṃgrāme cāpy ajeyatvaṃ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye saṃgrāme ripavaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ saṃgrāme vartamānasya saṃgrāme saṃkaṭe durge saṃghanirmūlanakṣamam saṃgharṣeṇa parasparam saṃghavicchedakāraṇam saṃghavicchedakāriṇī saṃghavidhvaṃsanakṣamam saṃghāte pacyamāno asau saṃcayāpacayā vyayāḥ saṃcaranti vimānāni saṃcaranti vimānāni saṃcaraṃś ca guhās tathā saṃcārān aśubhāṃs tathā saṃcārodvignacetasām saṃcintitam upāruhya saṃcintya puruṣaṃ svayam saṃcintya manasātmānaṃ saṃcintyamānaṃ manasā saṃcūrṇayati vānaraḥ saṃchannena kvacit kvacit saṃchādya taṃ yayau śeṣaḥ saṃchādya nirmale śānte saṃjagmatur dinakaraṃ saṃjagmur divam eva hi saṃjayasya jayaḥ putro saṃjayo nāma viśrutaḥ saṃjahre svakulaṃ katham saṃjātaṃ gautamasya hi saṃjātaṃ dvitayaṃ mama saṃjātaṃ māṃsavarjaṃ tu saṃjātā muniśārdūla saṃjātā vighnadoṣataḥ saṃjāto akhilapūrvajaḥ saṃjāyate muniśreṣṭhā saṃjīvaya prajāḥ sarvāḥ saṃjñayā tasya tat smṛtam saṃjñākarma kṛtaṃ mayā saṃjñā kāpi tvam āgatā saṃjñā tu pārthivī teṣām saṃjñā tu pārthivī viprāḥ saṃjñā dṛṣṭvā vivasvataḥ saṃjñā nāma sutapasā saṃjñām avāpsyate vīraḥ saṃjñāyate yena tad astadoṣaṃ saṃjñāyāṃ tapatāṃ varaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ vākyatatparā saṃjñāvākyair viśaṅkitaḥ saṃjñāṃ tathā mune so ayaṃ saṃjñāṃ nāma vivasvate saṃjñāṃ vaivasvato yamaḥ saṃjñeyam iti cintayan saṃjñeyam iti cintayan saṃtatiprāpaṇaṃ loke saṃtatir jāyatāṃ ślāghyā saṃtatis te bhaviṣyati saṃtatiḥ putrapautrikī saṃtateḥ kāraṇaṃ prati saṃtaptasikatena ca saṃtaptasikatena ca saṃtaptāṅgaḥ kathaṃ kuryāṃ saṃtapto asmi suraśreṣṭha saṃtartum upacakrame saṃtarpayet tathānyāṃś ca saṃtarpayet pitṝn mudgaiḥ saṃtarpya pitṛdevatāḥ saṃtarpya vidhivad budhaḥ saṃtarpyācamya vāgyataḥ saṃtarpyācamya vāgyataḥ saṃtāpayan sarvasurāsureśāṃs saṃtāpaṃ nityam āpnoti saṃtuṣṭaś cābhavan muniḥ saṃtuṣṭāḥ svadhanena ca saṃtuṣṭena sadā bhāvyaṃ saṃtoṣam āptāḥ paramaṃ samīkṣya saṃtoṣayām āsa tadātituṣṭaṃ saṃtoṣitaś cakragadāstradhārī saṃtoṣito nūpurarāvamātrād saṃtoṣito bhaktimatā hi tadvat saṃtyajya nijakarma yat saṃtyajya mokṣaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ saṃtyajya viṣayāṃs tasya saṃtyajyāvasathāṃs tadā saṃtrāsodvegajananaṃ saṃdaṃśayātanāmadhye saṃdaṃśaḥ śunabhojanaḥ saṃdaṃśaḥ śunabhojanaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ paralokaś ca saṃdṛśyate vāpy atha gamyate vā saṃdevo devarakṣitaḥ saṃdeśaiḥ saumyamadhuraiḥ saṃdehaḥ kasya jāyate saṃdraṣṭukāmā hy ājagāmātha śīghram saṃdhyayor ubhayor api saṃdhyākāle na kartavyaṃ saṃdhyākāle ardharātre vā saṃdhyākāle ardharātre vā saṃdhyākāleṣu ṣaṇḍhakāḥ saṃdhyātīrthaṃ kāratoyaṃ saṃdhyāyāṃ maithunaṃ cāpi saṃdhyārāgo vidagdhāṅgo saṃdhyārātridivāpakṣa- saṃdhyā rātrir ahar bhūmir saṃdhyā rātrir manojavā saṃdhyāsuto ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaś ca saṃdhyāṃ copāsya bhāskaram saṃdhyodakśīrṣanidrāṃ tām saṃdhyopāsanam eva ca saṃdhyopāstiṃ kariṣyāmi saṃnatis tasya cātmajaḥ saṃnater api dāyādaḥ saṃnaddhabaddhakakṣaiś ca saṃnidhānam athākarot saṃnidhānād yathākāśa- saṃnipātāvadhūtaiś ca saṃniyamyendriyagrāmaṃ saṃniroddhum atho kleśas saṃnyastaṃ patitaṃ śavam saṃnyasya viṣṇau paramātmarūpe saṃnyasya sāgarānte tu saṃnyāsena ca yat phalam saṃnyāsena yathoktena saṃpattaye hy asya vivṛddhaye ca saṃpatsu cāpatsu samānarūpā saṃpatsyanti tathā cānye saṃpatsyante tadopyante saṃpadāṃ sthairyasiddhaye saṃpadyate naraḥ pretya saṃpannam etat phalam uttamaṃ yat saṃpannair gokulaiś caiva saṃparāyas tayor abhūt saṃparāye dhanaṃ sarvaṃ saṃpaśyanti tvatpadābjaṃ maheśa saṃpātir garuḍas tathā saṃpātiś ca jaṭāyuś ca saṃpātiḥ patagottamaḥ saṃpādayiṣye śvas tubhyaṃ saṃpūjayaty ādikeśam saṃpūjayitvā vividhaiś ca mantrair saṃpūjayet tathā vahnau saṃpūjitaṃ somam ahaṃ namāmi saṃpūjito devagaṇair yathāvat saṃpūjya gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ saṃpūjya ca mahādevaṃ saṃpūjya caivātha mahopacārair saṃpūjya taṃ jagannāthaṃ saṃpūjya taṃ namaskṛtya saṃpūjya taṃ suravaraṃ saṃpūjya taṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ saṃpūjya taṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ saṃpūjya devaṃ sakaleśvaraṃ taṃ saṃpūjya narakesarīm saṃpūjya padmam āvāhya saṃpūjya puruṣottamam saṃpūjya puruṣottamam saṃpūjya puruṣottamam saṃpūjya praṇipatya ca saṃpūjya praṇipatya ca saṃpūjya preṣayām āsa saṃpūjyamānaṃ mahadāsanastham saṃpūjya vidhivat tataḥ saṃpūjya vidhivad bhaktyā saṃpūjya vidhivad bhaktyā saṃpūjya vidhivad viṣṇuṃ saṃpūjya vividhair vākyair saṃpūjya śarvaṃ nṛpatir yathāvat saṃpūjya śraddhayānvitā saṃpūjya sumanobhis taṃ saṃpūjya someśvaram āpa liṅgam saṃpūjyas tvaṃ tu deveśa saṃpūjya svāgatenaitān saṃpūjya halinā saha saṃpūjyāvaraṇair yuktaṃ saṃpūjyā havyakavyābhyām saṃpūjyaivaṃ jagannāthaṃ saṃpūjyaivaṃ jagannāthaṃ saṃpūjyaivaṃ vidhānena saṃpūrṇam abhavat tadā saṃpūrṇalakṣaṇopetā saṃpūrṇās tā bhavantu me saṃpūrṇās tena saṃpadaḥ saṃpūrṇe tu kratau viṣṇur saṃpūrṇe tu tadā rājā saṃpūrṇe daśarātre tu saṃpraṇamya ca bhaktitaḥ saṃpradānena kena vā saṃpradīptamahāsvanaḥ saṃpramūḍhena cetasā saṃprayāte api bhāskare saṃprayuktau ca sarvadā saṃprayuktau tathaiva tau saṃprayuktau yathā saha saṃprayogaiḥ sukhapradam saṃpravṛtte mahākṣaye saṃpraśasya tathā lakṣmīṃ saṃpraśnaṃ dvijasattamāḥ saṃprasādya tato rāmo saṃprasīda prapannārti- saṃprahāraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭāni sarvaśaḥ saṃprāpayiṣye nanu satyam etat saṃprāptavān matprasādād saṃprāptaś cāpi sāyāhne saṃprāptaṃ cāśmavarṣaṇam saṃprāptaḥ paramapadaṃ yato na kiṃcit saṃprāptākhilavāñchitā saṃprāptā bahuśo viprāḥ saṃprāptā matsamīpataḥ saṃprāpte ca kalau yuge saṃprāpto jaṭharān mayā saṃprāpto madhusūdanaḥ saṃprāpto vai jarā nāma saṃprāpto asi mamāgrataḥ saṃprāpto ahaṃ surottamāḥ saṃprāpya paramaṃ tattvaṃ saṃprāpya puṇyam uttamam saṃprāpya vaiṣṇavaṃ yogaṃ saṃprāpya sakalān kāmān saṃprāpyovāca deveśaṃ saṃprāpsyase putra madājñayā tvam saṃprītyā kriyate yadi saṃbandhayogyaḥ śūraś ca saṃbandhaḥ sāptapauruṣaḥ saṃbandhī droṇapāṭhakaḥ saṃbandhe gadato mama saṃbandho atra kathaṃ bhavet saṃbandho api tathāpy āsīd saṃbandho apy asya vaṃśe asmin saṃbabhūva mahān nṛpaḥ saṃbabhūvur diśaḥ sarvāḥ saṃbabhūvur yathākālaṃ saṃbodhād dharmaśīlatā saṃbodhya śaryātim uvāca vipraś saṃbhakṣya sarvabhūtāni saṃbhagne taruparvate saṃbhavanti tathā pare saṃbhavanti yuge yuge saṃbhavanti surādayaḥ saṃbhavantīha mānavāḥ saṃbhavas tu śruto asmābhir saṃbhavaṃ bhuvi durlabham saṃbhaviṣyanti gautama saṃbhaviṣyanti gautama saṃbhavetāṃ tadanvaye saṃbhave saṃbhave te tu saṃbhāvayām āsa sa taṃ saṃbhāvyā naiva cākhyeyam saṃbhāvyās te na cākhyeyam saṃbhāṣe paśya mām iha saṃbhūtam akhilaṃ yataḥ saṃbhūtas tasya cātmajaḥ saṃbhūtasya tu dāyādas saṃbhūtaḥ sumahāsuraḥ saṃbhūtā jaṭhare tadvad saṃbhūtā dhārmikī punaḥ saṃbhūtānīha yugapan saṃbhūte sa ca garbhe ca saṃbhūto brahmarākṣasaḥ saṃbhūto brahmarākṣasaḥ saṃbhūto brahmarākṣasaḥ saṃbhūto bhāskaro jātas saṃbhūya devā daiteyā saṃbhūyāham aśeṣataḥ saṃbhojya ca dvijottamān saṃmataḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ saṃmato balavāṃś caiva saṃmantrya devair asuraiś ca sarvair saṃmantryāha ca niṣkṛtim saṃmantryeha ca yujyate saṃmānayan bhṛtyagaṇaṃ samagram saṃmānenābhyanandayat saṃmānyāṃś cāvamanyante saṃmārjanavidhau ca yat saṃmārjitajalāśinaḥ saṃmārjitāḥ kuśā yatra saṃmukhaḥ sa viḍambanām saṃmūḍhā na vidur nūnaṃ saṃyateṣv agnihotriṣu saṃyāvaṃ kṛśaraṃ māṃsaṃ saṃyuktāḥ puruṣāḥ sadā saṃyuge vartamāne tu saṃyujyamānas tapasā saṃyogaḥ saṃcayaḥ kṣayaḥ saṃyogānāṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā saṃyogo yoga ucyate saṃyojyātmānam ātmani saṃrakṣito yair abhivardhitaś ca saṃrabdhau tāv ubhau tatra saṃrambhākṣiptalāṅgūlaḥ saṃrambhāt taṃ śatakratum saṃrambhād dānavottamaḥ saṃlihya cāsthīni daduḥ surāṇām saṃvatsarakaro aśvatthaḥ saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūn saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūn saṃvatsaram upāsīta saṃvatsaras tvam ṛtavo saṃvatsarasya paryante saṃvatsaraṃ tathā gavyaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ tu kumbhīras saṃvatsarair ity udīrya saṃvartakabalāhakau saṃvartakaṃ nāma gaṇaṃ saṃvartavasunāmnas tu saṃvartaḥ kauśiko raibhyo saṃvartākhyena vahninā saṃvartāya mahātmane saṃvarto bhauvanaṃ tadā saṃvarto vartakaś caiva saṃvādaś ca tayoḥ katham saṃvādaś ca purā tv āsīl saṃvādaṃ ca tayor buddhvā saṃvādaṃ cāgnivāriṇoḥ saṃvāhya tās tadā rājā saṃvāhyantāṃ ca śakaṭair saṃvibhāgapriyāya ca saṃvibhāgaṃ manuṣyebhyo saṃvibhāgaḥ purāṇāṃ vā saṃvivardhayiṣūn prajāḥ saṃviveśa kokāmukham ārtarūpaḥ saṃviveśa varāsane saṃvīkṣya ṣaṭsūrmiṣu śāntabhāvāḥ saṃvṛtaḥ saha bhāryayā saṃvṛtāsyaḥ suniścalaḥ saṃveṣṭayām āsur athāsurās te saṃveṣṭayitvā naśyanti saṃveṣṭayitvā puram atriputra saṃveṣṭito devagaṇair maheśaḥ saṃveṣṭya kṣāram udadhiṃ saṃveṣṭya liṅgaṃ tu visṛṣṭakāmaḥ saṃśayacchedanāya te saṃśayaṃ kurute manaḥ saṃśayaṃ chettum arhasi saṃśayaṃ no hṛdi sthitam saṃśayaṃ munisattamāḥ saṃśayaṃ me hṛdi sthitam saṃśayaṃ vo mahāmatiḥ saṃśayaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam saṃśayaḥ paramo nāśo saṃśayo no mahān atra saṃśayo me mahān ayam saṃśayo me mahān ayam saṃśayo hṛdi vartate saṃśuṣyamāṇatālvoṣṭha- saṃśoṣayitvā divam āruroha saṃśrayiṣyati keśavam saṃśrayiṣyanti bho viprās saṃśrayiṣyanti mānavāḥ saṃśrayiṣye nirāmayam saṃśritaḥ pratisaṃśrayet saṃśrūyate yatra vacaḥ śiveti saṃśleṣasaṃlāpaparā babhūva saṃsargāṇi samastāni saṃsargād atisaṃsargāt saṃsādhitāśeṣajagaddhito asau saṃsārakūpe patito asmi daivān saṃsāracakram ajaraṃ saṃsāracakram ajaraṃ saṃsāracakram āsādya saṃsāracakre parivartamāne saṃsāraceṣṭāsu gatānurāgāḥ saṃsāratāpatrayadāvadagdhāḥ saṃsāraduḥkhakhinnānām saṃsāraduḥkhāpaham saṃsārapatitasyaiko saṃsārabhayapīḍitaḥ saṃsāramadhye māyāyās saṃsāramokṣahetuś ca saṃsāraśramaparitāpataptacetā saṃsārasāgaragamāṃ saṃsārasāgare ghore saṃsārasāgare ghore saṃsārasāgare magnaṃ saṃsārasāgare magnaṃ saṃsārasindhoḥ param āptakāmā saṃsārasthasya dehinaḥ saṃsārasya vicitratām saṃsāraṃ na ca sevate saṃsāraṃ vedmi keśava saṃsārāṇāṃ śataṃ gatvā saṃsārān subahūn gatvā saṃsārārṇavapotāya saṃsārāsaṅgavarjitam saṃsārāsthāparāṅmukhaḥ saṃsārāsthāvirahitā saṃsāre dehinām anyā saṃsāre na bhavet punaḥ saṃsāre anyo na kaścana saṃsāreṣu nimajjati saṃsāre asmiñ jagannātha saṃsāre asmiñ janārdana saṃsāre asmin nirālambe saṃsāre asmin mahāghore saṃsāre asmin mahāghore saṃsiddhā daivataiḥ saha saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ tathā saṃsidhyante manogatāḥ saṃsūcitaṃ lokahitāya tasyāḥ saṃsṛtiṃ cātidustarām saṃsevitaṃ tīrtham ato babhūva saṃskāram akarot tayoḥ saṃskāraṃ kālajanitaṃ saṃskāraṃ lambhayām āsa saṃskārādi tadākarot saṃskṛto vedapāragaḥ saṃstavaiś ca svakarmabhiḥ saṃstuto bhagavān itthaṃ saṃstuto asi mayā prabho saṃstuvanti mudānvitāḥ saṃstūyate yatra sadeti tatra saṃstūyamānacaritaḥ saṃstūyamānam udgandhi- saṃstūyamānaś ca tathāpsarobhir saṃstūyamānaḥ sa tadā saṃstūyamānā munibhir marudbhiḥ saṃstūyamāno gopālaiḥ saṃstūyamāno rāmas tu saṃstūyamānau gandharvair saṃstotum upacakrame saṃstotum upacakrame saṃstotum upacakrame saṃstotum upacakrame saṃsthānam asya jagato saṃsthānaiḥ prāpyate vyathā saṃsthānaiḥ prāpyate vyathā saṃsthāpitāny atra vadasva yuktam saṃsthāpya ca śubhe deśe saṃsthāpya cāstrāṇy atidīptimanti saṃsthāpya tat puṣpakam āśu rakṣaḥ saṃsthāpya dṛṣṭiṃ nāsāgre saṃsthāpya nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ saṃsthāpya yatra deveśaḥ saṃsthāpya śirasādhārya saṃsthitā girirājani saṃspardhamānā danum ājagāma saṃspṛśya śudhyate snānād saṃspṛśyākṛṣya ca prītyā saṃspṛṣṭo bāhyavāyunā saṃsmaran puruṣo dvijaḥ saṃsmaran yauvane dīrghaṃ saṃsmṛtya praṇipatyainaṃ saṃsmṛtya svakṛtaṃ kṛtam saṃsmṛtyābhyāgataṃ hariḥ saṃsrakṣyāmi varārohe saṃhatānāṃ ca vastrāṇāṃ saṃhatāśvasutau dvijāḥ saṃhatāśvo nikumbhasya saṃhara pratimāṃ vibho saṃharasva punaḥ śīghraṃ saṃharasvedam ātreya saṃharāmy ātmamāyayā saṃharet sacarācaram saṃhartā ca dvijottama saṃhartā caiva bhūtānāṃ saṃhartā daṇḍake vane saṃhartā prabhavo avyayaḥ saṃhartā rudraśaktyā tvaṃ saṃhartā sa maheśvaraḥ saṃhārakāle ca hareta bhūyaḥ saṃhārasya ca bho dvijāḥ saṃhāraṃ tu karoti yaḥ saṃhāraṃ teṣu nityaśaḥ saṃhārānteṣu saṃbhavāḥ saṃhāre cāpi saṃhṛtaḥ saṃhitādhyāyinā bhāvyaṃ saṃhṛtya kopaṃ vṛkṣebhyaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt saṃhrādaś ca caturtho abhūd saṃhrādasya tu daityasya saṃhrādaḥ sambaraḥ svanaḥ saṃhrādo gamanapriyaḥ sā kadācid bhartṛvākyād sā kanyā taṃ patiṃ prāpya sā karoti sadaiva hi sākarod ātmanaś chāyām sākarṣata śanais taṃ tu sā kāmarūpeṇa caraty aśeṣāṃ sākāreṣu pṛthak pṛthak sākāro atha nirākṛtiḥ sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ sā kṛṣiḥ pretya bhāvinī sā kṛṣṭā tena sahasā sākṣāc caraty asau dharmas sākṣāt kāruṇikaḥ śivaḥ sākṣātkṛtas tvayā tryakṣo sākṣāt tatrābhavac chivaḥ sākṣād agnir iva jvalan sākṣād amṛtasaṃvāhā sākṣād āgatya taṃ śaṃbhuḥ sākṣād indra ivāparaḥ sākṣād dhareṇa tuṣṭena sākṣād rūpeṇa sarvadā sākṣād viṣṇus trivikramaḥ sākṣād vedoditaṃ mayā sākṣād vedoditaṃ śubham sākṣāl lakṣmīr ivāparā sākṣāl lakṣmīr ivāparā sākṣāl lakṣmīvivardhanam sā kṣiptā viyati sthitim sākṣibhūtā divāniśam sākṣī kṣetrajña ucyate sā gatā kutracit tadā sā gatvā gautamīṃ devīṃ sā gatvā jvalanaṃ hetis sā gatvā rājavacanaṃ sā gatvoṣā gṛhaṃ tvaṣṭuḥ sāgaratvaṃ ca lebhe sa sāgarasya jalasyānte sāgarasya taṭaṃ tyaktvā sāgarasya mayoditam sāgarasya vidhiḥ kramāt sāgarasyeva garjataḥ sāgarasyormayo yathā sāgaraṃ ca prasādayet sāgaraṃ dakṣiṇāśrayam sāgaraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ sāgarāṇāṃ ca nāśanam sāgarāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sāgarāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ sāgarān īkṣayām āsa sāgarāntāṃ vasuṃdharām sāgarān balinaḥ kṛtīn sāgarā brahmaśāpena sāgarāmbudharā purā sāgarāmbhaḥsamākṛṣṭaṃ sāgarāmbhaḥsamāplutam sāgarāś ca tathā śailās sāgarāṃś ca viśeṣataḥ sāgarāḥ sarva eva hi sāgare cendradyumnākhye sāgare vidhivat snātvā sāgareṣu ca śaileṣu sāgarottaraṇe tariḥ sāgniśveta ivācalaḥ sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ punaḥ sāgrāṇi kathitāni ca sāṅgaṃ bhavatu tat sarvaṃ sāṅgān vyākaraṇāni ca sāṅgāś ca caturo vedāḥ sāṅgopāṅgeṣu gīyase sā cakāra kuṭumbinī sā cakāra nadītīre sā cakre susamāhitā sā ca taṃ kāmajair bhāvair sā ca taṃ cāruhāsinī sā ca taṃ prāha garbhāṇḍam sā ca taṃ siddham abravīt sā ca putrārthinī devī sā ca mām abravīd devī sā ca vavre varaṃ tadā sā ca sarvaṃ nyavedayat sā cāpi yatpādaratā ca lakṣmīs sā cāpi virarāma ha sā cāpi sarvabhāvena sā cāpy āha tvayoditam sā cāsmākaṃ parā gatiḥ sā cāsmai kathayām āsa sā cāha kāntaṃ vinayād uktam eva sā cet kulīnā priyabhāṣiṇī ca sā ced gurūpakārāya sā ceyaṃ gautamī gaṅgā sā chāyā vartayām āsa sā jagāmorvaśī dvijāḥ sā jahāsātigarvitā sā jighāṃsati lokāṃs trīṃs sā tatpariharantī ca sā tat pariharantī tu sā tatra patitā dikṣu sā tatheti pratijñāya sā tathoktā tayā mātrā sā tad annaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā sā tan niravamac chukraṃ sā tam āha pativratā sā tasya caivābhimatā babhūva sā tasya mātaiva na saṃśayo atra sā taṃ prāha mahābhāgaṃ sā taṃ prāha mahāmunim sātīrthaṃ lokapālākhyaṃ sā tu dṛṣṭvā priyaṃ taṃ tu sā tu dṛṣṭvaiva bhartāraṃ sā tu devī satī pūrvam sā tu dharmavyavasthānaṃ sā tu nirbhartsitā tena sā tu bhartuś citāṃ kṛtvā sā tu mātre nyavedayat sā tu roditi te mātā sā tu varṣāyutaṃ taptvā sā tu vāg asphuṭā viprā sā tu vāg asphuṭā viprā sā tu śukraprasādataḥ sā te māyā janārdana sā te vidyāṃ pradāsyati sāttvikā devalokāya sāttvikānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ sāttvikānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ sāttvikān sattvasaṃśrayāt sāttvikā rājasāś cānye sāttviko rājasas tathā sātrājitī satyabhāmā sātvatā kīrtivardhanaḥ sā tvaṃ śāsanam āsthāya sā tv evam uktā grāheṇa sā dadarśa mahākūṭaṃ sā dāsī syān mayoditam sādinaś ca tathā sarve sā duhyamānā pṛthunā sā devī sūktam ity evam sādritoyādhikānanā sādrinagārṇavābhogaṃ sādhakaḥ phalapākāntaḥ sādhako nātra saṃśayaḥ sādhanaṃ kurute ca yat sādhanaṃ yac carācare sādhanaṃ yad yad ucyate sādhavaḥ syur dayānvitāḥ sādhike sā śubhānanā sādhitaṃ kṛṣṇa devānām sādhitaṃ yair anāśakam sādhitaṃ yair anāśakam sādhu kṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti sādhu gautama bhadraṃ te sādhunā gṛhamedhinā sādhu bhadre samīraya sādhubhiḥ sāttvikāni tu sādhu rājan mahāmate sādhuvādo nirarthakaḥ sādhuvṛttiḥ kṛtayuge sādhuśabdopaśobhitam sādhusatyamahātmanām sādhu satyaṃ tvayā vipra sādhu sādhu jagannātha sādhu sādhu dvijaśreṣṭhā sādhu sādhu mahābhāga sādhu sādhu mahīpāla sādhu sādhu muniśreṣṭhā sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan sādhu sādhv iti te hocuḥ sādhu sādhv ity athābruvan sādhu sādhv ity abhāṣata sādhūnām upajāyate sādhūnāṃ darśane ratāḥ sādhūnāṃ parivṛttiś ca sādhūnāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya sādhūpacārāt sahasā sādhyasādhananispṛham sādhyasādhanabhāvena sādhyaṃ kenāpy upāyena sādhyān ajanayad devān sādhyāni yāni na bhavanti nirīkṣitāni sādhyā rudrāś ca viśve ca sādhyā viśvā ca bho dvijāḥ sādhyā viśve ca maruto sādhyā viśve marudgaṇāḥ sādhyā sādhyān vyajāyata sādhyāṃs tathā yakṣagaṇān diśaś ca sādhyāḥ sarve marudgaṇāḥ sādhyaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ saha sādhvasaṃ paramaṃ gatā sādhv asādhu yathā tathā sādhvī bindumatī nāma sādhv etat te mahat kṛtam sādhvy etat sarvabhāvena sā na jānāti tac cittaṃ śakrasya dviṣato ditiḥ sā nadī vaḍavābhavat sā nadī samajāyata sānapatyā purā cāsīt sānītā viṣṇunā devī sānugartaṃ samāhendraṃ sānugasya yamasyāto sānuge vinipātite sānuje vinipātite sānurāgā manoramā sānurāgā hariṃ prati sānulepanabhājanām sā naiva yoṣit tanaye abhijāte sāntar jalaṃ snātum atha praviṣṭā sāntardhānaṃ sadā kāryaṃ sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā vācā sāntvayan sa tadā vākyam sāntvayānas tam abravīt sāntvayām āsa vai tadā sāntvayitvā nṛpottamam sāndranīlalatāhastaṃ sāndramāñjiṣṭhavarṇābhaṃ sāndrasindūrasaṃnibham sāpatnā bhrātaro mithaḥ sāpatnā rāvaṇaś caiva sāpatnyaṃ yo anumanyate sāpatnyād daityadānavāḥ sāpatyaś cottarāsu ca sāpatyā ca kulīnā ca sā papāta mahītale sāpaśyad induvadanā sāpahnavaṃ mama mano sāpi kesariṇo bhāryā sāpi taṃ garbhasaṃsthaṃ ca sāpi taṃ tanayaṃ hareḥ sāpi devī gate tasmin sāpi daivavaśāt putra sāpi niṣpādyate vṛṣṭiḥ sāpi novāca lajjitā sāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā sāpi priyā śivasyādya sāpi svargaṃ jagāma ha sāpīyam ambā jagato janitrī sā purī vipulākārā sā purī vipulākārā sā purī vividhaiḥ saṃghair sā purī vividhaiḥ saṃghair sā purūravasaṃ prāha sā puṃskokilamādhurye sāpy abhūd atiduḥkhitā sāpy āste añjanaparvate sā praśastā dvijanmanām sā prāyād yatra rājāsau sā prāha taṃ siddhavaraṃ sā prāha śakaṭo vipra sā priyābhūn mahāśaneḥ sā provāca pitṝn devān sā provāca yamaṃ devaṃ sāphalyakaraṇo raṇaḥ sāphalyam akṣṇor yugapan mamāstu sā babhūva varāṅganā sā babhūvātivepathuḥ sā babhrāma bahūn deśān sābravīt putram ātmīyam sābravīn niyamo bhadra sā bhartrā gautamīṃ yayau sābhavat tatra gaṅgāyāṃ sābhijñānāni santi vai sābhimānam idaṃ vacaḥ sābhilāṣā tadā sā tu sā bhūmiḥ saiṃhikī bhūtvā sābhragaṅgāprapāto asau sābhraṃ caivābhavat tadā sāmagaṃ tīrtham eva ca sāmagā brahmavādinaḥ sāmago atīva niṣkṛpaḥ sāmagryaṃ caiva bandhuṣu sāmaghoṣasvaro mahān sāma copapradānaṃ ca sāmadhvanivarāya ca sāmapūrvam umāpatiḥ sāmayajñavide caiva sā mayā madanārtena sā mayā saṃyutā yayau sāmayogavide namaḥ sāmarthyaṃ tava paśyāmaḥ sāmarthyaṃ dṛśyate katham sāmarthyaṃ putratīrthayoḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṅgavarjanāt sāmaśabdopabṛṃhitaiḥ sāmātyaḥ sapurohitaḥ sāmātyān sapurohitān sāmātyān sapurohitān sāmātyaiḥ sapurohitaiḥ sāmātharvayutas tathā sāmānyamātrato nyāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ vo bhaviṣyati sāmānyaḥ sarvalokasya sāmānyaḥ sarvalokānāṃ sāmānyāni dvijottamāḥ sāmānyenaiva me kṛtaḥ sā mām evam abhāṣata sā māṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyitā sāmudraṃ tīrtham ākhyātaṃ sāmudrīṇāṃ dvijottamāḥ sā mṛtādya mahārāja sāmopāyena tadvākyāt sāmnā naiva vayaṃ śaktā sāmne ca sāmagītāya sāmbam anyāyaceṣṭitam sāmbam āśu vimuñcata sāmbaṃ jāmbavatīputraṃ sāmbaṃ patnyā samanvitam sāmbādyā bāhuśālinaḥ sāmbo jāmbavatīsutaḥ sāmyatāṃ pratiyānty uta sāmyam ekatvatāṃ yāto sāmyenaiva nivartayet sāyakaṃ dhārayan param sāyaṃprātar yathāvidhi sāyaṃ prātaś ca bhoktavyaṃ sāyaṃprātas tathā homaṃ sāyāhne kadalīkhaṇḍāḥ sāyujyatāṃ brahmaṇo asau jagāma sāyudhāṣṭamahābhujam sāratā yābhavan mūrtā sārathiś ca yathā yuktaḥ sārabhūtaṃ sanātanam sārasaiś ca balākaiś ca sārasvatam iti śrutam sārasvataṃ nāma tīrthaṃ sārasvatībhiḥ puṇyābhir sārasvateṣu gomatyāṃ sārasvateṣu tīrtheṣu sāraṃ samastagoṣṭhasya sā rākṣasī tat puram āsasāda sārāt sārataraṃ cedam sārāt sārataraṃ param sārāt sārataraṃ param sārīkaḥ saṃprajāyate sāroddharaṇadūṣitam sārghapātrā janārdanam sārṇavā dharmabhūṣitā sārdhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ śrīs tu sārdhaṃ mayaiva deveśaṃ sārdhaṃ yāmaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ sārdhaṃ vākyam athābravīt sārdhaṃ sa nāgair aparair mahātmā sārvakāmikam eva ca sārvabhaumaḥ pratāpavān sālaṃkārāṇi mādhava sā lokān brahmalokādīn sāvajñaṃ yo abhivīkṣate sāvajñaṃ samavaikṣata sāvarṇa iti cocyate sāvarṇa iti cocyate sāvarṇajananī tadā sāvarṇasya manoḥ putrā sāvarṇasyeha bho dvijāḥ sāvarṇā manavo viprāḥ sāvarṇiś ca manus tadvad sāvarṇiś ca śaniś caiva sāvarṇiḥ sa tapodhanāḥ sā vāṇy enaṃ munīśvarāḥ sā vāpi syān mama surā sāvitrīgranthisaṃyuktam sāvitrī caiva gāyatrī sāvitrī caiva gāyatrī sāvitrīhradam eva ca sāvitryādyāḥ pañca sutā sā vimuktamahārāvā sā vepamānā vinatā sā vai bhāryā bhagavato sā śaktiḥ punar apy evaṃ sā śaśāpa tadātmajān sāśrugadgadayā girā sāśvamātaṅgamānavām sāśvaṃ hataṃ prasenaṃ tu sā saṃgatā pūrvam apāṃpatiṃ taṃ sā saṃbhramād āgatā cāśramaṃ svaṃ sāste adyāpi svarūpiṇī sāsmākaṃ sukhadā sadā sāhañjanī nāma purī sāhañjas tasya cātmajaḥ sāhasāc cāpalena ca sāhaṃkārā dayāhīnā sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi sāhāyyaṃ vaḥ kariṣyāmi sā hi satyavatī puṇyā sāṃkṛtir gālavaś caiva sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi sāṃkhyajñāne ca ye doṣāṃs sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvat sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvad sāṃkhyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca kṛtsnena sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ sāṃkhyayogāṃś ca kṛtsnaśaḥ sāṃkhyayoge ca kuśalā sāṃkhyayogena mokṣiṇīm sāṃkhyayogo mayā proktaḥ sāṃkhyaśrutinidarśanāt sāṃkhyasyātinidarśanam sāṃkhyaṃ ca dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha sāṃkhyaṃ jñānena saṃyuktaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ tad anugamyate sāṃkhyaṃ mūrtir iti śrutiḥ sāṃkhyaṃ yogasya no vipra sāṃkhyaṃ viśālaṃ paramaṃ purāṇaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ vai mokṣadarśanam sāṃkhyaṃ samyag dvijātayaḥ sāṃkhyāgataṃ tac ca mahāmunīndrāḥ sāṃkhyāgataṃ tan nikhilaṃ munīndrāḥ sāṃkhyānām avanīpate sāṃkhyānāṃ tu paraṃ tattvaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ viditātmanām sāṃkhyāya sāṃkhyamukhyāya sāṃkhyā viprā mahāprājñā sāṃkhyā viprā mahāprājñās sāṃkhyāś cāmitadarśanāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ śāstraviniścayāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ praśaṃsanti sāṃkhye ca kathyate yoge sāṃkhye ca paṭhyate śāstre sāṃkhye tv idānīṃ dharmasya sāṃkhye dvijā bho iha śiṣṭajuṣṭe sāṃkhye yathāvad vihitāni viprāḥ sāṃkhye vā yadi vā yoga sāṃkhye sāṃkhyavidhānajñā sāṃtānikādayo vā te sāṃdīpanir asaṃbhāvyaṃ sāṃnidhyam agamat tuṣṭo sāṃnidhyaṃ mama caivātra sāṃpratasya mahādyuteḥ sāṃprataṃ ca jagatsvāmī sāṃprataṃ manur ucyate sāṃprataṃ vai yathā kṛtam sāṃprataṃ samupasthite sikatābhiḥ samantataḥ siktā ceti ca tatrāsīt siktāyāḥ saṃgame puṇyam sigrukaṃ kovidārakam sicyamānā vrajanti ca sitakṛṣṇāv ivāmbudau sitakṛṣṇau dvijottamāḥ sitadīrghādiniḥśeṣa- sitapadmopari raviṃ sitapuṣpavibhūṣitaḥ sitaprākāraśobhitam sitabhasmapriyāya ca sitaraktais tathā pītaiḥ sitavastraparicchannaṃ sitādrinicayaprabhaḥ sitābhraśikharākāraṃ sitābhrāvayavā iva sitāmbhojāvataṃsakam siddhagandharvamānuṣāḥ siddhagandharvasevitaḥ siddhagandharvasevitaḥ siddhacāraṇagandharva- siddhacāraṇapannagaiḥ siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca siddhacāraṇasevitāḥ siddhacāraṇasevite siddhacāraṇasevitaiḥ siddhatīrtham iti khyātaṃ siddhanimbaśubhāñjanaiḥ siddhayogair akalmaṣaiḥ siddhavākyaṃ tataḥ śrutvā siddhavidyādharān ṛṣīn siddhavidyādharās tathā siddhavidyādharāḥ sādhyāḥ siddhavidyādharair yakṣair siddhavidyādharair yakṣaiḥ siddhavidyādharaiś cāpi siddhavidyāṃ ca śāstrāṇi siddhavṛndaiḥ sadā hṛṣṭair siddhavṛndaiḥ sadā hṛṣṭair siddhasaṃgamabhūṣitā siddhas tam āha tāṃ vedmi siddhādimunisevitam siddhādimunisevitam siddhānāṃ kapilo yathā siddhān dharmavidas tathā siddhāpsarobhir gandharvaiḥ siddhā munaya eva ca siddhārthakānāṃ kalkena siddhārthacaṇakaiś caiva siddhāś ca munayas tathā siddhāś cānye ca brāhmaṇāḥ siddhāś cāpsarasas tvatto siddhāś cāpsaraso nāgā siddhāś caiva tapodhanāḥ siddhāḥ sādhyā munayo guhyakāś siddhidaṃ munayo viduḥ siddhidaṃ vai pitāmahe siddhim alpena kālena siddhimūrtis tathā dyutiḥ siddhir atra paratra ca siddhis tuṣṭis tathā puṣṭiḥ siddhiṃ kuru sukhaṃ yāhi siddhiṃ gacchanty avighnataḥ siddhiṃ ca devīṃ varuṇasya patnīṃ siddhiṃ ca sarvarddhim abhīpsitāṃ ca siddhiṃ prāpsyasi kalyāṇīṃ siddhiṃ yāntu maheśvara siddhiṃ yāsyanti mānavāḥ siddhiṃ yāsyasi viprendra siddhiṃ vindati kaścana siddhiṃ saṃvatsarāl labhet siddhe kārye surān prati siddhe tu mantre punar eva laṅkām siddheśvaras tatra devo siddheśvaraṃ tatra tīrthaṃ siddheśvaraṃ nāma jagatprasiddhaṃ siddheśvaraṃ mitravalaṃ siddheśvaro yatra devaḥ siddhair aśeṣaiḥ parisevitaṃ ca siddhai rājarṣibhis tathā siddhair āmrātakais tathā siddhair vidvadbhir eva ca siddhair vṛto yogibhir aprameyaiḥ siddho api vicacārāsau siddho abravīn na jānāmi sidhmāpasmārayor api sidhyanti cāsya saṃkalpā sidhyanti nātra saṃśayaḥ sidhyanti hi manorathāḥ sidhyanty annāni cintanāt sinīvālī kumudvatī sindhujātaiḥ suśobhanaiḥ sindhudvīpa iti khyāto sindhudvīpapitābhavat sindhudvīpasya vīryavān sindhusena iti śrutaḥ sindhusenavadhāt tataḥ sindhusauvīramadrakāḥ sindhor uttarakūleṣu siprā payoṣṇī nirvindhyā siprā hy avantī ca tathā siṣicur netrajair jalaiḥ siṣeva kāmān atulān maharṣiḥ sisṛkṣur vividhāḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣur vividhāḥ prajāḥ siṃhacarmaparīdhānaḥ siṃhatuṇḍaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ ca siṃhanādaṃ tataś cakre siṃhayukte bṛhaspatau siṃharūpādibhiḥ sthitam siṃhaveṣeṇa līlayā siṃhasaṃhanano yuvā siṃhaskandho mahābhujaḥ siṃhasya pratimāṃ kṛtvā siṃhasyārdhatanuṃ prabhuḥ siṃhaḥ prasenam avadhīt siṃhārdhakṛtadehasya siṃhārdhakṛtavigrahaḥ siṃhārdhakṛtavigrahaḥ siṃhāsanagataṃ hariḥ siṃhāsanagato devaḥ siṃhāsanam upasthitam siṃhikā cābhavat kanyā siṃhikātanayāṃś caiva siṃhikāyām athotpannā siṃho jāmbavatā hataḥ siṃho mṛgāṇāṃ patayas sītayā bhāṣitaṃ dṛḍham sītayā lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā saha vaidehyā sītayā sahito dvija sītā ca labdhā hanumāṃś ca bandhuḥ sītā cālakanandā ca sītām adṛṣṭvā hanumān sītām ādāya śatruhā sītāyāḥ padam anvicchan sītā vākyam athābravīt sītāṃ ca guṇaśālinīm sītāṃ lakṣmīm ayonijām sīteti prathitā jane sīmantena virājitāḥ sīmantonnayanaṃ cakre sīmāntaṃ ca punar vanam sīrayajñāś ca karṣakāḥ sukanyā caikataḥ smṛtā sukapolāḥ sthirālakāḥ sukarmāṇy avatāre tu sukumāraka mā rodīs sukumāratanur garbhe sukumāratanur hariḥ sukumāraś ca tatsutaḥ sukumāras tato abhavat sukumārasya putras tu sukumārasya putras tu sukumāraṃ kumārakam sukumārī kumārī ca sukumāro manīrakaḥ sukṛtaṃ karma vai bhuṅkte sukṛtaṃ kvāpi vidyate sukṛtī ko api jānāti sukṛtī tatra yaḥ kuryād sukṛtī duṣkṛtī vāpi suketus tasya cātmajaḥ suketos tanayaś cāpi sukeśāś cāruvadanāḥ sukeśāḥ sukapolāś ca sukeśī nīlakeśā ca sukeśyaś cārujaghanāḥ sukhadaṃ kīrtivardhanam sukhadaṃ bhuvi durlabham sukhaduḥkhapradātāraṃ sukhaduḥkhapradātāraṃ sukhaduḥkhasamāyuktā sukhaduḥkhaṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ sukhaduḥkhādilakṣaṇaḥ sukhaduḥkhe bhavābhavau sukhaduḥkhe samaśnute sukhaduḥkhopabhuktaye sukhaduḥkhopabhuktaye sukhapracārabahulair sukhabuddhyā mayā sarvaṃ sukhabhāgī nirāyāso sukhabhāvaikalakṣaṇam sukham atyantam aśnute sukham alpena karmaṇā sukham ātyantikaṃ labhet sukhamūlā hi dārāś ca sukhamṛtyuṃ sa gacchati sukhamṛtyuṃ sa gacchati sukham edhanti bahavo sukham evaṃ tu kartavyaṃ sukhayānair alaṃkṛtāḥ sukhavāyuviśoṣitā sukhasparśaś ca bho dvijāḥ sukhasya ca paraṃ kālaṃ sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ kariṣye tava yat priyaṃ ca sukhaṃ cakre ca nārada sukhaṃ tatsādhanaṃ vada sukhaṃ tiṣṭhati mānavaḥ sukhaṃ tiṣṭhatu bhārgavaḥ sukhaṃ tiṣṭhanti gāyanti sukhaṃ tiṣṭha prajāpate sukhaṃ dharme pratiṣṭhitam sukhaṃ na tādṛk tvatprāptau sukhaṃ paramanirvṛtaḥ sukhaṃ puṃsāṃ yathāsukham sukhaṃ prabhūtaṃ ca śubhaṃ ca nityaṃ sukhaṃ prāptā nāthanāthaṃ vilokya sukhaṃ bhuṅkte na saṃśayaḥ sukhaṃ yānti ca tat patham sukhaṃ yānti yamālayam sukhaṃ yāhi hitaṃ kuru sukhaṃ srakṣyāmahe prajāḥ sukhāni dhārmiko hṛṣṭa sukhāni dhārmiko hṛṣṭa sukhān muktiḥ kathaṃ bhavet sukhāya dharmāya jagat pratiṣṭhitam sukhāya yoṣitaḥ kasya sukhāya sukhanetrāya sukhāyerṣyodayāya ca sukhāsīno manaḥ kṛtvā sukhitvaṃ sa viśiṣyate sukhī sadā dānaparo vareṇyaḥ sukhī saṃpadyate naraḥ sukhena tvaṃ kapotaki sukhena nirbhayo bhūtvā sukhena yamasādanam sukhenaiva mahāpathe sukhodayas tathānandaḥ sukhodayāya tat sarvaṃ sukhopāsyaḥ susādhyaś ca sukhoṣitas tāṃ rajanīṃ mahātmā sugatis tu kathaṃ teṣāṃ sugandhakusumākīrṇe sugandhakusumākīrṇe sugandhakusumaiḥ pānais sugandhadravyasaṃyuktān sugandham etad rājārhaṃ sugandhāgurukarpūrān sugandhair daśabhiḥ śataiḥ sugandhaiś cārudarśanaiḥ sugāḍhaṃ pariṣasvaje sugātryāṃ dvijasattamāḥ sugrīvaś cābhiṣecitaḥ sugrīvasya kṛte yena sugrīvī tu dvijottamāḥ sugrīvī śucigṛdhrikā sugrīvo hanumāṃś caiva sughoram aśivaṃ raudraṃ sughoraṃ tan mahāghoraṃ sughore makarālaye sucandratārāsaṃyoge sucāror duhitā sādhvī sucāror duhitā subhrūr sutanur vaḍavā caiva sutanū rāṣṭrapālī ca sutaptavālukābhiś ca sutam icchaṃs tapas tepe sutasya syād vadasva tat sutaṃ kambalabarhiṣam sutaṃ kambalabarhiṣaḥ sutaṃ jāmbavato dvijāḥ sutaṃ tam uragākṛtim sutaṃ somaṃ yaśasvinam sutaḥ pañcajanasyāpi sutaḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ sutaḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ sutaḥ suśīlaḥ subhagaḥ sutā āsan suropamāḥ sutā tasya kathaṃ me asya sutāpatiṃ hiraṇyasutaṃ sutā me santi bhāryā ca sutāyāḥ kṛtavān asi sutārthī putravān bhavet sutāv aruṇāv īśvarau sutā syād vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ sutāṃ tvaṃ varavarṇinīm sutāṃ draṣṭuṃ nareśvaraḥ sutāṃ bhāryām avāpa saḥ sutāṃ bhāryām avindata sutāṃ bhāryām avindata sutāṃ me yaccha śailarāṭ sutāṃ sutapasā yuktāṃ sutāṃ snuṣāṃ cāpi gatvā sutīrāḥ kālatoyadāḥ sutṛptaḥ prīta eva ca sute nyastabharā yānti suto daityaguro dṛḍham suto anugāmī hanumān nṛpasya suto abhavan mahātejā suto bhīmarathasya vai suto raṇaviśāradaḥ suto viśvāvasor balī suto asyājātadantaś ca sutau kanavakasya tau sutau vai kulanandanau sudarśanena cakreṇa sudaṃṣṭraś ca sucāruś ca sudāntaś cātidāntaś ca sudāntair iva saṃyantā sudāsas tasya tanayo sudāsasya sutaḥ proktaḥ sudīptena samanvitā sudīptair vividhāyudhaiḥ sudīptair vividhāyudhaiḥ sudurgandhaṃ mahābhīmaṃ suduṣprāpaṃ vimūḍhānāṃ sudūrastho api yo bhaktyā sudṛḍhaṃ sukhasaṃcāraṃ sudṛḍhāṃ puruṣottamaḥ sudevā devarakṣitā sudyumna iti vikhyātas sudyumnaś ca bhaviṣyati sudyumnaś ceti te nava sudyumnasya tu dāyādās sudyumnasya dvijottamāḥ sudyumneti ca viśrutaḥ sudhanvanaḥ sutaś cāpi sudhanvanaḥ subāhuś ca sudhanvā nāma pārthivaḥ sudhanvā nāma pārthivaḥ sudhanvā sudhanus tathā sudharmākhyā sabhā yuktam sudharmā dharmabhṛt tathā sudharmā bhavatā sabhā sudhā tvaṃ jyotir eva ca sudhāmā virajās tathā sudhāṃśo jyotiṣāṃ nidhiḥ sudhūtapāpā manugautamādayaḥ sunadyaṃ nāma dhārmikam sunandaṃ muśalaṃ tathā sunandā kāmadāyinī sunandā kāmadohinī sunahotrasya dāyādās sunahotro mahāyaśāḥ sunāmā balabhadreṇa sunāmnī caiva pañcamī sunāmnī caiva saptamī sunāsaṃ sukapolaṃ ca sunirvāteṣu deśeṣu suniścitya mahāgrāha suniścitya mahāvrate sunīthasya tu dāyādaḥ sunīthāyāṃ prajāpatiḥ sunītho nāma dhārmikaḥ sundaraṃ naumi vigraham sundarī ca varāṅganā sundarī ca varāṅganā sundaryaḥ priyadarśanāḥ sundo asuras tathātyugro suparṇaracanādhvajam suparṇavaśagā nāgā suparṇaviṣayāñ jñātvā suparṇas tv avahan nāgān suparṇā caiva kadrūś ca suparṇāyāṃ tato garbham suparṇāsaṃgamaṃ nāma suparṇāṃse tam āsīnaṃ suparṇāḥ kiṃnarā nāgās suparṇenāruṇena ca suparṇair dānavair daityai suparṇo nandino antike suparṇo yasya vīryeṇa supavitraṃ pavitrāṇāṃ supārśvakagaveṣaṇau supārśvaś cottare sthitaḥ supuṇyaṃ bibhrate atulam supuṇye naimiṣāraṇye suputraḥ kena labhyate suptasya tasya nṛpater suptaṃ kṛṣṇam upādāya suptaṃ taṃ dvijaputrakam suptāyāṃ śayane tasyāṃ supte pravasite api vā supto yugasahasraṃ yaḥ supratiṣṭhaikarūpiṇī suprabhaś ca dvijottamāḥ suprabhaṃ nāma saptamam suprabhātā ca me niśā suprabhātādya rajanī suprabhāḥ suvibhūṣitāḥ suprabhety abhiviśrutā supraśāntamanā nityaṃ suprasannas tavābhīṣṭaṃ suprasanno rave mama suprasiddhaṃ jagaty etat suprītā tena caiva hi suprītās te varān daduḥ suprītir muniśārdūla suprīte āhatur dvijam suprīto abhūd dvijottamaḥ suprītau tu bravāvahai suprītau yadi deveśau subahūn ratnasaṃcayān subāhur bahubāhuś ca subāhur bahubāhuś ca subāhuś caiva dhārmikaḥ subrahmaṇya namo astu te subhagā cārulocanā subhagāḥ priyavādinyo subhage cāruhāsini subhadrā ca rathena te subhadrāyāś muniśreṣṭhās subhadrāṃ ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ subhadrāṃ ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ subhadrāṃ ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ subhadrāṃ ca varapradām subhadrāṃ nāma revatīm subhadrāṃ praṇipatya ca subhadrāṃ bhaktavatsalām subhadrāṃ sumeror dakṣiṇe pārśve sumeroḥ kāñcane śṛṅge suyajñatanayo abhavat suyavasyātmajo loke surakāryārtham utpanno suragaṇapitṛyakṣasevitaṃ hy suragandharvayoṣitaḥ surathasya tu vikrāntaḥ suratho matimāṃs tathā suranadyās tatas tīraṃ surabhikusumareṇukḹptasarvāṅgaśobhā surabhir jagatāṃ mātā surabhir nandinī dhenuḥ surabhir mahiṣīs tathā surabhir vinatā caiva surabhiḥ sarvakāmadhuk surabhī kaśyapād rudrān surabhī nandinī nandā suramyaṃ vālukākīrṇaṃ suramyāṇi tathā tāsu surayajño vyajāyata surayā dāruṇo madaḥ surarājyaphalapradam surarājyaṃ mamepsitam surarājyaṃ yathābhavam surarājyena garvitaḥ surarāṭ prāha gautamam surarāṇ nṛpam abravīt surarṣīṇāṃ śrutaṃ madhye surarṣīn marutaś cānyān suralokaṃ tato gatvā suravāsaṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ suravāse pratiṣṭhite suravidyādharoragaiḥ suravidyādharoragaiḥ suraśaktisamanvitā surasaṃghā dvijottamam surasaṃghaiś ca ṛṣibhiḥ surasāyāḥ sahasraṃ tu surasiddhagaṇair juṣṭaṃ surasiddhāpsarobhiś ca surā ūcus trilocanam surāṅganānām alakāvalīḥ śubhāḥ surāṅganānāṃ ca muhuḥ samīrāḥ surā jagmuḥ svam ālayam surāṇām api durlabham surāṇām api durlabhān surāṇām api nānyataḥ surāṇām api vallabham surāṇām api sevyāni surāṇām abhinandya ca surāṇām eva cāśrayaḥ surāṇāṃ ca pratiṣṭhiteḥ surāṇāṃ netu nilayaṃ surāṇāṃ yad abhīṣṭaṃ ca surāṇāṃ surasattamaḥ surāṇāṃ hi patir yasmād surādhūtopajīvinaḥ surān pūjya pṛthak pṛthak surān prāha bṛhaspatiḥ surāpaḥ kṣīrasomapaḥ surāpāne ca saktānāṃ surāpā brahmavādinaḥ surāpe gurutalpage surāpo brahmahā steyī surāpo brahmahā hartā surābhāṇḍam ivāśuci surāmāṃsopahārais tu surāraṇī garbham adhatta divyaṃ surārir baladarpitaḥ surārcitaṃ priyayā brahmavṛndaiḥ surāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva surāś ca sakalāḥ svāṃśair surāsuranamaskṛta surāsuranamaskṛtam surāsurair arcitapādapadmam surās tam eva viviśū surās tābhyo varān procur surās tebhyo varān daduḥ surās tvarā jagmur adīnasattvāḥ surāḥ procuḥ pṛthak pṛthak surāḥ samastāḥ suranātha kāryam surāḥ samāgatya dadhīcim ūcur surāḥ sarve kiṃ tu dehena kāryam surāḥ sarve divaṃ yayuḥ surāḥ sarve pratiṣṭhitāḥ surāḥ svaṃ sadanaṃ yayuḥ surūpatām ubhau prāptau surūpaṃ cākaron munim surūpaṃ varadaṃ śāntaṃ surūpaḥ subhagaḥ sukhī surūpā cārusarvāṅgī surūpā cārusarvāṅgī surūpāś ca sulakṣaṇam suvarṇakamalair divyaiḥ suvarṇadhenuanaḍvāha- suvarṇanāmā ca tathā suvarṇapriya eva ca suvarṇamaṇimuktādyair suvarṇamaṇimuktānāṃ suvarṇamaṇimauktikaiḥ suvarṇamaṇiratnādau suvarṇarajatādyaiś suvarṇo lokaviśrutaḥ suvikālā kumārī ca suvibhaktacatuṣpathā suvistīrṇacatuṣpathā suvṛttānāṃ sukarmaṇām suvṛddhāṃ gautamapriyām suveśo nāma nāmataḥ suveśyābhiḥ suśobhanaiḥ suveṣāḥ puruṣās tatra suṣuvuḥ sthānujaṅgamān suṣuve saritāṃ varā suṣeṇaṃ cāruguptaṃ ca suṣvāpa dharaṇītale suṣvāpa balabhadraś ca suṣvāpa munisattamāḥ susamāhitamānasaḥ susasyāḥ sumanoharāḥ susaṃskṛtyāpy atithīnāṃ susthaḥ prajāvān āyuṣmān susthāḥ prajā nirātaṅkāḥ susnātaḥ susamāhitaḥ susvanaiś ca sumantritaiḥ susvedasaṃlāparahaḥprakāraiḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ svargam avāpa dhīraḥ suhṛdo munisattamāḥ suhṛddīkṣitabhūpāla- suhṛdbandhudhanādikam suhṛdbandhudhanādikam suhotrasya bṛhat putro suhotrasya sutadvayam suhotrasyābhavaj jahnuḥ suhotraṃ ca suhotāraṃ suhotro abhūn mahābalaḥ sūktaṃ caiva tadātmakam sūktaṃ sarvāghanāśanam sūktaṃ sauraṃ sapauruṣam sūktena puruṣasya hi sūkṣmam avyaktatāṃ gatam sūkṣmam ātmānam ātmanā sūkṣmayā kalayā sthitaḥ sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ sūkṣmaś carati sarvatra sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ māhiṣikaś caiva sūtakasya ca yat pāpaṃ sūtakānte gṛhe śrāddham sūtakānnopajīvī ca sūtamāgadhabandibhiḥ sūtaḥ sūtyāṃ samutpannaḥ sūtikāntyāvasāyinaḥ sūtena sahitā dvijāḥ sūtratantuguṇair nityaṃ sūtramantrabahiṣkṛtaḥ sūtrasvaravivarjitam sūdayaṃs tarasā sarvān sūdayām āsa tadbalam sūdayām āsa vīryavān sūnṛtā nāma viśrutā sūnṛtāyāṃ prajāpatiḥ sūnṛtā suṣuve sutān sūnor nāgasya dhīmataḥ sūpaviṣṭe varāsane sūrya eva trilokasya sūryakoṭipratīkāśaṃ sūryakoṭipratīkāśo sūryakoṭisamaprabham sūryacandrasamo jyotir sūryatīrthaṃ śaṅkhinī ca sūryadhvajapatākine sūryaprabhaṃ sūryatīrtham sūryamaṇḍalam anvaham sūryaraśmipratāpitam sūryaraśmipratāpitam sūryarūpadharo hariḥ sūryarūpeṇa yaḥ pāti sūryalokaṃ vrajanti te sūryalokaṃ vrajanti te sūryalokaṃ sa gacchati sūryalokaṃ sa gacchati sūryalokaṃ sa gacchati sūryalokād anugraham sūryaloke mahīyate sūryavaṃśakaraḥ śrīmān sūryavaṃśakramāgate sūryas timiranāśanaḥ sūryas tejoguṇān iva sūryasya ṛtusaṃbhavāḥ sūryasya ca pratiṣṭhānāt sūryasyāmitatejasaḥ sūryasyeva gabhastibhiḥ sūryaṃ manasi yaḥ kṛtvā sūryaḥ kṣemasubhikṣakṛt sūryācandramasāv iva sūryācandramasau tathā sūryācandramasau tārā sūryāt prasūyate sarvaṃ sūryāpīḍaś ca mokṣavit sūryāya ca yathākramāt sūryāya niyatendriyāḥ sūryāya sūryapataye sūryāyārghyaṃ nivedayet sūryāyārghyaṃ praṇamya ca sūryāyārghyaṃ prayacchati sūryeṇa paramātmanā sūryoḍhaṃ gṛham āgatam sūryodayam udaikṣata sūryodaye yathā nāśaṃ sūryodaye yaḥ susamāhitaḥ paṭhet sūryo abhūc cakṣuṣas tathā sūryo ayaṃ gacchatīti ha sūryo yācyo bhuvaṃ prati sūryo lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ sūryo vahati raśmibhiḥ sūryo viṣṇus tat prayayau sūryo hy ātmāsya jagatas sṛkkaṇī vivṛte cakre sṛjate ca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ sṛjate tad guṇāṃs tathā sṛjate tu guṇān eka sṛjate tu guṇān sattvaṃ sṛjato hi prajāpateḥ sṛjaty anantakarmāṇi sṛjaty avaty atti na sajjate asmin sṛjaty aśeṣam api yo sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā sṛjaty ātmānam ātmanā sṛjaty ātmānam ātmanā sṛjantaṃ vedhasaṃ prajāḥ sṛjaṃl lokān sanātanaḥ sṛjethāḥ kiṃ punaḥ sutam sṛjyamānāḥ prajā naiva sṛñjayasya mahātmanaḥ sṛñjayasyābhavat putro sṛñjayo nāma vai sutaḥ sṛṣṭas tu bahuśaḥ sṛṣṭau sṛṣṭā kanyā bahuvidhā sṛṣṭā cāhaṃ dvijanmanā sṛṣṭā lokāḥ purā sarve sṛṣṭāḥ kālena kālena sṛṣṭikartre namas tubhyaṃ sṛṣṭir jātā tathepsitā sṛṣṭisaṃhārakāriṇā sṛṣṭisthitivināśānāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ sarge karoty eṣa sṛṣṭiḥ prajāpateḥ samyak sṛṣṭeḥ sthiteḥ saṃharaṇāya bhūmer sṛṣṭyākāras tataḥ śaktaḥ sṛṣṭvā ca vividhāḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā devamanuṣyāṃś ca sṛṣṭvā prajāpatīn sarvān sṛṣṭvā sasāgarān dvīpān sṛṣṭvā svayaṃbhūr bhagavān viriñciṃ setihāsaṃ yathākramam setihāsāni sattama setihāsaiś ca chandasi setur yo lokasetūnāṃ setuṃ baddhvā mahārṇave setuṃ baddhvā mahodadhau setsyanti tatra yajñāś ca setsyanti nṛpasattama senānīnāṃ yathā skandaḥ senāpatiḥ surapatis senā prādurbabhūva ha sendracāpau virājantau sendrā vai mānuṣādayaḥ seyam asmān apāsyeha seyam urvī dvijottamāḥ seyaṃ janitrī sakalepsitānām seyaṃ dhātrī vidhātrī ca seyaṃ dhātrī vidhātrī ca sevate nityadā sukham sevate siddhikāṅkṣayā sevamānāpsarogaṇaiḥ sevamānāḥ śubhaṃ tathā sevā niṣiddhā yā kācid sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā nṛbhiḥ sevitaṃ sukhamokṣadam sevitāny apsarogaṇaiḥ sevitāny apsarogaṇaiḥ sevitāḥ sumanoramāḥ sevite tatra parvate sevite dvijamukhyaiś ca sevyamānas tu gandharvair sevyamānāpsarogaṇaiḥ sevyamānā yamālayam sevyamānā vrajanti te sevyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ sevyamānāḥ prayatnataḥ sevyamānāḥ surāsuraiḥ sevyamāno yathottaraiḥ sevyamāno raviprabhaḥ saindhavaṃ sāgarotthaṃ ca saindhavāraṇyam eva ca sainyam adrāvayat tadā sainyaṃ tena mahātmanā sainyair āyāntu mā ciram sainyaiḥ parivṛto harim saiva tasya sutā putras saiva tasyopakārikā saiva nityaṃ sahāyinī saiva nityāśarīriṇī saiva pūjyārcanīyā ca saiva buddhir iti smṛtaḥ saiva brāhmī ca pāvanī saivam uktātha mātrā tu saivam uktvā manuṃ devaṃ saiva vāg abravīt punaḥ saiva vāg abravīd daivī saiva vede pragīyate saiva sarvārtisaṃhartrī saiva saṃdehakartarī saivaṃ pañcadaśākṛtiḥ saivodbhūtā jaṭāmārgāt saiṃhikeyaṃ ca somapam saiṃhikeyaṃ tad ucyate saiṃhikeyā iti khyātā saiṃhikeyā iti khyātās saiṃhikeye ca bhedite so akrūro mathurāṃ purīm sogravyagro mahāsuraḥ soḍhuṃ brahmañ jaṭājūṭe so atikopād sopavāso jitendriyaḥ sopavāso jitendriyaḥ sopavāso atha gāyati so apaśyat tasya codare so apaśyat tasya codare so apaśyad ratnabhūṣitān sopānapaṅktis tava bhaktir eṣā sopānapaṅktiṃ na vadanti dhīrāḥ sopānapaṅktiḥ sarveṣāṃ sopānaṃ yuktamānasaḥ so apāṃpates tu tanujām so api kālavaśāt tatra so api kālena śailendro so api kaiśorakavayā so api grāhavaraḥ śrīmān so api jālena badhyate so api taṃ bhadram ity uktvā so api taṃ munim āyāntaṃ so api tān pratipūjyaiva so api tṛptim avāpnoti so api tṛptim avāpnoti so api duḥkhavinirmukto so api doṣakṣayān muktiṃ so api nārāyaṇāśrayaḥ so api prakṣālya cāmbhasā so api praviṣṭo yavano so api mātaṅgadāyādaḥ so api mṛtyum upāgamya so api mohasamāpanno so api reṇur na lakṣyate so api viprā mṛto jantus so api viprā mṛto jantuḥ so api viprā mṛto apīhāsyārthatattvajño so apy atīndriyam ālokya so apy ante muktibhājanam so apy aṃśaḥ sarvabhūtasya so apy enaṃ dhvajavajrābja- so apy enaṃ punar abravīt so apy enaṃ muṣṭinā mūrdhni so apy eṣāṃ na mahīpatiḥ so apratirūpagaṇeśasamāno so abravīt pitaraṃ tyaktaḥ so abravīd avajānāsi so abhavat saptadhā garbhas so abhavad gālavo nāma so abhidrutaḥ prajābhis tu so abhiṣikto mahātejā somakasya suto jantur somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailo somako nāma viśrutaḥ somakrayaṇa eva hi somatīrtham iti khyātaṃ somatīrtham iti khyātaṃ somatīrtham iti khyātaṃ somatīrthaṃ ca gāndharvaṃ somatīrthaṃ tuṅgakūṭaṃ somatīrthaṃ tu tat khyātaṃ somatīrthaṃ dadhīcaṃ ca somatīrthaṃ sitodaṃ ca somatīrthe pṛthūdake somadattasya dāyādaḥ somadattaṃ śalaṃ bhīmam somadatto mahāyaśāḥ somadatto mahīpatiḥ somanāthasya saṃnidhau somanātho jagatpatiḥ somapatnyo mahāvratāḥ somapānaphalapradam somapānaphalaṃ labhet somapānaphalaṃ labhet somapānaṃ havis tyāgam somapānāya tasthire somaputrād budhād viprās somabhūtaś ca saumyānām somabhojyān athetarān somam agnijaleśvaram somamaṇḍalakalpena somamaṇḍalasaṃkāśair somam āhartum arhatha somayuddhād daśānana somarūpī jagatsraṣṭā somalokam ajīgamat somavaṃśakaraḥ śrīmān somavaṃśakaraḥ śrīmān somavaṃśabhavaḥ śrīmān somavaṃśavivardhanaḥ somavaṃśavivardhinī somaśarma iti khyātaḥ somaś cāpi sarasvatī somaś cāpy oṣadhīpatiḥ somasūryāgnirūpāya somasūryāṃśukeśāya somasūryāṃśupavanaiḥ somasya janma śrutvaiva somasya bhagavān varcā somasyātha bṛhaspateḥ somasyāṃśena bho dvijāḥ somasyeti pitāmaham somaṃ caṣālam eva ca somaṃ dattvā surebhyas tu somaṃ namasya rājānaṃ somaṃ namasyāmi surādipūjyam somaṃ namasyāmi surādipūjyam somaṃ puṣyaty athenduś ca somaṃ prāpya ca vajriṇe somaṃ rājānam abhyetya somaṃ rājye abhyaṣecayat somaṃ vikrīṇate ca ye somaṃ vai ṣoḍaśāṃśakaiḥ somaṃ samastasaṃtāpa- somaḥ palāśam agamad somaḥ pīto mahātmanā somaḥ saumyavatāṃ varaḥ somaḥ svādhyāya īritaḥ somāgniśvasitāya ca somāt saṅgānukarṣāṇāṃ somādityau samaṃ tatra somāntikam athāyayuḥ somāyāgner yamāya ca somāyātha nyavedayan somārthaṃ gautamītaṭam somārthaṃ vai tathā cānye somā sadā somasamānarūpā somāhvaśailam eva ca so amṛtatvāya kalpate somena saha yotsyantaṃ somena saha rājñā somena saha rājñā somenāpyāyito gobhiḥ someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmaḥ someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi someśvare bhaktir aharniśaṃ yat somo janānāṃ guṇavanti nityaṃ somo dātāmṛtaṃ bhāgaṃ somo dharmaś ca bho viprās somo adhidevo asmākaṃ ca somo bṛhaspatiḥ śukro somo abhavac cāmarāṇāṃ somo amṛtam anuttamam somo rājāmṛtamayo somo rājā sutaṃ prati somo vāyur hutāśanaḥ so ayajad daivataiḥ saha so ayam evaṃ vimucyeta so ayaś cūrṇam abhakṣayat so ayaṃ tvayaiva datto me so ayaṃ bhūyo yunakti mām so ayaṃ mama mahābhāge so ayaṃ yaḥ kāliyaṃ nāgaṃ so ayaṃ yena hatā ghorā so ayaṃ so ayaṃ mamety ukte so ayodhyādhipatiḥ prabhuḥ sorāhne pnāvatarpayan so ariṣṭo dhenukas tathā so arkaloke mahīyate so avagāhata niḥśaṅkaṃ so avatīrṇo jagatyarthe so avadad devayajanaṃ sovāca taṃ rākṣasī kāmarūpā sovāca daivavihitaṃ so aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet so aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet so aśvamedham avāpsyati so aśvarūpeṇa bhagavāṃs soṣṇaṃ tad abhavad vāri so asuraḥ kṛṣṇabāhunā so asṛjat puruṣaṃ virāṭ so asṛjat pūrvapuruṣaḥ so asṛjat sapta mānasān so asṛjad dvividhāḥ prajāḥ so asṛjad bhagavān vaktrād so asṛjad yoganidrānte so asṛjad romakūpebhya so asmattaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati so asyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ so aham evaṃ vaśībhūtaḥ so ahaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇam apāram īśam īḍyaṃ so ahaṃ tvāṃ halapātena so ahaṃ patis tvaṃ ca bhāryā so ahaṃ prajānimittaṃ tvāṃ so ahaṃ yāsyāmi govinda so ahaṃ vadāmi vaḥ sarvaṃ so ahaṃ vadāmi vaḥ sarvaṃ so ahaṃ samārādhya murāridevaṃ so ahaṃ sāṃpratam āyāto so ahaṃ sutas te mama doṣeṇa tāta saukumārye tathā rūpe saugandhikavanaṃ caiva sautye ahani mahāmatiḥ sautrāmaṇīm ṛddhim adhaḥ sa cakre saudāso nāma pārthivaḥ sauparṇaiḥ samarudgaṇaiḥ saubhadras tasya cātmajaḥ saubhāgyapūrvatvam avāpa somāt saubhāgyamānam adhikaṃ saubhāgyavastūni vapuḥ suveṣaḥ saubhāgyaṃ ca sukhārthinī saubhāgyaṃ phālgunīṣu ca saubhāgyaiśvaryajananaṃ saumasya muniśārdūlā saumitre nūnam asmābhir saumyapralāpino nityaṃ saumye tejasvitāṃ labhet saurabheyaṃ manoramyaṃ sauraye mandagāmine sauraṃ viprās tu maṇḍalam sauraṃ saumyaṃ tathā brāhmaṃ saurājyayuktaṃ yaśasā jayaśriyā saurir bṛhaspater ūrdhvaṃ saurir brāhmaṇaveṣeṇa saurir munigaṇān āha sauriṃ śanaiścaraṃ mandaṃ sauryaṃ tīrthaṃ tad ākhyātaṃ sauvarṇamaṇipīṭheṣu sauvarṇavalayākrāntā sauvarṇena ca rāvaṇaḥ sauvarṇena vimānena sauvarṇena vimānena sauvarṇo merur ucchritaḥ sauvīrāḥ saindhavāpannāḥ sauhotrir aśapad gaṅgāṃ skandaḥ sanatkumāraś ca skando vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ skandhaśākhādisaṃyutaḥ skandhe kuṭhāraṃ ca tathā pareṇa skandhe śaṃbhoḥ samādhāya skannaṃ vīryam acūrṇayam stanadvayaṃ śuci striyāḥ stanapānādikāhāram stanārthī praruroda ca stanau tuṅgau bhujāntare stabakena vṛto asmy aham stabdharukṣair bhayaṃkaraiḥ stabdharukṣair bhayaṃkaraiḥ stambaḥ kaśyapa eva ca stambhān kanakacitrāṃś ca stambhitaḥ śiśurūpeṇa stambhitān sarvadevāṃs tān stambhair adbhutasaṃkāśair stava iṣṭaḥ sadā raveḥ stavanāt kīrtanād dhyānāt stavarāja iti khyātas stavarūpeṇa kānicit stavasyāsyānukīrtanāt stavānāṃ dakṣanirmitaḥ stavena manasā tathā stavenānena vai dvijāḥ stavenānena suvrata staveṣu munisattamāḥ stutavān paramārthataḥ stutavān vṛṣabhadhvajam stutavāṃs tam ahaṃ dvijāḥ stutaṃ paramam avyaktaṃ stutaḥ proktas tathaiva ca stutaḥ satyaṃ mahāmate stutaḥ sa bhagavān evaṃ stutaḥ saṃpūjito viṣṇus stutāś caiva marudgaṇaiḥ stutā siddhair vihāyasā stutikramam imaṃ śṛṇu stutijapyopahāreṇa stutibhir vedasaṃmitaiḥ stutiśabdair manoharaiḥ stutiṃ kartuṃ namo astu te stutiṃ cakāra gaṅgāyā stutiṃ cakāra devasya stutiṃ cakre sa bālakaḥ stutiṃ ca dānaṃ ca sabhāṃ śubhāṃ ca stuto gaurīpatiḥ śivaḥ stuto devair mayā saha stuto asi yan mayā deva stuto asi yan mayā deva stuto asmābhis tadeśvaraḥ stuto ahaṃ yat tvayā pūrvaṃ stutvā kāryaṃ nyavedayan stutvā caiva punaḥ punaḥ stutvā tatra mahābāho stutvā devaṃ maheśvaram stutvā devaṃ maheśvaram stutvā nānāvidhaiḥ stotraiḥ stutvā vākyaiḥ sarvabhāvopayuktaiḥ stutvaivaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ stutvaivaṃ vibudhāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ stutvaivaṃ sa mahādevaṃ stuvanti devau sakalārtihāriṇau stuvanti parayā mudā stuvanti puruṣottamam stuvanti sma maheśvaram stuvanti hariśaṃkarau stuvanto agniṃ viśeṣataḥ stuvanto devadeveśaṃ stuvanto bhītamanasaḥ stuvanty arkaṃ prajāpate stuvīdhvaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ stuhi cakreśvaraṃ haram stuhi taṃ puruṣaṃ param stuhi tvaṃ sarvabhāvena stuhi devam anāmayam stuhi devaṃ ca devīṃ ca stuhi devaṃ maheśvaram stuhi viṣṇuṃ jagadyoniṃ stuhi sarvaprayatnena stuhi sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ stūyatām eṣa pārthivaḥ stūyamānaś ca kiṃnaraiḥ stūyamānas tv atharṣibhiḥ stūyamānaṃ ca bandibhiḥ stūyamānaṃ siddhasādhyaiḥ stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ sarvair stūyamānāya vai namaḥ stūyamānāḥ surāsuraiḥ stūyamāne maheśvare stūyamāno apsarobhiś ca stūyamāno apsarobhiś ca stūyamāno maharṣibhiḥ stūyamāno munigaṇair stūyamāno munivarais stūyamāno virājate stūyamānau ca kiṃnaraiḥ stūyase acyuta kiṃ mayā stūyase acyuta kiṃ mayā stūyetāṃ hariśaṃkarau stainyān nivṛttāḥ satataṃ stokamātraṃ sthitā tasmād stotavyo bhaktim āsthāya stotuṃ tvāṃ tridaśā hare stotram etac ca yaḥ paṭhet stotrasya kāraṇaṃ devi stotraṃ cedaṃ tato jagau stotraṃ cedaṃ tato abravīt stotraṃ mayoktaṃ puruṣottamasya stotraṃ yenāsya kuryāva stotreṇa stauti māṃ tathā stotreṇānena nārada stotreṇānena matimān stotreṇānena yaḥ kaścid stotreṇānena yaḥ stauti stotreṇānena ye bhaktās stotreṇānena ye bhaktyā stotreṇānena ye bhaktyā stotrair namaskāraparaiś ca mantraiḥ stotrair nānāvidhair divyair stotrais toṣaya śaṃkaram stoṣyanti mantraiḥ śrutibhiḥ prabhūtair stoṣyanty ānamramūrtayaḥ stoṣyāmas taṃ kathaṃ vayam stauti sūryaṃ śucir bhūtvā staumi tvāṃ prakṛteḥ param stauṣi garvāyase cāpi striya eva surādhipa striyam ākāṅkṣate veśyāṃ striyaś ca kṛṣṇo jagrāha striyaś ca ratnakoṭyaś ca striyaś cāpsarasopamāḥ striyaś cāyayur utsave striyas tatra muniśreṣṭhā striyas taddeśavāsinyo striyaṃ mitraṃ nirāyudham striyaṃ mitraṃ nirāyudham striyaṃ vā yas tu ghātayet striyaṃ vā yas tu ghātayet striyaḥ kalau bhaviṣyanti striyaḥ pīnapayobhārāḥ striyaḥ pramuditās tatra striyaḥ śūdrāntyajātayaḥ striyaḥ śūdrāntyajātayaḥ striyaḥ śūdrāntyajātijāḥ striyaḥ śūdrāś ca vai nṛpa striyaḥ śūdrāś ca saṃyatāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ striyā garbhe mahādyutiḥ striyā bhūcarayā dhṛtaḥ striyā vā puruṣasyāpi striyo jānanti netare striyo navamyāṃ prāpnoti striyo api yatra yudhyeyuḥ striyo apy etena kalpena striyo yāś ca pativratāḥ striyo ayugmāsu rātriṣu striyo asvatantrāḥ puruṣapradhānās strīkāmo ahaṃ nṛpottama strīkṛtyaṃ sarvam eva tat strī garbhān dhārayaty uta strīgrahe gograhe vāpi strījanaṃ cāpi kaunteyād strījanaṃ nihateśvaram strījanmaparihārārthaṃ strīṇām anyāni cakriṇaḥ strīṇām apy evam eva syād strīṇām abhīṣṭadaṃ nānyad strīṇām ayaṃ paro dharmo strīṇām iti tato vatsa strīṇām eṣa svabhāvo vai strīṇām eṣa svabhāvo asti strīṇāṃ puṣpaṃ samāsādya strīṇāṃ maṅgalaśabdaiś ca strīṇāṃ rūpamadaś caiva strīṇāṃ vivādaṃ tā eva strīṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ jānanti strītvaprāptim aśeṣataḥ strītvaṃ jātaṃ jātam eva strītvaṃ tasya bhaved iti strītvād agurucittāhaṃ strīpuṃnapuṃsakaiś caiva strīpuṃnapuṃsakaiś caiva strīpuṃsayor vā saṃbandhaḥ strīpuṃsor lakṣaṇair yutaḥ strībālavṛddhahantāro strībālahantur yat pāpaṃ strī bhaviṣyaty asaṃśayam strībhāvam anuceṣṭantī strībhir naraiś ca sānanda- strībhir varṇāvaraiḥ śūdrair strībhiḥ paribhavaṃ prāpya strīlālityaṃ strīvilāsaṃ strīliṅgaṃ prākṛtaṃ smṛtam strīvadhe paripaśyasi strīśūdrayoḥ snānajāpyaṃ strīṣv āsaktas tu ṣaṇmukhaḥ strī satī saṃgame tasminn strīsahasrasamāvṛtaḥ strīsahasrāṇy anekāni strīsaṃbhoge ca bho dvijāḥ straiṇatvāt pāvanatvataḥ straiṇam auṣṭram āvikaṃ ca sthaṇḍilāni kuśās tathā sthalajā jalajā ye ca sthalajāḥ pakṣiṇo abjāś ca sthale carati tattvavit sthaleyuś ca mahābalaḥ sthale sthitvā jale yas tu sthāṇutīrthaṃ kuros tīrthaṃ sthāṇuvac cāpy akampyaḥ syād sthātavyaṃ kvety acintayam sthātavyaṃ tāvad eva hi sthātavyaṃ dinapañcakam sthātavyaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja sthānabhāvanidarśakāḥ sthānam ātmasamaṃ prabhuḥ sthānam iṣṭaṃ yatheṣṭataḥ sthānam uttamam āsādya sthānaṃ kṛṣṇasya halinaḥ sthānaṃ jagatpate mahyām sthānaṃ tat pūrayanty uta sthānaṃ tat so asmi cārjunaḥ sthānaṃ tan manasaḥ smṛtam sthānaṃ trailokyapūjitam sthānaṃ trailokyapūjitam sthānaṃ dehavatām āsīd sthānaṃ nāsty asureśvara sthānaṃ vada śubhānane sthānaṃ harer avyayam sthānaṃ hi bhavatām iti sthānāt sthānaṃ daśaguṇam sthānāt sthānāntarotkarṣān sthānād anyatra gāminaḥ sthānād bhraśyati sa dvijaḥ sthānāni saritas tathā sthānāntaraviśeṣāc ca sthāneneha na naḥ kāryaṃ sthāneṣu prabhaviṣyataḥ sthāneṣv eteṣu yo yogī sthānair anekaiḥ pṛthivīm sthāpanaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ sthāpanaṃ śaṃkarasya ca sthāpayām āsa kṛṣṇaṃ ca sthāpayām āsa tān sarvān sthāpayām āsa matimān sthāpayām āsa sa prabhuḥ sthāpayitvā tu tad dehaṃ sthāpayitvā biladvāre sthāpayiṣyanti maṅgalāḥ sthāpitaṃ yo anupaśyati sthāpitaṃ rasam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthāpitaṃ sāpy abhakṣayat sthāpitā jagato mārgās sthāpitāni haranti ca sthāpite prītim abhyeti sthāpito lokapālakaḥ sthāpyadeśaṃ na paśyāma sthāpyante astrāṇi mānada sthāpyaṃ sthānaṃ te samīpe munīśa sthāpyaḥ kuvalayāpīḍas sthālīm athāharat pūrṇāṃ sthālīstham agnisaṃyogād sthālīṃ cakre madhuplutām sthālīṃ vīkṣya tataḥ kopād sthāvarasya carasya ca sthāvarasya carasya ca sthāvarasya carasya ca sthāvarasya carasya ca sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ kiṃcid sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ kiṃcid sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ tathā sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ tathā sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ tathā sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ sarvam sthāvarāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca sthāvarāḥ kṛmayo ajvāś ca sthāvare jaṅgame tathā sthāvareṣu careṣu ca sthāsyāmīti mayoditam sthāsyāmy aham ariṃdama sthāsyāmy ahaṃ cātra sadaiva viṣṇur sthitaś candrasarittaṭe sthitas tadgatamānasaḥ sthitasya tapasi dviṣaḥ sthitaṃ māsaṃ nadītīre sthitaṃ vratamanīṣiṇaḥ sthitaḥ kālam imaṃ tv aham sthitaḥ koṭivaṭasyādho sthitaḥ kṣīrodadhir bahiḥ sthitaḥ pibaty aśeṣāṇi sthitaḥ saṃvṛtalocanaḥ sthitaḥ sthalajaleṣu ca sthitā āsan pūjayanto sthitā candrasarittaṭe sthitā dehavivarjitāḥ sthitā pṛthivyām adyāpi sthitā prajāpatitvena sthitāya dhāvamānāya sthitāyāṃ devasaṃsadi sthitā ye brahmaṇo antike sthitā vanaspatau sā tu sthitā valaccāmaravījitāṅgī sthitā sā devarājatve sthitā saiva namaskṛtā sthitāsmi tava nirdeśe sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā punaḥ punaḥ sthitāṃ bālo abravīn nṛpaḥ sthitikartākhilasya yaḥ sthitikartre namo namaḥ sthitir yasya na vidyate sthitir yasya na vidyate sthitisarge tathā prabhum sthitiṃ karotu tanmūrtau sthite tiṣṭhed vrajed yāti sthitenānamramūrtinā sthite ambhasi dvijottamāḥ sthiteyaṃ brahmaṇo antike sthite yāme vayaṃ yāmo sthite ayodhyāpatau mune sthiteṣu devasainyeṣu sthites tat tīrtham uttamam sthito devapurohitaḥ sthito dhyāyañ janārdanam sthito brāhmaṇadharmeṇa sthito mūrtir amūrtimān sthito yasmāt tad uttamam sthito lokopakārārthaṃ sthito asau tena vicchinnaṃ sthito asmīty abravīd vipraḥ sthitau nandagṛhe mune sthitau sarge tathā prabhum sthityutpattivināśānāṃ sthityutpattivināśānāṃ sthityutpattivināśānāṃ sthitvā ca rajanītrayam sthitvā dṛṣṭvā bahir gurum sthitvā maitreṇa cakṣuṣā sthitvāsau munisattamaḥ sthiraṃ rājābravīd idam sthirālakāḥ sukapolāḥ sthirāḥ syāmaḥ sureśāna sthirīkṛtyendriyagrāmaṃ sthīyatām ity abhāṣata sthīyatām ity abhāṣata sthīyatām ity abhāṣata sthīyatāṃ kṣaṇam ity evaṃ sthīyate vijane kvāpi sthūlacihnopaśobhitam sthūladaṇḍaṃ tathorvaśī sthūlabuddhyā na paśyāmi sthūlasūkṣmāṇi yāni ca sthūlasūkṣmātmane namaḥ sthūlasūkṣmātmane namaḥ sthūlaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ tvam anādi nityaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ tathā sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ caiva stheyam atra mayā sadā stheyaṃ macchāsanāc chubhe snātakaśvaśuraiḥ saha snātakānām idaṃ śāstraṃ snātakān brāhmaṇāṃś cānyān snātakāś ca dvijottamāḥ snātakair brahmacāribhiḥ snātasya tīrthe tripurāntakasya snātaṃ paśyanti ye kṛṣṇaṃ snātaḥ paśyati yuktātmā snātāyā budhabhāryāyāḥ snātau kṛtakṣaṇau cobhau snātvā kuṇḍe maheśvaram snātvā kṛtakṣaṇo vipras snātvā kṛtārthā gaṅgāyāṃ snātvā gaṅgāṃ ca gautamīm snātvā gaṅgāṃ jitavrataḥ snātvā ca kāpile tīrthe snātvā ca sa kṛtāñjaliḥ snātvā tatra ca saṃgame snātvā tatra phalaṃ dadyāt snātvā tathaiva cācamya snātvā tu gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ snātvā tu gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ snātvā tu gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ snātvā tu tasmin sukṛtī śarīrī snātvā tu dakṣiṇe kūle snātvā tu makarālaye snātvā tuṣṭāva tān devān snātvā tuṣṭāva deveśam snātvā te gautamītaṭe snātvātha bhūmau vasantī snātvā dṛṣṭvā ca śaṃkaram snātvā devaṃ namasya ca snātvā devān athābhyarcya snātvā devān ṛṣīn pitṝn snātvā devān pṛthak pṛthak snātvā devān praṇamya ca snātvā natvā gurūn kramāt snātvā niyatamānasaḥ snātvā paśyeta taṃ natvā snātvā paśyeta teneṣṭā snātvā puṇye atha saṃgame snātvāpūjya maheśvaram snātvā bindusarombhasi snātvā bhūtvā śuciḥ samyak snātvā mokṣaṃ labhed dhruvam snātvā yaḥ sāgare martyo snātvā vigatakalmaṣaḥ snātvā vipro viśudhyati snātvā vai yamunājale snātvā vai sāgare dattvā snātvā śucir yatamanā snātvā śucir yatamanā snātvā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ snātvā samyag vidhānena snātvā samyag vidhānena snātvā samyag vidhānena snātvā samyaṅ mahodadhau snātvā siddheśvaraṃ prabhum snātvaivaṃ vidhivat tatra snātvaivaṃ sāgare samyak snānakāle viśeṣeṇa snānakāle suraśreṣṭha snānadaṇḍaṃ prayāgaṃ ca snānadānajapādikam snānadānajapādibhiḥ snānadānamahādeva- snānadānasya yat phalam snānadānāc ca muktidam snānadānādikaṃ kiṃcid snānadānādikaṃ tatra snānadānādikaṃ tasmād snānadānādikaṃ naraiḥ snānadānādinā naraḥ snānadānādipūjanam snānadānādibhiḥ puṇyaṃ snānadānādi yaḥ kuryāt snānadānādisaṃyamaiḥ snānadānādihomaiś ca snānadānena kīrtitam snānadānena pūjādyair snānadānena yat phalam snānadānena yat phalam snānadānena yat phalam snānadānena vartantī snānadānaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ snānapānābhiṣekāc ca snānapānodakaṃ tathā snānamātreṇa sarvāṇi snānamaunasusaṃyamaiḥ snānalomāpahaṃ caiva snānaśeṣeṇa kṛṣṇasya snānasaṃdhyottare kāle snānaṃ karoti yas tatra snānaṃ karoti yo martyaḥ snānaṃ karotu jīvena snānaṃ karoty asau yāti snānaṃ karomi deveśa snānaṃ kuru puraṃdara snānaṃ kurvanti ye narāḥ snānaṃ kṛtvā cātra tīrthe snānaṃ kṛtvātha piṇḍādi snānaṃ kṛtvā nimnabhede snānaṃ cakre smarann antar snānaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ tasyāṃ snānaṃ jāpyam udāhṛtam snānaṃ tatpuṇyatoyena snānaṃ tatra na śasyate snānaṃ tarpaṇam eva ca snānaṃ tasya vidhīyate snānaṃ tvayi karomy adya snānaṃ dānaṃ ca yat kiṃcit snānaṃ dānaṃ ca yaḥ kuryād snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ snānaṃ dānaṃ tapo homa snānaṃ dānaṃ tapo homaṃ snānaṃ pāpaharaṃ cakre snānaṃ sarvārthasiddhidam snānaṃ saṃdhyāṃ japaṃ homaṃ snānāt kratuphalapradā snānād babhūvatur ubhau snānān muktiṃ pradāsyati snānān muktiṃ pradāsyati snānān mukto bhaven naraḥ snānāyāgacchatāṃ śiva snānārtham āhared yas tu snānārthaṃ rāmakṛṣṇayoḥ snāne cāpy antare mṛtyor snāne dāne prakīrtitam snānena tīrtharājasya snānaiḥ puṣpais tathā gandhair snāpayanti tadā kṛṣṇaṃ snāpayanti pṛthak pṛthak snāpayanty avanisthitāḥ snāpayām āsa gaṅgāyāṃ snāpayām āsa mātaram snāpayitvā tu taṃ bhaktyā snāpayitvā śivaṃ devam snāpayitvā subhadrāṃ ca snāpayet pūrvavat tatra snāyamānām athorvaśīm snāyīta cailavān prājñaḥ snāyīta devakhāteṣu snāyucarmaśirānvitam snigdhavāṇīpradaḥ sadā snuṣāyāṃ krathakaiśikau snuṣāṃ putrau kṛtāñjaliḥ snuṣeti sa janeśvaraḥ snuṣeyaṃ tava śobhanā snehajāṃś ca guṇān punaḥ snehapaṅkaṃ jarādurgaṃ snehapātre yathā pūrṇe snehabuddhyā munīn pṛthak snehasaṃbandhayantrakāḥ snehasnutapayodharam snehaṃ na pūrvajātānāṃ snehāktaṃ cirasaṃbhṛtam snehānāṃ varjane yukto snehena tulyam asmāsu spardhayantaḥ parasparam spardhayantī na lajjase spardhayann api śauriṇā spardhābhūd dhanahetave spardhāsīn mahatī brahman spardhinaṃ merubhānubhyāṃ sparśa eva sapiṇḍānāṃ sparśajān nakhāmbhasā vāpi spṛṣṭvā snāyīta śaucārthaṃ spṛṣṭvā smṛtvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca spṛṣṭvā svargaṃ gamiṣyanti spṛhayan manasaivāste spṛhāṃ cakre tadā svayam sphaṭāvikaṭamastakam sphītā janapadāvṛtāḥ sphītā janapadāvṛtāḥ sphuṭato hy aśaner iva smaragrahavaśe jātaḥ smarañ janmaśatāny atha smaraṇaṃ ca malakṣayam smaraṇaṃ cāpi yad bhaktyā smaraṇaṃ paṭhanaṃ vāpi smaraṇaṃ vā karoti yaḥ smaraṇaṃ vāpi gautama utkṛṣṭāpi cañcalā syān me vada karomi tat syuḥ pīḍā madbhavā na ca sragdāmalambābharaṇaṃ sragdharaṃ dhṛtaśārṅgaṃ ca sraṅmālām amitadyutiḥ sravate jarjarīkṛtaḥ sravantyo gandhavarjitāḥ sravanmadāsārakṛtapravāham sraṣṭā ca havyakavyānām sraṣṭā tribhuvaneśvaraḥ sraṣṭā tvaṃ brahmamūrtyā tu sraṣṭā dharmasya kaś cānyaḥ sraṣṭā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sraṣṭāraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sraṣṭāraṃ
