parityajya kuto harir bhuvaṃ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca durlabham svargaṃ mokṣaṃ sukhāni ca svargaṃ yāte api pitari svargaṃ yāntīha mānavāḥ svargaṃ yāsyāmaś ca vibho svargaṃ lokaṃ mamāntikam svargaṃ samabhipadyeta svargaḥ surāṇām abhavad svargād abhyetya medinīm svargād bhuvam anuprāptā svargāpavargaphalade svargāpavargahetuś ca svargāpavargāspadahetubhūte svargiṇau svarṇabhūṣaṇau svarge gate asau pitari pratāpavān svarge caturdhā vyagamat svarge ca divyaṃ sukhaṃ svarge dṛṣṭvorvaśīm atha svarge api pātabhītasya svarge bhuvi tale vāpi svarge martye ca pātāle svarge martye tatas tvarā svarge martye tale vāpi svarge martye rasātale svarge yāto mama bhrātā svarge ye rakṣasā hatāḥ svarge vasati so asuraḥ svarge vasanti te martyā svarge vāsaṃ tathākṣayam svarge vāsaṃ tathākṣayam svarge vāso bhavet tasya svargeṣv api hi ye kecit svarge samupajāyate svarge suradviṣo jñātvā svargo muktiḥ sutāt smṛtāḥ svargo mokṣas tvam eva ca svargyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svarṇavarṇaprabhe deva svarṇaśṛṅgīś ca dhenukāḥ svarṇādiratnāñcitacāruveśaḥ svarbhānutanayāyāṃ ca svarbhānunā hate sūrye svarbhānur bhānur eva ca svarbhānur vṛṣaparvā ca svarbhānos tu prabhā kanyā svarlokaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ svarlokaḥ so api kathito svarlokād api ramyāṇi svalaṃkṛtopādhihīnā svalpabuddhiratā narāḥ svalpasainyair balādhikaḥ svalpaṃ sasyaphalaṃ tathā svalpānām api kāryāṇāṃ svalpāny alpe ca tadvidaḥ svalpāyāsena dharmajñās svalpāṃśenāvatīryorvyāṃ svalpenaiva madaḥ kalau svavapurdṛṣṭiśaktimat svavaṃśadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā svavaṃśavistārakaraṃ svavaṃśavṛttāntam athācacakṣe svavaṃśānugataṃ pitā svavīryaśaktyādiguṇaikarāśiḥ svaveśmani yathānyāyam svaveśma prati tāṃ lobhād svaśaktileśādṛtabhūtasargaḥ svaśarīraṃ samutsṛjya svaśarīraṃ samutsṛjya svaśarīraṃ hi gṛdhrebhyo svaśarīreṇa duḥkhārtaṃ svasā tasyā gabhastinī svasāraṃ dadur andhakāḥ svasāraṃ bhīṣaṇākṛtim svasāraṃ vīkṣya tāṃ tadā svasāraṃ śīlasaṃmatām svasārau saṃbabhūvatuḥ svasainyaṃ magadhādhipam svasainyaiḥ parivāritāḥ svastikāmalabhūṣaṇaḥ svasti te astu jagannātha svasti te astu vrajāmy aham svasti te astu vrajāmy aham svasti te astv iti coktvā vai svasti rājan sukhī bhava svasti svastītivādinaḥ svastīty āha harir mayam svastīty uktā devatābhī svastīty ukte paitṛkais tu svasty astu te gamiṣyāmi svastyātreyā iti khyātāḥ svasthacitto bhavat punaḥ svasthacitto yathāmaraḥ svasthānaṃ punar āgamat svasthānaṃ saṃparityajya svasthānāt sa paribhraṣṭo svasthāne vismitamukhair svasthāneṣv eva sarvaśaḥ svasthe jāte triviṣṭape svasya putrasya vai tadā svasyaiveha paratra ca svasrīyaḥ sāmavedavit svaṃ ca dhāmāgamat punaḥ svaṃ ca sthānam upāgamat svaṃ dehaṃ bhogabandhanāt svaṃ svaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitaliṅgam arcya svaṃ svaṃ bhāgaṃ pracakrire svaṃ svaṃ vimānam ārūḍhās svaṃ svaṃ sthānaṃ cāyudhānāṃ ca rakṣā svaṃ svaṃ sthānaṃ makhāt tataḥ svaḥ prayāntu surāḥ sarve svāgataṃ tā vadanti ca svāgatāsanadānena svāgatāsaṃgamaṃ puṇyaṃ svāgatena ca yo vipraṃ svāgatenaiva sarveṣāṃ svācāntaḥ sa mahāmatiḥ svācānto vāgyataḥ śuciḥ svātantryaṃ puṣṭim uttamām svādu kiṃ tv iti vijñāya svādusnigdhāni bho dvijāḥ svādūdakasya parito svādūdakenodadhinā svādūni devabhojyāni svādhikārakṣayāya te svādhikāram athākarot svādhikārāṃs tataḥ prāptā svādhīnam āpādayituṃ samarthaḥ svādhyāyatapasānvitān svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ svādhyāyanirate vipre svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥ svādhyāyavarjitaḥ pāpo svādhyāyasamupetebhyaḥ svādhyāyasya phalaṃ dvijāḥ svādhyāyaṃ ca vivarjayet svādhyāyaṃ ca vivarjayet svādhyāyaṃ ca vivarjayet svādhyāyaṃ devatārcanam svādhyāyaṃ prāṅmukhaḥ kṛtvā svādhyāyo yajñakarma ca svān amātyāṃs tathā gāś ca svān amātyāṃs tadā rājā svāni karmāṇy apākṛtya svāni sthānāni te jagmuḥ svāni sthānāni divyāni svāny āyudhāni saṃgṛhya svāpatyarakṣaṇāyāsau svāparādho mayoditaḥ svāpe adhvani tathā bhuñjan svāmitvahetusaṃbandho svāmitvaṃ ca tathā gataḥ svāmitvaṃ manyate tvayā svāminī cāsya dehasya svāmino vaikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāmin pṛṣṭo asi gamyate svāmivākyaṃ phaṇīśvaraḥ svāmiṃs tattvaṃ vadasva me svāmī tvam evāsya carācarasya svāmyaṃ svasthātmacittatā svāyaṃbhuvīṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ pūrvaṃ svārociṣasya putrās te svārthabhraṃśo hi mūrkhatā svārtham uddharate prājñaḥ svārtham evāvagamya ha svārthahāniṃ tu mānavaḥ svārthād vā yadi vā kāmān svāśramād vicyutaś ca yaḥ svāśrame cātiśobhane svāśrame sumahāpuṇye svāhākāravaṣaṭkārau svāhānāmnīṃ surūpiṇīm svāhāpatiṃ yajñabhujaṃ namasye svāhāyāṃ priyabhūtāyāṃ svāhāśabdair alaṃkṛtaḥ svāhāsutā svairiṇī sā babhūva svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭkāro svāhā svadhā svastir anādisiddhir svāhiputro abhavad rājā svāhiṃ svāhākṛtāṃ varam svāṃ kanyāṃ bhūṣaṇānvitām svāṃ chāyāṃ vākyam abravīt svāṃ jarāṃ pratyapadyata svāṃ purīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam svāṃ purīṃ yādavair vṛtām svāṃ purīṃ sa visiṣmāya svāṃ bhāryāṃ vaḍavāṃ tataḥ svāṃ bhāryāṃ varavarṇinīm svāṃ bhāryāṃ śubhacāriṇīm svāṃ bhāryāṃ śubhacāriṇīm svāṃśaiś ca vayam apy atra svāṃśo viṣṇumayaṃ sthānaṃ svāḥ svāḥ karmakriyāḥ kuryuḥ svittropaleti vikhyātā svinnagātralatāṃ satīm svinnapakvāṃś ca piṣṭakān svīkṛtatyāgapāpād dhi svīkṛtāṃ ca tapobalāt svecchayā na tavājñayā svecchayā muniśārdūlās svecchayā yāti viprendraḥ svecchayā viharan gaṅgām svecchayā svavane yakṣaḥ svecchādehadhṛg avyayaḥ svedajas te surarṣabha svedajāny udbhidāni ca svedajāś codbhijās tathā svedajāś codbhijās tathā svedajodbhijja eva ca svedajodbhedajāṃs tathā svedabindur babhūva ha svedabindau tadā bhuvi svedarūpī tadaṅgataḥ svedāmbukaṇikāñcitam svedāmbughanatāṃ gatau svedārdragātraḥ śrāntaś ca svedodbhavāṃs tilāṃś caiva svenaiva vyavasāyena svebhyo gṛhebhyaś cānīya sve mahimni vyavasthitaḥ sveṣv anujñāpiteṣu ca sveṣv apatyeṣu coṣāyā sve sve gṛhe pramuditā sve sve sthāne yathāvidhi svairacārī yathāsukham svairatho randhano dhṛtiḥ svair arthaiḥ parisaṃtuṣṭās svairasthityā vartamāno svairiṇī tv iha varte ahaṃ svairiṇī pāpamohitā svairiṇyo lalitaspṛhāḥ svairī vṛttir na yujyate svodakaiḥ puṣpamiśraiś ca haṇḍe tvaṃ naya putrān me hatavān asurottamam hatavān ekapāṇinā hatavīryaparākramāḥ hatavīryo hataviṣo hataṃ kṛṣṇaṃ nyavedayan hataṃ tasya sutas tataḥ hataṃ tribhuvanaṃ dṛṣṭvā hataṃ brahmavidāṃ dhanam hataṃ mṛtyum avekṣya ca hataṃ hi yasyāḥ parisevanena hataḥ keśī janārdana hataḥ prasenaḥ siṃhena hatāni śaśvad duritāni caiva hatā mayā mahāpāpā hatāyāṃ pūtanāyāṃ ca hatāvaśiṣṭā yāmyās te hatāśena pratāritaḥ hate keśini vismitāḥ hate tu narake bhūmir hate pitari duḥkhārtā hateṣu teṣu kaṃsena hateṣu teṣu devendra hateṣu teṣu bāṇo api hataiśvaryāḥ sureśāna hato dakṣasya sa kratuḥ hato devair mahādeva hato madhuvane vīro hato mayā hatāś cānye hato mṛgas tato mīnaḥ hato yena ca durvṛtto hato asmi rogānalatīvratāpaiḥ hatau bhagavatā tena hatyā sāpīndragāminī hatyāsthānaṃ prakalpya ca hatvā kuvalayāpīḍaṃ hatvā kṣemakarākṣasam hatvā kṣemakarākṣasam hatvā garvasamārūḍho hatvā cārīn sahasraśaḥ hatvā cāsurapuṃgavān hatvā cāsurapuṃgavān hatvā tu keśinaṃ kṛṣṇo hatvā tu pauṇḍrakaṃ śauriḥ hatvā tu so asuraḥ kanyā hatvādāya ca vastrāṇi hatvā dāsye mahauṣadhīḥ hatvā daityān sahasraśaḥ hatvā daityāṃs tu rākṣasān hatvā niveśayām āsa hatvā pañcajanaṃ tathā hatvāpi māṃ na śaktas tvaṃ hatvā balaṃ sa nāgāśva- hatvā muraṃ hayagrīvaṃ hatvā mṛgān varāhāṃś ca hatvā rajisutān sarvān hatvā rasātalaṃ yāto hatvā rākṣasapuṃgavān hatvā rākṣasapuṃgavān hatvā rājyaṃ triviṣṭape hatvā rāmas tu vīryavān hatvā vā kiṃ tu jāyeta hatvā vāliṃ manojavam hatvā venaṃ brahmaśāpair hatvā śambaram āgataḥ hatvā satrājitaṃ suptaṃ hatvā sainyam aśeṣaṃ tu haniṣyati mahābalam haniṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ haniṣyaty asurāṃś cāyaṃ haniṣyāmi vasuṃdhare haniṣyāmi sahānugam haniṣye pitaraṃ caiva hanumatpramukhān mune hanumān iti vikhyātas hanumān nalanīlaś ca hanumān samajāyata hanūmataṃ ca tat proktaṃ hanūmataṃ tathaiva ca hanūmadupamātā vai hanta te saṃpravakṣyāmi hanta te ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi hantavyau tadvadhād rājyaṃ hantā ca śaraṇāgatam hantā tad idam āyātaṃ hantā hantur bhaviṣyati hanti pāti karoti ca hanti bhūtagaṇān naraḥ hanti rājabhaṭaṃ ca yaḥ hantukāmaṃ tadovāca hantum abhyāyayau kopāj hantuṃ kṛtamatir vīram hantuṃ kṛṣṇam abhidrutaḥ hantuṃ cakreṇa codyataḥ hantuṃ cakre tato manaḥ hantuṃ cakre manoratham hantuṃ naiva kṣamā vayam hantuṃ prayatnam akaroj hantrī mama sadā priyā hanmaḥ kṣātreṇa varcasā hanyamānā nirāśrayāḥ hanyās tvaṃ sarvakauravān hanyāṃ sāśvarathadvipān hayagrīvaś ca vīryavān hayadharṣaṇasaṃbhītā hayamūrdhā ca lavaṇo hayamūrdhā tatra viṣṇus hayamedha upakrānte hayamedhaphalaṃ dadyus hayamedhaphalaṃ puṇyaṃ hayamedhaphalaṃ labhet hayamedhaphalaṃ labhet hayamedhaś ca tatrāsīd hayamedhasya niṣpattyai hayamedhasya yajanaṃ hayamedhaṃ mahāyajñaṃ hayamedhaṃ surair yutam hayamedhaḥ prajāpateḥ hayamedhādikṛt tathā hayamedhān sudakṣiṇān hayamedhāya dīkṣitaḥ hayamedhāya dīkṣitaḥ hayamedhāya dīkṣitaḥ hayamedhāya yatnataḥ hayamedhāya yatnavān hayamedhe dvijottamāḥ hayamedhena puṇyena hayamedhena yajate hayamedhe mahākratau hayamedho yathā viprāḥ hayasyāpi tu saṃsthitim hayaṃ jahre śatakratuḥ hayaṃ tam anucinvantas hayārūḍhas tadāpatat hayārūḍhābalā tanvi harakamalāsanaviṣṇusaṃstutasya haraṇān nādhikaṃ kvacit haraṇe kiṃ tadā bhavet haraṇe yatnavanto api harate daśa pāpāni haraye ca mayo māyāṃ haraye śaṅkarāya ca haraye śaṃkarāya ca haraś ca bahurūpaś ca harāṇīṣṭapradāni ca harikeśa namo astu te harikeśavanaṃ tathā haricchmaśrur vibhīṣaṇaḥ hariṇā kṛṣṭacetasaḥ hariṇā krīḍanaṃ nāma hariṇā cakram utsṛṣṭaṃ hariṇā ca harer mune hariṇā daityasūnunā hariṇā parirakṣitaḥ hariṇā lokadhāriṇā hariṇī capalākṣī sā harito rohitasyātha harito lohitaḥ kṛṣṇo haritvaṃ ca kṛte yuge haridattaṃ yathāvidhi haridaśvasya yajñe tu harinārāyaṇaṃ prabhum haribrahmamaheśānāṃ haribrahmādayaḥ surāḥ haribrahmādisahitaṃ haribhaktātmajadveṣa- harim āha ruṣānvitaḥ harir āsīt sanātanaḥ harir evākhilaṃ tena harir nārāyaṇo varam harir vṛṣṇikule prabhuḥ harir vṛṣṇikulodvahaḥ harir vṛṣṇikulodvahaḥ harivarṣaṃ tathaivānyan hariśaṃkarayor mahat hariśaṃkarayor yuddham hariś cakraṃ sudarśanam hariścandra iti tv āsīd hariścandram akalmaṣam hariścandram uvāca ha hariścandrasya nṛpate hariścandrasya putro abhūd hariścandraṃ śunaḥśepaṃ hariścandraṃ sutārthinam hariścandro janeśvaraḥ hariścandro api varuṇaṃ hariścandro api varuṇaṃ harisaṃsmaraṇaṃ param hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ prajāpatim hariṃ ca tuṣṭāva tadātriputraḥ hariṃ tadovāca jaleśasaṃnidhau hariṃ prīto abhavad dhariḥ hariḥ kṛtvodakakriyām hariḥ pramatim abravīt hariḥ prādāt prajāpatīn harītakīvibhītakān harīn sarvān athāmantrya harīśājātmakaṃ ravim hare tvāṃ karuṇārṇavam harer anucaras tatra harer apatyaṃ suvyaktaṃ harer ārādhanaṃ prati harer na kiṃcid vyatiriktam asti tat harer mantrair yathoditam harer līlāviceṣṭitam harer lokam avāpnuyāt hare vada parāyaṇam hare vyākulitendriyaḥ hareś cāyatanaṃ vaṭa hare saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ hareḥ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ hareḥ saṃnihite sthāna hareḥ sthānaṃ vrajanti te hareḥ svacchandatāṃ vrajet haro harir vā gaṅgā vā hartā kartā ca havyavāṭ hartā bhartā tathā prabhuḥ hartāraḥ pararatnānāṃ hartā hara mamāśubham hartum arhasi pādapam haryaṅgasya sutas tatra haryaṅgo asya suto abhavat haryatvatasuto rājā haryaśvaś cātmajaḥ smṛtaḥ haryaśvasya nikumbho abhūt haryaśvā iti viśrutāḥ haryaśveṣv atha naṣṭeṣu harṣagadgadayā girā harṣagadgadayā girā harṣaṇaṃ śuddhabuddhiṃ taṃ harṣaṇaḥ punar abravīt harṣaṇāya tataḥ prādāt harṣaṇo gautamīṃ yayau harṣaṇo asi na saṃśayaḥ harṣanirbharamānasaḥ harṣabāṣpaparītāṅgo harṣabāṣpāśrunayanau harṣam utpādayām āsa harṣayanti na kṛṣyanti harṣaśokānvito mūḍhaḥ harṣasaṃghamahāvegaṃ harṣasya hetau mahatīha jāte harṣāc carāmi purato harṣān novāca kiṃcana harṣeṇa procatur ubhau harṣeṇa mahatā yukto harṣeṇa mahatā yutaḥ harṣotkarṣaikakāraṇe halabhṛtyaṃ sarṣapaṃ ca halaṃ ca balabhadrasya halaṃ jagrāha lāṅgalī halāyudhaṃ subhadrāṃ ca halinaṃ ca subhadrāṃ ca halī bala iti khyāto havanaṃ savanaṃ caiva havanāya samudyataḥ havighnaḥ sukṛtir jyotir havir juhomi vahnau te havir dravyaṃ kare agrahīt havirdhānāt ṣaḍ āgneyī havirdhānān muniśreṣṭhā havirdhāmnaḥ suto dvijāḥ havirbhāgān pṛthak pṛthak havirbhāgārtham āsanna- havirbhiḥ prathamaḥ kalpo havirbhūtāya te namaḥ havir yathā mantrahutaṃ hutāśam haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva haviṣāṃ bhāgadheyāya haviṣyānnena jāyate havīṃṣi ca yaśāṃsi ca havyakavyātivegavān havyaghna iti vikhyātaṃ havyaghna tvaṃ na cānyathā havyabhāgabhujas tathā havyavāṭ śamim āviśat havyavāḍ āha pakṣiṇau havyavāhana eva ca havyavāha namo astu te havyaṃ kavyaṃ yad amṛtaṃ havyaṃ devā naiva cāpur havyaṃ vahantaṃ devānāṃ havyaṃ vahāmi devānāṃ havyaṃ vā kavyam eva ca havyādāṃś ca surāṃś cakre havye vā laukike tathā hasanti ca rudanti ca hasantī cārudarśanā hasantī nṛpatiṃ prekṣya hasantīm iva sarvataḥ hasantīṃ brahmaṇo antike hasantau ca ramantau ca hasanty anye tathāsurāḥ hasaṃś cāpi punaḥ punaḥ hasaṃs tatraiva saṃsthitaḥ hasitaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ hasitotkruṣṭanirghoṣaṃ hastapādaṃ muhuḥ kṣipan hastapādādijīvavat hastapādādijīvavān hastapādaiś ca niyatair hastamātraṃ catuṣkoṇaṃ hastarkṣage dinakare hastasvastikam āropya hastaṃ devasya devyāś ca hastābhyāṃ jāyatāṃ paṇaḥ hastābhyāṃ tatra saṃsthitā hastābhyāṃ yadi vā padbhyāṃ haste gṛhītvā kalaśaṃ haste pragṛhya caikaikāṃ haste śrāddhaprado naraḥ hastyaśvakharaśārdūle hastyaśvabalinā dvijāḥ hastyaśvamṛgapakṣiṇām hastyaśvarathapādātair hastyaśvarathapādātaiḥ hastyaśvarathamukhyānāṃ hastyaśvarathaśālāsu hastyaśvarathasaṃkīrṇā hastyaśvasyandanojjvalam hastyaśvādi tato dhanam hastyārohapracoditam haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇaiś haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇaiś haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇaiḥ haṃsatvaṃ pāradarśinaḥ haṃsanūpuranihrādā haṃsanūpuraśabdāḍhyā haṃsayuktena bhāsvatā haṃsayuktair vimānais tu haṃsayuktair vimānais tu haṃsalīlānugāminyo haṃsavāraṇagāminyaḥ haṃsavāraṇagāminyaḥ haṃsaṃ trijagatāṃ gurum haṃsendukundadhavalaṃ haṃsoktaṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva haṃso nāgas tathāparāḥ haṃso hi niyato vaśī hā kaṣṭaṃ me kim abhavad hā tāta mātaḥ putreti hā tāta mātaḥ putreti hā dhig durdaivaceṣṭitam hānenābhivikalpānāṃ hā putra hanta kālena hāyi hāyi hare hāyi hārakeyūrabhūṣitām hārakeyūrasaṃyuktaṃ hāragokṣīrasaṃnibham hārabhārārpitagrīvaṃ hāriṇī kleśavāriṇī hāriṇo janavittānāṃ hārihāropaśobhitāḥ hārītair jīvajīvakaiḥ hārītair jīvajīvakaiḥ hārītair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca hārīto jāyate naraḥ hārair alaṃkṛtagrīvāḥ hāvabhāvānatagrīvāḥ hāvabhāvānvitagrīvā hāvabhāvāvanāmitāḥ hā vidhe kiṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā hāsaṃ cakre samaṃ kaiścid hāsaṃ saṃjanayan muhuḥ hāsyam īṣad vilokyatām hāsyaṃ taddevasaṃnidhau hāsyaṃ me jāyate vīrās hāsyaḥ parijanasyāpi hāsyāt suto ayaṃ tava deva śūraḥ hāhākārapare loka hāhākārasamākruṣṭaṃ hāhākārasamākruṣṭaṃ hāhākāraḥ suroditaḥ hāhākāro mahāñ jajñe hāhākāro mahān abhūt hā hā kvāsāv iti jano hikkikā procyate jvaraḥ hiṅgūgragandhaṃ phaṇiśaṃ hitajīrṇamitāśanāt hitāya jagataḥ prabho hitāya jagato asurān hitāya sarvalokasya hitāyānugatāya ca hitārthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ hitārthaṃ suramartyānāṃ hitā vihitā purā hitvāgamaṃ suvihitaṃ hitvā ca dehaṃ praviśanti mokṣaṃ hitvā deham imaṃ dvijāḥ hitvā mānaṃ yaśasvinī hitvāyodhyāṃ divaṃ yāto hinasti brāhmaṇān sādhūn hintālair devadārubhiḥ hintālair bījapūrakaiḥ hintālaiś caiva tālaiś ca hintālaiḥ kadalīvanaiḥ hindolayām āsa giriṃ daśāsyo himakṣīraṃ madhutilān himagiritanayāvivāhabhūtyai himavacchikharāśrayā himavacchikhare ramye himavatkandaragatiṃ himavatkandaraśreṣṭhe himavatparvataśreṣṭha himavatparvatāt puṇyād himavatparvatāśritāḥ himavatparvate śreṣṭhe himavatparvatottamāt himavatpādaniḥsṛtāḥ himavatpādaniḥsṛtāḥ himavatpādabhūtale himavatsaṃbhavair mattair himavadvindhyayor madhye himavantam athāgamat himavantaṃ giriṃ natvā himavantaṃ nagottamam himavantaṃ nṛpottamaḥ himavantaṃ mahāśailam himavantaṃ ratnamayaṃ himavantaṃ ratnamayaṃ himavantaṃ hemakūṭaṃ himavān api tad vākyaṃ himavān uttareṇāsya himavān dhyānakovidaḥ himavān sa nagottamaḥ himavān hemakūṭaś ca himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca himaśṛṅgeṣu śukleṣu himācalo atīva tadā rarāja himādreś caiva dakṣiṇe himālayena tat tīrtham hiraṇya iti vikhyāto hiraṇyakalaśe analam hiraṇyakalaśe sthāpya hiraṇyakavacāya ca hiraṇyakaśipur daityo hiraṇyakaśipur yo asau hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ hiraṇyakaśipuś caiva hiraṇyakaśipuḥ pūrvam hiraṇyakaśipor bhayāt hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāś hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāḥ hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sthānam hiraṇyakṛtacūḍāya hiraṇyagarbha śrīnātha hiraṇyagarbhasya sutā hiraṇyagarbhaḥ śakunir hiraṇyagarbhād ṛṣiṇā hiraṇyagarbho brahmātrir hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān hiraṇyaturagādikam hiraṇyadhānyatanaya- hiraṇyanābhas tvaṃ devas hiraṇyapataye namaḥ hiraṇyapuravāsinaḥ hiraṇyapuravāsinaḥ hiraṇyam akṣayaṃ dhenur hiraṇyaromā parjanya hiraṇyavarṇam abhavat hiraṇyavarṇo bhagavān hiraṇyasya suto vīraḥ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ gāvo hiraṇyākṣaś ca vīryavān hiraṇyākṣasutāś caiva hiraṇyāya nyavedayat hiraṇyena tathaiva ca hiṃsāyuktāṃ manonugām hiṃsārthaṃ niṣkṛtiprajñaḥ hīnajātir akiṃcijjño hīnavarṇo yathā śaśī hīnaṃ tena vinā sarvaṃ hīnāyur upajāyate hīnāyus tatra jāyate hīnā vayaṃ mune tena hīnā hīnaṃ tathā dharmaṃ hīnair yuddhaṃ karoty asau hīyate vardhate sadā hutavān vṛjinodbhavaḥ hutahavyavahas tathā hutaṃ caiva tathā prabhuḥ hutaṃ yajñeṣu devatāḥ hutaṃ havir yā ca kṛtā ca pūjā hutārciṣam udāyudham hutāvaśiṣṭaṃ ca dadau hutāśanārkāṃśutaḍidguṇābhaiḥ hutāśano mano buddhir hute vai brahmaṇaḥ sattre hutvāgniṃ vidhivat sā tu hutvāgnau cāmṛtaṃ bahu hutvāgnau tu yathāvidhi hutvā lājāṃś ca vidhivat huvāhāveti vāsakṛt hūyamāne mahāmakhe hūhūś caiva tu sāmagāḥ hūṃhūṃkārāya rudrāya hṛc chiraś ca śikhāvarma- hṛtageho vanaṃ prāpto hṛtadārān gatāpadaḥ hṛtabhṛtyaḥ sa yakṣiṇīm hṛtarājyas tadā rājā hṛtavān kālaśambaraḥ hṛtavān kālaśambaraḥ hṛtavān maṇiparvatam hṛtavān vai mahīpatiḥ hṛtavān vai mahīpatiḥ hṛtasvaṃ dyūtakaiḥ pāpair hṛtasvāmyān suragaṇān hṛtaṃ gehaṃ mamānena hṛtaṃ tena balīyasā hṛtaṃ tribhuvanaṃ mama hṛtaṃ yaṣṭipraharaṇaiḥ hṛtaṃ yena balīyasā hṛtaṃ yais tu kubuddhibhiḥ hṛtaṃ rājyam abhūt kila hṛtaḥ sāṃdīpaner iti hṛtā gā rākṣasaiḥ pāpaiḥ hṛtā caiva parasya ha hṛtāni ca mahīpānāṃ hṛtāni bhavatārjuna hṛtā puṇyajanair viprā hṛtāvakāśā gacchanti hṛtā sthālī muniśreṣṭha hṛto yenābhavat pūrvaṃ hṛto vivekaḥ kenāpi hṛto aśvair dvijasattamāḥ hṛtpadmakoṭare līnaṃ hṛtpadmamadhye mama somanātha hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ hṛtvā piṣṭamayaṃ pūpaṃ hṛtvā raktāni vastrāṇi hṛtvā sa medinīṃ kṛtsnāṃ hṛtvāhaṃ dvārakāṃ punaḥ hṛdante vai tataḥ śīghraṃ hṛdayasthaṃ divākaram hṛdayastho antarātmeti hṛdayaṃ ca pitāmahaḥ hṛdayaṃ priyam eveha hṛdayaṃ rakṣatāt kṛṣṇo hṛdayāni mahāmate hṛdayā pratyapadyata hṛdayāḥ kiṃ na kurvate hṛdaye sa tu vaiśyo api hṛdaye asya niveśaya hṛdi nārāyaṇas tasya hṛdi yat te vyavasthitam hṛdi yasmin niveśite hṛdi vakṣasi pārśvayoḥ hṛdi śūlaṃ nikhanyate hṛdi saṃsthāpayed yadi hṛdyaiś ca tuṣṭair muditair manobhiḥ hṛṣīkeśa urukramaḥ hṛṣīkeśa namo astu te hṛṣīkeśāya vai namaḥ hṛṣīkeśo ambare bhūmau hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇā hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇā hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulāḥ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāḥ sarve hṛṣṭaromābhavad rājā hṛṣṭaḥ provāca śaṃkaram hṛṣṭaḥ sa mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ hṛṣṭā babhūva suprītā hṛṣṭā babhūvuḥ saṃprītā hṛṣṭā babhūvuḥ suprītā hṛṣṭās tatra pṛthak pṛthak hṛṣṭās tatraiva sarvaśaḥ hṛṣṭena manasā dattaṃ hṛṣṭo avasad bhāryayā dharmayuktaḥ hṛṣṭo harṣaṃ paraṃ yayau hetave prabhaviṣṇave heti kṣemaṃ dadāmy aham hetiḥ kapotakī dṛṣṭvā hetutvam ubhayoḥ sthitam hetunā kena gautamaḥ hetunā kena vāgīśa hetubhir nṛpasattamam hetubhir lakṣitau tadā hetubhūtam aśeṣasya hetubhūtaṃ sanātanam hetubhūtāṃ prayaccha me hetubhūtaiḥ purohitaḥ hetur harṣasya me bhavet hetuvādān bahūn āhuḥ hetuś cāpi tvam eva hi hetus trilokasya jagatprasūter hetuṃ vadasveti mahānubhāva hetūn hetuśataiś citraiś hetyulūkaṃ vidur budhāḥ he daityāḥ kiṃ palāyante he pralamba mahābāho hemakakṣaiḥ sapatākair hemante tāmravarṇābhaḥ hemaprākāraveṣṭitam hemamāṣaiḥ kṛtacchidrā hemamauktikam eva ca hemaratnavibhūṣitam hemaśayyāsanayutair hemānīva babhur dvijāḥ he rāma he kṛṣṇa sadā he he kṛṣṇa rathasyoccaiś haimasopānapaṅktayaḥ haimaṃ tālavanaṃ yathā haimaṃ vimānaṃ savalatpatākam haimāḍhyaiḥ kalaśair jalam haimāni vistīrṇajaleṣu keṣucin haihayaś ca hayaś caiva haihayasya tu dāyādyaṃ haihayasya tu dāyādyaṃ haihayasyābhavat putro haihayānāṃ mahātmanām haihayān vijaghānāśu haihayārthe parākraman haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca haihayais tālajaṅghaiś ca hotavyaś ca hutāśanaḥ hotā tvaṃ ca haviḥ kratuḥ hotā dātā ca bhoktā ca hotā yaṣṭā tathaiva ca hotāraṃ ca paraṃ ca yat hotāraṃ cāpi devānāṃ hotāraṃ havyam eva ca hotraṃ hotā ca homyaṃ ca homaṃ kurvan harāntike homaṃ kurvīta buddhimān homaṃ japyaṃ surārcanam homair dhyānais tathārcanaiḥ hy agaman devaparvate hy agastyo munisattamaḥ hy agnir evātra daivatam hy agnir jyotirmayaṃ jagat hy agnir dharmaś ca śāśvataḥ hy agnivaṃśasamudbhavāḥ hy agniṃ taṃ dvijarūpiṇam hy agniḥ śvaśura ity api hy agnīnāṃ paricārakāḥ hy agnau devāś ca mānuṣāḥ hy aṅgārair aṅgirā yataḥ hy aṅgulī rakṣatān mṛgaḥ hy atigaṇḍas tathaiva ca hy atīva phaladaṃ viduḥ hy atra yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ hy adityā garbham āviśat hy anāthāni mahāmune hy anīnaśur aśeṣataḥ hy antarjānuḥ sadā naraḥ hy antardhāmā tataḥ param hy ante viṣṇuṃ śivaṃ smaret hy annaṃ prādāt suvistaram hy anyāṃ pūjāṃ karoti yaḥ hy aparatra janārdanaḥ hy aparaṃ bhīṣaṇākṛti hy aparaḥ sodaro anujaḥ hy aparo mūrta ucyate hy apunarbhāvam āsthitaḥ hy apsarobhyāṃ bruvann iva hy abhinandya yayau śivaḥ hy abhiṣiktaṃ tadā makhe hy amūrtiḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ hy amṛtaḥ para ucyate hy amṛtenārpitāḥ prajāḥ hy ayonim amṛtātmakam hy aruṇo bhānusārathiḥ hy arthārthī paridhāvati hy alpāyāsena vatsaka hy avadhyo asau surāsuraiḥ hy avyaktāgādha ucyate hy avyakto akṣara eva tu hy asito devalas tathā hy ahalyām ānayat tadā hy ahaṃ tapasi niṣṭhitaḥ hy ahaṃ vṛddhas tathaiva ca hy aho vai viprapūjanam hy āsīnās tattvacintakāḥ hy āste tatra nagottame hy evam āha pitāmahaḥ hradasya putrau dvau vīrau hradaṃ kālīyanāgasya hrade asmiñ jīvanāśinaḥ hrasante sūryaraśmayaḥ hrasvadīrghaplutair yat tu hrasvapāt pṛthukukṣikaḥ hrasvāṇy atipramāṇāni hrasvo atimātraḥ puruṣaḥ hrasvo atimātro raktākṣo hrasvodaro hrasvabhujo hrasvo bāhuka eva ca hrādaś ca anuhrādaś ca hriyamāṇas tataḥ kṛṣṇam hrīḥ śrīḥ svāhā sarasvatī hreṣato abhrāvalokinaḥ hreṣitāropakāriṇā
